MatthiBottomActivity

The post has just arrived and in it a very nice surprise, the discovery that Jacques Seguela, one-time adviser to President Mitterrand, now close confidant of President and Madame Sarkozy (indeed he intoduced them), and something of a legend in French political communications, has dedicated his latest book to little old moi.
With apologies for the missing accents here and in the French bits of the long posting which follows – the dedication to ‘Le Pouvoir dans la Peau‘ (Power in the skin) reads ‘A Alastair Campbell, mon spin doctor prefere’ (three missing accents in one word – mes excuses sinceres). without at least some doubt in their eyes. When things are so tight, communications can make the difference. It is not a dirty word.
I don’t agree with all of Seguela’s analysis. I don’t accept that only four US presidents radically changed the country. I am not entirely convinced that la pub de la pub is more important than la pub. I am not sure that David Cameron’s loss of a child had the political impact Seguela thinks it did. I think Brits will be also be surprised at the dominant role he gives in the Tory campaign to his colleague David Jones. I think he overstates how Sarkozy is seen in the world. I agree with him that we need to be cautious about the potential abuse of the internet which has no global governance or regulation to match, but I’m not sure I agree this risks being ‘en bras arme de l’anarchie’. But it is a book full of understanding of some of the big themes and the small details required for a successful campaigning mindset.
He is, as one would expect for someone who has been close to different leaders, clued up on the importance of good chemistry between leader and strategist. He understands the importance of body language as well as language. He knows the importance of emotion as well as reason. He understands how the web is changing politics. One of my favourite phrases is that ‘life is on the record’. He has a different way of putting it. ‘Le “off” n’existe plus desormais. Tout ce que vous direz pourra se retourner contre vous.’ It is why the whole ‘droit d’etre oublie’ is emerging as a debate. How many of the young men and women today filling the web with pictures and confessions from their private lives may end up running for office one day, and regretting their openness? On verra.
Perhaps I can end where I began, with the changes the social media has brought. At the last election Labour did not do poster campaigns. This was a shame. In previous campaigns we had had some brilliant posters. But under Gordon Brown, we had very little money for the campaign. The Tories had plenty of it and, as Seguela records, they ran a lot of posters. One of their most expensive billboard campaigns was of a giant photo of Cameron with an anti-Labour slogan ‘we can’t go on like this.’ Someone noticed that the Tory leader’s face had been airbrushed. This fact became the source of thousands of tweets. Then someone set up a website mydavidcameron.com where people could send their own, largely anti-Tory, versions of this poster. These were sent in in their thousands, and many were much better, wittier and more politically devastating than the original. I’ll tell you when I knew they had wasted their money – when the newspapers carried photos of one giant poster site which had been defaced … Cameron’s hair had been replaced with a painted version of Elvis Presley’s hair, and to the slogan ‘we can’t go on like this’ had been added the words of one of Elvis’ most famous songs … ‘with suspicious minds’. The combination of the internet and wit had reduced the political impact of a hugely expensive campaign to zero. That is my final thought as you begin to read Jacques Seguela’s account. It is a quote from a former colleague, Labour MP Hazel Blears … ‘Campaigning is like sex. If you’re not enjoying it, you’re not doing it properly.’

Johan 01 

1 Ahanbada wahei adu leirammi, wahei adu Iswarga leiminnarammi, amasung wahei adu Iswar oirammi. 

2 Ibungo mahak asina ahanbada Iswarga leiminnarammi. 

3 Pot pumnamak Ibungo mahakki mapanna oirakle, amasung oirakkhrabada adu Ibungo mahak nattana kari amatta oirakte. 

4 Ibungo mangonda hingba leirammi, aduga hingba adu misinggi mangal oirammi. 

5 Amasung mangal aduna amambada ngalli, aduga amamba aduna madunu ngamde. 

6 Maming Johan kouba Iswardagi tharakpa mi ama phaoraki. 

7 Mahak asina mangal adugi maramda sakshi pinanaba, pumnamak mahakki mapanna thajanaba, mahakna sakshigi damak lakle. 

8 Mahakti mangal adu oiramde, touigumbasung mangal adugi maramda mahakna sakshi pinanabani. 

9 Taibangpanda lakliba, mi khudingbu nganbiba, achumba mangal adu leirammi. 

10 Ibungodi taibangpanda leirammi, aduga Ibungogi mapanna taibangpal oirakle, amasung taibangpanna Ibungobu khanglamde. 

11 Ibungona masagi oiba maphamda lengbiraki, aduga Ibungogi masagi oiba misingna Ibungobu lousinde. 

12 Touigumbasung Ibungobu lousillaba makheida haibadi Ibungogi mingda thajaba makhoi aduda, Iswargi machasing oiraknanaba Ibungona matik pibire. 

13 Makhoi pokkraba adudi idagisu, hakchanggi ningbadagisu, migi ningbadagisu natte, adubu Iswardagini. 

14 Amasung wahei aduna sayollaktuna, thoujanne achumbane pithanduna eikhoigi irakta leibirare; aduga mapadagi amata ngaiba machagi matik mangal oiba adugumba Ibungogi matik mangal adu eikhoina ujare. 

15 Johanna Ibungogi maramda sakshi piduna laona hai, Ibungo mahakki maramda, eigi tungda lengbirakpa Ibungona imang thrakli, maramdi Ibungodi eingondagi hanna leirammi haina eina haikhiba Ibungo adu asini. 

16 Maramdi Ibungogi athanbadagi thoujangi mathakta thoujansu eikhoi pumnamakna phangjare. 

17 Maramdi Mousigi mapanna wayel yathang adubu pire, Jisu Khristagi mapanna thoujan amasung achumba adu thokle. 

18 Iswarbu kana amatana khak ude, amata ngaiba macha nipa Iswar, mapagi thrakta leiriba Ibungo aduna Ibungo mahakpu phongdokle. 

Baptais toubiba Johanna Jisugi maramda sakshi piba 

19 Amahiksung, nahak kanano, haina hangnanaba Jihudisingna Jerusalemdagi purohitsing amasung Lebiyansingbu tharakpada, Johangi sakshi adu asini. 

20 Mahakna haisu haidokle, amasung yadabasu toude, adubu, eidi Khrista adu natte, haina mahakna haidokle. 

21 Amasung makhoina hangle, adu oirabadi, karino? Nahak Eliyara? Aduga mahakna khumle, natte. 

22 Maram aduna makhoina mangonda hai, eikhoibu tharakpasingda eikhoina paokhum pinanaba, nahak kanano? Nahak nasagi maramda kari hairibano? 

23 Mahakna hai, Iswargi wa takthokpa Jisaiyana haikhibagumna, prabhugi lambi adu chumhallu, haina lamjaoda amana laoribagi khonjel eini. 

24 Makhoidi pharisisingdagi tharakpani. 

25 Aduga makhoina mangonda hanglaki, adu oiraga nahak Khristasu, Eliyasu, Iswargi wa takthokpa adusu nattrabadi, nahakna baptais toubiriba karigino? 

26 Johanna makhoida khumlaki, einadi isingda baptais toubi, eigi tungda lengbirakpa, nakhoina khangdaba Ibungo mahak adu nakhoigi narakta lepli. 

27 Ibungogi khugrang mari adu eina louthokpa itik chade. 

28 Johanna baptais toubiba mapham, Jordan wangmada Bethaniyada thabak makhei asi thokle. 

29 Adugi nongngalaga Jisuna mangolomda lenglakpa uduna mahakna hai, yengu, Iswargi yao macha, taibangpanbagi pap pubiba adu! 

30 Ibungogi maramda, eigi mang tharakliba nipana itungda lenglaki, maramdi Ibungodi eingondagi hanna leirammi haiduna eina haikhiba Ibungo adu asini. 

31 Aduga einadi Ibungobu khanglamde; adubu Ibungobu Israyelsingda phongdoknanabagi damak eina isingda baptais toubiduna lakle. 

32 Amasung Johanna sakshi piduna hai, thawai aduna swargadagi khunungumna kumtharakpa eina ure, aduga masina Ibungogi thakta leibire. 

33 Aduga einadi Ibungobu khanglamde; adubu isingda baptais toubinanaba eibu tharakpa Ibungo mahak aduna eingonda hai, thawai aduna kumtharaktuna kanagumbagi mathakta leibiriba nangna ugani, asimakna thawai asengbada baptais toubiba Ibungoni. 

34 Amasung eina ure, aduga masi Iswargi macha nipa aduni haiduna eina sakshi pire. 

Baptais toubiba Johangi seboksing amasung Jisu 

35 Amuk adugi nongngallaga Johanga mahakki seboksinggi aniga leplammi; 

36 Maduda Jisuna khonglengliba adu yengduna mahakna hai, yengu, Iswargi yao macha adu! 

37 Aduga mahakki sebok ani aduna mahakna nganba adu tarabada, Jisugi tung ille. 

38 Maduda Jisuna ollaktuna, makhoina tung illakliba adu urabada, makhoida hai, nakhoina kari thiribano? Aduga makhoina Ibungoda hai, Rabbi (haiba asi handokpada guru haibani), Ibungo kadaida leibage 

39 Ibungona makhoida hai, laku, ugani, maram aduna makhoina laklaga Ibungogi leipham ure, aduga makhoina numit adu Ibungoga leiminnare, madu tarasuba pung aduwaini. 

40 Johangi wa taduna, Ibungogi tung inba ani adugi amadi, Simon Pitargi manao nipa Andriya oirammi. 

41 Mahak asina ahanbada mahakmakki mayamba Simonbu phangduna, mangonda hai, eikhoina Masiha phangjare (haiba asi handokpada Khrista haibani) 

42 Mahakna mahakpu Jisugi nakta purakle, Jisuna mangonda yengduna hai, nangdi Johangi macha nipa Simonni, nangbu Keipha kougani(haiba asi handokpada Pitare haibai) 

43 Adugi nongngallakpada Ibungona Galil tanna lengningle, aduga Philippu phangladuna, Jisuna mangonda hai, eigi itung illu. 

44 Philipti Andriya amasung Pitargi khul Betseidadagi oirammi. 

45 Philipna Nathaniyel phangduna, mangonda hai, Mousina wayel yathang adugi lairikta amsung Iswargi wa takthokpasingna ikhiba Ibungo adubu eikhoina phangjare, madu Jousephki macha nipa Nasaretki Jisu aduni. 

46 Maduda Nathaniyelna mangonda hai, Nasarettagi karigumba aphaba thokpa ngambra? Philipna mangonda hai, laktuna yengu. 

47 Jisuna manakta Nathaniyel lakpa uraduna mahakki maramda hai, yengu tasengnamak Israyelgi mini, mangonda lingjel chumdaba leite! 

48 Nathaniyelna Ibungoda hai, karamna eibu khangbibage? Jisuna mangonda khumlaki, Philipna nangbu koudringeida nangna heiyet pambigi makhada leiba adu eina ukhi. 

49 Nathaniyelna Ibungoda khumle, Rabbi, Ibungodi Iswargi macha nipani, Ibungodi Israyelgi ningthouni. 

50 Jisuna mangonda khumlaki, eina nangbu heiyet pambigi makhada ukhi haina nangonda haibagi maramna thajabra? Asidagi henna achou achouba thabak nangna ugani. 

51 Amasung Ibungona mangonda hai, eina nakhoida thanggei sengnamak hairibani, swarga hangdoklaba amasung Iswargi dutsingna migi macha nipa adugi mathakta kakhatkhumtha touba nakhoina ugani.

Johan 02 

Kanada Luhongba 

1 Adudagi numit humni subada Galilgi Kanada luhongba ama thokle, aduga Jisugi mama maduda yaorammi. 

2 Amasung luhongba aduda Jisubusu, Ibungogi seboksingbusu bartton toure. 

3 Aduga draksha mahi watlabada, Jisugi mamana Ibungoda hai, makhoigi draksha mahi leitre. 

4 Maduda Jisuna mamada hai, he nupi, eina nangga kari toupham leibage? Houjik eigi pungpham laktri. 

5 Ibungogi mamana manaisingda hai, Ibungona nakhoida haiba haiba adu tou. 

6 Mapham aduda Jihudisinggi hounabi matung inna sengdoknaba mon ani ahum chanba nunggi kharaung taruk khillammi. 

7 Jisuna makhoida hai, kharung makhei adu ising thalhallu, aduga makhoina kharung makhei adu mamai phaoba thalhalle. 

8 Maduda Ibungona makhoida hai, houjikti sokkat tuna, chakkhangbagi arang puren aduda pukho, aduga makhoina madu pukhre. 

9 Amasung chakkhangba adugi arang purenna draksha mahi ollaba ising adu tangbada madu kadaidagino khangdaduna(adubu ising adu sokkatpa manaising adunadi khangkhi), chakkhangba adugi arang purenna bor adubu kouraga mangonda hai, 

10 Mi khudingna ahanbada aphaba draksha mahi pithaknei, aduga misingna penna thaklabada, khara hanthaba pithaknei, nahakti houjik phaoba aphaba draksha mahi adu khakle. 

11 Khudamsinggi ahouba asi Jisuna Galilgi Kanada touduna, Ibungoda matik mangal phongdokle, aduga seboksing aduna Ibungoda thajare. 

12 Asigi matungda Ibungo, mama, machin manao amasung Ibungogi seboksingna Kapharnahumda lengthakhre, aduga makhoina maduda numit kuina leiramde. 

Iswar ningnasang sengdokpa 

13 Amahiksung Jihudisinggi aranchakkhangba adu naksillakpada, Jisuna Jerusalemda lengkhatle. 

14 Aduga Ibungona Iswar ningnasangda san, yao, khunu yollibasing amasung sel kaibasingna phamliba adu phangle. 

15 Maduda Ibungona thourigi sajei semduna, yaosu sansu pumnamak Iswar ningnasangdagi tanthokle, amasung sel kaiba singgi senjoi adu Ibungona heidokpiduna, makhoigi mej makhei mathak makha onthokpire. 

16 Aduga khunu yonbasingda Ibungona hai, potsing asi asidagi puthokkhro, eigi Ipagi yum lallonbagi yum oihanganu. 

17 Ibungo nahakki yumgi damak thawai yaona ningbana eibu chatthokani haina ikhiba adu Ibungogi seboksingna ningsingle. 

18 Maram aduna Jihudinsingna Ibungoda khumlaki, nahakna thabak asi toubagi maramna eikhoida kari khudam uhanbage? 

19 Jisuna makhoida khumle, asengba mapaham asi manghallu, aduga eina numit humnida hougathangani. 

20 Maram aduna Jihudisingna hai, asengba mapham asi sabada chahi niphutaruk changkhi, aduga nahakti numit humnida hougathangera? 

21 Touigumbasung Ibungonadi Ibungogi hakchang asengba mapham oibagi maramda hairammi. 

22 Maram aduna Ibungona asibasinggi maraktagi hinggatpada, Ibungona asi hairammi haina Ibungogi seboksingna ningsingle, aduga makhoina sastrabusu Jisuna haikhiba wa adubusu thajare. 

23 Amahiksung Ibungona Jerusalemda aranchakkhangba matamda leiringeida, Ibungona touramliba khudamsing uduna, Ibungogi mingda ayambana thajare. 

24 Touigumbasung Jisu masana masabu makhoida thajana sinnade, maramdi Ibungona mi pumnamakpu khangi, 

25 Amasung migi maramda kanagumbana sakshi piba Ibungogi kananaba leiramde, maramdi migi manungda kari leibage Ibungo masana khanglammi.

The Wedding at Cana 2\n\n On the third day there was a wedding at Cana in Galilee, and the mother of Jesus was there. 2 Jesus also was invited to the wedding with his disciples. 3 When the wine ran out, the mother of Jesus said to him, “They have no wine.” 4 And Jesus said to her, “Woman, what does this have to do with me? My hour has not yet come.” 5 His mother said to the servants, “Do whatever he tells you.” 6 Now there were six stone water jars there for the Jewish rites of purification, each holding twenty or thirty gallons.[a] 7 Jesus said to the servants, “Fill the jars with water.” And they filled them up to the brim. 8 And he said to them, “Now draw some out and take it to the master of the feast.” So they took it. 9 When the master of the feast tasted the water now become wine, and did not know where it came from (though the servants who had drawn the water knew), the master of the feast called the bridegroom 10 and said to him, “Everyone serves the good wine first, and when people have drunk freely, then the poor wine. But you have kept the good wine until now.” 11 This, the first of his signs, Jesus did at Cana in Galilee, and manifested his glory. And his disciples believed in him. 12 After this he went down to Capernaum, with his mother and his brothers[b] and his disciples, and they stayed there for a few days. Jesus Cleanses the Temple 13 The Passover of the Jews was at hand, and Jesus went up to Jerusalem. 14 In the temple he found those who were selling oxen and sheep and pigeons, and the money-changers sitting there. 15 And making a whip of cords, he drove them all out of the temple, with the sheep and oxen. And he poured out the coins of the money-changers and overturned their tables. 16 And he told those who sold the pigeons, “Take these things away; do not make my Father\'s house a house of trade.” 17 His disciples remembered that it was written, “Zeal for your house will consume me.” 18 So the Jews said to him, “What sign do you show us for doing these things?” 19 Jesus answered them, “Destroy this temple, and in three days I will raise it up.” 20 The Jews then said, “It has taken forty-six years to build this temple,[c] and will you raise it up in three days?” 21 But he was speaking about the temple of his body. 22 When therefore he was raised from the dead, his disciples remembered that he had said this, and they believed the Scripture and the word that Jesus had spoken. Jesus Knows What Is in Man 23 Now when he was in Jerusalem at the Passover Feast, many believed in his name when they saw the signs that he was doing. 24 But Jesus on his part did not entrust himself to them, because he knew all people 25 and needed no one to bear witness about man, for he himself knew what was in man.

Johan 03 

Jisuna Nikodimbu tambiba 

1 Amahiksung pharisisinggi maraktagi maming Nikodim kouba, Jihudisinggi luchingba mi ama leirammi. 

2 Mi asina Ibungogi nakta ahingda laktuna Ibungoda hai, Rabbi, Ibungodi Iswardagi lengbirakpa guru amani haiba eikhoina khangi, maramdi Ibungona touriba khudamsing asi, Iswarna mahakka loinabidrabadi, kana amatana touba ngamde. 

3 Jisuna mangonda khumlaki, eina nangonda thanggei sengnamak hairibani, kanagumbana nouna poktrabadi, mahakna Iswargi leibak adu uba ngamde. 

4 Nikodimna Ibungoda hai, mina hanurabada karamna pokpa ngambage? Mahak anirak mamagi puknungda changduna pokpa ngambra? 

5 Jisuna Khumle, eina nangonda thanggeisengnamak hairibani, kanagumbana ising amasung thawaidagi poktrabadi, mahakna Iswargi leibakta changba ngamde. 

6 Hakchangdagi poklaba adu hakchangni, aduga thawaidagi poklaba adu thawaini. 

7 Nakhoina nouna pokpa tare haiduna eina nangonda haikhiba aduda ngakkanu, 

8 Nungsitna sitning sitningbada sitli, aduga nangna madugi makhol tai, adubu madu kadaidagi lakpano aduga kadaida chatpano khangde, adugumduna thawaidagi poklaba mi khudingmak oiribani. 

9 Nikodimna Ibungoda khumlaki, asising asi karamna oiba ngambage? 

10 Jisuna mangonda khumlaki, nahakti Israyelgi guru oiraga, asising asi khangdabra? 

11 Eina nangonda thanggei sengnamak hairibani, eikhoina khangba adu eikhoina nganglibani, amasung eikhoina ukhraba adugi maramda eikhoina sakshi piribani, aduga nakhoina eikhoigi sakshi loude. 

12 Taibangpanda touba thabak nakhoida eina takpirabada nakhoina thajadrabadi, swargada touba thabak nakhoida takpiragadi, nakhoina karamna thajagadage? 

13 Amasung migi macha nipa adu, swargadagi kumtharakpa mahak adu nattana, kana amatanasu swargada kadri. 

14 Mousina lamjaoda lil adubu thanggatpa adugumna, migi macha nipa adubu thanggatpa tare 

15 Aduga mangonda thajaba khudingna lomba naidaba hingba phangbani, 

16 Maramdi Iswarna taibangpanbabu asup nungsibire, haibadi, Ibungo mahakki amata ngairaba macha nipa adubu pibire, aduna macha nipa adubu thajaba mi khudingna mangdaduna, lomba naidaba hingba phangbani. 

17 Maramdi Iswarna macha nipa adubu taibangpanbabu wayennanaba taibangpanda thabiba natte, adubu Ibungogi mapanna taibangpanbabu kanbinanabani. 

18 Ibungogi thajaba mahak adubu wayel toubide, thajadaba mahak adugi wayel loikhre, maramdi mahakna Iswargi amata ngairaba macha nipa adugi mingda thajakhide. 

19 Amasung wayel adu asini, haibadi, mangal adu taibangpanbada laklabani, aduga mangal adudagi misingna amambabu henna pamle, maramdi makhoigi thabak makhei phattaba oirammi. 

20 Maramdi phattaba touba mi khudingna mangal adubu tukkachei, aduga mahakki thabakki maral phongdokkani haiduna, magi manakta lakte. 

21 Touigumbasung achumba touriba mahak aduna mahakki thabak adu Iswarda tourabani haina phongdoknanaba, mangal adugi manakta laki. 

Baptais toubiba Johanna Jisugi maramda amuk henna sakshi piba 

22 Asigi matungda Jisuga seboksingana Jihudiya leibakta lenglakle, amasung maduda Ibungona makhoiga loinana leiminnaduna baptais toubirammi. 

23 Aduga Johannasu Salimgi manak Einonda baptais toubirammi, maramdi mapham aduda ising yamna lei, amasung misingna laktuna baptais lourammi. 

24 Maramdi matam aduda Herodna Johanbu keisumsangda thajindri. 

25 Maram aduna Johangi seboksingga Jihudi amaga sengdokpagi maramda hangdok hangjin tounarakle. 

26 Amasung makhoina Johangi maphamda laktuna mangonda hai, Rabbi, Jordan wangmada nahakka leiminnaramba mahakki maramda nahakna sakshi pikhraba mi adu, yengu, mahak asina baptais toubiri, aduga mi pumnamakna mangonda laki. 

27 Johanna khumlaki, swargadagi mangonda pirakpa nattanadi, mina karisu phangba ngamde. 

28 Eidi Khrista adu natte, adubu Ibungogi mang thana eibu tharakle haiduna eina haikhiba aduda nakhoi nasamakna eigi sakshi oiribani. 

29 Mou anoubi phangba mahak adu borni, touigumbasung leptuna mahakki wa tariba borgi marup aduna borgi khonjel tabagi maramna yamna haraojei, maram aduna eigi haraoba asi mapung phahalle. 

30 Ibungodi chaokhatpa tai, adubu eidi hanthaba tai. 

31 Mathaktagi lenglakliba Ibungo aduna pumnamakki mathak oi, prithibidagi oiba mahak aduna prithibidagini, amasung mahakna prithibidagi oiba wa ngangi, swargadagi lenglakliba Ibungo aduna pumnamakki mathak oi. 

32 Ibungona ukhraba, takhraba adugi waram Ibungona sakshi pibiri, aduga mi kana amatana Ibungogi sakshi adu loubide. 

33 Ibungogi sakshi loukhraba mahak aduna Iswar achumbani haina chum namle. 

34 Maramdi Iswarna tharakpa aduna Iswargi wahei ngangi, maramdi Ibungo mahakna thawai adubu chang tamduna pide. 

35 Mapana macha nipa adubu nungsi amasung Ibungogi khutta pumnamak pibire. 

36 Macha nipa adubu thajaba mahak aduna lomba naidaba hingba phangle touigumba sung macha nipa adugi wa indaba mahak aduna hingba uroi, adubu Iswargi asaoba mahakki mathakta lei.

You Must Be Born Again

 1 Now there was a man of the Pharisees named Nicodemus, a ruler of the Jews. 2 This man came to Jesus[a] by night and said to him, “Rabbi, we know that you are a teacher come from God, for no one can do these signs that you do unless God is with him.” 3 Jesus answered him, “Truly, truly, I say to you, unless one is born again[b] he cannot see the kingdom of God.” 4 Nicodemus said to him, “How can a man be born when he is old? Can he enter a second time into his mother's womb and be born?” 5 Jesus answered, “Truly, truly, I say to you, unless one is born of water and the Spirit, he cannot enter the kingdom of God. 6 That which is born of the flesh is flesh, and that which is born of the Spirit is spirit.[c] 7 Do not marvel that I said to you, ‘You[d] must be born again.’ 8 The wind[e] blows where it wishes, and you hear its sound, but you do not know where it comes from or where it goes. So it is with everyone who is born of the Spirit.” 9 Nicodemus said to him, “How can these things be?” 10 Jesus answered him, “Are you the teacher of Israel and yet you do not understand these things? 11 Truly, truly, I say to you, we speak of what we know, and bear witness to what we have seen, but you[f] do not receive our testimony. 12 If I have told you earthly things and you do not believe, how can you believe if I tell you heavenly things? 13 No one has ascended into heaven except he who descended from heaven, the Son of Man.[g] 14 And as Moses lifted up the serpent in the wilderness, so must the Son of Man be lifted up, 15 that whoever believes in him may have eternal life.[h] For God So Loved the World 16 “For God so loved the world,[i] that he gave his only Son, that whoever believes in him should not perish but have eternal life. 17 For God did not send his Son into the world to condemn the world, but in order that the world might be saved through him. 

18 Whoever believes in him is not condemned, but whoever does not believe is condemned already, because he has not believed in the name of the only Son of God. 19 And this is the judgment: the light has come into the world, and people loved the darkness rather than the light because their works were evil. 20 For everyone who does wicked things hates the light and does not come to the light, lest his works should be exposed. 21 But whoever does what is true comes to the light, so that it may be clearly seen that his works have been carried out in God.” John the Baptist Exalts Christ 22 After this Jesus and his disciples went into the Judean countryside, and he remained there with them and was baptizing. 23 John also was baptizing at Aenon near Salim, because water was plentiful there, and people were coming and being baptized 24 (for John had not yet been put in prison). 25 Now a discussion arose between some of John's disciples and a Jew over purification. 26 And they came to John and said to him, “Rabbi, he who was with you across the Jordan, to whom you bore witness—look, he is baptizing, and all are going to him.” 27 John answered, “A person cannot receive even one thing unless it is given him from heaven. 28 You yourselves bear me witness, that I said, ‘I am not the Christ, but I have been sent before him.’ 29 The one who has the bride is the bridegroom. The friend of the bridegroom, who stands and hears him, rejoices greatly at the bridegroom's voice. Therefore this joy of mine is now complete. 30 He must increase, but I must decrease.”[j] 31 He who comes from above is above all. He who is of the earth belongs to the earth and speaks in an earthly way. He who comes from heaven is above all. 32 He bears witness to what he has seen and heard, yet no one receives his testimony. 33 Whoever receives his testimony sets his seal to this, that God is true. 34 For he whom God has sent utters the words of God, for he gives the Spirit without measure. 35 The Father loves the Son and has given all things into his hand. 36 Whoever believes in the Son has eternal life; whoever does not obey the Son shall not see life, but the wrath of God remains on him.

Johan 04 

Jisuga Samariyagi nupi amaga 

1 Maram aduna Jisuna seboksing semduna baptais toubiduna Johandagi helli, haibasi pharisisingna takhre haiba prabhuna khanglabada 

2 (Asi hairabasu Jisu masamakna baptais toubide, touigumbasung Ibungogi seboksingnani), 

3 Ibungona Jihudiya thadoktuna, Galilda amuk lengthokhre, 

4 Amasung Ibungona Samariya phaoduna chatpa tare, 

5 Asum touna Jakobna macha nipa Jousephta pikhiba lam machet adugi manakta, Sukhar kouba Samariyagi khunda Ibungona lenglaki. 

6 Aduga Jakobki guha maduda leirammi, maram aduna Jisuna lamchatpada waraduna, guha adugi manakta asum phamlammi, madu taruksuba pung aduwaini. 

7 Samariyagi nupi amana ising soknanaba laki, Jisuna mangonda hai, eingonda thaknaba ising pibiyu. 

8 Maramdi Ibungogi seboksingna khullakta acha athak leiba chatkhi. 

9 Maram aduna Samariya nupi aduna Ibungoda hai, nahakti Jihudi mi oiraga, Samariya nupi oibi eingondagi karamna thaknaba ising niribage? (Maramdi Jihudisingna Samariyasingga samnade). 

10 Jisuna mangonda khumlaki, nanga Iswargi khudon adu amasung eingonda thaknaba ising pibiyu haina nangonda haiba adu kanano khanglamlabadi, nangna mangondagi niramgadabani, aduga mahakna nangonda ahingba ising pibiramgadabani. 

11 Nupi aduna Ibungoda hai, Ibungo, nahakki ising sokna naba karisu leite, guhasu lui, adunadi ahingba ising adu nahakna kadaidagi phanglabage? 

12 Eikhoigi apokpa Jakobtagi nahakna henna chaobra? Mahakna guha asi eikhoida pibiramle, aduga masanasu, mahakki machasingnasu, mahakki sa sannasu masidagi thaknei. 

13 Jisuna mangonda khumlaki, ising asi thakpa mi khudingna amuk khoranggani. 

14 Adubu eina pigadaba ising adu athak athakpa makheina khak khouranlaroi, touigumbasung eina pigadaba ising adu lomba naidana hingnabagi damak thoklakpa isinggi iphut mangonda oirakkani. 

15 Nupi aduna Ibungoda hai, Ibungo, eina khourangdananaba amasung ising soknaba asi tanna laktananaba, eingonda ising asi pibiyu. 

16 Jisuna mangonda hai, chatlu, nanggi napuroiba asida kouraku. 

17 Nupi aduna Ibungoda khumlaki, eigi ipuroiba leijade, Jisuna mangonda haikhi, eigi ipuroiba leijade haiba nangna phajana haire; 

18 Maramdi nanggi napuroiba manga sure, amasung houjik nanggi leiriba adu nangi napuroiba natte; nanga haiba asi achumbani. 

19 Nupi aduna Ibungoda hai, Ibungo, nahakti Iswargi wa takthokpa amani haiba eina ui. 

20 Eikhoigi ipa ipusingna ching asida Iswarbu khurumjare, aduga nakhoinadi hai, khurumjagadaba mapham adudi Jerusalemdani. 

21 Jisuna mangonda hai, eibu thajou, he nupi, napa adubu ching asidasu Jerusalemdasu nakhoina khurumjaroidaba pungpham adu lakli. 

22 Nakhoina khangdaba adu khurummi, Eikhoinadi khangba adu khurummi, maramdi Jihudisingdagi aran khubam oi. 

23 Touigumbasung achumba khurumbasingna mapa adubu thawaida amasung achumbada khurumjagadaba pungpham adu laksu lakli, houjiksu oiri, maramdi Mapa aduna Ibungo mahakpu khurumjabasing asigumbabu thiri. 

24 Iswardi thawaini, aduga Ibungo mahak pu khurumjabasing aduna thawaida amasung achumbada khurumjaba tare. 

25 Nupi aduna Ibungoda hai, Masiha (Khrista haina kouba adu) lenglakkani haiba eina khangi; Ibungona lenglakpa matamda eikhoida pumnamak khanghanbigani. 

26 Jisuna mangonda hai, nangonda wa ngangliba eimak mahakni. 

27 Matam asida Ibungogi seboksing lakle, aduga Ibungona nupiga wa ngangnaba aduda makhoina ngaklammi, adum oinamakpu Ibungona kari thiribage, nattraga Ibungona mahakka karigi wa ngangnaribage haina kananasu haide. 

28 Maduda nupi aduna magi isigpul thanamlaga khullakta chatkhiduna, misingda hai, 

29 Laku, eina toukhi toukhiba pumnamak eingonda haiba mi yenglarao, masi Khrista adu oiramgadra? 

30 Makhoina khunadagi thoklatuna Ibungogi nakta lakpa houre. 

31 Tallak asida seboksingna Ibungoda haijaraki, Rabbi, luk habiyu. 

32 Touigumbasung Ibungona makhoida hai, nakhoina khangdaba chananaba eigi achapot lei. 

33 Maram aduna seboksingna amaga amaga hainarammi, kanagumbana Ibungoda karigumba chananaba pubirakpra? 

34 Jisuna makhoida hai, eibu tharakpa Ibungo mahakki ningba adu touba amasung Ibungo mahakki thabak changkhonna loiba, asi eigi achapotni. 

35 Houjik tha mari leiraga lourok tha lakkani haina nakhoina hainadabra? Yengu, eina nakhoida hairi, houjik lou loknanaba khoingang sare haiduna,nakok thanggattuna loubuk yengu. 

36 Ahunba mahakka akhaoba mahak aduna asumal phangi, aduga lomba naidana hingnabagi damak mahei khomjilli. 

37 Maramdi masida, amana maru hulli aduga atei amana khaoi, haibasi achumbani. 

38 Nakhoina nomdaba aduda khaonanaba eina nakhoibu thare; ateisingna nomle, aduga nakhoinadi makhoigi nomba aduda changle. 

39 Amahiksung, eina toukhi toukhiba pumnamak mahakna eingonda haire, haiduna sakshi pikhiba nupi adugi wadagi khul adudagi Samariyagi mi ayambana Ibungobu thajare. 

40 Asum touna Samariya misingna Ibungogi nakta laklaga, makhoiga leiminnanaba Ibungoda haijei; aduga Ibungona mapham aduda numit nini leirame. 

41 Amasung Ibungona haiba wa adudagi amuk henna ayambana thajare; 

42 Aduga makhoina nupi aduda hairammi, nahakna tambagi maramna eikhoina houjik thajaba natte, maramdi eikhoi isamakna tare, tasengnamak asi taibang panbagi kanbiba mapu aduni haiba khangi. 

Jisuna Galilda ningthougi phamnaibagi macha nipabu anaba phahanbiba 

43 Numit nini adugi matungda Ibungona mapham adudagi Galilda lengsinkhre. 

44 Maramdi Iswargi wa takthokpabu mahakmakki mareibakta ikaikhumnabide haiba Jisu masamakna sakshi pire. 

45 Asum touna Ibungona Galilda lenglaklabada, chakkhangbada Ibungona toukhiba pumnamak adu Galilgi misingna Jerusalemda ukhraduna, Ibungobu lousinjare; maramdi makhoisu chakkhangba aduda chatlui. 

46 Maram aduna Ibungona isingbu draksha mahi olhankhiba Galilgi Kanada amuk lenglakle, aduga Kapharnahumda macha nipa nariba ningthougi phamnaiba kanagumba ama leirammi. 

47 Mahak asina Jisu Jihudiyadagi Galidagi lengsillakle haiba tarabada, mahakna Ibungogi nakta chatkhiduna, Ibungona lengthabiraklaga, mahakki macha nipabu naba phahanbinaba haijei, maramdi mahak sigadourammi. 

48 Maram aduna Jisuna mangonda hai, nakhoina khudamsing amasung angak angakpa udrabadi, nakhoina suptha thajaroi. 

49 Phamnaiba aduna Ibungoda hai, Ibungo, icha sidringeida lengthabiyu. 

50 Jisuna mangonda hai, chatlu, nacha nipa hingli, mi aduna Jisuna mangonda haiba wa adu thajaduna chatpa houre. 

51 Aduga mahakna asum kumtharaklingeida, mahakki macha hingle haina tamlaba mahakki minaisingga oknare. 

52 Maram aduna machana naba phaba houkhiba pung adu mahakna makhoida hangle, maram aduna makhoina mangonda hai, ngarang taretsuba pungda mahak arum thokhre. 

53 Maduda Jisuna mangonda, nacha nipa hingli, haiba pung adumakta oirammi haiba mapa aduna khangle, amasung mahak masasu mahakki imung apumbasu thajare. 

54 Masi Jisuna Jihudiyagi Galilda lenglakba matungda amuk henna toukhiba anigumba khudamni.

Johan 05 

Bethesda kouba pukhrida masa sonba mi amabu phahanbiba 

1 Asigi matungda Jihudisinggi chakkhangba ama thokpada, Jisuna Jerusalemda lengkhatle. 

2 Jerusalenda yaogi thongjao manakta, Ibriya londa Bethesda kouba, hojang manga leiba pukhri ama lei, pukhri asigi hojang manga leirammi. 

3 Hojang manga asida anaba, mittangba, khongtekpa, yangganba miyam hiplammi. (Makhoina ising lengba ngaiduna lei). 

4 Maramdi kari karigumba matamda pukhri aduda swargadut amana kumlaktuna ising adu lenghalli, ising adu lenghanba adugi matungda kanagumba amana hanna ising aduda kumtharabadi, mahakki karigumba laithung thunglabasu, madudagi kokkadabani. 

5 Aduga chahi kunthra nipal suna masa sonba kanagumba mi ama maduda leirammi. 

6 Mi asina hipliba Jisuna uduna, amasung houjik naba matam kuikhre haiba khangduna, mangonda hai, nang phajarage ningbra? 

7 Anaba mi aduna Ibungoda khumjei, Ibungo, ising lenghanba matamda eibu pukhrida puthabinanaba eigi mi leijade, touigumbasung eina chatlingeida attopa mi amana eingondagi hanna kumthakhi. 

8 Jisuna mangonda hai, hougatlo, nanggi hipnapham loukhattuna chatlo. 

9 Aduga khudak adumaktada mi aduna pumpha phaduna magi hipnapham loukhatlaga chatlammi, numit adudi potthaba numit oirammi. 

10 Maram aduna anaba phakhiba mi aduda Jihudisingna hai, potthaba numitni, aduga nangna nanggi hipnapham loukhatpa wayel kai. 

11 Touigumbasung mahakna makhoida khumle, eibu phahanbiba mahak aduna eingonda hai, nanggi hipnapham loukhattuna chatlo. 

12 Makhoina mangonda hangle, nangonda nanggi hipnapham lokhattuna chatlo haiba mi adu kanano? 

13 Adubu anaba phakhiba aduna madu kanano khanglamde, maramdi mapham aduda miyam leibana Jisuna litthokkhlalamle. 

14 Adugi matungda Jisuna mahakpu Iswar ningnasangda phangduna mangonda hai, yengu, nahak phare, henna phattaba nathakta tadananaba amuk pap touraganu. 

15 Mi aduna chatkhiduna, mahakpu phahanbiba adu Jisuna haiduna Jihudisingda tamle. 

16 Maram asigi damak Jihudisingna Jisubu otneiba houre, aduga mahakpu hatnaba lambi ama thirammi, maramdi Ibungona thabak asi potthaba numitta tourammi. 

17 Touigumbasung Jisuna makhoida khumle, eigi ipana houjik phaoba thabak toui, einasu toui. 

18 Maram aduna Jihudisingna asigi damak Ibungobu hatnanaba henna thirammi, maramdi Ibungona potthaba numitpu kaihanbata natte, touigumbabsung Iswarbu mahakmakki mapa kouduna Ibungo masamak Iswarga mannahallammi.


19 Maram aduna Jisuna makhoida khumlaki, eina nakhoida thanggeisengnamak hairibani, mapana touri touriba adu uba nattanadi macha nipa aduna masa mathanta karisu touba ngamde, maramdi Ibungo mahakna touri touriba adu macha nipa adunasu maduga mannana touribani. 

20 Maramdi mapana macha nipabu nungsi amasung Ibungo mahak masana touba thabak pumnamak mangonda uhalli, aduga nakhoina ngaknaba, asidagi henna chaoba thabaksing mangonda utpigani. 

21 Maramdi mapana asibasingbu hougathanduna hinghanba adugumduna macha nipa adunasu mahakna hinghanningba makhoi adubu hinghalli. 

22 Maramdi mapana kanabasu wayende, touigumbasung pumnamakna Mapabu ikaikhumnabagumna, macha nipa adubu ikaikhumnanaba Ibungo mahakna wayenba pumnamak macha nipa aduda pikhre. 

23 Masi pumnamakna Mapa adubu ikai khumnabagum, macha nipa adubu ikai khumnanabani, macha nipa adubu ikaikhumnadaba mahak aduna macha nipa adubu tharakpa adubusu ikaikhumnade. 

24 Eina nakhoida thanggei sengnamak hairibani, eigi wa taba amasung eibu tharakpa Ibungo mahakpu thajaba mahak aduna lomba naidaba hingba phangle, aduga wayenbada mahak yowroi, touigumbasung mahakti asibadagi ahingbada lanthokle. 

25 Eina nakhoida thanggei sengnamak hairibani, asibasingna Iswargi macha nipa adugi khonjel tagadaba pungpham adu laksu lakli, houjiksu oiri, amasung khonjel adu tarabasingna hinggani. 

26 Maramdi Mapa masmakta hingba leibagum, mahakna macha nipa adudasu masamakta hingba leinaba pibire. 

27 Amasung macha nipa adu migi macha nipa oiba maramna, mahakna mangonda wayel tounaba matik pibire. 

28 Asida ngakpa touganu, maramdi pungpham adu lakli, matam aduda mongpham mongphamda peiba pumnamakna mahakki khonjel taraga, 

29 Aphaba toukhibasingna hingnabagi hinggatpada, amasung phattaba toukhibasingna wayennabagi hinggatpada, thoklakkani. 

Jisugi maramda Johangi sakshi 

30 Ei isa ithanta karisu touba ngamde, eina tabagi matung inna eina wayelli, aduga eigi wayenba achumbani, maramdi eibu tharakpa Ipagi mahakki ningba adu nattana ithantagi ningba eina thide. 

31 Eimakna isa ithantagi maramda sakshi pijarabadi, eigi sakshi adu chumde. 

32 Eigi maramda piba sakshi atei ama lei, amasung mahakna eigi maramda piba sakshi adu achumbani haiba eina khangi. 

33 Nakhoimakna Johangi maphamda mi thare, amasung mahakna achumbagi maramda sakshi pire. 

34 Touigumbasung einadi midagi sakshi louba natte, adum oinamakpu nakhoibu kanbinanaba eina wa asi haibani. 

35 Mahakti thanduna ngalliba thaomei adu oirammi, aduga nakhoina matam kharagi damak mahakki manganda haraoba pamle. 

36 Touigumbasung Johangidagi henna chaoba sakshi eigi lei, haibadi eina mapung phana tounaba Ipana eigonda pikhiba thabaksing adumakna Ipana eibu tharakpani haina sakshi pi. 

37 Amasung eibu tharakpa Ipa adumakna eigi maramda sakshi pibire, nakhoina keidoungeidasu mahakki khonjel tadri, amasung mahakki maongsu keidoungeidasu udri. 

38 Aduga mahakki wa adu nakhoigi nungda itattattana leibe leite, maramdi mahakna tharakpa mahakpu nakhoina thajade. 

39 Nakhoina sastrada thi, maramdi madusinggi manungda nakhoina lomba naidaba hingba phangi haina ningi, amasung eigi maramda sakshi piba aduni 

40 Amasung nakhoina hingba phangnanaba eingonda lakningde. 

41 Eina misingdagi thagatpa loude. 

42 Touigumbasung nakhoigi nungda Iswarbu nungsiba leite haiba eina nakhoibu khangli. 

43 Eina eigi Ipagi mingda lakle, aduga nakhoina eibu lousinde, atei amana masamakki mingda laklagadi, nakhoina mabu lousingani. 

44 Amata ngairaba Iswardagi lakpa thagatpa adubu thidraga, amana amadagi thagatpa louduna, nakhoina karamna thajaba ngambage? 

45 Eina nakhoibu Ipagi maphamda naral pigani haina ningganu; nakhoina asa thamliba Mousi aduna nakhoibu naral pibani. 

46 Maramdi nakhoina Mousibu thajaramlabadi, nakhoina eibu thajaramgadabani, maramdi mahakna eigi maramda iramle. 

47 Adubu nakhoina mahakki iramba adu thajadrabadi, eigi waheising nakhoina karamma thajagadage?

Johan 06 

Mi lising mangabu pijaba 

1 Asigi matungda Jisuna Galilgi samadru, Tibiriyagi pat, wangmada lengthokkhre. 

2 Aduga miyam yamna Ibungogi tung illami, maramdi Ibungona anabasingda khudam touri touriba adu makhoina urammi. 

3 Amasung Jisuna chingda lengkhattuna, seboksingga loinana phamlammi. 

4 Matam aduda aranchakkhangba, haibadi Jihudisinggi chakkhangba adu, naksillammi. 

5 Maram aduna Jisuna mit yengkhatpada, miyam yamna Ibungogi nakta lakliba uraduna, Philipta hai, makhoi asina chananaba eikhoina kadaidagi tal leigadage? 

6 Aduga asi Ibungona mahakpu chang yengnanaba hai, maramdi Ibungona kari tougadouribage masana khangjei. 

7 Philipna Ibungoda khummi, dinari chanigi tal leirabasu makhoi mi khudingna khajik khajiktang chabasu okloi. 

8 Ibungogi seboksinggi maraktagi ama Simon Pitargi manao Andriyana Ibungoda hai, 

9 Jobki tandum manga amasung nga ani yaoriba nipa macha ama asida lei, touigumbasung mi asup yambagi marakta asisingi kari oigadage? 

10 Jisuna hai, mising adu phamthahallu, aduga mapham aduda napi yamna hourammi, asum touna nipa masing lising mangarom phamthare. 

11 Maram aduna Jisuna tandum adu louduna, thagatcharaga phamtharibasingda yelle, adugumduna ngasing adusu makhoina pamba adupki makhei yelle. 

12 Amasung makhoi pumnamakna puk thallabada, Ibungona seboksingda hai, kari amata mangdananaba, lemhouba machet makai adu khomjillu. 

13 Maram aduna makhoina madu khomjille, amasung mising aduna charaga, Jobki tandum manga adudagi lemhouba machet makai adu thummok taranithoi thanna haple. 

14 Maram aduna misingna Ibungona toukhiba khudam adu urabada hairaki, taibangpanda lenglakliba Iswargi wa takthokpa adu achumbamak asini. 

Jisuna achikpa maphamda theidokkhiba, amasung isinggi mathakta khongna lengba 

15 Maram aduna Ibungobu ningthou semnanaba, makhoina laklaga namduna phagadouri haiba Jisuna khanglabada chingnungda Ibungo mathanta amuk theidokchakhre. 

16 Amahiksung yachanglakpada, Ibungogi seboksingna samadruda kumthare. 

17 Aduga makhoina hida tongduna Kapharnahum tanna samadru lallammi, amasung houjik mamkhre, aduga Jisuna makhoida laklamdri. 

18 Amasung nungsit kanna sitpagi maramna samadru adu ithak karammi. 

19 Maram aduna kilometre manga taruklom hi hollaklaba matungda, Jisuna samadru mathakta khongna lenglaktuna hi adu tanna naksillakpa makhoina ui, maduda makhoina kire, 

20 Touigumbasung Ibungona makhoida hai, eini, kiganu. 

21 Maram aduna makhoina Ibungobu hida lousinba yahjare, aduga khudak aduda makhoina chatliba lam adugi torbanda thungle. 

Misingna khudam pamba; Hingbagi achapot 

22 Nongngallakpada samadru adugi wangmada leppa miyam aduna seboksingna tongba hi nattana atei hi leiba ukhide, aduga Jisuna seboksingga loinana hi aduda tongkhide, adubu Ibungogi seboksing ngakta chatkhi haiba khangkhi. 

23 (Adum oinamakpu prabhuna thagatcharaga makhoina tal chaba mapham adugi manakta Tibiriyadagi hi khara laklammi.) 

24 Maram aduna Jisusu seboksingsu mapham aduda leitre haina miyam aduna urabada, makhoi masamakna hi machasing aduda tonglaga Jisubu thiduna Kapharnahumda lakle. 

25 Amasung makhoina Ibungobu samadru wangmada phanglabada hai, Rabbi, Ibungona mapham asida karamba matamda lengbirakpage? 

26 Jisuna makhoida khumlaki, eina nakhoida thanggei sengnamak hairibani, nakhoina eibu thibadi khudam ukhibagi maramna natte, adubu nakhoina tandum adudagi charaga thankhibagi maramnani. 

27 Manggadaba chinjakki damak nomganu, touigumbasung migi macha nipa aduna nakhoida pigadaba lomba naidaba hingba phaoba leiba chinjak adugi damak nomu, maramdi mapa Iswarna mangonda chum namle. 

28 Maram aduna makhoina Ibungoda hai, "Iswargi thabak pumnamak tounanaba, eikhoina kari touba tabage"? 

29 Jisuna makhoida khumlaki, Mahakna tharaklaba mahak adubu nakhoina thajaba haiba asi Iswargi thabak aduni. 

30 Maram aduna makhoina Ibungoda hai, adu oirabadi, eikhoina uduna nangonda thajananaba houjik nahakna kari khudam toubage? Aduga nahakna kari thabak toubage? 

31 Eikhoigi ipa ipusingna lamjaoda manna chakhi, masi ikhibagumbani, mahakna swargadagi achapot chananaba makhoida pikhi. 

32 Maram aduna Jisuna makhoida hai, eina nakhoida thanggeisengnamak hairibani, nakhoida swargadagi achapot pikhiba adu Mousina natte, touigumbasung eigi ipana nakhoida swargadagi achumba achapot adu pibibani. 

33 Maramdi swargadagi kumtharaktuna taibangpanbada hingba pibiba adu Iswardagi achapotni. 

34 Maram aduna makhoina Ibungoda hai, Ibungo, matam leiba khibikta achapot asi eikhoida pibiyu. 

35 Jisuna makhoida hai, eimak hingbagi achapot aduni, eingonda lakpa mi adu khak lamloi, amasung eingonda thajaba mi aduna kadoungeidasu khouranglaroi. 

36 Touigumbasung eina nakhoida haire, nakhoina eibu urabamaksu thajade. 

37 Ipana eingonda pibiba pumnamak eingonda lakkani, aduga eingonda lakpa mi adubu eina khak tanthokloi. 

38 Maramdi ei ithantagi ningba tounanaba swargadagi kumtharakpa natte, adubu eibu tharaklaba mahakki ningba tounanaba kumtharakpani. 

39 Amasung eibu tharaklaba Ibungo mahakki ningba adu asini, mahakna eingonda pikhiba pumnamak adudagi eina kari amata manghandaduna, akonba numit aduda hinggathannabani. 

40 Maramdi eigi Ipagi ningba adu asini, macha nipa adubu ujaduna, mahakpu thajaba mi khudingna lombda naidaba hingba phangjananabani, aduga eina mahakpu akonba numit aduda hinggathangani. 

41 Maram aduna, eidi swargadagi kumtharakpa achapot aduni, Ibungona haibagi maramna, Jihudisingna Ibungogi maramda murum mururm sonnarammi. 

42 Amasung makhoina hainarammi, masi eikhoina mapa amasung mamabu khangba, Josephkhi macha nipa Jisu nattra? Eidi swargadagi kumtharakle, haina houjik mahakna karamna hairibano? 

43 Jisuna makhoida khumlaki, nakhoi nasengi marakta murum murum sonnaganu. 

44 Eibu thraklaba Ipa aduna chinglaktrabadi, kananasu eingonda lakpa ngamde, aduga eina mahakpu akonba numit aduda hingathangani. 

45 Amasung makhoi pumnamak Iswarna tambiramba oigani haina Iswargi wa takthokpasinggi larikta ikhrabani, Ipadagi taraba amasung tamlaba mi khudingmakna eingonda laki. 

46 Kanagumba amana Ipabu ure haiba natte, Iswardagi oiba mahak asitana Ipabu ure. 

47 Eina nakhoida thanggei sengnamak hairibani, thajaba mi aduna lomba naidaba hingba phangle. 

48 Eimak hingnabagi achapot aduni. 

49 Nakhoigi napa napusingna lamjaoda manna adu chasu chare, sisu sire. 

50 Kanagumbana chaduna sidanaba, swargadagi kumtharakliba achapot adu asini. 

51 Swargadagi kumtharaklaba hingliba achapot adu eini, kanagumbana achapot asidagi charagadi, lomba naidana hinggani, amahiksung taibangpanbana hingnanabagi damak eina pigadaba achapot adu eigi isani. 

52 Maram aduna Jihudisingna amaga amaga yetnaduna hainarakki, karamna nipa asina mahakki hakchang eikhoida chanaba piba ngambage? 

53 Maram aduna Jisuna makhoida hai, eina nakhoida thanggei sengnamak hairibani, nakhoina migi macha nipa adugi masa chadrabadi amasung mahakki i(blood) thaktrabadi, nakhoi nasada hingba leite. 

54 Eigi isa chaba amasung eigi i thakpa mi aduna lomba naidaba hingba phangle, amasung eina mahakpu akonba numit aduda hinggathangani. 

55 Maramdi eigi isadi ah oiba achapotni, aduga eigi idi ah oiba thaknabani. 

56 Eigi isa chariba amasung eigi i thakliba mahak aduna eingonda itattatana leiribani, aduga eina mangonda itattatana leiribani. 

57 Hingliba Ipana eibu tharaklaba amasung eina Ipagi maramna hingba adugumna, eibu chaba mi aduna eigi maramna mahaksu hinggani. 

58 Swargadagi kumtharaklaba achapot adu asini, ipa ipusingna charaga sikhiba adugumba natte, achapot asi chaba mahak aduna lomba naidana hinggani. 

59 Ibungona Kapharnahumda tambibada wa asi loisangda haikhi. 

Chingnaba seboksing 

60 Maram aduna Ibungogi seboksinggi maraktagi ayambana madu tarabada haikhi, asi aruba wani, masi kanana taba ngamgani? 

61 Touigumbasung Ibungogi seboksingna asigi maramda murum murum sonnaba adu Jisu masa mathanta khangjaraduna makhoida haikhi, masina nakhoibu khudi thihallibra? 

62 Adunadi magi macha nipa aduna hanna leiramba mapham aduda kakhatpa nakhoina uragadi, kari haigadage? 

63 Hingba piba adu thawainani, hakchangnadi karisu tongjade, eina nakhoida haikhiba wa adu thawaini amasung hingbani. 

64 Touigumbasung nakhoigi narakta thajadaba khara lei, maramdi thajadabasing adu kanano, aduga Ibungobu pithokkadaba adu kanano haiba Jisuna ahoubadagi khangba maramna mahakna masi haibani. 

65 Amasung Ibungona hai, maram asina eina nakhoida haikhre, Ipadagi mangonda pibidrabadi, kana amatana eingonda lakpa ngamde. 

Jisubu Khristani haina Pitarana haidokpa 

66 Asidagidi Ibungogi sebok ayambana hankhre amasung Ibungoga amuk chatminnakhidre. 

67 Maram aduna Jisuna taranithoi aduda hai, nakhoisu chatthokningbra? 

68 Simon Pitarna Ibungoda khumle, Prabhu, eikhoina kanada chatkadage? Ibungodadi lomba naidaba hingbagi wa lei. 

69 Aduga Ibungodi Iswargi asengba aduni haiba eikhoina thajare, amasung khangjare. 

70 Jisuna makhoida haikhi, eina nakhoi taranithoibu khankhraba nattra? Aduga nakhoidagi amadi duyabolni. 

71 Simon Iskariyotki machanipa Jihudagi maramda wa asi Ibungona haibani, maramdi taranithoi adugi maraktagi ama asina Ibungobu pithokkadouri.

Johan 07 

Jisu amasung Ibungogi machin manaosing 

1 Amahiksung asisinggi matungda Jisuna Galilda koirammi, maramdi Jihudisingna Ibungobu hatnanaba thibagi maramna Jihudiyada Ibungona koininglamde. 

2 Aduga Jihudisinggi chakkhangba, haibadi khangpokki chakkhangba, naksillammi. 

3 Maram aduna Ibungogi manaosingna Ibungoda hai, nahakki seboksingnasu nahakna touri touriba thabak adu unanaba, nahakna mapham asidagi chatthoktuna Jihudiya tanna chatlu. 

4 Maramdi masamakpu phongdokpa pamaba mi kana amatana lonna toude, nahakna thabaksing asi tourabadi, taibang panbada nasa nathantabu phongdokchou. 

5 Maramdi Ibungogi manaosingmakna Ibungoda thajaramdri. 

6 Maram aduna Jisuna makhoida hai, eigi matamdi houjik laktri, adubu nakhoigi matamdi tattana khudong chabani. 

7 Taibangpanbana nakhoibu tukkachaba ngamde, touigumbasung masigi thabak phatte haina eina taibangpanbagi maramda sakshi pibagi maramna eibu tukkachei. 

8 Nakhoina chakkhangba aduda chatlu, eidi chakkhangba asida houjik chatkhiroi, maramdi eigi matam thungladri. 

9 Mahakna wasing asi makhoida hairaba matungda, Ibungona Galilda adum leirammi 

10 Touigumbasung mahakki manaosingna chakkhangbada chatkhrabada mahaksu aduda chatlammi, adubu phonngna nataduna lonna chatlami. 

11 Adudagi Jihudisingna Ibungobu chakkhangbada thiduna hairammi, mahak kadaida leibano? 

12 Amasung Ibungogi maramda miyamsinggi marakta murum murum sonnaba yamlammi, kharana hairammi mahakti aphaba mini, ateisingna hairammi, natte, adubu mahakna miyambu serannana chingbani. 

13 Adum oinamakpu Jihudisingbu kibagi maramna, kananasu Ibungogi maramda phongna ngangnaramde. 

Eidi Iswardagi lakpani haina Jisuna Jerusalemda tambiba 

14 Touigumbasung houjik chakkhangba adu khaibok chansillakpada, Jisuna Iswar ningnasangda lengkhattuna tambirakii. 

15 Maram aduna Jihudisingna ngakladuna hairammi, itam tambdana mi asina wahei karamna heiribano? 

16 Maram aduna Jisuna makhoida khumlaki, eigi tambiba asi eigi natte, adubu eibu tharaklaba mangondagini. 

17 Kanagumbana Ibungo mahakki ningba touninglabadi, tambiba asi Iswardagira, nattraga ei ithantadagi nganglibra haiba mahakna khangjagani. 

18 Masa mathantadagi ngangliba mahak aduna masa mathantabu thangatchaba thiribani, touigumbasung mahakpu tharaklaba Ibungo mahakpu thagat chaba thiraba mahak adu achumbani, aduga dharamachendaba leite. 

19 Mousina nakhoida wayel yathang piraba nattra? Adubu nakhoi kana amatana wayel yathang adu toude, nakhoina eibu karigi hatke thiribage? 

20 Miyamna khumle, nahak bhut pubani, nahakpu kanana hatke thibano? 

21 Jisuna makhoida khumlaki, eina thabak ama toure, aduga nakhoi pumnamakna ngaktuna lei. 

22 Mousina nakhoida un kakpa pire (madu Mousidagi natte, adubu ipa ipusingdagini), aduga potthaba numitta nakhoina mibu un kaknei. 

23 Mousigi wayel yathang kaidananaba, potthaba numitta mibu un kaklabadi, eina potthaba numitta mibu anaba pumpha phahanbagidamak nakhoina eigi ithakta karigidamak kanna shaoribano? 

24 Nakhoina maithong yengduna wayenganu, touigumbasung achumba wayenna wayellu. 

25 Maram aduna Jerusalemgi mi kharana hainarammi, makhoina hatke haina thiriba mahak adu asi nattra? 

26 Amasung yengu, mahakna iphong phongna wa ngangli, aduga makhoina mangonda karisu haide, asi Khrista aduni haiduna luchingbasingna chumna khanglamgadra? 

27 Adum oinamakpu mi asi kadaidagino eikhoina khangi, touigumbasung Khristana lenglakpada, mahak kadaidagino kana amatana khangloi. 

28 Maram aduna Jisuna Iswar ningnasangda tambiringeida mahakna laoduna hai, nakhoina eibu khangi, aduga ei kadaidagino haiba adusu khangi, ei ithantagi lakpa natte, adubu eibu tharakpa mahak adu achumbani, nakhoina mahakpu khangde. 

30 Maram aduna makhoina Ibungobu phanaba thirammi, adubu mi kana amatana Ibungobu khutna sokte, maramdi Ibungobu pungpham houjik laklamdri. 

31 Touigumbasung miyamgi maraktagi ayambana Ibungoda thajaraduna hairammi, Khrista aduna lenglaklapa matamda, mi asina touba khudamsing asidagi henna mahakna tougadra? 

32 Ibungogi maramda miyamna murum murum sonnaba asi Pharaisisingna tarammi, maduda athoiba purohitsingna amasung Pharisisingna Ibungobu phanaba phamnaibasingbu thare. 

33 Maram aduna Jisuna haikhi, amuk matam khara eina nakhoiga leiminnagani, adudagi eibu tharaklaba Ibungobu mahakki maphamda eina chatkani. 

34 Nakhoina eibu thigani, aduga eibu phangloi, amasung eina leiba mapham aduda nakhoina lakpa ngamde. 

35 Maram aduna Jihudisingna makhoi masengi marakta hainei, eikhoina phangloidaba mapham kadaida mi asina chatkadage? mahakna Griksinggi marakta chaithokkhrabasingda maphamda Griksingbu tambinaba chatthokdouribra? 

36 Nakhoina eibu thigani, aduga eibu phangloi, amasung eina leiba mapham aduda nakhoina lakpa ngamloi, haiduna mahakna haiba wa karino? 

Ahingba ising 

37 Amahiksung aroiba numitta, haibadi chakkhangbagi athoiba numitta, Jisuna leptuna laona hairiki, kanagumba mina khouranglabadi, mahakna eingonda laktuna thaksanu. 

38 Eibu thajaba mahak aduna sastrana haikhibagumna mahakki puknungdagi hingliba isinggi turansing chengani. 

39 Touigumbasung Ibungobu thajarabasingna phanggadouriba thawai adugi maramda Ibungona asi haibani, maramdi matam asida Jisuna matik managal phanglamdriba maramna, thawai adubu houjik piramdri. 

40 Maram aduna miyamdagi kharana wasing asi tarabada hainarammi, tasengnamak masi Iswargi wa takthokpa mi aduni. 

41 Ateisingna hai, asi Khrista aduni, touigumbasung mi kharana hai, natte, maramdi Khrista aduna Galildagi lakkadra? 

42 Khrista aduna Davidki dharadagi amasung Davidna leiramba khul, Bethlehemdagi thokpani haiduna sastrana haikhibani nattra? 

43 Maram aduna miyamgi manungda Ibungogi maramna tokhai tanarrami. 

44 Aduga makhoi kharana Ibungobu phaninglammi, adubu kananasu Ibungobu khut sokte. 

45 Maram aduna phamnaibasing aduna athoiba purohitsing amasung Pharasisingda laklabada, makhoina phamnaibasing aduda hai, nakhoina mahakpu karigidamak puraktrabano? 

46 Makhoina khumle, "mi amatana keidoungeidasu nipa asigumna ngangdri". 

47 Maram aduna Pharisisingna makhoida khumle, nakhoibusu serannana chingthoklabra? 

48 Luchingbasingi maraktagi amana Pharasisingi maraktagi amana mangonda thajakhraba? 

49 Touigumbasung wayel yathang khangdaba miyam asi sirap phanglabani. 

50 Nikodimna (Ahingda Jisugi manakta lakkhiba mahak asi makhoigi kangluptagani) makhoida hai, 

51 Mahak masadagi wa hanna tadaduna amasung mahakna kari touba khangdaduna, eikhoina wayel yathang aduna mi adubu wayenbra? 

52 Makhoina mangonda khumkhi, nangsu Galildagira? thiduna yengu, Galildagi Iswargi wa takthokpa kanasu thokte. 

53 Amahiksung makhoi mi khudingna magi magi yumda chatnakhre.

Johan 08 

Nipa lannabada phabi nupi 

1 Touigumbasung Jisudi Jeitungi chingda lengkhre. 

2 Amasung ayuk nganna Ibungona amuk Iswar ningnasangda lengsillakle, aduga mi pumnamakna Ibungogi maphamda laklammi, maduda Ibungona phamthaduna, makhoibu tambiraki. 

3 Amasung sastragi ojhasingga pharisisinggana nipa lannabada pharabi nupi amabu puraktuna, mayaida lephallaga, 

4 Makhoina Ibungoda hai, Guru, nupi asibu nipa lannaringeimaktada pharaklabani. 

5 Wayel yathangdadi Mousina asigumbasibu nungdumna thaduna hatnaba eikhoida yathang pire, Ibungonadi magi maramda kari haibibage? 

6 Makhoina Ibungoda theijinpham phangnanaba, Ibungobu chang yengduna, wa asi makhoina hairammi, touigumbasung Jisuna nonthaduna, khudonbina leipakta iba houre. 

7 Adubu makhoina Ibungoda hangla hangladuna leibada, Ibungona hangattuna, makhoida hai, nakhoigi narakta pap chendaba mahak aduna mangonda hanna nungdum thasanu. 

8 Aduga Ibungona amuk nonthaduna, leipakta khudonbina irammi. 

9 Maduda makhoina masi tarabada, ahandagihouna amamam chatthokkhre, amasung Jisu mathantaga mayaida leiribi nupi adugata leihoure. 

10 Aduga Jisuna hangattuna mangonda hai, he nupi, makhoi kadaida chatkhre? Nangbu mi kana amatana lalhandrabra? 

11 Aduga mahakna hai, kananasu lalhandre, Prabhu, maduda Jisuna hai, einasu nangbu lalhande, chatlo, houjiktagi houna amuk pap touganu. 

Taibangpangi mangal 

12 Maram aduna Jisuna amuk makhoida wa hairaki, eidi taibangpanbagi manganni, eigi itung illiba mahak aduna amambada chatlaroi, touigumbasung hingbagi mangal adu phangjagani. 

13 Maram aduna pharisingna Ibungoda hai, nahak nathantagi maramda sakshi pijei, nahakki sakshi adu chumde. 

14 Jisuna makhoida khumlaki, eina ithantagi maramda sakshi pijarabasu, eigi sakshi adu achumbani, maramdi eina kadaidagi lakpa aduga kadaida chatliba eina khanjei, adubu eina kadaidagi lakpa nattraga kadaida chatliba nakhoidi khangde. 

15 Nakhoidi hakchanggi matung inna wayeli, eidi kanabasu wayende. 

16 Hoi, aduga eina wayellabadi, eigi wayenba adu achumbani, maramdi eidi ithanta natte, touigumbasung eiga eibu tharaklaba Ipagani. 

17 Hoi, aduga mi anigi sakshi achumbani haina nakhoigi wayel yathang aduda ikhrabani. 

18 Ithantagi maramda sakshi pijaba adu eimakni, aduga eibu tharaklaba Ipana eigi maramda sakshi pibi. 

19 Maram aduna makhoina Ibungoda hairiki, nahakki napa kadaida leibage? Jisuna khumle, nakhoina eibusu Ipabusu khangde, nakhoina eibu khanglabadi, eigi Ipabusu nakhoina khanglamgadabani. 

20 Ibungona Iswar ningnasangda tambiringeida, wasing asi langeida ngangbani, kana amatana mahakpu pharamde, maramdi Ibungogi pungpham houjik laklamdri. 

Lakkadaba wayengi marida mitna singhanbiba 

21 Maram aduna Ibungona amukka makhoida hai, eina chatthokkadouri, nakhoina eibu thigani, aduga nakhoina nakhoigi papta sijagani, eina chatpa mapham aduda nakhoina lakpa ngamde. 

22 Maram aduna jihudisingna hairiki, eina chatpa mapham aduda nakhoina lakpa ngamde haiba asinadi, mahak mathanta sijagadra? 

23 Maduda Ibungona makhoida hairaki, nakhoidi makhadagini, eidi mathaktagini, nakhoidi taibangpanba asidagini, eidi taibangpanba asidagi natte. 

24 Maram aduna nakhoina nakhoigi papta sijagani haina eina nakhoida haire, maramdi eini haiba nakhoina thajadrabadi, nakhoi nakhoigi papta sijagani. 

25 Maram aduna makhoina Ibungoda hairiki, nahak kanano? Jisuna makhoida hai, eina ahanbada nakhoida haiba adumakni. 

26 Nakhoigi maramda eina nganggadaba amasung wayengadaba yamna lei, touigumbasung eibu tharaklaba mahak adu achumbani, aduga eina mangondagi tarak tarakpa adu eina taibangpanda ngangthokpani. 

27 Ibungona mapa adugi maramda makhoida haibani haiba makhoina khangde. 

28 Maram aduna Jisuna hai, migi macha nipa adubu nakhoina thanggatlaba matam aduda, eina aduga ei ithanta kari amata toude, touigumbasung Ipa aduna eingonda tambikhiba adugumna eina wa asi ngangthoki haiba nakhoina khanggani. 

29 Amasung eibu tharaklaba mahakna eibu loinabiri, Ipa aduna ei ithantabu thadokpide, maramdi eina matam pumnamakta mahakpu penhenba thabak toui. 

30 Ibungona wasing asi haibada, mi ayambana Ibungoda thajare. 

Jihudisingga yetnaba 

31 Maram aduna Ibungoda thajaraba jihudising aduda Jisuna hai, nakhoina eigi wa aduda itattatana leirabadi, nakhoi chumna eigi sebokni, 

32 Aduga nakhoina achumba adu khanggani, amasung achumba aduna nakhoibu naning tamhangani. 

33 Makhoina Ibungoda khumle, eikhoidi Abrahamgi dharani, aduga mi kananasu minai khak oikhidri, aduga nakhoi naning tamgani haina nahakna karamna hairibano? 

34 Jisuna makhoida khumle, tasengnamak eina nakhoida hairibani, pap touba mi khudingmak papki minaini. 

35 Amasung minaidi yumda matam pumnamakki oina leite, adubu macha nipadi lomba naidana lei. 

36 Maram aduna macha nipa aduna nakhoibu naning tamhallabadi, tasengnamak nakhoina naning tambani. 

37 Nakhoidi Abrahamgi dharani haiba eina khangi, adubu eigi wasing asi nakhoida leitaba maramna nakhoina eibu hatnaba hotnari. 

38 Eina Ipaga loinana ukhraba adugi maramda ngangi, adubu nakhoina nakhoigi napagi loinana ukhriba adu toui. 

39 Makhoina Ibungoda khumlaki, eikhoigi Ipadi Abrahamni, Jisuna makhoida hai, nakhoina Abrahamgi machasing oirabadi, nakhoina Abrahamgi thabak touramgani. 

40 Adubu Iswardagi taraba achumba adu nakhoida takpiriba mi eibu nakhoina houjik hatke thi, asi Abrahamnadi masi toukhide. 

41 Nakhoina nakhoigi napagi thabak toui, maram aduna makhoina Ibungoda hai, eikhoidi nupi nupi lannaduna macha natte, eikhoigi Ipa ama lei, madudi Iswarni. 

42 Jisuna makhoida hai, Iswarna nakhoigi napa oiramlabadi, nakhoina eibu nungsiramgadabani, maramdi eina Iswardagi thoklaktuna laklabani, ei isa ithantadagi lakpa natte, touigumbasung mahakna eibu tharakle. 

43 Eina ngangba adu nakhoina karigi khangdabage? maramdi nakhoina eigi wa taba ngamdre. 

44 Nakhoidi nakhoigi napa diyaboldagini, aduga nakhoigi napa adugi apam apamba thabak adu touba nakhoigi ningbani, madi ahoubadagi mihatpa oirammi, aduga achumbada lepte, maramdi mangonda achumba ilei leite, mana chinthiba ngangba matamda mahak mathantadagi ngangi, maramdi madi chinthibani amasung madugi mapani. 

45 Touigumbasung einadi achumba haiba maramna, nakhoina eibu thajade. 

46 Nakhoigi narakta kanana eibu pap chenbada tahanbage? eina achumba hairabadi, nakhoina eibu thajadriba karigino? 

47 Iswardagi oiba mi aduna Iswargi haidokpa wa tai, maram asina nakhoinadi tade, maramdi nakhoi Iswardagi natte. 

48 Jihudisigna Ibungoda khumlaki, nangdi Samariyagi machani, amasung bhut pubani haiduna eikhoina ningthina haidabra? 

49 Jisuna khumle, eidi bhut puba natte, touigumbasung eina Ipabu ikai khumnei, aduga nakhoina eibu ika khumnade. 

50 Adubu eina ithantabu thagatchaba thide, thiba amasung wayel touba ama lei. 

51 Eina nakhoida thanggeisengnamak hairibani, kanagumba mina eigi wa ngaklabadi, mahakna siba keidoungeidasu uroi. 

52 Jihudisingna Ibungoda hai, houjik eikhoina khangle, nangdi bhut pubani, Abrahamsu sikhre amasung Iswargi wa takthokpasingsu sikhre, adumakpu nangna hairi, kanagumba mina eigi wa ngaklabadi, sibagi mahao mahakna lomba naidana suptang tangloi. 

53 Eikhoigi ipudhou Abrahamdagi henna nangna chaobra? Mahaksu sikhre, Iswargi wa takthokpasingsu sikhre, nang nathantabu kanaga mananhallibage? 

54 Jisuna khumle, eina ithantabu thagatcharagadi, eigi thagatpa karisu natte, adubu thagatpiba adu eigi Ipani, mahak asi eikhoigi Iswarni haina mahakki maramda nakhoina hai. 

55 Adumakpu nakhoina mahakpu khangde, adubu einadi mahakpu khangi, aduga eina Ibungo mahakpu khangde hairamlabadi, eina nakhoigumna chinthiba oiramgani, touigumbasung eina mahakpu khangi, aduga mahakki wa ngaki. 

56 Nakhoigi napa Abrahamna eigi numit ujagani haiduna haraorammi, amasung mahakna madu ujaraduna haraore. 

57 Maram aduna jihudisingna Ibungoda hai, nangdi chahi yangkheimaksu sudri, aduga nangna Abrahambu ukhrabra? 

58 Jisuna makhoida hai, tasengnamak eina nakhoida hairi, Abraham poktringeida, Ei Lei. 

59 Maram aduna makhoina Ibungoda thananaba nungdum paikhatle, adubu Jisudi lottuna Iswar ningnasangdagi thoklaklaga makhoigi marakta phaoduna chatkhre.

Johan 09 

Pokpadagi mamit tangba amabu uhanba 

1 Amahiksung Ibungona asum lenglakpada, mapokngeidagi mamit tangba mi amabu ure. 

2 Amasung Ibungogi seboksingna Ibungoda hangjaraki, Rabbi, nipa asina mamit tangna pokpa asi, kanana pap toubadagino, nipa asinara natraga mama mapanara? 

3 Jisuna khumle, mi asina pap touba natte, mapa mamanasu natte, adubu Iswargi thabak mangonda phongdoknabani. 

4 Eibu tharaklaba Ibungo mahakki thabak numit leiringeida eikhoina touba tare, mi amatana thabak touba ngammoidaba ahing adu lakli. 

5 Eina taibangpanda leiba matamda, eina taibangpanbagi manganni. 

6 Ibungo na asumna hairaga, leipakta tin sittuna, leikhom neiraga, leikhom aduna magi mamitta teibiraduna, 

7 Mangonda hai, chatlu, Silom pukhrida chamthoklu (Silomgi arthadi thakhraba haibani), maram aduna mahakna chatkhiduna, chamthoklure aduga uba phangjaduna hallakle. 

8 Maram aduna leikai machasingnasu mahakpu ahanbada chak niba oina uramba, makhoi adunasu hairaki, phamduna chak niramba mahak adu asi nattra? 

9 Mi kharana hai, mahakni, atei ateina hai, natte, adubu mahak manba amani, mahaknadi hairaki eimakni. 

10 Maram aduna makhoina mangonda hai, karamna nanggi namit uba phanglibano? 

11 Mahakna khumle, Jisu kouba mi aduna leikhom neiraga, eigi imitta teibiduna eingonda hai, Silom chattuna chamthoklu, maram aduna eina chattuna chamthoklabada, eina uba phangjare. 

12 Maduda makhoina mangonda hai, mahak kadaida lei? mahakna hai, ei khangde. 

13 Makhoina mamangngeida, mamit tanglamba mahak adubu, Pharisisingda puraki. 

14 Jisuna leikhom neiraga mahakki mamit phanghankhiba numit adu potthaba numit oirammi. 

15 Maram aduna Pharisisingnasu karamna uba phanglabage haina mangonda amuk hanglaki, maduda mahakna makhoida hai, mahakna eigi imit mathakta leikhom happire, aduga eina chamthokcharaga ujei. 

16 Maram aduna Pharisising kharana hairaki, mi asi Iswardagi natte, maramdi mahakna potthaba numit ngakte, touigumbasung ateisingna hairaki, pap chenba mina asigumba khudam karamna touba ngambage? Aduga makhoigi marakta tokhaki tokhai tanarammi. 

17 Maram aduna makhoina mittangba mi aduda amuk hai, nanggi namit uhanbiba maramna, mahak adugi marida nangna kari hairibage? Aduga mahakna hai, mahakti Iswargi wa takthokpa amani. 

18 Maram aduna uba phangjaraba mahak adugi mapa mamabu jihudisingna koudriba phaoba mahakti mamit tanglammi amasung uba phangjare haiba mahak adugi maram da thajade. 

19 Aduga makhoina makhoibu hanglaki, mamit tangna pokle haina nakhoina haiba nacha nipa adu asira? Adu oirabadi, mahakna houjik karamna uba phanglibano? 

20 Mahakki mapa mamana khumlaki, asi eikhoigi icha nipani amasung mahakna mit tangna pokle haiba eikhoina khangi. 

21 Adubu mahakna karamna houjik urabage eikhoina khangde, aduga kanana mahakki mamit phahanbage eikhoina khangde, mangonda hangbiyu, mahak ahal oire, masana masagi maramda ngangjagani. 

22 Mahakki mapa mamana jihudisingbu kibagi maramna asi haibani, maramdi kanagumba mina Ibungobu Khristani haidoklabadi, mahakpu loisanggi kangluptagi inthokkadabani haina jihudisingna hannana lepnakhre. 

23 Asigi maramna mapa mamana mahak ahal oire, mahakpu hangbiyu haire. 

24 Maram aduna makhoina mamit tanglamba mi adubu anirak hanna kouduna, mangonda hai, Iswarbu thagatlu, mi asi pap chenbani haina eikhoina khangi. 

25 Maram aduna mahakna khumle, mahak pap chenba mira, ei khangde, amadi eina khangjei, haibadi, eina mit tanglammi, houjikti eina ujare. 

26 Maram aduna makhoi na mangonda hai, mahakna nangonda kari toubikhibage? Karamna nanggi namit panghanbibage? 

27 Mahakna makhoida khumle, eina houjikmak nakhoida tamkhre, aduga nakhoina tabide, nakhoina madu karigi damak amuk taningbage? Nakhoisu mahakki sebok oibi pambra? 

28 Maduda makhoina mahakpu cheiduna hai, nahak magi sebokni, adubu eikhoidi Mousigi sebokni. 

29 Iswarna Mousiga wa haikhi haiba eikhoina khangi, adubu nipa asidi kadaidagino lakpano haiba eikhoina khangde. 

30 Mi aduna makhoida khumlaki, karino, masi angakpani, mahak kadaidagino lakpano nakhoina khangde, adubu mahakna eigi imit uhanbire. 

31 Iswarna pap chenbasingbu tabide haiba eikhoina khangi, touigumbasung kanagumba mina Iswarbu ningba mi oirabadi amasung mahakki apamba adu tourabadi, Iswarna mahakki haijaba tabi. 

32 Thainadagi kanagumba mi amana mamit tangna poklaba migi mamit uhanbikhi haiba kadoungeidasu tadri. 

33 Mi asina Iswardagi oiramdrabadi, mahakna karisu touba ngamlamloidabani. 

34 Makhoina mangonda khumlaki, nangdi papna yomduna pokle, aduga nangna eikhoibu tambiribra? maduda makhoina mahakpu inthokkhre. 

35 Makhoina mahakpu inthokle haiba Jisuna tare, aduga mahakpu phangduna Ibungona hai, nahakna migi macha nipa adubu thajabra? 

36 Mahakna khlumlaki aduga, Ibungo, eina thajagadaba mahak adu kanano? 

37 Jisuna mangonda hai, nahakna mahakpu ure, aduga nangga ngangnariba asi mahakni. 

38 Maduda mahakna hai, Prabhu, ei thajei, aduga mahakna Ibungobu khurumjare. 

39 Amasung Jisuna hai, udabasing aduna unanaba, aduga ubasing aduna mittangba oiraknanaba, eina wayennabagi damak taibangpanda lakle. 

40 Ibungoga loinariba Pharisising aduna waram asi taraduna, Ibungoda hai, eikhoisu mit tangbra? 

41 Jisuna makhoida hai, nakhoi mit tanglamlabadi, nakhoigi pap leiramloidabani, adubu, eikhoina ui haiduna hoijik nakhoina hairi, nakhoigi pap adum leiri.

Johan 10 

Jisudi Aphaba Yaosenbani 

1 Eina nakhoida thanggei sengnamak hairibani, thongda changdaduna, atoppa lambida kakhattuna yaokonda changba mi adudi huranbani amasung dakuni. 

2 Touigumbasung thongda changba mi adudi yaosinggi yaosenbani. 

3 Mahakki damak thong sangbana thong hangbi, aduga mahakki yaosingna mahakki khonjel tai, mahakna mahakki yaosinggi maming panduna koui, aduga makhoibu mapanda puthokpi. 

4 Mahakna mahakki yaosingbu puba matamda, makhoigi mamang thaduna chatli, aduga yaosingna aduna mahakki matung illi, maramdi makhoina mahakki khongjel khangi. 

5 Aduga makhoina atoppa migi tung khak illoi, touigumbasung mangondagi chengani, maramdi makhoina atoppa singgi khonjel khangde. 

6 Pandam asi Jisuna makhoida haibibani, adubu Ibungona makhoida ngangkhiba adu karino makhoina khangde. 

7 Maram aduna Jisuna makhoida amuk hai, eina nakhoida thanggei sengnamak hairibani, Eidi yaosing adugi thong aduni. 

8 Eigi mangda lakkhiba pumnamak adu huranbaga dakuga ngaktani, touigumbasung yaosing aduna makhoigi khol tade. 

9 Eidi thong aduni, eingonda kanagumba mi changlabadi, mahakpu kanbigani, aduga mahakna chatthok chatsin touduna, sajik chapham phangjagani. 

10 Huranba aduna hurannanaba, hatnanaba amasung manghannanaba nattana lakte eidi makhoina hingba phangnanaba amasung madu marang kaina phangnanaba lakle. 

11 Eidi aphaba yaosenba aduni, aphaba yaosenba aduna yaosinggi damak mathawai thabi, 

12 Anakpa mahak adudi yaosenba adu natte, aduga yaosing adu marranaigi natte, keisal lakpa uraga yaosing adu thadoklamlaga chengi, aduga keisal aduna yaosing adu lakltuna yao amasung makhoibu chaikhai. 

13 Mi adu anakpa oiba maramna mahakna chenkhi amasung yaosing adugi maramda khanbide. 

14 Eidi aphaba yaosenba aduni, Eina Eigi yaosingbu khangi amasung eigi oibasingna eibu khangi. 

15 Aduga Ipana eibu khanbagumna, einasu Ipabu khangi, amasung yaosinggi damak eina eigi thawai thabi. 

16 Aduga yaokol asida yaodaba eigi atei yaosing lei, makhoi adubusu eina purakpa tai, amasung makhoina eigi khonjel tagani, aduga makhoina yao sanggu ama oirakkani, amasung yaosenba ama leigani. 

17 Maram asigi damak Ipana eibu nungsi, maramdi eina eigi thawai amuk lousinnaba eina thawai thai. 

18 Kananasu eingondagi thawai loude, adubu ei isa ithanta thadokchabani, eina madu thadoknaba itik lei, aduga eina madu amuk lousinnaba itik lei, yathang asi eina Ipadagi phangjare. 

19 Wasing asigi maramna jihudisinggi marakta amuk tokhai tanarammi. 

20 Amasung makhoi ayambana hairaki, mahak bhut puduna ngaobani, nakhoina mahakki wa karigi tabage? 

21 Ateisingna hairaki, asi bhut puba migi wahei natte, bhutna mittangbagi mamit phahanba ngambra? 

Jerusalemda Iswar ningnasang sengdokpagi chakkhangbada, Jisuna tambiba jihudisingna yengthiba 

22 Matung aduda Iswar ningnasang sengdokpagi chakkhangba adu Jerusalemda thokle, aduga madu ningthamtha matam oirammi, 

23 Aduga Jisuna Solomongi manggonda Iswar ningnasang manungda koirammi. 

24 Maram aduna jihudisingna Ibungobu koisilladuna hairaki, nahakna eikhoibu kaya kuina chingnahangadabage? Nahakna Khrista adu oirabadi, eikhoida sengna tammu. 

25 Jisuna makhoida khumle, Eina nakhoida tamkhre, aduga nakhoina thajade, Eina Ipagi mingda toujariba thabaksing asina eigi maramda sakshi pi, 

26 Adubu nakhoina thajade, maramdi nakhoi eigi yaosinggi marakta yaode. 

27 Eigi yaosingna eigi khonjel tai, eina makhoibu khangi, aduga makhoina itung illi. 

28 Amasung eina makhoida lomba naidaba hingba pibi, makhoi kadoungeidasu manglaroi, aduga kananasu ikhuttagi makhoibu pak mallaroi. 

29 Eingonda makhoibu pibikhiba eigi Ipana pumnamaktagi athoibani, amasung kananasu Ipagi khuttagi makhoibu pak munba ngamde. 

30 Eiga Ipaga eikhoi amatani. 

31 Maram aduna jihudisingna Ibungobu thananaba amuk nungdum paikhatle. 

32 Jisuna makhoida khumle, Ipadagi ayamba aphaba thabak nakhoida eina uhalle, thabak adugi maraktagi karambagi damak nakhoina eibu nungdumna thagadouribano? 

33 Jihudisingna Ibungoda khumle, aphaba thabakkidamak eikhoina nangngonda nungdumna hunba natte, adubu Iswarbu thina ngangbagi damakni, aduga nangna mi oiraga nasa nathantabu Iswar semjei. 

34 Jisuna makhoida khumle nakhoigi wayel yathang aduda, eina haire, nakhoi Iswarsingni, haiduna ikhiba nattra? 

35 Iswargi wa thunglaba makhoibu Ibungo mahakna Iswarsing kourabadi (Aduga sastrabu kaiba ngamde), 

36 Eidi Iswargi macha nipani haibagi maramna, mapana katthokpiduna taibangpanda thabirakpa mahakpu, nangdi Iswarbu thina ngangi haina mahakki maramda nakhoida hairibra? 

37 Eina Ipagi thabak toudrabadi, eibu thajaganu. 

38 Adubu eina tourabadi, eibu thajadrabasu Ipana eingonda lei amasung eina Ipada lei haiba nakhoina khangduna leinaba, thabak adu thajabiyu. 

39 Makhoina Ibungobu phanaba amuk thirammi aduga Ibungona makhoigi khuttagi nanthokkhre. 

40 Amahiksung Ibungona Jordan wangmada Johanna ahanbada baptais toubiduna leiramba, mapham aduda amuk hanna lengthoktuna, maduda leirammi. 

41 Aduga mi ayambana Ibungogi maphamda laktuna hairaki, Johandi khudam karisu toude, touigumbasung mi asigi maramda Johanna haikhi haikhiba pumnamak adu isoi soiramde. 

42 Amasung mi ayambana mapham aduda Ibungobu thajare.

Johan 11 

Lasarbu sibadagi hinggatpiba 

1 Amahiksung Mariyam amasung magi mache Marthagi khul Bethaniyadagi, Lazaras kouba kanagumba mi ama narammi. 

2 Naribasi, Jisubu manam nungsiba thou teithokpikhiba amasung mahakki makhong masamna teithokpikhiba Mariyamgi mapuwa, Lazarasni. 

3 Maram aduna machesingna Ibungogi maphamda pao thaduna haire, Prabhu, yengbiyu, Ibungona nungsiba mahak adu nari. 

4 Touigumbasung Jisuna madu tarabada hai, anaba asi sige haiba naba natte, adubu masigi mapanna Iswargi machanipa adubu thagatnanaba, Iswargi matik mangangi damakni. 

5 Jisuna Martha, magi manao amasung Lasar adubu nungsirammi. 

6 Maram aduna Ibungona mahak nare haiba tabada matam aduda leiramba mapham aduda Ibungona numit nini phare. 

7 Adudagi asigi matungda Ibungona seboksingda hai, eikhoina Jihudiyada amuk chatsi. 

8 Seboksingna Ibungoda hai, Rabbi, houjikmak jihudisingna nahakpu nungdumna thananaba thiri, aduga nahakna aduda amuk hanna chatkadouribra? 

9 Jisuna khumle, nungthingi pung taranithoi leiba nattra? kanagumba mi amana nungthinda chatlabadi, mahakna taibangpan asigi mangan adu uba maramna nkhudi thide. 

10 Touigumbasung kanagumba mina ahingda chatlabadi mahakna khudi thi, maramdi mangal adu mangonda leite. 

11 Ibungona asising haire, aduga asigi matungda Ibungona makhoida hai, eikhoigi marup Lazaras tumkhre, adubu eina mahakpu houdoknanaba chatke. 

12 Maram aduna seboksingna Ibungoda hai, Prabhu, mahakna tumlabadi, naba pharagani, 

13 Jisunadi mahakki sibagi maramda haiba oire, adubu tumbana potthabani haiba asigi maramda Ibungona haibani haiduna, makhoina ninglammi. 

14 Maram aduna Jisuna matam aduda makhoida sengna hai, Lazaras sire, 

15 Amasung nakhoina thajananaba eina maduda leiramde haiduna nakhoigi damak eina harawi, adum oinamakpu eikhoina mangonda chatsi. 

16 Maram aduna Didumas kouba Thomasna na mahakki marup seboksingda haikhi, Ibungoga loinana siminnanaba eikhoisu chatsi. 

17 Asum touna Jisuna lenglaklabada, mahakpu mongphamda phumkhiba houjik numit marini sure haiba khangle. 

18 Bethani asi Jerusalemdagi kilometre ahumlomta thapna leirammi, 

19 Aduga jihudising ayambana Marthaga Mariyamgagi maphamda makhoigi mapuwagi maramda themjinbinanaba laklammi. 

20 Maram aduna Marthana Jisu lenglaki haiba tarabada, Ibungo oknarure, adubu Mariyamdi yumda phamhoui. 

21 Maram aduna Marthana Jisuda hai, Prabhu, Ibungona asida leibiramlabadi, eigi Ipuwa siramloidabani. 

22 Aduga houjiksu eina khangjei, Ibungona Iswargi maphamda nijaba khibik Iswarna Ibungoda pibigani. 

23 Jisuna mangonda hai, nanggi napuwa hinggatkani. 

24 Marthana Ibungoda hai, akonba numitta hinggatpa aduda mahakna hinggatkani haiba eina khangjei. 

25 Jisuna mangonda hai, hinggatpa adu amasung hingba adu eimakni, eibu thajaba mi aduna hinggani, 

26 Aduga hingduna eibu thajaba mi khudingna kadoungeidasu siroi, nangna masi thajabra? 

27 Mahakna Ibungoda hai, hoi, Prabhu, Ibungodi Iswargi macha nipa Khrista, taibangpanda lengbirakliba aduni haiba eina thajare. 

28 Mahakna wasing asi hairaba matungda chatkhre, aduga mahakki manai Mariyambu lonna kouduna hai, Rabbi lakle, aduga nahakpu kouri. 

29 Mahakna madu tarabada, thuna hougattuna Ibungogi maphamda chatlammi. 

30 (Jisudi khunda lengsillaktri, adubu Marthana Ibungobu oknaba mapham aduda leirammi.) 

31 Mariyamga loinana imungda leiminnaduna, mahakpu themjinbiriba jihudisingna mahakna thuna hougattuna chenthokkhiba ubada, mahakna kaplunanaba mongpham tanna chellibani haina ningduna, matung innare. 

32 Maram aduna Mariyamna Jisu leiba mapham aduda laktuna, Ibungobu urabada, Ibungogi khuyada tuthajaduna haijei, Prabhu, Ibungona asida leibiramlabadi, ipuwa siramloidabani. 

33 Maram aduna Jisuna mahakna kappa amasung mahakka loinaba jihudisingna kappa urabada, Ibungogi thawai sokle, 

34 Amasung Ibungona langtaknaraduna hai, nakhoina mahakpu kadaida thambano? Makhoina Ibungoda hai, Prabhu, lengbiraktuna yengbiyu. 

35 Jisu kaple. 

36 Maram aduna Jihudisingna hai, yengu, mahakna Lazarasbu kayamuk nungsiba! 

37 Touigumbasung makhoi kharana hai, mamit tanglamba adugi mit phahanbikhiba mi asina mi asisu sidananaba touba ngamloidra? 

38 Maram aduna Jisuna amuk thawai sokladuna mongpham tanna lenglaki, aduga mongpham adu chingnunghut oirammi, amasung madugi mamaida nung ama thamlammi. 

39 Jisuna hai, nung adu louthokkho, asiba adugi machem Martha aduna Ibungoda hai, Prabhu, matam asida hakchang adu namthiragani, maramdi mahak marini sukhre. 

40 Jisuna mangonda hai, nangna thajarabadi, Iswargi matik mangan ujagani haina eina nangonda haidra? 

41 Maduda makhoina nung adu louthokle, aduga Jisuna mit yengkhattuna haijei, Ipa, nahakna eigi haijaba tabire haiduna eina nahakpu thagatchei. 

42 Amasung nahakna matam leiba khibikta eigi haijaba tabi haiba eina khangjare, touigumbasung nahakna eibu thabire haiba koina lepliba miyam mina thajananaba, eina makhoigi damak haibani. 

43 Amasung Ibungona wa asi hairaga, khonjel laona hairaki, Lazaras, thoklaku. 

44 Asiba aduna makhong makhut phina punduna thoklakle, aduga mahakki mamai khudeina pullammi, Jisuna makhoida hai, yetsillaba adu louthoku aduga mahakpu chathallu. 

45 Mariyamgi manakta lakhiba jihudising mayamna Jisuna toukhiba adu ukhri, aduga mahakpu thajakhi, 

46 Touigumbasung makhoigi maraktagi kharanadi Pharisising tanna chatkhiduna Jisuna toukhiba adu tamlure. 

Athoiba purohitsingna Jisubu hatnabagi khujin thourang 

47 Maram aduna athoiba purohitsingna amasung pharisisingna ahallup khomduna hai, eikhoina kari touribano? maramdi mi asina ayamba khudam toui. 

48 Eikhoina mahakpu mathanta asumna thadoklabadi, mi pumnamakna mangonda thajagani, aduga Romgi misingna laktuna, eikhoigi lam amasung eikhoigi jati asi loukhragani. 

49 Touigumbasung makhoigi maraktagi kanagumba ama, chahi adugi purohitlen oiriba Kayaphana makhoida hai, nakhoina karisu khangde, 

50 Leibak amagi jati pumnamak mangdanaba mi amana jati pumnamakidamak sibiba asi eikhoidamak henna phai haiba nakhoina khangde. 

51 Adubu wa asi mahakna mathantadagi haiba natte, adubu mahakna chahi adugi purohitlen oiba maramna Jisuna jati adugidamak sibigani haina mahakna wa takthokpa mi amagumna haikhi, 

52 Aduga jat adugi damakta nattana, ichai chaithokkhiba Iswargi machasingbu Ibungona ama oina khomsu khomjinbinanaba mahakna sibigani. 

53 Maram aduna numit adudagi houna makhoina Ibungobu hatnanaba wa tannare. 

54 Maram aduna Jisuna jihudisinggi marakta phongna amuk koiramde, touigumbasung Ibungona lamjao manakta leiba Ephraim kouba sahar amada chatlaga, aduda mahakki seboksingga leiminarrami. 

55 Amahiksung Jihudisinggi aranchakkhangba naksillammi, lepthompibagi aranchakkhangba gi mamangda, khundagi mi kayana Jerusalemda makhoi masamak senghanaba chatlammi. 

56 Maram aduna makhoina Jisubu thirammi, aduga makhoina Iswar ningnasangda asum laktuna amaga amaga ngangnaraki, nakhoina kari khanbano? mahakna chakkhangbada lakloidrane? 

57 Adubu athoiba purohitsing amasung pharisisingna asumna yathang pikhre, kanagumbana Jisu kadaida lei haiba khanglabadi, makhoina mahakpu phanaba mahakna pao pigadabani.

Johan 12 

Bethaniyada Mariyamna Jisubu thao heibiba
