1 Maram aduna Jisuna asiba singgi maraktagi hinggathanbiba Lasarna leiba Bethaniyada; aran-chakkhangbagi mamang numit tarukni watlingeida, leng-lakle. 

2 Matou asum touna makhoina maduda Ibungona numidang luk hananaba langle aduga Marthana thougan touram-mi, adubu Ibungoga luk habada pham-minnabasinggi marakta amadi Lasar oirammi. 

3 Maram aduna Matiyamna asengba Naradki mamal yamna luba teina-thao sermakhai ama puraktuna, Jisugi khongda teibiraga, mahakki masamna Ibungogi khong adu teithokpire; aduga yum adu teinathaogi manam aduna thalle. 

4 Touigumbasung Ibungobu pithok-kadouriba Jihuda Iskariyot, seboksinggi maraktagi ama aduna hai, 

5 Teinathao asi dinar chahumlomda yonthoktuna, lairabasingda karigi pithok-tabage? 

6 Mahakna asi haibadi laira-basinggi damak mahakna khanduna haiba natte, touigumbasung maram asina haibani, madudi mahak huranbani, amasung mangonda leiba sen-gao aduda happa adu louthoklammi. 

7 Maram aduna Jisuna hai, eibu phumbagi thourang touba numit phaoba madu thamnanaba mahakna man-ing toujasanu. 

8 Matamdi lairabasingdi nakhoiga itattattana leiminnei; adubu eidi nakhoiga itattattana leiminnaba natte. 

9 Maram aduna jihudisinggi micham-singna Ibungpna aduda lei haiba khang-laduna, Jisugi maram ngaktagi nattana, Ibungona asibasinggi maraktagi hing-gathanbikhiba Lasarbusu yengnanaba makhoina lakle. 

10 Touigumbasung athoiba purohitsingna Lasarbusu hatnanaba wa tannare; 

11 Maramdi mahakki maramna jihudisinggi maraktagi ayamba chat-thokkhiduna, Jisubu thajarammi. 

Jerusalemda Jisuna lola tongduna lengkhatpa 

12 Nongngallakpada chakkhangbada laklaba micham ayambana Jisuna Jerusalemda lenglakli haiba tara-bada, 

13 Thangdup pambigi maka pai-duna Ibungobu oknanaba lenglaktuna, laona hairak-i, Hosanna, Prabhugi ming-da lengbirakliba Ibungo, Israyelgi ning-thou adu, yaiphabani! 

14 Aduga Jisuna lola macha ama phangladuna mathakta lengkhatle; 

15 Kiganu, Siyon-gi macha nupi, yeng-u, nahakki ningthouna lola macha amagi mathakta tongduna lengbirak-i, haiba ikhibagumbani, touri touriba asi Ibungogi seboksingna ahanbada khanglamde; 

16 Touigumbasung Jisuna matik mangal phanglaba matam aduda waram asi Ibungogi matamda ikhibani amasung thabak asi Ibungoda toukhibani haiba makhoina ningsinglakle. 

17 Maram aduna Ibungona mong-phamdagi Lasarbu kouthoktuna sibadagi hinggathanba matamda loinaramba miyam aduna sakshi pirammi. 

18 Asigi damaknasu mi mayam aduna Ibungobu oknarare, maramdi Ibungona khudam asi toure haiba makhoina tare. 

19 Maram aduna Pharisisingna makhoi masen-gi marakta hainarak-i, khang-u nakhoina touba karisu kannade! Yeng-u, taibang-panbana mahakki tung inkhre! 

Griksinggi haijaba 

20 Amahiksung chakkhangbada Iswarbu khurumjananaba karakpasinggi maraktagi kanagumba Griksing yaorammi. 

21 Maram aduna makhoi asina Galilgi Betseidagi Philipta laktuna, man-gonda haijarak-i, 

22 Philipna laktuna Andriyada tammi; Andriyaga Philipkana laktuna Jisuda tammi. 

23 Aduga Jisuna makhoida khumlaki, migi macha nipa aduna matik mangal chaonanaba pungpham adu lakle. 

24 Eina nakhoida thanggeisengnamak hairibani, gehu maru ama leipak-ta taduna sidragadi, madu mathanta adum marei; adubu madu siragadi, mahei yamba palli. 

25 Mathawai nungsijaba mahak aduna madu manghalli; aduga taibangpal asida thawai tukka-chaba mahak aduna lomba naidaba hingba phangba madu ngakkan-i. 

26 Kanagumbana eibu thou-ganjaragadi, eigi itung injasanu; aduga eina leiba mapham aduda eigi inaisu leigani; kanagumbana eibu thouganjara-gadi, +Ipana mahakpu ikaikhumnabigani. 

27 Houjikti ithawai ware; aduga eina kari haisige? lpa, pungpham asidagi eibu ngakpiyu. Touigumbasung maram asigi damak pungpham asi phaoba eina lakle. 

28 Ipa, Ibungogi ming matik mangal chaohallu. Maram aduna swarga-dagi khonjel ama thoklakle, eina madu matik mangal chaosu chaohankhre, aduga madu amuksu chaohan-gani, 

 

29 Maram aduna manakta leplamduna taraba miyam aduna hairak-i, masi nong-khongbani. ateisingna hairak-i, swargadut amana mahakka ngang nare. 

30 Jisuna khumlak-i, khonjel asi eigi maramgi damak lakpa natte, adubu nakhoigi maramgi damakni. 

31 Houjik taibangpanba asigi wayenba oiri; houjik taibangpanba asigi mapu inthokkani. 

32 Amasung eimakpu leipaktagi thanggatlabadi, mi pumnamakpu isagi nakta eina chingsin-gani, 

33 Touigumbasung Ibungona haiba asidi Ibungona sigadouriba adu matou karamna sigani haiba khanghan-bani. 

34 Maram aduna miyam aduna Ibungoda khumle, Khrist adudi lomba naidana lei haiduna eikhoina wayel ya-thang lairiktagi tare; aduga migi macha nipa adubu thanggatpa tare haiduna nahakna karamna haibage. migi macha nipa asi kanano? 

35 Maram aduna Jisuna makhoida hai, amuk matam khara nak-hoigi narakta mangal adu lei. Nakhoina amamba nangdananaba, nakhoida, mangal leiringeida koichat chatlu; aduga amam-bada koichat chatpa mahak aduna kadaida chatlibano haiba khangde 

36 Nakhoida mangal adu leiringeida, mangal adugi machasing oiraknanaba, mangal adubu thajou. 

Jihudiya leibakki thajadaba, adubu aronba sebok khara phangba 

Jisuna wasing asi nganglaga theikhi-duna, makhoidagi Ibungogi lot-khre. 

37 Touigumbasung Ibungona asup yamba khudam makhoigi mamangda toubikhrabasu, makhoina Ibungoda thajaramde; 

38 Iswargi wa takthokpa Jisaiyana hairamba wa adu thungnana-bani, haibadi, Prabhu, eikhoigi paodam kanana thajabibage? Aduga kanada Prab-hugi pambom phongdokpi-rabage? 

39 Maram asigi damak makhoina thajaba ngamlamde, maramdi Jisai-yana amuk hai, 

40 Makhoina mamitna uba, mapuk-ningna khangba, aduga amuk onsillakpa, amasung eina makhoibu naba phahanbiba, asi khibik oidananaba, Ibungo mahakna makhoigi mamit tanghalle, aduga mak-hoigi pukning kalhalle. 

41 Jisaiyana Ibungogi matik mangal ubagi maramna asi haibani; aduga mahakna Ibungogi maramda ngangba oire. 

42 Adum oinamAkpu ayamba luching-basingmakna Ibungoda thajare; adubu pharisisinggi maramna makhoibu loi-sanggi kangluptagi inthoktananaba, makhoina haidoklamde; 

43 Maramdi Iswarna thagatpadagi misingna thagatpa makhoina henna pamle. 

Jisuna iphong phongna tambibagi maru oiba wa khara dang 

44 Amahiksung Jisuna laona hai, eibu thajaba mahak aduna eibu thajaba natte touigumbasung eibu tharaklaba Ibungo mahakpu thajabani. 

45 Amasung eibu yengliba mi aduna eibu tharaklaba Ibungo mahakpu yenglibani. 

46 Eibu thajaba mi khudingna amambada leitananaba, eina mangal oiduna taibangpanda lakle. 

47 Aduga kanagumbana eigi wa taraga ngaktrabadi, eina mahakpu way-ende; maramdi eina taibangpanbabu wayennanaba lakpa natte, touigumbasung eina taibangpanbabu kanbinanaba lakpani. 

48 Eibu thou-oidaba amasung eigi wa loudaba mahak adubu wayenba ama lei; eina ngangkhiba wa adumakna mahakpu akonba numit aduda wayen-gani. 

49 Maramdi eina isa ithantadagi ngangkhiba, natte; touigumbasung eibu tharaklaba ipa aduna, eina kari haiga-daba amasung kari nganggadaba adu Ibungo mahakna eingonda yathang pire. 

50 Amasung Ibungo mahakki yath-ang adu lomba naidaba hingba oiribani haiba eina khang-i; maram aduna eina ngangli ngangliba asi ipana eingonda haikhiba adugumna eina nganglibani.

Johan 13 

Jisuna seboksinggi khong hambiba 

1 Amahiksung aran-chakkhangbagi mamangda, Jisuna taibangpan asi-dagi mapagi nakta lanthokkadaba pung-pham adu lakle haiba khangladuna, taibangpanda leiba Ibungogi masagi oiba misingbu nungsiraduna, makhoibu Ibun-gona mamei phaoba nungsibire. 

2 Aduga Simon-gi macha nipa Jihuda Iskriyotki thamoida Ibungobu pithoknanaba diya-bolna hanna hapkhraduna, 

3 Numidang luk haringeida Jisuna, mapana Ibungogi khutta pumnamak pithokle, amasung Ibungona Iswardagi lengthoklakle aduga Iswargi nakta lenggadouri haiba khang-laduna, 

4 Numidang luk habadagi leng-khatlaga Ibungogi innaphi thammi, aduga Ibungona khudei ama louduna khwangda pulle. 

5 Adudagi Ibungona khudengda ising heiduna, seboksinggi khong hambiba amasung Ibungona pulliba khudei aduna teithokpiba houre. 

6 Asumna Ibungona Pitarda lengsilli Mahakna Ibungoda hai, Prabhu, Ibun-gonabu eigi khong hambi-gadra? 

7 Jisuna mangonda khumlak-i, eina Kari touriba houjik nahakna khangde, adubu asigi matungda nahakna khanglakkani. 

8 Pitarna Ibungoda hai, Ibungona kadoungeidasu eigi khong hambiroidabani. Jisuna mangonda khumle, eina nahakpu hambidrabadi, nahakka eiga karisu thoknade. 

9 Simon Pitarna Ibungoda hai, Prabhu, eigi khongta nattana ikhutsu ikoksu cham-biyu. 

10 Jisuna mangonda hai, irujakh-raba mahak aduna makhong nattana hamgadaba leite, adubu apumbadi seng-i; amasung nakhoidi seng-i, touigumbasung pumnamakti sengba natte. 

11 Maramdi Ibungobu pithokkadouriba mi adubu Ibungona khangle; asigi maramna nakhoi pumnamak sengba natte haiduna Ibun-gona haibani. 

12 Asum touna Ibungona makhoigi makhong hambiba loiraduna innaphi adu louraga amuk phamtharabada makhoida hai eina nakhoida toukhiba adu nakhoina khangbra? 

13 Nakhoina eibu Guru ama-sung Prabhu koui, aduga nakhoina chumna haibani, maramdi ei madu makni. 

14 Maram aduna eina Prabhu adu amasung Guru adu oiduna, nakhoigi khong hambirabadi, nakhoisu amana amagi khong hambipham thok-i. 

15 Maramdi eina nakhoida toubikhiba adugumna nakhoinasu tounanaba eina nakhoida pandam pirabani. 

16 Eina nak-hoida thanggeisengnamak hairibani, minaina mabungodagi henna chaoba natte; aduga pakhonchatliba mi aduna mahakpu tharakpa mi adudagi henna chaode. 

17 Nakhoina hiramsing asi khanglaga, madu tourabadi, nakhoi yai-phabani. 

18 Eina nakhoi pumnamakki maramda ngangba natte; eina kana kanabu khan-gatlaba eina khangjei; touigumba-sung eigi tal chaba mahak aduna eigi ithakta magi khonggi khuning thanggatle, haiba sastra adu thungnana-bani. 

19 Houjiktagina, asum thoktrin-geida, eina nakhoibu tambi, haibadi, asum thoklabada, eini haiba nakhoina thaja-nanabani. 

20 Eina nakhoida thanggei-sengnamak hairibani, eina thaba kana-gumba mi adubu yaba mahak aduna eibu yabani; aduga eibu yaba mahak aduna eibu tharakpa Ibungo mahakpu yabani. 

Jisubu yeknabagi khutta pithokkadaba mi adubu Jisuna takthokpa 

21 Jisuna wasing asi hairaga, thawai ware, amasung sakshi piduna hai, eina nakhoiga thanggeisengnamak hairibani, nakhoigi naraktagi amana eibu pithok-kani. 

22 Ibungona kanagi maramda ngangbano haiba seboksingna chingna-duna, amana amabu yengnarak-i. 

23 Seboksinggi marakta ama, haibadi Jisuna nungsiba aduna Jisugi thabakki mapada chagadabagi ngathdaduna pham-lammi. 

24 Maram aduna Simon Pitarna mangonda nason touduna hai, Ibungona kanagi maramda ngangbano tam-biyu. 

25 Mahakna Jisugi thabakta asum ngaduna Ibungoda hanggatli, Prabhu, madu kanano? 

26 Maram aduna Jisuna khummi, eina tal machet luplaga pigadou-riba mahak aduni. Asum touna Ibungona tal machet adu luplaga louduna Simon Iskariyotki macha nipa Jihudada pi. 

27 Amasung tal machet adu pibagi matungda seitanna mangonda changle. Maram aduna Jisuna mangonda hai, nangna touriba adu thuna tou. 

28 Adubu Ibungona asi karigi maramna mangonda haibano haiba chabada phamlibasing kana amatana khangde. 

29 Marmdi Jihudada sen-gao leibanina chakkhangbagi damak eikhoigi kannanaba pot leiyu, nattraga mahakna lairabasingda karigumba khara pigadabani, haiduna Jisuna mangonda haibani haina makhoi kharana ning-lammi. 

30 Mahakna tal, machet adu phanglaga hek chatthokkhre; aduga matam adu ahing oirammi. 

Nungsinou haibagi anouba yathang 

31 Maram aduna mahakna thokkhra-bada Jisuna hai, houjik migi macha nipa adubu matik mangal chaohalle, amasung mahakki mapanna Iswarbu matik mangal chaohalle; 

32 Aduga Iswarna mathan-tada mahakpu matik mangal chaohanbi-gani. amasung thunamak Ibungo mahakna mahakpu matik mangal chaohanbi-gani. 

33 Nungsiba angangsa, matam kharadang eina nakhoiga leiminnari. Nak-hoina eibu thigani, aduga eina jihudi-singda haikhibagumna, eina chatpa mapham aduda nakhoina lakpa ngamloi, adugumduna houjik eina nakhoidasu hairi. 

34 Anouba yathang ama eina nakhoiga piri, nakhoi amaga amaga nungsinou; eina nakhoibu nungsiba adugumna nakhoisu amaga amaga nungsinou. 

35 Nakhoida amaga amaga nungsinaba leirabadi, asina mi pumnamakna nakhoi eigi sebokni haiba khanggani. 

Pitarna yaroidaba mangjounana haidokpa 

36 Simon Pitarna Ibungoda, hai, prabhu, kadaida lengbigege? Jisuna khumle, eina chatpa mapham aduda nahak houjik itung inba ngamloi; adubu matungda nahakna itung in-gani. 

37 Pitarna Ibungoda hai, Prabhu, houjikmak eina Ibungogi tung injaba karigi ngamloidabage? Eina ithawai Ibun-gogi damak thajagani. 

38 Jisuna khummi, nahak eigidamak thawai tha-gera? Eina nangonda thanggei sengnamak hairibani, nahakna eibu yadaba ahumlak sudriba phaoba yellaba khak khongloi.

Johan 14 

Iswar phangnaba lambi; thawai asengbagi maramda waleppa 

1 Nakhoigi pukning olang onsaoba toudasanu; Iswarbu thajou, eibu-su thajou. 

2 Eigi ipagi yumda leipham yamna lei; madu natlamdrabadi eina nak-hoida haibiramgadabani; maramdi eina nakhoigi damak mapham thourang touna-naba chatli. 

3 Amasung eina chattuna nakhoigi damak thourang tourabadi, eina leiba mapham aduda nakhoisu leinanaba, eina amuk laktuna nakhoibu inakta pujemgani. 

4 Aduga eina kadaida chat-liba nakhoina lambi adu khang-i. 

5 Thomana Ibungoda, hai, Prabhu, Ibungona kadaida lengliba eikhoina khangjade; karamna eikhoina lambi adu khanggadage? 

6 Jisuna mangonda hai, lambi adusu, achumba adusu, hingba adusu eini; eigi ipanna nattanadi mi kana amatanasu ipagi maphamda thungde. 

7 Nakhoina eibu khinglamlabadi, nakhoina eigi ipa-busu khanglamgadabani; houjiktagi nak-hoina Ibungo mahakpu khang-i amasung ure. 

8 Philipna Ibungoda, hai, Prabhu, ipa adubu eikhoida uhanbiyu, aduga eikhoi penjagani. 

9 Jisuna mangonda hai, matam asup kuina eina nakhoiga leiminnei, aduga nahakna eibu khangdribra, Philip? eibu uraba mahak aduna ipa adubu ure; nahakna karamna eikhoida ipa adubu uhanbiyu haibage? 

10 Eina ipada lei aduga ipana eingonda lei haiba nahakna thajadabra? Eina nakhoida hairi hairiba wa adu eina isa ithantadagi ngnagba natte, toui-gumbasung eingonda leiba ipa aduna Ibungo mahakki thabak tou-i. 

11 Eina ipada lei aduga ipana eingonda lei haiba eigi wa adu thajou; nattraga eigi thabak adumakki mamma thajou. 

12 Eina nak-hoida thanggei sengnamak hairibani, eibu thajaba mahak aduna eina touba touba thabak adu mahaknasu tougani; aduga asisingdagi henna chaoba thabak mahakna tougani; maramdi eina ipagi maphamda chatli. 

13 Amasung mapana macha nipa aduda matik mangal phangnanaba, nakhoina eigi mingda nija nijaba adu eina toubigani. 

14 Eigi mingda nakhoina kar-igumba eingonda nijarabadi, eina madu toubigani. 

15 Nakhoina eibu nungsirabadi, eigi yathang pumnamak nakhoina ngak-kani. 

16 Amasung eina ipada haijagani, aduga Ibungo mahakna atei pangbiba ama, 

17 Haibadi achumba adugi thawai adubu, nakhoiga lomba naidana leiminna-naba nakhoida pibigani; taibangpanbana Ibungo mahakpu ngamde, maramdi Ibungo mahakpu usu ude, khangsu khangde; nakhoidi Ibungo mahakpu khang-i, maramdi Ibungo mahakna nak-hoiga itattattana loinei, amasung nakhoigi nungda leibani. 

18 Eina nakhoibu pitat patatpa machagum thanamloi; eina nak-hoida lakkani. 

19 Matam khara leiraga taibangpanbana eibu amuk uroi, adubu nakhoidi eibu ugani; eina hingbagi mar-amna nakhoisu hinggani. 

20 Eina ipada lei, nakhoina eingonda lei, amasung eina nakhoida lei haiba nakhoina numit aduda khangani. 

21 Eina yathang phanglaba amasung ngakpa mahak adumakna eibu nungsibani; aduga eibu nungsiba mahak adubu eigi ipana nungsigani, amasung eina mahakpu nungsiduna mangonda isa ithantabu phongdokchagani. 

22 Iskariyot nattaba Jihudana Ibungoda hai, Prabhu, Ibungo nasa nathantabu eik-hoida phongdokpigani aduga taibang-panbadadi natte haiba asi kari thok - khibanano? 

23 Jisuna mangonda khumlak-i, kanagumbana eibu nungsirabadi, mah-akna eigi wa ngakkani, aduga eigi ipana mahakpu nungsibigani, amasung eikhoina mangonda laktuna mahakka loinana eik-hoigi leipham semgani. 

24 Eibu nung-sidaba mahak aduna eigi wasing ngakte; amasung nakhoina tariba wa adu eigi natte, adubu eibu tharakpa ipagani. 

25 Eina nakhoiga leimi-nnaringeida waramsing asi nakhoida ngangle. 

26 Touigumbasung pangbiba adu, haibadi ipana eigi mingda thabirak-kadaba thawai asengba, Ibungo mahak aduna nakhoida pumnamak tambigani, amasung eina nakhoida haikhiba pum-namak adu nakhoibu ningsinghanbigani. 

27 Ingthaba eina nakhoida thanammi; eigi ingthaba eina nakhoida pibi; taibang-panbana pibagumna eina nakhoida pibide. Nakhoigi pukning olang onsaoba tou-dasanu, aduga kiba oidasanu. 

28 Eina chatthokkani, amasung eina nakhoida lak-kani haiba eina nakhoida haikhiba adu nakhoina tare. Nakhoina eibu nung-sirabadi, eina Ipagi maphamda chatpa maramna nakhoina haraoramgadabani; maramdi Ipana eingondagi henna chao-i. 

29 Amasung thoklakpada nakhoina thajananaba, houjik thoktringeida eina nakhoida tambikhre. 

30 Eina nakhoiga amuk hanna yamna ngangnaroi, maramdi taibangpanbagi mapu adu lak-i, aduga eingonda magi karisu leite; 

31 Toui-gtunbasung eina Ipabu nungsi Ipana eingonda yathang pikhibagumna eina tou-i haiba taibangpanbana khangnanabani. Hougatlo, eikhoi mapham asidagi chatlasi.

Johan 15 

Draksha mari amasung masa; taibangpal amasung achumbagi thawai 

1 Achumba draksha mari adu eini, aduga ingkhol koiba mi adu eigi Ipani. 

2 Mahei pandaba eingonda leiba masa khuding adubu Ibungo mahakna kakthatli; amasung mahei panba masa khuding adubu mahei henna pannanaba Ibungo mahakna sengdok-i. 

3 Eina nak-hoida ngangkhiba wa adugi maramna houjik nakhoi seng-i. 

4 Eingonda iatta-ttana leiyu, aduga eina nakhoida itatta-ttana leige. Draksha marida masa aduna itattattana leiba nattrabadi, mathantana mahei panba ngamdaba adugumna, nakhoina eingonda itattattana leiba nattrabadi, nakhoinasu mahei panba ngamde. 

5 Draksha mari adu eini, masadi nakhoini. eingonda itattattana leiba amasung eina mangonda itattattana leiba mahak aduna mahei yamna palli; maramdi ei yaodana nakhoina karisu touba ngamde. 

6 Kanagumba mina ein-gonda itattattana leiba nattrabadi, mahak-pu masagumna hunsu hunjek-i, kangsu kangsilli; aduga makhoina madubu khom-jillaga meinungda langsinduna thadok-i. 

7 Nakhoina eingonda itattattana leira-badi, aduga eigi wasing nakhoida itatta-ttna leirabadi, nakhoina niningba nijou, aduga madu nakhoida oirakkani. 

8 Nak-hoina mahei yamna panduna, asum eigi sebok oiba, asida eigi Ipana matik mangal phang-i. 

9 Eibu Ipana nungsiraba adugumna, einasu nakhoibu nungsire; nakhoina eigi nungsibada itattattana leiyu. 

10 Eina Ipagi yathang makhei ngakladuna Ibungo mahakki nungsibada itattattana leiba adugumna, nakhoina eigi yathang makhei ngaklabadi, nakhoina eigi nung-sibada itattattana leigani. 

11 Eigi haraoba nakhoida leinanaba, amasung nakhoigi haraoba mapung phahannanaba, waramsing asi eina nakhoida haire. 

12 Eina nakhoibu nungsiraba adu-gumna nakhoinasu amaga amaga nung-sinou haiba asi eigi yathangni. 

13 Kana-gumba amana mahakki marupsinggi damak mathawai thabiba, asidagi henna nungsiba kanagisu leite, 

14 Eina nak-hoida yathang piba piba adu nak-hoina tourabadi, nakhoi eigi marupni. 

15 Amuk hanna eina nakhoibu minai kouraroi, maramdi mabungona touba adu minaina khangde; adubu eina nakhoibu marup koure, maramdi eina Ipadagi taba pumnamak adu eina nak-hoida khanghalle. 

16 Nakhoina eibu khanba natte, adubu eina nakhoibu khalle, aduga nakhoina chattuna mahei panna-naba, amasung nakhoigi mahei adu itatta-ttana leinanaba, nakhoina eigi mingda Ipagi maphamda nija nijaba adu Ibungo mahakna madu nakhoida pibinanaba eina nakhoibu pham haple. 

17 Nakhoina amaga amaga nungsinan-aba puninamA asi eina nakhoida yathang pi. 

18 Taibangpanbana nakhoibu tukkacharabadi, nakhoibu tukkacha-dringeida eibu tukkachare haiba khang-u. 

19 Nakhoi taibangpanbagi oirabadi, taibangpanbana natte, adubu eina nak-hoibu taibangpandagi khalle, asigi maramma taibangpanbana nakhoibu tukk-achei. 

20 Minaina mabungodagi henna chaoba natte haina eina nakhoida haikhiba wa adu ningsing-u, Makhoina eibu ot-neirabadi, nakhoibusu ot-neigani; mahoina eigi wa ngaklabadi, nakhoigisu ngakkani. 

21 Touigumbasung eigi minggi maramgi damak makhoina asi pumnamak nakhoida tougani, maramdi eibu tharakpa Ibungo mahakpu makhoina khangde. 

22 Eina laktuna makhoida nganglamdrabadi, makhoigi pap leiram-loidabani; touigumbasung houjikti mak-hoigi pap kuppipham leite. 

23 Eibu tukkachaba mahak aduna eigi Ipabusu tukkachei. 

24 Mi atei kana amatana tou-khidaba thabak adu eina makhoigi mar-akta touramdrabadi, makhoigi pap leiramloidabani; touigumbasung houjikti makhoina eibusu Ipabusu usu ure tuksu tukkachare. 

25 Touigumbasung mak-hoina maram leitana eibu tukkachare haiba makhoigi wayel yathang adugi lairikta ikhiba wa adu thungnanabani. 

26 Adubu eina Ipaciagi nakhoida tharakkadaba pangbiba adu, haibadi Ipadagi thoklakpa achumbagi thawai aduna lakpada, Ibungo mahakmakna eigi maramda sakshi pigani. 

27 Aduga nak-hoinasu sakshi pi, maramdi ahoubadagi nakhoina eiga loinaraklabani.

Johan 16 

Khainaramdaigi wa 

1 Nakhoibu khudi thihandanaba, eina nakhoida wasing asi haikhre. 

2 Makhoina nakhoibu loisanggi kang-luptagi inthokkani; hoi, nakhoibu hatpa kanagumbana mahak Iswarda katchari haina ninggadaba pungpham adu lak-i. 

3 Amasung makhoina Ipabusu eibusu khangdaba maramna thabaksing asi mak-hoina tougani. 

4 Touigumbasung mak-hoigi pungpham adu laklabada, eina nak-hoida madu tambikhibani haiba nakhoina ningsingnanaba, eina nakhoida wasing asi haikhre. Aduga eina nakhoiga leiminnaba maramna ahoubadagi eina nakhoida was-ing asi haide. 

5 Adubu houjikti eibu tharakpa Ibungo mahakki maphamda ei chatkadouri; aduga nakhoigi naraktagi kana amatana eingonda kadaida chatka-douribage haiba hangde. 

6 Touigumba-sung eina nakhoida wasing asi hailchiba maramna nakhoigi pukning wabana thane. 

7 Adum oinamakpu eina nakhoida achumba hairibani; ei chatthokpa asi nak-hoigi damak tongjabani, maramdi ei chat-thoktrabadi, pangbiba aduna nak-hoigi maphamda khak lakloi; adubu ei chatlabadi, Ibungo mahakpu eina nak-hoida tharakkani. 

8 Amasung Ibungo mahakmakna lengbiraklaga, papki mar-amda, dharmachenbagi maramda amas-ung wayenbagi maramda taibang-panbabu maral khanghanbigani: 

9 Papki maramdi, makhoina eingonda tha-jade; 

10 Dharmachenbagi maramdi, Ipagi maphamda ei chatkadouri, aduga nakhoina eibu amuk uroi; 

11 Amasung wayenbagi maramdi, taibangpanba asigi mapubu wayel toukhre. 

12 Eina nakhoida haigadaba wa amuk yamna lei, adubu nakhoina houjik madu khangba ngamloi. 

13 Touigumbasung Ibungo mahakna, haibadi achumbagi thawai aduna, lengbiraklaga, Ibungo mah-akna nakhoibu achumba pumnamakta chingbigani; maramdi Ibungo mahakna mathantadagi ngangloi, adubu ata ataba adu ngangbigani. Aduga thokka thokka-daba adu nakhoida khanghan-bigani. 

14 Ibungo mahakna eibu matik mangal chaohanbigani, maramdi Ibungo mahakna eigidagi louduna nakhoida madu khanghanbigani. 

15 Ipagi areiba pum-namak adu eigini; maram asina Ibungo mahakna eigidagi louduna nakhoida madu khanghanbigani haiba eina haire. 

16 Khan leiraga nakhoina eibu uba phangloi; aduga amuk khara leiraga nakhoina eibu ugani. 

17 Maram aduna Ibungogi seboksinggi maraktagi kharana amaga amaga hairnarak-i, khara leiraga nakhoina eibu uba phangloi, aduga amuk khara leiraga nakhoina eibu ugani; amasung, maramdi ei Ipagi maphamda chatkadouri, haiduna Ibungona eikhoida haiba asi karino? 

18 Maram aduna makhoina hairammi, khara leiraga haiba Ibungona haiba asi karino? Ibungona lcari haiba eikhoi khangde. 

19 Makhoina hangjaningba adu Jisuna khangladuna makhoida hai, khara leirakga nakhoina eibu uba phangloi, aduga amuk khara leiraga nakhoina eibu ugani haiduna eina haikhiba asigi maramda nakhoi nasen-gi marakta thinaribra? 

20 Eina nakhoida thanggei sengnamak hairibani, nakhoina kapsu kapkani, tengsu teng-thagani, adubu taibangpanbana harao-gani; nakhoina pukning wagani, adubu nakhoigi awaba haraobada on-gani. 

21 Nupina angang unaba matamda wai, maradi mahakki pungpham lakle; touigumbasung mahakna angang adu poklabada, mi ama taibangpanda pokle haibagi haraoba maramna, awa ana adu mahakna amuk ning-singde. 

22 Asum touna nakhoisu houjik pukning wari, adubu eina nakhoi bu amuk unagani, aduga nakhoigi pukning harao-gani, amasung nakhoigi haraoba adu kana-nasu nakhoidagi louthokloi. 

23 Amasung numit aduda nakhoina wahang kari amata eingonda hangloi. Eina nakhoida thanggei sengnamak hairibani, nakhoina Ipagi maphamda karigumba nijarabadi, Ibungo mahakna eigi mingda madu nakhoida pibigani. 

24 Hotijik phaoba nakhoina eigi mingda karisu nijadri; nijou, aduga nakhoigi haraoba mapung phahannanaba nakhoina phangjagani.

 

25 Hiramsing asi pandam oina eina nakhoida haire; nakhoida amuk pandam oina ngangdaduna Ipagi maramda phongna eina nakhoida takthokpigadaba pungpham adu lak-i. 

26 Numit aduda nakhoina eigi mingda nijagani; aduga eina nakhoigi damak Ipada haijagani haiba eina nakhoida,haide; 

27 Maramdi Ipa Ibungo mahakmakna nakhoibu nungsi, maramdi nakhoina eibu nungsire amasung eina Ipadagi lakpani haiba nakhoina thajare. 

28 Ei Ipadagi thoklaktuna taibangpanda lakle; amuk ei taibangpan thanamduna Ipagida chatkadouri. 

29 Ibungogi seboksingna hai, yeng-biyu, houjik Ibungona phongna haibiduna pandam oina karisu ngang-bide. 

30 Ibungona pumnamak ikhang khang-i, aduga kanagumbana Ibungoda hangpham leite haiba houjikti eikhoida khang-i; asigi mapanna, Iswardagi Ibungo thoklakpani haiba eikhoi thajei. 

31 Jisuna makhoida khumle, houjik nakhoina thajabra? 

32 Yeng-u, nakhoi mi khudingna napham naphamda ichai chaikhiduna, eibu ithanta thadokkadaba pungham adu lakkadouri, hoi, madu lakle. Adum oinamakpu ei ithanta natte, mar-amdi Ipana eiga loinari. 

33 Nakhoina oingonda ingthaba phangnanaba, eina nakhoida wasing asi haikhre. Taibang-panbada nakhoina awa anang phang-i, touigumbasung nungngaijaro; eina taibangpanbabu ngamle.

Johan 17 

Jisuna haijaba 

1 Jisuna wasing asi haire, aduga swarga lomda Ibungona mit yeng-khattuna hai, Ipa, pungpham adu lakle; 

2 Ibungona nacha nipada pibi-khiba punmamakta mahakna lomba naidaba hingba pibinanaba, lengli-palliba pumnamakki mathakta Ibungona man-gonda matik pibikhiba adugumna, Ibun-gobu machanipana matik mangal chaohannanaba, nachanipabu matik mangal chaohan-biyu. 

3 Amasung amata ngaiba achumba Iswar Ibungobu amasung Ibungona tharakpa Jisu Khristabu mak-hoina khangba, masi lomba naidaba hingba aduni. 

4 Eina tounanaba Ibungona eingonda pibikhiba thabak adu eina loithakladuna, prithibida Ibungobu matik mangal chaohalle. 

5 Aduga, Ipa, taibangpan oidringeida Ibungoga loinana eigi matik mangal leiramba aduna Ibun-gogi nakta houjik eibu matik mangal chaohanbiyu. 

6 Ibungona taibangpanbadagi ein-gonda pibikhiba mising aduda eina Ibungogi mingbu phongdokchare makhoigi Ibungogi oirammi, aduga Ibuti-gona makhoibu eingonda pibire, amasung makhoina Ibungogi wa ngak-chare 

7 Ibungona eingonda pibikhiba pumnamak adu Ibungodagani haiba honjik makhoina khang-i; 

8 Maramdi Ibungona eingonda pibikhiba wasing adu eina makhoida pire, aduga makhoina madu louduna, eina Ibungodagi thoklak-pani haiba makhoina chumna khangle, amasung Ibungona eibu tharakpani haiba makhoina thajare. 

9 Eina makhoigi damak haijabani, taibangpanbagi damak haijaba natte; adubu Ibungona eingonda pibikhiba mak-hoi adugi damakni, maramdi makhoi Ibungogini. 

10 Amasung eigi areiba makhei adu Ibungogini, aduga Ibungogi adu eigini, amasung makhoigi mapanna eina matik mangal phangjare. 

11 Aduga eidi taibangpanda leiraroi, adubu makhoi asigi taibangpanda leiri amasung eidi Ibungoda lakchari. Asengba Ipa, eik-hoina amata oibagumna makhoi oinanaba, Ibungona eingonda pibikhiba makhoibu Ibungogi mingda ngakpiyu. 

12 Eina makhoiga leiminnaringeida, Ibungona eingonda pibikhiba makhoi adubu Ibungogi mingda eina senna-jarammi; aduga eina makhoibu ngakch-are, amasung sastragi wa adu thungna-naba, amangbagi macha nipa adu nattana, makhoi kana amata mangde. 

13 Toui-gumbasung houjikti ei Ibungogi mapham-da lakchari; aduga makhoi makhoigi masada eigi haraoba mapung phahan-nanaba eina taibangpanda wasing asi hairi. 

14 Eina Ibungogi wa makhoida pikhre; amasung, taibangpanbana makho-ibu tukkachare, maramdi ei taibangpan-bagi nattaba gumna, makhoibu taibang-panbagi natte. 

15 Eina makhoibu taibangpanbadagi puthokpiyu haijaba natte, adubu Ibungona makhoibu phattaba adudagi sennabiyu haijabani. 

16 Ei taibang-panbagi nattabagumna, makhoisu taibangpanbagi natte. 

17 Makhoibu achumba aduna sengdokpiyu, Ibungogi wadi achumbani. 

18 Ibungona eibu taibangpanbada tharakpa adugumna einasu makhoibu taibangpanbada thare. 

19 Amasung makhoi masabusu achumbana sengdokpinanaba, makhoigi maramgi damak eina isa ithantabu kat-thokchei. 

20 Aduga makhoi asigi ngakta eina haijaba natte, adubu makhoigi wadagi thajaba makhoigi maramdasu, 

21 Mak-hoi pumnamak amata oinanaba haijabani; Ibungona eibu tharakpani haiba taibang-panbana thajananaba, he Ipa, Ibungona eingonda aduga eina Ibungoda lei-bagumna, makhoinasu eikhoida leinanaba eina haijei. 

22 Eikhoina amata oiba-gumna, makhoina amata oinanaba, Ibungona eingonda pibikhiba matik mangal adu eina makhoida pire; 

23 Eina makhoida aduga Ibungona eingonda leiba aduna makhoina mapung phana amata oinanabani; haibadi Ibungona eibu thar-akle, amasung Ibungona eibu nungsira-bagumna makhoibu nungsire haiba taibangpanbana khangnanabani. 

24 He Ipa, Ibungona taibangpan houdringeida eibu nungsiraba maramna, Ibungona ein-gonda pibiraba eigi matik mangal adubu Ibungona eingonda pibikhiba makhoina yengjanaba, eina leiba mapham aduda makhoinasu eiga leiminnaba eina pam-jei. 

25 Amasung, he asengba Ipa, tai-bangpanbanadi Ibungobu khangde, adubu eidi Ibungobu khangjare; aduga Ibungona eibu tharakle haiba makhoi asina khangle. 

26 Amasung Ibungona eibu nungsiraba manungsi adu makhoida leinanaba, aduga eina makhoida leinanba, eina Ibungogi mingbu makhoida khang-halle, amasung madu khanghan-gani.

Johan 18 

Jisubu phaba 

1 Jisuna wasing asi haibgagi matungda Ibungona seboksingga loinana Kidron lok wangmada lengthokle. mapam aduda leiba ingkhol adugi manu-ngda Ibungosu Ibungogi sebosksingsu lengsille. 

2 Aduga Ibungobu pithokpa Jihudanasu mapham adu khangle, mar-amdi Jisuna mapham aduda mahakki seboksingga loinana toina tinnaram-mi. 

3 Maram aduna Jihudana athoiba purohitsingga pharisisinggadagi lamnmi kanglup amasung phamnaibasingbu phangduna, mapham adu tanna thaomei, meira amasung khutlaiga loinana lak-i. 

4 Maduda Jisuna mangonda thokla-gadaba pumnamak adu khangduna, leng-thoklaga makhoida hai, nakhoina kanabu thiribage? Makhoina Ibungogda khumle Nasretki Jisubuni. 

5 Jisuna makhoida hai, Eini. Aduga Ibungobu pithokpa Jihudanasu makhoiga loinana leptuna leirammi. 

6 Maram aduna eini haina Ibungona makhoida haibada, makhoina ninghannaduna leipakta ture. 

7 Maram aduna amuk Ibungona makhoibu hangle, nakhoina kanabu thiribage? maduda makhoina hai, Nasretki Jisu-buni. 

8 Jisuna khumle, Eini haina nak-hoida eina takkhre; maram aduna nak-hoina eibu thirabadi, makhoi asi chatkhi-sanu. 

9 Ibungona eingonda pibikhiba makhoi adugi maraktagi eina kana ama-tabu manghande, haiba Ibungona haikhiba wa adu thungnanabani. 

10 Maram aduna Simon Pitarna kabak-thang leibadu satlaga, purohitlen-gi manaibu yanduna magi yatthangba mana soidatle. Aduga minai adugi mamingdi Malkhasni. 

11 Maram aduna Jisuna Pit-arda hai, kabakthang adu makhumda hapchillu; Ipana eingonda piraba tenggot adu eina thakloidra? 

12 Asum touna lanmi kanglupka, at-hoiba luchingbaga, Jihudisinggi phamnai-basinggana Jisubu phaduna pulle. 

13 Aduga makhoina Hannada Ibungobu hanna pukhre; maramdi mahakti chahi adugi purohitlen oiba Kayaphagi makubokni. 

14 Kayapha asidi, mi amana stnisinggi mahutta sibiba tongjabani haina jihudisingda takpikhiba mi aduni. 

Pitarna Jisubu yadaba 

15 Amahiksung Simon Pitarga atei sebok amagana Jisugi tung illammi. Aduga atei sebok ama adudi purohitlen-ga khangnabanina, purohitlen adugi sumang manung tanna Jisuga loinana changle. 

16 Touigumbasung Pitardi mapanda thong manakta leptuna leirammi maram aduna purohitlen-ga khangnaba atei sebok ama aduna thokkhiduna, thongsangbi aduda hairaga Pitarbu manungda pusille. 

17 Maram aduna thong-sangbi leisabi aduna Pitarda hai, nangsu mi asigi seboksinggi maraktagira? mah-akna hai, ei natte. 

18 Amasung ingbagi maramna minaisingga phamnaibasing-gana meital thagatlaga, leptuna mei tik-lammi. Aduga Pitarsu makhoiga loinana leptuna mei tiklammi. 

19 Maram aduna Purohitlen aduna Jisubu Ibungogi seboksinggi amasung tambibagi maram hangle. 

20 Jisuna mangonda khumle, eina taibangpanbada phongna ngangle; matam leiba khibikta Jihudising pumnamakna tinnaba mapham, loisangdasu, Iswar ningnasan-gdasu eina tambire; aduga eina karisu lonna ngangde. 

21 Nahakna eingonda karigi hanglibano? Eina makhoida kari kari haikhibage haiba adu takhiba makhoi aduda hang-u; yeng-u, eina kari kari haikhiba adu makhoi asina khang-i. 

22 Amasung Ibungona asi haibada, manakta leplamliba phamnaibasing amana Jisubu khubakna thaduna hai, nangna purohitlenda asumna khumlibra? 

23 Jisuna mangonda khumle, eina phattaba ngangkhrabadi, phattaba adugi maramda sakshi piyu, adubu aphaba oirabadi, nangna eibu karigi phuribage? 

24 Maram aduna pulliba Ibungobu Hannana Kayapha purohit-lenda thare 

25 Amahiksung Simon Pitardi leptuna mei tiklammi. maram aduna makhoina mangonda hai nangsu mahakki sebok-singgi maraktagi amara? Mahakna yada-duna hai, ei natte. 

26 Purohitlen-gi minaising ama, Pitarna mana soidatkhiba adugi sagei thokpa aduna hai, eina ingk-holda nangbu mahakka loinaramaba ukhiba nattra? 

27 Maram aduna Pitarna amuk yadre, aduga khudak aduda yellaba khongle. 

Romgi leibak ngakpa mapu Pilatki mangda Jisubu pukhatpa 

28 Maram aduna makhoina Jisubu Kayaphadagi Pritoriyon-gi manungda chingsille. Aduga madu ayuk anganba oirammi. Amasung makhoina aran-chak-khangba chabada mangdananaba, Pritoriyon-gi manungda makhoi masana changde. 

29 Maram aduna Pilatna makhoi tanna lengthokkhiduna hai, mi asigi math-akta nakhoina kari theijinba leiduna ,puraklibage? 

30 Makhoina mangonda khumlak-i, masina phattaba touba mi oiramdrabadi, eikhoida mabu nangonda pikhatlamloidabani. 

31 Maram aduna Pilatna makhoida hai, nakhoimakna mabu pujakhiduna, nakhoigi wayel yathang matung inna mabu wayenjaru. Jihudising-na mangonda hai, kanagumba mibu hatnanaba eikhoida matik pide; 

32 Haibasi, Jisuna karamba masina sigadaba khanghanduna haikhiba wa adu thungnanabani. 

33 Maram aduna Pilatna amuk Pritoriyon-gi manungda changkhiduna Jisubu kouraga hai, nangdi Jihudisinggi ningthoura? 

34 Jisuna khumle, asi nahak nathantadagi haibra, nattraga ateisingna eigi maramda nangonda takpi-bra? 

35 Pilatna khumle, ei jihudirane? nahakki jatka athoiba purohitsinggana nangbu eingonda pithokle. Nangna kari toukhrabage? 

36 Jisuna khumle, eigi leipak taibang-panba asigi natte; eigi leibak taibangpanba asigi oiramlabadi, eibu jihudisingda pithoktananaba eigi inaisingna lan soknaramgadabani; adubu houjikti eigi leibak mapham asigi natte. 

37 Maram aduna Pilatna Ibungoda hai, adunadi nang ningthoura? Jisuna khumle, ningthouni haiba nahakna haibaduni. Asigi damak ei poklabani, amasung eina achumbada sakshi pinanaba, asigi damak eina taibang-panbada lakpani. Achumbagi oiba mi khudingna eigi khonjel tai. 

38 Pilatna Ibungoda hai, achumba karino amasung asi hairaga, amuk jihudising tanna leng-thokkhiduna makhoida hai, eina man-goncia maral kari amata phangde. 

39 Tou-i-gumbasung aran chakkhang-bada eina nakhoigi damak mi adubu tha-dokpinaba nakhoigi hounabi lei; maram aduna jihudisinggi ningthou asibu eina nakhoigi damak thadokpiba nakhoina pambra? 

40 Maram aduna makhoi pumnamakna amuk laorak-i, asibu natte, Barabbabuni. Adubu Barabbadi daku oirammi.

Johan 19 

Pilatna Jihudisinggi maning thunghanba 

1 Maram aduna Pilatna matam aduda Jisubu louraduna thina jeihal-le. 

2 Aduga lanmisingna tingkhanggi luhup ama londuna, Ibungogi kokta uppi-raga, memanba phi inbire; 

3 Amasung makhoina Ibungoda laktuna hairammi, he jihudigi ningthou, khurumjari! aduga makhoina Ibungobu khubakna thai. 

4 Maduda Pilatna amuk mapanda lengthokkhiduna makhoida hai, yeng-u, eina mangonda maral kari amata phangde haiba nakhoina khangnanaba eina mahak nakhoida puthokli. 

5 Maram aduna Jisuna tingkhang luhup amasung meman-ba phi induna mapanda lengthoklakle. Aduga Pilatna makhoida hai, yeng-u, mi adu! 

6 Maram aduna athoiba purohitsing amasung phamnaiba singna Ibungobu urabada laorak-i, krosta hatlu, krosta hatlu! Pilatna makhoida hai, nakhoimakna mahakpu puduna krosta hatcharu, maramdi einadi mangonda maral phangde. 

7 Jihudisingna mangonda khumle, eikhoigi wayel yathang lei, aduga wayel yathang adugi matung inna mana sipham thok-i, maramdi masa mathan-tabu Iswargi macha nipa oihan-jare. 

8 Maram aduna Pilatna wa asi tara-bada henna kire; 

9 Aduga mahakna Pritoriyon-gi manungda amuk changkhi-aduna Jisuda hai, nang kadaidagino? Adubu Jisuna mangonda khumbidre. 

10 Maram aduna Pilatna Ibungoda hai eingnonda nang wa ngangloidra? nangbu thadoknaba matik ama-sung krosta hatnaba matik eigi liei haiba nang khangdra? 

11 Jisuna mangonda khumle, nangonda mathaklomdagi pibiramdrabadi, ithakta nanggi matik kari amata leiramloidabani. Maram asigi damak eibu nangonda pithokpa mahak adugi pap henna chao-i. 

12 Adudagi Pilatna Ibungobu thadok-nanaba thirammi, touigumbasung Jihudisingna laorak-i, nahakna mi asibu thadoldabadi, nahakti Keisargi marup natte. Masa mathantabu ningthou oihanjaba mi khudingna Keisargi mathakta wa ngangbani. 

13 Maram aduna Pilatna wasing asi tarabada, mahakna Jisubu mapanda puthoktuna nung chanba kouba (Ibriya londa Gabbatha) maphamda wayen-phambei thakta phamthare. 

14 Aduga madu aran-chakkhangbagi thourang langba numit amasung chaorakna taruk-suba pung taba matam oirammi. Amasung mahakna Jihudisingda hai, yeng-u, nak-hoigi ningthou. 

15 Maram aduna mak-hoina laorak-i, puthokkhro, puthokkhro, mabu krosta hatlu! Pilatna makhoida hai, nakhoigi ningthoubu eina krosta hatkadra? Athoiba purohitsingna khumle, Keisar nattana eikhoigi ningthou leite. 

16 Maram aduna mahakna matam aduda Ibungobu krosta hatnanaba mak-hoida pithokkhre. 

Jisubu Krosta Hatpa 

17 Maram aduna makhoina Jisubu puthokle aduga Ibungona mathantagi damak kros pujaduna, Ibriya londa Golgotha, haibadi lukanggi mapham kouba, mapham adu tanna leng-thoklakle. 

18 Mapham aduda makhoina Ibungobu, amasung Ibungoga loinana atei mi anibu yet-oida aduga Jisubudi mayaida, krosta yotpi thaduna pang-tingle. 

19 Amasung Pilatna mingthol laririk ama iraduna, ksos mathakta haple; ikhraba adudi, Nasretki Jisu, Jihudisinggi ningthou, haiba asini. 

20 Maram aduna mingthol adu Jihudising ayambana pare, maramdi Jisubu krosta yotipi thaduna pangting-lamba mapham adu sahargi manakta oirammi; aduga madu Ibriya, Romiya amasung Grik londa irammi. 

21 Maram aduna Jihudisinggi athoiba purohitsingna Pilatta hai, Jihudisinggi ningthou ibiga nu; touigumbasung, ei jihudisinggi ning-thouni haina mahakna haikhi, haiduna ibiyu. 

22 Pilatna khumle, eina ikhraba adu ikhre. 

23 Maram aduna lanmisingna Jisubu krosta yotpi thaduna pangthingba matamda, Ibungogi phi louduna, lanmi amamamna saruk amamam phangnanaba, saruk mari thokhalle; phurit adusu loure. amasung phurit adudi langdai leitaba mathaktagina pumsa saba oirammi. 

24 Maram aduna makhoina amaga amaga hainei, eikhoina masi segai-ganusi, adubu masi kanagi oigadage leibak yengnasi. Makhoina makhoigi marakta eigi phirol yennare, aduga eigi phuritki damak makhoina laibak yengnare, haiba sastra adu thungnanabani. 

25 Maram aduna lamnisingna thabak-sing asi toure. touigumbasung Jisugi kros manakta Ibungogi mama, mamaga pokminnabi, Klopagi nupi Mariyam, amasung Magdalini Mariyam leptuna leirammi. 

26 Maram aduna Jisuna mama amasung manakta lepliba Ibungona nung-siba sebok uraduna, mamada hai, he nupi, yeng-u, nachanipa! 

27 Maduda Ibun-gona sebok aduda hai, yeng-u, nangi nama! aduga pung adudagi sebok aduna mahakpu mayumda pubikhre. 

28 Asigi matungda Jisuna thabak pum-namak houjikti loire haiba khangduna, sastra adu thungnanaba hai, ei khourangi. 

29 Aduga asinba mahina thanba phu ama leirammi; maram aduna makhoina asinba mahina thallaba Spanj ama Hisop macheida lengsinduna Ibungogi chinban tanna thin-gatpire. 

30 Miran aduna Jisuna asinba mahi adu louraga hai, loire; aduga Ibungogi kok lekthaduna mathawai thakhre. 

Tana thinba amasung phumba 

31 Maram aduna thourang langba numit oibagi maramna, hakchangsing adu kros mathakta potthaba numitta leitan-anaba (Maramdi potthaba numit adu at-hoiba numit oirammi), makhoigi khong thudeklaga; makhoibu puhankhinanaba Jihudisingna Pilatki maphamda nijare. 

32 Maram aduna lanmisingia laktuna Ibungoga loinana krosta yotpi thaduna pangtingba ahanba aduga atei adudagi makhong thudekle; 

33 Tou-gumbasung makhoina Jisu tanna laktuna, Ibungo sirabani haiba urabada Ibungogi khong thudekte. 

34 Adubu lanmisinggi maraktagi amana Ibungogi pungnopta ta amana thille, aduga khudak adumaktada madudagi iga isingga thoklakle. 

35 Amasung nakhoinasu thajananaba, mamitna ukhiba mahak aduna sakshi pire, aduga mahakki sakshi adu achumbani, amasung mahakna achumba hairibani haiba mahakna khang-i. 

36 Maramdi, Ibungogi maru amata thudekloi, haiba sastra adu thungnanaba arising asum thoklare. 

37 Aduga amuk sastragi mapham atei amada hai, makhoina tana thillaba Ibungobu yenglagani. 

38 Amahiksung asigi matungda judisingbu kibagi maramna lonna Jisugi sebok oiba Arimathiyagi Jouseph na Jisu-gi hakchang puthokchananaba Pilatki maphamda nijare; amasung Pilatna mang-onda yabire. Maram aduna mahakna laktuna Ibungogi hakchang puthokkhre. 

39 Amasung ahingda Ibungoda ahanbada lakpa Nikodimnasu Gondharaska Aguruga yannaba pot ser yangkheirom puraktuna lakle. 

40 Asum touna makhoina Jisugi hakchang adu lou-duna, phumnanaba jihudisinggi hounabi matung inna manam nungsiba potka loinana ananba limon phina madu pulle. 

41 Aduga- Ibungobu krosta hatpa mapham aduda ingkhol ama leirammi, amasung ingkhol adugi manungda mi kana amatabu khak thamdriba anouba mongpham ama leirammi. 

42 Maram aduna Jihudisinggi thourang langba numit oibagi maramna, makhoina Jisubu maduda thamle, maramdi mongpham adu nakna leirammi.

Johan 20 

Ahangba mongpham 

1 Amahiksung chayon-gi ahanba numitta ayuk nganna mamlingeida Magdalini Mariyamna mongpham tanna lakpada mongphamdagi nung adu lou-thokkhiramba ui. 

2 Maram aduna mah-akna chenkhiduna Simon Pitarda amasung Jisuna nungsiba atoppa sebok ama aduda laktuna makhoida hai, makhoina Prabhubu mongphamdagi puthokkhre, aduga makhoina Ibungobu kadaida thamkhi-bano eikhoina khangde. 

3 Maramaduna Pitar amasung atoppa sebok ama aduna thokkhiduna mong-phamlomda chatlammi. 

4 Makhoi anina chenminnarammi, aduga atoppa sebok ama aduna Pitarbu hen-gatkhi-duna, mongphamda hanna thungle. 

5 Amasung nonthaduna yengsinbada mahakna ananba limon phi adu thanamba ui; adubu mahakna manung changde; 

6 Maduda Simon Pitarnasu mahakki tung induna laklaga mongpham manungda changle; amasung ananba limon phi adi thanamba, 

7 Aduga Ibun-gogi kokthakta leiramba khudei adu ana-nba limon phi aduga loinana thanamduna madu ngakta thuptuna mapham amana thanamba mahakna ui. 

8 Maram aduna mongphamda hanna thunglaba atoppa sebok ama adunasu matam aduda man-ungda changlaktuna, usu ure, thasu thajare. 

9 Maramdi Ibungona asibasinggi maraktagi hinggatpa tai haiba sastra adu makhoina matam aduda khangdri. 

10 Aduda seboksing aduna amuk hanna mayum mayumda chatkhre. 

Jisuna masabu Mariyamda uhanba 

11 Touigumbasung Mariyamna kap-tuna mongphamgi mapanda leptuna leirammi. Asum touna mahakna kapna kapna nontharaga mongpham manungda yeng-sille; 

12 Aduga Jisugi hakchang thamlamba mapham aduda angouba phi setpa swargadut ani, amana lukhumda, amana khuyada phamliba mahakna ui. 

13 Amasung makhoina mangonda hai, he nupi, karigi kapliba ge? Mahakna makhoida hai, maramdi makhoina eigi Prabhubu puth-okkhre, aduga makhoina Ibungobu kada-ida thamkhiba ei khangde. 

14 Mahakna asi hairaga, tung onthokkhibada Jisu lep-lamba ui, aduga madu Jisuni haiba mahakna khangde. 

15 Jisuna mangonda hai, he nupi karigi kaplibage? kanabu thiri-bano? Mahakna Ibungobu ingkhol ngakpa mini ningladuna, mangonda hai, Ibungo, nahakna Ibungo bu puthoklabadi, kadaida thamkhibano, eingonda takpiyu, aduga eina Ibungo bu louthokchage. 

16 Jisuna mangonda hai, Mariyam. Mahakna ollaktuna, Ibungoda Ibriya lonna hai, Rabboni (Madudi guru haibani). 

17 Jisuna mangonda hai, ein-gonda paiba thadok-u, maramdi eina Ipagi maphamda kakhattri, adubu ichin initosingda chattuna makhoida hairu, eina eigi Ipasu nakhoigi napasu, eigi Iswarsu nakhoigi Iswarsu oiba, adugi maphamda kakhat-kadouri. 

18 Magdalini Mariyamna lak-tuna seboksingda takle, eina Prabhubu ujare, aduga Ibungona eingoncia wa asi haibire, 

Jisuna masabu pakhonchatpasingda uhanba 

19 Maram aduna chayon-gi ahanba numit adugi numidang oirabada, aduga jihudisingbu kibagi maramna seboksingna leiba mapham adugi thong pumnamak lonkhrabada jisuna leng-sillaktuna makhoigi mayaida leple, amasung makhoida hai, Nakhoida ingthaba oisanu. 

20 Maduda Ibungona asi hairaga, Ibungogi khut anisu puknopsu makhoida uhalle. Maram aduna seboksingna prabhubu ujarabada haraojare. 

21 Maram aduna Jisuna makhoida amuk hai, nakhoida ingthaba oisanu. Ipana eibu tharakpa adugumna, einasu nakhoibu thari. 

22 Amasung Ibungona asi haira-bada, makhoida Ibungona swar kamsinduna hai, thawai asengba nakhoina phang-jou. 

23 Kana kanagumbagi pap nakhoina kokpirabadi, makhoida pap adu kokpira-bani; kana kanagumbagi pap nakhoina thamlabadi, pap adu thamlabani. 

Jisuna masabu Thornada uhanba 

24 Touigumbasung Diduma kouba Thoma, taranithoigi maraktagi ama adu, Jisuna lengsillakpada makhoiga aramde. 

25 Maram aduna atei sebok-singna mangonda hairammi, eikhoina Prabhubu ure. Adubu mahakna makhoida hai, eina Ibungogi khut anida yotpigi makhul udrabadi, eigi khudonbina yotpigi makhul aduda thingjindrabadi, amasung eina eigi khut Ibungogi puknopta hapchindrabadi, ei khak thajaroi. 

26 Amahiksung numit nipannigi matungda amuk Ibungogi seboksing imungda leirammi Thomasu makhoigi loinarammi. Thong puninamak lonkhrabada Jisuna lengsillaktuna mayaida leplaga hai, nakhoida ingthaba oisanu. 

27 Maduda Ibun-gona Thomada hai, nanggi khudonbi asi tanna lamthoklak-u, aduga khut ani yeng-u; amasung nakhut lamtholdaktuna eigi puknopta hapchillu; aduga thajadrabasu, thajou. 

28 Thomana Ibungoda khumjarak-i, he eigi Prabhu, he eigi lswar. 

29 Jisuna mangonda hai, nahakna eibu uraba maramna thajare; udrabasu thajaraba makhoi adu yaiphabani. 

Aphaba wapao, asi lengbagi maram 

30 Maram aduna Lairik asida isindaba atei ayamba khudamsu seboksinggi mam-angda Jigma toure; 

31 Touigumbasung Jisudi Iswargi machanipa Khristani haiba nakhoina thajananaba, amasung thajaduna nakhoina Ibungogi mingda hingba phang, nanaba, khudamsing asi isinkhrabani.

Johan 21 

Jisuna masabu Tibiriyagi patki manakta uhanba 

1 Asigi matungda Jisuna masa mathantabu seboksingda Tibiriyagi samadru mapanda amuk uhalle; amasung Ibungona matou asumna uhalle. 

2 Simon Pitar, Diduma kouba Thoma, Galilgi Kanadagi Nathaniyel, Sebedigi macha-nipasing amasung Ibun-gogi sebok atei ani, makhoi asi tinna-rammi. 

3 Simon Pitarna makhoida hai, ei nga thiba chatke. makhoina mangonda hai, eikhoisu nahakka loinana lakchege. Makhoina chatkhiduna hida tongle; aduga ahing aduda makhoina kari amata phadre. 

4 Tougumbasung nongngallakpada, Jisuna samadru mapanda leplammi; adubu madu Jisuni haiba makhoina khangde. 

5 Maram aduna Jisuna makh-oida ham, angangsa nakhoigi chanaba kari-gumba leibra? Makhoina Ibungoda khumle leijade. 

6 Maduda Ibungona makhoida hai, il adu higi yetthangba nakanda hunjillu, aduga nakhoina phanggani. Maram aduna makhoina hunjille, aduga nga yammanbagi maramna makhoina chingkhatpa ngamdre. 

7 Maram aduna Jisuna nungsiba sebok aduna Pitarda hai, masi Prabhuni. Maram aduna Simon Pitarna Prabhuni haiba tara-bada, masada phurit yetsillaga (Maramdi mahak phi setlamde), isingda chongthare. 

8 Tougumbasung atei seboksing aduna ngana thanba il adu chingduna hi machada tongduna lakle, maramdi makhoi kangphandagi kaya thaplamde, khudup chaniromtani. 

9 Asum touna makhoina kangphanda kakhatlabada, maduda meitan-gi mei, amasung mei adugi mathakta nga thamba, aduga tandum ure. 

10 Jisuna makhoida hai, nakhoina houjik phakhiba nga adudagi khara purak-u. 

11 Maram aduna Simon Pitarna hida tongkhatkhiduna nga achouba chamaga yangkhei humdoina thallaba il adu kangphanda chingkhatle; aduga nga asup yamlabasu il adu segaide. 

12 Jisun makhoida hai, lak-o, chararo. Masi Prabhuni haiba khangduna, seboksing kana amatana nahak kanano haiba Ibungoda ichang thouna hangde. 

13 Jisuna lenglaktuna, tandum adu louraga makhoida pi, adugumduna nga adusu pi. 

14 Jisuna asibasinggi maraktagi hinggatpagi matungda sebok-shingda uhanba houjik asina ahumlak subani. 

Pitarda Jisugi akonba wa haiba 

15 Matou asumna makhoina chaba loirabada, Jisuna Simon Pitarda hai, Johan-gi macha nipa Simon, nahakna makhoi asidagi henna eibu nungsibra? mahakna Ibungoda hai, hoi, Prabhu, eina Ibungobu nungsi haiba Ibungona khangbi. Ibungona mangonda hai, eigi yaomachasingbu thakpiyu. 

16 Ibungona mangonda anirak suna amuk hanna hai, Johan-gi macha nipa Simon, nahakna eibu nungsibra? mahakna Ibungoda hai, Hoi, Prabhu, eina Ibungobu nungsi haiba Ibungona khangbi. Ibungona mangonda hai, eigi yaosingbu senbiyu. 

17 Ibungona mangonda ahumlak suna hai, Johan-gi macha nipa Simon, nahakna eibu nung-sibra? nahakna eibu nungsibra haina Ibun-gona mangonda ahumlak suna haibagi maramna Pitar mathawai ware. Aduga mahakna Ibungoda hai, Prabhu Ibungona pumnamak khangbi; eina Ibungobu nungsi haiba Ibungona khangbiribani. Jisuna mangonda hai, eigi yaosingbu thakpiyu. 

18 Eina nangonda thanggeisengnamak hairibani, nahakna naha oirin-geida, nahak nasa nathanta khwangjet laktuna, nahakna chatning chatningba mapham aduda koichat chatlammi; adubu nahakna ahal oiraga, nahakna nakhut ting-thokkani, aduga atoppa mi amana nah-akpu khwangjet lakpiduna, nahakna chat-ningdaba mapham aduda nahakpu pugani. 

19 Mahakna karamba masina Iswarbu matik mangal chaohan-gadaba adu khanghannaba, asi Ibungona haire aduga Ibungona asi hairaga, mangonda hai, itung illu. 

20 Pitarna onthoklak-pada, Jisuna nungsiba sebok aduna tung illakapa ui; mahak asi numidang luk habada Ibungogi thabakta ngaduna, Prabhu, Ibungobu pithokpa adu kanano haiba aduni. 

21 Maram aduna Pitarna mahakpu uraduna Jisuda hai, Prabhu, mi asigidi kari oigadage? 

22 Jisuna mangonda hai eina laktriba phaoba mahakna ngaiba asi eina ningba oirabadi, maduna nangonda kari toubage? Nahakti itung illu. 

23 Maram aduna sebok adu siroi haiba wa asi machin manaosinggi marakta sinakre; adubu mahak siroi haiba Jisuna mangonda haiba natte, touigumbasung, eina laktriba phaoba mahakna ngaiba asi eina ningba oirabadi, maduna nangonda kari toubage haibani. 

Aroiba wa 

24 Warmsing asigi maramda sakshi piba amasung waramsing asi iramba sebok adu asini; aduga mahakki sakshi asi achumbani haiba eikhoina khang-i. 

25 Amasung Jisuna toukhiba ayamba thabak ateisu leiri; madubu amamam oina irabadi, ikhiba lairik pumnamak adu teng-banbamaktasu challoi haina eina ningjei.

PAKHONCHATPASINGGI THABAK 

A-iba: Daktar Luk 

Ibagi matam: A.D. 60-61 aduwai. 

Wamachang: Thawai asengbana thabak toubaga loinana Pakhonchatpasingbu sijinnaduna aphaba wapao sandokpa. 

Gospel iba Lukna Pakhonchatpasinggi thabak(Acts) asi ibani. Khristan singgi maram amasung singlup houdokpagi matangda mahaktana Bible gi manungda palli. Aduna masi yamna maru oibani. Jisu Khristana swarga kabadagi Missionary Polna Rom saharda awaba napgbagi chahi 30 Rom adugi maram Daktar Lukna mayek sengna utli. Singlup chaokhatnabagi maram amadi thawai asengbana thabak toubagi maram tenna yamna ningthina khanghalli. Maru oina Iswar masak khangdriba amambada leiriba mioisinggi marakta thabak toubagi matangda mayek sengna khanghalli. 

 Pakhonchatpasinggi Thabak 1 

1 He Thiophil, eina lengthokchakbiba ahanba waridi, Jisuna khan-gatkhiba pakhonchatpa singda thawai asengbagi mapanna yathang pibikhiba matungda, 

2 Ibungobu loukhatkhiba numit aduphaobada ibungona toubasu tambibasu houkhiba pumnamak adugi maridani. 

3 Numit niphunigi manungda pakhonchatpasingda uhanbiduna amasung iswargi leibakki maramda tambiduna, ibungona awa anang khangba matungda tasengba khudam kayana ibungo masamak hingli haiba makhoida utpire. 

4 Amasung ibungona makhoiga loinana tinnaringeida makhoida yathang pire, nakhoi Jerusalemdagi chatthokkanu adubu ipana pigani waleppa, na-khoina eingondagi takhiba adu ngairammu; 

5 Maramdi Johannadi isingda baptais toubire, adubu nakhoibudi numit khara leiraga thawai asengbada baptais toubigani. 

Jisuna swarga kaba 

6 Maram aduna makhoina punna tin-naringeida, ibungoda hangjarak-i, Prabhu, matam asida Israyelda ningthouleibak adu ibungona hanjinbigadra? 

7 Maduda ibungona makhoida hai, ipana ibungo mahakmakki matikta thamkhiba matam nattraga makum matha adu khangba nakhoigi natte. 

8 Touigumbasung thawai asengbana nakhoigi thakta lengthabiraklabada, nakhoina panggal phangjagani; aduga nakhoina Jerusalemda Jihudiya amasung Samariya pumnamakta, aduga prithibigi aroiba maphamda eigi sakshi oigani. 

9 Amasung ibungona waramsing asi hairaga, makhoina asum yenglingeida, ibungobu makhoigi mityengdagi loukhatkhre. 

10 Amasung Ibungona asum lengkhatliba adu makhoina atiyada sangtrik sangna yenglingeida, yengu, phi angouba setpa mi ani makhoigi manakta leplammi; 

11 Aduga makhoina hai, nak-hoi Galilgi misa, nakhoina karigi atiyada yengduna leplibage? nakhoidagi swargada loukhatkhiba Jisu asi swargada lengkhatliba nakhoina ubagumna, ibungona asigumna lengbirakkani. 

Pakhonchatpa taranithoi sunaba ama khanba 

12 Matung aduda makhoina Jerusalem-ga naknaba, potthaba numit amagi lambi thapnaba, Jeitun kouba ching adudagi Jerusalem tanna hallakle. 

13 Aduga maduda changlaga makhoina, haibadi, Pitar, Johan, Jakob amasung Andriya, Philip amasung Thoma, Barthawlomoi amasung Matthi, Alphiyagi macha nipa Jakob, Selot kouba Simon aduga Jakobki macha nipa Jihuda, makhoi asina leiramba mathak thangba ka aduda kakhatle. 

14 Pumnamak asina nupisingga, Jisugi mama Mariyamga, Ibungogi manaosingga loinana pukning amata oina haijabada itattattana pukning changlammi. 

15 Amahiksung numitsing asigi manungda Pitarna machin manaosinggi mayaida lepkhattuna hai (tinnaba miyam adu mi chama kun marum oirammi), 

16 He ichin inaosa, Jisubu phaba makhoigi lamjingba Jihuda adugi maramda Dayudki machindagi thawai asengbana mamangngeida haikhiba sastragi wa adu thunggadaba oirammi. 

17 Maramdi mahakti eikhoigi irakta masing challammi, aduga thougan touba asigi saruk mahakna phangle. 

18 (Nipa mina mahakki aranbagi manana lou ama phangle; aduga mahakna upna taduna mapuk pokkhaiduna makhoimaril pumnamak chongthokle. 

19 Amasung Jerusalemda leiba pumnamakna khanglakle; asigi maramna lou adu makhoigi maronda HAKALDAMA, haibadi i-gi lou koure) 

20 Mramdi Dayudki isei lairikta ikhibasini, 

Mahakki leipham mang taksnu, aduga maduda kana amata leitasnu; amasung mahakki pham mi atoppa amana lousnu. 

21 Maram aduna Johanna baptais touba adudagi houna ibungobu eikhoidagi lou khatkhiba numit adu phaoba, 

22 Eikhoigi irakta Prabhu Jisuna handok hanjin chatminnaramba matam pumnamak aduda eikhoiga loinana chatminnaramba nipasing adugi maraktagi amana eikhoiga loinana ibungona hinggatpagi sakshi oirakpa tai. 

23 Amasung makhoina mi anibu, haibadi, Barsabba kouba, mingthol Justhsu happa Jouseph amasung Mathiyabu puthokle. 

24 Amasung makhoina haijarak-i, mi pumnamakki pukningbu khangbiriba, he Prabhu, Jihudana mahakmakki maphamda chatnanaba, thougan amasung pakhonehatpagi thabak asi thadokkhi. 

25 Mahakki mapham adu lounanaba, mi ani asidagi amabu ibungona khanggapta adubu utpiyu. 

26 Amasung makhoina makhoigi maramda laibak yengnaraga, madu Mathiyada tare; aduga mahakpu pakhonchatpa taramathoiga masing chanminnare.

Pakhonchatpasinggi thabak 2 

Thawai asengba lengthabirakpa 

1 Amahiksung Pentekostki numit thunglabada, makhoi pumnamak mapham amada tinnarammi. 

2 Amasung khanghoudana akanba nungsit lakpagumna makhol ama swargadagi lakladuna, makhoina phamliba yum adu pumthal thalle. 

3 Aduga meigumba leitol makhoigi marakta tongan khaibiduna makhoida uhalle amasung makhoi mi khudingda tongle. 

4 Maduda makhoi pumnamak thawai asengbana thalladuna, thawai aduna makhoibu nganghanbiba adugi matung inna atop atoppa lonna ngangba houre. 

5 Amahiksung atiyagi makhada leiba jat khudingmaktagi laining chetpa Jihudi nipasing Jerusalemda leirammi. 

6 Aduga makhol asi tabada, miyamna upsillaktuna tingak maingaknahalle, maramdi makhoina ngangliba adu mahak mahakki marol oina mi khudingna tarammi. 

7 Amasung makhoi pumnamakna ngaklammi, amasung onthokpani haiduna ngangnarak-i; yengu ngangliba pumnamak asi Galilgi mi nattra? 

8 Aduga eikhoi eikhoigi pokphamgi irol oina eikhoi mi khudingna karamna taribano? 

9 Parthiya, Midiya, Jihudiya amasung Kappadokiyada, Pontaga Esiyagada, 

10 Phrogiyaga Pamphuliyagada, Misor amasung Kurinigi akoibada leiba Libiyada leibasing, Romdagi lamlallakpasing, Jihudi amasung Jihudi dharma loubasing, 

11 Kritsing amasung Arbising, eikhoi asina makhoina iswargi achouba thabaksing ngangliba adu eikhoi eikhoigi irol oina tari. 

12 Aduga makhoi ptunnamakna ngakladuna amasung langtaknaraduna amaga amaga hainarak-i, asi kari matouno? 

13 Touigumbasung ateisingna karemnaduna hai, makhoi anouba draksha mahi thanna thakchille. 

Pentekost numitta Pitarna tambiba; khristan kanglupki dharmachenba mipal 

14 Touigumbasung Pitarna Taramathoi aduga loinana leptuna, khonjel wangna makhoida hai, he Jihudigi misa, amasung he Jerusalemda leiba pumnamaksa, asi nakhoina khangbiyu, aduga eigi wada nakong thambiyu. 

15 Maramdi nakhoina ningbagumna makhoi asi yu ngaoba natte; maramdi nungthingi ahumsuba pungta matari; 

16 Touigumbasung asi iswargi wa takthokpa Joyelna haikhiba aduni: 

17 Amasung iswarna hai, akonba numitsing aduda masi oigani, eina mi oiba pumnamakki mathakta eigi thawai heithabigani, aduga nakhoigi nacha nipasingga nacha nupisinggana eigi wa takthokkani, amasung nakhoigi pakhangsingna auba phanggani, aduga nakhoigi hanubasingna mang manggani; 

18 Hoi, aduga eigi minai nipasing amasung eigi minai nupisinggi thakta eigi thawai numitsing aduda eina heithabigani, amasung nakhoina eigi wa takthokkani. 

19 Aduga eina mathak atiyada angak angakpa amasung makha prithibida khudamsing, haibadi i, mei aduga meikhugi manil uhangani. 

20 Prabhugi athoiba amasung onthokpa numit adu laktringeida, numitna amambada amasung tha-na ida onthokkani. 

21 Aduga masi oigani, prabhugi ming koujaba mi khudingbu kanbigani. 

22 He Israyelgi misa, wasing asi tabiyu-Nasretki Jisudi, iswarna nakhoi-gi narakta ibungogi mapanna toungamdaba amasung angakpa thabaksing aduga udamsing toukhiba, aduna ibungo asi iswarna yaraba mini haiba nakhoi nasamaknasu khangbani; 

23 Ibungo asibu iswargi areppa wakhal amasung hanna khangba adugi mapanna pithoklaga, nakhoina wayel yathang indaba misinggi makhutna krosta yotpi thaduna pangtingduna hatkhre. 

24 Ibungobu iswarna asibagi awa ana adudagi thadokpiduna hinggatpire, maramdi ibungobu asiba aduna khudum chanba ngamde. 

25 Maramdi Dayudna ibungogi marida hai, 

Eina prabhubu imangda itattattana urammi, maramdi ei lengdananaba ibungodi eigi yetthangbada leiri; 

26 Maram asina eigi thamoina nungaisu nungaijare, eigi ireina haraosu harkojare; asidagi hernia eigi hakchangnasu asada pan-gani. 

27 Maramdi ibungo nahakna ithawaibu khamnung leibakta hundok-piroi, adubu ibungo nahakki asengba mahak adubu ibungo nahakna amangba uhanbiroi. 

28 Ibungo nahakna eingonda hingbagi lambi khanghanbire; Ibungo nahakki mangda eibu haraobana thalhanbigani. 

29 He ichin inaosa, sageigi, piba Dayudki maramda, mahak sisu sikhre, phumsu phumkhre, aduga mahakki mongpham numit asi phaoba eikhoigi irakta leiri haiba eina nakhoida taseng tasengna haiba ngamjei. 

30 Maram aduna mahakna iswargi wa takthokpa oiduna, mahakki dharasingdagi amana mahakki phambal thakta phamgadabani haiduna iswarna mangonda wasak ama sakpire haiba mahakna khangle. 

31 Mahakna asi hanna uduna Khristana hinggatpa adugi maramda ngangthokle, haibadi ibungobu khamnung leibakta hundokpidre, aduga ibungogi hakchangna amangba ukhidre. 

32 Jisu asibu iswarna hinggatpire, asigi maramda eikhoi pumnamakna sakshi oijari. 

33 Maram aduna iswargi khut yetna chaokhathanbiba amasung thawai asengbabu pibigani waleppa adu mapadagi phangjaduna, nakhoina uriba amasung tariba asi ibungona heithabibani. 

34 Maramdi Dayudti swargada kaba natte; adubu mahak masana hai, 

35 Prabhuna eigi prabhuda hai, eina nanggi yeknabasingbu nakhonggi khunet oihandriba phaoba eigi yetta phammu. 

36 Maram aduna nakhoina krosta hatkhiba Jisu asibu iswarna Prabhusu Khristasu oihanbire haiba Israyel imung pumnamakna thangei sengna khangsnu. 

37 Amahiksung makhoina tarabada, makhoigi thamoida tana thinbagum oira-duna, Pitarda amasung atei pakhonchatpasingda hairak-i, he ichin inaosa, eik-hoina kari tougadage? 

38 Maduda Pitarna makhoida hai, nakhoigi pap koknabagidamak nakhoina pukning hongu amasung Jisu Khristagi mingda nakhoi mikhudingna baptais lou; aduga nakhoina thawai asengbagi khudon phanggani. 

39 Maramdi nakhoida, nakhoigi nachasingda, amasung arappada leiba pumnamakta, haibadi eikhoigi iswar prabhuna koubigadaba makheida, waleppa adu lei. 

40 Amasung atei atei wa ayamba mahakna sakshisu pi, makhoibu insu insinbiduna hai, pukchel khoiraba miron asidagi nahei nahei kanjananaba tou. 

41 Maram aduna mahakki wa louraba makhoi adu bu baptais toubire, aduga numit aduda mi lising ahumlom makhoida tinsillammi. 

42 Amasung makhoina pakhonchatpasinggi tambibada, marup tinnabada, tal thugaibada, amasung haijabada itattattana pukning changiammi. 

43 Amahiksung mi khudinggi mathakta akiba thoklammi, aduga angakpasu khudamsu ayamba pakhonchatpasingna tourammi. 

44 Aduga thajaraba pumnamakna tinnaduna, pot pumnamak mayamgi oina sijinnei; 

45 Amasung makhoina makhoigi arei areiba yonthoktuna kanagumbagi kannaba matung inna pumnamakta yenbi. 

46 Aduga numit khuding iswar ningnasangda pukning amata oina itattattana tinnaduna, mayum mayumda tal thugaiduna makhoina haraona amasung pukning iting tingna chaminnarammi; 

47 Makhoina iswarbu thagat thagatladuna leirammi, mi pumnamaktagisu chanbiba phanglammi, aduga kanbiba phangjabasing adubu prabhuna numit khuding makhoida tinsinbirammi.

Pakhonchatpasinggi thabak 3 

Makhong tekpa chakniba amabu phahanbiba; Iswar ningnasang manungda Pitarna tambiba 

1 Amahiksung Pitarga Johan-gana haijabagi mapalsuba pung aduda iswar ningnasangda karaklammi. 

2 Amasung mama puknungdagi makhong teklaba kanagumba nipa amabu puraktuna, iswar ningnasangda changlakpasingdagi chanbiba nijananaba, ningthijaba kouba iswar ningnasanggi thongda numit khuding thamlammi. 

3 Mahakna Pitarga Johangabu iswar ningnasangda changlamdaida uduna, chanbiba phangnaba nijare. 

4 Maduda Pitarna Johan-ga loinana mangonda sangtrik yengduna hai, eikhoida yengu. 

5 Aduga makhoidagi karigumba phangjagani ningduna, mahakna makhoida pukning changna yengle. 

6 Touigumbasung Pitarna hai, eigi lupa amasung sana leijade, adubu eigi leijaba adu eina nangonda pi; Nasretki Jisu Khristagi mingda koichat chatlu. 

7 Aduga mahakna makhakna makhut yet paiduna chingkhatpire amasung khudak aduda mahakki khongga khumitka kankhatle. 

8 Maduda mahakna chongkhattuna lepsu leple, koichat chatpasu houre, aduga mahakna koichat chattuna, chongduna amasung iswarbu thagatchaduna makhoiga loinana iswar ningnasangda changle. 

9 Amasung mahakna koichat chattuna iswarbu thagatpa adu mi pumnamakna ure; 

10 Aduga iswar ningnasanggi ningthijaba thongda chanbiba phangnanaba phamlamba mahak asini haiba makhoina khangladuna, mangonda thokkhiba adu onthokpa amasung angakpana thalle. 

11 Amahiksung mahakna Pitarga Johan-gabu pairingeida, mi pumnamakna yamna ngakladuna Solomon-gi haina kouba manggon aduda makhoi tanna chensillakle. 

12 Aduga Pitarna madu urabada mising aduda khumle, he Israyelgi misa, nipa asida nakhoina karigi ngakhibage? Eikhoina mahakpu koichat chathanba asi eikhoimakki pangganna oirabasu, iswar chetna ningbana oirabasu, toukhibani haiduna nakhoina eikhoida karigi sangtrik yenglibano? 

13 Abraham, Ishak amasung Jakobki iswar, haibadi eikhoigi ipa ipusinggi iswar aduna manai Jisubu matik mangal chaohanbire; nakhoinadi ibungobu pithoktuna, Pilatna ibungobu thadoknanaba waroirabada, nakhoina mahakki mangda yakhide. 

14 Adubu nakhoinadi asingba amasung dharmachenba ibungo adubu yadaduna mi hatpa nipa amabu nakhoigidamak thadokpinaba nijare, 

15 Aduga hingbagi mapubu hatle; ibungodubu iswarna asibasinggi maraktagi hingatpire, asigi maramda eikhoina sakshini. 

16 Amasung ibungogi mingda thajabana nakhoina uriba amasung khangliba nipa asibu ibungogi ming aduna kalhanbire; hoi, ibungodagi oiba thajaba aduna nakhoi pumnamakki mangda mangonda pumpha phaba asi pibire. 

17 Amasung houjik, he ichin inaosa, nakhoigi mapusingna toukhibagumna, nakhoinasu khangdaduna madu toukhibani haiba eina khangi. 

18 Touigumbasung iswarna ibungo makki Khristana awa anang khangbagi maramna adu wa takthokpa pumnamakki machinna mamangngeida khanghankhiba adu ibungo mahakna asumna thunghanbire. 

19 Maram aduna nakhoigi pap khibik muthatpinanaba nakhoina pukning hongduna amuk ollak-u; asum toubada prabhugi mangdagi ingthabagi matam laknanabani; 

20 Aduga nakhoigidamak khandokpiraba khristabu, haibadi Jisubu, ibungo mahakna thabiraknanabani. 

21 Hiram pumnamak amuk hanjinnabagi matam thungdriba phaoba ibungobu swargada leihan-gada-bani; asigi maramda iswarna thainadagi ibungo mahakki wa takthokpa asengbasinggi machinna haihankhre. 

22 Mousina hai, prabhu iswarna nakhoigi nachin nanaosinggi maraktagi nakhoigidamak eigumba ibungo mahakki wa takthokpa ama thokhanbigani; mahakna nakhoida haigadaba wa pumnamak adu tao. 

23 Amasung masi oigani, haibadi, iswargi wa takthokpa adugi wa tadaba mi khudingbu mising asigi maraktagi tumna manggani. 

24 Hoi Samuyeldagina mathang mathang thoklakpa iswargi wa takthokpa pumnamakna, haikhiba adupki makheina, makhoinasu matam asigi maram tamthokle. 

25 Nakhoidi iswargi wa takthokpasing adugi amasung iswarna nakhoigi napa napusingga walepnakhiba adugi macha nipasingni. Walepnakhiba aduda iswarna hai, amasung nahakki dharada prithibigi imung pumnamakna yaiphaba phangjagani. 

26 Ahanbada iswarna nakhoida ibungo mahakki manaibu thokhan-biduna, nakhoi nakhoigi ayol arandagi mi khundingbu pukning onthokpibada nakhoi yaiphananaba ibungobu thabire.

Pakhonchatpasinggi thabak 4 

Pitarga johan-gabu ahallup mangda pukhatpa 

1 Amahiksung malthoina. misingda wa nganghngezcia, purohitsing, iswar ningnasanggi lanjingba amasung Saddukisingna makhoida laktuna yamna nungairamde, 

2 Maramdi makhoina misingbu tambiduna Jisu hinggatpagi khudamna asibasinggi maraktagi hinggatpa adu haidok-i. 

3 Maduda makhoina makhoibu khutphangnana phaduna, nonganba phaoba hajokta thamlammi, maramdi matam adu numidangni. 

4 Touigumbasung wa adu taraba ayambana thajare; aduga nipasing adugi masing lising mangarom sure. 

5 Amahiksung madugi nongnagallaga asum thoklare, makhoigi luchingbasing, ahallamansing amasung sastragi ojhasingna Jerusalemda tinnare, 

6 Aduga purohitlen Hanna, Kayapha, Johan, Aleksandar amasung purohitlen-gi mari mata thokpa makhei jaorammi. 

7 Maduda makhoina makhoibu mayaida lephallaga hanglak-i, kari pangganna nattraga kari mingda nakhoina asi tourabage? 

8 Matam aduda Pitarna thawai asengbane thalladuna makhoida hai, he mising asigi luchingbasing amasung ahallimansing, 

9 Eikhoibu numit asida, asonba mi amada aphaba thabak toukhibagi maramda, kari pambeina mi asibu phahanbano haina hanglabadi, 

10 Nakhoi pumnamakta amasung Israyelgi mi pumnamakta masi khanghanjari, nakhoina krosta hatkhiba, iswarna asibasinggi maraktagi hinggatpiraba Nasretki Jisu Khristagi mingda, haibadi ibungo asigi mapanna, mi asina pumpha phaduna nakhoigi namangda lepli. 

11 Nakhoi yum sabasingna channadaba, chithekki mapi oihanba nung adu ibungo asini. 

12 Amasung atei kanagidasu aran khubam leite; maramdi madugi mapanna eikhoibu kanbigadaba, misinggi marakta piraba, atei ming amata atiyagi makhada leite. 

13 Maduda makhoina Pitarga Johanga gi thouna adu urabada, aduga mahei heitaba amasung michamni haiba khanglabada, ingak ngaklammi; aduga makhoi Jisuga loinarammi haiba makhoina khanglakle. 

14 Amasung naba pharaba mi aduna makhoiga leiminnaba uraduna, makhoina madugi mathakta kari amata haiba leiramde. 

15 Touigumbasung makhoina makhoibu ahallup tinnabadagi mapan thoknaba yathang piraga, makhoi amaga amaga tanaduna hai, 

16 Mising asida eikhoina kari tousige? Maramdi makhoina phaoraba khudam toure haiba Jerusalemda leiba pumnamkta phong-i, aduga eikhoina madu yadaba ngamde. 

17 Touigumbasung masi misinggi marakta henna sinkhidananabagi, makhoina houjiktagi mi kanadasu ming asida haidananaba, eikhoina makhoibu kihansi. 

18 Maduda makhoina makhoibu kouraduna, Jisugi mingda khak ngangsu ngangdanaba, tamsu tambidanaba makhoibu yathang pire. 

19 Adubu Pitarga Johan-gana makhoida khumlak-i, Iswargidagi henna nakhoigi wa inbana iswargi mityengda chumbra, chumdabra, nakhoina wayel toubiyu. 

20 Maramdi eikhoina ukhiba amasung takhiba adu ngangdaba ngamde. 

21 Aduga misinggi maramna, makhoina makhoibu karamna dandi pigadage haiba kari amata phangdaduna, makhoibu henna kihanba wa hairaga thadokle; Maramdi mi pumnamkna thokkhiba adugidamak iswarbu thagatcharammi. 

22 Maramdi chahi niphu henba ahan amagi mathakta anaba phahanbagi khudam asi toukhibani. 

Pitarga Johan-Gana Marupsingda Hallakpa 

23 Amahiksung thadokpirabada makhoina makhoigi kanglupta laktuna, athoiba purohitsing amasung ahallamansingna makhoida haikhiba pumnamak adu tamle. 

24 Maduda makhoina madu tarabada pukning amata oina iswargi maphamda makhoina khonjel wangna haijei, He Mapu, Ibungo nahakti swarga, prithibi, samadru amasung maduda leiba pumnamak sembibani; 

25 Thawai asengbagi mapanna eikhoigi ipa nanai Dayudki machindagi ibungo nahakna haibikhi, jatsingna karigi ithak thaklibage, aduga misingna aremba wakhal karigi khallibage? 

26 Prabugi amasung ibungo mahakki Khristagi maiyokta prithibigi ningthousingna lepkhatle, aduga mapusingna tinnare. 

27 Maramdi ibungo nahakna thao heibikhraba asengba nanai Jisugi maiyokta atoppa jatsingga Israyelgi misingga loinana Herodnasu Pontiya Pilatnasu, 

28 Ibungo nahakki khutna amasung wakhanna tungda thoklagadaba, hanna langkhiba makhei adu tounanaba, aoibamak sahar asida punna tinnarare. 

29 Amasung houjikti, he prabhu, makhoina eikhoibu kihanba adu yengbiyu, aduga anaba phahannanaba amasung asengba nanai Jisugi minggi mapanna khudamsing amasung angak angakpa tounanaba, 

30 Ibungo nahakki khut tingthokpiringeida, yamna thouna phana ibungo nahakki wa ngangnanaba nanaisingda pinabiyu. 

31 Amasung makhoina haijarabada, makhoina tinnariba mapham adu nikle; aduga makhoi pumnamak thawai asengbana thalladuna, thouna phana iswargi wa nganglak-i. 

Marupki Sen 

32 Maduda thajabasing miyanma pukning amasung thawai amata oina leirammi, aduga makhoi kana amatanasu magi magi leijaba potki marakta kari amatasu marannaini hainaramde, adubu makhoina pot pumnamak mayamgi oina sijinei. 

33 Amasung prabhu Jisuna hinggatpagi maramda achouba pangganga loinana pakhonchatpasingna sakshi pirammi, aduga makhoi pumnamakna thoujal yamna phangjarammi. 

34 Maramdi makhoigi marakta awatpa kanasu leiramde, maramdi lam nattraga yum leiba makheina madu yonthoktuna, yonkhiba pot adugi mamal adu puraklaga, 

35 Pakhonchatpasinggi khuyada thamlei; aduga kanagumbagi kannaba matung inna mi khudingda madu yenbi. 

36 Amahiksung Kupragi mi, Lebiyagi sagei, pakhonchatpasingna Barnaba mingthol pibiba (mingthol asi handokpada thoujanbibagi macha nipa haibani), 

37 Josephki loupham ama leirammi; mahakna madu yonthoktuna, sel adu puraklaga pakhonchatpasinggi khuyada thamlei.

Pakhonchatpasinggi thabak 5 

Ananiya Amasung Saphira 

1 Touigumbasung Ananiya kouba kanagumba nipa amana mahakki nupi Saphiraga loinana lam ama yonthokle. Mahakki nupinasu khangna, 

2 Mahakna mamal adugi saruk ama khakhouraga, saruk ama puraktuna, pakhonchatpasinggi khuyada thamlei. 

3 Adubu Pitarna hai, Ananiya nahakna thawai asengbada minamnanaba, amasung lam adugi mamandagi saruk ama khakhounanaba, seitanna nahakki pukning thalhanba karigino? 

4 Maduna leiringeida, narannaigi natlamdra? amasung madu yonthokkhraga, mamal adu naning touramloidra? Nahakna toukhiba thabak asi nahakki pukningda khallamba karigino? Nahakna misingda minamba natte, iswardani. 

5 Maduda Ananiana waramsing asi tabamaktada haithaduna mathawai thakhre. Aduga madu taba mi pumnamakta yamna kiba pokle. 

6 Adudagi pakhangsingna hougattuna mahakpu phina yetlaga, puthoktuna phumle. 

7 Amahiksung pung ahumlom leiraga, mahakki nupina thokkhiba adu khangladuna changlak-i. 

8 Aduga Pitarna mangonda hairak-i, nakhoina lam adu asupta yolli haiba engonda taku. 

9 Maduda mahakna hai, hoi, asupta yonbamakni. Touigumbasung Pitarna mangonda hai, prabhugi thawaibu chang yengnanaba nakhoina yaminnaba karigino? Yengu, nahakki napuroibabu phumkhibasinggi makhong thongganda leiri, aduga makhoina nahakpusu puthokkani. 

10 Amasung khudak adumaktada mahakna Pitargi khuyada haithaduna mathawai thakhre. Aduga pakhangsing aduna changlakpada mahak siramba phangle, amasung makhoina mahakpu puthoktuna mapuroibagi manakta phumle. 

11 Aduga singlup apumbada amasung thokkhiba asi taba pumnamakta yamna kiba pokle. 

Pakhonchatpasingna Khudam Utpa Amasung Anaba Phahanba 

12 Amahiksung pakhonchatpasinggi khutna misinggi marakta ayamba khuciam amasung angakpa tou-i. Aduga makhoi pumnamakna Solomon-gi mangonda pukning amata oina leirammi. 

13 Adubu leihouba misinggi maraktagi kananasu makhoida thouna phana tinnade, adum oinamakpu misingna makhoihu ikaikhumnei. 

14 Amasung nipasinggisu nupisinggisu miyam thajaduna prabhuda henna henna tinsillammi. 

15 Maram asina Pitarna lakpada mahakki mamita oirabasu kana kanagumbagi masada tananaba, anabasingbu lamjao lamjaoda puthoklaktuna phamung amasung hidanda hiphallammi. 

16 Aduga Jerusalemgi akoibada leiba sahar sahardagi miyamnasu anabasingbu amasung sengdaba thawaisingna noihatpasingbu puraktuna tillabada, pumnamakpu phahallammi. 

Pitarga Johan-Gabu Ahallup Mangda Amuk Pukhatpa 

17 Tou-i-gumbasung purohitlen amasung mahakka loinaba pumnamak, haibadi Saddukisinggi khutpu, makhoi asina houraktuna kallakpana thalle, 

18 Aduga pakhonchatpasingbu khutphangnana pharaga, keisumsangda thamle. 

19 Tou-i-gumbasung prabhugi dutna ahingda keisumsanggi thongsing adu, hangdokpiraga, makhoibu puthokpiduna hai, 

20 Chatlu, aduga nakhoina iswar ningnasangda leptuna misingda hingba asigi wa pumnamak haidok-u. 

21 Aduga makhoina asi tabada, iswar ningnasangda nongngallamdaida changduna tambirammi. Tou-i-gumbasung purohitlen-ga mahakka loinabasinggana laktuna, ahallup amasung Israyelgi machasinggi ahallaman pumnamakpu kousillaga, makhoibu puraknanaba keisumsangda thare. 

22 Adubu arakpa phamnaibasing aduna makhoibu keisumsangda phangdraduna makhoina hallaklaga pao tamlare, 

23 Keisumsang adu pumnamak yamna cheksinna thinglamba amasung thong ngakpasingna thongda leplamba eikhoina phangle, adubu thong hangdok-pada manung aduda mi kana amata eikhoina phangde. 

24 Maduda iswar ningnasanggi lanjingbaga purohit athoibasinggana wasing asi tabada, kari tholdagaba haina makhoigi maramda yamna langtaknare. 

25 Amasung mi amana laktuna makhoida tamlare, yeng-u, nakhoina keisumsangda thamlamba nipasing aduna iswar ningnasangda leptuna misingbu tambiduna lei. 

26 Maduda lanjingba aduna phamnaibasingga loinana chatkhiduna makhoibu purakle, adubu namhaba toude, maramdi makhoibu nungdumna thagani haiduna misingbu kirammi. 

27 Aduga makhoina makhoibu puraklabada, ahallupki mangda lephalle. Amasung purohitlenna makhoida hangduna hai, 

28 Ming asina tambiganu haiduna eikhoina nakhoibu kanna yathang pikhi, aduga yeng-u, nakhoigi tambiba asina Jerusalem ithal thalle, amasung mi asigi i eikhoigi ithakta nakhoina tahanning-i. 

29 Tou-i-gumbasung Pitarga pakhonchatpasinggana khumlak-i, misingdagibudi henna iswargi yathang eikhoina inba tare. 

30 Nakhoina uda yanduna hatkhiba Jisubu eikhoigi ipasinggi iswarduna hinggatpire. 

31 Israyelda pukning hongba amasung pap kokpiba pinanaba, iswarna ibungo asibu luchingba amasung kanbiba mapu oina ibungomahakki khut yetna thanggatpire. 

32 Aduga eikhoina waramsing asigi sakshi oiri, amasung iswarna ibungo mahakki haiba inbasingda pibiraba thawai asengba adunasu sakshini. 

33 Tou-i-gumbasung makhoina asi tarabada makhoigi thammoi chakladuna makhoibu hatninglammi. 

34 Adubu ahallupki marakta amana, haibadi Gamaliyel kouba, mi pumnamakna ikaikhumnaraba wayen-gi ojha asina lepkhattuna, mising adubu ngaihak mapanda thamnanaba yathang pire. 

35 Aduga mahakna makhoida hai, Israyelgi misa, nakhoina mising maram tamthokle. Nakhoidi iswargi cheksinjou. 

36 Maramdi numit asigi kamangda masa mathantabu thoidokpa mi amani haina Thiudas thokle, mangonda nipasing masing chamarirom changle. Mahakpu hatkhrabada, mahakki wa inba pumnamakna ikai kainakhiduna, karisu oikhidre. 

37 Mi asigi matungda mikok thiba matamda Galilgi Jihuda tholdaduna, mahakki tung inba mi khara chingthokle; mahaksu mangle, aduga mahakki wa inba pumnamak ichai chaithokkhre. 

38 Amasung houjikti eina nakhoida hairibani, mising asidagi nakhoina chaithoktuna makhoibu thadok-u; maramdi wakhal asi nattraga thabak asi misingdagi oirabadi, masi mangjakhigani; 

39 Tou-i-gumbasung iswardagi oirabadi, nakhoina makhoibu manghanba ngamloi; iswargi maiokta leppasingmakni haina nakhoibu khangbasu yai. 

40 Maduda makhoina mahakka yanare, aduga makhoina pakhonchatpasingbu kouraga makhoibu yieduna, Jisugi mingda ngangdananaba kanna yathang piraga, makhoibu thadokle. 

41 Maram aduna makhoina ming adugi maramda ikaiba khangba matik chai haina haraojaduna ahallup mangdagi chatthokkhre. 

42 Aduga numit khuding iswar ningnasangda amasung yum yumda makhoina Jisudi Khristani haina tambiba amasung sandokpa toklamde.

Pakhonchatpasinggi thabak 6 

Pakhonchatpa Mi Taret Khan-Gatpa 

1 Amahiksung numitsing asigi manungda seboksinggi masing hen-gatpada, Grik lol louba Jihudisingna Ibriyasinggi mathakta murum murum sonba houre, maramdi makhoigi lukhrabisingbu numit khudinggi mateng pangbibada thouoibiramde. 

2 Maduda taranithoi aduna sebok mayambu kouraduna hai, pijapithakki thougan changnabagi damak eikhoina iswargi wa thadokpham thokte. 

3 Maram aduna, he ichin inaosa, mingchat aphaba, thawai asengbaga lousinggana thanba nipa taret nakhoigi naraktagi thibiyu; thabak asigi mathakta eikhoina makhoibu thamgani. 

4 Tou-i-gumbasung eikhoinadi haijabada amasung wa adugi thouganda itattattana pukning changjagani. 

5 Maduda wa asina miyam apumbabu pelhalle, aduga makhoina thajabaga thawai asengbagana thanba nipa Stiphan kouba, Philip, Prakhor, Nikanor, Timon, Parmina, amasung Antiyokki Jihudi dharma louba Nikalai, makhoi asibu khangattuna, 

6 Pakhonchatpasinggi mamangda lephalle; amasung makhoina haijarabada, makhoigi mathakta khut thambire. 

7 Aduga iswargi wapao chaokhatlammi, Jerusalemda seboksinggi masing yamna yamkhatlammi, amasung purohitsing mayam yamna thajaba aduba illammi. 

Stiphanbu Hotchillaktuna Phaba 

8 Amahiksung Stiphanna thoujal amasung pangganna thalladuna, misinggi marakta achouba angakpasu khudamsu tourammi. 

9 Tou-i-gumbasung Libarttin kouba loisanggi, khurinisinggi, Aleksandriyasinggi mi kharana Kilikiyadagi amasung Esiadagi mi kharagana hougattuna, Stiphan-ga wa marei yetnei. 

10 Amasung mahakna lousing amasung thawaina ngangliba adugi mangda makhoina leppa ngamlamde. 

11 Maduda makhoina nipa kharabu haihalle, mahakna Mousigi amasung iswargi mathakta usittaba wa ngangba eikhoina tare.
