12 Aduga makhoina misingbu, ahallammansingbu amasung sastragi ojhasingbu thoudongle, amasung mangonda hotchillaklaga, mahakpu pharaduna, ahallup tanna pusille; 

13 Amasung, mi asina asengba mapham asigi amasung wayel yathang adugi mathakta ngangba tokte; 

14 Maramdi Nasaretki Jisu asina mapham asi manghanduna, Mousina eikhoida pithoklaba hounabi adu hongdokkani haina mahakna haiba eikhoina tare, haiba minamba sakshisingbu makhoina lepkhathalle. 

15 Aduga ahallupta phamliba pumnamakna mangonda sangtrik sangna yengbada, mahakki mamai adu swargadutki maigumna ure.

Pakhonchatpasinggi thabak 7 

Stiphan-gi sandokpa wa 

1 Adudagi purohitlenna hai, wasing asi chumbra? 

2 Maduda mahakna hai, he ichin inaosa amasung ipa ipansa, tabiyu. Matik mangan-gi iswar aduna eikhoigi piba Abrahamda, mahakna Haranda leiramdringeida Mesopotamiyada leiringeida, 

3 Uhanbiduna mangonda hai, nangna nareibaktagi, amasung nanggi sagei-nateidagi thoklaktuna eina nangonda uhan-gadaba leibak adu tanna lak-u. 

4 Matam aduda mahakna Kaldiya-singgi leibaktagi thoklaktuna Haranda leirare; aduga mahakki mapana sikhrabada, madudagi nakhoina houjik leiriba lam asida iswarna mahakpu honghallakle; 

5 Aduga ibungo mahakna mangonda masida kari amata phanghankhide; khong thapham phaoba pikhide, aduga ibungo mahakna mangonda amasung tungda mahakki dharada masigi mapu oinanaba pibigani haina mahakki macha leitringeida waleppire. 

6 Amasung iswarna asumna hai, mahakki dharana mireibak amada lamlallugani, aduga leibak adugi mina makhoibu minai oihanduna chahi chamari phaoba thina laknagani. 

7 Aduga makhoibu minai oihan-gadaba jat adubu eina wayengani, amasung adugi matungda makhoina thoklaktuna, mapham asida eibu khurumjagani haina iswarna hai. 

8 Amasung ibungo mahakna mangonda un kakpagi walepnaba adu pire. Aduga asum touna mahakna Isahakpu poktuna numit nipanni subada mahakpu un kakle; Isahakna Jakobpu amasung Jakobna ipa ipusing taranithoibu asumna toukhi. 

9 Amasung ipa ipusingna Jousephki mathakta kallakladuna, mahakpu Misorda yonthokkhre; aduga iswarna mahakka loinabiduna, 

10 Mahakki awa anang pumnamaktagi lanthokpiraga Misorgi ningthou Pharoun-gi mangda thoujal amasung lousing pibire, aduga mahakna mahakpu Misorgi amasung mahakki imung pumnamakki mathakta mapu oihalle. 

11 Amahiksung Misor amasung Kanan apumbada chaktangba amasung yamna awa anang thokle, aduga eikhoigi ipasingna chinjak phanglamde. 

12 Maduda Misorda chanaba mahei marong lei haiba Jakobna tarabada, ahanbada eikhoigi ipasingbu thare. 

13 Amasung anirak subada Jousephna masabu machin manaosingda khanghalle, aduga Jouseph-ki sageibu Pharounda phongdokle. 

14 Amasung Jousephna thakhiduna, mahakki mapa Jakob amasung sagei-natei pumnamak mi humphutara mangabu mangonda kourakle; 

15 Aduga Jakobna Misorda kumthare. Amasung mahakmaksu eikhoigi ipasingsu sikhre, 

16 Aduga makhoibu Sekhem tanna puraktuna, Abrahamna Sekhemda leiba Hamorgi macha nipasingdagi lupana mamal piduna leiba mongpham aduda phumle. 

17 Tou-i-gumbasung iswarna Abrahamga yanaduna waleppagi matam adu naksillaklabada, Josephpu khangdaba Misorgi ningthou atoppa ama thoklaktriba phaoba, 

18 Mising aduna Misorda masing chaosu chaokhatle, hensu hen-gatle. 

19 Ningthou asina eikhoigi jatpu marei mara touduna, eikhoigi angang apisaksingbu hingdananaba langsekhanduna, ipa ipusingbu thina laknei. 

20 Matam aduda Mousi poktuna, iswargi mityengda yamna phajarammi; aduga mahakpu mapagi yumda tha ahum yokle. 

21 Amasung mahakpu langseklabada, Pharoun-gi macha nupina mahakpu khungattuna mahakmakki macha nipa oijanaba yokle. 

22 Aduga Mousibu Misorsinggi mahei pumnamak loina tambire, amasung mahakti waheidasu thabaktasu kanthouba oirammi. 

23 Tou-i-gumbasung mahakna chahi niphu surabada, mahakki machin manaosingbu, Israyelgi machasing adubu, mahakki pukningda yengningba pokle. 

24 Amasung mahkoigi maraktagi kanagumba amabu chumdana otpiba uduna, mahakna mahakpu tengbangbiduna Misorgi mi adubu hattuna noihatpa phangba adugi laman khumbire. 

25 Aduga mahakki khutna iswarna machin manaosingbu kanbiri haiba makhoina khang-i haiduna mahakna ninglammi, adubu makhoina khanglamde. 

26 Amasung matunggi numit aduda makhoi masen yeinaba mahakna uruduna, makhoibu channahannanaba hai, ibungokhoi, nakhoi nachin nanao-singni. Karigi nakhoi amana amada aranba tounaribage? 

27 Tou-i-gumbasung mahakki leiminnababu chumdaba touramliba aduna mahakpu inthoktuna hai, nangbu kanana eikhoigi ithakta mapu amasung wayenba oihanbage? 

28 Nangna ngarang Misorgi mibu hatkhibagumna, eibu hatkera? 

29 Aduga asi haibada Mousina chenkhiduna, Midiyan leibakta leirure; mapham aduda mahakki macha nipa ani pokle. 

30 Adudagi chahi niphu surabada Sinai chinggi lamhangda swarga dut amana mana pungba mongsong amada meigi meiri manungda mahakpu uhalle 

31 Aduga Mousina madu urbada mahakna uriba pot aduda ngakle. Amasung munna yengnanaba mahakna naksillaklabada, prabhugi khonjel thoklakle, 

32 Eidi nanggi napa napu-singgi iswar, Abrahamgi, Ishakki amasung Jakobki iswar aduni; maduda Mousina tanik tanikladuna thouna phana munna yengdre. 

33 Aduga prabhuna mangonda hai, nakhongdagi khugrang adu louthok-u, maramdi nangna lepliba mapham asi asengba leipakni. 

34 Misorda leiba eigi misinggi awa anang adu eina loina ure, aduga makhoigi naheba, tare, amasung eina makhoibu kanbinanaba lengtharakpani; aduga houjik lak-o, eina nangbu Misorda thage. 

35 Kanana nangbu mapu amasung wayenba oihanbage haiduna makhoina yakhidaba Mousi asibu mana pungba mongsongda mangonda uhanbikhiba swargadut adugi pambeina mapu amasung handokpiba oinanaba, iswarna thabire. 

36 Mi asina Misorda, angangba samadruda, amasung lamjaoda chahi niphu angak angakpa thabak amasung khudamsing touduna makhoibu chingthokpirakle. 

37 Iswarna nakhoigi nachin nanaosinggi maraktagi nakhoigi damak eigumba ibungo mahakki wa takthokpa ama thokhanbigani haina Israyelgi machasingda haikhiba Mousi adu asini. 

38 Sinai chingda mangonda wa ngangnaba swargadut aduga amasung eikhoigi ipa ipusingga loinana lamjaoda singlupta leiramba mahak adu asini, mahakna eikhoida pibinanaba hingliba wa phangle. 

39 Eikhoigi ipa ipusingna mahakki wa inningdaduna mahakpu makhoidagi inthoklaga, makhoigi pukning Misorda onkhiduna Haronda hai, 

40 Eikhoigi imangda chatpinanaba eikhoigi damak laising sabiyu; maramdi eikhoibu Misordagi chingthokpirakpa Mousi asida kari thokkhibano eikoina khangde. 

41 Maduda makhoina matam aduda sanno ama saduna, murtti aduda iratpot puraklaga makhoigi khutna saba pot aduda makhoina haraoba houre. 

42 Tou-i-gumbasung iswarna onthokkhiduna, makhoibu atiyagi mayambu khurumnanaba thadokle; iswargi wa takthokpasinggi lairikta ikhiba asigumbani: He Israyelgi imung, lamjaoda chahi niphu nakhoina ball tounaba amasung iratnaba sa eingonda katpa nattra? 

43 Amasung Molakki phijang amasung lai Remphan-gi thawanmichak, nakhoina khurumnanaba saba murttising adubu nakhoina thanggatle. Amasung eina nakhoibu Babilon-gi wangmada pukhigani. 

44 Eikhoigi ipa ipusinggida lamjaoda sakshigi phijang adu leirammi, madudi ukhiba maonggi matung inna madu saga-dabani haina Mousiga ngangnaba ibungo mahakna takpikhiba adugumbani. 

45 Eikhoigi ipa ipusinggi mangdagi iswarna tanthokkhiba jatsing adugi lamda changba matamda, phijang adu ipa ipusingna leng oina phangduna Jihosuyaga loinana pusillakle. Madu Dayudki haktak phaoba lei-rammi. 

46 Dayudna iswargi mityengda thoujal phangjaduna Jakobki iswargi damak leipham phangjanaba nijare. 

47 Adubu Solomonna ibungo mahakki damak yum sare. 

48 Adum omamakpu ihen henba aduna khutna saba yumda pande; iswargi wa takthokpana haibagumba asini: 

49 Swargadi eigi phambanni, aduga prithibidi eigi khonggi khunetni; prabhuna hai, eigi damak nakhoina karamba yum sagadage? Nattraga eigi potthanaba mapham karino? 

50 Eigi khutna pot pumnamak asi saba nattra? 

51 He ngak kanba, amasung thammoiga nakonggada unkaktabasa, nakhoina matam leiba khibikta thawai asengbabu yeknei. Nakhoigi napa napu-singna toukhibagumna, nakhoinasu tou-i. 

52 Nakhoigi napa napusingna iswargi wa takthokpasinggi maraktagi kanabu ot-neikhidabage? Aduga dharmachenba ibungo adugi lenglakpagi maramna hanna takpasingbu makhoina hatle; houjik nak-hoina ibungobu pithokpasing amasung hatpasing oirakle. 

53 Nakhoidi swargadutsinggi mapanna piraba wayel yathang adu phanglabasingni, aduga madu ngakte. 

Stiphan siba 

54 Amahiksung makhoina waramsing asi tabada, makhoigi thammoi chakladuna mahakki thakta makhoina maya krak krak chikpa houre. 

55 Tou-i-gumbasung mahakti thawai asengbana pikthalladuna atiyaromda sangtrik yengkhatpada, iswargi matik mangal amasung Jisuna iswargi yetthangbada lepliba uraduna hai, 

56 Yeng-u, swarga hangdokpa amasung migi macha nipa aduna iswargi yetthangbada lepliba eina ujei. 

57 Tou-i-gambasung makhoina khon-jel wangna laoraduna manakong mensinduna pukning amata oina mangonda hotchillakle. 

58 Aduga makhoina mahakpu sahargi mapanda inthoktuna mahakpu nungna thaba houre; amasung sakshising aduna makhoigi maphi marol adu maming Sol kouba pakhang amagi khong manakta thamle. 

59 Amasung Stiphanna prabhubu koujaringeida amasung prabhu Jisu, eigi thawai loubiyu, haijaringeida makhoina mahakpu nungna tharammi. 

60 Aduga mahakna khuru khudak kunduna, khonjel loana haijei, prabhu makhoigi thakta pap asi singthanabiganu. Amasung asi hairaga mahakna tumkhre.

Pakhonchatpasinggi thabak 8 

Khristansingbu ot-neiba amasung chaikhaiba 

1 Aduga mahakpu hatpa asida Solna makhoiga yamirmarammi. Amasung numit aduda Jerusalemda leiba singlup adugi mathakta yamna ot-neiba thokle; maducla pakhonchatpasing nattana, makhoi pumnamak Jihudiya amasung Samariyagi lam lamda ichai chaithoknare. 

2 Aduga laining-chetpa nipasingna Stiphanbu phumlamduna, mahakki damak yamna teng-thanare. 

3 Tou-i-gumbasung Solna yum yumda changduna, nipa nupisingbu chinglaklaga keisumsangda pithokpa aduna singlup adubu otkhairammi. 

Philipna Samariyada chatpa 

4 Maram aduna chaithokkhibasing aduna aphaba wapao sandok sandoktuna koichat chatle. 

5 Aduga Philipna Samariyagi saharda kumthakhiduna makhoida Khristabu sandokle. 

6 Amasung miyamsingna Philipki wa tabada amasung mahakna touba khuclamsing adu ubada, amata oina mahakna hairiba wa aduda pukning changle. 

7 Maramdi sengdaba thawaising changba ayambadagi thawaising aduna khonjel wangna laoduna chongthokle; aduga nakal namma sithaba ayambabu amasung khong tekpasingbu phahanbire. 

8 Maduda sahar aduda yamna haraoba thokle. 

Angakpa mahei sijinnaba Simon-gi wari 

9 Tou-i-gumbasung sahar aduda mamangngeida angakpa mahei sijinnaramba, maming Simon kouba, kanagumba nipa ama leirammi, aduga mahakna masa mathantabu kanagumba achouba amani haiduna Samariyasingbu ngakhallami. 

10 Mangonda makhoi apikpadagi achouba phaoba pumnamakna pukning thingjinduna hai, mi asi achouba kouba iswar gi pangngal aduni. 

11 Amasung mahakna mahakki angakpa mahei aduna makhoibu matam kuina ngakhallamba maramna makhoina mangonda pukning thingjillammi. 

12 Tou-i-gumbastmg Philipna iswargi leibak amasung Jisu Khristagi minggi maramda aphaba wapao sandokpa adu makhoina thajarabada, inakhoi nipasu nupisu baptais lourammi. 

13 Maduda Simon masanasu thajaraduna, baptais louraga Philipka itattattana loinarammi, aduga khudamsing amasung achouba toungamdaba thabak-sing thokkhiba adu uduna mahakna ngakllammi. 

Pitarga Johan-gana Samariyada Chatpa 

14 Amahiksung Samariyana iswargi wa loure haiba Jerusalemda leiba pakhonchatpasingna tarabada, makhoina Pitar amasung Johanbu makhoida thabire. 

15 Makhoi anina kumtharaklabada, makhoina thawai asengba phangnanaba makhoigi damak haijabire. 

16 Maramdi thawai asengbana makhoi kana amagi thakta tabiramdri, adubu prabhu Jisugi mingda makhoibu baptais toubibatani. 

17 Matam aduda makhoigi mathakta makhoina makhut thambirammi, amasung makhoina thawai asengbabu phangjarammi. 

18 Aduga pakhonchatpasinggi khut thambibada, thawai asengbabu pibire haiba Simonna urabada, mahakna makhoida sel katladuna hai, 

19 Eina kanagumba amagi thakta ikhut thamlaga, mahakna thawai asengbabu phangnanaba, matik asi eingondasu pibiyu. 

20 Tou-i-gumbasung Pitarna hai, nanggi lupa nangga mangminnasanu, maramdi iswargi khudonbu senna leiba yai haina nangna ningle. 

21 Thabak asida nanggi saruk nattraga tamba nongdam kari amatta leite, maramdi nanggi pukchel iswargi mangda chumde. 

22 Maram aduna nanggi phattaba asidagi pukning hong-u, aduga yagadaba oirabadi, nanggi pukninggi ningba adu nahakpu kokpinanaba prabhuda nonjou. 

23 Maramdi nangdi nasingkha phattabada amasung dharma nattabagi apunbada lei haiba eina ui. 

24 Maduda Simonna khumlak-i, nakhoina hoina haikhiba adu amata ithakta tadananaba, eigi damak nakhoina prabhuda nonjabiyu. 

25 Asum touna makhoina prabhugi wa adu ningthina sakshi piduna hairamlaga, Samariyasinggi khun ayambada aphaba wapao sandok sandoktuna Jerusalemda hallak-i. 

Philip amasung Ithiyopiyagi masa onba mi ama 

26 Tou-i-gumbasung prabhugi dutna, Philipta hairak-i, hougatlo, aduga Jerusalemdagi Gasa tanna kumthaba lambi aduda makharomda chatlu; madu lamhangni. 

27 Maduda mahakna hougattuna chatle. Aduga yeng-u, Ithiyopiyagi masa onba nipa, Ithiyopiyasinggi rani Kandakigi lal pumnamakki mathakta pannariba, matik chaoba aduna Jerusalemda iswarbu khurumjananaba chatlui; 

28 Aduga mahakna hallak-pada mahakki kang manungda phamduna iswargi wa takthokpagi lairik Jisaiya adu paduna leirammi. 

29 Amasung thawai aduna Philipta hai, manakta chattuna kang asiga loinou. 

30 Maduda Philipna mangonda chensinkhiduna Mahakna iswargi wa takthokpagi Lairik Jisaiya adu pariba taraduna hai, nahakna pariba adu khangbra? 

31 Aduga mahakna hai, kanagumbana eibu takpidrabadi, eina karamna ngamgadage? Adudagi mahakna Philippu, kakhattuna eihakka phamminnabiyu, haijare. 

32 Amasung mahakna paramliba sastragi mapham adu asini: Yaobu hatnanaba chingbagum ibungobu chingle, aduga yao machana magi matu kakpagi khongdabagum, adugumduna ibungona ya kakhatte. 

33 Ibungona nollukpa aduda ibungogi wayel louthokkhre. Ibungogi miron kanana phongdokkadage? Maramdi ibungogi thawai prithibidagi puthokkhibani. 

34 Aduga masa onba nipa aduna Philipta khumlak-i, eina nahakpu haijari, iswargi wa takthokpana masi kanagi maramda hairibano? Masagi maramda haijabra, nattraga kanagumba atoppagi maramda haibra? 

35 Maduda Philipna maya kakhattuna, sastra asidagi houna mangonda Jisubu sandokle. 

36 Amasung makhoina lambida asum chatlakpada karigumba ising manakta thunglare, aduga masa onba nipa aduna hai, yengbiyu, ising lei! Eibu baptais toubibada kari apanba leibage? 

37 Aduda Philipna hai, nahakna nahakki thammoi pumnamak yaona thajarabadi yai. Maduda mahakna khumlak-i, iswargi macha nipa adu Jisu Khristani haiba eina thajei. 

38 Adudagi mahakna kang khamnaba yathang pire, aduga Philipsu masa onba nipasu makhoi anina ising aduda kumthaduna, mahakna mahakpu baptais toubire. 

39 Aduga makhoina ising adudagi kakhatlaklage, prabhugi thawaina Philippu puthokkhi, amasung masa onba nipa aduna mahakpu amuk hanna ukhidre, maramdi mahak harao haraona chatkhirammi 

40 Tou-i-gumbasung Philippu Asadodda phanglare, aduga mahakna Keisariyada thungladriba phaona sahar pumnamakta chattuna aphaba wapao sandoklak-i.

Pakhonchatpasinggi thabak 9 

Solna pukning hongba 

1 Tou-i-gumbasung houjiksu prabhugi seboksingbu kihan-ge amasung hatke hotnabana Solgi manungsa honbagum hoilamlibana purohitlen-gi maphamda chatle, 

2 Amasung lambi adugi oiba nipasingsu nupisingsu kanagumbabu phanglabadi, makhoibu punduna Jerusalemda purakpa yanabagi damak Damesakki loisanggi kanglupsingda pinaba yathang lairik piyu haina mangondagi nijare. 

3 Amasung mahakna asum chatlingeida Damesakta naksillakpada, asum thoklare, Khanghoudana swargadagi mangal amana mahakki akoibada ngalle. 

4 Maduda mahakna leipakta tuthare, aduga, Sol, Sol, nangna eibu karigi ot-neiribage haina mangonda haiba khonjel ama mahakna tare. 

5 Aduga mahakna hai, ibungo nahak kanano, prabhu? Maduda ibungona hai, eidi nangna ot-beiriba Jisuni: 

6 Adubu hougattuna saharda chang-u, aduga nangna kari kari touba tabage haiba nangonda takpigani. 

7 Amasung mahakka loinana lam chat-minnariba nipasing aduna khonjendi taraga mi kana amana udrabada, wa ngangba thoktaduna leple. 

8 Aduga Solna leipaktagi hougatle, adubu mahakki mit pangthoklabada karisu udre; maduda makhoina mahakpu makhut samduna, Damesakki manungda chingsinbire. 

9 Aduga mahak numit humni phaoba karisu uba ngamlamde, amasung chada-thaktadana leirammi. 

Solna damesakta leiba 

10 Amahiksung Damesakta kanag-umba sebok, mining Ananiya kouba ama leirammi; aduga prabhuna mangonda uhanduna hai, Ananiya. Maduda mahakna hai, yengbiyu, nanaibu, prabhu. 

11 Amasung prabhuna mangonda hai, hougattuna, achumba kouba lambi adu tanna chatlaga, Jihudagi yumda Tarsagi Sol kouba nipa amabu thiru; maramdi yeng-u, mahakna haijari, 

12 Aduga maming Ananiya kouba nipa amana changlaktuna mahakna uba phangjananaba mathakta makhut thambiba ujare. 

13 Tou-i-gumbasung Ananiyana khumle, prabhu, nipa asigi maramda, mahakna Jerusalemda ibungogi asengba misingda kayamuk phattaba toukhiba adu eina miyamdagi tajare; 

14 Aduga asida ibungogi mingbu sonjaba mi pumnamakpu punnanaba, athoiba purohitsingdagi matik mahakna phangle. 

15 Adubu prabhuna mangonda hai, chatlu, maramdi atoppa jatsinggi, ningthousinggi amasung Israyelgi machasinggi mangda eigi ming punanaba nipa asi eigi damak khandokpa khutlaini. 

16 Maramdi mahakna eigi minggi maramgi damak kaya yamna awaba khangba tare haiba erna mangonda khanghan-gani. 

17 Maduda Ananiyana chatkhiduna yum aduda changle, aduga mahakki khut mathakta thambiduna hai ichin inao Sol, nahakna uba phangnanaba amasung nahakpu thawai asengbana thannanaba, prabhuna, haibadi nahakna lakpa lambi aduda nangonda uhanba Jisu aduna, eibu thabire. 

18 Amasung khudak adumaktada mahakki mittagi makugumba khara takhre, maduda mahak uba phangjare. 

19 Aduga mahakna hougattuna baptais loure, amasung charabada kankhatle. Amasung mahakna Dammesakta leiba seboksingga numit kayani marum leiminnare. 

20 Aduga thindana mahakna loisang loisangda Jisubu, haibadi, ibungo asi iswargi macha nipani haina sandoklammi. 

21 Amasung tariba mi pumnamakna ngakladuna hairammi, Jerusalemda ming asi sonjabasingbu manghannaba toukhiba adu mi asi nattra? Aduga mahakna asida makhoibu punduna athoiba purohitsinggi mangda punanaba, maram asigi damak laklammi. 

22 Tou-i-gumbasung Solna henna henna kankhattuna, asimak Khrista aduni haina praman pibada, Dammesakta leiba Jihudisingbu tingngak maingaknahalle. 

23 Adugi matungda numit yamna kuirabada, Jihudisingna mahakpu hatnanaba wa tanare, adubu makhoigi sarou sinnaba adu Solna khanglakle. 

24 Aduga makhoina mahakpu hatnanaba ahing nungthil panthong panthongdasu lumlammi. 

25 Tou-i-gumbasung mahakki seboksingna mahakpu ahingda puduna polang amada haplaga pandagi thadabikhre. 

Solna Jerusalemda amasung Tarsada chatpa 

26 Amahiksung mahakna Jerusalem tanna laklabada, seboksingga tinnajagadabagi mahak masana hotnajei; aduga mahakna sebok oire haiba thajadaduna, makhoi pumnamakna mahakpu kirammi. 

27 Adubu Barnabana mahakpu loukhatpiduna pakhonchatpasinggi nakta pubiradunna, mahakna lambida prabhubu karamna ukhiba, ibungona mahakka ngangnakhiba, amasung karamna mahakna Jisugi mangda - Dammesakta thouna phana pao sandokhiba, makhoida sengna lithokle. 

28 Amasung prabhugi mingda thouna phana pao sandoktuna, Jerusalemda chatthok chatsin touduna mahakna makhoiga loinarammi. 

29 Aduga mahakna Grik lol lonba Jihudisingna ngangnaduna wa marei yetnarammi; adubu makhoina mahakpu hatnanaba hotnarammi. 

30 Amasung machin manaosingna madu khanglabada, mahakpu Keisariyada puthaduna, Tarsada thakhre. 

31 Matam aduda Jihudiya, Galil amasung Samariya apumbada sinthungna singluppu semgatpiduna ingthaba phanglammi; aduga prabhubu kijabada amasung thawai asengbagi pambeina chatchaduna masing yamkhatlammi. 

Luddada Pitarna anaba phahankhiba 

32 Amahiksung asum thoklare, Pitarna mapham pumnamakta koichat chattuna Luddada leiba asengba misingdasu kumthare. 

33 Aduga mapham aduda maming Einiya kouba, chahi nipal phaoba phamungda hiplaba, nakal namma sithaba kanagumba anaba mi amabu mahakna phangle. 

34 Maduda Pitarna mangonda hai, Einiya, Jisu Khristana nangbu phahanbi; hougattuna nanggi phamung semjaro. Aduga khudak adumaktada mahak hougatle. 

35 Amasung Luddada aduga Saronda leiba pumnamakna mahakpu ure, amasung makhoina prabhuda onsillakle. 

Dorka koubi nupi amagi wari 

36 Aduga Japhoda maming Tabitha, handokpada Dorka, koubi kanagumbi sebok ama leirammi. Nupi asina itattattana toujariba adu aphaba thabakna amasung pinaheibana thalli. 

37 Amasung numitsing adugi manungda asum thoklare, nupi adu naduna sire; aduga makhoina mahakpu luthokpiduna, mathak thangba ka amada thamle. 

38 Aduda Ludda Japhogi manakta leibanina seboksingna Pitar aduda lei haiba adu taraduna, eikhoida lengbiraknaba thinbiraganu haina mangonda haijarunaba nipa ani thare. 

39 Maduda Pitarna hougattuna makhoiga loinana chatkhre. Aduga mahakna maduda thunglabada makhoina mahakpu mathak thangba ka aduda pukhatle. Amasung lukhrabi pumnamakna kap kaptuna Dorkana makhoiga leiminnaringeida phurit amasung phirol tubiba adu uttuna manakta leple. 

40 Tou-i-gumbasung Pitarna makhoi pumnamakpu chatthokhanduna, khuru khudak kullaga haijare; aduga hakchang aduda onsillaktuna mahakna hai, Tabitha, hougatlo. Maduda mahakna mamit pangthokle, aduga Pitarbu urabada hougattuna phamle. 

41 Amasung Pitarna mangonda khut lansinbiduna mahakpu hougathalle; aduga asengba misingbu amasung lukhrabisingbu kouraga mahakpu hingna phanghanbire. 

42 Amasung Japho apumbada sinthungna masi khanglakpada, mi ayambana prabhubu thajare. 

43 Asum tholdare, mahakna Simon kouba kanagumba saun noiba amaga loinana Japhoda numit kuina leiminnarammi.

Pakhonchatpasinggi thabak 10 

Pitar amasung Korniliya 

1 Amahiksung Keisariyada Italiya haina kouba lanmi kanglup adugi chamagi mapu oiba, maming Korniliya kouba, kanagumba nipa ama leirammi. 

2 Mahakti mahakki imung manung pumnamakka loinana laining chetpa, iswarbu kina touba, misingda yamna pinaheiba, amasung matam leiba khibikta iswarda nonjaba mi oirammi. 

3 Nongmagi mapalsuba pung aduwaida uhanbiba amada iswargi dut amana mahakki manakta changlapka, amasung mangonda Korniliya haina hairaba mahakna sengna ure. 

4 Aduga mahakna mangonda mamit sangtrik yenglaga, kiraduna hai, kari oirabano, prabhu? Maduda mahakna mangonda hai, nahakki haijaba amasung pinaheiba khibik iswargi mangda ningsingnanabagi damak thunglare. 

5 Amasung houjik Japhoda nipasingbu thakhiduna, mingthol Pitar kouba kanagumba Simon adubu Louhallu; 

6 Mahak asina Simon kouba kanagumba saun noiba amaga leiminnari; mahakki yumdi samadru mapandani. 

7 Aduga mangonda wa ngangnaba swarga dut aduna lengthokkhrabada, mahakna mayumgi manaisingdagi anibu amasung mahakki thougan-gi damak itattattana ngaiduna leibasingdagi laining chetpa lanmi amabu kouraduna, 

8 Makhoida waram pumnamak takpiraga, Japho tanna mahakna makhoibu thakhre. 

9 Hayenggumbada makhoina lam asum chatlaktuna, sahar adu naklaklabada, Pitarna taruksuba pung aduwaida haijananaba yumthakta lengkhatle. 

10 Aduga mahakti mapuk lamlaktuna chaninglammi; adubu makhoina chanaba langlingeida mangonda samadhigi phibam oirakle; 

11 Aduga swarga hangdok-lamba, amasung achouba innaphi gumba karigumba hapnapot ama kumtharaktuna, madugi chithek marida paiduna prithibida thadarakpa mahakna ui. 

12 Madugi manungda makhal punmamak, makhong mari panba sasing, leipakta mapukna sittuna chatpasing, amasung atiyagi ucheksing yaorammi. 

13 Aduga, hougatlo, Pitar; hattuna chao, haiba khonjel ama mangonda lakle. 

14 Adubu Pitarna hai, asum oibiganu, prabhu, maramdi karigumba pot amangba amasung sengbada ei kadoungeidasu chajadri 

15 Aduga khonjel ama amukka anirak suna mangonda lakle, iswarna senghankhiba adubu nangna amangba oihan-ganu. 

16 Amasung asi ahumlak suna thokle, aduga khudak aduda hapnapot adu swargada loukhatkhre. 

17 Amahiksung Pitarna ukhiba uhanbiba adu karino haiduna mahak masa mathanta yamma langtaknaringeida, yeng-u Korniliyana tharakpa nipasing aduna Simon-gi yum hangla hangladuna konthong manakta leplaga, 

18 Mingthol Pitar kouba Simon asida thunglibara thungdabara haina kouduna hanglak-i. 

19 Amasung Pitarna uhanbiba aduda maol maol khallingeida, thawaina man-gonda hai, yeng-u, nipa ahumna nangbu thiri. 

20 Adubu hougattuna kumtharo, aduga karisu chingnaba leitana makhoiga loinana chatlu, maramdi eina makhoibu tharakpani. 

21 Maduda Pitarna nipasing adu tanna kumthakhiduna hai, yeng-u, nakhoina thiba mi adu eini; nakhoina kari maramgi lakpiribano? 

22 Aduga makhoina hai, lanai chamagi mapu oiba Korniliya, dharmachenba amasung iswarbu kina touba, aduga Jihudisinggi jat pumnamakna sonaba nipa aduda, mahakki mayumda nahakpu puraknaba amasung nangondagi wapao tanaba asengba swargadutna takpire. 

23 Maram aduna mahakna makhoibu kousinbiduna thunghanbire. Amahiksung hayenggumba aduda mahakna hougattuna makhoiga loinana chatkhre, aduga Japhodagi machin manaosinggi maraktagi kana kanagumbana mahakka loinakhi. 

24 Adugi matung nongma aduda makhoina Keisariyada thunglare. Aduga Korniliyana mahakki sagei-ngai, amasung marup mapang pullap punna kouraduna makhoibu ngairammi. 

25 Amasung Pitarna changlakpada asum thoklare, Korniliyana mahakpu okladuna, mahakki khongda tuthajaraga khurumjare. 

26 Tou-i-gumbasung Pitarna mahakpu hougathanduna hai, lepkhatlu; eisu mini. 

27 Adudagi mahakna mahakki wari sura suraduna changlakpada, mi mayam tinnaramba phangle. 

28 Maduda mahakna makhoida hai, Jihudi oiba nipa amana atoppa jatki mi amana tinnaba nattraga changnaba kayada wayel kaibano haiba nakhoina khang-i; adumakpu eina kanagumba mi amabu amangba nattraga sengdaba koupharoi haiba iswarna eingonda utpire. 

29 Maram asina eibu lourabada, karisu wayamba toudaduna eina lakchare. Maram aduna nakhoina eibu koubiraba kari maramgino eina hangjari. 

30 Maduda Korniliyana hai, numit marinigi mamangda eina iyumda pung asida mapal suba punggi haijaba toujarammi; eduga yeng-u, arangba phi setpa nipa amana imangda lepladuna hai, 

31 Korniliya, nahakki haijaba tabire, amasung, nahakki pinaheiba iswargi mangda ningsingba oire. 

32 Maram aduna Japhoda thakhiduna, mingthol Pitar kouba Simonbu kouru; mahakna samadru mapanda saun noiba Simon-gi yumda thungli. 

33 Maram aduna eina matam adumaktada nahakki naphamda thakibani, aduga nahakna lengbirakpa yamna phare. Maram aduna prabhuna nangonda yathang pikhiba pumnamak adu tajananaba, eikhoi pumnamakna houjik iswargi mangda leijari. 

34 Maduda Pitarna maya kakhattuna hai: Aoibamak eina khangle, iswarna misak mimai yengde, 

35 Adubu jat khudingmakta ibungo mahakpu kiba amasung dharmachenbagi thabak touba mi khudingmak ibungo mahakna yabibani. Jisu Khristagi mapanna ingthanabagi aphaba wapao sandoktuna, 

36 Ibungo mahakna Israyelgi machasingda wa adu thabire (ibungodi pumnamakki prabhuni). 

37 Johanna baptais toubagi wapao sandokpa matungda Galildagi houna Jihudiya apumba sinthungkhiba wari adu nakhoi nasana khangdaba natte, 

38 Madudi, Nasaretki Jisugi wani, karamna ibungobu iswarna thawai asengbaga panggangana thao heibiraga, ibungona koichat chattuna aphaba thabak tourambage amasung Diyabolna neiriba pumnamakpu phahanbirambage haibaduni; Maramdi iswarna ibungoga loinabirammi. 

39 Aduga ibungona Jihudisinggi lamdasu Jerusalemdasu toukhi toukhiba thabak pumnamak adugi sakshi eikhoini; adugasu makhoina ibungobu uthakta yanduna hatle. 

40 Iswarna ibungo asibu numit humni subada hinggatpiraduna phongdokhanbire, 

41 Mi pumnamakta natte, adubu iswarna mamangngeida khandokkhraba sakshisingdani, haibadi, ibungona asibasinggi maraktagi hinggatpa matungda ibungoga chamin thakminnakhiba eikhoidani. 

42 Aduga misingda pao sandoknaba, amasung ahingbasingga asibasinggagi wayel mapu iswarna oihan-biba adu ibungo asini haiba sakshi pinaba, ibungona eikhoida yathang pibire. 

43 Ibungogi maramda iswargi wa tak-thokpa pumnamakna sakshi pi, haibadi, ibungobu thajaba mi khudingmakna ibungogi minggi mapanna pap kokpa phangjagani. 

Atoppa jatsingna Thawai asengba phangba amasung baptais louba 

44 Pitarna wasing asi nganglingeimaktada wa adu tariba pumnamakki mathakta thawai asengbana tabire. 

45 Amasung Pitarga loinana lakpa thajaba un kakpa mising aduna ingak ngakle, maramdi atoppa jatsinggi mathaktasu thawai asengbagi khudon adu heithabire. 

46 Maramdi makhoina atop atoppa lonna ngangba amasung iswarbu thagatpa adu makhoina tarammi. 

47 Matam aduda Pitarna khumle, eikhoiga mannana thawai asengbabu phanglaba makhoi asibu baptais toubidanaba kanagumba mina ising khamba ngambara? 

48 Aduga makhoibu Jisu Khristagi mingda baptais toubinaba mahakna yathang pine. Maduda makhoina mahakpu numit khara phaibinaba haijare.

Pakhonchatpasinggi thabak 11 

Pitargi wathokki maramda masagi ngakchawa 

1 Amahiksung atoppa jatsingnasu iswargi wa phangle haiba pakhonchatpasingna amasung Jihudiyada leiba machin manaosingna tare. 

2 Aduga Pitarna Jerusalemda lengkhatpada, un kakpasing-gi kanglup aduna mahakka ningai tounaduna hai, 

3 Nahakna un kaktaba misingda changduna makhoiga chaminnare. 

4 Tou-i-gumbasung Pitarna makhoida mathangsitna libiduna haiba houre: 

5 Eina Japho saharda haijaduna leirammi; maduda samadhigi phibamda uhanbiba amada haibadi, achouba innaphigumba karigumba hapnapot ama kumtharaktuna, madugi chithek marida paiduna swargadagi thadarakpa eina ure; aduga maduna eigi inak phaoba lakle. 

6 Madubu eina sangtrik yengduna, wakhal touduna leiringeida, prithibigi makhong mari panba sasing, lamsasing, mapukna sittuna chatpasing amasung atiyagi ucheksing eina ure. 

7 Maduda, hougatlu, Pitar; hattuna chao, haiba khon-jel amanasu eingonda haiba eina tare. 

8 Adubu eina hai, asum oibiganu, prabhu; maramdi karigumba amangba nattraga sengdaba pot ichinda khak hapchadri. 

9 Tou-i-gumbasung khonjel amana swargadagi anirak suna khumle, iswarna senghankhiba adubu nangna amangba oihan-ganu. 

10 Amasung asi ahumlak suna thokle, aduga pumnamak amuk swargada chingkhatkhre. 

11 Amasung yeng-u, chingei-mak aduda Keisariyadagi eingonda tharakpa nipa ahumna eikhoina leiramba yum adugi mamangda leplare. 

12 Aduga thawaina eibu chingnaba leitana makhoiga loinana chatlu haina yathang pire. Amasung ichin inao taruk asisu eiga loinare, aduga eikhoina nipa adugi yumda changle. 

13 Maduda mahakna karamna ukhiba adu eikhoida tambire, haibadi, swargadutna mahakki imungda leptuna hai, Japhoda thakhiduna, mingthol Pitar kouba Simonbu louru; 

14 Mahakna nangonda wa haibigani, wa adugi mapanna nangnasu naniggi imung pumnamaknasu aran khubam phangjagani. 

15 Aduga eina wa ngangba houbada, eikhoigi ithaktasu ahanbada takhiba adugumna, thawai asengbana makhoigi mathakta tabire. 

16 Maduda, Johannadi isingda baptais toubire, tou-i-gumbasung nakhoibudi thawai asengbada baptais toubigani haina prabhuna karamna hairamba wa adu eina ningsingle. 

17 Maram aduna eikhoina prabhu Jisu Khristabu thajarabada, iswarna eikhoidasu makhoidasu chap mannaba khudon pibirabadi, eina kana oiduna iswarbu khamba ngambra? 

18 Maduda makhoina waramsing asi tarabada, tuminna leiraduna, iswarbu thagatcharak-i, adunadi atoppa jatsingdasu hingnanaba pukning hongba iswarna yabire. 

Antiyokhiyada attopa Jatsinggi singlup lingkhatpa 

19 Maram aduna Stiphan-gi maramda thokkhiba awaba aduna ichai chaithokkhibasing aduna Jihudisingtada, ateidadi nattana, wa adu tambi tambiduna Pheinikiya, Kurpa amasung Antiyokhiya phaoba koirakle. 

20 Tou-i-gumbasung makhoigi marakta kharanadi Kupra amasung Kurinigi nipasing oirammi. Makhoina Antiyokhiyada laklabada, Griksingdasu prabhu Jisubu sandoktuna tambirammi. 

21 Amasung prabhugi khut makhoiga loinabirammi, aduga thakaraba mi masing ayambana probhuda onsille. 

22 Amasung makhoigi maramda pao adu Jerusalemda leiba singlupki nakongda thunglabada, makhoina Barnababu Anti-yokhiya phaoba thare. 

23 Mahakna thunglabada, iswargi thoujal adu uduna haraojare; aduga makhoi pumnamakpu pukning chap yungna prabhuda itattattana leinanaba mahakna insinbire. 

24 Maramdi mahak aphaba, aduga thawai asengba amasung thajabana thanba nipa amani. Amasung ayamba mising prabhuda tinsille. 

25 Maduda mahakna Solbu thinanaba Tarsa tanna chatkhre; 

26 Aduga mahakna mahakpu phanglabada, Antiyokhiyada purakle. Amasung asum tholdare, makhoina chahi ama chuppa phaoba singlupka lionana pullap punna tirmaduna, ayamba misingbu tambire; aduga Antiyokhiyada seboksingbu Khristan haina ihan hanna koure. 

Barnabaga Solgabu Jerusalemda thaba 

27 Amahiksung numitsing asigi manungda Jerusalemdagi iswargi wa takthokpasingna Antiyokhiyada lengtharakle. 

28 Aduga makhoigi maraktagi maming Agaba kouba amana hougattuna, taibangpal apumbada achouba chaktangba thokkadouri haiba thawaigi mapanna phongdokle.; masi Klodiyogi haktakta asum thokle. 

29 Amasung Jihudiyada leiba machin manaosingda mi khudingna magi magi ngamjabagi matung inna pangbiba thananaba seboksingna wa lepnare. 

30 Asigumna makhoina toure; Barnaba amasung Solgi khutta ahallamansing tanna madu thakhre.

Pakhonchatpasinggi thabak 12 

Herodna ot-neiba; Pitarbu keisumsangdagi kanbiba 

1 Amahiksung matam aduwaida Herod ningthouna singlupki mi kana kanagumbabu thina tounanaba makhut thingjille. 

2 Amasung mahakna Johan-gi mayamba Jakobpu kabakthangna hathalle. 

3 Aduga masina Jihudisingbu pelhalle haiba mahakna urabada, Pitarbusu mahakna phahalle. Amasung madu hamei yaodaba tanchakkhangba matam oirammi. 

4 Aduga mahakna mahakpu pharabada, keisumsangda thamduna, lanmi mari marigi kanglup marida mahakpu ngaknaba pithokle; maramdi aran chakkhangbagi matungda mahakpu misinggi mamangda pukhatke ninglammi. 

5 Asum touna Pitarbu keisumsangda ngaklammi; adubu mahakki damak singlupna iswargi maphamda yamna kanna haijarammi. 

6 Amasung Herodna mahakpu putholdamdai ahing adumaktada, Pitarna lanmi anigi marakta yotlhing-phalang anina punduna tumlammi; aduga ngak-senbasingna keisumsang adugi thongda ngaklammi. 

7 Amasung yeng-u, prabhugi dut amana manakta leplare, aduga mangal amana leipham aduda ngalle, maduda dut aduna Pitargi nakanda phuraga houdoktuna hai, thuna hougatlu. Aduga mahakki yotlhing-phalang adu makhuttagi takhre. 

8 Maduda swargadut aduna mangonda hai, nakhwang laksillu, khugrang marisu punsillu. Aduga mahakna adugumna toure. 

9 Maduda mahakna mangonda hai, naphi insillaga itung illu. Aduga mahakna thoktuna matung illammi, amasung dutna touba adu aoiba-makni haiba khangdaduna mahakna uhanbiba ama ugani haina ninglammi. 

10 Adudagi makhoina ahanba amasung anisuba ngaksenbabu hendoklaktuna, saharda changnaba yotna saba panthong aduda thunglarabada, thong adu makhoigi damak manthanta hangdokchare. Aduga makhoi thoklaktuna, lambi amada chatlaga, khanghoudana dut adu mangondagi chatthokkhre. 

11 Maduda Pitarna masana khangjaraklabada hai, houjikti eina chumna khangjare, haibadi, prabhuna ibungogi dutpu thabiraktuna, eibu Herodki khuttagi amasung Jihudisinggi ninglambadagi kanthokpire. 

12 Amasung mahakna wakhal khallaga, mingthol Mark kouba Johan-gi mama Mariyamgi yumda lakle; mapham aduda ayambana tinnaduna haijarammi. 

13 Amasung mahakna mapan-gi thongda yeirabada, Roda koubi minai leisabi amana hangnanaba lakle. 

14 Aduga mana Pitargi khonjenni khanglabada, haraornanbadagi thongdi hangdoktaduna, mana chensinkhiduna, Pitarna thongjinda leptuna lei haina tumlare. 

15 Maduda makhoina mangonda hai, nang ngaore! Adubu mana aoibamakni haiduna kana mayadre. Aduga makhoina hai, madu mahakki dutni. 

16 Tou-i-gumbasung Pitarna thong yei yeiduna leirammi, makhoina thong hangdoklabada, mahakpu uraduna ingak ngakle. 

17 Adubu mahakna makhoida tuminna leinanaba makhut khattuna, prabhuna mahakpu keisumsangdagi karamna chingthokpirakpa haiba adu makhoida lithokle. Aduga mahakna hai, waramsing asi Jakobta amasung ichin inaosingda tambiyu. Adudagi mahakna thokkhiduna atoppa mapham amada chatkhre. 

18 Nongngallakpada Pitarda kari thokkhibano haiduna lanmisinggi marakta yamna marang hounare. 

19 Aduga Herodna mahakpu thiduna phangdrabada, ngaksenbasingbu munna wayenduna, makhoibu hatnaba yathang pire. Adudagi mahakna Jihudi-yadagi Keisariyada kumthaduna, maduda phairammi. 

Herod Siba 

20 Amahiksung mahakna Tur amasung Sidon-gi misinggi mathakta yamna saorammi, aduga makhoina amata oina mahakki maphamda laklaga, ningthougi sanggai manung pannaba Blastbu makhoigi marup oihanduna, ingthanaba haijarammi, maramdi makhoigi lam adu ningthougi lamdagi yok-thak-pirammi. 

21 Amasung lepnaba numit amada Herodna ningthougi phijet setlagai phambanda phamduna, makhoida wari tourammi. 

22 Maduda mising aduna laorak-i, laigi khonjenni, migi natte. 

23 Aduga mahakna iswarbu thagattaba maramna khudak adumaktada prabhugi dutna mahakpu yeithure, aduga tinna chaduna mathawai thakhre. 

24 Tou-i-gumbasung iswargi wapao chaokhatlammi, amasung hengatlammi. 

25 Aduga Barnabaga Solgana makhoigi thougan adu loiramlaga, mingthol Mark Kouba Johanbu makhoiga loinana puraktuna Jerusalemdagi hallakle.

Pakhonchatpasinggi thabak 13 

Antiyokhidaya leiba singlup 

1 Amahiksung Antiyokhiyada leiba singlupta iswargi wa takthok pasing amasung tambibasing oiba Barnaba, Nigro kouba Sumiyon amasung Kurinigi Lukiya, aduga Herod ningthogi yokchaba manao Manahem amasung Sol leirammi. 

2 Amasung makhoina prabhuda thougan toujaduna chara hellingeida, thawai asengbana hai, Barnabaga Solgabu eina thabakki damak koure; matam aduna makhoibu eigi damak houjik khaidokpiyu. 

3 Matam aduda makhoina chara henduna haijaraga, makhoigi thakta khut thambirabada, makhoibu thakhre. 

Kuprada Barnabaga Solgana chatpa 

4 Asum touna makhoibu thawai asengbana thakhiduna, Selukiyada makhoina kumtharakle; aduga mapham adudagi Kupra tanna hi tonglakle. 

5 Amasung makhoina Salamida leibada, iswargi wapao Jihudisinggi loisang loisangda phongdokle. Aduga Johansu makhoigi pangbibagumna loinei. 

6 Amasung makhoina ithat apumba landuna Paphoda thunglabada, kanagumba angakpa mahei touba, iswargi wa takthoksinnaba, maming Barjisu kouba Jihudi nipa amabu makhoina phangle. 

7 Mahakti ithat adugi mapu Sarjiya Polo kouba heisingba nipa aduga loinarammi. Ithatki mapu asina Barnabaga Solgabu kouduna, iswargi wapao tananaba hotnare. 

8 Tou-i-gumbasung Eluma, angakpa mahei touba aduna (maramdi mahakki maming handokpada asum oibani), makhoibu maioknaduna ithat adugi mapu adubu thajaba adudagi leithokhannaba pambei thirammi. 

9 Adubu Polsu kouba Solna thawai asengbana thalladuna, mangonda sangtrik yengduna hai, 

10 He marei mara amasung lounam pumnamakna thallaba, diyabolgi macha nipa oiba, dharmachenba punmamkki yeknaba nang, nahakna prabhugi achumba Iambi adubu serannahanba tokloidra? 

11 Amasung houjik yeng-u, prabhugi khut nathakta lei, nang numit tagani aduga matam khara phaoba numit uroi. Aduga khudak adumaktada mangonda leichin amasung amambana kupsinkhre, amasung kana kanagumbana mabu khut samduna chingbinanaba koithi thirammi. 

12 Matam aduda mapu aduna thokkhiba adu urabada, prabhugi tambiba aduda ingak ngakladuna thajare. 

Pisidiyada leiba Antiyokhiyada Polgi paotak 

13 Amahiksung Polga mahakki loinabasinggana Paphodagi hi tonglaktuna, Pamphuliyagi Pargada kakhatle; amasung Johanna makhoidagi khainaraktuna Jerusalemda hallakle. 

14 Tou-i-gumbasung makhoina Pargadagi lallaktuna Pisidiyagi Antiyokhiyada thunglare; aduga makhoina potthaba numitta loisangda changduna phamle. 

15 Aduga iswargi wayel amasung wa takthokpasinggi lairik pabagi matungda loisanggi wayel thoudaba mapusingna makhoida tharaktuna hai, he ichin inaosa, misinggi damak thoujinba wa karigumba nakhoigi leirabadi, haibiyu. 

16 Maduda Polna lepkhatle, aduga makhut khattuna hai: He Israyelgi nipasing amasung iswarbu kibasing, tabiyu. 

17 Israyel mising asigi iswarna eikhoigi ipa ipusingbu khandokpire, amasung makhoina Misor leibakta lamlanba oiringeida, mising asibu chaokhathanbire, amasung makhoibu mapham adudagi ibungo mahakna pambom tingkhattuna chingthokpirakle. 

18 Amasung chahi niphuromgi matam phaoba ibungo mahakna lamjaoda makhoibu mapagumna yokpi-senbire. 

19 Aduga ibungo mahakna Kahan leibakta leiba jat taretpu manghallaga, makhoigi leibak adu makhoigi oinanaba, cahahi chamari yangkheirom phaoba ibungo mahakna pibire. 

20 Amasung asigi matungda iswargi wa takthokpa Samuyel phaoba ibungo mahakna wayel mapusingbu pibire. 

21 Adudagi makhoina ningthou nijare, aduga iswarna makhoida Benyamingi salaigi mi, Kiski macha nipa Solbu chahi niphugi damak pibire. 

22 Aduga ibungo mahakna mahakpu hongdoktuna makhoigi ningthou oinanaba Dayudpu thokhanbire; mahakki damak ibungo mahakna Sakshisu piduna hai, eina Jisaigi macha nipa Dayud, eigi pukning taba nipa ama phangle, mahakna eigi ningba pumnamak tougani. 

23 Nipa asigi dharadagi iswarna pigani waleppa matung inna Israyelda kanbiba mapu Jisubu pubirakle. 

24 Ibungosi phongdoktringeida Johanna Israyelgi mising pumnamakta pukning hongbagi baptais touba hanna sandokpire. 

25 Aduga Johanna mahakki mathou loiramdaida hai, eibu kanani haina nakhoina ningbage? Eidi ibungodu natte, tou-i-gumbasung yeng-u, eigi tungda lengbirakpa ibungo adugi khonggi khugrang louthokpa ei itik chade. 

26 Ichin inao, Abrahamgi imunggi machasa amasung nakhoigi narakta iswarbu kibasa, aran khubam asigi wapao eikhoida thabirakle. 

27 Maramdi Jerusalemda leibasingga makhoigi wayel thoudabasinggana ibungobu amasung potthaba numit khudingda paba iswargi wa takthokpasinggi khonjel adubu khangdabagi maramna, ibungobu maran theijinduna wa adu thunghalle. 

28 Amasung makhoina hatnaba maram ibungoda phangdrabasu, ibungobu hatnanaba makhoida Pilatki maphamda nijare. 

29 Aduga ibungogi maramda ikhiba pumnamak adu makhoina thunghallabada, ibungobu udagi puthaduna, mongphamda thamle. 

30 Adubu iswarna ibungobu asibasinggi marktagi hinggatpire; 

31 Aduga ibungoga loinana Galildagi Jerusalem tanna kamirmarakpasingda ibungona numit kuina unhanbire, houjik makhoi asina misingda ibungogi sakshi oiri. 

32 Amasung ipa ipusingda walepkhibagi aphaba wapao adu eikhoina nakhoida pubirak-i, 

33 Haibadi, iswarna Jisubu thokhanbiduna, eikhoigi ichasingda madumak thunghanbire; asigumnasu anisuba iseida ikhre, nahakti eigi icha nipani, ngasi eina nahakpu pokipirabani. 

34 Aduga ibungo mahakna ibungobu asibasinggi maraktagi hinggatpire, amasung ibungona amangbada amuk hallaroi haibagi marida, ibungo mahakna asumna haire, eina nakhoida Dayudki asengba, thajaba matik oiba adu pibigani. 

35 Maramdi mahakna atei iseidasu hai, ibungo nahakki asengba mahak adubu ibungo nahakna amangba uhanbiroi. 

36 Maramdi Dayudna mahaktakta iswargi wakhal adugi thougan touramlaga, tumsu tumkhre, mapasinggi manaktasu thamkhre, aduga amangba ure. 

37 Adubu iswarna hinggatpiraba ibungodudi amangba ude. 

38 Maram aduna, ichin inaosa, masi nakhoina khangbiyu, haibadi, ibungo asigi mapanna pap kokpiba nakhoida sandokchabani. 

39 Amasung Mousigi wayel yathang adugi mapanna nakhoibu chumhanbiba ngamdaba, pumnamak adudagi ibungosigi mapanna thajaba mi khudingbu chumhanbi. 

40 Maram aduna iswargi wa takthokpasinggi lairikta haikhiba adu nakhoigi nathakta tadananaba cheksillu, haibadi: 

41 Yeng-u, he thouoidabasa, ngaksu ngak-u, mangsu mang-u; maramdi nakhoigi haktakta eina thabak ama tou-i; kanagumba nakhoida thabak adu takpirabadi, nakhoina suptha thajaroi. 

42 Amahiksung makhoina thoklaklingeida, waheising asi ollakpa potthaba numitta makhoida habinanaba makhoina nijarammi. 

43 Aduga loisanggi kanglup adu kainarabada; Jihudisingsu Jihudi dharma louba iswar ningbasingsu ayambana Pol amasung Barnabagi tung ille; makhoina makhoiga ngangnaduna iswargi thoujanda chetna leinanaba makhoibu insinbirammi. 

Pakhonchatpasingna atoppa Jatsingda, mai onkhiba 

44 Aduga ollakpa potthaba numit aduda sahar apumbamuk iswargi wapao adu tananaba tinnare. 

45 Tou-i-gumbasung Jihudisingna miyamsing: adu urabada, kallakpana thalladuna, Polna haiba wa adu khetsu khettok-i, thinasu ngangnei. 

46 Maduda Polga Barnabagana thouna phana ngangduna hai, nakhoida hanna iswargi wa adu haigadabamakni. Madu nakhoina nakhoidagi inthoktuna lomba naidaba hingba phangba matik chade haina nasana khanjaba maramna, yeng-u, eikhoidi atoppa jatsingda chatlabani. 

47 Maramdi Prabhuna asumna eikhoida yathang pire, nahakna prithibigi aroiba mapham, phaoba aran khubam oinanaba, eina nahakpu atoppa jatsinggi mangan oinanaba thamle. 

48 Aduga atoppa jatsingna asi tara-bada, haraosu haraorammi, iswargi wapaobusu thagathunmi; amasung lomba naidana hingnabada khangatpiraba makheina thajare. 

49 Aduga prabhugi wapao adu lam apumbada sinthunglammi. 

50 Tou-i-gumbasung ikaikhumnabi, iswar ningbi nupisingbu amasung sahar adugi athoiba nipasingbu Jihudisingna thoujinduna, Polga Barnabagagi mathakta otneinanaba wa thokhallaga, makhoigi lamdagi tanthokkhre. 

51 Adudagi makhoina makhoigi mathakta sakshi oina khonggi uphul kanthoktuna Ikoniya tanna lakle. 

52 Aduga seboksingdu haraobaga thawai asengbagena thallammi.

Pakhonchatpasinggi thabak 14 

Polga Barnabagana Ikoniyada chatpa 

1 Amahiksung Ikoniyada asum thoklare, makhoi ani changminnaduna Jihudisinggi loisangda asumna ngangthoklabada, Jihudisinggisu Griksinggisu miyam yamna thajare. 

2 Tou-i-gumbasung thajadaba Jihudisingna atoppa jatsinggi pukning thoudongduna, machin manaosinggi mathakta phattaba oihalle. 

3 Maram aduna makhoina prabhugi mapanna thouna phana ngangduna maduda matam kuina leire; makhoigi khutna khudamsing amasung angak angakpa touhahbiduna ibungogi thoujan-gi wapaoda ibungona sakshi pibire. 

4 Tou-i-gumbasung sahar adugi miyamna khainare; aduga kharana Jihudisinggi amasung kharana pakhonchatpasinggi michang oire. 

5 Amasung makhoigi wayel thoudabasingga loinana atoppa jatsingna amasung Jihudisingna makhoibu chophannanaba aduga nungna thananaba marang hourabada, 

6 Makhoina madu khanglakladuna, Lukayoniyagi sahar Lustraga Darbigada amasung akoiba lam lamda chellakle; 

7 Aduga maduda makhoina aphaba wapao sandoklammi. 

Lustrada leiba amasung Antiyokhiyada Hallakpa 

8 Amahiksung Lustrada makhong soiba, mama-puknungdagi makhong teklaba, chapta khak ngamdaba kanagumba nipa ama phamlammi. 

9 Nipa asina Polna hairiba adu taringeida, Polna mangonda sangtrik yengduna phahanbinanaba mahakki thajaba leiba adu ubada, 

10 Khonjel laona hai, nakhong chumna lepkhatlu. Maduda mahakna chongkhattuna koichat chatlak-i. 

11 Amasung Polna toukhiba adu miyamsingna urabada, Lukayoniyagi maronna, laisingna mioibagi masak louduna eikhoida lengthabirakle haiduna, khonjel wangna laokhatlak-i. 

12 Aduga makhoina Barnababu Jupitar, amasung Polbuna, mahakna wa ngangbagi makok oibagi maramna, Markuri kouba houre. 

13 Amasung Jupitargi laisang sahargi mamangda leiba adugi purohitna sallabasing amasung leipareng panthongda puraktuna, miyamsingga loinana latkadoure. 

14 Tou-i-gumbasung pakhonchatpasing adu, haibadi Barnaba amasung Polna madu tarabada makhoigi maphi segaiduna miyamgi marakta chongsinkhiduna laorak-i, 

15 Ibungokhoi, nakhoina thabaksing asi karigi touribage? Eikhoisu nakhoiga hounasa mannaba mi oibani. Nakhoina aremba thabaksing asidagi hingliba iswarda ollaknanaba, aphaba wapao eikhoina nakhoida pubirakpani. Ibungo mahakna swarga, prithibi, samadru amasung pumnamak asigi manungda leiriba makhei sembire. 

16 Houkhi houkhiba mironda ibungo mahakna jat pumnamakpu maning makha tamna chatnanaba yabire. 

17 Adum oinamakpu ibungo mahakki sakshi leitaduna thanamde, haibadi, ibungo mahakna aphaba toubiduna atiyadagi nong amasung mahei marong pannaba makum matha pibire, aduna achapotka haraobagana nakhoigi pukning pelhanbire. 

18 Aduga asi haiduna makhoida latkadabadagi miyamsingbu makhoina wana khamjille. 

19 Tou-i-gumbasung Antiyokhiya amasung Ikoniyadagi Jihudisingna mapham aduda lakle, aduga makhoina miyamsingbu thoujinduna, Polbu nungna tharaga, mahak sire haina ningduna, sahargi mapanda mahakpu chingthoklammi. 

20 Adubu seboksingna mahakki akoibada leplingeida, mahakna hougattuna, saharda changle; aduga hayeng-gumba aduda Barnabaga loinana Darbi tanna chatkhre. 

21 Amasung makhoina sahar aduda Aphaba wapao sandoktuna ayamba sebok semlaga, Lustra, Ikoniya, amasung Antiyokhiyada hallakle. 

22 Mapham khuding asida seboksinggi pukning chethanbiduna, thajabada ittattattana leinanaba makhoibu thoujinbiraga, ayamba awa anangga loinana eikhoina iswargi leibakta changba tare haina takpire. 

23 Amasung makhoina makhoigi damak singlup khudingda ahallamansing khandokpibada, chara henbaga loinana haijabiduna, makhoina thajaraba prabhuda makhoibu sinnabire. 

24 Aduga makhoina Pisidiya phaoraktuna Pamphuliyada lakle. 

25 Amasung Pargada makhoina wapao hairamlaga, Attaliyada kumthare. 

26 Adudagi makhoina loirakpa thabak adugidamak iswargi thoujanda makhoibu sinnakhiba mapham, Antiyokhiya tanna hi tonglakle. 

27 Amasung makhoina thunglabada singlup khomjinduna, iswarna makhoiga loinana toubikhiba thabak pumnamak amasung atoppa jatsingda ibungo mahakna thajabagi thong hangbire haiba makhoina makhoida libirammi. 

28 Aduga makhoina seboksingga loinana matam kuina leiminnarammi.

Pakhonchatpasinggi thabak 15 

Atoppa Jatki khristansing amasung mousigi wayel yathang 

1 Amahiksung Jihndiyadagi kana kanagumba misingna kumtharaktuna, Mousigi hounabi matung innan un kaktrabadi, nakhoina aran khubam phangba ngamloi, haiduna machin manaosingda makhoina tambiraki. 

2 Maduda Polga Barnabagana makhoiga yamna ningai tounaduna wa yetnarabada, wa yetnaba asigi maramda Pol, Barnaba amasung makhoigi maraktagi atei kana kanagumbabu pakhonchatpasing amasung ahallamansingda Jerusalem tanna kanaba khandokle. 

3 Maram aduna singlupna makhoibu lambida thillaktuna, atoppa jatsingna pukning hongba adu lira liraduna makhoina Pheinikiya amasung Samariya lallakle, aduga machin manaosing pumnamakpu yamna haraohallammi. 

4 Amasung makhoina Jerusalemda thunglarabada, singlup, pakhonchatpasing amasung ahallamansingna makhoibu lousinbire, aduga iswarna makhoiga loinana toubikhiba thabak punmamak makhoina libire. 

5 Tou-i-gumbasung makhoi un kakpa tare, amasung Mousigi wayel yathang adu ngaknanaba makhoida yathang piba tare haiduna thajaraba Pbarisisinggi Khutpudagi kharana hougatle. 

Jerusalemda tinnaba 

6 Maduda pakhonchatpasingga ahallamansinggana wa asgi maramda tananaba tinnare. 

7 Aduga yamna wa yetnarabada, Pitarna hougattuna makhoida hai, He ichin inaosa, attoppa jat singna eigi chindagi aphaba wapao taraga thajanaba, mamangngeida iswarna nakhoigi naraktagi eibu khandokpire haiba nakhoina khang-i. 

8 Aduga pukningbu khangbiba iswarna eikhoida toubikhiba adugumna makhoidasu thawai asengba pibiduna, makhoida sakshi pibire. 

9 Amasung thajabagi mapanna makhoigi pukning sengdokpiduna, ibungo mahakna eikhoiga makhoigagi marakta karisu tonganba leihande. 

10 Maran aduna houjik eikhoigi ipa ipusingnasu eikhoinasu puba ngamdaba popubu seboksinggi mangakta nakhoina thonggattuna, iswarbu karigi chang yenglibano? 

11 Tou-i-gumbasting prabhu Jisugi thoujanna makhoiga mannana eikhoisu aran khubam phanggani haiba eikhoina thajei. 

12 Maduda miyam pumnamakna tuminna leire; aduga Barnabaga Polgagi mapanna atoppa jatsinggi marakta iswarna khudamsing amasung angak angakpa toukhiba adu makhoi anina lithokpiba makhoina tarammi. 

13 Amasung makhoina tuminna leiraba matungda Jakobna khumlak-i. He ichin inaosa, eigi wa tabiyu: 

14 Iswarna ibungo mahakki minggi damak atoppa jatsingdagi mi khutpu ama louthoknanaba ahanbada karamna mityeng tabikhiba adu Sumiyonna lithokpire. 

15 Amasung asidi iswargi wa takthokpasinggi waga mannei; asumna ire, 

16 Thabaksing asigi matungda eina hallakkani, aduga Dayudki tukhraba phijang adu eina amuk sagani; amasung madugi mangkhraba adu eina amuk sagani; aduga eina madu chumkhatkani, 

17 Lemhouba misingna amasung eigi ming louraba atoppa jatsing pumnamakna prabhubu thinanabani haiduna 

18 Ahanbadagi hiramsing asi khanghanbiba prabhuna hai. 

19 Maram aduna eina khanjabani, atoppa jatsinggi maraktagi iswarna onsillakpa makhoi adubu eikhoina wahanganusi; 

20 Adubu makhoina laida katluraba sengdaba pot, marumbi, lakhattuna siba sa, amasung i chaba pumnamak asidagi lapthoknaba eikhoina makhoida ikhisi. 

21 Maramdi mamangngeidagi houna sahar saharda Mousigi yam lairiksingdu sandokpa mising leiduna madu potthaba numit khudingda loisang sangda panarammi. 

Atoppa jatki Khristansingda iduna thakhiba 

22 Matam aduda makhoigi maraktagi machin manaosinggi marakta luchingbasingbu; maming Barsabba kouba Jihuda amasung Silabu, khandoktuna Pol amasung Barnabaga loinana Antiyokhiya tanna thananaba singlup apumbaga pakhonchatpasing amasung ahallamansinggana phagani ningle. 

23 Amasung asumna iduna makhoigi khutta thakhre: Eikhoi ichin inao, pakhonchatpasing amasung ahallamansingna Antiyokhiya, Suriya amasung Kilikiyada leiba atoppa jat ichin inaosinggi maphamda khurumjari. 

24 Eikhoina yathang pikhidaba mi kharana eikhoidagi chatkhiduna, nakhoigi pukning onna-teinahanduna, nakhoibu waheina olang onsaohalle haiba eikhoina tabagi maramna, 

25 Eikhoina pukning amata oiraduna misingbu khandoklaga, eikhoigi prabhu Jisu Khristagi minggi damak mathawai katthoklaba, 

26 Eikhoina channaraba Barnaba amasung Polga loinana makhoibu thaba phei ningle. 

27 Maram aduna eikhoina Jihudaga Silagabu thare; makhoi masanasu nakhoida waram asimak machinna takpiragani. 

28 Maramdi thoidokna kannaba potsing asi nattana henna lumba pot nakhoigi nathakta haptabana phei haiduna thawai asengbanasu, eikhoinasu ningle, 

29 Haibadi, laida katluraba pot, i chaba, lakhattuna sibs sa, amasung marumbi pumnamak asidagi nakhoina lapthokpa phei; nakhoi nasana pumnamak asidagi ngakcharabadi, nakhoigi aphaba oigani. Nakhoi yaiphaba oisanu. 

30 Asum touna makhoibu thadokpirabada, Antiyokhiya tanna kumtharakle; aduga miyambu khomjinduna, makhoina lairik adu pire. 

31 Amasung makhoina madu parabada, pukning thougatpibagi maramna haraojare. 

32 Aduga makhoi masana iswargi wa takthokpasu oiba Jihudaga Silagana machin manaosing adubu wahei ayambana thoujanbiduna, makhoibu pukning chethanbire. 

33 Matam khara makhoina leiramlaga, machin manaosing adudagi makhoibu tharakpasing adu tanna ingthana thadokpire. 

34 Tou-i-gumbasung Silana aduda leiba phei nin-gle). 

35 Tou-i-gumbasung Polga Barnabagana ayamba ateisinggasu loinana prabhugi wapao tambiduna amasung sandoktuna matam lellammi. 

Polga Barnabaga khainaba 

36 Amahiksung numit kharagi matungda Polna Barnabada hai, eikhoina prabhugi wapao sandoklamba sahar khudingda ichin inaosing karamna leiba, houjik amuk handuna yengusi. 

37 Aduga Barnabana Mark kouba Johanbasu makhoiga loinana puninglammi. 

38 Adubu makhoibu Pamphuliyadagi thadoklamlaga thabakta makhoiga loinana chatminnadaba mahak asibu makhoiga loinana puba aphaba natte haina Polna ninglammi. 

39 Asumna ningai thoknaduna, makhoi amaga amaga khainakhre, aduga Barnabana mahakka loinana Markpu puduna Kupra tanna hi tongkhi; 

40 Tou-i-gumbasung Polna Silabu khandokle, aduga machin manaosingna makhoibu prabhugi thoujanda sinnabiduna, makhoina chatthokkhre. 

41 Aduga mahakna singlup singluppu chethanbiduna Suriya amasung Kilikiya lallakle.

Pakhonchatpasinggi thabak 16 

Lustrada Timothiyana Polga tinnaba 

1 Adudagi mahakna Darbi amasung Lustradasu thunglare; aduga yengu, thajabi jihudi nupi amagi macha nipa, Timothiya kouba, kanagumba sebok ama maduda leirammi; mahakki mapadi Grik oirammi. 

2 Lustra amasung Ikoniyada leiba machin manaosingna mahak asigi maramda ningthina sakshi pirammi. 

3 Polna mahak asibu mahakka loinana chatminnaninglammi; aduna lam aduda leiba Jihudisinggi maramna mahakna mahakpu puduna, un kakpire, maramdi mahakki mapa Grikni haiba makhoi pumnamakna khanglammi. 

4 Amasung makhoina sahar saharda koina chatlakpada, Jerusalemda leiba pakhonchatpasing amasung ahallamansingna yanakhiba wa adu ngaknanaba makhoida makhoina pithoklammi. 

5 Asum touna singlupsing aduna thajabada kankhatlammi, amasung numit khuding masing hen-gatlammi. 

Troyada Polbu uhanbiba 

6 Amahiksung Esiyada wapao adu haidokpa thawai asengbana khambagi maramna, makhoina Phrugiya amasung Galatiyagi lam lallakle. 

7 Aduga makhoina Musiyaga maioknana laklabada, makhoina Bithuniya changnaba hotnarammi, aduga Jisugi thawaina yabidre. 

8 Aduna Musiyagi chidai oina chattuna, makhoina Kroya tanna kumthare. 

9 Amasung ahingda uhanbiba ama Polda utle: Makidoniyagi kanagumbi nipa amana leptuna mangonda nonjarak-i, Makidoniyada lanbiraktuna eikhoibu pangbiyu. 

10 Uhanbiba adu urabada, iswarna makhoida aphaba wapao sandoknaba eikhoibu koubire haiba khanglaktuna, khudak aduda eikhoina Makidoniyada chatnanaba thire. 

Polna Makidoniya lallaktuna Philippi tanna lakpa 

11 Maram aduna eikhoina Troyadagi hi tonglaktuna, lam chumdringna Samothaki tanna amasung matung nongma aduda Niyapoli tanna, 

12 Amasung mapham adudagi eikhoi Philippi tanna lakle. Mapham asi Makidoniya, jilagi athoiba sahar amasung Romiyasingna loichallaba lam oirammi; amasung eikhoina sahar asida numit kayani marum phairammi. 

13 Aduga potthaba numitta eikhoina panthonggi mapanda torbanda haijanaba mapham lei haina ningduna, madu tanna chatthokle; aduga eikhoina phamthaduna, tillariba nupisingda tambiba houre. 

14 Amasung Thuyatira sahargi maming Ludiya koubi, memanba phi yonbi amasung iswarbu ningbi kanagumbi nupi amana tambibadu tarammi; Polna ngangthokpa wa adu pukning changna tananaba prabhuna mahakki thammoi hangdokpire. 

15 Aduga mahaksu mahakki imungsu baptais lourabada, mahakna nonjarak-i, ei prabhubu thajabini haina nakhoina khanbirabadi, eigi yumda lengsinbiduna leibiyu. Amasung mahakna eikhoibu kanna mahaijare. 

16 Amahiksung asum thoklare, eikhoina haijaba maphamda chatlingeida, kithum pubi kanagumbi minai leisabi ama eikhoiga oknare. Mana laibao takpagi mapanna magi mapusinggi yamna tongjaba oirammi. 

17 Leisabi asina Pol amasung eikhoigi tung illaktuna laothoklak-i, eikhoida aran khubamgi lambi sandokpiriba mising asi ihen henba iswargi manaisingni. 

18 Aduga mana matam kuina asi tourammi. Adubu Polna yamna nungaitaduna onsillaga, thawai aduda hai, mangondagi thoknanaba eina Jisu Khristagi mingda nangonda yathang piri. Maduda pung adumaktada thawai adu chatthokkhre. 

Polga Silagabu keisumsangda phaba amasung kanbiba 

19 Tou-i-gumbasung magi mapusingna makhoigi tongjabagi khudong chaba adu chatkhiba urabada, makhoina Polga Silagabu phaduna, keithen manungda mamangda chinglakle; 

20 Aduga makhoina makhoibu wayel mapusinggi maphamda puraklabada hai, mising asi Jihudini, makhoina eikhoigi sahar ilang langhalli; 

21 Amasung Romgi oiba eikhoina louba amasung ngakpada wayel kaiba hounabi sandok-i. 

22 Aduga miyamna makhoiga yeknaduna hougatle; amasung wayel mapusingna makhoigi maphi chingthokpiduna, makhoibu cheina phunaba yathang pirammi. 

23 Aduga makhoina makhoigi mathakta cheipham yamna naina phuraga, makhoibu keisumsangda phajinduna, cheksinna ngaknanaba keisumsang sangbada yathang pire. 

24 Mahakna asup kanba yathang phanglabada, makhoibu keisumsanggi manungchanba sarukta thamjindduna, makhoigi makhong ugi hang chansinbire. 

25 Tou-i-gumbasung ahing nongyai aduwaida Polga Silagana haijaduna iswarbu thagatchaba isei saklammi, aduga phadoksingna madu tarammi; 

26 Maduda khanghoudana kanna yuhararaktuna keisumsanggi yumpham ani nikle; aduga khudak aduda thong pumnamaksu hangdokle, mi khudinggi punba adusu thokle. 

27 Aduga keisumsang sangba aduna tumba khanghou hougattuna keisumsanggi thong pumba hangdokpa urabada, phadoksing chenthokkhre ningduna, mahakki kabakthang satlaga mathantabu hatchagadoure. 

28 Tou-i-gumbasung Polna khonjel wangna laorak-i, nasa nathantabu mangjanaba khak touganu, maramdi eikhoi pumnamak asida leiri. 

29 Maduda keisumsang sangba aduna thaomei niraga chongsillakle, aduga kibana thak thak nikladuna Polga Silagagi mangda tuthare; 

30 Amasung mahakna makhoibu puthoktuna hai, ibungosing, aran khubam phangnanaba eina kari toujaba tabage? 

31 Maduda makhoina hai, prabhu Jisubu thajou, aduga nahaksu nahakki imungsu aran khubam phanggani. 

32 Aduga makhoina mangondasu mahakki yumda leiminnaba pumnamaktasu prabhugi wapao takpire. 

33 Amasung ahing adugi pung adumaktada mahakna makhoibu puduna makoigi cheipham adu chamthokpire, aduga khudak adumaktada mahaksu mahakki mi pumnamaksu baptais loure. 

34 Adudagi mahakna makhoibu mahakki yum manungda pukhatpiraga, makhoigi mangda chanaba pot khinbire, aduga iswarda thajaraduna mahakki imung pumnamakka loinana yamna haraorammi. 

35 Tou-i-gumbasung nongngallabada, wayel mapusingna dolaipabasingbu tharaktuna hai, mising adubu thadoku. 

36 Aduga keisumsang sangbana Polda pao adu tamlak-i, wayel mapusingna nakhoibu thadoknanaba tharakle; maram aduna houjikti lengthokpiraktuna ingthana chatpikhro. 

37 Tou-i-gumbasung Polna makhoida hai, wayel itou toudana Romgi oiba eikhoibu misinggi mangda makhoina phuduna, keisumsangda phajinbire, aduga houjikti makhoina eikhoibu lonna tanthokkadra? Khak yaningde; adubu makhoi masamakna laktuna eikhoibu puthoksanu. 

38 Maduda dolaipabasing aduna wayel mapusingda wapao asi tamlabada, makhoi Romgi mini haiba taraga makhoina kire; amasung makhoina laktuna makhoida nonjare. 

39 Aduga makhoina makhoibu puthokpiraga, sahar adudagi chatthoknanaba haijarammi. 

40 Adudagi makhoina keisumsangdagi thokkhiduna, Ludiyagida changle; Aduga makhoina machin manaosingbu unarabada, makhoibu thoujinbiduna chatthokkhre.

Pakhonchatpasinggi thabak 17 

Thesalonikada chatpa 

1 Amahiksung makhoina Amphipoli amasung Apoloniya phaoduna, Jihudisinggi loisang leiba Thesalonika tanna lakle. 

2 Aduga Polna mahakki hounabigumna, makhoida changsinkhiduna, potthaba numit ahumlak suna sastradagi makhoiga wakhal touminnarammi. 

3 Madu handokpiduna Khristana awa anang khanglaga asibasinggi maraktagi hinggatpa tare, amasung eina nakhoida sandokliba Jisu asi Khrista aduni haina sugaina takpirammi. 

4 Amasung makhoigi maraktagi khara, iswar ningba Griksingdagi miyam ayamba, aduga athoiba nupisingdagi ayambana thajaraduna Polga Silagada tinnajare. 

5 Tou-i-gumbasung Jihudisingna kallakle, amasung thounaidaba misinggi maraktagi kana kanagumba phattabasingbu kousinduna miyan khomjillage, sahar adu inin ninhallammi; aduga makhoina Jason-gi mayum namduna makhoibu miyamda puthoknanaba thirammi. 

6 Aduga makhoina makhoibu phangdrabada, Jason amasung kana kanagumba machin manaosingbu sahargi mapusinggi mangda chinglaktuna, laorei, taibangpanbabu mathak makha olhanba mising asina mapham asidasu lak-i; 

7 Makhoi asibu Jasonna lousille; amasung Jisu kouba ningthou atoppa ama lei haiduna makhoi pumnamak asina Keisargi yathanggi onna-teinana tau-i. 

8 Aduga miyamga sahar adugi mapusinggana waram asi tarabada, pukning marang houre. 

9 Amasung makhoina Jason amasung ateisingbu jaminda thadokkhre. 

Biroyada chatpa 

10 Adudagi machin manaosingna thindana Polga Silagabu ahingda Biroyada thakhre. Makhoina mapham aduda thunglabada, Jihudisinggi loisangda changle. 

11 Makhoi asinadi Thesalonikagi misingdagi henna machat phajei, maramdi makhoina wapao adu heiningna louduna, waramsing asi asum oibra haiduna numit khuding sastra munna thiranuni. 

12 Maram aduna makhoigi maraktagi ayambana amasung ikaikhumnabi Grik nupisingga nipasing ayambagana thajare. 

13 Tou-i-gumbasung Thesalonikagi Jihudisingna Polna Biroyadasu iswargi wa sandokle haiba khanglabada, makhoina laktuna, adudasu miyamsingbu thoudongduna wa thokhalle. 

14 Matam achumaktada thindana machin manao-singna Polbu samadru phaoba chatananaba thakhre, aduga Silaga Timothiyagana maduda adum leihoure. 

15 Tou-i-gumbasung thillakpasingna Polbu Athinai phaoba pubirakle; aduga Silaga Timothiyagana mangonda thuna yangna laknanaba, makhoina ya-thang phangduna chatkhre. 

Polna Athinaida leiba amasung Areyopagaski mayaida sandokpa 

16 Amahiksung Polna Athinaida makhoigi damak ngairingeida, mahakna sahar adu lai murttina thanba uraduna mahakki thawai nungngaitre. 

17 Maram aduna mahakna loisangda Jihudisingga, iswar ningba misingga amasung keithenda numit khuding mahakka oknabasingga wakhal touminnarammi. 

18 Amukka Epikureya amasung Stoyikki mehei masin heiba mising kharana mahakka ningai tounarammi. Amasung mi kharana hai, pet pet ngangba asina kari haining-bano? A teisingna hai, mahakna mireibakki laisingbu sandokpa migununi; maramdi mahakna Jisugi amasung hinggatpagi wapao sandoklammi. 

19 Aduga makhoina mahakpu paiduna Areyopagasta puraktuna hai, nahakna takpiriba anouba tambiba asi karino eikhoina khangjaba yabra? 

20 Maramdi nahakna eikhoigi nakongda karigumba atoppa wa tahanbi; maram aduna wasing asi karino haiba eikhoi khangjaning-i. 

21 (Maramdi Athinaigi misingna amasung mapham aduda leiramba lamlallakpasingna karigumba anou anouba wa haiba nattraga taba nattana, atei kari amatasu toudana matam lellammi.) 

22 Maduda Polna Areyopagaski mayaida lepladuna hai: He Athinaigi misa, maram pumnamakta nakhoi yamna lai-ningba mini haiba eina ui. 

23 Maramdi eina asum koiduna, nakhoigi lainingbagi mapham mapham adu yengbada, khangdaba laida haina latnapung amagi mathakta iba adusu ure. Maram aduna nakhoina khangdana latliba asi eina nakhoida sandokpani. 

24 Taibangpanbu amasung madugi manungda leiba pot pumnamakpu semba aduna, swarga amasung prithibigi prabhu oibanina, khutna saba laisangda leite; 

25 Aduga ibungo mahakki karigumba awatpa lei haiduna mioibagi khutna ibungogi thougan touba leite, maramdi ibungo mahakmakna pummamakta thawai, nungsaswar amasung pot pumnamak pibi. 

26 Amasung ibungo mahakna amatadagi jat khudingmakpu prithibigi leimai thungna leinanaba sembire, ibungo mahakna makhoigi areppa matam amasung leiphamgi ngmakhei lingkhatpire, 

27 Haibadi, karigumba matou ama oina makhoina iswarbu maduna phangjage haiduna thinannabani; adum oinamakpu eikhoi khudingmaktagi ibungo mahakti thapna leite. 

28 Maramdi ibungo mangonda eikhoigi hingba, lengotpa amasung panba phangjaribani; nakhoi nasengi warengbasinggi maraktagi kanagumbamaknasu asumna hai, maramdi eikhoidi ibungo mahakki macha masuni. 

29 Maram aduna eikhoina iswargi macha masu oibanina, iswar oiba adudi mioibagi mehei masingna amasung puksemna semjin-sajinba sana oirabasu, lupa oirabasu, nung oirabasu, adugumbani haiduna eikhoina ningphade. 

30 Maram aduna khanglamdabagi matam adu iswarna usinnaramde, adubu houjikti mapham khudingmakta mi pumnamak pukning hongnanaba ibungo mahakna yathang pibi, 

31 Maramdi ibungo mahakna khandokkhraba nipa amana taibangpanbabu achumbada wayengadaba numit ama thaduna thambire. Ibungo asibu asibasinggi maraktagi hinggatpiraba asina mi pumnamakta thajapham oinaba ibungo mahakna pibire. 

32 Maduda asibasingna hinggatpagi maram adu makhoina tabada, kharana noknarak-i, adubu kharanadi asigi maramda eikhoina amukka nangondagi tajagani. 

33 Asum touna Polna makhoigi maraktagi chatthokkhre. 34 Tou-i-gumbasung nipa kana kanagumbana mangonda chetna tinnaduna thajare. Thajabasinggi marakta Areyopagaski Diyonusiya, Damari koubi nupi ama amasung makhoiga loinana atei ateisingsu yaorammi.

Pakhonchatpasinggi thabak 18 

Polna Korinthada chatpa 

1 Asigi matungda mahakna Atbinaidagi chatthokkhiduna, Korin-thada lakle. 

2 Amasung mahakna kanagumba Jihudi Akula kouba, Pontagi mi ama, phangnare. Klodiyona Jihudi pumnamak Romdagi chatthoknaba yathang pibagi maramna, mahakki nupi Priskillaga loinana mahakna Italidagi lakpa kuidri; aduga Polna makhoida lakle; 

3 Amasung thabak mahakka chapmannaba maramna mahakna makhoiga leiminnaduna thabak tourammi; maramdi makhoina Phiyum sabagi thabak touba mising oirammi. 

4 Aduga mahakna potthaba numit khuding loisangda wa yetnaduna, Jihudising amasung Griksingbu thajanaba themlammi. 

5 Tou-i-gumbasung Silaga Timothiyagana Makidoniyadagi kumtharaklabada, Polna Jisudi Khristani haiba Jihudisingda sakshi piduna wapaoda pukning changlammi. 

6 Amasung makhoina maioknaduna thina nganglabada, mahakna maphi kanduna makhoida hai, nakhoigi i nakhoimakki kokthakta leijasanu! Eidi seng-i. Houjiktagi houna eidi atoppa jatsingda chatlage. 

7 Maduda mahakna adudagi hongkhiduna, kanagumba mi, Tita Justa kouba, iswarbu ningba amagi yumda changkhre; mahakki yum adu loisangga hek thangnana leirammi. 

8 Aduga loisanggi wayel thoudaba mapu Krispana mahakki imung pumnamakka loinana prabhubu thajare; amasung Korinthaki mi ayambana taduna thasu thajarammi, baptaissu lourammi. 

9 Aduga prabhuna ahingda Polda unhanbiduna hai, kiganu, haidok-u, tuminna leiganu; 

10 Maramdi eina nangga loinabiri, aduga mi kana amatana nangbu sok-panba touroi; maramdi sahar asida eigi mi yamna lei. 

11 Maduda mahakna makhoigi marakta iswargi wapao tambiduna chahi ama tha taruk leire. 

Gallioga Polga 

12 Tou-i-gumbasung Galliona Akhaigi mapu oiba matamda, Jihudisingna pukning amata oina Polgi mathakta houraktuna, mahakpu wayen-phambei mamangda puraktuna hai. 

13 Mi asina wayel yathangga onna-teinana iswarbu ningnanaba misingbu themmi. 

14 Adubu Polna maya kakhatkadourabada, Galliona Jihudisingda hai, karigumba aranba nattraga mireihatki wa leiramlabadi, he Jihudisa, waram adugi matung inna eina nakhoibu khangbigadabani. 

15 Tou-i-gumbasung wapao, mingsing amasung nakhoimakki wayel yathang adugi maramda wa yetnaba oirabadi, madu nakhoi nasenna yengjou; wasing asigi wayenba ei oiningde. 

16 Aduga mahakna makhoibu wayen-phambeidagi tanthokkhre. 

17 Maduda makhoi pumnamakna loisanggi wayel thoudaba mapu Sonthinibu phaduna, wayenphambei mamangda phurammi. Aduga Galliona thabak asigi maramda kari amata thouoibidre; 

Polna Suriyada hallakpa 

18 Amahiksung Polna aduda amuk numit yamna kuina leiraga, machin manaosingga khainaramduna, Priskilla amasung Akulaga loinana Suriya tanna hi tonglakle. Mahakki wasak ama leibagi maramna Kenkriyada maru kokthokle. 

19 Aduga makhoina Ephisada lakladuna mahakna makhoibu mapham aduda thanamle, adubu mahak masadi loisangda changkhiduna Jihudisingga wa yetnare. 

20 Amasung makhoina mahakpu maduda matam khara kuina leibinaba haijarabada, mahakna yabidre; 

21 Tou-i-gumbasung makhoiga khainaduna, iswarna ningbirabadi eina nakhoida amuk hanjarakkani hairaduna mahakna Ephisadagi hi tongkhre. 

22 Aduga mahakna Keisariyada thunglabada, kakhatkhiduna singluppu khurumjaruraga, Antiyokhiyada, mahakna kumtharakle. 

23 Amasung mahakna matam khara mapham aduda lellamlaga thoklakle, aduga Galatiya amasung Phrugiya leibak mathang mathang lallaktuna, seboksing pumnamakpu pukning chet-hanbirammi. 

Apollona Ephisada lakpa 

24 Amahiksung Apollo kouba, Aleksandriyagi kanagumba mahei heiba Jihudi nipa ama Ephisada lakle; aduga mahakti sastrada heisingba ama oirammi. 

25 Nipa asibu prabhugi lambigi maramda chinhaina tambikhibani; aduga mahakna thawai chakna Jisugi maramda ngangduna changkhonna tambirammi, adum oinamakpu mahakna Johanna baptais touba aduta makhang-i. 

26 Aduga mahakna loisangda thouna phana ngangba houre. Tou-i-gumbasung Priskilla amasung Akulana mahakki wa tarabada; makhoina mahakpu mayumda puduna, iswargi lambi adu henna cheksinna mangonda sugaina tambire. 

27 Amasung mahakna Akhai tanna lanthokninglabada, machin manaosingna thoujinbiduna mahakpu lousinbinanaba seboksingda ikhre. Aduga mahakna thunglabada, thoujan-gi mapanna thajarabasingbu yamna pangbire, 

28 Maramdi Jisudi Khrista aduni haiduna mahakna sastragi mapanna utpiduna, miyamgi mamangda Jihudisinggi wadu tasengna tubat kakthatpirammi.

Pakhonchatpasinggi thabak 19 

Baptais toubiba Johan-gi seboksing Ephisada unaba 

1 Amahiksung asum thoklare, Apolsingbu phangnare. 

2 Aduga mahakna makhoida hai, nakhoina thajabada thawai asengbabu phanglabra? Maduda makhoina mangonda hai, phangde, thawai asengba lei haiba eikhoina tasu tade. 

3 Aduga mahakna makhoinda hai, adu oirabadi, nakhoibu karida baptais toubibage? Maduda makhoina hai, Johan-gi baptais touba aduda. 

4 Aduga Polna hai, mahakki tungda lengbirakpa ibungobu, haibadi Jisubu thajagadabani haina Johanna misingda haiduna, pukning hongbagi baptais toubire. 

5 Amasung makhoina asi tarabada, prabhu Jisugi mingda baptais loure. 

6 Aduga Polna makhoigi thakta makhut thambirabada, thawai asengbana makhoigi thakta lakle; amasung makhoina atop atoppa lonna ngangduna iswargi wa tak-thoklak-i. 

7 Aduga makhoi pumnamak adu nipa taranithoirom oirammi. 

Polna Ephisada Tambiba 

8 Amahiksung mahakna loisangda changlaga, iswargi leibakki maramda wa yetnaduna amasung themduna tha ahum phaoba thouna phana tambiram-mi. 

9 Tou-i-gumbasung, makhoi kharana miyamgi mangda lambi adugi maramda phattaba ngangduna, nunggannaba amasung haiba indaba oirabada mahakna makhoidagi thoklaklaga, seboksingbu khaidoklaktuna, numit khudinggi Turannagi lairiksangda wa yetnarammi. 

10 Asi chahi ani phaoba asumna thokle; maram aduna Esiyada leiba pumnamak, Jihudisingsu Griksingsu prabhugi wapao tare. 

11 Amasung iswarna thoidokpa toungamdaba thabak Polgi khutna touhallammi; 

12 Asi phaoba touhalli, mahakki, hakchangdagi khudei oirabasu, phi oira-basu, anabasingda purakpada, makhoigi laina adu kok-i, amasung phattaba thawaisingna thokkhi. 

13 Tou-i-gumbasung pangkoi koiba Jihudising, mahei puba kharana, Polna sandokpa Jisu adubu sonduna nakhoibu yathang piri, haiduna phattaba thawaisingna changba misinggi mathakta prabhu Jisugi ming sonba hourakle. 

14 Aduga kanagumba Jihudigi athoiba purohit Skiwagi macha nipa taretna asi tourammi. 

15 Amasung phattaba thawai aduna makhoida khumlak-i, eina Jisu adubusu khang-i, Polbusu khang-i; adubu nakhoidi kanano? 

16 Aduga phattaba thawai changba mi aduna makhoida chongsillage, makhoibu khudum chanduna ngamle, aduna makhoina yum adudagi maphi maron yaodana amasung khogai thingairaba phangduna chenkhre. 

17 Amasung Ephisada leiba Jihudising amasung Griksing pumnamakna asi khanglakle; aduga makhoi pumnamakta akiba pokle, amasung prabhu Jisugi ming chaokhatlakle. 

18 Thajaraba makhoigi maraktagi ayambanasu laktuna makhoi makhoigi thabak haidokchaduna phongdokcharammi. 

19 Aduga angakpa mahei sijinnaba makhoi ayambana mak-hoigi lairik khomlaktuna mi pumnamakki mamangda mei tharammi; amasung makhoina madugi mamal masing thirabada, lupagi sel lising yangkhei oirammi. 

20 Asum touna prabhugi wa pao adu khutkan pangganna chaokhattuna kankhatlammi. 

Polgi khujil thourang 

21 Amahiksung thabaksing asi loiraba matungda, Polna Makidoniya amasung Akhai lallaklaga, Jerusalem tanna chatnaba mathawaina ningladuna hai, eina maduda youruraga, Romsu uba tai. 

22 Aduga mahakpu thougan toubiba, Timothiyaga Irastaga, makhoi anibu Makidoniyada thakhiduna, mahak masadi matam kharagi damak Esiyada leihoure. 

Ephisada wathokpa 

23 Matam aduwaida lambi adugi maramda yamna marang houre. 

24 Maramdi Dimitriya kouba kanagumba sana saba amana Diyanagi laisang maong lupana saduna khutsa heibasingda thabak yamna pirammi. 

25 Mahakna makhoibu amasung makhoiga mannaba thabak subasingbu khomjinduna hai, he ibungokhoi, thabak asigi mapanna eikhoina lan phang-i haiba nakhoina khang-i. 

26 Aduga khutna saba adu iswar natte haiduna Poi asina Ephisatadasu nattana Esiyagi ayamba mapham maphamda ayamba misingbu themduna lamchat onthokhalle haiba nakhoina ui amasung tai. 

27 Amasung eikhoigi thabak asigi mingchat mangtharakpa oigani haibata natte, Esiyaga taibangpanba pumnamakkana ningliba achouba lairembi Diyanagi laisangbusu kannadaba oihan-gani, ama-sung mahakki matik mangal adudagi hanthaba oihan-gani haibagi khudong thiba lei. 

28 Maduda makhoina asi tarabada, meihouna saoraduna laothoklak-i, Ephi-sasinggi Diyana achoubini. 

29 Aduga sahar adu chanei khaneinabana thalle; amasung langpheida Polga loinaba Makidoniyagi mi, Gaya amasung Aristarkhabu makhoina phaduna, pukning amata oina kummeisangda kanna chensille. 

30 Aduga Polna mising adugi marakta changninglabada seboksingna yadre. 

31 Amasung mahakki marupsing oiba Esiyagi angambasinggi marakta kana kanagumbana mangonda tharaktuna kummeisangda masak uhandananaba haijare. 

32 Maram aduna kharana wa ama, aduga kharana atoppa wa ama laorammi, maramdi miyam tinba adu chanei khaneinarammi; aduga tillaba ayambana kari maramgi tinabano khanglamde. 

33 Amasung makhoina Aleksandarbu miyamgi maraktagi puthoklakle, maramdi Jihudisingna mahakpu manglomda in-thoklakpani. Aduga Aleksandarna makhut khattuna ngangthokchanaba wa misingda haiba hotnarammi. 

34 Tou-i-gumbasung mahak Jihudini haiba makhoina khanglabada, pumnamakna pung anirom phaoba, Ephisasinggi Diyana achoubini, haina khonjel amata oina laorak-i. 

35 Maduda sahargi lairik subana miyam adubu tuminna leihanduna hai, he Ephisagi nipasa, Ephisasinggi sahardi Diyana achoubigi amasung Jupitardagi tarakpa murttigi laisang ngakpani haiba khangdaba mi kana leibage? 

36 Maram aduna wasing asi yadaba ngamdabanina nakhoina ingthana leiba amasung iphing phingna karisu toudaba tare. 

37 Maramdi laisangdagi hurandaba amasung eikhoigi lairembibu usittaba toudaba nipasing asibu nakhoina purakle. 

38 Maram aduna Dimitriya amasung mahakka loinaba khutsa heibasinggi wa kanagumba migi mathakta leirabadi, wayensang hangli, aduga leibakki mapusingsu leiri; makhoina amaga amaga hunnajasanu. 

39 Tou-i-guinbasung nakhoina atei atei wagi maramda karigumba thirabadi, wayel matung inna leibak tinbada loigadabani. 

40 Maramdi numit asigi maram leitaba wathok asigi maramda hunnaba eikhoigi khudong thibani, amasung masigi marida eikhoina pangtin tinnaba asigi maram piba ngamioi. 

41 Aduga mahakna asi haidoklaga, miyam tinba adu kaihankhre.

Pakhonchatpasinggi thabak 20 

Polna Makidoniya, Gris amasung Troyada chatpa 

1 Amahiksung ninnaba adu toklaba matungda, Polna seboksingbu kouduna thoujanbiraga, khainaduna Makidoniyada chatnanaba thokkhre. 

2 Aduga mahakna lamsing adomda chatlakpada, makhoibu yamna thoujanbiraga, Gristanna lakle. 

3 Amasung mahakna maduda tha ahum lellamlaga, Suriya tanna hi tongduna chatke touringeida Jihudisingna mahakpu yeknaduna sarou sinnaba thoklabada, mahakna Makidoniyalomda han-ge ningle. 

4 Aduga Biroyadagi Purhagi macha nipa Soptar Thesalonikasingdagi Aristarkha amasung Sikunda, Darbidagi Gaya, amasung Timothiya, aduga Esiyadagi tukhika amasung Tophima, makhoisi mahakka loinarammi. 

5 Adubu makhoi asina mang thakhiduna, Troyada eikhoibu ngairammi. 

6 Aduga hamei jaodaba tan-chak-khangba numit matungda eikhoina Philippidagi hi tonglaktuna, numit manganida Troyada makhoigi manakta thunglare; maduda eikhoi numit taretni phaire. 

Utukh 

7 Amahiksung chayon-gi ahanba numitta eikhoina tal thugainanaba tinnarabada, Polna hayeng sandokke ninglabada makhoibu tambi takpiduna mahakki wa ngangba adu ahing nongyai yourammi. 

8 Aduga eikhoina tinnaba mathak thangba ka aduda thaomei yamna thallammi. 

9 Amasung Utukh kouba kanagumba pakhang ama mihutthongda phamlammi; mahak tumningbana karma namtharammi. Aduga Polna tambi takpiba kuithakhibana mahak tumthakhiduna ahumsuba mathangdagi tare, amasung sina loukhatle. 

10 Maduda Polna kumthaduna mangonda nontharaga, konduna hai, nakhoi ninganu; maramdi mangonda mathawai leiri. 

11 Aduga mahakna kakhatlaga, tal thugaiduna charaga, makhoiga khara kuina, nongnganba phaoba ngangnaraga, asumna chatthokle. 

12 Amasung makhoina nipa macha adu hingna pukhre, aduga makhoigi harao nungaiba adu khajikta natkhidre. 

Polna Militada chatpa 

13 Tou-i-gumbasung eikhoina hi tanna hanna chattuna, Assa phaoba hi tongle; maduda Polbu tonghange ningbani, maramdi mahak masana khongna chatke haina asumna yathang pirammi. 

14 Aduga mahakna eikhoibu Assada oknarabada, eikhoina mahakpu tonghanduna, Mitulinida lakle. 

15 Adudagi hollaktuna, eikhoina matung nongma aduda Khiyagi mamangda thungle; aduga nini subada Samo soklamlaga, matung numit aduda Militada lakle. 

16 Maramdi Polna Esiyada matam lendananaba, Ephisa lanthokna hi asum honthanaba pukning leple; maramdi ngamlabadi, mahakna Pentekost numitta Jerusalemda leinanaba hathu hathu chatlammi. 

Militada Polna magi khaina-wa Ephisagi ahallamansingda haiba 

17 Amasung Militadagi Ephisada mi thakhiduna, singlupki ahallamansingbu mangonda kouhallakle.
