18 Aduga makhoina mangonda laklabada, mahakna makhoida hai: Eina Esiyada Khong-darakpa ahanba numittagi matam pumnamak nakhoiga loinana karamna leijaramba nakhoi nasana khangbi, 

19 Haibadi, eina pukning yamna nemjaba, pi taba, amasung Jihudisinggi sarou sinnaba maramna eingonda chang yengba thoklabaga loinana prabhugi thougan toujaduna; 

20 Iswarlomda pukning hongba amasung eikhoigi prabhu Jisu Khristaromda thajaba Jihudisingdasu Griksingdasu sakshi piduna, 

21 Karigumba kannagadaba wa nakhoida phongdokpadagi amasung miyam mamangdasu, yum yum khudingdasu nakhoibu tambibadagi karamna eina hanthadaba nakhoina khangbi. 

22 Aduga houjikti, yengbiyu, thawaina punduna ei Jerusalem tanna chatli; mapham aduda eingonda kari thokkadabano ei khangde. 

23 Asitadi khangjei, apunba amasung awa anangbana eibu ngaiduna lei haina thawai asengbana sahar khudingda eingonda sakshi pi. 

24 Tou-i-gumbasung eigi ithou amasung iswargi thoujan-gi aphaba wapaogi sakshi pinanaba, prabhu Jisudagi phangjaba thougan adu eina loijananaba, eigi thawai eingonda aruba oina ningjade. 

25 Aduga houjikti, yengbiyu, nakhoigi narakta eina iswargi leibak koisan sandoktuna chatlammi, adubu nakhoi pumnamakna eigi iral amuk hanna uraroi haiba ei isana khangjei. 

26 Maram aduna mi punmamakki igi maramda eigi iral leite haiba ngasidi eina nakhoida sakshi toujari. 

27 Maramdi iswargi ningba pumnamak nakhoida phongdokpadagi eina hanthajade. 

28 Ibungomakki ina leibikhraba iswargi singluppu yokthaklaba, nakhoi nasenda amasung sanggu pumnamak aduda pukning thingjillu; thawai asengbana nakhoibu sanggu adugi luchingbasing oihanbire. 

29 Eina chatthokkhraba matungda sanggubu khakpidaba, tamthiraba keisalsingna nakhoigi narakta changgani haiba eina khangi, 

30 Amasung nakhoi nasenmakki maraktagi makhoigi tung innaba sebok-singbu chingthoknanaba serannaba wa ngangba nipasing thorakkani. 

31 Maram adugi damak chahi ahum phaoba eina ahing nungthil pi tana mi khudingbu warakpa tokchade haiba ningsingbiduna nakhoina mitseng khangbiyu. 

32 Aduga houjik eina nakhoibu iswarda amasung ibungo mahakki thoujan-gi wada sinnajari; wa asina nakhoibu semgatpiba amasung sengdokpikhraba makhoi pumnamak adugi marakta phangpham thokpa adu nakhoida pibiba ngam-i. 

33 Eina mi kana amatagi lupa, sana, nattraga phirol karamba toujade. 

34 Ikhut ani asina eigi amasung eiga loinabasinggi kannagadaba adugi damak thougan toujare haina nakhoi nasana khang-i. 

35 Mrama pumnamakta eina nakhoida hounabi machat utpire, haibadi, adugum nomduna nakhoina asonbasingbu pangbiba amasung prabhu Jisugi wa adu ningsingba tare, maramdi ibungomakna haikhi, phangbabudi pibana henna yaiphabani. 

36 Asi hairaga, mahakna khuru khudak kulladuna makhoi pumnamakka loinana haijare. 

37 Aduga makhoi pumnamak yamna kaple amasung Polgi ngaksam konduna mahakpu chuplakle; 

38 Mahakki maithong amuk hanna makhoina uraroi haina mahakna haikhiba wa adugi damak thoidokna makhoina warammi. Adudagi makhoina mahakpu hi tanna thindoklakle.

Pakhonchatpasinggi thabak 21 

Militadagi Turda lakpa 

1 Amahiksung asum thoklare, eikhoina makhoidagi khainaduna hi tonglakpa, Kos tanna lambi chumdringna lakladuna, matung nongma aduda Rodada, aduga madudagi Patarada thungle; 

2 Amasung Pheinikiyada langadaba hi phangladuna, eikhoina madu tongkhatlaga hollakle. 

3 Aduga eikhoina Kupra urabada, madu oiromda thanamlaga, Suriyalomda hollaktuna. Turda kakhatle. 

4 Aduga seboksingbu phangnaraduna, numit taretni maduda phaire; makhoi asina thaWai asengbagi mapanna Pol Jerusalemda chattanaba wa hairammi. 

5 Amasung numit adu surabada asum thoklare, eikhoina thoklaktuna langphei sandoklakpada, makhoi pumnamak matu machasingga loinana eikhoibu sahar mapan phaoba thindokpirakle, aduga samadru mapanda khuru khudak kunduna haijaraga, eikhoi amaga amaga khaina-wa hainare; 

6 Aduga eikhoi hi tonglakle, makhoidi mayumda amuk hankhre. 

Keisariyada thunglaba 

7 Amahiksung eikhoina samadruda chatpa loiraduna, Turdagi Tolemayada thunglare; aduga eikhoina ichin inao-singbu khurumjaduna makhoiga loinana nongma phaire. 

8 Amasung hayenggumba aduda eikhoina thoklaktuna, Keisariyada lakle; aduga mi taret adugi maraktagi ama aphaba wapao sandokpa Philipki yumda changduna, mahakka leiminnare. 

9 Nipa asigi macha leisabi mari leirammi, makhoidu iswargi wa takthokpi orammi. 

10 Aduga eikhoina maduda numit khara phairingeida, Jihudiyadagi iswargi wa takthokpa kanagumba Agaba kouba ama kumtharakle. 

11 Amasung mahakna eikhoida laklaga Polgi khwangjet louduna, mahakna mahakki makhong makhut punjaraga hai, thawai asengbana asumna hai, khwangjet asigi mapuoiriba nipabu Jihudisingna Jerusalemda asumna pullaga, atoppa jatsinggi makhutta mahakpu pithokkani. 

12 Aduga eikhoina waramsing asi tarabada, eikhoinasu mapham adugi misingnasu mahak Jerusalemda kadanaba haijarammi. 

13 Matam aduda Polna khumlak-i, nakhoina kapliba amasung eigi thammoi thugaibiriba karigino? Maramdi prabhu Jisugi minggi damak Jerusalemda eibu punnanabata nattana sinanabasu eigi thourangni. 

14 Amasung mahakpu themba yadrabada, eikhoina toktuna hai, prabhugi ningba oibisanu. 

Jerusalemda thunglaba; Jihudigi khristansingbu themjin-khotchinnaba Polgi thourang 

15 Numitsing asigi matungda eikhoina potchei yomsillaga, Jerusalem tanna kaba houre. 

16 Aduga eikhoiga loinana Keisariyadagi seboksing kharasu chatminnei, makhoina eikhoibu thungnanaba mamangngeigi sebok, Kupragi kanagumba Manason-gi yumda purakle. 

17 Amahiksung eikhoina Jerusalemda thunglabada, ichin inaosingna haraona lousinbire. 

18 Amasung matunggi numit aduda Polna eikhoiga loinana Jakobkida changle; aduga ahallaman pumnamak yaorammi. 

19 Maduda mahakna thougan toujabadagi iswarna atoppa jatsinggi marakta toubikhiba thabak adu amamam oina mahakna lithoklammi. Aduga makhoina madu tarabada, iswarbu thagatle. 

20 Amasung makhoina mangonda hai, ichin inao, nahakna ubiri, Jihudisinggi marakta thajaraba mi lising kaya kaya leiri; aduga makhoi pumnamakna wayel yathang adugi damak mathawai luppi, 

21 Amasung makhoibu nahakki marida tamle, haibadi, nahakna atoppa jatsinggi marakta leiba Jihudising pumnamakta, makhoigi machasingbu ma-un kakkanu amasung hounabi matung inna chatkanu haiduna, makhoina Mousibu thadoknaba tambire. 

22 Maram asina kari tougadage? Maramdi nahak lakle haiba makhoina soidana taragani. 

23 Maram aduna eikhoina nangonda haiba asi toubiyu; makhoi masana wasakchaba eikhoigi nipa mari lei. 

24 Nipasing asibu puduna makhoiga loinana nahak nasa sengdokchou, aduga makhoina makhoigi maru kokthokchananaba, makhoigi damak chading toubiyu; amasung makhoida nahakki marida tamba wa adu achumba natte, adubu nahak nasanasu wayel yathang adu ngaktuna mathangsitna chatli haiba makhoi pumnamakna khanggani. 

25 Tou-i-gumbasung thajaraba atoppa jatsinggi maramda, laida katluraba pot, i chaba, lak-hattuna siba sa amasung marumbi, pumnamak asidagi makhoina masa mathantabu ngakchanaba, eikhoina wayel touduna ikhre. 

26 Maduda Polna nipasing adubu puduna matung nongma aduda makhoiga loinana masa sengdokcharaga, makhoi mi khudingmakki damak katnaba pot adu katchaba phaoba, sengdokpagi numit loigadaba khanghannaba, iswar ningnasangda mahakna changle. 

Jerusalanda wathokpa, amasung Polbu phaba 

27 Amahiksung numit taretni adu loiramdaida, Esiyadagi Jihudisingna mahakpu iswar ningnasangda urabada, miyam pumnamakpu thoudongduna mahakpu khutphangnana pharga laorak-i, 

28 He Israyelgi nipasa, pangbiyu! Mapham khudingda eikhoigi misingbu, wayel yathang adubu amasung mapham asibu yeknaduna mi pumnamakpu tambiba mi adu asini; aduga asidagi henna mahakna Griksingbusu iswar ningnasangda pusillaktuna asengba mapham asibu manghalle. 

29 Maramdi mamangngeida makhoina Ephisagi Trophimabu mahakka loinana saharda ukhi, aduga mahakpu Polna iswar ningnasangda pusillakle haiduna makhoina ninglammi. 

30 Aduga sahar apumba ilang langle, amasung misingna chensillaklaga, makhoina Polbu phaduna, iswar ningnasangdagi mahakpu chingthokkhre, amasung khudak aduda thong makhei thingjile. 

31 Amasung makhoina mahakpu hatnaba thiringeida, Jerusalem apumba marang houre haiduna, lanmi kanglupki athoiba luchingbagi maphamda pao pukhatlakle. 

32 Thunamak mahakna lanmising amasung chama chamagi luchingbasingbu puduna makhoi tanna chentharakle; maduda makhoina athoiba luchingba amasung lanmising adubu urabada, Polbu phuba tokle. 

33 Matam aduda athoiba luchingba aduna naksillaktuna mahakpu pharaga yotlhing-phalang anina punnaba yathang pire; aduga mahak kanano amasung mahakna kari toukhrabage hanglammi. 

34 Aduga miyam marakta kharana wa ama, kharana atoppa wa ama laorammi; amasung ninkhongba adugi maramna mahakna aoiba adu khangba ngamdrabada, mahakpu pallikorgi manungda pusinkho haiduna yathang pire. 

35 Aduga mahakna thakta kakhatlakpada, miyamna namthu hathuna toubagi maramna mahakpu lanmisingna thangduna purakpa tare; 

36 Maramdi mising mayam aduna, mabu puthokkhro haina laora laoraduna tung illammi. 

37 Amahiksung Polbu pallikorgi manungda pusillamdaida, mahakna athoiba luchingbada hai, nahakki naphamda eina karigumba wa haijaba yabra? Maduda mahakna hai, nang Grik lol khang-bra? 

38 Madu oirabadi, numit-sing asigi mamangda mihatpa nipa lising maribu thoudongduna lamjaoda chingthoklamba Misorgi mi adu nang nat-tabra? 

39 Adubu Polna hai, eidi Tarsa sahargi Jihudini, Kilikiya leibakki thoidokpa sahar adugi misingda wa hainaba eibu yabiyu haiduna eina nahakki naphamda nonjari. 

40 Amasung mahakna mahakpu yabirabada, Polna thak mathakta leptuna mising aduda makhut khatle; aduga yamna tuminna leirabada, mahakna Ibriya londa ngangduna makhdida hairak-i.

Pakhonchatpasinggi thabak 22 

Jihudisingda Polna ngangba wa 

1 Ichin inao amasung ipa itonsa, eina houjik nakhoigi naphamda eigi ngakthokchanaba wa haiba tabiyu. 

2 Aduga mahakna, makhoida Ibriya lol ngangba adu makhoina tarabada, henna tuminna leire. Maduda mahakna hai: 

3 Eidi Jihudi nipa, Kilikiyagi Tarsada pokpani, adubu sahar asida Gamaliyelgi khuyada chaorakpani, eikhoigi ipa ipusinggi wayel yathang adu chetna ngakpa matung inna tamjarakpani, aduga nakhoi pumnamakna ngasi toubagumna, einasu iswargi damak ithawai luppani. 

4 Aduga nipasingbusu nupissingbusu pullaga keisumsangda pithoktuna, makhoi siba phaoba lambi asibu eina otneikhi. 

5 Asigi maramda purohitlennasu ahallup apumbanasu eigi sakshini. Makhoidagi eina ichin inaosingda pinanaba lairik phangduna, Damesakta leiriba makhoibusu dandi tounanaba, amasung punduna Jerusalem tana puraknaba eina maduda chatle. 

6 Aduga eina asum chattuna Damesakta naksillakpada asum tholdare, numit yungba aduwaida, khanghoudana eigi akoibada swargadagi achouba mangal amana ngalle. 

7 Amasung ei leipakta ture, aduga khonjel amana eingonda, Sol, Sol, nangna eibu karigi otneiribage haiba eina tare. 

8 Maduda eina khumle, ibungo nahak kanano, prabhu? Aduga ibungona eingonda hai, eidi nangna ot-neiriba Nasaretki Jisuni. 

9 Amasung eiga loinabasingna mangal adudi ure, adudu eingonda ngangba ibungogi khonjel adudi makhoina tade. 

10 Aduga eina hai, eina kari toujagadage, prabhu? Maduda prabhuna eingonda hai, hougattuna Dammesakta chang-u, amasung mapham aduda nangna tounabagi damak langbikhraba thabak pumnamakki maramda nangonda takpigani. 

11 Adudagi mangal adugi arangbana eina uba ngamdrabada, eiga loinabasingna ikhut sambiduna, asumna eina Dammesakta lakle. 

12 Aduga mapham aduda leiba Jihudising pumnamakna ngangnaraba, wayel yathang adugi matung inna laining chetpa Ananiya kouba kanagumba nipa ama eingonda laklaga, 

13 Inakta lepladuna eingonda hai, ichin inao Sol, nahak uba phangjaro. Aduga pung adumaktada ei uba phangjaduna mangonda yengkhatle. 

14 Maduda mahakna hai, eikhoigi ipa ipusinggi iswar aduna nahakpu ibungo mahakki ningba khangnaba, dharma-chenba ibungo adubu unaba, amasung ibungogi chindigi khonjel tanaba khan-dokpire; 

15 Maramdi nahakna mi pumnamakki mamangda ibungogi damak nahakna ukhraba amasung takhraba adugi sakshi oigani. 

16 Aduga houjik nahak karigi thillibano? Hougatlo, ibungogi ming sonduna baptais loujaro, amasung napap chamthokcharo. 

17 Amasung asum thoklare, eina Jerusalemda hallaklaga, iswar ningnasangda haijaringeida, eingonda samadhigi phibam oiraktuna, 

18 Thuro, Jerusalemdagi thuna chatthoklo, maramdi eigi maramda nahakki sakshi makhoina loubiroi, haiduna eingonda haiba ibungobu ure. 

19 Maduda eina hai, prabhu, makhoi masana khangbani, eina loisang khudingda ibungobu thajabasingbu keisumsangdasu thamlammi aduga phusu phurammi. 

20 Aduga ibungogi sakshi Stiphan-gi i thokhanba matamda, eimak-su manakta lepsu leplamba yasu yaramba amasung mahakpu hatpasinggi maphi marol ngakpiba oirammi. 

21 Amasung ibungona eingonda hai, chatthoklo; maramdi eina nangbu asidagi thapna atoppa jatsingda thagani. 

Polna math Romgi mini haina dabi touba 

22 Amahiksung makhoina mahakki wa asi phaoba tarammi; Aduga makhoigi khonjel laona hai, asigumba mibu prithibidagi puthokkhro! Maramdi maliak hingba matik chade. 

23 Amasung makhoina laosu laoba, maphi maronsu louthokpa amasung atiyaromda uphulsu chaikhatpa tourabada, 

24 Athoiba luchingba aduna magi mathakta makhoina asup Laoba maram adu khangnanaba, mabu phuduna hangnaba yathang piduna, mabu pallikor da pusinkho haina yathang pire. 

25 Amasung makhoina mahakpu sa-un marina pullabada, Polna manakta lepliba lanmi chamagi mapu aduda hai, Romgi mibu wayel toudana phuba nakhoigi wayella? 

26 Aduga chamagi mapu aduna madu tarabada, mahakna athoiba luchingba aduda chatkhiduna tamlak-i, nahak kari tougadouribage? Maramdi mi asi Romgi mini. 

27 Maduda athoiba luchingba aduna laklaga mangonda hai, eingonda tammu, nang Romgi mira? Aduga mahakna hai, mani. 

28 Maduda athoiba luchingba aduna khumle, mamal yamna piduna eina Romgi mi oiba asi phangle. 

29 Aduga Polna hai, adubu eidi Romgi mi oina pokpani. Maram aduna mangonda hanggadouribasing aduna khudak aduda mangondagi thaptokkhre; aduga athoiba luchingba adunasu mahak Romgi mini haiba khanglabada, mahakna mahakpu pullubagi maramna kire. 

Athoiba purohitsing amasung ahallupki mangda Polna Masa Kanjaba wa ngangba 

30 Tou-i-gumbasung hayenggumba aduda Jihudisingna mangonda kari maramgi theijillabano haiba aoiba adu mahakna khangningladuna, mahakpu thadokle, amasung athoiba purohitsingga ahallup apumbagabu tillu haiduna yathang piraga Polbu, putharaktuna, makhoigi mamangda lephalle.

Pakhonchatpasinggi thabak 23 

1 Adudagi Polna ahallupta sangtrikna yengduna hai, ichin inaosa, eina numit asi phaoba iswargi mangda pukchel phajana panjarakli. 

2 Maduda purohitlen Ananiyana manakta leplibasing aduda mahakki machinda phujillu haiduna yathang pire. 

3 Matam aduda Polna mangonda hai, he angouba teiba phaklang, nangbu iswarna phugani! Nahakti wayel yathang adugi matung inna eibu wayel tounaba phamlaga wayel yathang adugi onna teinana eibu phu haiduna yathang piribra? 

4 Aduga manakta leplibasingna hai, iswargi purohitlenbu nangna cheiribra? 

5 Maduda Polna hai, ichin inaosa, mahak purohitlenni haiba eina khangjade; maramdi asi iduna lei, nangna nanggi misinggi mapubu phattaba ngangpharoi. 

6 Tou-i-gumbasung nakpak amana sadduki amasung nakpak amana pharisi oirammi haiba Polna Khanglabada, ahallupta lorak-i, ichin inaosa, eidi pharisi, pharisisinggi macha nipani; asibasingna hinggatli haibe khourangna ningbagi marida eibu wayel toubani. 

7 Aduga mahakna asumna hairabada, pharisising amasung saddukisinggi mar-akta ningai tounarakle; amasung miyam adu nakpak tanare. 

8 Maramdi hinggatpasu, swargadut amasung thawaisu leite haiduna saddukisingnadi hai; adubu pharisisingnadi animak asi lei haina yai 

9 Maduda yamna lao khongnaba thokle; aduga pharisisinggi nakpak oiba sastragi ojasing kharana hougattuna waga waga soknarak-i, eikhoina mi asida phattaba karisu phangde. Kanana khanggani, mangonda thawai amana nattraga swargadut amana ngangnaramba yai. 

10 Aduga ningai karma tounarak-labada, makhoina Polbu machet machet segaiba yai haina athoiba luchingbana kiraduna, lanmising kumthaduna mahakpu makhoigi maraktagi mullaga, pallikorda pusillu haiduna yathang pire. 

11 Amasung matunggi ahing aduda prabhuna manakta leptuna mangonda hai, thouna phou, maramdi nahakna Jerusalemda eigi maramda sakshi piba-gumna, Romdasu nahakna adugumna sakshi piba tare. 

Jihudisingna Polgi mathakta sarou sinba: Polbu Keisariyada thaba 

12 Amahiksung nongngallakpada, Jihudisingna sarou sinnaraduna, inakhoina Polbu hattriba phaoba chasu charoi, thaksu thakloi haiduna, makhoi masen sari sonnare. 

13 Aduga wasak asi tounaba makhoi mi niphu hellammi. 

14 Makhoina athoiba purohitsing amasung ahallamansingda laktuna hai, eikhoina Polbu hattriba phaoba karisu tangloi haiduna eikhoi isen kanna sari sonnare. 

15 Maram aduna houjik nakhoina mahakki wathok adu henna cheksinna wayengadaba matagum nakhoida mahakpu puthabiraknaba ahallupka loinana athoiba luchingbagi maphamda hanggatipyu; aduga mahakna nakna youraktringedia, eikhoina mahakpu hatnanaba thourang toure. 

16 Tou-i-gumbasung Polgi mamakna makhoigi lumliba adu tarabada, mahakna laktuna pallikor manungda changlaga Polda tamle: 

17 Maduda Polna lanmi chamagi mapu ama kouduna hai, nipa macha asibu athoiba luchingbagi maphamda pubikho; mahakna mangonda karigumba wa tamjagadaba lei. 

18 Asum touna mahakna mabu paiduna, athoiba luchingbagi maphamda puraklaga hai, keisumsangda thamliba eibu kouduna, nipa macha asina nahakki maphamda karigumba wa khara haijagadaba lei, mabu pubikho haina eingonda haijare. 

19 Maduda athoiba luchingba aduna mabu khutsamduna, amaromda pukhraga, mangonda lonna hangle, nangna eingonda tamgadaba kari leibage? 

20 Aduga mahakna hai, nahakna mahakki maramda henna cheksinna kari-gumba hanggadouba matagum Polbu hayeng ahallupta putharaknaba Jihudisingna nahakki naphamda haijagadabagi yanakhre. 

21 Maram aduna nahakna makhoigi wa inbiganu; maramdi makhoigi maraktagi nipa niphudagi henba kangbu amana mahakpu hattriba phaoba chasu charoi, thaksu thakloi haina makhoi masen sari sonnaraga mahakpu lumduna lei; aduga houjikti makhoina langba loire; nangondagi yabiba ngaibata mangaire. 

22 Adudagi athoiba luchingba aduna nipa macha adubu, nangna wasing asi eingonda khanghankhre haiduna mi kana amadasu tamganu haina yathang piduna chathankhre. 

23 Aduga mahakna lanmi chamagi mapusingdagi anibu kouduna hai, ahinggi ahumsuba pungda Keisariya phaoba chatnaba lanmi chani, sagol tongba mi humphutara, aduga ta paiba mi chani thourang tou. 

24 Amasung Polbu sagol tonghanduna leibak ngakpa Philikski mapham tanna asoi angam leitana thunghannanaba, sadongsing adu langu. 

25 Amasung mahakna maong asigi mattung inna lairik ama ire: 

26 Klodiyo Lusiya, matik chaoraba leibak ngakpa Philikski maphamda eina khurumjari. 

27 Nipa asibu Jihudisingna phaduna, hatkadouba matamda eina mahak Romgi mini haiba khangladuna, lanmisingga loinana makhoigida matam chana cheksinduna, mahakpu kanbire. 

28 Aduga makhoina mahakpu karigi theijilliba maram adu khangningduna, eina mahakpu makhoigi ahallup tanna puthare. 

29 Makhoigi wayel yathang adugi wathoknaba marida mangonda theijille, adubu hatpa nattrage punbagi matik chaba theijinba wa karisu leite haina eina phangle. 

30 Amasung nipa asigi mathakta sarou sinnaba leigani haina eingonda utlabada, eina mahakki theijinbasingdasu nahakki namangda mahakki mathakta wa ngangjaru haina yathang piduna, mahakpu nahakki naphamda thindana thakhibani. 

31 Adudagi lanmisingna yathang matung inna Polbu louthoktuna ahingda Antipatrida purakle. 

32 Tou-i-gumbasung hayenggumba aduda makhoina sagol tongba misingbu mahakka loinana chatnanaba thanamlage, pallikorda hallakle. 

33 Makhoi asina Keisariyada thunglabada, lairik adu leibak ngakpa aduda katsillaga, Polbusu mamangda pusille. 

34 Amasung mahakna lairik adu paraga, mahak kari lamgi wino hangle; aduga mahak Kilikiyadagini haiba khanglabada, 

35 Nahakki theijinbasingnasu laklaga, eina nahakki wa munna tagani haina mahakna hai. Aduga mahakpu Herodki konungda ngaktuna thamnaba yathang pire.

Pakhonchatpasinggi thabak 24 

Leibakki mapu Philiski mangda Polbu wayenba 

1 Numit manganigi matungda purohitlen Ananiyana kana kanagumba ahallamansing amasung kanagumba wanomheiba Tartullaga loinana kumtharaktuna, Polgi mathakta leibak ngakpagi maphamda makhoina wakatle. 

2 Aduga Polbu kouraga Tartullana mangonda theijinba hourak-i: He matik chaoraba Philiks, ibungogi mapanna eikhoina thoidokna ingthaba phangjaba ama-sung ibungogi wakhanna jat asigi da-mak phatta-phattaba chumthokpiba maramna, 

3 Eikhoina yamna thagatchabaga loinana maram pumnamakta amasung mapham pumnamakta yajaba oire. 

4 Tou-i-gumbasung eina ibungogi matam kuina changdananaba, ibungogi chanbibana eikhoigi wa khara tabinanaba nonjari. 

5 Maramdi nipa asi mangtaknaba touba, taibangpal apumbada leiba Jihudising pumnamakki marakta leibak wathok houhanba amasung nasaretsinggi khutpugi luchingba oiba mini haiba eikhoina phangle. 

6 Mana iswar ningnasangbu manghannanaba hotnare; amasung mabu eikhoina phare. (Amasung eikhoigi wayel yathang adugi matung inna mahakpu wayel touninglammi. 

7 Amasung mahakki theijinbasingbu ibungogi mangda chatlu haiduna yathang pi.) 

8 Eikhoina mangonda theijinba waram pumnamak asigi marida ibungomakna mahakpu hangbiraga mangondagi khangbiba ngamgani. 

9 Amasung hairiba wa asi asum oibani haina lepnaduna Jihudisingnasu mahakka wa tinnare. 

10 Amahiksung leibak ngakpana mahakpu wa ngangnaba nason tourabada, Polna Khumlaki: Ibungona chahi kuina jat asigi wayel mapu oibirakpani haina eina khangjaduna, eigi ngakthockchanba wa haraona khumjari. 

11 Eina Jerusalemda iswar Khurumjananaba kajarubadagi numit taranithoini hendri haiba ibungona khangbiba ngammi; 

12 Amasung kanagumba miga eiga ningai tounaba, nattraga miyambu eina wa thokhanba iswar ningnasangdasu, loisang loisangdasu, shardasu makhoina phangde. 

13 Makhoina houjik eingonda theijinba waram adu ibungogi maphamda praman piba ngamloi. 

14 Tou-i-gumbasung asi eina ibungogi maphamda haidokchari, haibadi, wayel yathang adugi matung inna leiriba amasung iswargi wa takthoppasinggi lairikta ikhiba pumnamak adu thajaduna, makhoina kutpu kouba lambi adugi matung inna eina eikhoigi ipa ipusinggi iswar adubu ningjari; 

15 Dharmachenbasingnasu chendabasingnasu hinggatpa oigani haiba makhoi asimaknasu yajaba adu eina iswar-lomda tarang tarang khangna ningba thamjari. 

16 Asigi maramna einasu iswargi amasung misinggi maphamda matam leiba khibikta langjaba thoktaba pukchel leijananaba isana hotnajei. 

17 Aduga chahi kharagi matungda eina eigi jatta dan amasung katnaba pot puraknanaba lakchare. 

18 Marak aduda miyamgasu loinadana, ninnabasu toudana iswar ningnasangda ei isabu sengdokchakhraba phibamda makhoina phangle. Tou-i-gumbasung Esiyadagi Jihudising kharasu leirammi. 

19 Makhoina ein-gonda theijingadaba karigumba leiramlabadi, mapham asida ibungogi mangda leptuna eingonda theijillamgadabani. 

20 Nattabanina mising asimakna eina ahallup mangda leppa matamda aranba touba phangba adu haisanu. 

21 Asibasingna hinggatpagi marida numit asida nakhoigi mangda eibu wayel touribani haiba khonjel asitadi eina makhoigi marakta leptuna laojakhi. 

Philiksna wayen adu matam yeithokpa 

22 Tou-i-gumbasung Philiksna lambi adugi maramda khara henna sengna khangba aduda, Lusiya, athoiba luchingbana kumlakpada, eina nakhoigi wayel toubigani haiduna wa adu yeithokle. 

23 Aduga mahakpu maining tamna thamduna ngaksennaba amasung mahakpu thougan touriba mahakki marupsing 

24 amatabusu numitkharagi matungda, Philiksna mahakki nupi Jihudi ningon Drusillaga loinana laklaga, Polbu kouhalluduna, Khrista Jisuda thajabagi marida mangondagi wa tare. 

25 Aduga dharmachenbagi, masa mathantabu khudum chanbagi amasung lakkadaba wayen-gi maramda mahakna nganaglakpada, Philiksna kirakladuna khumlak-i, houjikti chatlo; aduga eina khudong chaba matam phanglabada, nangbu kourakkani. 

26 Marak asida Polna mangonda sel pijagani haina mahakna ningsu ninglammi. Maram adunasu mahakpu toina toina koukhattuna mahakka ngangnarammi. 

27 Tou-i-gumbasung chahi ani houkhrabada Porkiya Phestna Philikski mahut sille; amasung Philiksna Jihudi-singdagi chanbiba phangningduna, Polbu thadoktana thanamle.

Pakhonchatpasinggi thabak 25 

Polbu Phestgi mangda wayenba 

1 Maram aduna Phestna mahakki lamda changlaktuna, numit humnigi matungda Keisariyadagi Yerusalemda kakhre. 

2 Aduga athoiba purohit singna amasung Jihudisinggi makok oiba misingna Polgi mathakta mahakki maphamda wakatle. 

3 Amasung lambida mahakpu lumduna hatnanaba sarou sinnaduna, Jerusalemda koukhatpinaba Phestgi maphamda makhoina thoujan nijaduna hanggatlammi. 

4 Adubu Polbu Keisariyada ngaksenduna leiri, aduga mahak masasu khara leiraga maduda chatkoduri haina Phestna khumlak-i. 

5 Maram aduna nakhoigi narakta angamba misingna eiga loinana chatthaminnaduna, nipa adugi karigumba maral leirabadi, makhoina maduda mangonda theijinsanu, haiduna mahakna hai. 

6 Adudagi mahakna makhoigi marakta numit nipanni nattraga taranidagi hendana leiramlaga, Keisariya tanna leng-tharaktuna, hayenggumba aduda mahakna wayen-phambeida phamlaga, Polbu puthoklaknaba yathang pire. 

7 Aduga mahakna laklabada, Jerusalemdagi kumtharakpa Jihudisingna mahakki akoibada leptuna, pramandi piba ngamdaba lum-la lumlaba theijanba wa yamna puthokle. 

8 Polna magi ngakthok-chanaba wa haijaba asini: Jihudisinggi wayel yathangadugi mathakta oirabasu, iswar ningnasang adugi mathakta oira-basu, Keisargi mathakta oirabasu, eina pap khak toujade. 

9 Tou-i-gumbasung Phestna Jihudisingdagi chanbiba phangjaningduna, Polna khumlak-i, nangna Jerusalemda karaktuna, wathok asigi maramda maduda eigi mangda wayenba yaningbra? 

10 Adubu Polna hai, eibu wayel tougadaba mapham Keisargi wayen-phambei mangda ei lepchari, Jihudisingda eina aranba toukhiba khak leite, madu ibungonasu yamna ningthina khangbiribani. 

11 Adumakpu ei aranba touba mi oirabadi amasung siba matik chaba karigumba toukhiba leirabadi ei sibada yadaba toude; adubu mising asina eingonda theijanba khibikki manungda karigumba achumba amata leitrabadi, mi kana amatana eibu makhoida pikhatpa ngamde. Eina Keisarda wayelsi hanjari. 

12 Maduda Phestna phamnaibasing aduga wa tanaraga khumlak-i, nangna Keisarda wayeldu hankhre; nang Keisarda chatkadabani. 

Agrippa amasung Barniki 

13 Adudagi numit khara leiraga, ningthou Agrippa amasung Barnikina Keisariyada thunglare, amasung Phestbu khurumjare. 

14 Amasung makhoina mapham aduda numit kupna phairingeida, Phestna ningthou adugi mangda Polgi wa khanghanduna hai, Philiksna keisumsangda phaduna thanamba kanagumba nipa ama lei. 

15 Eina Jerusalemda leiba matamda nipa asigi maramda athoiba purohitsingna amasung Jihudisinggi ahallamansingna magi mathakta maral tahanbiyu haijaduna eingonda wakatle. 

16 Eina makhoida khumle, haibadi, theijinba phangliba mi aduna theijinbasing aduga maioknaduna mahakki mathakta taba wa adugi maramda mahakki ngakthokchanaba wa khudong chaba phangdringeida, mi adubu pithokpa Romgi misinggi hounabi natte. 

17 Maram aduna makhoina mapham asida pullap laklabada eina thindana, matung nongma aduda wayen-phambeida phamlaga, nipa adubu puraknaba yathang pire. 

18 Theijinbasing aduna lepkhatlabada, mahakki maramda eina ninglambagumna phattaba wa karisu makhoina puthokte. 

19 Adubu makhoimakki dharmagi maramda, amasung hingli haina Polna chap leppa sikhraba kanagumba Jisu adugi maramda, makhoina mahakki mathakta karigumba wa thokle. 

20 Aduga wathok asigi marida karamna hanggadaba eina khanjanaraduna, mahakna Jerusalemda chattuna, wa asigi maramda wayenhanningbra haiduna hangle. 

21 Tou-i-gumbasung Polna ningthouren-gi wayel atabigi damak mahakpu ngaksennaba wayeldu halhankhrabada, eina mahakpu Keisarda thadriba phaoba ngaksenduna thamnaba yathang pire. 

22 Maduda Agrippana Phestda hai, eimaknasu mi asigi wa tajaning-i. Mahakna hai, hayeng nahakna mahakki wa tagani. 

23 Asumna hayenggumba aduda Barnikigana sajel chaona lenglaktuna, lanmi athoiba luchingbasingga sahargi achou achouba misingga loinana wa tanabagi maphamda changlabada Phestgi yathangna Polbu purakle. 

24 Aduga Phestna hai, ningthou Agrippa amasung eikhoiga loinana asida kaminnariba nipa pumnamak, nakhoina nipa asibu uri. Mahak asigi maramda, masina amuk hingba matik chade haina laoduna Jerusalemdasu asidasu Jihudisinggi miyam apumbana eingonda hanggatchare. 

25 Adubu mana sibagi matik chaba karisu toude haiba eina phangle, aduga ma masana ningthourenda wayel halhanjabagi maramna mabu thakhinaba ei wa leple. 

26 Magi maramda eigi ibungoda eina inba areppa karisu leite. Maram adugi damak hangle hairaga, eina karigumba iba yaba phangnanaba, nakhoigi mangda amasung, he ningthou Agrippa, maru oina nahakki mangda purakle. 

27 Maramdi keisumsanggi phadok amabu wayengi damak thabada, magi mathakta theijinba wasu uttaba asi wakhal leitabani haina ningjei.

Pakhonchatpasinggi thabak 26 

Polna Agrippagi mangda ngangba 

1 Amahiksung Agrippana Polda hai, nang nasagi damak ngangnaba yabire. Matam aduda Polna makhut tingthoktuna mahakki ngakthokchanaba wa haiba houre: 

2 He ningthou Agrippa, eingonda Jihudisingna theijinba pumnamak adugi marida numit asida ibungogi mangda eigingakthokchanaba wa haijagadaba asi eigi yaiphabani ningjei, 

3 Maramdi Jihudisinggi marakta leiba hounabi amasung wathok pumnamak ibungona thoidokna khangbiba amani; maram adugi damak khangbiduna eigi wa tabinaba eina ibungobu nonjari. 

4 Houjik madudi ahanbadagi houna eigi jatki marakta amasung Jerusalemda leibada naha oiringeidagi pallakpa eigi mioi mipal adu Jihudising pumnamakna khangbi. 

5 Makhoina sakshi pibininglabadi, eikhoigi dharmagi thoina kupna chatpa khutpu adugi matung inna eina pharisi oina panjarakle haiba ahanbadagi eibu khangbiraklibani. 

6 Amasung houjikti eikhoigi ipa ipusingda iswarna pigani haina waleppiba adu khourangna ningba maramna eibu wayennaba lepchari; 

7 Madu phangnanaba eikhoigi salai taranithoina ahing nungthil iswarbu thawai yaona thougan toujaduna khourangna ningjari. Ningba asigi maramda, he ningthou, eingonda Jihudisingna theijillibani. 

8 Iswarna asibasingbu hinggatpirabadi, madu thajaba ngamdabani haina nakho ina khallibano? 

9 Nasaretki Jisugi mingga onna-teinaba ayamba thabak touba tai haina eina thanggei sengna isana ninglammi. 

10 Aduga asi eina Jerusalemda asum toukhi; amasung athoiba purohitsingdagi matik phangduna, eina asengbasing ayambabu keisumsangda thamkhi, aduga makhoibu hatpa matamda eina makhoigi mathakta eigi ayaba khudamsu pikhi. 

11 Amasung loisang pumnamakta makhoibu hanna hanna laknaduna, dharma adu usittana touhannaba eina hotnarammi; aduga makhoigi mathakta thoidokna angaobagumna mireibakki sahar sahar phaobada makhoibu tannarammi. 

12 Asum touna eina athoiba purohitsingdagi matik amasung yathang lairikka loinana Dammesak tanna chatlingeida, 

13 Numit yungba matamda, he ningthou, numittagi henna langba swargadagi mangal amana eibusu eiga loinana lam chatminnaribasingbusu ikoi koina nganba lambida eina ure. 

14 Aduga eikhoi pumnakakna leipakta turabada, Sol, Sol, nangna eibu karigi ot-neiribage? Tingkhangda nakhongna kaoba nanggi damak arubani, haina eingonda Ibriya lonna haiba khonjel ama eina tare. 

15 Maduda eina hai, ibungo nahak kanano, Prabhu? Aduga prabhu aduna hai, eidi nangna ot-neiriba Jisuni. 

16 Adubu hougattuna nakhongna lep-khatlu; maramdi asigi damak eina nangonda uhanbani, haibadi, nangna eibu ukhraba amasung eina nangonda uhangadaba adugi hiramda thougan toubasu sakshi pibasu nangbu oihannabani. 

17 Nanggi jattagi amasung atoppa jatsingdagi eina nangbu kan-bigani; 

18 Makhoina amambadagi manganda amasung seitan-gi pang-gandagi iswarda ollaktuna, pap kokpiba amasung eibu thajaba mapanna sangdokpikhrabasinggi marakta mapham phangnabagi, eina nangbu makhoigi mit panghannanaba makhoida thabani. 

19 Maram a dugi damak, he ningthou Agrippa, swargadagi uhanbiba adu eina indaba natchade, 

20 Adubu ahanbada Dammesakki misingda, tungda Jerusalemgi misingda, Jihudiyagi lam pumnamakta amasung atoppa jatsingda makhoina pukning hongduna, iswarlomda ollakkadabani, amasung pukning hongbagi matik chaba thabak tougadabani haina eina sandoklammi. 

21 Asigi mamma Jihudisingna iswar ningnasangda eibu phaduna hatnaba hotnarammi. 

22 Maram aduna iswardagi oiba tengbang phangjaduna, apisaktasu achoubadasu sakshi piduna numit asi phaoba eina lepchari, 

23 Khristana karamna awa apang khanggadaba, amasung ibungona karamna sibadagi ahanba hinggatpa oiduna, ibungogi jattasu atoppa jatsingdasu mangal sandokkadabani haina iswargi wa takthokpasingnasu Mousinasu thoklagadaba haikhiba wa adu nattana kari amata eina haijade. 

24 Amahiksung mahakna ngakthokchanaba wa haijarakpada, Phestna khonjel laona hai, Pol, nang ngaore; nanggi yamna tamba aduna nangbu ngaohalle. 

25 Tou-i-gumbasung Polna hai, he matik chaoraba Phest, ei ngaojade, adubu achumbagi amasung lousing tabagi wahei ngangthokchabani. 

26 Maramdi ningthouna wasing asigi maramda khangbiribani, eina ibungogi maphamdasu ining tamna ngangthokchari; maramdi ibungogi maphamda waram asi kari amata thupchade haiba eina thajei, maramdi thabak asi machi mayada toukhiba natte. 

27 He ningthou Agrippa, ibungona iswargi wa takthokpasingbu thajabra? Ibungona thajei haina ei khangjei. 

28 Maduda Agrippana Polda hai, nangna eibu khajiktang thembana Khristan oihannaba hotnari. 

29 Aduga Polna khummi, khajiktana oirabasu ayambana oirabasu ibungota nattane, numit asida eigi wa tariba ptunnamaknasu, yotlhing-phalang asi nattana, eina oibagumna oiraknanaba eina iswargi maphamda haijaba pammi. 

30 Maduda ningthou adunasu, leibak ngakpa adunasu, Barnikinasu, makhoiga phamminnaribasingnasu hougatle; 

31 Aduga makhoina lengthokkhiduna amaga amaga ngangnarak-i, mi asina siba nattraga punba matik chaba maral karisu toude. 

32 Amasung Agrippana Phestda hai, mi asina Keisargi maphamda wayel halhallamdrabadi, mahakpu thadokpa ngamlamgadabani.

Pakhonchatpasinggi thabak 27 

Rom chatnaba Polgi hi khongchat; Kritta lakpa 

1 Amahiksung eikhoina Itali youna hi tongnaba lepnarabada, mak-hoina Polbu amasung atei kana kanagumba keisumsangda thamliba misingbu ningthouren-gi lanmi kanglupki chamagi mapu Juliya kouba amada pithokle. 

2 Aduga Esiyagi mapanda leiba mapham maphamda hongadouriba Adramuttiyagi hi amada tongduna, eikhoina samadruda sandoklakle; amasung Thesalonikada leiba Makidoniyagi mi Aristarkhana eikhoiga loinarammi. 

3 Hayenggumbada eikhoina Sidonda hi thanglaga, Juliyana Polbu yamna channa toubiduna, mahakki marup mapangsinggi maphamda chattuna nungngaihannaba mahakpu thadopki. 

4 Aduga mapham adudagi samadruda sandoklakpada, nungsitna eikhoigi mai-oknaba maramna, eikhoina Kupragi marum marumda hollakle. 

5 Amasung Kilikiyaga Pamphuliyagagi mangba leiba samadru lanthoktuna, eikhoina Lukiyagi murada thungle. 

6 Mapham aduda lanmi chamagi mapu aduna Itali tanna hongadouriba Aleksandriyagi hi ama phangla duna, eikhoibu hi aduda tonghalle. 

7 Aduga numit kuina eikhoina tapna tapna hi hollaktuna, Klidagi mamangda wana thunglabada, nungsitna eikhoibu manglomda hengathandabagi maramna, Salmonigi mamang Kritki marum marumda hollakle. 

8 Amasung wana ithat adugi changjouda nakna nakna hollaktuna, Laseya sahargi manakta leiba phajaba hithangpham kouba karigumba mapham amada eikhoi thungle. 

Polna Militada thungba amasung akanba nong-nungsit hi yeikhaiba 

9 Amahiksung matam yamna kuina changlabada, amasung chara henba matam adu chatkhraba maramna, hi khongchat adu houjik khudong thiraklabada, 

10 Polna makhoida mitna singhanduna hai, ibungokhoi, hi khongchat asida puriba potki amasung higita soiba amasung yamna mangba nattana eikhoigi thawaigisu oigani haiba eina ui. 

11 Tou-i-gumbasung chamagi mapu aduna Polna haiba wa adudagidi hinao saba amasung higi mapu adugi wa adudana henna pukning thingjillammi. 

12 Aduga hithangpham adu ningthamtha lenba mapham chadaba maramna, karigumba pambeina Phinida youduna, mapham aduda ningthamtha lenba ngamlabadi, haina mi ayambana mapham adudagi samadruda sandoknaba wa tanare; Phini haiba mapham adudi awang-nongpok amasung kha-nongpok onduna leiba Kritki hithangpham amani, 

13 Aduga khagi nungsitna liri liri sitlakpa, makhoina makhoigi apamba adu thungle haina ningduna, hi thadoklaga, Kritki changjouda nakna nakna hollakle. 

14 Adubu matam kharagi matungda Urakulo kouba akanba nungsit nongleina madudagi yeitharakle; 

15 Aduga hi adubu pharaduna nungsit mai-oknaba ngamdrabada, adumna thadoktuna eikhoibu humdokhalle. 

16 Amasung Kaoda kouba apikpa ithat amagi marumda chellaktuna, eikhoina wana hi macha adu phajille; 

17 Madu thanggatlaga, makhoina hi adu hibhamda laksinduna chenhannaba pambei sijinnare; aduga makhoibu Surttida yeisinba yai kiduna, makhoiba langyanphinachingba chingtharaga, asumna chathalle. 

18 Amasung eikhoibu nongnungsitna thoidokna wahallabada, matunggi numit aduda makhoina hidagi potchei hunthaba houre; 

19 Aduga humni suba numit aduda makhoimakki makhutna higi mapot machei hundokle. 

20 Amasung numit yamna kuina eikhoigi ithakta numitnasu thawanmi chaknasu nganbikhidrabada, amasung akanba nong-nungsitna eikhoigi ithakta kupkhrabada, houjik eikhoi hinggani haibagi asa punmamak leikhidre. 

21 Aduga chara henba kuiraklabada, matam aduda Polna makhoigi mayaida leptuna hai, he ibungokhoi, nakhoina eigi wa inbiduna, Krittagi hollamdrabadi, asoiba amasung amangba asi phanglamloidabani. 

22 Adubu houjikti eina nakhoigi thawai wadannaba thougatchari; maramdi hi nattana, nakhoigi narakta amata thawai mangba leiroi. 

23 Maramdi eina ibungogi mi oiba, ibungobasu eina thougan toujaba, iswar adugi dut amana ahing asida inakta leptuna hai, 

24 Kiganu, Pol; nang Keisargi mangda leppa tare; aduga yeng-u, nangga loinana hi tongminnariba pumnamakpu iswarna nangonda pibire. 

25 Maram adugi damak, ibungokhoi, thawai wabiganu, maramdi eingonda haibikhiba adugumna thokkani haina eina iswarda thajei. 

26 Adubu eikhoi karigumba ithat amada taba tare. 

27 Tou-i-gumbasung taramarini suba ahing oirabada, Adriya samadruda eikhoibu humdok humjin touduna puringeida, ahing nongyai aduwaida hi honbasingna karigumba kangphal naksillakli haina khallammi. 

28 Maduda makhoina ising tambada lam kun luba phangle; aduga khara chatlaga amuk hanna tambada makhoina lam taramanga luba phangle. 

29 Aduga eikhoibu karigumba nungjao maphamda tahanba yai kiduna, makhoina hirudagi longgor mari thadaraga, nongngannaba haijaduna leirammi. 

30 Amasung hi honbasingna hinaodagi longgorsing puthokkadaba matagum hi macha adu thadaduna hidagi chenthoknaba hotnaringeida, 

31 Polna lanmi chamagi mapuda amasung lamnisingda hai, makhoi asina hinungda adum leitrabadi, nakhoibu kanbiba ngamloi. 

32 Matam aduda lanmising aduna hi macha adugi thouri kakthatlaga, madu thadokle. 

33 Aduga nongngallamdaida Polna makhoi pumnamakpu khara chanaba haijarammi. Mahakna hai, ngasi numit taramarini nakhoina ngaiduna karisu chadaduna chara hellakle. 

34 Maram aduna khara chanaba eina nakhoibu haijari; maramdi asi nakhoigi thawai kannanabagi damakni, maramdi nakhoi kanagumbagi koktagi sam mana amata mangloi. 

35 Aduga mahakna asi hairaga, tal louduna punmamakki mangda iswarda thagatcharaga, madu thugaiduna chaba houre. 

36 Maduda pumnamakna thawai nungairaduna makhoimaknasu chare. 

37 Amasung hinungda eikhoi pumnamakna mi chani humphutara-taruk oirammi. 

38 Aduga makhoina chaba oklabada, samadruda gehu adu hundok khiduna hi adu yanghanba houre. 

39 Amasung nongngallabada, makhoina lam adu khangdre; adubu nungphou leiba karigumba isingna hanjinba ama makhoina uba phangle; maduda hi adu kalluba ngamgadra haiduna makhoina wa tanarammi. 

40 Aduga langgorsing adu hun-doktuna Samadruda thanamle; matam adumaktada makhoina hirugi nou punba adu thadokle; aduga mamanggi langyanphi adu nungsitlomda thanggattuna, nungphou tananaba makhoina hotnarammi. 

41 Tou-i-gumbasung samadru ani oknaba maphamda tarara-bada, hi adu leingoida chensinkhre; aduga hinao adu yeisinkhiduna, lengba yada-duna leire, adubu hiru adu ithak kabana thugaiba hourammi. 

42 Amasung phadoksing kanagumbana iroiduna nanthokkhiba yai haiduna, makhoibu hatsi haina lanmisingna wa tanare. 

43 Tou-i-gumbasung Polbu kan-biningduna, chamagi mapu aduna makhoigi tanaramba adu khamle; aduga iroiba ngambasing aduna hidagi hanna chongthaduna, kangphanda thungsanu; 

44 Amasung leihoubasing aduna, kana kanagumbana upakta, aduga atei kharana higi kari karigumba potta lansanu haiduna yathang pire. Amasung asum touduna pumnamak kangphanda kanbiba phangjarare.

Pakhonchatpasinggi thabak 28 

Polna Melitada panba 

1 Amahiksung eikhoina hinghou-raba matam aduna ithat aduda Melita kou-i haiba eikhoina khangle. 

2 Aduga lam asigi misingna eikhoida chanbiba utpa adu icham chamba natte; maramdi nong churakpagi amasung ningthambagi maramna, makhoina mei houbiduna, eikhoi pumnamakpu lousinbire. 

3 Tou-i-gumbasung Polna sing mapul ama khomlaktuna, madu meida tharabada, meisa aduna lil ama madudagi thoklaktuna mahakki khutta chetna phare. 

4 Amasung lam adugi misingna mahakki khutta mahu kanba lil aduna yalliba adu urabada, makhoina amaga amaga hainarak-i, mi asi mihatpani, chingnaba leite. Mahakna samadrudagi hinglaklabasu, achumba wayenna mahakpu hinghanbidre. 

5 Adum oinamakpu mahaknadi lil adu meinungda kansinkhiduna, karisu sokpa leite. 

6 Tou-i-gumbasung mahak pomgani, nattraga khanghoudana siduna tugani haina makhoina ninglammi; adubu makhoina kuina yengduna leibada amasung mangonda karisu asoi angam udrabada, makhoigi pukning olladuna mahak laini hairammi. 

7 Amahiksung mapham adugi manakta Publiya kouba ithat adugi mapugi lam leirammi; mahakna lousinbiduna, numit humni nungsiheina eikhoibu thunghalle. 

8 Amasung asumna oirare, Publiyagi mapa arum amasung iton phaibana naduna hiplammi. Mangonda Polna changkhiduna, haijaraga, mahakki mathakta makhut thambiduna mahakpu phahanbire. 

9 Amasung asi tourabada, ithat aduda leiba anaba ateisingnasu laktuna naba phahallei. 

10 Makhoinasu eikhoibu yamna ikaikhumnabaga loinana luna toubire; aduga eikhoina hi tonglabada, eikhoigi kannagadaba pot makhei makhoina happire. 

Polna Romda thungba 

11 Amahiksung tha ahum leiraga, ithat aduda, ningthamtha lellamba, phaibok machin manaogi khudam hakpa, Aleksandriyagi hi amada eikhoina tong-lakle. 

12 Aduga Surakusda hi thang-duna, maduda eikhoina numit humni phaire. 

13 Adudagi eikhoina koiraktuna Rigiyada thungle; aduga nongma leiraga, khagi nungsit sitlakpada, nini subada eikhoina Putiyolida lakle. 

14 Mapham aduda eikhoi ichin inaosingbu phangladuna, eikhoibu makhoina numit taretni leiminnasi haijare; asum touna eikhoina Romda lakle. 

15 Madudagi ichin inao-singna eikhoigi pao tarabada, Appiyagi keithen amasung yumthung ahum kouba mapham phaoba eikhoibu oknanaba lakle, makhoibu Polna urabada, iswarbu thagatchaduna ichang thoure. 

16 Aduga eikhoina Romda changlabada, Polbu ngaksenba lanmi aduga loinana mathanta leinaba yabire. 

Polna Romda leiba Jihudisingbu unaba 

17 Asum Thoklare, numit humni leiraga mahakna Jihudisinggi athoi athoibasingbu kouduna tinnahalle; aduga makhoina tillarabada, mahakna makhoida hai, he ichin inaosa, eina eigi jat nattraga ipa ipusinggi hounabi yeknaba karisu toujadrabasu, eibu Jerusalemdagi phadok oiduna Romgi misinggi makhutta pithokpire. 

18 Romgi misingna eibu hanglabada, eingonda hatnaba maram kari amata leitaba maramna makhoina eibu thadokpininglammi. 

19 Tou-i-gumbasung Jihu-di-singna yadaba wa haibada, eina eigi jatta maral theijinnaba kari amata leitrabasu, eina Keisarda wayeldu hanba takhi. 

20 Maram aduna asigi damak eina nakhoibu unanaba amasung ngangnaminnanaba koujabani, maramdi Israyelsingna khourangna ningba ibungo adugi maramda eibu yotlhing-phalang asina pullibani. 

21 Maduda makhoina mangonda hai, eikhoina Jihudiyadagi nahakki maramda lairiksu phangde, aduga ichin inaosing kanagumbana mapham asida laktuna, nahakki maramda karigumba phattaba pao tamlaba oirabasu nganglaba oira-basu leite. 

22 Tou-i-gumbasung nahakki wakhal karino eikhoina nangondagi taba chummi haina ning-i; maramdi khutpu asigi mathakta mapham khudingmakta ngangnaba eikhoina khang-i. 

23 Amasung makhoina mangonda numit ama thanarabada, makhoi phana yamna mahakki thungpham, manung aduda lakle. Makhoida mahakna Mousigi wayel yathang adudagi amasung iswargi wa takthokpasinggi lairiktagi iswargi leibakki maramda sakshi piduna, amasung Jisugi maramda makhoibu thajanaba themduna, ayuktagi numidang phaoba takpirammi. 

24 Aduga kharana takpiba wa adu thajarak-i, adubu kharana thaja-ramde. 

25 Amasung makhoina makhoi masen marakta yanadrabada khainare. Khainadringeiga Polna makhoida wa ama hai, thawai asengbana eikhoigi ipa ipusingda iswargi wa takthokpa Jisaiyabu phajana ngangthokhanduna haibasini: 

26 Nahakna jat asida chattuna hai-u, nakhoina tabadi tagani, aduga supkhang khangloi, amasung ubadi ugani, aduga wakhandi supta taroi. 

27 Maramdi makhoina mamitna uba, manakongna taba, makhoigi pukningna khangba, amuk onsillakpa, amasung eina makhoibu phahanba yadananaba, mising asigi pukning pangsinkhre; makhoigi mana tathire, amasung makhoigi mamit uisille. 

28 Maram aduna iswargi aran khubam asi atoppa jatsindga thabirak-i haiba nakhoina khangba oisanu; makhoinasu tagani. 

(29 Amasung mahakna wasing asi hairbada, Jihudisingna makhoi masen marakta yamna ningai tounaduna khainare.) 

Aroiba saruk 

30 Amasung mahakna mahakmakki awaiba yumda chahi ani leiduna, mangonda lakpa pumnamakpu lousinbire. 31 Mahakpu kananasu thingba toudana, mahakna thouna phana iswargi leibak sandoktuna amasung prabhu Jisu Khristagi maramda tambiduna leirammi.

Matthi 02 

Prabhu Jisu angang oiringeigi wari, Mahei heibasingna yenglaba 

1 Herod ningthougi haktakta Jihudiyagi Bethlehemda Jisu asi poklabagi matungda, 

2 Yengu, nongpoklomdagi mahei heiba misingna Jihudisinggi ningthou pok-iba adu kadaida leibage haiduna Jerusalemda laklammi. Maramdi eikhoina nongpoklomda ibungo mahakki thawanmichak adu ui, amasung ibungobu khuramjage lakcharibani. 

3 Herod ningthouna waram adu taraga l, mahak amasung Jerusalemgi mi pumnamak khoirangle. 

4 Amasung mahakna athoiba purohitsingne missingi sastragi ojasingne khomjillaga, makhoida khrita kadaida pokkadage haina hanglak-i. 

5 Amahiksung makhoina mangonda hairak-i, Jihudiyagi Bethlehemdani; maramdi iswargi wa takthokpa mjna asumna ikhrabani, 

6 Amasung he Jihuda leibakki Bethlehem, nangdi Jihudigi Ningthou machasinggi khwaidagi pikpa natte; maramdi eigi mi Israyelbu senbinaba wayel thoudaba mapu ama nangondagi thoklakkani. 

7 Matam adumaktada Herodna mahei heibasingbu lonna kouraga karamba matamda thawanmichak adu thokkhibage haiba adu makhoidagi ningthina khangle. 

8 Amasung mahakna makhoibu Bethlehemda thakhiduna, nakhoina chatuna angang adugi maramda munna thiraga ohanglaba matamda munna thiraga phanglaba matamda eihaksu laktuna khurumjaba yanaba eingonda pao khanghanbiro, haikhi. 

9 Makhoina ningthougi Yathang adu taraga chatkhre; amahiksung yengu, nongpoklomda uramba thawanmichak aduna angang macha adugi leiphamgi mathakta laktuna leptriba phaoba makhoigi mamang thangkhre. 

10 Amahiksung makhoina thawanmichak adu ubada, nagmkhei leitana haraojakhi. 

11 Amasung makhoina yum adugi manungda changlaga angang macha aduna mama Mariyamga loinana leiramba ubada, leitana ibungobu khurumjaduna makhoigi pukkei hangdok laga, khudongi masak oina sana, kunduru amasung gondharas katchare. 

12 Matung aduda iswarna makhoibu Herodta halluraganu haibasi makhoigi mamangda khanghanbirabada, makhoina atoppa lambida mareibak tanna chatkhre. 

Misor leibakta chenba 

13 Amasung makhoina chatkhrabagi matungda, yengu prabhugi dutna jousephki mamangda uhanbiduna haikhi, hougattuna angang macha asiga mamagabu puduna Misorda chellaga, eina hairadriba phaoba mapham aduda leiyu; maramdi Herodna angang asibu manghangadabagi thirakadouri. 

14 Mahakna hoigatladuna angang machaga mamagabu ahingda puduna Misor leibakta chatkhre. 

15 Amasung prabhuna wa takthokpa mibu haihankhiba, eina eigi icha nipabu Misordagi koukhi, haibasi thungnanabagi damak Herodna sidri phaoba mapham aduda leirammi. 

Herodna Bethlehemgi angangsingbu hatpa 

16 Adudagi Herodna mahei heibasingna mahakpu namthak tourammi haiba urabada, yamna saoraduna, mahei heibasingdagi munna khanglaba matam adugi matung inna Bethlehem amasung madugi akoibada leiba chahi ani suba amasung madugi makhagi nipa macha makheibu mi thaduna hathankhre. 

17 Maduda iswargi wa takthokpa Jirmiyana haikhiba adu thungkhre, 

18 Madudi, hikna kappa amasung yamna tengthanaoibagi khonjel ama Ramada tarammi, Rehelna macha-singgi damak kapi; makhoi leitabana mapukning nungaihanba yade. 

Misordagi Hallakpa 

19 Touigumbasung Herodna sikhrabada, yengu, Misorda prabhugi dutna Jousephki mangda uhanbiduna hairare, 

20 Hougattuna angang macha asiga mamagabu puduna Israyel leibakta hallak-u; maramdi angang machagi mathawai louge thiramba makhoi adu sikhre. 

21 Amasung mahakna hougatladuna, angang macha aduga mamagabu ouduna Israyel leibakta lakle. 

22 Touigumbasung Arkhaleyasna Jihudiyada magi mapa Herodki khubamda palli haibasi taraduna, mapham aduda chatpa kirammi; amasung iswarna mamangda takpibagi maramna mana Galil leibakki lam amada theikhre. 

23 Amasung iswargi wa takthokpa misingna haikhiba, ibungobu Nasretki mi kougani haiba adu thungnanabagidamak mahakna Nasret kouba sahar aduda laktuna leirare.

Matthi 03 

 Baptais toubiba Johan amasung mahakki pao


1 Matam aduda baptais toubiba Johanna phaoraktuna, Jihudiyagi lamjaoda pao sandoktuna hairaki, 

2 Nakhoi pukning honglo, maramdi swarga leibak adu naksillakle. Maramdi, 

3 Lamjaoda lao-riba- amagi khon-geldi, - Nakhoina.prabhugi lambel thourang tou, Ibungogi lambi chumhallu, haiduna iswargi wa takthokpa Jisai-yana hairamba mi adu mahak asimakni, 

4 Johan Masamk ut madugi phijet set-lammi, amasung makhwangda saun-gi khwangjet ama laklammi; aduga mahakki achapotti koujeng amasung lamkhoihi oirammi. 

5 Matam aduda Jerusalem Jihudiya pumnamak amasung Jardangi akoibada leiba mi pumnamak thoklaktuna man-gonda chatlammi; 

6 Amasung makhoigi pap haidokchaduna Jardan turenda mak-hoina mangondagi baptais lourammi. 

7 Touigumbasung ayamba Pharisi amasung Saddukisingna baptaisgidamak lakpa uraduna mahakna makhoida hairaki, he lin-gi dharasa, lakkadouriba asaoba adudagi chellu haina kanana nakhoida takpibage? 

8 Adunadi nakhoina napu-kning hongbagi matik chaba mahei yal-hallu. 

9 Amasung eikhoigi ipudhou Abraham lei haige haina napukningda khan-ganu; maramdi eina nakhoida hairi, Iswarna nung mayam asidagi Abrahamda machasing thokhanba ngammi 

10 Houjikmaksu upambisinggi maruda singjang thaduna lei; maram asina aphaba mahei pandaba upambi khuding-makpu yanthektuna meinungda langsilli. 

11 Pukning hongbagi maramna isingda eina nakhoibu baptais toubi; adubu eigi itungda lenglakliba ibungosidi eingondagi matik helli; eidi ibungogi khugrang puba youna itik dude; ibungonadi nakhoibu thawai asengbada amasung meida baptais toubigani. 

12 Ibungogi humai makhutta lei amasung ibungona mahakki lou yeipham changkhonna sengdoklaga mahakki gehu adu keida peisin-gani, touigum-basung maham adu mutpa naidraba meida thajin-gani.


Jisubu baptais touba amasung diyabolna themba


13 Matam aduda Jisuna Galilda Johanda baptais louge haiduna Jordan tanna lenglakle. 

14 Touigumbasung Johanna ibungobu khamladuna hairaki, ibun-gona eibudum baptais toibigadabani, aduga ibungona eingonda lengbiraki-bra? 

15 Amasung Jisuna khumlaki, hou-jikti yaro; maramdi matou asumna eik-hoina dharma chenba thabak pumnamak pangthokpada matik chai Maduda mahakna yajare. 

16 Amahiksung Jisuna baptais loura-duna isingdagi hek karakle; amasung yengu, swarga hangdokle, amasung iswargi thawaina khunugumna- kum-tharaktuna ibungogi mathakta lak-iba adu ujare, 

17 Amasung yengu, swargadagi khonjel amana hairaki, masi eigi nung-siraba icha nipani, mangonda eina yamna pelle.

Matthi 04 

1 Adudagi Diyabolna themnaba Jisubu thawaina lamjaoda pukhatle. 

2 Amasung ahing nungthil numit niphuni chars hellabada mameithangda ibungo lamlakle 

3 Amasung athemba mapu aduna laktuna ibungoda haire, nang-na iswargi macha nipa oirabadi, nungsing asi tal ollu haina yathang piyu. 

4 Amasung ibungona khumlaki, asi iduna lei, taltana mina hingloi, touigumbasung iswargi chindagi thoklakpa wahei khuding adutana hinggani. 

5 Matung aduda Diya-bolna ibungobu asengba saharda pugsiduna iswar ningnasanggi maton tolenda lephallaga 

6 Ibungoda hai, nangna iswargi macha nipa oirabadi, chongthajou; maramdi iduna lei, ibungo mahakna nanggi maramda magi dutsingda yathang pibigani, amasung nanggi nakhong adu nungda thenggaidananaba makhoina nangbu makhutna pamkhatpigani. 

7 Jisuna mangonda hairaki, amuksu asumna iduna lei, nangna prabhu nanggi Iswarbu chang yengpharoi.

 

8 Amukka Diyabolna ibungobu thoidokna wangkhraba ching amada pukhattuna taibangpan-gi ningthou leibak pumnamak amasung makhoigi matik mangal adubu ibungoda uhalle hairaga, 

9 Nangna leitana eibu khurumjara-gadi, eina pumnamak asi nangonda pibi-gani, haina hairaki. 

10 Maduda Jisuna mangonda hai, chatkhro, seitan; maram-di asi iduna lei, nangna prabhu nanggi iswar adubu khurumjagadabani, amasung ibungo mahaktabu ninggadabani. 

11 Adudagi Diyabol aduna ibungobu thadoklammi, amasung yengu, swarga-dutsingna lakladuna ibungobu thougal tourammi. 

12 Adugi matungda Johanbu kei-sumsangda pithokkhre haiba asi Jisuna tarabada, ibungona Galilda lengthoktuna theikhre; 

13 Amasung Nasret thadok-tuna Sabulun amasung Naptaligi lamdam, samadrugi mapanda leiba Kapharna-humda lengkhiduna leikhre. 

14 Masi iswargi takthokpa Jisaiyana haikhiba, 

15 Subun leibak amasung Naptali leibak, samadrulomda leiba Jordan wang-mada, 

16 Atoppa jatsinggi Galil, amam-bada leiramba misingna achouba mangal ujare; Aduga asibagi, lam amasung- mamida phamlamliba misingda mangal thoklakle, haiba wa asi thungba yananabani.


Jisuna pao sandokpa houba amasung ahanba seboksingbu kouba


17 Pukning hong-u maramdi swarga leibak nakle haiba pao asi haiduna Jisuna matam adudagi sandokpa hourakle. 

18 Aduga ibungona Galil samadrugi mapanda koirakpada Pitar haina kouba Simon amasung magi manao Andriya, makhoi machin manao ani asi samadruda in hunduna leiramba adu ure; maraindi makhoi nga phabasingni. 

19 Amah-iksung ibungona makhoida hai, lak-u, itung illu, amasung eina nakhoibu mi pha-basing oihan-gani. 

20 Khudak adumak-tada makhoina - in thadoklamduna ibungogi tung injare. 

21 Amasung mapham adudagi asum lenglakpada, ibungona atei machin manao ani, Sebedigi macha nipa Jakob amasung mahakki manao Johan, makhoigi mapa Sebediga loinana hi amada makkhoigi in phottuna leiramba ure, amasung mak-hoina koure. 

22 Khudak aduda mak-hoina hi amasung mapabu thadoklamduna ibungogi tung injare. 

23 Matung aduda makhoigi loisang loi-sangda tambiduna amasung swarga leiba-kki aphaba wa pao sandokpiduna, aduga misinggi marakta laina pumnamak ama-sung asol ana pumnamak phahanbiduna ibungona Galil apumba thungna koira-mmi. 

24 Amahiksung ibungogi paonink-honna Suriya pumnamakta sin-thung-khre; amasung makhoina ibungoda anaba pumnamak, makhal makha ayamba laina amasung laithungna waraba, bhutna puba, sarei houba, nakal namma sithaba misingbu purakle, amasung ibungona makhoibu phahanbire. 

25 Aduga Galil Dekapoli, Jerusalem, Jihudiya amasung Jordan wangmadagi miyam yamna ibungogi tung injare.

Matthi 05 

Chingthakta tambiba


1 Amahiksung miyamsing adu uraduna ibungona chingda lengkhatle, amasung phamtharaba matamda ibungogi seboksingna mangonda laklammi; 

2 Amasung Ibungona ya kathoktuna makhoida tambiba houre;


Yaiphabasing (Haraobasing)


3 Thawai tonbasing adu yaiphabani, swaiga leibak adu makhoigini. 

4 Tengtharibasing adu yaiphabani, maramdi makhoibu nungngaihanbigani. 

5 Pukning ,tappasing adu yaiphabani, maramdi prithibi asi makhoina phang-pham thok-i. 

6 Dharma chenbagidamak aram khouranglibasing adu yaiphabani, maramdi makhoibu thalhanbigani. 

7 Nungsiheibasing adu yaiphabani maramdi makhoina nungsibiba phang-gani. 

8 Pukning asengbasing adu yaiphabani, maramdi makhoina iswarbu ujagani. 

9 Tapthaba pibasing adu yaiphabani, maramdi makhoibu iswargi machasing kougani. 

10 Dharmachenbagidamak awaba phanglibasing adu yaiphabani, maramdi swarga leibak makhoigini. 

11 Eigi maramgi damak misingna nakhoibu cheiraba amasung ot-neiraba, aduga nakhoigi nathakta phattaba pumnamak theijillabada nakhoi yaiphabani. 

12 Hariojou amasung thoidokna nungaijou, maramdi swargada nakhoigi mana chaoi, maramdi nakhoigi namangda leiramba iswargi wa takthokpasingbu asumna ot neikhi.


Thum amasung thaomeidagi paotak


13 Nakhoidi taibangpanbagi thumni; adubu thum aduna magi mahao mangkhrabadi, madu karamna haohan-gadage? Adudagidi madu hundoktuna misinggi khongna netpa nattana karisu kannadre. 

14 Nakhoidi taibangpanbagi manganni. Chingthakta leiba sahar lotpa jade. 

15 Aduga misingna thaomei thallaga thummuk makhada thamde; touigum-basung thaomei makhong mathakta thamduna imungda leiba pumnamakpu ngal-halli. 

16 Matou asumna misingna nakhoigi aphaba thabak uduna swargada nakhoigi Napabu thagatnanaba nakhoigi mangal adu misinggi mamangda ngansanu.


Wayel yathang ariba amasung Jisugi wayel yathang


17 Eina wayel yathang adu nattraga iswargi wa takthokpasinggi wa adu manghan-ge lakpani haina ningganu; eidi manghanba lakpa natte, touigumbasung thunghanba lakpani. 

18 Maramdi eina nakhoida thanggeisengna hairibani, swarga amasung prithibi mangdriba phaoba wayel yathang adudagi leii machet ama nattraga bindu amatasu, pum-namak thungdriba phaoba, mang-loi. 

19 Maram asina kanagumbana khwaidagi henna pikpa yathangsing asigi maraktagi amabu thugaiduna misingda adugumna tambiba mahakpu swarga leibakta khwaidagi pikpa kougani; touigumbasung kanagumbana induna tambira-badi, mahakpu swarga leibakta achouba kougani. 

20 Maramdi eina nakhoida hairibani, nakhoigi dharma chenbana sas-tragi ojhasing imasung Pharisisinggi dharmachenbadagi hendrabadi, nakhoina swarga leibakta supchang chang loi. 

21 Nangna mi hatpharoi; amasung kanagumbana mi hatlurabadi, wayen-gi awabada tagani; haibasi thainagi makhoi - aduda haikhibadu nakhoina tare. 

22 Touigumbasung eina nakhoida hairi, kanagumbana magi machin manao-bu saorabadi, wayen-gi awabada tagani; amasung kanagumbana machin manaobu raka haiba di, mahakna ahallupki awabada tagani; amasung kanagumbana apangba amangba nang hairabadi, mahak norokki meigi awabada tagani. 

23 Maram aduna nangna latna pungda nanggi katnaba pot puraklabada nanggi nachin nanaona nanggi nathakta karigumba ama leikhibadu ningsinglak-labadi, 

24 Katnnba, adu latnapunggi mamang aduda thanamduna, chatlaga nanggi nachin nanaoga hanna channaru, amasung madudagi laktuna nanggi katnaba pot adu katcharo. 

25 Nangga wa thoknariba aduna nangga loinana lambida leiringeida maga, thuna chamnou; adu nattrabadi wa thoknariba aduna nangbu wayenba mapuda pithokpa yai, amasung wayenba mapuna nangbu phamnaibada sinnaduna nangbu keisumsangda thajinba yai. 

26 Eina nangonda thanggei sengna hairibani, nangna singgadaba aroiba peisa adu singdriha makei mapham adudagi khak thoklakpa yaroi. 

 

27 Nangna migi nupi lannapharoi, haikhiba asi nakhoina tare; 

28 Touigumbasung eina nakhoida hairi, nupi amabu apambana sumhattuna yengba mi khuding makna magi pukningda mahakka loinana lannaba thabak toukhrabani. 

29 Amasung nanggi yethangba namitna nangbu papta khudi thihallabadi, khottoktuna nangondagi hundoku; maramdi nasa apumba norokta tahanbadagi nanggi hak-changgi kayat ama mangkhibana nanggi kannabani. 

30 Amasung nanggi yet-thangba nakhutna nangbu papta khudi thihallabadi, kakthattuna nangondagi hundoku; maramdi nasa apumba norokta tabadagi nanggi hakchanggi kayat ama mangkhibana nanggi kannabani. 

31 Asumnasu haikhre, kanagumbana magi nupi khainage hairabadi, khainabagi lairik nupi aduda pisanu. 

32 Touigum-basung eina nakhoida hairi, lannaba thabakki nattana nupi khainaba mi khuding-makna mabu mawa lannabi oihallabani amasung kanagumbana khainarabi mahakpu luhonglabadi, nupi lannaba thabak toui. 

33 Amukka, thainagi makhoi aduda haikhiba adu nakhoina tare, madudi, nangna lanna wasakkanu, adubu nanggi wasakpa adu prabhuda pang-thoku. 

34 Touigumbasung eina nakhoida hairi, khak wasakpharoi, swarga pandunasu sakkanu, maramdi iswargi phambanni; 

35 Leipak pandunasu sakkanu, maramdi Ibungogi khonggi khutnetni; aduga Jerusalem pandunasu sakkanu, maramdi achouba ningthougi saharani. 

36 Nanggi nakok paidunasu sakkanu, maramdi nangna sam mana amatasu ngouhan-ge nattraga muhan-ge ngamba natte. 

37 Touigumbasung nanggi wa adu hoi hairaga, hoi haiyu, mai hairaga, mai haiyu, amasung asidagi henba makheidi phattabagi mapudagini. 

38 Mit amagi mahut mit ama, ya amagi mahut ya ama, haikhiba asi nakhoina tare. Adubu eina nakhoida hairi, phattraba adubu thingganu. 

39 Touigumbasung kanagumbana nanggi yet-thangba nakha-jaida khupakna tharabadi, mangonda atoppa adusu onsillu. 

40 Amasung nangbu wayensangda pukhattuna nanggi phurit louningba mahak aduda nanggi innaphi adusu pithokho. 

41 Amasung kana-gumbana nangbu mail ama chathaba namlabadi, magi mail ani chat-minnou. 

42 Nangonda nijaraba mahak aduda pinou, amasung nangondagi pujaningba mahak adudagi leithokkanu. 

43 Nanggi keiroi leikaibu mingsiyu amasung nanggi yeknababu tukkachou, haikhiba asi nakhoina tare. 

44 Adubu eina nakhoida hairi, nakhoina swargada leiba nakhoigi napagi machasing oirak-nanaba yeknabasingbu nungsiyu, ama-sung nakhoibu ot-neibasinggi damak haijabiyu, 

45 Maramdi ibungo mahakna phattaba amasung aphabasinggi mathakta ibungo mahakki numit thokhalli, aduga dharma chenba amasung chendabasinggi mathakta nong chuhalli. 

46 Maramdi nakhoibu nungsibasingbu nakhoina nung-sirabadi, nakhoigi kari mana leibage? Khajna thoubasingnasu adum touba nattra? 

47 Atnasung nakhoina nakhoigi nachin nanaosingdata khurumlabadi ateisingdagi nakhoina kari henna toubage? Atoppa jatsingnasu adum touba nattra? 

48 Maram asina nakhoigi swargagi napana mapung phabagumna nakhoisu mapung phagadabani.

Matthi 06 

Lonna dan touba (nungsiba)


1 Misinggi mamangda makhoina unanaba nakhoigi dharmachenba thabak toudanaba pukning changu; adu nattrabadi swargada leiba nakhoigi napagi maphamda nakhoigi mana leite. 

2 Maram aduna misinggi thagatpa phangnanaba aphasajaningbasingna loisangda amasung lambida toubagumna, nangna dan touba matamda namangda punjao thin-ganu. Eina nakhoida thanggei sengna hairibani, makhoina makhoigi mana loina phangkhre. 

3 Touigumbasung nanggi dan adu aronba oinanaba nangna dan touba matamda nanggi yetthangba nakhutna touba adu nanggi oithangba nakhutna khangdasanu; 

4 Amasung lonna uriba nanggi napana nangonda hanbirakkani.


Lonna haijaba


5 Amasung nakhoina haijaba matamda aphasajaningbasingum oiganu; maramdi makhoibu misingna unanaba, loisangda amasung lamjaogi chithekta haijaba pammi. Eina nakhoida thanggei sengna hairibani, makhoina makhoigi mana loina phang-khre. 

6 Touigumbasung nangdi haijaba matamda nanggi achikpa kada changjaduna, nanggi thong thingjillaga, lonna leiba nanggi napada haijou; amasung lonna uriba nanggi napana nangonda hanbirakkani. 

7 Amasung haijaba matamda atoppa jatsinggumna arembada hanjin hanjinna haijaganu, maramdi makhoigi yamna ngangba aduda makhoibu tabigani haina makhoina ningi. 

8 Maram aduna makhoi gumganu, maramdi nakhoina nijadringeida nakhoigi awatpa leiba adu napana khangbi.


Prabhugi haijaba


9 Maram aduna matou asumna haijou: Swargada leibe eikhoigi ipa, ibungo nahakki ming, asengba oisanu. 

10 Nahakki-leibak laksanu, swargada nahakna ningba toubagumna taibangpanda oisanu. 

11 Eikhoigi nongmagi oknaba chinjak ngasi pibiyu. 

12 Aduga eikhoinasu eikhoigi laman tonbasingbu kok-pirabagumna, eikhoigi laman kok-piyu. 

13 Amasung eikhoibu athembada chingsinbiganu, touigumbasung phattaba adudagi eikhoibu kanbiyu. (Maramdi, ningthou leibak, panggal amasung matik mangal lomba-naidana nahakkini. Amen.) 

14 Maramdi nakhoina misinggi ayol aral kokpirabadi, nakhoigi swarga-gi napana nakhoibusu kokpigani. 

15 Touigumbasung nakhoina misinggi ayol aral kokpidrabadi, nakhoigi napanasu nakhoigi ayol aral kokpiroi.


Chara henba


16 Aduga nakhoina chara henba matamda aphasajaningbasinggumna awa-maithong utkanu, maramdi makhoina chara helli haiba misingna unanaba makhoina maithong maksilhalli. Eina nakhoida thanggei sengna hairibani, makhoina makhoigi mana loina phangkhre. 

17 Touigumbasung nangdi chara henba matamda nakhoina chara helli haiba misingda uhandana, lonna leiriba nanggi napana unanaba, nakokta thao teisellu, namai tathoku; 

18 Amasung lonna uriba nanggi napana nangonda hanbirakkani.


Achumba lal; Anganba amasung amamba


19 Tin-kang amasung kolhingna manghanba aduga huranbasingna , sagun tou-duna huba prithibi asida nakhoigidamak lal peisinganu; 

20 Touigumbasung tinkang amasung kolhingna mangbandraba aduga huranbasingna sagun touduna hudraba swargada nakhoigidamak lal peisin-jou. 

21 Maramdi nanggi lal leiba mapham aduda nanggi pukningsu leigani. 

22 Hakchanggi thaomeidi mitni. Maram aduna nanggi mitpham chumlabadi, nanggi hakchang apumba yamna ngan-gani; 

23 Touigumbasung nanggi mitpham chumdrabadi, nanggi hakchang apumba yamna mamgani .Maram aduna nangonda leiba mangal aduna mamla-badi, amamba adu kayada mamkhrabano. 

24 Kananasu mapu anigi minai oiba ngamde; Maramdi amabu tukkacharaga amabu nungsigani, nattraga amagidamak leplaga amabu thouoiroi. Nakhoina iswar amasung lan-gi Minai oiba ngamde.


Langtaknaba Amasung Iswarda thajaba


25 Maram asina eina nakhoida hairibani, nakhoina hingnabagi damak kari chagani, kari thakkani aduga nakhoigi hakchanggi damak kari setkadage haina langtaknaganu. 

26 Atiyagi ucheksingbu yengu; makhoina hunsu hunde, khaosu khaode, aduga kottasu peisinde; amasung nakhoigi swargagi napana makhoibu pijabi. Nakhoidi makhoidagi thoidok hendokpa nattra? 

27 Aduga nakhoi kanana langtaknaduna magi punsi aduda khudup ama hengat-hanba ngam-bage? 

28 Aduga phijetkidamak karigi langtaknabano? Loubukki tharosingna karamna houbage munna wakhal tou; makhoina nomsu nomde, langsu naide; 

29 Adubu eina nakhoida hairibani, Solomonmaknasu magi matik mangal pumnamakta makhoi, asigi marak-tagi phijet leitengkhide. 

30 Touigumbasung ngasi leiriba, hayengdi leirangda thajin-gdaba loubukki napi adubu iswarna asup, ningthijana thonbirabadi, he thajaphattabasa, ibungo-na, nakhoibu thoidok hendokna phi tholloidra? 

31 Maram aduna, eikhoina kari chagani, kari thakkani, nattraga, kari set ingani haiduna nakhoina langtaknaganu. 

32 Maramdi atoppa jatsingna pot pumnamak asi thi. Maramdi nakhoigi swargagi napana pot pumnamak asi nakhoida kannei haiba khangbi. 

33 Touigumbasung nakhoina ahanbada ibungo mahakki leibak amasung ibungo mahakki achumba adubu thiyu, aduga pot pumnamak asi nakhoida hapchinbigani. 

34 Maram asina hayeng-gidamak langtaknaganu, maramdi hayenggidi hayeng masana adumak langtaknajagani. Nongmagi waruba aduna nongma adugi matik chare.

Matthi 07 

Misingbu Wayendanaba Tambiba


1 Nakhoibu wayenkhidanaba wayelluganu. 

2 Maramdi nakhoina yelluriba wayel aduna nakhoibu wayengani, amasung nakhoina olluriba chang aduna nak-hoidasu ollagani. 

3 Aduga nangmakki namitta khangel leiba adu khandaduna, nanggi nachin nanaogi mamitta thunamba leiba adu karigi yenglibano? 

4 Aduga karamna nachin nanaoda, namittagi thunamba adu louthokpige, haigadage? amasung yengu, nanggi namitta khangel leiri. 

5 Aphasajaningba, nangna ahanbada namittagi khangel adu louthokkho, aduga matung aduda nangna nanggi nachin nanaogi mamittagi thunamba adu louthokpa sengna ugani. 

6 Asengba pot adu huisingda piganu; aduga nakhoigi mukta adu okki mamangda hunjinganu. Kanana khanggani, makhoina, madubu makhongna netsillaga onsillaktuna nakhoibu hogaiba yai.


Haijanaba Thoujinba


7 Nijou, nakhoida pibigani; thijou, nakhoina phangjagani; amasung thong yeijou, nakhoida hangdok-pigani. 

8. Maramdi nijaba mi khudingmakna phangi, thijaba aduna khangi, amasung yeijaba aduda hangdokpigani. 

9 Nakhoigi naraktagi kanana mahakki macha nipana tal niraga nung mangonda pigadage, 

10 Nattraga nga niraga lil mangonda pigadage? 

11 Maram aduna nakhoina phattaba oidunasu nakhoigi nachasingda aphaba khudon piba heirabadi, nakhoigi swargada leiba napana nijaba makhoida kayamuk thoidok hendokna aphaba pot pibigaba! 

12 Maram aduna nakhoina misingbu nakhoida touhanningba pumnamak adu nakhoinasu makhoida tou; maramdi masina wayel yathang adugi amasung Iswargi wa takthokpasinggi lairikki machini.


Lambi Ani


13 Nakhoina akhuba thong aduda changu; maramdi amangbada tanaba thong adu lao-i, aduga lambi adu pak-i, amasung maduda changba mi yammi. 

14 Maramdi hingnabada taba thong adu khui; aduga lambi adu chappi, amasung madu phangba mi yamde.


Wahei amasung Thabak


15 Yaogi phijet setpa, adubu manungdadi charamnaba keisal oina nakhoida lakpa iswargi wa takthoksinnabasingbu cheksillu. 

16 Nakhoina makhoigi maheidagi makhoibu khanggani. Misingna tingkhang pambidigi draksha mahei, aduga tingkhang pambidigi hayit heknabra? 

17 Matou asumna aphaba upambi khudingmakna aphaba mahei palli; touigumbasung phattaba upambina phattaba mahei palli. 

18 Aphaba upambina phattaba mahei panba, aduga phattaba upambina aphaba mahei panba ngamde. 

19 Aphaba mahei pandaba upambi khudingmak adubu yanthektuna meinungda langsilli. 

20 Maram asina makhoigi maheidagi nakhoina makhoibu khanggani. 

21 Eingonda prabhu, prabhu, haiba mi khudingmakna swarga leibakta changloi, touigumbasung swargada leiba ipagi ningba towriba mi aduna chang-gani. 

22 Numit aduda ayambana eingonda haigani, prabhu, prabhu, eikhoina ibungogi minggi mapanna iswargi wa tak-thok chakhidra, ibungogi minggi mapanna bhutsingbu tanthokchakhidra, amasung ibungogi minggi mapanna toungamdaba thabak ayamba toujakhidra? 

23 Matam aduda eina makhoida phongna haidokkani, eina keidoungeidasu nakhoibu khanglamde; he touheidaba toubasa, eingondagi chatthokkhro. 

24 Maram asina eigi wasing asi taraga touba mi khudingmakpu nungjao mathakta yum saba asingba mi amaga chang-damnagani. 

25 Amasung nong kanna taraktuna ising ichao lakle, nungsit sitle, amasung yum aduda yeirei, adubu nung-jao adugi mathakta houba mamma tuk-hide. 

26 Amasung eigi wasing asi taraga toudaba mi khudingmakpu leingoi mathakta yum saba apangba mi amaga changdamnagani. 

27 Amasung nong kanna taraktuna ichao lakle, nungsit side, amasung yum aduda phujinduna madu tukhi, amasung madu matu thina tukhi. 

28 Amasung asum thokkhi, Jisuna wasing asi loirabada, miyam aduna ibungogi tambiba aduda ingak ngaklammi; 

29 Maramdi makhoigi sastragi ojhasinggumna nattana matik leiba migumna tambirammi.

Matthi 08 

Jisuna angakpa thabak touba houba: kusthi thungba amabu, lanmi chamagi mapugi manaibu amasung simon-gi manembokpu phahanbiba


1 Ibungona ching adudagi lengtharakpa matamda, miyam yamna ibungogi tung ilaklammi; 

2 Amahiksung yengu, kusthi thungba amana ibungogi nakta laklaga khurumjaduna hai, he prabhu, ibungona yabirabadi, eibu senghanbiba ngammi. 

3 Amasung ibungona khut tingthoklaga mabu sokpiduna hai, eina yare, nahak sengjaro amasung khudak adumaktada magi kusthi laina adu sengkhre. 

4 Aduda Jisuna mangonda hairaki, yengu, nang kanadasu haidokkanu; adubu chatlu, purohitta nasamak utcharu amasung makhoida sakshi pinanaba, Mousigi yathang matung inna katnaba pot adu katcharu. 

5 Amasung Kapharnahumda ibungona changlaba matungda lanmi chammagi makok amana laklaga khurumjaduna hai, 

6 Prabhu, eigi inai adu nakal namma sithaba anabana yamna wana yumda hiptuna leiri. 

7 Ibungona mangonda hai, eina laktuna mahakpu phahangani. 

8 Amasung lanmi chammagi makok aduna khumlaki, prabhu, ibungona eigi yumda lengbirakpa itik chade, touigumbasung yathang aduta takpiragi eigi inaigi anaba phajagani. 

9 Maramdi eimaksu mapugi makhada leiba mini amasung eigi ikhada lanmising leiri; amasung eina mi asida, chatlu, hairaga mahakna chatli; atoppa amada, lak-u, hairaga lak-i; aduga eigi inaida, asi tou, hairaga toui. 

10 Amasung Jisuna madu tabada ngakladuna illibasingda hairak-i, eina nakhoida thanggei sengna hairibani, Israyelgi marakta asup yamna thajaba mi amatasu eina phangde. 

11 Aduga eina nakhoida hairi, nongpok amasung nong-chuptagi ayamba laktuna swarga leibakta Abraham, Isahak amasung Jakobka phamminnagani; 

12 Touigumbasung ninthougi leibak adugi machasingbu mapan-gi amambada hundokkani; mapham aduda kappa amasung maya krak krak chikpa oigani. 

13 Amasung Jisuna lanmi chammagi makok aduda hairak-i, chatlo, nahakki thajabagi matung inna nangonda oisanu. Amasung pungja aduda mahakki manai anaba pharammi. 

14 Amasung Jisuna Pitargi yumda lengsiklapada, magi manembok arum hou-duna hiplamba uraduna, 

15 Ibungona magi makhut soklabada arum kokkhre; amasung mana hougattuna ibungobu thougan toujarak-i. 

16 Amasung numidangda misingna ibungoda bhutna pubasingbu purakle, amasung wahei amana bhutsing adubu tanthoktuna anabasing pumnamakpu phahanbire. 

17 Iswargi wa takthokpa Jisaiyabu haihankhiba, Ibungomakna eikhoigi asol ana loubirammi amasung laina pumnamakpu pubirammi, haiba asi thungnanabani. 

18 Adudagi Jisuna mahakki akoibada miyam yamna leiba uraduna wangmada lannanaba yathang pibire. 

19 Amasung sastragi ojha amana ibungoda laktuna haijarei, he guru, ibungona lengba mapham khudingda tung injage. 

20 Amasung Jisuna mangonda hai, lamhuisinggi makhul lei, amasung atiyagi ucheksinggi mahum lei; touigumbasung migi macha nipa adugi kok thamphamdi leite. 

21 Amasung seboksinggi maraktagi atoppa amana ibungoda haijarak-i, prabhu, hanna ipabu potloinanaba eina chatchaba yabiyu. 

22 Touigumbasung Jisuna mangonda hai, eigi itung illu, amasung asibasingna makhoigi asibasingbu potloinanaba thanammu.


Nong nungsit khamjinba


23 Amasung ibungona hida lengkhatlabada ibungogi seboksingna tung injarammi. 

24 Amasung yengu, samadruda akanba nong-nungsit houraktuna; hi adu ithakna kupsillakle; touigumbasung ibungodi tumduna leirammi. 

25 Maduda makhoina laktuna ibungobu hodoklaga haijarak-i, prabhu, kanbiyu, eikhoi mangle. 

26 Amasung ibungona makhoida hai, he thajaphattabasa, nakhoina karigi kiribano? matung aduda ibungona lengkhattuna nungsit amasung samadrubu khamjille; amasung yamna taptha khre. 

27 Amasung mising aduna ngak-laduna hairak-i, , nungsit amasung samadrumakna mahakki yathang illiba asi karamba mino?


Bhutna puba Gadariyagi mi


28 Amahiksung ibungona wangmada Gadariyagi lamda lenglak pada mong-pham maraktagi thoklakpa bhutna puba mi ani ibungoga oknare. Makhoi thoi-dokna akibagi masak oiduna, lambi adomda kana amatana chatpa ngamnadre. 

29 Amasung yengu, makhoina laoduna haijarak-i, he iswargi macha nipa, nangga eikhoiga kari thoknaba leibage? Matam adu youdringeida ibungona eikhoibu wahanbige haina asida lakpiribra? 

30 Makhoidagi khara thapna ok mayamgi sanggu ama chaduna leirammi. 

31 Amasung bhutsing aduna ibungoda nonjaduna haijarak-i, eikhoibu tanthokpirabadi, ok sanggu aduda eikhoibu thajinbiyu. 

32 Amasung ibungona makhoida chatlu haina yathang pibire. Amasung makhoina thoklaktuna oksing aduda changkhre; amasung yengu, sanggu apumba adu angamba adudagi samadruda hothaduna isingda sikhre. 

33 Amasung sellambasing aduna chenkhiduna sahar aduda changkhraga, thokkhiba pumnamak amasung bhutna pubasinggi maramdu tamlure. 

34 Adudagi yengu, sahar pumnamak aduna Jisubu unanaba thorakle; amasung makhoina ibungobu uraba matamdia makhoigi lamdagi lengthokpinaba haijare.

Matthi 09 

Nakal namma sithaba anaba mi amabu phahanbiba


1 Amasung ibungona hi amada lengkhatlaga lanthoktuna ibungomakki saharda lenglakle. 

2 Amasung yengu, misingna nakal namma sithaduna naba mi amabu phamungna ibungoda purakli; amasung Jisuna mikhoigi thajaba adu uraduna, nakal namma sithaba aduda hai, icha, nungaijaro; nanngi papsing adubu kokpire. 

3 Aduga yengu, sastragi ojhasing kharana? nipa asi iswarbu thina ngangle, haina makhoi masen hainei. 

4 Amasung Jisuna makhoigi wakhal adu khangladuna hairak-i, nakhoina nakhoigi pukingda phattaba wakhal karigi khallibage? 

5 Maramdi nanggi papsing adubu kokpire haibaga, hougattuna koichat chatlu haibaga, karambana henna laibage? 

6 Touigumbasung migi macha nipa aduna taibanpanda papsingbu kokpinaba matik lei haiba nakhoina khang-nanaba (matam aduda nakal namma sithaba aduda hairak-i), hougatlo, nanggi phamung loukhattuna nayumda chatlu. 

7 Amasung, mana hougattuna mayumda chatkhre. 

8 Touigumbasung miyam adu mabu ubada kirammi, amasung misingda asigumba matik pibiba iswarbu thagatchare.


Matthibu koubiba chara henbagi marida tambiba


9 Amasung Jisuna mapham adudagi asum lenglakpada, Matthi kouba nipa ama khajna thiphamda phamliba uraduna, ibungona mangonda hai, eigi tung illu. Amasung mahakna hougattuna ibungogi tung injare. 

10 Amasung asum thoklare ibungona imungda chananaba phamlingeida, yengu, khajna thoubasing amasung papchenbasing laktuna Jisu amasung ibungogi seboksingga phamminnare. 

11 Amasung Pharisisingna madu uraduna, ibungogi seboksingda hairak-i; nakhoigi guruna khajna thoubasing amasung papchenbasingga karigi chaminnaribano? 

12 Touigumbasung ibungona madu taraduna hairak-i, masa phabasingdi maiba kannade, adubu anabasingdadi kannei. 

13 Touigumbasung eina nung-siheibabu pammi, aduga iratpotpu pamde, haiba asi karino nakhoina chattuna tamlukho. Maramdi eina dharmachenbasingbu kouba lakpa nate, adubu papchen-basingbuni. 

14 Matung aduda Johan-gi seboksingna ibungoda laktuna hairak-i, eikhoina amasung Pharisisingna chara helliba, aduga ibungogi seboksingnadi chara hendaba karigino? 

15 Amasung Jisuna makhoida hairak-i, borna marup mapangga leiminnaribamakhei makhoina tengthaba ngambra? touigumbasung asigumba numit lakkani, maduda bor adubu makhoidagi pukhigani, amasung matam aduda makhoina chara hengani. 

16 Aduga kananasu amanba phida ahanba phi machet photchinde, maramdi photchilliba phijet aduna phi adudagi chingsinduna mapham adu hennadum thina segaihalli. 

17 Misingna anouba draksha mahi amanba saun khaosingda hapnade; haplabadi, saunsing adu pokkhaiduna draksha mahi adu tai, amasung saun khaosing adusu mang-i; touigumbasung makhoina anouba draksha mahi anouba saun khaosingda hapnei, amasung animak ningthina thamle.


Jayirgi macha nupibu hinghanbiba amasung I tabi nupi amabu phahanbiba


18 Ibungona punmamak asi makhoida hairingeida, yengu, wayel thoudaba mapu amana ibungoda laklaga, khurumduna haijarak-i, eigi icha nupi houjikta sibta ngairi; touigumbasung lengbiraktuna ibungogi khutna mangonda thambiyu, amasung mana hingjagani. 

19 Amasung Jisuna lengkhattuna mahakki matung ille, aduga ibungogi seboksingsu chatle. 

20 Amasung yengu, chahi taranithoi i taduna narabi nupi amana tungda laktuna, ibungogi phiji adu sokle. 

21 Maramdi, eina ibungogi innaphi sokpata sokchara-badi, ei pumpha phagani, haina mapukningda ningjei. 

22 Aduda Jisuna onthok-tuna mabu uraga hai, icha nupi, nungai-jaro; nanggi thajabana nangbu phahan-bire. Amasung pung adudagi nupi adu pumpha phakhre. 

23 Amasung Jisuna wayel thoudaba mapu adugi yumda lengsinbada bangsi khongbasing amasung nink-hongliba miyam adu uraduna hairak-i, 

24 Handokpiyu; maramdi nupi macha asi side, tumlibani. Amasung makhoina ibungobu usittana noknei. 

25 Amasung miyam adu thokhankhrabada, ibungona manungda lengsinduna magi makhut paikhatlure, amasung nupi macha adu hinggatle. 

26 Amasung mingchat adu lam pumnamakta sin-thungkhre.


Mittangba mi ani bhutna puba marol thoktaba mi amabu phahanbiba


27 Amasung madudagi Jisuna asum lenglakpada mittangba anina, he Dayudki macha nipa, eikhoibu nungsibiyu, haina laora laoraduna ibungogi tung injarak-i. 

28 Amasung ibungona imungda lengsillabada, mittangbasing adusu ibungoda lakle; amasung Jisuna makhoida hai, eina masi touba ngammi haibasi nakhoi thajabra? Makhoina ibungoda haijei, hoi, prabhu. 

29 Matam aduda ibungona makhoigi mamit soktuna haibi, nakhoigi thajabagi matung inna nakhoida oisanu.
