30 Aintating makhoigi mamit pangthokle. Amasung, yengu, mi kana amatasu khanghan-ganu haina Jisuna makhoida akanba yathang piram-mi. 

31. Touigumbasung makhoina chatkhiduna, ibungogi mingchat adu leibak adugi apumbada koisan sandokkhre. 

32 Amasung makhoina asum chatthokpada, yengu, bhutna puba marol thoktaba mi amabu ibungoda purak-lammi. 

33 Amasung bhut adu tanthok-khrabada marol thoktaba adu thokle; maduda miyam aduna ngakladuna hairak-i, Israyelgi marakta asigumba asi keidoungeidasu ukhidri, 

34 Pharisising-nadi, bhutsinggi mapugi mapanna mahak-na bhutsingbu tanthoklibani, hainarammi. 

35 Amasung Jisuna makhoigi loisang loisangda tambiduna, ningthou-leibakki aphaba wapao sandoktuna, aduga laina pumnamak amasung asol ana pumnamakpu kokhanbiduna, sahar amasung khul pumnamakta koichat chatlammi. 

36 Touigumbasung ibungona miyam-sing adu ubada, makhoida nungsibiba pokle; maramdi makhoi adu senbiba leitaba jaosinggumna ka-ngaonaba amasung pambei leitaba oirammi. 

37 Matam aduda ibungona mahakki seboksingda hai, lou lokkadaba yammi, adubu lok-pinaba midi yamde; 38 Maram adu na ibungo mahakki lokkadaba louda thabak suba mi thabiraknaba lougi mapuda nonjou.

Matthi 10 

Sebok taranithoi amasung makhoibu thaba


1 Amasung ibungona, mahakki sebok taranithoi adubu kouraduna, sengdaba, thawaisingbu tanthoknaba, aduga laina pumnamakpu amasung asol ana pumnamakpu phahannaba matik ibungona makhoida pibirammi. 

2 Pakhonchatpa taranithoi adugi mamingdi asini: ahanbada Pitar kouba simon amasung mahakki manao Andriya: Sebedigi macha nipa Jakob, amasung mahakki manao Johan; 

3 Philip amasung Bartholomaya; Thoma amasung khajna louba Matthi; Alphiyagi macha nipa Jakob, amasung Thaddiya; 

4 Kannagi Simon, amasung yeknabagi makhutta ibungobu pithokpa Iskariyot Jihuda. 

5 Taranithoi asibu Jisuna yathang piduna sinnaraga thakhre, madudi, atoppa jatsinggi lambida chatluganu, amasung , Samariytasinggi karigumba saharda changannu, 

6 Touigumbasung Israyelgi imunggi mangkhraba yaosingda chatlu. 

7 Amasung nakhoina chatpada, swargagi Ieibak adu naksillakle haiduna sandok-u. 

8 Anabasingbu phahallu, asibasingbu hinggathallu, kusthi thungbasingbu senghallu, bhutsingbu tanthok-u. Nakhoina lemna phangjare, lemna pinou. 

9 Nakhoigi sengaoda sana oirabuse, lupa oirabasu, semkhai oirabasu puganu; 

10 Amasung lambigidamak paitukhao, phurit ani, khugrang nattraga cheisu langganu; maramdi thabak suba mina magi chinjak phangba matik chai. 

11 Amasung karigumba saharda oirabasu, khunda oirabasu, nakhoina changaga maduda kana matik chabage munna thiyu, amasung nakhoina chatthoktriba phaoba aduda leiyu. 

12 Amasung nahoina yum aduda changbada madubu khurummu. 

13 Amasung yum aduna matik charabadi, nakhoigi tapthaba adu yum adugi mathakta laksanu; touigumbasung yum aduna matik chadrabadi, nakhoigi tapthaba adu nakhoida hallaksanu. 

14 Amasung kanagumbana nakhoibu lousinbidrabadi nattraga nakhoigi wa adu tabidrabadi, yum adudagi nattraga sahar adudagi chatthokpada, nakhoigi khuyagi uphul kanthoklammu. 

15 Eina nakhoida thanggei sengna hairaibani, wayen-gi numitta sahar adudagi Sodom amasung Gomora leibakna henna saphagani. 

16 Yengu, keisalgi marakta eina yaogumna nakhoibu tharibani; maramaduna nakhoina lin-gumna singu, amaung lamkhunugumna pukchel tingu. 

17 Touigumbasung misinggi-damak sajel tou; maramdi makhoina nakhoibu ahallupsingda pithokkani, amasung makhoigi loisang loisangda nakhoibu thina phugani; 

18 Aduga makhoida amasung atoppa jatsingda sakshi pinanaba leibak ngakpasing amasung ningthousing phaoba eigidamak nakhoibu phukatkani. 

19 Touigumbasung nakhoibu pithoklaba matamda karamna natraga kari haigani haina langtaknaganu, maramdi kari nganggadage haiba adu pung aduda nakhoida pibigani 

20 Maramdi ngangliba adu nakhoina natte, touigumbasung nakhoigi napuknungda napagi thawaina nganglibani. 

21 Amasung machin manaona machin manaobu amasung mapana machabu sinanaba pithokkani; amasung macha singna mama mapagi mathakta houraktuna makhoibu hat-han-gani. 

22 Aduga eigi iminggi damak mi pumnamakna nakhoibu tukkachagini; touigumbasung aroiba phaoba khangba mahak adubu kanbigani. 

23 Touigumbasung makhoina nakhoibu sahar asida ot-neirabada, atoppa amada chellu; maramdi eina nakhoida thanggei sengna hairibani, migi macha nipi aduna lenglaktribaphaoba nakhoina Israyelgi sahar pumnamak thunglamloi. 

24 Sebokna magi gurugi mathak natte, aduga minaina mapugi mathak natte. 

25 Sebokna magi gurugumlaga aduga minaina mapugumlaga okle. Makhoina yumgi mapubu § Belsabul kourabadi, magi yum-aduda leiribasingbu kayamuk henna thina kougaba! 

26 Maram aduna makhoibu kiganu maramdi phongdokloidaba kupsinba karisu leite, aduga khangloidaba arotpa karisu leite. 

27 Eina nakhoida amambada haiba adu nakhoina anganbada ngangu, aduga nakhoina nanakongda taba adu yumthak kaduna laothok-u. 

28 Amasung hakchangbu hatlaga thawaibu hatpa ngamdaba makhoibu kiganu; touigumbasung thawai hakchang animakpu norokta manghanba ngamba ibungo mahakpu thoina kiyu. 

29 Sendang anida peisa amagidamak yondra? amasung makhoigi maraktagi amatasu nakhoigi napa nattanadi leipakta taroi. 

30 Amasung nakokki sam pumnamak adu phaoba masing thirabani. 

31 Maram aduna kiganu, nakhoidi sendang mayamdagi mamal helli. 

32 Maram aduna misinggi mamangda eibu yaba mi khudingmakpu einasu swargada leiba eigi ipagi mamangda mahakpu yabigani. 

33 Touigumbasung misinggi mamangda eibu yadaba kanagumba adubu einasu swargada leiba eigi ipagi mamangda yabiroi. 

34 Eina- prithibida ingthaba piba lak-pani haina khan-ganu; ei ingthaba piba lakpa natte, touigumbasung thangsang piba lakpani. 

35 Maramdi mi amaga mapaga, macha nupiga mamaga, amasung namouga manembokka yanahandanaba ei lakpani; 

36 Amasung migi yeknabadi, mahakki manunggi misingni. 

37 Mapa nattraga mamabu eingondigi henna nung-siba mahak adu eigini haiba matik chade; aduga machanipa nupibu eingondagi henna nungsiba mahak adu eigini haiba matik chade. 

38 Amasung magi kros puduna eigi itung illaktaba mahak adu eigini haiba matik chade. 

39 Mathawai kanjara ba mahak aduna madu manghan-gani; aduga eigi maramgi damak mathawai manghallaba mahak aduna madu kanjagani. 

40 Nakhoibu lousinba mahak aduna eibu lousinbani, aduga eibu lousinba mahak aduna eibu tharakpa ibungo mahakpu lousinbani. 

41 Iswargi wa takthokpa amabu iswargi wa takthokpani haina lousinba mahak aduna iswargi wa takthokpa amagi mana phangiagani; aduga dharmachenba amabu dharmachenbani haina lousinba mahak aduna dharmachenba amagi mana phangjagani. 

42 Amasung apikpasing asigi maraktagi amada sebokni haina kanagumbana ising aingba tenggot amatang thaknaba pibirabadi, eina nakhoida thanggei sengna hairibani, mahakki mana adu khak mangloi.

Matthi 11 

1 Amasung matou asum thoklare, Jisuna mahakki sebok taranithoi aduda takpiba loiraga, ibungona mapham adudagi makhoigi sahar saharda tambiba amasung pao sandokpa lengthokkhi.


Baptais toubiba Johan-gi wahang amasung Jisugi paokhum


2 Amasung Johanna keisumsangda Khristagi thabaksing adu taraga, mahakki seboksingbu tharaktuna, ibungoda hanggathallammi, 

3 Lenglakliba adu ibungora, nattraga eikhoina atoppa amabu ngaijakhigadra? 

4 Amasung Jisuna makhoida khumlak-i; nakhoina uba amasung taba pumnamak adu chattuna, Johan-da tammu: 

5 Mittangbasingna ujari, khongtekpasingna koijari, kusthi thung-basingna sengba phangjari, napang-basingna tajari, asibasingbu hinggathalli, sandokliba aphaba wapao adu leirabasingbu tahanbani. 

6 Amasung eingonda khudi thidaba mahak adu yaiphabani. 

7 Amasung makhoina chatkhrabada, Jisuna miyam aduda Johan-gi maramda haiba hourakle, nakhoina lamjaoda kari yengba chatlubage? Nungsitna lenghanba singutpura? 

8 Touigumbasung nakhoina kari unaba chatlubage? Amonba phi setpa mi amabura? Yengu, amonba phi setpa makhoi adudi ningthousinggi sanggaidaleibini. 

9 Touigumbasung karigi chatluribano? iswargi wa takthokpa amabu yengnanabara? hoi, eina nakhoida hairi, mahakti iswargi wa takthokpa amadagi helli. 

10 Masi mahak aduni, mahakki mar-amda iduna lei, madudi, yengu, eina eigi pakhonsibabu nanggi namangda thai; mahakna nanggi namangda nanggi lambi semgani. 

11 Eina nakhoida thanggei sengna hairibani, nupisingna pokpa makhoi adugi marakta baptais toubiba Johandagi henna chaoba kanasu phaokhidri. Adum oinamak swarga leibakta khawidagi henna pikpa mahak aduna mangondagi henna chao-i. 

12 Amasung baptais toubiba Johan-gi matamdagi houjik phaoba swargagi leibak asi pangganna laksilli, amasung laksillibasing aduna madu namduna louri. 

13 Maramdi iswargi wa takthokpasing pumnamak amasung wayel yathang aduna Johan phaoba takthokpikhre. 

14 Amasung nakhoina louge ninglabadi, lakkadouriba Eliya adu mahakni. 

15 Manakong panba mahak aduna tajasanu, 

16 Amasung eina miron asibu karida changdamnagadage? Masidi asigumba angangsingga mannei, makhoiduna keithenda phamduna makhoigi mapang-singbu kouduna hai; 

17 Madudi, eikhoina nakhoigidamak bangsi khongle ,adubu nakhoina jagoi sade; eikhoina tengthare adubu nakhoina thabak yeide. 

18 Maramdi Johanna chada-thaktana laklammi amasung makhoina mahakpu bhut pubani hai. 

19 Migi macha nipa aduna chathaktuna lengbirakle, amasung yengu, pukchaoba amasung yu thakpa, khajna thoubasing amasung papchen basinggi marupni, haina makhoina hai amasung lousingbu magi thabaksingna chummi haina utle.


Thajadabasingbu warakpa amasung potlum pithasingbu koubiba


20 Matung aduda ibungona mahakki ayamba toungamdaba thabak toukhiba sahar saharbu paothangnana cheiba hourakle; maramdi makhoina mapukning honglamde. 

21 He Khorasin, nangonda awabanida! he Betseida, nangonda awabanida! maramdi nakhoida toukhiba toungamdaba thabaksing adu Tur amasung Sidonda touramlabadi, adungeida thouri phi settuna amasung ut teiduna mapukning honglamgadabani. 

22 Touigumbasung eina nakhoida hairi, wayen-gi numitta nakhoidagidi Tur amasung Sidonna henna saphagani. 

23 Amasung he Kapharnahum, nangdi swarga phaoba wangkhatkadra? Nangdi khamnung, leibak phaoba, kumthagani; maramdi nangonda toukhiba toungamdaba thabaksing adu Sodomda touramlabadi, houjik phaoba Sodom leiramgadabani. 

24 Touigumbasung eina nakhoida hairi, wayen-gi numitta nangondagidi Sodom leibakna henna saphagani. 

25 Thoudok asida Jisuna hairak-i, he ipa, swarga amasung prithibigi prahhu, eina nahakpu thagatchari; maramdi nahakna hiramsing asibu asingbasing amasung akhangbasingdagi thuptuna thamlaga angang machasingda phongdok pire. 

26 Hoi, ipa, maramdi masina nahakki mityengda apenbani. 

27 Hiram pumnamak eigi ipana eingonda sinnabire; amasung mapa adunattana macha nipa adubu kananasu khangde, aduga macha nipa adu amasung macha nipa aduna mangonda phongdokningba kanagumba adu nattana, kananasu Mapabu khangde. 

28 Thabak wana suba amasung potlum puba pumnamak eingonda changjarku, amasung eina nakhoibu pothahanbigani. 

29 Eigi popu thakta thong-u, amasung eingondagi tamjou; maramdi eidi pukning tapi atnasung thamoi nemi; amasung nakhoina nakhoigi thawaida pothaba phangjagani. 

30 Maramdi eigi popudi lai, amasung eigi potlumdi yang-i.

Matthi 12 

Potthaba numit ngakpa


1 Matam aduda Jisuna potthaba numitta louyaida lenglak-i, amasung ibungogi seboksingna lamladuna, gehu charong hektuna chaba hourakle. 

2 Touigumbasung Pharisi-singna uradauna ibungoda hai, yengu, nahakki seboksingna potthaba numitta touba hounadaba thabak adu tou-i. 

3 Maduda ibungona makhoida hairak-i, Dayudna, mahak amasung mahakka loinabasingna lamlaba matamda kari toukhiba, 

4 Haibadi, mahakna iswargi sangda karamna changduna, purohitsingtana chaba yaba aduga mahak amasung mahakka loinabasingna chaba yadaba aut-tal adu makhoina chakhibage, haiba adu nakhoina padabra? 

5 Adu nattraga potthaba numitta, purohitsingna iswar ningnasangda potthaha numit adubu thugairabasu maral leite haiba asi nakhoina wayel yathang aduda padabra? 

6 Touigumbasung eina nakhoida hairibani, mapham asida iswar ningnasangdagi henna chaoba ama lei. 

7 Adubu eina nungsiheibabu pammi, iratpotpu pamde, haiba asi kari hairibano nakhoina khanglamlabadi, maral leitabasingbu lalhallammoidabani. 

8 Maramdi migi macha nipa adu potthaba numitki mapuni.


Makhut namma sithaba mi amabu phahanbiba


9 Amasung ibungona mapham adudagi lengthoklaktuna makhoigi loisangda lengsinkhi. 

10 Amasung yengu, makhut namma sithaba mi ama leirammi, aduga makkhoina ibungobu maral piba yanana-ba; potthaba numitta phahanba hounabra, haina ibungoda hangjarammi. 

11 Amasung ibungona makhoida hairak-i, nakhoigi naraktagi kanagumbagi yao ama leijaba adu potthaba numitta komda tarabadi, mahakna madubu paiduna loukhatloidra? 

12 Adu oirabadi, mina yaodagi kayada mamal helliba maram aduna potthaba numitta aphaba touba hounei. 

13 Mitam aduda ibungona mi aduda, nanggi nakhut tingthok-u, hai; aduda mahakna tingthoklak-i, amasung madu atoppa adugumna pumpha phare.

 

14 Touigumbasung Pharisising aduna thokkhiduna, ibungobu karamna mang-hansige haina wa tanarammi 

15 Amasung Jisuna khangladuna, mapham adudagi chatthokkhre. Amasung ayamba mina ibungogi tung injarik-i, aduga ibungona makhoi pumnamakpu anaba phahanbirammi; 

16 Amasung eibu mida khanghanganu haiduna ibungona akanba yathang makhoida pire. 

17 Masidi iswargi wa takthokpa Jisaiyabu haihankhiba adu thungnanabani, madudi, 

18 Yengu, eina khallaba inai, eigi thawaina yamna pellaba, eigi achanba; mangonda eina eigi thawai happigani; amasung mahakna atoppa jatsingda achumba wayel phongdokpigani. 

19 Mahakna angamsu talloi, laosu laoroi; aduga kananasu lambi lambida mahakki khonjel taroi. 

20 Ngamnanaba achumba wayenbu chathandriba phaoba, mahakna akaiba singut thudekloi amasung meikhu chenba limon muthatloi; 

21 Aduga mahakki mamingda atoppa jatsingna khourangna ninggani.


Jisudi seitan-gi pangbibana thabak touribani haibada Jisuna khumba


22 Matam aduda ibungoda bhutna puba, mittangba amasung marol thoktaba mi amabu purakle, amasung ibungona mabu phahanbire; aduda marol thoktaba aduna thokle amasung ujare. 

23 Maduda miyam pumnamak ingak ngakladuna hai-rak-i, masibu Dayudki macha nipa adura? 

24 Touigumbasung Pharisisingna masi tabada hairak-i, bhutsinggi mapu Belsabulgi mapan nattana, mi asina bhutsingbu tanthokpa natte. 

25 Amasung ibungona makhoigi wakhal adu khangladuna makhoida hai-rak-i, ningthou leibak khudingmakna masagi manungda nakpak tajarabada amangba thoklei; amasung sahar nattraga imung manung khudingmakna masagi manungda nakpak tajarabada panduna leiroi. 

26 Amasung seitanna seitanbu tanthoklabadi, mahakna masagi manungda nakpak tajare. Adu oirabadi; mahakki leibaki adu karamna pangadage? 

27 Amasung eina Belsabulgi matengna bhutsingbu tanthoklabadi, nakhoigi nacha nipasingna kanagi matengna makhoibu tanthokpage? Maram asina makhoina nakhojgi wayel mapu oigani. 

28 Touigumbisung eina iswargi thawaigi mapanna bhutsingbu tanthok-laba; adu oirabadi, iswargi leibak nakhoida laklabani. 

29 Adu nattraga kanagumbana akanba mi amagi mayumda changlaga mabu hanna pundana magi mapot machei adu karamna munba ngamgadage? Pullabatada magi yum adu lut tougani. 

30 Eiga loinadaba mahak aduna eigi yeknabani, amasung eiga khomjinminnadaba mahak aduna chaikhai. 

31 Maram asina eina nakhoida hairibani, misinggi pap amasung thina ngangba khudingmakpu kokpigani, adubu thawaibu thina ngangbadi kokpi-roi. 

32 Amasung migi macha nipa adugi mathakta wa ngangba kanagumba adubu kokpigani; touigumbasung thawai asengbagi mathakta ngangba kanagumba adubudi taibangpanba asidasu lakkadaba adudasu kokpiroi. 

33 Upambi amasung magi maheisu aphaba oihallu, nattraga upambi amasung magi maheisu phattaba oihallu; maramdi uheidagi upambi adu khang-i. 

34 He lingi dharasa, nakhoina phatti phattana karamna aphaba ngangba ngambage? Maramdi pukningda leiba ayamba adudagi chinna ngangthok-i. 

35 Aphaba mina aphaba pukkeidagi aphaba potsing puthoki, amasung phattaba mina phattaba pukkeidagi phattaba potsing puthok-i. 

36 Amasung eina nakhoida hairibani, misingna nganggadaba warem khudingmakki maram wayen-gi numitta pigadabani. 

37 Maramdi nanggi wahei-singdagi nangbu chummi haina, amasung nanggi waheisingdagi nangbu lalli haina singthanagani.


Khudam nijaba adu Ibungona yabidaba


38 Matam aduda sastragi ojhasing amasung Pharisising kharana, guru, eikhoina nangondagi khudam ama ujaningi, haina hairak-i. 

39 Touigumbasung ibungona makhoida khumlak-i, phattaba amasung §nupi lannaba mironna khudamna thi, amasung iswargi wa takthokpa Jonagi khudam nattana khudam maduda piraroi. 

40 Maramdi Jonana ahing nungthil numit humni achouba ngagi mapuk manungda leiramba adugumna migi macha nipa adunasu ahing nungthil numit humni leipakki mapuk manungda leigani. 

41 Ninabigi misingna wayen-gi matamda miron asiga loinana lepkhatlaktuna madubu aranbani haina utkani; maramdi Jonana pao sandokpada makhoina pukning honglammi, amasung yengu, asida Jonadagi henna chaoba ama lei. 

42 Makharomgi Ranina wayen-gi matamda miron asiga loinana hougatlaktuna, madubu aranbani haina utkani; maramdi mahakna prithibigi ngamkheidagi Solomon-gi lousing tage haina lak-lammi; amasung yengu, asida Solomon-dagi henna chaoba ama lei. 

43 Touigumbasung sengdaba thawaina mi amadagi chatthokpa matamda potthapham thiduna, ising leitaba lam lamda koichat chatli, adubu madu phangde. 

44 Matung aduda mana hai, eina thoklakkhiba iyum aduda ei hanjillage. Amasung mana lakpada, madu hanglamba, sitoklamba amasung leitenglamba ui. 

45 Matam aduda mana chatttuna mahakmaktagi henna phattaba atei thawai taretka loinaraktuna, changsinduna maduda lei; amasung mi adugi akonbagi phibam aduna ahanbadagi henna phatlakte. Phattaba miron asidasu maduga chap mannana thokkani.


Achumba ichin inao


46 Ibungona miyamsing aduda nganglingei adumaktada, yengu, ibungogi mama amasung manaosingna ibungoda wa hainingduna mapanda leplammi. 

47 Amasung kanagumba amana ibungoda hairak-i, yengbiyu, ibungogi ima amasung inaosingna ibungoda wa hainingduna mapanda lepli. 

48 Touigumbasung wa hairakpa mi aduda ibungona khumlak-i, eigi ima kanano, aduga eigi inaosing kana kanano? 

49 Amasung ibungona mahakki seboksinglomda khut tingthoktuna hai-rak-i, yengu, eigi ima amasung ichin inao-sing! 

50 Maramdi swargada leiba eigi ipagi ningba touba kanagumba adumakna eigi ichin inao, ichan iche amasung imani.

Matthi 13 

Swarga leibakki maramda Jisuna piba pandam tatret, Maru Hunba 

1 Numit adumaktada Jisuna yum adudagi lengthoklaktuna samadru mapanda phamle. 

2 Amasung miyam yamna ibungoda tillare, aduna ibungona hi amada lengsinduna phamlammi; aduga miyam apumbana samadru mapanda leplammi 

3 Amasung ibungona makhoida pandam piduna wa yamna nganglak-i. Madudi, yengu, maru hunba mi aduna hunba thoklakle. 

4 Amasung mahakna asum hullakpada, maru kharana lambigi mapanda taraduna, ucheksingna laklaga chathokkhi. 

5 Aduga kharana leipak kaya yamna leitaba nunglakta tai, amasung leipak luna leitabagi maramna thuna hourakle. 

6 Aduna numit karakpa matamda madu pumba khuithare, amasung mara leitaba maramna kangsu kangsille. 

7 Aduga kharana tingkhang marakta tai, amasung tingkhang adu houraktuna madu pumbabu namhatli. 

8 Touigumbasung ateisingdi aphaba leipakta taduna, kharana saruk chama, kharana humphu, kharana kunthra mahei palli. 

9 Manakong panba mahak aduna tajasanu.

 

10 Matung aduda seboksingna ibungoda laktuna haijei, ibungona laktuna karigi pandam piduna makhoida ngangbi-bage? 

11 Aduga ibungona makhoida khumlak-i, swarga leibakki athuppa wa khangnanaba nakhoida pibirabani, adubu makhoidadi pibide. 

12 Maramdi areiba mahak aduda pibigani, aduna mahakki thoina henna leijagani; touigumbasung leitaba mahak adudagi mahakki leijaba adu phaoba louthokkhigani. 

13 Maram asidagi eina makhoida pandam piduna nganglibani, maramdi makhoina yengdunasu ude, tadunasu tade, amasung khangde. 

14 Aduga Jisaiyagi takthokpa wa asi makhoida thungli, nakhoina tabadi tagani, aduga supkhang khangloi; amasung ubadi ugani, aduga wakhaldi supta taroi. 

 

15 Maramdi makhoina mamitna uba, manakongna taba, makhoigi pukningna khangba, amuk onsillakpa amasung eina makhoibu phahanba yadananaba, mising asigi pukning pangsinkhre, makhoigi mana tathire, amasung makhoigi mamit uisille. 

16 Touigumbasung nakhoigi namit yaiphabani, maramdi nakhoina ujei, amasung nakhoigi nanakong yaiphabani, maramdi nakhoina tajei. 

17 Maramdi eina nakhoida thanggei sengna hairibani, iswargi wa takthokpa amasung dharmachenba ayambana nakhoina uba adu uninglammi, adubu ukhide; aduga nakhoina taba adu taninglammi, adubu takhide. 

18 Adu oirabadi nakhoina maru hunbagi pandam asi tao. 

19 Kanagumba amana swarga leibakki wapao taraga, madu khangdrabada, phattaba aduna laktuna magi thamoida hunkhiba adu louthokkhi; lambi mapanda hunba aduna mahak asini. 

20 Aduga nunglakta hunba mahak aduna wapao adu taraga, thuna haraona loujei; 

21 Adumnadi oiraga mangonda mara leitabana ngaihaktamak khangi; touigumbasung wapao asigidamak awaba taba nattraga otneiba phanglaba matamda, mahakna thuna khudi thiduna tui. 

22 Aduga tingkhang marakta hunba mahak aduna wapao adu tai, aduga taibangpanbagi wakhal amasung lan-gi lounamna wapao adubu namhattuna, mahak mahei yandaba oiraki 

23 Aduga phaba leipakta hunba mahak adudi wapao adu taduna khangi, mahakna lepnamak mahei yanduna, kharana saruk chama, kharana humphu, kharana thra henna thok-i.


Napi maru


24 Ibungona makhoida atoppa pandam ama piduna hairak-i, swarga leibak adu magi loubukta aphaba maru hullamba mi amaga changdamnei. 

25 Touigumbasung misingna tumlingeida mahakki yeknabana laklaga, gehugi marakta napi marusu hullamduna chatkhre. 

26 Adithu mapanbi chaoraktuna mahei panba matamda, napi marusu ure. 

27 Aduga yumbu adugi minaisingna laktuna mangonda hai, ibungo, nahakna aphaba maru nahakki loubukta hullamba nattra? Adu oirabadi, napi maru leiriba asi kadaidagino? 

28 Aduda mahakna makhoida hai, yeknaba amana masi touramlibani. Minaising aduna mangonda hai, adudi eikhoina chattuna madu peisillu haibra? 

29 Touigumbasung mahakna hai, peisilluganu adu nattrabadi, nakhoina napi maru pengthokpada maduga loinana gehu adusu phuktokpa yai. 

30 Gehu loktriba phaoba animak houminnarasanu, amasung lokpa matamda eina akhao-basingda, napi adu henna khomjinduna mei thanaba mapul oina pullu, aduga gehu aduna eigi keida peisillu, haigani.


Hanggam maru Hamei


31 Ibungona atoppa pandam ama piduna makhoida hairak-i, swarga leibak adudi, mi amana louduna mahakki lou-bukta hanggam maru amagumbani. 

32 Maduna maru ateidagi henna piki, touigumbasung hourakpa matamda atei mana-masingdagi henna chaoraktuna upambi ama oirak-i; aduna atiyagi ucheksingna pairaktuna magi masasingda mahum sarei. 

33 Ibungona atoppa pandam ama makhoida hairak-i, swarga leibak adudi, nupi amana yam chang ahumda, pumnamak adu kamkhattriba phaoba, louduna happa hamei adugumbani. 

 

34 Jisuna hiram pumnamak asi miyamda pandam oina nganglammi, amasung ibungona pandam yaodana karisu nganglamde; 

35 Maduna iswargi wa takthokpabu haihankhiba adu thungba yananabani, haibadi, eina pandam oina ya kakhattuna nganggani, taibangpal houngeidagi lotliba pumnamak adu eina haidokkani. 

36 Adugi matungda Jisuna miyam adubu thadoklamduna, yum adugi manungda lengsille; amasung ibungogi seboksingna laktuna ibungoda hai, loubukki napi marugi pandam adu eikhoida phongdokna takpiyu. 

37 Aduda ibungona khumlak-i, aphaba maru hunba mahak adu migi macha nipa aduni; 

38 Loubuk aduna taibangpanni; aphaba maru adu, makhoidi ningthou-leibakki macha nipasingni; napi maru aduna phattaba adugi macha nipasingni; 

39 Makhoibu hunba yeknaba aduna Diyabolni; lokpa matam aduna tabangpanbagi aroibani; aduga akhaobasing aduna swargadutni. 

40 Maram aduna napi adu khomjillaga meida thajin-bagumna, taibangpanbagi aroibida matou adugumna oiragani. 

41 Migi macha nipa aduna mahakki swargadutsing tharaktuna, khudi thihanba pumnamak amasung ayol aral toubasingbu ibungogi leibaktagi khomjinduna makhoibu meigi komda langsin-gani. 

42 Mapham aduda kappa amasung maya krak krak chikpa oigani. 43 Matam aduda dharma chenbasingna makhoigi §mapagi leibakta numitkumna nganthoklakkani. Manakong panba mahak aduna tajasanu.


Aronba lan Mukta In


44 Swarga leibak adu loubukta lotpa lan-gumbani; madu mi amana phangjara-duna lotle, amasung haraona chatkhiduna mahakki leijaba pumnamak yonthoklaga, loubuk adu leijei. 

45 Amukka, swarga leibak adu aphaba mukta thiba lallonba mi amagumbani; 

46 Amasung mamal yamlaba mukta ama phangjaduna, chatkhraga mahakki leijaba pumnamak yonthoktuna madu leijare. 

47 Amuksu, swarga leibak adu samadruda hunba, nga jat khudingmak khomjinba in ama gumbani; 

48 Maduna thallaba matamda makhoina samadru mapanda chingkhatle, aduga phamtharaduna aphaba makhei tunggonda khunjille, touigumbasung phattaba makhei hundokkhre. 

49 tTaibangpanbagi aroibada matou adugumna oiragani. Swargadutsingna laktuna dharmachenbasinggi maraktagi phattabasingbu khaidok-laga, 

50 Makhoibu meigi komda langsin-gani. Mapham aduda kappa amasung maya krak krak chikpa oigani. 

51 Maram pumnamak asi nakhoina khanglabra? Makhoina ibungoda hairak-i, ahoi. 

52 Aduda ibungona makhoida hai-rak-i, maram aduna swarga leibakta sebok oihallaba sastragi ojha khudingmak mahakki lan-geidagi anouba amasung ariba potsing puthoklakpa yumbu ama-gurnbani.


Nasretta Jisubu yabidaba


53 Amasung asum thoklare, Jisuna pandamsing asi haiba loiraga, mapham adudagi lengthokkhre. 

54 Aduga ibun-gona masamakki khunda lengduna, mak-hoigi loisangda asumna makhoibu tambirammi, maduda makhoina ngakladuna hairak-i, nipa asigi lousing amasung toungamdaba thabaksing asi kadaidagi-no? 

55 Masi usuba adugi macha nipa nattra? Mahakki mamadu Mariyam koudra? Aduga manaosingdi Jakob, Jouseph, Simon amasung Jihuda nattra? 

56 Machansing pumnamak eikhoiga leiminnariba nattra? Adu oirabadi, nipa asida pumnamak asi kadaidagino? 

57 Matou asumna makhoina ibungoda khudi thire. Touigumbasung Jisuna makhoida hai, iswargi wa takthokpa mi mahakmakki mareibakta amasung mahakmakki imung manungda nattana ikaikhumnadaba natte. 

58 Amasung makhoigi thajadabagi maramna mapham aduda ibungona tougamdaba thabak yamna touramde.

Matthi 14 

Baptais toubiba johanbu hatpa


1 Matam aduda Herod ningthouna Jisugi maram adu taraduna, 

2 Mahakki manaisingda hairak-i, baptais toubiba Johan adu asini. Mahakpudi asi-basinggi maraktagi hinggatpire, maram aduna mangonda toungamdaba thabak toubagi matik leiribani. 

3 Maramdi Herodna mahakki manao nipa Philipki nupi Herodiyagi masung-langgi damak Johanbu phaduna pullaga keisumsangda thamlammi. 

4 Maramdi Johanna mangonda haikhi, nahakna mabu louba wayel kai. 

5 Aduna mabu hatninglabasu, mahakna miyambu kirammi, maramdi makhoina mabu iswargi wa takthokpa mi amani haina lourami. 

6 Toui-gumbasung Herodki mapok numit oira-bada, Herodiyagi macha nupina makhoigi mamangda jagoi saduna Herodpu pelhalle. 

7 Maduda mahakna mangonda karigurnba nijaba adu pibigani haina akanba wasakka loinana hairammi. 

8 Aduda mamagi thouinsindagi mana hai, mapham asida, baptais toubiba Johan-gi makok adu sempak amada haptuna eingonda pinabiyu. 

9 Ningthou aduna thawai warabasu, mahakki wasak amasung chaminnariba makhoi adugi damak, madu pinanaba yathang pibire. 

10 Amasung mahakna mi thara-duna keisumsangda Johan-gi makok kamhallure. 

11 Mahakki makok adu sempak amada puraktuna leisabi aduda pirabada, mana mamada purakle. 

12 Amasung mahakki seboksingna laklaga asiba masa adu loukhattuna mahakpu phumlure, aduga makhoina laktuna Jisuda tamlare.


Mi lising mangabu pijaba


13 Jisuna madu taraduna, mapham adudagi hida tongduna achikpa mapham amada tonganna theidokkhre; amasung madu tarabada, miyamna sahar sahar-dagi khongna ibungogi tung injare. 

14 Amahiksung Jisuna lengthokrakpada miyam yamna uraduna, makhoibu nungsiba poktuna, makhoigi anaba phahanbire. 

15 Adudagi numidangwai oirabada, seboksingna ibungogi maphamda laktuna haijarak-i, masi achikpa maphamni, matamsu houkhre; miyam asi khun khunda chattuna makhoigi damak chanaba leijarunanaba thabikhro. 

16 Touigumbasung Jisuna makhoida hai, makhoina chat-thokpa kannade; nakhoina makhoida chanaba piyu. 

17 Amasung makhoina ibungoda haijarak-i, eikhoigi tandum manga amasung nga ani nattana asida karisu leijade. 

18 Aduda ibungona hai, asida madu eingonda purak-u. 

19 Aduga ibungona miyam adubu napi mathakta phammu haiduna yathang piraga, tandum manga amasung nga ani adu loure, aduga swargada yengkhattuna bor pibire, amasung thugaiduna talsing adu seboksingda piraga seboksingna madu miyamda pirammi. 

20 Amasung makhoi pumnamakna chaduna mapuk thalle, aduga makhoina aremba machet makai adu khungatpada thummuk taranithoi thalli. 

21 Aduga chaba makhoi adu nupi angang thadana nipa lising mangarom oirammi.


Jisuna ising mathakta khongna lengba


22 Amahiksung khudak aduda ibungona miyam adubu thadokkhidriba phaoba ibungogi seboksingbu hi tongduna mang thana wangmada chathallammi. 

23 Adudagi ibungona miyam adubu thadokkhraga, haijananaba chingda tonganna lengkhatle; amasung numidang-wai oiraklabada, mapham aduda ibungo matomta mangairammi. 

24 Touigumbasung hi adu matam aduda ithakna wahanduna kangphandagi yamna lapna leirammi, maramdi nungsit maiyoknarammi. 

25 Ahinggi yuthak mari taba matamda ibungona samadru mathakta khongna chattuna makhoi tanna lenglak-i. 

26 Seboksingna ibungona samadru mathakta khongna lengba ubada, pakhattuna hairak-i, masi tamnaba laini, amasung kiduna makhoina laorak-i. 

27 Touigumbasung Jisuna khudak aduda makhoida hairak-i, pukning lumna leiyu; eini; kiganu. 

28 Aduda Pitarna ibungoda khumlammi, prabhu, ibungo oirabadi, ibungogi maphamda eina ising mathakta laknaba yathang pibiyu. 

29 Ibungona hai, lak-u. Amasung Pitarna hidagi kumtharaga, ising mathakta khongna chattuna Jisuda laklammi. 

30 Touigumbasung mahakna nungsit adu ubada kirammi, amasung luppa hourakladuna, prabhu, eibu kanbiyu, haina laorak-i. 

31 Khudak aduda Jisuna khut tingthoktuna pharaga mangonda hai, he thajaphattaba, kari maramdagi nangna chingnabage? 

32 Amasung makhoina hida kakhatlaba matamda nungsit adu lepkhre. 

33 Aduga hinungda leiba makhoi aduna ibungobu khurumjaduna haijaraki, achumbamak, ibungo nahak iswargi macha nipani. 

34 Adudagi makhoina lanthokkhiduna Gennesaretki laidamda lakle. 

35 Aduga mapham adugi misingna ibungobu khangladaba lam adugi akoibada leiba maphampumnamakta pao thakhiduna, anaba pumnamak ibungoda pujarakle; 

36 Amasung makhoina ibungogi phiji adu sokpata sokchanaba ibungoda haijaramini; aduna sokchaba makheibu pumpha phahanbire.

Matthi 15 

Chatnarakliba hounabi kaibagi Jisuna khumba


1 Matam aduda Jerusalemdagi Pharisising amasung sastragi ojha-singna Jisuda laktuna hairei, 

2Nahakki seboksingna ahallman-gi chatnarakliba karigi thugaibage? Maramdi makhoina chaba matamda makhut hamde. 

3 Aduda ibungona makhoida khumlak-i, nakhoisu nakhoigi chatnarakliba adugi damakta iswargi yathang thugaiba karigino? 

4 Maramdi iswarna hairammi, nama napabu ikai khumnou, amasung mama mapabu thin ngangba mahak adu sisanu. 

5 Touigumbasung nakhoina hai, kanagumbana mama nattraga mapada, eingondagi nakhoina kannaba phangba yaba adu iswarda katthokkhre, hairagadi, mahak aduna mapabu khak ikai khumnaroi. 

6 Amasung nakhoigi chatnarakliba adugidamak nakhoina iswargi yathangbu karisu oihande. 

7 Aphasajaningbasa, Jisaiyana nakhoigi maramda ningthina takthok-lammi. 

8 Mising asina eibu chinbanthongna ikaikhumnei, Touigumbasung makhoigi pukningdi eingondagi thapna lei; 

9 Amasung makhoina misinggi chatnaba yathang adubu dharmagi paotakkumna tambiduna eibu arembada khurumjei. 

10 Matung aduda ibungona miyam adu nakta kousillaga makhoida takpirak-i, khangnanaba tao, 

11 Chinda changkhiba aduna mibu manghande, touigumbasung chindagi thoklakliba aduna mibu mang-halli. 

12 Matam aduda seboksingna laktuna ibungoda hairei, wa adu tabada Pharisisingna khudi thire haiba ibungona khangbibra? 

13 Touigumbasung Ibungona khumlak-i, eigi swargagi ipana thadaba pambi khudingmakpu phuktokkani. 

14 Makhoi leijasanu; makhoi mittangba lamjingbani. Amasung mittangbana mittangbabu chinglabadi, animak komda tagani. 

15 Aduda Pitarna ibungoda khumlak-i, pandam adu phongdokna takpiyu. 

16 Amasung ibungona hairak-i, nakhoisu houjik phaoba khangdri-bra? 

17 Chinda changkhiba makhei adu pukta taduna manung changbada chatkhi haiba nakhoi kbangdabra? 

18 Toui-gumbasung chindagi thoklakpa potsing adu pukningdagi lakpani, amasung makhoi aduna mibu manghalli. 

19 Maramdi phattaba wakhal, mi hatpa, mitu-miwa lannaba, marumbi thamba, huranba, aranba sakshi piba, thin ngangba, asi pukningdagi thoklak-i. 

20 Mibu manghanbadi pumnamak asinani, touigumbasung hamdaba khutna chabadi mibu man-ghande.


Atoppa jatki leisabi amabu phahanbiba


21 Matung aduda Jisuna mapham adudagi lengthoklaktuna, Tur amasung Sidon-gi lamda theidokkhre. 

22 Amasung yengu, lamdam adudagi Kananiya nupi ama laktuna laojarak-i, Dayudki macha nipa, He Prabhu, eibu nungsibiyu; eigi icha nupibu bhut amana yamna wana otpire. 

23 Touigumbasung ibungona mangonda wa amata khumlamde. Amasung ibungogi seboksingna laktuna, mabu thadokpikhro, maramdi mahakna eikhoigi tungda lao-i, haina ibungoda hai-jaduna leirammi. 

24 Ibungona khumlak-i, Israyelgi imunggi mangkhraba yao-singda thaba nattana eibu tharakte. 

25 Touigumbasung mana laktuna ibungobu khurumjaduna haijarak-i, prabhu, eigi iteng pangbiyu. 

26 Aduda ibungona khumlak-i, angangsing adugi tal louduna huisingda hunjinba chumde. 

27 Touigumbasung mana hai-jarak-i, chummi, Prabhu, maramdi huising adunasu makhoigi mapusinggi mejdagi tarakpa makup makai chai. 

28 Matam aduda Jisuna Mangonda khumlak-i, he nupi, nang yamna thajare; nangna ningjaba adu nangonda oirasanu. Amasung magi macha nupi adu pungja adudagi phahanbire.


Mi ayambabu anaba phahanbiba


29 Amahiksung Jisuna mapham adudagi sandokkhiduna, Galil samadrugi manakta lenglak-i, amasung chingda lengkhattuna mapham aduda phamle. 

30 Amasung miyam yamna ibungoda laktuna, makhoiga loinana khong tekpa, khut soiba, mittangba, lol thoktaba amasung atei yamna puraktuna ibungogi khuyada hek thamjarare, amasung ibungona makhoibu phahanbire. 

31 Maduna lol thoktabasingna ngangjaba, khong tekpasingna chatchaba, mittangbasingna ujaba asi ubada miyam duna ngakladuna Israyelgi iswargi matik magun thagatle.


Mi lising maribu pijaba


32 Matam aduda Jisuna mahakki seboksingbu kousinduna hairak-i, eina miyam asida nungsiba pokle, maramdi makhoina eiga loinana numit humni leiminnaraduna makhoigi chanaba leitre; amasung makhoi lambenda wanthagadra haiduna eina makhoibu chara helhanduna thadokningde. 

33 Seboksingna ibungoda haijarak-i, miyam asup yambagi oknaba talbu lamhang asida eikhoina kadaidagi phanggadage? 

34 Aduda ibungona makhoida hai, nakhoigi tandum kaya yaori-bage? amasung makhoina haijei, tandum taretka nga macha kharaga yaojari. 

35 Aduga ibungona miyam adubu leipakta phamthananaba yathang piraga, 

36 Tandum taret amasung ngasing adu louduna thagatchare hairaga, thugaiduna seboksingda pibire, aduga seboksingna miyamda pire. 

37 Amasung makhoi pumnamak chaduna thalle; aduga lemhouba machet makai adu khungatpada thumuk taret thalli. 

38 Nupi angang thadana chakhiba makhoi adu nipa lising marini. 

39 Adudagi ibungona miyam adubu thadokkhraga, hida lengsinduna Magadan-gi lamdamda lenglakle.

Matthi 16 

Khudam nijabada Jisuna yabidada


1 Amahiksung Pharisisingga Saddukisingga laklaga ibungobu chang yengba oina swargadagi khudam ama makhoida uhannanaba ibungoda haijarammi. 

2 Touigumbasung ibungona makhoida khumlak-i, numidangwai oirakpada, nakhoina hai, nong ching thangdaba numit oigani, maramdi atiya asi ngang-i; 

3 Amasung ayuktana, ngasi nong ching thangba numit oigani, maramdi atiya asi ngang-i amasung mamsilli. Nakhoina atiyagi matou yeng laga kari thokkani haiba khang-i, touigumbasung matamgi khudamdi kari thokkani haiba ngamde. 

4 Phattaba amasung nupi lannaba mironna khudam thi, amasung Jonagi khudam nattana khudam amata maduda piraroi Adudagi ibungona makhoibu thanamduna lengthokkhre.


Ibungona seboksinggi wakhal tadaba adu warakpiba


5 Matung aduda seboksingna wangmada lakpada tal purakpa kaoramle; 

6 Amasung Jisuna makhoida hairammi, Pharisi amasung Saddukisinggi hammei adu cheksillu amasung sajel tou. 

7 Aduda makhoi masen khannaduna hainei, eikhoi tal purakte. 

8 Jisuna madu khangladuna hairak-i, he thajaphattabasa, nakhoigi tal leite haiduna nakhoi nasen karigi khannabage? 

9 Mi lising manga adugi tandum manga amasung nakhoi-na thumuk kaya khungatpage haiba, 

10 Aduga mi lising mari adugi tandum taret amasung nakhoina thumuk kaya khungatpage haiba adu nakhoina houjik phaoba khangsu khangdribra, aduga ningsu ningsingdriba? 

11 Eina talgi maramda nakhoida ngangde haiba adu nakhoina karamna khangdabage? Touigumbasung Pharisi amasung Saddukisinggi hamei adubu sajel tou. 

12 Maram aduda talgi hameibu natte, touigumbasung pharisi amasung Saddukisinggi tambiba adubu sajel tou, haina ibungona yathang pibani haiba makhoina khangjare.


Jisubu Khristamakni haina Pitarna haidokpa


13 Jisuna Kaisariya Philippigi lam-damda lenglakpada mahakki seboksingda hanglak-i, misingna migi macha nipa adubu kanani hainabage? 

14 Aduga makhoina hairak-i, kharana baptais toubiba Johan aduni, kharana Eliyani, amasung ateisingna Jirimiyani nattraga iswargi wa takthokpasinggi amani, hai. 

15 Ibungona makhoida hai, adubu nakhoinadi eibu kanani haina-bage? 

16 Amasung Simon Pitarna khumlak-i, ibungo nahakti ahingba iswargi macha nipa, Khrista aduni. 

17 Aduda Jisuna mangonda khumlak-i, Simon Barjona, nangdi yai-phei; maramdi swargada leiba eigi ipa nattana i-tong yaobana masi nangonda phongdok lamba natte. 

18 Aduga eisu nangonda hairi, nangdi Pitarni, amasung nungjao asigi mathakta eina eigi singlup hougani, aduga khamnung leibakki thong aduna madubu laksilloi. 

19 Eina nangonda swarga leibakki so adu pibigani, amasung prithibida nangna karigumba punba adu swargada pun-gani, aduga prithibida nangna karigumba thadokpa adu swargada thadokkani. 

20 Matam aduda ibungona seboksingda, ei Khristani haiba asi kana dasu haidokkanu haina kanna sinnare.


Jisuna mahakki siba amasung hinggatpagi wa mangjounana khanghanbiba


21 Matam adudagi Jisu Khristana mahakki seboksingda, mahakna Jerusalemda chatpa tai, ahallamansing, athoiba purohitsing amasung sastragi ojhasing makhutta ayamba awa anang khangle hairaga, mahakpu hatpa tai amasung numit humni subada hinggatpa tai, haiba asi utpa houre. 

22 Amasung Pitarna ibungobu manakta pusillaga warakpa hourak-i, prabhu, madu iswarna thapna thambisanu, madu ibungoda supoi oiroi. 

23 Touigumbasung ibungona onsillaktuna Pitarda hairak-i, itungda chatthokkhro, seitan; nahak asi eigi khudi thipham ama oire; maramdi nahakna iswargi oiba adu khande, touigumbasung migi oiba adu khalli.


Mina masa mathantabu yajadanaba Jisuna kouba


24 Matam aduda Jisuna mahakki seboksingda hairammi, kanagumbana eigi itung inninglabadi, mahakna masa matomtabu yajadasanu, mahakki kros loukhatsanu amasung eigi itung injasanu. 

25 Maramdi mathawai kanjaningba kanagumba aduna madu mangjagani; aduga eigi maramgi damak mathawai mangjaba kanagumba aduna madu phangjagani. 

26 Maramdi mi amana taibangpan apumba phangjaraga, mahakki thawai mangjarabadi, magi kari tongjabage? nattraga mi amana magi thawaiga kariga sinnagadage? 

27 Maramdi migi macha nipa aduna mahakki mapagi matik manganda mahakki swargadutsingga loi-nana lakkani, amasung matam aduda mi khudingmakta magi magi thabakki matung inna mahei pibigani. 

28 Eina nakhoida thanggei sengna hairibani, asida lepliba makhoi kharadi, migi macha nipa aduna mahakki ningthou-leibakta lakpa udriba phaoba, sibagi mahao khak tangloi.

Matthi 17 

Jisugi saklon hongba


1 Amahiksung numit taruknigi matungda Jisuna mahakka loinana Pitar, Jakob amasung magi manao Johanbu puduna awangba chingda makhoibu tonganna pukhatle. 

2 Amasung Ibungona makhoigi mamangda saklon hongle, aduga ibungogi maithong adu numit kumna nganthokle, amasung ibungogi phirol adu mangan-gumna ngourakle. 

3 Aduga yengu, Ibungoga wa ngangnaduna Mousi amasung Eliya makhoigi mangda phao-rakle. 

4 Aduda Pitarna Jisuda hanggat-charak-i, Prabhu eikhoina mapham asida leijaba phei; Ibungona yabirabadi, asida eina khangpok ahum, Ibungogi damak ama, Mousigi damak ama, amasung Eliyagi damak ama sajage. 

5 Mahakna nganglingeimaktada, yengu, arangba leichin amana makhoibu khanjillare, amasung yengu, leichin adudagi khonjel amana hairak-i, masi eigi nung-siraba icha nipani; mangonda eina yamna pelle; nakhoi mahakna haiba tao. 

6 Seboksingna madu tabada, uprakna tuthajare, amasung yamna kirammi. 

7 Amasung Jisuna lenglaklaga makhoibu soktuna hai, hougatlo, kiganu. 

8 Makhoina yengkhatlakpada Jisu matommata nattana kana amatabu ukhidre. 

9 Amahiksung makhoina chingdagi asum kumtharakpada, Jisuna makhoida, migi macha nipa aduna siba-dagi hinggattriba phaoba mi kanadasu nakhoina uba adu haidokkanu haina yathang pibirammi. 

10 Aduda seboksingna ibungoda hang-jarak-i, adu oirabadi, sastragi ojhasingna Eliyana hanna lakpa tai haina karigi hai-bage? 

11 Amasung Ibungona khumlak-i, Eliya laktuna pot pumnamak hanjin-gani, chummi; 

12 Adubu eina nakhoida hairi, Eliyadi lakkhrabani amasung makhoina mahakpu khanglamde, touigumbasung makhoina pamba adu mangonda toukhre. Adugumna migi macha nipa adusu makhoigi makhutta awaba khanggani. 

13 Matam aduda Ibungona baptais toubiba Johan-gi maramda makhoida ngangbani haiba seboksingna khangle.


Bhut changba nipa macha amabu phahanbiba


14 Adudagi makhoina miyamda laklabada, mi amana Ibungoda laklaga khurukhudak kunduna haijarak-i. 

15 Prabhu, eigi icha nipabu nungsibiyu, maramdi ma sarei houduna yamna wana leire; maramdi ma meida amasung isingda toina tai. 

16 Amasung eina Ibungogi seboksingda mabu pujarak-i, aduda makhoina mabu phahanba ngamdre. 

17 Amahiksung Jisuna khumlak-i, he thajadaba amasung serannaba miron, eina nakhoiga kaya kuina leiminnagadge? Eina nakhoibu kaya kuina khanggadage? mabu eingonda purak-u. 

18 Amasung Jisuna mabu cheihatpada bhut adu mangondagi thokkhre, aduga pungja adudagi angang adu phare. 

19 Matam aduda seboksingna Jisuda tonganna laktuna haijare, eikhoina masi tanthokpa ngamdriba karigino? 

20 Amasung Ibungona makhoida hai, nakhoina khajikta thajabanani; maramdi eina nakhoida thanggei sengna hairibani, nakhoina hanggam maru amamuk thajaba leirabadi, nakhoina chingjao asida haigani, asidagi ada hongdok-u, amasung maduna hongdokkani; adup nakhoida oithoktaba karisu leiroi: 

(21 Touigumbasung asigumba asi iswarda haijaba amasung chara henba nattana thokkhide).


Jisuna mahakki sibagi waram mangjounana Tambiba anirak suba


22 Makhoina Galiida pullap pullingeida Jisuna makhoida hai, migi macha nipa adubu misinggi makhutta pithokkadouri, 

23 Aduga makhoina mahakpu hatkani, amasung numit humni subada mahak hinggatkani. Amasung makhoi thoidokna warammi.


Iswar ningnasanggi kanggat ibungona piba


24 Makhoina Kapharnahumda lakpa matamda sekal makhai louba makhoi aduna Pitarda laktuna hairammi, nakhoigi guruna makhai pidabra? Mahakna hai pi, 

25 Amasung mahakna imung changlakpada Jisuna mangonda hannana hairak-i, Simon, nahak kari khanbage? Prithibigi ningthousingna kanadagi kanggat nattraga loipot loubage? Makhoigi macha nipasingdagira atoppa misingdagira? 

26 Mahakna atoppa singdagini haiba matamda, Jisuna mangonda hai, maram aduna macha nipasingdi pipham thokte. 

27 Adumakpu eikhoina makhoibu khudi thiba touhandanaba nahak samadruda chattuna khoi choplu, aduga ahanba thuba nga adu haigatlu; amasung nahakna madugi maya phaktokpada sekal ama phanggani; madu louduna eigi amasung nanggidamak makhoida pikho.

Matthi 18 

Swarga leibakta khwaidagi henna chaoba kanano? mibu khudi thihandanaba paomenba


1 Pungja aduda seboksingna Jisuda laktuna haijarak-i, swarga leibaktabu kanana khwaidagi henna chaobage? 

2 Aduda ibungona apikpa angang ama kousillaga, mabu myaida thamduna hairak-i, 

3 Eina nakhoida thanggei sengna hairibani, nakhoina onsillaktuna apikpa angangsinggumna oirakpa nattanadi, swarga leibakta sup-chang changloi. 

4 Maram aduna kanagumbana apikpa angang asigumna masana nollukcharakpa mahak aduna swarga leibakta khwaidagi henna chao-i 

5 Aduga kanagumbana eigi imingda asigumba apikpa angang amabu lousinjara-badi, eibu lousinjabani. 

6 Touigumba-sung kanagumbana eingonda thajaba apikpasing asigi amabu khudi thihan-babudi, magi mangakta achouba chakkri-nung thangduna samadrugi aruba maphamda luphanbana magi tongiabani. 

7 Khudi thipham yamna leibagidamak taibangpan asida awabanida! maramdi pumnamak asi thoktaba yade touigumba-sung khudi thiba thokhanba mi aduda awabanida! 

8 Amasung nanggi nakhong nattraga nakhutna nangbu khudi thiba thokhallabadi, madu kakthattuna nangondagi langthokkho; nanggi nakhut ani nattraga nakhong ani panna atat akham leitraba meinungda langsinbagi saruk-pudi, khut soina nattraga khong tekna hingba aduda changbana nanggi henna phei. 

9 Amasung nanggi namitna nangbu khudi thiba thokhallabadi, madu kotthoktuna nangondagi langthokkho; nanggi namit ani panna norokki meida lang-sinbagi sarukpudi, namma tangna hingba aduda changbana nanggi henna phei. 

10 Cheksillu, apikpasing asigi amabu nakhoina thouoidaba touganu; maramdi eina nakhoida hairi, swargada makhoigi dutsingna swargada leiba eigi ipagi maithong itattattana ujei. 

(11 Maramdi migi macha nipa aduna mangkhraba adubu kanbinanaba lakle.)


Mangkhiba yaogi pandam


12 Nakhoi karamna khanbage? Kanagumba nipa amagi yao chama leiba adugi maraktagi ama mangkhrabadi, mahakna mariphutara-mapal adubu chingda thanamlaga, mangkhiba adu thiba chat-loidra? 

13 Amasung mana madu phang-lakpa thoklabadi, eina nakhoida thanggei sengna hairibani, mana mangdaba mariphutara-mapal adudagi henna maduda haraojei. 

14 Matou asumna apikpasing asigi ama mangbadi, swargada leiba eigi ipagi mangda apamba pot ama natte.


Aranba touba misingbu karamna laknagadaba Pukning tinnana haijaba


15 Amahiksung nanggi nachin nanaona pap tourabadi, chattuna nangga magata leibada, magi maral adu mangonda utlu; mana nangna haiba adu tabirabadi, nangna nachin nanao adubu amuk phang-jare. 

16 Touigumbasung mana nangna haiba adu tabidrabadi, sakshi ani ahumgi machinda wa khudingmak lepnanaba, mi ama ani henna nangga loinana puro. 

17 Amasung mana makhoina haiba adu tao yadrabadi, madu singlupta tak-u; aduga mana singlupki wa adusu tao yadra-badi, nangonda ma atoppa jat amasung khajna thouba amagumna oisnu. 

18 Eina nakhoida thanggeisengna hairibani, prithibida nakhoiona karigumba punba adu swargada pun-gani, aduga prithibida nak-hoina karigumba thadokpa adu swargada thadokkani. 

19 Amukka eina nakhoida hairi, prithibida nakhoigi maraktagi anina karigumba ama nijagadaba adugi maramda mapukning tinnajarabadi, eigi swargada leiba ipana makhoida madu oihanbigani. 

20 Maramdi eigi imingda ani ahum punna tinnaba mapham aduda eina makhoigi marakta lei.


Kokpinabagi tougadaba mathou amasung toubimal Khangdaba minaigi pandam


21 Matam aduda Pitarna laktuna ibungoda haijarei, Prabhu, eigi ichin inaona eingonda pap touraga eina kayarak kokpigani? Taretlak phaobra? 

22 Jisuna mangonda hairak-i, eina nangonda taret-lak phaobata haiba natte, touigumbasung tarettu humphu tararak phaoba haibani. 

23 Maram aduna swarga leibak adu mahakki minaisingga chaga chading paba pamba kanagumba ningthou amaga changdamnei. 

24 Amasung mahakna paba houraba matamda talanta lising tara tonba ama mangonda purakle. 

25 Toui-gumbasung mahakki singnaba leitabagi maramna mabungona ma, matu, machasing amasung magi leijaba makhei singnanaba yonthok-u haina yathang pirammi. 

26 Maram aduna minai aduna tuthajaraga khurumduna haijarak-i, eibu khara khangbiyu, amasung eina nangonda loina singjagani. 

27 Aduda minai adugi mapuna mangonda nungsiba poklamduna mabu thadokpire, amasung sendon adu kokpire. 

28 Touigumbasung minai adumakna thoklakpada mahakki dinar chama tonba mamannaba minaising ama thengnare, amasung mana phaduna mabu makhouri mettuna hairak-i, nangna tonba adu singu. 

29 Maram aduna magi mamannaba minai aduna tuthajaduna mangonda haijarak-i, eibu khara khang-biyu, amasung eina nangonda singjagani. 

30 Aduda mana yaninglamde, touigumbasung chatkhiduna mana tonba adu singdriba phaoba mabu keisumsangda thajille. 

31 Maduda magi mamannaba minaisingna thokkhiba adu ubada thoidokna waraduna, laklaga, thokkhiba pumnamak adu makhoigi mapuda takle. 

32 Matam aduda mabungona mabu kouraktuna mangonda hai, phattaba minai, nangna eingonda haijabagi maramna eina nanggi sendon pumnamak kokpire; 

33 Eina nangonda nungsibikhiba adugumna nangsu nanggi namannaba minai aduda nungsibipham thoktra? 

34 Amasung magi mabungona saoraduna mana tonba pumnamak adu singdriba phaoba laknabasingda mabu pithokle. 

35 Nakhoi khudingmakna magi magi machin manaobu nathawai yaona ngakpidrabadi, eigi swargagi ipanasu adugumna nakhoida tougani.

Matthi 19 

Nupi khainabagi wahang


1 Amahiksung asum thoklare, Jisuna tambibasing asi loirabada, Galildagi sandokraktuna Jarddan wangmada Jihudiyagi lamdamda lenglakle, 

2 Aduga miyamna yamna ibungogi tung injarammi, amasung mapham aduda ibungona makhoibu phahanbirammi. 

3 Matung aduda Pharisisingna ibungogi nakta laktuna chang yengba oina hairak-i, maram khudingmakki damak nupi khainaba asi wayel kaibra? 

4 Amasung ibungona khumlak-i, ihan hanbadagi oihanba mapu aduna makhoibu nipa amasung nupi oina sembirambani, 

5 Amasung maram asigi damak nipana mapa mama thadoktuna magi nupida napsin-gadabani amasung makhoi ani aduna masa amata oigadabani, hairamba asi nakhoina padabra? 

6 Adunadi makhoina amuk ani oidaduna masa amata oire. Matam aduna iswarna tinnahankhraba adu mina khaidoktasanu. 

7 Makhoina ibungoda hairak-i, adu oirabadi, Mousina khainabagi waroi lairik piduna mabu khainou haina karigi yathang pirambage? 

8 Ibungona makhoida hai, nakhoigi thamoi kanbagi maramna Mousina nakhoibu nupi khainaba yarambani, touigumbasung ihan hanbadagi asumna touramba natte. 

9 Amasung eina nakhoida hairi, kanagumbana magi nupibu nipa lannabagi nattana khainaraga atoppa ama luhongba adu migi nupi lannaba thabak tou-i. (amasung khainarabi mahakpu luhongba mahak aduna migi nupi lannaba thabak tourabani.) 

10 Seboksingna ibuttgoda haijarak-i, nipa amana magi nupiga asumna mari leinarabadi, luhongdabana phei. 

11 Aduda ibungona makhoida bai, hairiba asi mi pumnamakna louba ngamde, touigumbasung masi pikhraba makhoi adudani. 

12 Maramdi makhoigi mama puknungdagi asum poklaklaba masa onbasing lei, aduga misingna semba masa onbasing lei, amasung swarga leibakki damak makhoi masana masa onhanjaba masa onbasing lei. Lousinba ngamba mahak aduna masi lousinjasnu.


Jisuna angangsingbu bor pibiba


13 Matam aduda ibungogi khut makhoigi mathakta thambiduna iswarda haijabinaba apikpa angangsing ibungoda pujarak-i; amasung seboksingna makhoibu cheihatlammi. 

14 Touigum-basung Jisuna hai, apikpa angangsing leijasanu, amasung makhoina eingonda lakpa khamganu; maramdi swarga leibak adu asigumba makhoigini. 

15 Amasung ibungona makhoigi mathakta khut thambire amasung mapham adudagi lengthokkhre.


Inakkhunba pakhang amana lomba naidaba hingba thiba


16 Amahiksung yengu, mi amana ibungogi nakta laktuna haijarak-i, Guru, eina lomba naidaba hingba phingnanaba kari aphaba thabak toujagadage? 

17 Aduda ibungona mangonda hai, nangna aphaba adugi maramda eingonda kari gi hanglibano? aphabadi amata marei touigumbasung nangna hingba aduda changninglabadi, yathangsing adu ngaklu. 

18 Matta ibungoda hai, karambano? amasung Jisuna hairak-i, nangna mi hatpharoi, nupi lannapharoi, huranpharoi, aranba sakshi pipharoi, 

19 Napa namabu ikaikhumnou, amasung nanggi keiroi leikaibu nasamakkumna nungsigadabani. 

20 Naha aduna ibungoda haijei, pumnamak asi eina ngakcharak-i. Eina houjik kari watlibage? 

21 Jisuna mangonda hairak-i, nangna mapung phaba oininglabadi, chatlu, nanggi leijaba makhei yonthoktuna lairabasingba pinou, aduga swargada nanggi lal leigani; aduga lak-u, itung injararao. 

22 Touigum-basung naha aduna hairiba adu tabada, wana chatthokkhre; maramdi mahak maral yamna leiba ama oirammi.


Inakkhunbagi apanba


23 Jisuna mahakki seboksingda hai, eina nakhoida thanggei sengna hairibani, inakkhunba mina swarga leibakta changba lui. 

24 Amukka eina nakhoida hairi, inakkhunba mina iswargi leibakta changbadagi ut amana yetum manada litpana henna tai. 

25 Amasung seboksingna madu tabada thoidokna ngakladuna hairak-i adu oirabadi, kanana aran khubam phangba ngamgadage? 

26 Jisuna makhoida yengduna hairak-i, misingdadi masi oithoktabani, touigumbasung iswardadi pumnamak oiba ngaktani. 

27 Matam aduda Pitarna ibungoda khumlak-i, yengbiyu, eikhoida pumnamak thadokchaduna ibungogi tung injare. Aduda eikhoida kari oiragadage? 

28 Aduga Jisuna makhoida hairak-i, eina nakhoida thanggei sengna hairibani, anouba taibangpanda migi macha nipa aduna mahakki matik mangan-gi phambanda phamba matamda, Israyelgi salai taranithoibu wayel touduna eigi itung inba nakhoisu phambal taranithoida phamgani. 

29 Amasung eigi iminggi damak mayum makei, machin manao, machan mache, mapa mama, macha masu, lou sing oirabasu thadokpa mi khudingmakna saruk yamna phangjagani, amasung lomba naidaba hingba phangpham thoklabani. 

30 Touigumbasung ahanba oiba ayambana akonba oigani, aduga akonbana ahanba oigani.

Matthi 20 

Draksha ingkhonda thabak subasinggi pandam


1 Maramdi swarga leibak adu draksha ingkhonda thabak subasing neknanaba ayuk ngantada chatthokpa yumbu amagumbani. 

2 Amasung mahakna thabak subasing aduga nongmada dinar amada yanarabada, mahakna makhoibu draksha ingkhonda thakhre. 

3 Aduga mahakna ahumsuba pung aduwaida chatthokkhiduna, keithenda karisu toudana leptuna leiba ateisingbu ure, 

4 Amasung mahakana makhoida hai, nakhoisu eigi draksha ingkhonda chatlu, aduga asup thok-i haiba adu eina nakhoida pigani. Aduda makhoina chatle. 

5 Amukka mahakna taruksuba amasung mapalsuba pung aduwaida chatkhiduna adugumna toure. 

6 Aduga taramathoisuba pung aduwaida mahakna chatthokpada ateising leptuna leiba uraduna, makhoida hai, nakhoida asida numit-chuppa karisu toudana lepliba karigino? 

7 Makhoina mangonda hai, maramdi kananasu eikhoibu nekpide. Mahakna makhoida hai, nakhoisu draksha ingkhonda chatlu. 

8 Aduga numidangwai oiraklabada draksha ingkhongi mapu aduna mahakki asin-arangbada hai, thabak subasing adu kouduna akonbadagi houna ahanba phaoba makhoida anekman pikho. 

9 Amasung ttaramathoisuba pung aduwaida nekpa makhoi aduna lakpada mi khudingna dinar amamam phangi. 

10 Aduga ahanbasing aduna lakpada makhoina henna phanggani khallammi; adubu makhoisu mi khudingna dinar amamam phanglammi. 

11 Amasung makhoina madu phangbada yumbugi mathakta murum murum sonba hourak-tuna hai, 

12 Akonbasing asina pung amata masui, aduga nangna makhoibu nongmagi awaba amasung nungsagi chaklaba meisa khanglaba eikhoida mannahalli. 

13 Aduda mahakna makhoi amada khumlak-i, marup, eina nangonda aranba toude. Nangga eiga dinar amada yanakhidra? 

14 Nanggi adu loukhattuna, chatkhro. Nangonda pibagumna akonba asida piba eigi iningni. 

15 Ei isagi adu eina apamba toubada eigi ining nattabra? Nattraga eina pukchel phajaba maramna nanggi namit kharabra? 

16 Maram asina akonbana ahanba amasung ahanbana akonba oigani.


Jisuna mahakki sibagi waram mangjounana tambiba ahumlak suba


17 Amahiksung Jisuna Jerusalemda lengkhatlamdaida, sebok taranithoibu tonganna puduna lambida ibungona makhoida hairak-i, 

18 Yengu, eikhoi Jerusalem tanna kari; amasung migi macha nipa adubu athoiba purohitsing amasung sastragi ojhasingda pithokkani; Aduga makhoina mahakpu hatpa matik chai haina utkani, 

19 Amasung mahakpu atoppa jatsingda noknanaba, thina yeinanaba amasung krosta hatnanaba pithokkani, aduga numit hummi subada mahak hinggatkani.


Swarga leibakta achouba oinaba Jakob amasung Johanna nijaba


20 Matam aduda Sbedigi macha nipa-singgi mamana macha nipasingga loinana ibungoda laklaga, khurumjaduna ibungodagi karigumba ama nijarammi. 

21 Amasung ibungona mangonda hairak-i, nang kari pambage? mana ibungoda haijarak-i, ibungogi leibakta eigi icha nipa ani asi, amana ibungogi yetta, amana oida phamjanaba yathang pibiyu. 

22 Touigumbasung Jisuna khumlak-i, nakhoina nijariba adu nakhoina khangde. Eina thakkadouriba tengot adu nakhoina thakpa ngambra? Makhoina ibungoda haijei, eikhoi ngamjei. 

23 Ibungona makhoida hai, nakhoina eigi tenggot adu thakpadi thakkani, touigumbasung eigi yet amasung oida phambadi eina pigadaba natte, adubu masidi eigi Ipana makhoigidamak semsabiraba mkhoi adugini. 

24 Amasung tara aduna madu tabada machin manao ani adugi mathakta saorammi. 

25 Touigumbasung Jisuna makhoibu nakta kousinduna hairak-i, atoppa jatsinggi makok oibasingna makhoigi manakta mapu oi, aduga makhoigi achoubasinggi makhoigi mathakta mapu oibagi thabak tou-i haiba nakhoina khangi. Nakhoigi naraktadi asum toude; 

26 Touigumbasung nakhoi-gi naraktagi chaoningba kanagumba aduna nakhoigi thougan touba mi oigani; 

27 Aduga nakhoigi naraktagi khwaidagi makok thangninba kanagumba aduna nakhoigi thougan touba minai oigani. 

28 Adugumna migi macha nipa aduna masabu thougan touhannaba lakpa natte, touigumbasung thougan toubinaba amasung mayamgi thadokmal oina mahakki thawai pinaba lakpani.


Mittangba mi anibu uhanbiba


29 Amahiksung makhoina Jerikhodagi asum chatthoklakpada ayamba miyamna ibungogi tung injarammi. 

30 Amasung yengu, lambi mapanda phamba mittangba anina Jisu chatli haiba tabada laojarak-i, Dayudki macha nipa, Prabhu, eikhoibu nungsibiyu. 

31 Amasung miyam aduna makhoi tuminna leigadabani haina makhoibu cheihatlammi; touigumbasung makhoina henna henna laojarak-i, Dayudki macha nipa, Prabhu, eikhoibu nungsibiyu. 

32 Aduda Jisuna leplaga makhoibu kouduna hairak-i, eina nakhoigi damak kari toubiba pambage? 

33 Makhoina ibungoda haijei, Prabhu, eikhoigi mit pangthokhanbiyu. 

34 Aduda Jisuna nungsiba pokladuna makhoigi mit sokpire; amasung khudak aduda mamit uba phangjare adudagi makhoina ibungogi tung injare.

Matthi 21


Jisuna Jerusalemda lola tongduna lengkhatpa


1 Makhoina Jerusalemda naksil-laklaba amasung Jeitun chinda taba Betphageda laklaba matamda, Jisuna sebok anida asi haiduna thakhirammi, 

2 Nakhoigi namangda leiriba khul aduda chatlu. Amasung khudak aduda nakhoina lola mapi macha punduna leiramba phanglugani. Makhoibu thoktuna, eingonda purak-u. 

3 Amasung kanagumbana nakhoida karigumba hairabadi, Prabhu aduna makhoibu kannaba lei, haiduna nakhoina haigadabani; amasung mahakna makhoibu hek tharakkani. 

4 Iswargi wa takthokpabu haihankhiba, 

5 Siyon-gi macha nupida nakhoina haiyu, yengu, nanggi .ningthou nangonda lengbirak-i; ibungodi pukning tap-i, amasung lola tong-i; Aduga lola adudi machani, haiba asi thungnanaba houjik asum thoklare. 

6 Amasung seboksingna chatkhiduna Jisugi yathang matung inna tourure; 

7 Amasung lola mapi macha adu puraktuna mathakta makhoigi phi thare hairaga, ibungona maduda lengkhatle. 

8 Aduga miyam adugi ayambana lambida makhoigi phi thajei, amasung ateishigna ugi usa kakthaduna asum asum thai. 

9 Amahiksung ibungogi mangda-chatpa amasung tong injaba miyamsing aduna laona hairak-i, Hosanna Dayudki macha nipada! Prabhugi mingda lengbirakliba ibungo adu yaiphabani! Hosanna khwaidagi henna wangbada! 

10 Amasung Ibungona Jerusalemda changbada sahar pumnamak irang houraduna hairak-i, masi kanano? 

11 Aduda miyamsing aduna hairak-i, Galilgi Nasretgi iswargi wa takthokpa Jisu adu asini.


Ibungona iswar ningnasang sengdokpa


12 Amahiksung Jisuna iswar ningnasangda changlaga sang aduda leiri-yolliba makhoi pumnamakpu tanthokle, amasung sen kaibasinggi mejsu khunu yonbasinggi phamphamsu mathak makha ontholde. 

13 Aduga ibungona makhoida hai, masi ikhre, eigi sangbu haijanabasang kougani, adubu nakhoina madu dakusinggi makol oihalli. 

14 Matungda mittangba amasung khong tekpasingna iswar ningnasangda ibungogi nakta lakcharammi, amasung ibungona makhoibu phahanbirammi. 

15 Touigumbasung athoiba purohitksing amasung sastragi ojhasingna ibungona toukhiba angakpa thabaksing amasung, Hosanna Dayudki macha nipada, haina loaba angangsing adu ubada, saoraduna ibungoda hairak-i, makhoi asina hairiba asi nahak tabra? 

16 Aduda Jisuna makhoida hai, hoi, apikpa angang amasung khom thaklibasinggi machindagi ibungo nahakna thagatchaba mapung phahanbire, haiba nakhoina kadoungeidasu padabra? 

17 Amasung ibungona makhoibu thadoklaga, sahardagi Bethaniyada chatkhiduna mapham aduda leklure. 

Mahei pandaba heiyit pambi 

18 Nongngallaga ibungo saharda hallaklingeida chak lamlammi. 

19 Amasung lambi mpanda heiyit pambi ama uraduna ibungona madu tanna lenglakpada mana ngakta nattana maduda karisu phangde. Aduda ibungona maduda hai, matam asidagi houna nangonda matam pumnamakta mahei pandaba oirasanu. Khudak aduda heiyit pambi adu kangsillammi. 

20 Amasung seboksingna madu ubada ngakladuna hairak-i, heiyit pambi asina khudak asida matou karamna kangsinkhribano? 

21 Aduda Jisuna khumlak-i, eina nakhoida thanggei sengna hairibani, nakhoina thajaba leiduna chingnaba toudrabadi, heiyit pambida toukhiba adu tougadabata natte, nakhoina chingjao asida phaoba, nang phuktuna samadruda thadajou hairabadi, madu tougani. 

22 Aduga nakhoina thajaduna iswarda haijabada karigumba nijaba pumnamak adu nakhoina phangjagani.


Jisu matikki maramda wahang; macha nipa anigi pandam


23 Adudagi ibungona iswar ningnasangda lengsillakpa matamda athoiba purohitsing amasung misinggi ahallamansingna ibungona tambiringeida laktuna hairei, nangna natik kari leiduna hiramsing asi touribano? 

24 Amasung kanana natik asi nangonda pibibage? Aduda Jisuna makhoida khumlak-i, eisu nakhoida wahang ama hangge, madu nakhoina eingonda khumlabadi, eisu hiramsing asi kari itik leiduna toubage haiba adu eina nakhoida takke. 

25 Johanna baptais touramba adu kadaidagino? swargadagira, nattraga misingdagira? amasung makhoi masen khannarammi, eikhoina swargadagini hairagadi, mana eikhoida haigani, adu oirabadi, nakhoina mabu karigi thajadabage? 

26 Touigumbasung eikhoina misingdagini hairagadi, eikhoina miyambu ki; maramdi pumnamakna Johanbu iswargi wa takthokpa amani haina yanei. 

27 Amasung makhoina Jisuda khumlak-i, eikhoi khangde. Ibungonasu makhoida hai, kasi itik leiduna eina hiramsing asi toubage haiba adu einasu nakhoida hairoi. 

28 Touigumbasung nakhoina kari khanbage? Mi amagi macha nipa ani leirammi. Mahakna ahal aduda laktuna hai, icha, ngasi draksha ingkhonda thabak suru. 

29 Aduda mana khumlak-i, ei chatchage, paji, adubu ma chatte. 

30 Amasung mahakna macha atomba aduda laktuna adugumna hairare; aduda mana khumlak-i, ei ngamloi, adubu mameithangda ma masana ningngamlaktraduna chatkhre. 

31 Ani adugi karambana mapagi ningba tourambage? makhoina hai, atomba aduni. Jisuna makhoida hai, eina nakhoida thanggei sengna hairibani, khajna thoubasing amasung oktabi nupisingna nakhoigi mang than iswargi leibakta chatli. 

32 Maramdi Johanna dharmachenbagi lambida laklammi, amasung nakhoina mahakpu thajade, touigumbasung khajna thoubasingga oktabi nupisinggana mahakpu thajarammi, aduga nakhoidi madu uba matamda, nakhoina mahakpu thajaba yanaba mamei-thangda nakhoi nasana pukning phaoba hongde.


Draksha ingkhon-gi pandam


33 Atoppa pandam amaga tao. yumbu ama leirammi, mana draksha ingkhol ama koiraga, madugi akoibada sambal khaduna, maduda draksha sumpham ama halle, amasung sagai ama saraga, akoiba misingda sandoklamduna atoppa leibakta chatkhre. 

34 Adudagi mahei lokpa matam adu yousillaklabada, mahakna akoiba mising adudagi mahakki mahei saruk lourunaba minaising thakhi. 

35 Aduga akoiba mising aduna minaising adubu phaduna amabu yeire, atei amabu hatle, amasung atoppa amabuna nungna thane. 

36 Amukka mahakna ahanbadagi henna atei minaising thakhi, amasung makhoina makhoida hannagi adugumna toure. 

37 Touigumbasung mameithangda, eigi icha nipabudi makhoina ikai khumnagani haiduna mahakna macha nipbu thakhi. 

38 Adubu akoibasing aduna macha nipa adubu uba matamda makhoi masen hainei, masi yumlepcharani; lak-o eikhoina mabu hattuna magi phangpham thokpa adu phangsi. 

39 Adudagi makhoina mahakpu phaduna draksha ingkhondagi langthoklaga, mabu hatle. 

40 Maram aduna draksha ingokhon-gi mapu aduna lakpa matamda akoiba mising aduda mahakna kari tougadage? 

41 Makhoina ibungoda hairak-i, mahakna phattaba mising adubu sathina manghallaga matam matamda mahei adu mangonda pigadaba atei akoiba misingda draksha ingokhol adu sandokkani. 

42 Jisuna makhoida hai, yum saba-singna channadaba nung adu, madumakna chithekki mapi oihallammi; masi prabhudagini, amasung masi eikhoigi mittadi angakpani, haina sastrada nakhoina kadoungeidasu pakhidabra? 

43 Maram aduna eina nakhoida hairi, iswargi leibak adu nakhoidagi louthokhigani, aduga madugi mahei yangadaba jat amada pibigani. 

44 Amasung nung asigi mathakta tuba mahak adu machet machet kaigani, touigumbasung masina mathakta taba kanagumba adu uphulgumna toigani. 

45 Amahiksung athoiba purohitsing amasung pharisisingna ibungogi pandamsing asi tabada, makhoibu ngangbani haiba makhoina khanglammi. 

46 Aduga makhoina ibungobu nampha phage haina thirabasu, miyamsingbu kire; Maramdi makhoina ibungobu iswargi wa takthokpa amani haina lourammi.

Matthi 22 

Luhong-chakkhangbagi pandam


1 Matung aduda Jisuna makhoida amuk pandam oina ngangduna khumlak-i, 

2 Swarga leibak adudi macha nipagi damak luhongbagi chak pijaba kanagumba ningthou amaga changdamnei. 

3 Amasung chak pijabada barton phangbasing adubu kouru haiduna mahakki minaisingbu thakhi, adubu mak-hoina lakningde. 

4 Amukka mahakna atoppa minaisingda asi haiduna thakhi, barton phangbasing aduda haiyu, yeng-u, eina chak pijaba adu thourang loire; eigi sallabasing amasung anoiba sasing hattuna thabak pumnamak loire; Luhongbagi chak pijabada laklo. 

5 Touigumbasung makhoina madu waoidaduna magi magi chatkadabada chatkhre; amana masamakki louda, atei amana lallon-itikta chatkhre; 

6 Aduga leihoubasing aduna minaisingbu pharaga tachop tachopna toubiduna, makhoibu hatle. 

7 Touigumbasung ningthou adu saore amasung mahakki lanmising thaduna mi hatpasing adubusu manghalle, makhoigi sahar adubusu mei thadokhalle. 

8 Matam aduda mahakna minaisingda hai, luhongbagi thourang loire, adubu barton phanglibasing adu matik chadre. 

9 Maram aduna nakhoi lamlong lamlongda chattuna nakhoina phangba makhei luhongbagi chakkhang chanaba kouru. 

10 Aduda minaising aduna lambi lambida chatkhiduna, aphabasu phattabasu makhoina phanglakpa makhei khomjillakle; amasung lakpiribasingna luhongpham adu thalle. 

11 Touigumbasung ningthou aduna lakpiribasing adubu yengba changlakpada, luhong-phijet settaba mi ama mapham aduda ure; 

12 Aduda mahakna mangonda hai, marup, nang luhong-phijet settana asida karamna changbano? Amasung ma wa ngangba thoktre. 

13 Matam aduda ningthou aduna thougan toubasingda hairak-i, mabu makhong makhut punduna mapan-gi amambada langthok-u. Mapham aduda kappa amasung maya krak krak chikpa oigani. 

14 Maramdi mayambu kou-i, adubu kharadamak makhalli.


Ibungona loutunaribasinggi wahang khumba, Loipot Habagi Wahang


15 Matam aduda Pharisisingna chatkhiduna, ibungobu mahakki wangangda karamna phagadage haina wa tanarammi. 

16 Aduga makhoina Herodki khutpu ga loinana makhoigi seboksingbu tharaktuna haihallei, guru, ibungo nahak achumbani, iswargi lambibu chumna takpi, amasung kanabusu kide haiba eikhoina khang-i; maramdi ibungo nahakti migi misak mimai yengbiba natte. 

17 Maram aduna eikhoida haibiyu, ibungona kari khanbibage? Keisarda loipot haba wayel kaibra kaidabra? 

18 Touigumbasung Jisuna makhoigi phattaba adu khangladuna hairak-i, aphasajaningbasa, nakhoina elbu karigi chang yenglibage? 

19 Loipotki sen adu eingonda utlu. Amasung makhoina dinar ama ibungoda purakle. 

20 Maduda ibungona makhoida hai, makok amasung ming asi kanagino? 

21 Makhoina ibungoda hai, Keisargini. Matam aduda ibungona makhoida hai, adu oirabadi, Keisargi oiba adu Keisarda, aduga Iswargi oiba adu Iswarda katlu. 

22 Amasung makhoina madu tabada ngakle, amasung ibungobu thadoklam-duna chatkhre.


Hinggatpagi Wahang


23 Hinggatpa haibasi leite hairiba Saddukising aduna numit aduda Ibungoda laktuna hanglammi, 

24 Guru, Mousina hairammi, macha leitaba mi amana sirabadi mahakki machin manaona magi nupi adubu luhongduna machin manao adugi dhara thanamgadabani. 

25 Eikhoigi irakta machin manao taret leirammi; amasung ahal aduna luhonglaga sikhre, amasung macha poktabanina, magi nupi adu manao nipada thanamle; 

26 Anisuba, ahumsubanachingba taretsuba phaoba adum toure. 

27 Aduga makhoi pumnamakki ikon konbada nupi adu sire. 

28 Maram aduna hinggatlakpa aduda nupi adu makhoi taret adugi karam-bagi oigadage? Maramdi makhoi pumnamakna mabu lourammi. 

29 Touigumbasung Jisuna makhoida khumlak-i, sastra amasung iswargi panggal adu khangdaduna nakhoina lalle. 

30 Maramdi hinggatlakpa aduda makhoina luhongde, amasung makhoibu luhongduna pide, adubu makhoina swargada dudsinggumna lei. 

31 Touigumba-sung asibasinggi hinggatpagi maramda iswarna, 

32 Eidi Abraham, Isahak amasung Jakobki iswarni, haina nakhoida ngangkhiba adu nakhoina padabra? Iswardi asibasinggi iswar natte, touignm-basung ahingbasinggini. 

33 Aduda miyamsing aduna madu taba matamda Ibungogi tambiba aduda ngaklammi.


Khwaidagi Henna Chaoba Wayel Yathanggi, Marida Wahang


34 Touigumbasung Ibungona Saddukisingbu khumba ngamhandre haiba adu Pharisisingna tabada makhoi masen pullap tinnare; 

35 Amasung makhoigi maraktagi wayel heiba amana Ibungobu chang yengduna wahang ama hanglaki, 

36 Guru, wayel yathang adugi manungda karamda yathangna achoubano? 

37 Aduda Ibungona mangonda hai, nangna prabhu nanggi iswarbu nanggi thamoi apumba, thawai apumba amasung pukning apumba yaona nungsigadabani. 

38 Asina achouba amasung ahanba yathangni. 

39 Aduga aisgumna anisuba adu asini, nangna nanggi keiroi leikaibu nasamakkumna nungsigadabani. 

40 Yathang ani asida wayel yathang apumba amasung iswargi wa takthokpasinggi mawa adu suplabani.


Khristagi Maramda Wahang


41 Pharisisingna pullap pullingeida Jisuna makhoida hanglak-i, 

42 Khristagi maramda nakhoina kari khanbage? Mahak kanagi macha nipano? Makhoina Ibungoda hai, Dayudki macha nipani. 

43 Ibungona makhoida hairaki, adu oirabadi, Dayudna thawaigi mapanna mahakpu karamna probhu koubage? Madudi. 

44 Prabhuna eigi prabhuda hai, eina nanggi yeknabasingbu nanggi nakhong makhada thambidriba phaoba, eigi yetta phammu. 

45 Dayudna mahakpu prabhu kouraba adu oirabadi, mahakna mahakki macha nipa karamna oiribano? 

46 Amasung kananasu ibungoda wa amata khumba ngamlamde, aduga numit adudagi houna kana amatanasu ibungoda amuk hanna ichang thouna hangkhidre.

Matthi 23 

Jisuna sastragi ojhasinggi amasung pharisisinggi phattaba puthokpa


1 Matam aduda Jisuna miyamsing amasung mahakki seboksingda hairak-i, 

2 Sastragi ojhasing amasung Pharisisingna Mousigi phamphamda phammi; 

3 Maram aduna makhoina karigumba haiba pumnamak adu nakhoina tou amasung ngak-u, touigumbasung makhoigi thabakki mattung inna touganu, maramdi makhoina hai, aduga toude. 

4 Hoi, makhoina arumba potlum pullaga, misinggi marengbanda hap-i, adubu makhoi masanadi khudonbinasu lenghanningde. 

5 Touigumbasung mak-hoina makhoigi thabak pumnamak misingna unanaba tou-i; maramdi makhoigi jantra adu pakhalli aduga phina cholhalli; 

6 Aduga makhoina chak khangbada amasung loisang loisangda makok phamba, 

7 Miyam tinnabada misinggi khurumba, amasung misingna Rabbi kouba pammi. 

8 Touigumbasung nakhoibudi Rabbi kouhan-ganu; maram-di nakhoigi gurudi amatani, aduga nakhoi pumnamak nachin nanaoni. 

9 Amasung prithibi asida kanadasu ipa haiba mingthol asi piduna kouganu; maramdi napadi swargada leiba ibungo mahak mathantani. 

10 Nakhoibudi mapu kouhan-ganu, maramdi nakhoigi mapudi Khrista mathantani. 

11 Touigumbasung nakhoigi narakta khwaidagi chaoba mahak aduna nakhoigi nanai oigani. 

12 Aduga masabu chaohanjaba kanagumba adubu nolhan-gani, amasung masana nollukchaba kanagumba adubu chaohanbigani. 

13 Touigumbasung, aphasajaningba sastragi ojha amasung pharisisa, nakhoida awabanida! Maramdi nakhoina swarga leibak adu misinggi mamangda thingjilli; Maramdi nakhoi nasanasu changde, aduga cbangjage hotnariba makhoi adubusu changhande. 

14 Aphasajaningba sastragi ojha amasung pharisisa, nakhoida awabanida! Maramdi nakhoina tousinnanabagi damak kuina iswarda haijaringei phaobadasu lukhrabisinggi yum kei munthok-i. Maram aduna nak-hoina henna chaoba naral phanggani.) 

15 Aphasajaningba sastragi ojha amasung pharisisa, nakhoida awabanida! Maramdi nakhoina samadru amasung kangphanda koichat chattuna kanagumba amabu machat olhalli, aduga mahakna ollaklabada nakhoina mahakpu nakhoi nasadagi saruk ani henna norokki macha oihalli. 

16 Mittangba lamjingbasa, nakhoida awabanida! nakhoina hai, kanagumbana iswar ningnasang panduna wasakpa adudi karisu natte, adubu kanagumbana iswar ningnasanggi sana adu panduna sakpa adudi mahak laman tonbani. 

17 Apangba amasung mittangbasa maramdi sanaga nattraga sanabu sengdokliba iswar ningnasang karambana henna chaobage? 

18 Amasung kanagumbana latnapung panduna wasakpa adudi karisu natte; adubu kanagumbana madugi mathakta katliba pot aduga panduna sakpa adudi mahak laman tonbani. 

19 Mittangbasa! Maramdi katliba pot aduga katliba pot sengdokliba latnapungga karambana henna chaobage? 

20 Maram aduna latnapung panduna wasakpa mahak aduna madubu amasung madugi mathakta leiba pot pumnamak adubu panduna wasaklabani. 

21 Aduga iswar ningnasang panduna wasakpa mahak aduna madubu ama-sung madugi manungda leiba ibungo mahakpu panduna wasaklabani. 

22 Aduga swarga panduna wasakpa mahak aduna iswargi phambanbu amasung madugi mathakta phamliba ibungo mahakpu panduna wasaklabani. 

23 Aphasajaningba sastragi ojha amasung pharisisa, nakhoida awabanida! Maramdi nungsi hidak, hop amasung jiragi saruk taragi ama katlaga, wayel yathang adugi henna luba hiramsing, achumba, nungsibiba amasung thajaba asi thadok-i; touigumbasung pumnamak asi nakhoina touba tai, aduga ateising adu thadoktaba tai. 

24 Yuralbu phijumda chumthoklaga, utpu yotpa mittangba lamjingbasa! 

25 Aphasajaningba sastragi ojha amasung pharisisa, nakhoida awabanida! Maramdi nakhoina pukham tenggotki mapanthangba saruk adu sengdok-i, adubu manungdadi namja namtheknaba amasung masa lakpa ngamdabana pik thalli. 

26 Mittangba Pharisi! pukham tenggotki mapanthangba saruk adusu senglaknaba, ahanbada manung adu sengdok-u. 

27 Aphasajaningba sastragi ojha amasung pharisisa, nakhoida awabanida! Maramdi nakhoi mapanthongda phajana uba, touigumbasung manungdadi asiba-singgi saruna amasung sengdaba pumnamakna thallaba angouba teiba mongphamgumbani. 

28 Adugumduna nakhoisu mapandadi misingda dharmachenba oina uhalli, touigumbasung manungdadi aphasajaningba amasung wayel chattabana pikthalli. 

29 Aphasajaningba sastragi ojha amasung pharisisa, nakhoida awabanida! Maramdi nakhoina iswargi wa takthokpasinggi mongphamsu sai, dharmachenbasinggi mongphamgi phurasu leiteng-i, aduga hai, 

30 Eikhoina ipa ipusinggi matam aduda leiramlabadi, iswargi wa takthokpasinggi i aduda makhoiga loinana saruk yaramloidabani. 

31 Maram aduna nakhoina iswargi wa takthokpasingbu hatpa makhoi adugi machani haiba nakhoi nasana sakshi pijei. 

32 Adu oirabadi, napa napusinggi chang adu nakhoi thalhallu! 

33 Lilsa, lindugi chagogsa, norokki wayel touba adu nakhoina karamna nanthokkadage? 

34 Maram aduna yeng-u, eina nakhoida iswargi watakthokpasing, asingba mising, amasung sastragi ojhasingbu thai; makhoi kharabu nakhoina hatkani amasung krosta sihangani; aduga makhoi kharabuna nakhoigi loisang loisangda thina phugani, amasung sahar saharda hatke haina tannagani; 

35 Masi nakhoina iswar ningnasanggi sengba mapham amasung latnapunggi marakta hatkhiba dharmachenba Hebalgi idagi Barakhiyagi macha nipa Sakhariyagi i phaoba prithibida takhiba dharmachenbagi i pumnamak nakhoigi nathakta tananabani. 

36 Eina nakhoida thangei sengna hairibani, hiram pumnamak asi miron asigi mathakta tagani.


Jerusalemgi damak Jisuna tengthabiba


37 Iswargi wa takthokpasingbu hatpa amasung mangonda thakhibasingbu nungna thaba, he Jerusalem, Jerusalem! yenbina magi mathada machasingbu konsinbagumna, eina nanggi nachasingbu kaya toina konsinningkhiba, adubu nakhoina yaningkhide. 

38 Yeng-u, nakhoigi yum hangna nakhoida thambiramla bani. 

39 Maramdi eina nakhoida hairi, Prabhugi mingda lenglakpa ibungo mahak yaiphabani, haibasi nakhoina haidriba phaoba matam asidagi houna nakhoina eibu sup-u ukhraroi.

Matthi 24 

Jerusalemgi damak Jisuna tengthabiba amasung jugki aroiba mangjounana khanghanba


1 Amahiksung Jisuna iswar ningnasangdagi lengthoklaktuna chatlingeida, ibungogi seboksingna iswar ningnasanggi sariba makhei adu ibungoda utnanaba nakta laklammi. 

2 Touigumbasung ibungona makhoida khumlak-i, nakhoina hiram pumnamak asi udra? Eina nakhoida thanggei sengna hairibani, asida nung amabu amagi mathakta ningkhaihandana thanamlaroi. 

3 Amasung ibungona Jeitun chingthakta phamlingeida, seboksingna ibungoda lonna laktuna haijarei, hiramsing asi keidoungei thokkadage, aduga ibungona lenglakpa amasung taibang-panbagi aroibagi khudam adu karino, eikhoida takpiyu. 

4 Aduda Jisuna makhoida khumlak-i, kananasu nakhoibu serannana lamjingdanaba cheksillu. 

5 Maramdi, ei Khristani, haiduna ayambana eigi imingda lakkani; aduga ayambabu serannana chinggani. 

6 Nakhoina lal amasung lal-gi paoninkhol tagani; khang-u, nakhoidi mipaiganu; maramdi hiramsing asi thok-laba tai, adubu aroiba adu houjik natri. 

7 Maramdi jat amana jat amagi mathakta, amasung ningthou leibak amana ningthou leibak amagi mathakta hourakkani; aduga tongan tonganba maphamda chaktangba amasung juharaba thokkani; 

8 Touigumbasung hiram pumnamak asi awa ananggi ahoubani. 

9 Matam aduda makhoina nakhoibu laknanaba pithokkani amasung nakhoibu hatkani, aduga jat pumnamakna eigi minggi darnak nakhoibu tukkachagani. 

10 Amasung matam aduda ayambana khudi thigani, aduga amaga amaga pithoknagani, amasung amaga amaga tukkachanagani. 

11 Amahiksung iswargi wa takthoksinnabasing yamna thoklaktuna ayambabu serannana chinggani. 

12 Aduga wayel chattabana hengatlakpagi maramna ayambagi nung-sinaba adu hanthakhigani. 

13 Touigumbasung aroiba phaoba khangba mahak adubu kanbigani. 

14 Aduga ningthouleibakki aphaba wapao asi jat pumnamakta sakshi oinanabagidamak taibangpal apumbada sandokkani; amasung matam aduda aroiba adu lakkani. 

15 Maram aduna iswargi wa takthokpa Daniyelbu haihankhiba amang atakki tukkachaba adu asengba maphamda leppa nakhoina uba matamda (apaba mahak aduna khangjasanu), 

16 Matam aduda Jihudiyada leiba makhoi chingda chenkhi-sanu, 

17 Yumthakta leiba mahak aduna imungda leiba pot louthokpa kumthadasanu; 

18 Aduga loubukta leiba mahak aduna mahakki innaphi louba hallaktasanu. 

19 Touigumbasung mirollibi amasung khomnouribising adudi matam aduda awanungsibanida! 

20 Amasung nakhoigi chenba adu ningthamthadasu potthaba numittasu oidanaba haijou. 

21 Maramdi matam aduda taibangpal ahoubadagi houjik phaobasu thokkhidriba, aduga keidoungeidasu thoklaroidaba achouba awaba oigani. 

22 Amasung numitsing adu kaksinbiba nattanadi, thawai panba kanabusu kanbiramloidabani; touigumbasung khangatpasing adugi damakta numitsing asi kaksinbigani. 

23 Matam aduda, yeng-u, asida, nattraga aduda Khrista lei, haina kanagumbana nakhoida hairabadi thajaganu. 

24 Maramdi Khrista sasinnabasing amasung iswargi wa takthoksinnabasing thokkani, aduda ngamlabadi khan-gat-pasing phaoba serannana lamjingnaba, achouba khudamsing amasung angak angakpa utkani. 

25 Yeng-u, eina nakhoida mangjounana haikhre. 

26 Maram aduna makhoina nakhoida, yeng-u, Ibungo lamjaoda lei, hairabadi chatthokluganu; aduga, yeng-u, Ibungo achikpa kada lei, hairabasu thajaruganu. 

27 Maramdi nongpoktagi kuplakpa nongthangbu nongchupta uba adugumna migi macha nipa aduna lenglakpasu adugumgani.
