28 Asiba masa leiba mapham aduda langja pullap leigani. 

29 Touigumbasung awabagi numitsing adugi hek matungda numitna mamsingani, thana magi mangal piroi, Thawanmichaksingna atiyadagi tarakkani, amasung atiyagi panggal khibikpu nikhangani. 

30 Amasung matam aduda atiyada migi macha nipa adugi khudam ugani, aduga matam aduda prithibigi jat pumnamakna thabak yeinagani, amasung panggalga achouba matik mangalga loinana migi macha nipa aduna atiyagi leichin-gi mathakta lenglakpa nakhoina ugani. 

31 Amahiksung Ibungona mahakki dutsingbu peresinggagi ahouba makholga loinana tharakkani, aduga makhoina Ibungogi khang-gatpasingbu atiyagi aroiba amadagi aroiba ama phaoba maikei marimaktagi khomjin-gani.


Mitseng khangbagi kannaba


32 Nakhoina hayit pambidagi pandam ama tamu. Magi masa aduna nouraklaba amasung yenning hullaklaba matamda, nakhoina olangtha nakle haiba khangi. 

33 Adugumduna nakhoinasu hiram pumnamak asi uba matamda, ibungo thongjin youna naksillakle haiba nakhoina khang-u. 

34 Eina nakhoida thanggei sengna hairibani, hiram pumnamak asi pangthoktriba phaoba miron asi houkhiroi. 

35 Atiya amasung prithibidi mangkhigani, touigumbasung eigi wasingdi supmang manglaroi. 

36 Touigumbasung madugi numit amasung pung adu, mapa nattana, swargadutsingnasu, macha nipa adunasu kana amatana khangde. 

37 Maramdi Nohagi haktakta oikhibagumna, migi macha nipa aduna lenglakpa adu adugumna oigani. 

38. Maramdi ising achao adugi numit adu oidringeigi mamangda, Nohana hijao adugi manungda changdriba numit phaoba, makhoina chaduna, thaktuna, luhongduna matting luhonghanduna leiramba, 

39 Amasung ising ichao adu laktuna makhoi pumnamakpu puthoktriba phaoba khanglamdabagumna, migi macha nipa aduna lenglakpa adusu adugumna oigani. 

40 Matam aduda loubukta mi ani leigani; amabu pukhigani, amasung amabu thanamgani. 

41 Nupi anina chakri taktuna leigani; amabu pukhigani, amasung amabu thanamgani. 

42 Maram aduna mitseng khang-u, maramdi nakhoigi prabhuna lenglakka-daba numit adu nakhoina khangde. 

43 Touigumbasung asi khang-u, kari yuthakta huranbana lakkani haiba yumbuna khanglamlabadi, mahakna mitseng khangduna magi yum adu sagun touhallamloidabani. 

44 Maram asina nakhoinasu thourang touduna leiyu; maramdi nakhoina ningdaba pungphamda migi macha nipa adu lenglakkani.


Aphaba amasung phattaba minaigi pandam


45 Adunadi achaba matamda makhoida acha athak pinanaba magi mabungona imunggi mathakta sinnaraba thajaba yaba amasung asingba minai adu kanano? 

46 Magi mabungona lenglakpada adugumna touriba phangba minai adu yaiphabani. 

47 Eina nakhoida thanggei sengna hairibani; mahakna mahakki leijaba pumnamakki mathakta mabu sinnabigani. 

48 Touigumbasung, eigi ibungona thillakkani, haina phattaba minai aduna mapukningda haiduna, 

49 Amasung magi mamannaba minaisingbu yeiba houduna, yungaobasingga chathak minnarabadi, 

50 Minai aduna ningdaba numit amasung khangdaba pimgda mabungo aduna lenglakkani; 

51 Mabu matup ani thokna kakthatlagani, amasung aphasajaningbasingga loinana magi saruk phanghangani; mapham aduda kappa amasung maya krak krak chikpa oigani.

Matthi 25 

Luhongba yaobi leisabi taragi pandam


1 Matam aduda swarga leibak adu makhoi makhoigi thaomei paiduna bor okanaba chatthoklakpi leisabi tara-gumgani. 

2 Aduga makhoi mangadi apangbi oirammi, amasung mangadi asingbi oirammi. 

3 Maramdi apangbising adudi makhoigi thaomei paibada, makhoiga loinana thaodi puramde; 

4 Touigumbasung asingbising adudi makhoigi thaomeiga loinana hapnaba potta thao purammi. 

5 Aduga bor aduna thillaklingeida, makhoi pumnamak uirammi amasung tumthakhirammi. 

6 Touigumbasung ahing nongyaida laorak-i, yeng-u, borsi! nakhoi oknaba thoraklo. 

7 Matam aduda leisabising aduna hougattuna makhoigi thaomei semle. 

8 Amahiksung apangbising aduna asing-bising aduda hai, nakhoigi thao adudagi eikhoida khara pinabiyu, maramdi eikhoigi thaomei muttharakle. 

9 Toui-gumbasung asingbasingna khumlak-i, eikhoigidamaksu oknadaba yai; nakhoina ayonbasingda chattuna, nakhoi nasen-gi damak leibiruro. 

10 Amasung makhoina leigadabagi chatkhringeida bor adu lakle, aduga thourang loirambising aduna mahakka loinana luhongbagi chakkhangbada changkhre; amasung thong thingkhre. 

11 Matung aduda atei leisabising adusu laktuna hairak-i, Prabhu, Prabhu, eikhoida thong hangdokpiyu. 

12. Touigumbasung ibungona khumlak-i, eina nakhoida thanggei sengna hairibani, eina nakhoibu khangde. 

13 Maram aduna mitseng khang-u, maramdi nakhoina numit adusu pung_adusu khangde.


Talantagi pandam


14 Maramdi masidi mi amana atoppa leibak amada chatlamdaida, mahak makki minaisingbu kouduna mahakki lal makhei makhoida sinnaramba mi amagumbani; 

15 Aduga mahakna amada talanta manga, atei amada ani, amasung atei amada ama, magi magi ngamjabagi matung inna makhoi khudingmakta pibiramlaga, mahak langphei chatkhre. 

16 Khudak adumaktada talanta manga phangba aduna chatkhiduna maduna lalonnarubada, atoppa talanta manga tongjare. 

17**Matou adugumna talanta ani phangba mi aduna talanta ani tonjare 

18 Touigumbasung talanta ama phangba aduna chatkhiduna leipakta touraga, magi mabungogi sel adu lotle. 

19 Amahiksung matam kuiraklabada minaising adugi mabungona laktuna makhoiga loinana chaga chading panarare. 

20 Aduga talanta manga phangba aduna changsillaktuna, atoppa talanta manga puraktuna hairei, prabhu, ibungona eingonda talanta manga pibirammi; yengbiyu, eina atoppa talanta manga tongjare. 

21 Magi mabungona mangonda hairak-i, yamna phare, aphaba amasung thajaba yaba minai, nangdi pot khajiktagi mathakta thajaba yabana eina nangbu pot ayambagi mathakta pannahangani; nabungogi haraobada changjaro. 

22 Talanta ani phangba adunasu changsillaktuna hairak-i, prabhu, ibun-gona eingonda talanta ani pibirammi, yengbiyu, eina atoppa talanta ani. tongjare. 

23 Magi mabungona mangonda hairak-i, yamna phare, aphaba amasung thajaba yaba minai, nangdi pot khajiktagi mathakta thajaba yabana, eina nangbu pot ayambagi mathakta pannahangani; nabungogi haraobada changjaro. 

24 Amasung talanta ama phangba adunasu changsillaktuna hairei, prabhu, ibungona hunkhidaba aduda khaoba, aduga chaithokkhidaba aduda khomjinba, nungsiganba mini haina eina khangjarammi; 

25 Aduna eina kijaduna chatthokcharaklaga, ibungogi talanta adu leipak manungda lotchei; yengbiyu, ibungogi oibadu asini. 

26 Touigumbasung magi mabungona khumduna mangonda hairak-i, phattaba amasung atanba minai, eina hunkhidaba aduda eina khao-i, amasung eina chaithokkhidaba aduda khomjilli haiba nangdi khanglamlaboire! 

27 Adu oiramlabadi, nangna eigi sel adu sen-onbasmgda piramgadabani, aduga eina lakpada eigi oiba adu sendoiga loinana eina amuk phanglamgadabani. 

28 Maram aduna mangondagi talanta adu louthoktuna talanta tara leiba mahak aduda piyu. 

29 Maramdi areiba mi khudingda pigani, aduga magi ayamba oigani; touigumbasung leitaba mahak adudagi magi leijariba adu phaoba lou-thokkani. 

30 Aduga kannadaba minai adu mapangi amambada langthok-u; mapham aduda kappa amasung maya krak krak chikpa oigani.


Wayen-gi numit


31 Touigumbasung migi macha nipa aduna matik manganga amasung swarga dut pumnamakka loinana lenglakpa matam aduda, ibungogi matik mangalgi phambal thakta ibungona phamlagani. 

32 Aduga jat pumnamakpu ibungogi mangda khomjingani; yaosenbana hamengdagi yao khaidokpagum, ibungona makhoi amadagi amabu khaidokkani; 

33 Amasung ibungona yaosingbu ibungogi yetta, touigumbasung hameng-singbu oida thamgani. 

34 Matam aduda ningthou aduna ibungogi yetthangbada leibasingda haigani, lak-u, eigi ipagi bor phangjabasa, taibangpal houngeidagi nakhoigidamak thourang toubiramlaba ningthou leibak adu phangjaro. 

35 Maramdi eina lamlabada nakhoina chanaba pibi, eina khouranglabada eibu pithakpi, eina lamlanba oirambada nakhoina eibu lousinbi; 

36 Phi leitrabada eingonda phi pibi, eina narabada laikannabi, eina keisumsangda leirabada nakhoina eingonda lakpi. 

37 Matam aduda dharmachenbasing aduna ibungoda khumlakkani, prabhu, ibungona lamba eikhoina urabada keidoungei ibungobu pijakhibage, nattraga khouranglabada pithakkhibage? 

38 Amasung ibungobu lamlanba oina eikhoina urabada kadoungei ibun-gobu lousinbikhibage, nattraga phi leitrabada phi pikhibage? 

39 Aduga ibungona naraba nattraga keisumsangda leiraba eikhoina urabada kadoungei ibungoda lakkhibage? 

40 Amahiksung ningthou aduna makhoida khumlakkani eina nakhoida thanggei sengna hairibani, eigi ichin inao khwaidagi henna pikpa ama phaobada nakhoina asup toubikhibana, nakhoina madu eingonda toubikhibani. 

41 Matung aduda ibungona oithangbada leibasingdasu haigani, he sirap phangbasa, eingondagi chatthoktuna diyabol amasung magi dutsinggi damak thourang toukhraba lomba naidraba meida chatlu; 

42 Maramdi eina lamlabada nakhoina chanaba pibide, amasung eina khouranglabada nakhoina eibu pithakpide, 

43 Eina lamlanba oirambada nakhoina eibu lousinbide, phi leitrabada eingonda phi pibide, naba amasung keisumsangda leibada nakhoina laikanna-birade. 

44 Matam aduda makhoinasu khumlakkani, prabhu, ibungona lamba, khourangba, lamlanba oiba, phi leiraba, naba, nattraga keisumsangda leiba eikhoina urabada, kadoungei ibungobu thougan toujadabage? 

45 Matam aduda ibungona makhoida khumlakkani, eina nakhoida thanggei sengna hairibani, khwaidagi henna pikpasing asigi amada nakhoina asup toubikhidabana, nakhoina madu eingonda toubikhidabani. 

46 Amahiksung pumnamak asina lomba naidaba dandida, touigumbasung dharmachenbasingna lomba naidaba hingbada chatkani.

Matthi 26 

Jisu hatnanabagi khujin thourang


1 Amahiksung asum thoklare, Jisuna wa pumnamak asi loiraga, ibungona seboksingda haire, 

2 Numit ninigi matungda aran-chakkhangba thok-i, amasung migi macha nipa adubu krosta hatnaba pithok-i haiba nakhoina khangi. 

3 Matam aduda Kayapha kouba purohitlen-gi sumangda athoiba purohitsing amasung misinggi ahallamansing khundinnare; 

4 Amasung makhoina marei mara touduna Jisubu phaduna hatnanaba wa tanare. 

5 Touigumbasung, misinggi marakta ninnadananaba chakkhangba matamda oiganusi, haina makhoina hainei.


Bethaniyada Jisubu thao heibiba


6 Amahiksung Jisuna Bethaniyada leiringeida, kusthi thungba Simon-gi yumda, 

7 Nupi amana mamal yamna tuba teinathao happa angouba nungphu ama puduna ibungogi maphamda amasung ibungona luk haringeida mahakna madu ibungogi kokthakta heithabire. 

8 Touigumbasung seboksingna madu ubada nungaitaduna hairak-i, amangba asi kari maramgi damakno? 

9 Maramdi masi mama yamna sitna yonthoklaga, lairabasingda piba yaramgadabani. 

10 Touigumbasung Jisuna madu khangladuna makhoida haire, nupidubu nakhoina karigidamak otlibano? Maramdi mahakna eingonda aphaba thabak toubire. 

11 Maramdi lairabasingdi itattattana nakhoiga leiminnei, touigumbasung eidi itattattana nakhoiga leiminaba natte. 

12 Maramdi mahakna teinathao asi eigi hakchangda hei-thaduna eibu phumbagi damak thourang langnanaba toubire. 

13 Eina nakhoida thanggei sengna hairibani, taibangpal apumbada aphaba wapao asi sandokkadaba mapham khudingmakta, nupi asina toubikhiba adusu mabu ningsingnanabagi damak ngangthokkani.


Jihudagi marou


14 Matam aduda Jihuda Iskariyot kouba, taranithoigi amana athoiba purohitsingda chatkhiduna haire, 

15 Eina mahakpu nakhoida pithoklaga, nakhoina eingonda kari piningbage? Aduga makhoina mangonda lupagi sen kunthra onbire. 

16 Amasung matam adudagi mana ibungobu pithoknaba khudong chaba thirammi.


Ikon kouba chakkhang


17 Amahiksung hamei yaodaba talchakkhangbagi ahanba numitta seboksingna Jisuda laktuna hairei, aran-chak-khangba adu hananaba ibungogi damak eikhoina kadaida thourang semjaba ibungona pambibage? 

18 Aduga ibungona hai, saharda changduna asigumba mida hairu, guruna hai, eigi matam nakle; nahakki yumda eigi seboksingga loinna eina aran-chakkhangba adu ngakchage. 

19 Amasung Jisuna makhoida takpibagumna, seboksingna touraduna, aran-chakkhangba adu thourang toure. 

20 Amahiksung numidang oirabada, sebok taranithoiga ibungoga phamminnarammi; 

21 Amasung makhoina charingeida, ibungona hairak-i, eina nakhoida thanggei sengna hairibani, nakhoigi naraktagi amana eibu pithok-kani. 

22 Aduda makhoina thoidokna pukning waraduna, ibungoda mi khu-dingmakna hanggatcharak-i, einara, prabhu? 

23 Aduga ibungona khumlak-i, pukhamda eiga loinana khut lupminnaraba mahak asimakna eibu pithokkani. Migi macha nipa aduna magi maramda ikhiba adugumna chatlabani, toui-gumbasung migi macha nipa adubu pithokpa mi aduda awabanida! Mi aduna poklamdragadi, magi damak pharamgadabani. 

25 Aduda ibungobu pithokpa Jihudana khumlak-i, einara, Rabbi? Ibungona mangonda hai, nangna haidok-chare. 

26 Amahiksung makhoina charingeida, Jisuna tal louduna bor piraga, madu thugaire, amasung seboksingda piduna hai, louduna chao; masi eigi hakchangni. 

27 Aduga ibungona tenggot louduna thagatcharaga, makhoida piduna hai, nakhoi pumnamak masidagi thak-u; 

28 Maramdi masi walepnaba adugi, pap koknanaba ayambagidamak tabikhraba eigi ini. 

29 Touigumbasung eina nakhoida hairibani, ipagi leibakta nakhoiga loinana anouba thakminnagadaba numit adu oidriba phaoba, eina matam asidagi houna draksha mahei asidagi thak-laroi.


Jisubu seboksingna thadokkadaba adu Ibungona mangjounana khanghanba


30 Aduga makhoina isei saklaga Jeitun chingda chatthokkhre. 

31 Matam aduda Jisuna makhoida hai, nakhoi pumnamak ahing asida eingonda khudi thiba thokkani, maramdi masi ik-hrabani, eina yaosenbabu yeithugani, amasung yao sanggu adu ichai chaithoklagani. 

32 Touigumbasung eibu hinggatpiraga, eina nakhoidagi hanna Galilda chatkani. 

33 Adubu Pitarna ibungoda khumjarak-i, pumnamakna ibungoda khudi thiba thoklagasu, eidi kadoungei-dasu khudi thiba thokcharoi. 

34 Jisuna mangonda hairak-i, eina nangonda thanggei sengna hairibani, ahing asida yellaba khongdringeida, nahakna eihakpu ahumlak jaramloi. 

35 Pitarna ibungoda hai, eina ibungoga loinana siba phaoba tarabasu, eidi ibungobu yadaba suptou toujaroi. Adugumna seboksing putnnamak-nasu hake.


Getsimanida Jisugi thawai waba amasung ibungobu phaba


36 Matam aduda Getsimani kouba maphamda Jisuna makhoiga loinana lenglakpada, seboksingda hai, eina ada chattuna haijaringeida, nakhoi asida phamlammu. 

37 Amahiksung ibungona mahakka loinana Pitarga Sebedigi macha nipa aniga purammi, aduga ibungona waba amasung pukning olang onsaoba houre; 

38 Matam aduda ibungona makhoida hai, eigi thawai sigadouba makhei ware; nakhoi asida leiduna, eiga loinana mitseng khang-u. 

39 Aduga ibungona manglom khara lengthoklaga, uprakna tuthajaduna haijarak-i, he ipa, masi oiba yarabadi eingondagi tenggot asi lanthoksanu; adum oinamakpu eigi ningbagum oidaduna, ibungogi ningbagum oibiribani. 

40 Amasung ibungona seboksingda lenglakpada, makhoi tumlamba phangi, aduga Pitarda hai, nakhoi eiga loinana pung ama asum mitseng khang-ba ngamdra? 

41 Nakhoi na athembada changdananaba, mitseng khangduna haijou; thawainadi maning-i, touigumbasung hakchangnadi solli. 

42 Amukka anirak hanna ibungona lengkhiduna haijarak-i, he ipa, eina masibu thakpa nattanadi, asi lanthokpa ngambidrabadi, ibungogi ningba oisanu. 

43 Amasung ibungona amuk lenglakpada makhoi tumlamba phanglare, maramdi makhoigi mamit lumtharammi 

44 Aduga ibungona makhoibu amuk thanamduna lengthokkhraga, chap mannaba wahei, amuk haideuna, ahumlak suba oina haijei. 

45 Matam aduda ibungona seboksingda lenglaktuna hai, houjiktagidi tumduna pothajaro; yeng-u, pungpham adu nakle; migi macha nipa adubu papchenbasinggi makhutta pithok-i. 

46 Hougatlu, eikhoi chatlasi; yeng-u, eibu pithokpa mi adu nakle. 

47 Amahiksung ibungona wa nganglingeimaktada, yeng-u, Jihuda, taranithoi gi ama adu lak1e, amasung athoiba purohitsing amasung misinggi ahallamansingdagi kabakthangga cheiga paiba miyam yamna maga loinari. 

48 Aduga ibungobu pithokpa mi aduna makhoida khudam ama piduna hairammi, eina chupkadaba mahak aduni; mabu phao. 

49 Khudak adumaktada mana Jisugi manakta laklaga, khurumjari, Rabbi, haiduna ibungobu yamna chuple. 

50 Aduga Jisuna mangonda hai, marup, nang kari maramgi lak-i-bage? Matam aduda makhoina laktuna Jisuba khutphangnana phare. 

51 Amahiksung yengu, Jisuga loinaba makhoi adugi amana makhut lamthoklaktuna magi kabakthang satlaga, purohitlen-gi minai adubu yallakpada mana soidatle. 

52 Matam aduda Jisuna mangonda hai, nanggi kabak thangdu maphamda amuk hapchillu; maramdi kabakthang paiba makhoi pumninnakna kabakthangna manggani. 

53 Aduga swargadutki Lejin tarani thoidagi henna inakta houjikmak thabiraknaba eina ipada haijaba ngammoi haina nahakna ningbra? 

54 Adugumna tourabadi, sastrana asumna oiba tare haiba adu karamna thunglamgadabage? 

55 Pung aduda Jisuna miyamsingda haire, dakubu phagadabagum kabakthangga cheiga loinana eibu phananaba nakhoina thoklaldabra? Numit khuding eina iswar ningnasangda tambiduna phamlamlabasu nakhoina eibu phade. 

56 Touigumbasung iswargi wa takthokpasinggi sastra adu thungnanaba pumnamak asi thoklare. Matam aduda seboksing pumnamakna ibungobu thadoktuna chenkhre.


Purohitlen-gi mangda Jisubu wayenba


57 Aduga Jisubu phaldtibasing aduna sastragi ojhasing amasung ahallam-ansingna tinnaramba, Kayapha purohitlen-gimaphamda ibungobu pukhatkhre. 

58 Adubu purohitlen-gi sumang phaoba Pitarna ibungogi tung thap-in illammi, aduga manungda changlaga, matungda kari thokkadage yengnaba phamnaibasingga phamminnei. 

59 Amahiksung athoiba purohitsingga ahallup apumbagana Jisubu hatnanaba aranba sakshi thirammi; aduga minamba sakshi piba mi ayambana laklabasu, makhoina karisu phangde. 

60 Touigumbasung konthangda mi ani laktuna hairei, 

61 Eina iswar ningnasang adu manghanba amasung madu numit humnida saba ngammi, haiduna mi asina haire. 

62 Aduga purohitlenna hougattuna ibungoda hairak-i, nang karisu khumlaroidra? Nanggi nathakta mising asina piriba sakshi asi karino? 

63 Adubu Jisuna tuminna leire. Amahiksung purohitlenna ibungoda hairak-i, Iswargi macha nipa Krista adu nang oi, oide eikhoida hainanaba eina nangbu ahingba iswar yengduna sari solhalli, 

64 Jisuna mangonda hai, nahakna haikhre; adum oinamakpu eina nangonda hairi, asigi matungda migi macha nipa aduna matik chaobagi yethangbada phamba amasung swargagi leichinda lenglakpa nakhoina ugani. 

65 Matam aduda purohitlenna maphi segaiduna hairak-i, mana iswarbu thina ngangkhre. Asidagi henna eikhoina sakshi louba kari kannabano? yengu, iswarbu thina ngangbadu nakhoina tare; 

66 Nakhoina kari khanbage? makhoina khumlak-i, mahak siba matik chai. 

67 Matam aduda makhoina ibungogi maida tin sitchinduna, khudumna sure; aduga ateisingna ibungobu khubakna thaduna hai, 

68 He Khrista, nangbu kanana phubage? eikhoida takthok-u.


Jisubu Pitarna Jadaba


69 Amahiksung Pitarna mapan-gi sumangda phamlingeida, minai leisabi ama laktuna mangonda hairak-i, nangsu Galilgi Jisuga loinarambani. 

70 Touigumbasung mahakna makhoi pumnamakki mamangda yadaduna hairak-i, nangna hairiba adu ei khangde. 

71 Aduga mahakna manggonda chatthokpada, atei leisabi amana mabu uraduna, maduda leibasingda hai, nipa asi Nasretki Jisuga loinarambani. 

72 Amasung, eina mi adubu khangde, haiduna sari sonbaga loinana mahakna ,amuk yadre. 

73 Ngaihak leiraga manakta leplamba makhoina laktuna Pitarda hairak-i, aoibamak nangsu makhoigi maraktagini, maramdi nanggi wangangna nangbu khanghanbani. 

74 Matam aduda, mi adubu eina khangde, haiduna mahakna masabu sirap toujaba amasung sari sonba hourakle. Aduga khudak adumaktada yellabana khongle. 

75 Amasung, yellabana khongdringeida nangna eibu ahumlak yaramloi, haina Jisuna haikhiba wa adu Pitarna ningsinglakle. Adudagi mahakna mapan thokkhiduna thawai sokna kaplure.

Matthi 27 

Romgi Leibak Ngakpa Mapu Pilaiki Mangda Jisubu Pukhatpa


1 Ayuk oirabada, athoiba purohit pumnamak amasung misinggi ahallamansingna Jisubu hatnanaba wa tanare; 

2 Aduga makhoina Ibungobu pullaga, puthokkhiduna leibak ngakpa pilatta pikhatkhi.


Jihuda Matommata Sijaba


3 Matam aduda Ibungobu pithokkhiba Jihudana Ibungobu aranba tahalle haiba ubada, pukning hongduna, lupagi sen kunthra adu athoiba purohitsing amasung ahllamansingda amuk puraktuna hairak-i, 

4 Eina dharmachenba i pithokkhiba aduna ei pap chelle. Touigumbasung makhoina hai, eikhoigi ithou kari leibage? nang madu khangjou. 

5 Aduga iswar ningnasanggi asengba maphamda mana lupagi sen adu huntharamduna thokkhre; amasung chatkhiduna thouri yanduna sijakhre. 

6 Amahiksung athoiba purohitsingna lupagi sen adu louduna hai, masi asengba lanthamphamda thamjinba wayel kai, maramdi masi igi mamanni. 

7 Amasung makhoina wa tannaraga, lamlanbasingbu phumnanaba phusa-loubuk adu maduna leinare. 

8 Maram aduna loubuk adu igi loubuk haina houjik phaoba kounare. 

9 Amasung Israyelgi machasing kharana mamal kakkhraba amadugi akakpa mamal lupagi sen kunthra adu makhoina loure; 

10 Aduga Prabhuna eingonda yathang pibagumna, makhoina phusaloubuk adugidamak madu pikhre, haiba iswargi wa takthokpa Jirmiyana haikhiba adu matam aduda thungle.


Pilatki Mangda Jisubu Wayenba


11 Jisudi leibak ngakpagi mamangda leple; amasung leibak ngakpa aduna ibungoda hanglak-i, nangdi Jihudisinggi ningthoura? aduga Jisuna mangonda hai, nahakna haibaduni. 

12 Athoiba purohitsing amasung ahallamansingna ibungoda theijinba matam aduda ibungona kari amata khumde. 

13 Maduda Pilatna ibungoda hai, makhoina nathakta sakshi kaya piriba adu nang tadabra? 

14 Aduga ibungona mangonda wahei amatasu khumdrabada leibak ngakpa adu yamna ngakle. 

15 Chakkhangbada leibak ngakpa aduna miyamna pamliba keisumsangda thamliba amabu makhoigidamak thadokpiba mahakki hounasani. 

16 Aduga makhoigi keisumsangda thamliba Barabba kouba phaoraba ama matam aduda leirammi. 

17 Maram aduna makhoibu tinnahallabada, Pilatna makhoida hairak-i, eina nakhoigi damak kanabu nakhoina thadokhanningbage, Barabbabura, Khrista kouba Jisubura? 

18 Maramdi makhoina ibungobu kallakpa maramna pithokle haiba mahakna khanglammi. 

19 Amahiksung mahakna wayenphambeida phamlingeida, mahakki nupina mangonda tharaktuna hairei, dharmachenba mi aduda nangna kari amata touganu, maramdi mahakki maramda eina ngasi mangda yamna awa khanglammi. 

20 Adubu athoiba purohitsing amasung ahallamansingnadi Barabbabu nijaraga, Jisubu manghanasanu haiduna miyam singbu thoujillammi. 

21 Touigumbasung leibak ngakpa aduna makhoida khumlaki, ani adugi maraktagi eina kanabu nakhoigidamak nakhoina thadokhanningbage? Aduga makhoina hairak-i, Barbbabu. 

22 Adu oiragadi, Khrista kouba Jisubu eina kari tougadage, haiduna Pilatna makhoida hai. 

23 Makhoi pumnamakna hai, mabu krosta hatpa oisanu. Aduga mahakna hai, karigino, mahakna kari phattaba toukhrabage? touigumbasung, mabu krosta hatpa oisanu, haiduna makhoina hennadum laorammi. 

24 Asum touna Pilatna karigumba thabak amata mahakna pangdre, adubu madugi marang hourak-i haiba ubada, mahakna ising louduna miyamgi mamangda makhut hamdoktuna hairak-i, dharmachenba mi asigi igi maramda eigi iral leite; nakhoigi nasrukni. 

25 Amasung mi pumnamakna khumlak-i, magi i eikhoigi amasung ichasinggi thakta tasnu. 

26 Matung aduda mahakna Barabbabu makhoigidamak thadokpire; touigumbasung Jisubu thina yeiraga, krosta hatnaba pithokle.


Jisubu Krosta Pangtingba Jisuna Siba Jisubu phumba


27 Matam aduda leibak ngakpagi lan-misingna Jisubu Pritoriyon-gi manungda pusinkhiduna lanmi kanglup apumba ibungogi maphamda tinnare. 

28 Aduga makhoina ibungogi phi louthokpiduna phingang inbire. 

29 Amasung makhoina tingkhanggi luhup ama lollaga ibungogi kokta uppiduna, ibungogi khut yetta singnang ama paihalle; aduga makhoina ibungogi mangda khuru khudak kunduna, ibungobu noknaduna hal, he Jihudisinggi ningthou, khurumjari! 

30 Amasung makhoina ibungoda tin sitchinbiduna, singnang adu louraga ibungogi kokta phure. 

31 Amasung makhoina ibungobu noknaraga, ibungodagi phingang adu louthokpiduna, ibungogi phi setpiraga krosta hatnaba puthokkhre. 

32 Amasung makhoina asum thoklakpada, Simon kouba Kurinigi nipa amabu phangle.Makhoina mahak asibu namduna ibungogi kros puhalle. 

33 Amahiksung makhoina Golgotha kouba mapham, hainbadi lukanggi mapham aduda laklabada, 

34 Makhoina ibungoda masingkhaga totnaba draksha mahi thaknaba pire; aduga ibungona madu tanglabada thakningde. 

35 Amasung ibungobu krosta yotpi thaduna pangtingkhrabada, makhoina laibak yengna-raga ibungogi phi yennei; 

36 Aduga makhoina maduda phamduna, ibungobu sangduna leirammi. 

37 Amasung ibungogi kokthollomda ibungoda theijinba wa ikhraba adu yankhatle, haibadi masi Jisu, Jihudisinggi ningthou aduni. 

38 Matam aduda ibungoga loinana daku anibu, amana yetta, amana oida, krosta yotpi thaduna pangting-i. 

39 Amasung manakta chatthok chatsin touriba makhoi aduda makok hairaduna, khonthina ikaiba piduna hai, 

40 Iswar ningnasang manghanba amasung numit humnida saba nang, nathantabu kanjou; nang iswargi macha nipa oirabadi, Kros-tagi kumtharak-u. 

41 Adugumduna athoiba purohitsingna sastragi ojhasingga ahallamansingga yaona ibungobu noknaduna hai, 

42 Ateisingbudi mana kanbi; mathantabudi kanjaba ngamde. Madi Israyelgi ningthouni; houjik mana krostagi kumthasanu aduda eikhoina mangonda thajagani. 

43 Mana iswarda thajei; ibungo mahakna mabu pammurabadi, houjik kanbisanu; maramdi mana hai, eidi Iswargi macha nipani. 

44 Amasung ibungoga loinana krosta yotpi thaduna pangtingminnriba dakusing adunasu adugumba achoppa wa adu ibungobu hairammi. 

45 Amahiksung taruksuba pungdagi mapansuba pung phaoba leibak pumnamakta mamle. 

46 Aduga mapansuba pung taramdiada Jisuna awangba khonjenna laorak-i, Eloi, Eloi, Lama Sabaktani? Adudi, Eigi Iswar, Eigi Iswar, ibungona eibu karigi hundokpibage? 

47 Aduga maduda leplamba makhoi kharana madu tarabada hairak-i, mi asina Eliyabu kou-i. 

48 Amasung khudak aduda makhoigi maraktagi amana chenkhiduna Spanj ama louraga, madu asinba mahida luptuna, singnang amada madu lengsinduna ibungobu thaknaba pire. 

49 Aduga areiba misingna hairak-i, leisanu, Eliyana mabu kanbinanabu lakkadra eikhoina yengsi. 

50 Matung aduda Jisuna amukka awangba khonjenna laoramlaga, mathawai thakhre. 

51 Amahiksung yeng-u, iswar ningnasanggi asengba maphamgi maikhanphi adu mathaktagi makha phaoba ani thokna segaire; leipaksu nikle, nungjaosu pokkhaire; 

52 Mongphamsu hangdokle, aduga tumkhraba asengba misinggi hakchang ayambabu hinggathalle, 

53 Amasung ibungona hinggatpa matungda mongphamdagi makhoina thoklaklaga asengba saharda changduna ayambada uhalle. 

54 Amasung lanmi chammagi mapu-ga, Jisubu sangba mahakka loinaba makhoigana yuharaba amasung thokliba adu ubada, thoidokna kiduna hairak-i, aoibamak mi asi Iswargi macha nipani. 

55 Aduga ayamba nupisingna athappadagi yengduna maduda leirammi; makhoidi ibungobu thougan touduna Galildagi Jisugi tung illakpani; 

56 Makhoigi marakta Magdalini Mariyam, amasung Sebedigi macha nipasinggi mama yaorammi. 

57 Numidangwai oirakpada Arimathiyadagi Jouseph kouba, masana Jisugi sebok oiba, inakkhunba nipa ama lakle; 

58 Nipa asina Pilatki maphamda chatkhiduna Jisugi hakchang nijare. Matam aduda Pilatna madu pithoknaba yathang pine. 

59 Amasung Jousephna hakchang adu louduna, ananba asengba limon phina yomlaga, 

60 Mahakna nungjaoda huttoktuna saba mahmakki anouba mongphamda madu thamle; aduga mahakna mongpham adugi thongda nung achouba ama onsillamlaga chatthokkhre. 

61 Amasung Magdalini Mariyam amasung atoppa mariyam aduna mongpham aduga maioknana phamduna maduda leirammi. 

62 Hayeng, haibadi thourang langbagi matung nongma aduda, athoiba purohitsingga pharisisinggana Pilatki maphamda tilladuna hairak-i, 

63 Ibungo, minamba nipa aduna hinglingeida numit humnigi matungda eina hinggatkani, haina hatkhiba adu eikhoina ningsingi. 

64 Maram aduna numit hummi phaoba mongpham adu ningthina ngaknaba yathang pibiyu, nattrabadi magi seboksingna laktuna mabu hukhraga, mabu asibasinggi maraktagi hinggatpikhre, haiduna misingda haiba yai; aduga ahanba minambadagi akonba minambana henna phattaba oigani. 

65 Pilatna makhoida hairak-i, asangba mi lou; chatlu, nakhoina khangjaba makhei madu ningthijana ngak-u. 

66 Maduda makhoina chatkhiduna asangba mi yaona nung adu mohor namlaga mongpham adu ningthijana ngakhalle.

Matthi 28 

Jisuna Hinggatpa


1 Amahiksung potthaba numit loiramdaida, chayongi ahanba numit houramdaida, Magdalini Mariyam amasung atoppa Mariyam aduna mongpham adu yengnaba lakle. 

2 Amasung yeng-u, yamma yuharare; maramdi prabhugi dut swargadagi kumtharaklaga, nakna lengsilaktuna nung adu onthoklaga, mathak aduda phamle. 

3 Mahakki maithong nongthang kuppagum oiraimmi, aduga mahakki maphi marol un-gum ngourammi; 

4 Amasung sang libasing aduna mahakpu kibagi maramna nikladuna asiba misinggum oirakle. 

5 Maduda swargadut aduna nupising aduda khumlak-i, nakhoi kiganu; maramdi krosta hatkhiba Jisu adubu nakhoina thi haiba eina khang-i. 

6 Ibungo asida leitre; maramdi ibungona haikhibagumna hinggatpikhre. Lak-u, ibungobu thamlamba mapham adu yengjou. 

7 Aduga thuna chatkhiduna ibungogi seboksingda tak-piru, ibungobudi asibasinggi maraktagi hinggatpikhre; amasung yeng-u, ibungona nakhoidagi hanna Galilda lenggadouri; mapham aduda nakhoina ibungobu ugani. Yeng-u, eina nakhoida takpire. 

8 Amahiksung makhoina kiba amasung yamna haraobaga loinana mongpham adudagi thuna chatkhiduna, ibungogi seboksingda taknanaba chenkhre. 

9 Aduga yeng-u, Jisuna makhoibu oknaduna hai, yaiphou. Amasung makhoina naksillaklaga, ibungogi khong paiduna khurumjare. 

10 Matam aduda Jisuna makhoida hai, kiganu; chatlu, eigi ichin inaosingbu Galilda chatnaba takpiru, aduga makhoina mapham aduda eibu ugani. 

11 Makhoina chatlingeida, yeng-u, sangliba mising adudagi kharana saharda laktuna, thokkhiba pumnamak adu athoiba purohitsingda tamle. 

12 Amasung makhoina ahallamansingga tinnadunna wa tanaraga, lanmising aduda sen yamna piduna hai, 

13 Magi seboksingna ahingda laktuna, eikhoina tumlingeida mabu hudokkhre, haiduna nakhoina haiu. 

14 Amasung asi leibak ngak pagi manakongda yourgadi, eikhoina mahakpu themlaga, nakhoibu karisu touhalloi. 

15 Asumna makhoina sen adu louraga, makhoibu tambikhibagumna toure; amasung hairiba asi Jihudisinggi marakta houjik phaoba sandokli.


Galilda Jisuna masabu Seboksingda uhanba


16 Touigumbasung sebok taramathoi aduna Galilda Jisuna takpikhiba ching adu tanna chatkhre. 

17 Amasung makhoina ibungobu ubada khurumjare; adubu mi kharanadi chingnare. 

18 Aduga Jisuna lenglaktuna makhoida hairak-i, swarga amasung taibangpanda leiba matik pumnamak eingonda pibire. 

19 Maram aduna nakhoina chattuna, jat pumnamakpu sebok semmu; makhoibu Mapagi, Macha Nipagi amasung Thawai Asengbagi mamingda baptais tou; 

20 Eina nakhoida pikhiba yathang pumnamak adu ngaknaba makhoibu tambiyu; aduga yeng-u, taibangpanbagi aroiba phaoba eina tattana nakhoiga loinana lei.

MARKNA LENGBA APHABA WAPAO 

A-iba: Johan Mark Ibagi matam: A.D. 67-68 aduwai. 

Wamachang: Khrista asi Iswargi seba touba nipani. 

"Mark" asi Jerusalem khun-gi mini. Mamagi mamingna Mary koui Mapadi khangba ngamde(Acts 12:12) mahakna Barnaba amasung Polgi matung induna Perga khulda hallakkhre aduga Markna Barnabaga Kupra lomda chatle. Pitarnadi Mark asibu ichanipa haina kourammi. Markna Gospel ibagi maramsi Pitarna Jisu ubagi maram malli. Gentile amadi Romgi misingna bhap tanaba maongdasu ibani. Jisu Khrista asi Iswargi seba touba ama oina irabasu mana angakpa thabak toubagi maramna Iswargi machani haibadu tasengna utli. 

Mark 01 

Baptais toubiba Johan amassing mahakki pao


1 Iswargi macha nipa Jisu Khristagi aphaba wapaogi ahouba. 

2 Iswargi wa takthokpa Jisaiyagi lairikta ikhibagumna, yeng-u, eina eigi pakhonsibabu nanggi namangda thai; mahakna nanggi lambi semgani; 

3 Lamjaoda laoriba amagi khonjendi, nakhoina prabhugi lambel thourang tou, Ibungogi Iambi chumhallu; 

4 Adugumduna lamjaoda baptais toubiba John aduna paptagi handokpinaba pukning hongbagi baptais touba adu sandoktuna lakle. 

5 Amahiksung Jihu-diyagi lam pumnamak amasung Jerusalemgi mi pumnamak mahakki maphamda thoklakle; aduga makhoigi pap haidok-chaduna, Jordan turenda makhoina mangondagi baptais lourammi. 

6 Johandi ut matugi phi setlammi amasung makhwangda sa-un-gi khwangjet laklammi, aduga koujeng amasung lam-khoihi charammi. 

7 Amahiksung mahakna pao sandoktuna hairak-i, eigi itungda len-glakliba Ibungona eingondagi matik helli; Ibungogi khugrang mari eina nonthaduna louthokpa itik chade. 

8 Eina nakhoibu isingda baptais toubire, adubu Ibungona nakhoibu thawai asengbada baptais toubigani.


Jisubu baptais touba amasung diyabolna themba


9 Matam aduda asum thoklare, Galilgi Nasarettagi Jisuna lenglaktuna, Jordanda Johandagi baptais loure. 

10 Amasung isingdagi hek karakpada, swarga khanghang hangdokpa amasung thawaina khunugumna Ibungogi thakta kumtharakpa adu ure; 

11 Aduga khonjel ama swargadagi lakle, nang eigi nungsiraba icha nipani, nangonda eina yamna pelle. 

12 Amahiksung khudak aduda thawaina Ibungobu lamjaoda pu-thokkhi. 

13 Aduga Ibungodi seitanna themba adu khangduna lamjaoda numit niphuni lamsaga loinana leirammi, aduga swargadutsingna Ibungobu thougal tourammi.


Jisuna thabak houba amasung ahanba seboksingbu kouba


14 Johanbu Keisumsangda pithokkhibagi matungda, Jisuna Iswargi aphaba wapao sandoktuna Galilda lenglakle, 

15 Amasung Ibungona hai, matam adu thungle, aduga Iswargi leibak nakle; nakhoi pukning hongduna aphaba wapaoda thajou. 

16 Amahiksung Gall samadrugi mapanda lallakpada, Ibungona Simon amasung Simon-gi manao Andriya samadruda in koihun hunduna leiramba ure; maramdi makhoidi nga phaba mini. 

17 Amasung Jisuna makhoida hai, lak-u, itung illu, aduga eina nakhoibu mi phabasing oihan-gani. 

18 Khudak adumaktada makhoina in thadoklamduna, Ibungogi tung injare. 

19 Aduga khara lengthoklaklaga, Ibungona Sebedigi machanipa Jakob amasung magi manao Johan in phottuna hinungda leiramba ure. 

20 Khudak adumaktada Ibungona makhoibu koure; aduga makhoina makhoigi mapa Sebedibu anekpa misingga loinana hinungda thanamduna, Ibungogi tung injare.


Kapharnahumda Jisuna bhut changba mi amabu phahanbiba


21 Amahiksung makhoina Kapharnahumda lak-i; aduga potthaba numitta Ibungona loisangda hek changduna tambirak-i. 

22 Amasung Ibungogi tambiba aduda makhoina ingak ngaklammi, maramdi Ibungona sastragi ojha-sing-gumna nattana, matik leiba migumna makhoibu tambirammi. 

23 Khudak adumaktada makhoigi loisangda sengdaba thawai changba mi ama leirammi; 

24 Aduga mana laorak-i, he Nasaretki Jisu, nangga eikhoiga kari thok-naba leibage? eikhoibu manghannanaba lakpra? Eina nang kanano haiba khang-i, Iswargi asengba aduni. 

25 Maduda Jisuna mabu khamjinduna hai, tuminna laiyu, aduga mangondagi thokkhro. 

26 Aduga sengdaba thawai aduna mabu noihatlamlaga, awangba khonjenna laoduna mangondagi thokkhre. 

27 Maduda makhoi pumnamakna ingak ngakle, aduna makhoi masen hangnarak-i, asi karino? Anouba tambibani! Matik yaona mahakna sengdaba thawaisingmakpu yathang pi, amasung makhoina mahakpu illi. 

28 Amasung Galilgi akoiba lam apumba mapham khudingmakta Ibungogi paoninkhon hek sandokkhre.


Jisuna Pitargi manembokpu amasung atei ayambasingbu anaba phahanbiba


29 Amahiksung makhoina loisangdagi hek thoklakpada, Jakob amasung Johan-ga loinana Simon amasung Andriyagi yumda changle. 

30 matam aduda Simon-gi manembok arum houduna hiplammi, amasung makhoina magi maramda Ibungoda hek tammi. 

31 Aduga Ibungona lengsillaga, makhut paiduna mabu hougatpire; amasung magi arum kokkhre; aduga mahakna makhoibu thougan toujarak-i. 

32 Amahiksung numit tare hairaga, numidangda makhoina anaba pumnamak amasung bhutna pubasingbu Ibungoda puraklammi. 

33 Aduga sahar apumbana thongda tillare 

34 Maduda makhal makha ayamba lainana naba mayambu Ibungona phahanbire, amasung bhut ayambabu tanthokle; aduga Ibungona bhutsingbu nganghandre; maramdi makhoina Ibungobu Khristani haiba khanglammi.


Jisuna haijanabagidamak lengba, amasung Kapharnahum thadokpa


35 Ayuk nganta nong ngan-gadaba yamna watlingeida, Ibungona hougatlaga lengthokkhre, amasung achikpa maphamda laktuna maduda haijarammi. 

36 Amasung Simon-ga mahak-ka loinaba makhoigana Ibungogi tung inkhiduna, 

37 Makhoina Ibungobu phanglaga Ibungoda hanggatchei, pumnamakna Ibungobu thiri. 

38 Aduda Ibungona makhoida hai, eikhoina khul mathang mathangdasu eina pao sandok-nanaba chatsi; maramdi eina asigidamak thoklakpani. 

39 Aduga Ibungona makhoigi loisang loisangda pao sandoktuna amasung bhutsingbu tanthoktuna Galil pumnamakta lenglakle.


Kusthi thungba mi amabu phahanbiba


40 Amahiksung kusthi thungba amana Ibungoda laktuna, khuru khudak kullaga nijaduna haijei, Ibungona yabirabadi, eibu senghanbiba ngammi. 

41 Maduda Ibungona nungsibiraktuna khut tingthok-laga, mabu sokpiduna hai, eina yare; nahak sengjaro. 

42 Amasung khudak adumaktada kusthi laina adu mangondagi thokkhiduna, mahak senghoure. 

43 Aduga Ibungona mahakpu kanna yathang pire, amasung mahakpu hek thakhiduna mangonda hai, 

44 Yeng-u, nangna kanadasu kari amata haidokkanu; adubu chatlu, nasamak purohitta utcharu, aduga nahakpu senghanbibagi maramda Mousina yathang pikhiba pot adu makhoida sakshi pinanaba katcharu. 

45 Touigumbasung mahakna chatthokkhiduna, waram adu yamna phongdokpa amasung sandokpa houre; maram aduna Ibungona saharda phongni amuk changba ngamdre; touigumbasung mapanda achikpa mapham maphamda leirammi; amasung makhoina maikei khudingmaktagi Ibungoda laklammi.

Mark 02 

Nakal namma sithaba mi amabu phahanbiba


1 Amahiksung numit kharagi matungda ibungona Kapharnahumda amuk changbada, ibungo yumda lei haiduna inin ninnare. 

2 Amasung mi asup yamna tillammi, madudi thongjin mapan phaobada mapham leiramde; aduga ibungona makhoida wa ngangthoklammi. 

3 Amasung mi marina puba nakal namma sithaduna naba mi ama ibungoda puraktuna lak-i. 

4 Aduga makhoina miyamgi maramna ibungogi nakta purakpa ngamdrabada, ibungona leiba yumthak adu makhoina sidoktuna hohallaga, nakal namma sithaba anabana hipliba phamung adu thadare. 

5 Amahiksung Jisuna makhoigi thajaba adu uraduna, nakal namma sithaba aduda hai, icha, nanggi papsing adubu kokpire. 

6 Tou-i-gumbasung sastragi ojhasing kharana aduda phamduna, makhoigi pukningda maon-maon khanduna leirammi; 

7 Mi asina karigi asumna haibage? Mahakna iswarbu thina ngangle! Amata ngaiba iswar nattana kanana pap kokpiba ngambage? 

8 Amasung Jisuna mathawaida makhoina makhoigi nungda asumna maon khanba adu hek khangduna makhoida hai, nakhoina nakhoigi pukningda waram asi karigi maon maon khanbage? 

9 Nanggi papasing adubu kokpire haibaga, hougattuna nanggi hipnapham adu loukhattuna koichat chatlu haibaga, karambana henna laibage? 

10 Tou-i-gumbasung migi ma-cha nipa aduna papsing kokpinaba taibangpanda matik lei haiba nakhoina khan-gnanaba (ibungona nakal namma sithaba aduda hairak-i), 

11 Eina nangonda hairi, hougatlo, nanggi hipnapham adu loukhattuna nayumda chatlu. 

12 Maduda mahakna hougatle, amasung hipnapham, adu hek loukhattuna makhoi pumnamakki mangda chatthokkhre; maram aduna makhoi pumnamakna ingak ngakladuna, iswarbu thagatchaduna hai, eikhoina asi-gumba asi keidoungeidasu udri.


Lebibu koubiba


13 Amahiksung ibungona samadrugi mapanda amuk lengthokkhre; aduga miyam pumnamakna ibungoda lakpa houre, amasung ibungona makhoibu tambire. 

14 Asum chatlakpada ibungona khajana thiphamda phamliba Alphiyagi macha nipa Lebibu uraduna, mangonda hai, eigi itung illu. Maduda mahakna hougattuna ibungogi tung injare. 

15 Amahiksung asum tholdare, Jisuna mahakki yumda chanaba phamlingeida, ibungo amasung seboksingga loinana ayamba khajana thoubasing amasung papchenbasing phamminnarammi; maramdi ibungogi tung illamba makhoi adu yamlammi. 

16 Amasung Pharisisinggi sastragi ojhasingna ibungoda papchenbasingga khajana thoubasingga chaminnaba ubada, mahakna khajana thoubasingga papchenbasingga chamin-thak-minnariboire, haiduna ibungogi seboksingda hairak-i. 

17 Amasung Jisuna madu tabada makhoida hai masa phabasingdi maiba kannade, adubu anabasingdadi kannei; eina dharmachenbasingbu kouba lakpa natte, adubu papchenbasingbuni.


Chara henbagi amasung potthaba numit ngakpagi wahang


18 Amahiksung Johan-gi seboksing amasung Pharisisingna chara henduna leirammi; aduga makhoina laktuna ibungoda hai, Johan-gi seboksing amasung Pharisisinggi seboksingna chara helliba, aduga ibungogi sebok singnadi chara hendaba karigino? 

19 Amasung Jisuna makhoida hai, borna marup mapangga leiminnaringeida makhoina chara henba ngambra? Borna makhoiga loinaringei makhei makhoina chara henba ngamde. 

20 Tou-i-gumbasung asigumba numit lakkani, maduda bor adubu makhoidagi pukhigani, amasung numit aduda makhoina chara hen-gani. 

21 Kananasu amanba phida ahanba phi machet photchinde; photchillabadi, photchilliba aduna madudagi, haibadi amanbadagi, ahanba aduna chingsinduna hennadum thina segaihalle. 

22 Amasung kananasu amanba sa-un khaosingda anouba draksha mahi hapnade; haplabadi draksha mahi aduna sa-un khaosing adubu pokkhaihan-gani. Maduda draksha mahisu sa-un khaosing adusu mang-i; tou-i-gumbasung anouba draksha mahi ahanba sa-un khaosingda hapnei. 

23 Amasung asum thoklare, ibungona potthaba numitta louyaida lenglak-i, aduga ibungogi seboksingna asum chat-nachatna gehu charong hekpa houre. 

24 Maduda Pharisisingna ibungoda hairak-i, yeng-u, potthaba numitta touba hounadaba thabak karigi makhoina touribage? 

25 Aduga ibungona makhoida hai, Dayudna, mahak amasung mahakka loinabasingna awatpa amasung lamlaba matamda kari toukhiba, 

26 Haibadi, Abiyatharna athoiba purohit oiba matamda, mahakna iswargi sangda matou karamna changkhibage, amasung purohitsing nattana chaba yadaba a-ut-tal adu mahaksu chak-hibage, mahakka loinabasingdasu pikhibage haiba adu nakhoina padabra? 

27 Amasung ibungona makhoida hai, potthaba numitsi migidamak semkhi, mibu potthaba numitkidamak natte; 

28 Maram aduna migi macha nipa adu potthaba numitki mapuni.

Mark 03 

Makhut namma sithaba mi amabu amasung atei anabasingbu phahanbiba


1 Amahiksung ibungona loisang-amuk lengsille; maduda makhut namma sithaba mi ama leirammi. 

2 Amasung makhoina ibungobu maral piba yananaba, ibungona mabu potthaba numitta phahangadra haiduna makhoina lumduna yenglammi. 

3 Aduga ibungona makhut namma sithaba mi aduda hai, mayaida lepkhatlu. 

4 Amasung ibungona makhoida hai, potthaba numitta aphaba nattraga phattaba touba, thawai kanbiba nattraga hatpa hounabra? Adubu makhoidi tuminna lei. 

5 Aduga ibungona asaobaga loinana makhoida koiyeng yenglaga, makhoigi thammoi kanbagi ibungona thawai waraduna mi aduda hai, nakhut tingthok-u. Aduga mahakna ting-thokpada, mahakki khut hannagum phakhre. 

6 Amasung pharisisingna thokkhiduna, khudak aduda ibungobu karamna manghansige haiba herodiya-singga loinana wa tannarammi. 

7 Amahiksung Jisuna seboksingga loinana samadruda lengthokkhre, aduga Galildagi miyam yamna tong ille; amasung Jihudiyadagi, 

8 Jerusalemdagi, Idomiyadagi, Jordan wangmadagi, amas-ung Turga Sidon-gagi akoibadagi miyam yamna ibungona toukhi toukhiba adu taraduna ibungoda lakle. 

9 Amasung miyam aduna ibungobu omsindananaba, ibungogi damak hi macha ama thourang tousanu haiduna seboksingda hairak-i; 

10 Maramdi ibungona asup yamba mibu phahalle, phattaba laina thungba pumnamakna ibungobu soknanaba ibungoda insillakle. 

11 Amasung sengdaba thawaisingna ibungobu uba khudingda, ibungogi manida tuthaduna laona haijei, ibungodi iswargi macha nipani. 

12 Maduda eibu mida khanghariganu haiduna ibugona akanba yathang ayamba makhoida pire.


Jisuna sebok taranithoi khandokpa


13 Amahiksung ibungona chingda lengkhattuna, ibungomakna pamba makhoibu koukhatle, amasung makhoina ibungogi maphamda lakle. 

14 Aduga ibungoga loinanabagi, amasung bhutsingbu tanthokpa ngamba matik yaona pao sandoknaba makhoibu thananabagi, 

15 Ibungona taranithoibu pham haple. 

16 Ibungona Pitar thonjinbiba Simon, 

17 Sebedigi machanipa Jakob amasung jakobki manao Johan (makhoi anibu ibungona bonerges, haibadi nongkhakpagi macha nipasing thonjinbi); 

18 Andriya; Philip, Barthalomoi, Matthi, Thoma, Alphiyagi macha nipa Jakob, Thaddiya, Kannagi Simon, 

19 Amasung yeknabagi khutta ibungobu pithokpa Iskariyot Jihuda taranithoi asibu ibungona pham happibani.


Jisudi Seitan-gi kangbibana thabak. touribani haibada Jisuna khumba


20 Amahiksung ibungona yumda lenglak-i; aduga mi yamna amuk tinnare, aduna makhoina chaba phaoba ngamlamde. 

21 Amasung ibungogi naknabasingna madu tarabada, makhoina ibungobu phananaba thoklakle; maramdi, ibungodi mapukning serannakhre, haiduna makhoina hainarammi. 

22 Aduga Jerusalemdagi kumtharakpa sastragi ojhasingna hairammi, mahakna belsalbul phangle, amasung bhutsing-gi mapugi, mapanna mahakna bhutsingbu tanthokli. 

23 Amasung ibungona makhoibu kousinduna pandamgi wana makhoida hairak-i, seitanna seitanbu karamna tanthokpa ngambage? 

24 Aduga ningthou leibak amana masagi manungda nakpak tajarabadi, leibak adu panba ngamde. 

25 Amasung imung manung amana masagi manungda nakpak tajara-badi, imung manung adu panba ngamloi. 

26 Aduga seitanna mathantabu yeknaraktuna nakpak tajarabadi, panba ngamde, adubu magi aroiba oi. 

27 Tou-i-gumbasang kana amatana akanba migi yumda changlaga, akanba mi adubu hanna pundrabadi, magi mapot machei munba ngamde; pulle hairaga magi yum lut touba ngamgani. 

28 Eina nakhoida thanggei sengna hairibani, mioibagi machasinggi papsing, amasung makhoina thina nganglagadi makhoigi thina ngangba, pumnamak adu kok-pigani; 

29 Tou-i-gumbasung thawai asengbagi mathakta kanagumbana thina nganglabadi, kadoungeidasu kokpiba phangde, adubu lomba naidaba papki maral phang-i 

30 Maramdi ibungona sengdaba thawai phangle haiduna makhoina hairammi.


Achumba ichin inao


31 Arnahiksung ibungogi mama amasung manaosing lak-i; aduga makhoina mapanda leptuna ibungobu kounaba thare 

32 Amasung miyamna ibungogi akoibada phamduna leirammi; aduga makhoina ibungoda hairak-i, yeng-u, ibungogi imaga inaosinggana mapanda leiduna ibungobu thin. 

33 Madudi ibungona makhoida khumlak-i, eigi ima amasung inaosing kana kanano? 

34 Amasung ibungogi akoibada phamliba makhoida koiyeng yengduna ibungona hai, yeng-u, eigi ima amasung ichin inaosing! 

35 Iswargi ningba touba kanagurnba mi adu eigi ichin inao, ichan iche amasung imani.

Mark 04 

Maru hunbagi pandam


1 Amukka ibungona samadru mapanda tambiba houre. Amasung ibungoda miyam yamna tillare, aduna ibungona samadruda hida lengsinduna phamle; aduga miyam pumnamak aduna samadru mapan kangphanda leirammi. 

2 Amasung ibungona makhoida pandam piduna wa yamna tambirammi, amasung ibungogi tambiba aduda hairak-i. 

3 Tao! yeng-u, maru hunba mi aduna hunba thoklakle. 

4 Aduga asum thok-lare, mahakna asum hullakpada, maru kharana lambigi mapanda taraduna ucheksingna laklaga madu chathokkhi. 

5 Aduga kharana leipak kaya yamna leitaba nunglakta tai, amasung leipak luna leitabagi maramna thuna hourakle. 

6 Aduna numit karakpa matamda madu khuithare, amasung mara leitaba maramna kangsu kangsille. 

7 Aduga kharana tingkhang marakta tai, amasung tingkhang houraktuna madu namhatle, amasung mahei pande. 

8 Ateidi aphaba leipakta taduna mahei palle; houraktuna yamkhatle, aduga saruk kunthra, humphu, amasung rhamma phaoba mahei palli. 

9 Amasung ibungona hai, tananaba nakong panba mahak aduna tajasanu. 

10 Amahiksung ibungona mathanta leiba matamda ibungogi akoibada leiba-singna taranithoiga loinana pandamsing adu ibungoda hanglammi. 

11 Maduda ibungona makhoida hai, iswargi leibakki athuppa wa nakhoida pibirabani, adubu mapanda leibasingda maram pumnamak pandam toubani; 

12 Aduna makhoina amuk onsillakpa amasung makhoibu kokpiba yai haiduna, makhoina ubadi uraga wakhandi supta tadananabani, aduga tabadi taraga supkhang khangdananabani. 

13 Amasung ibungona makhoida hai, pandam asi nakhoina khangdra? adunadi nakhoina pandam pumnamak karamna khanggadage? 

14 Maru hunba mi aduna wapao adu hulli. 

15 Amasung lambi mapanda wapao hunkhiba maphamda leiba makhoi adu asini; aduga makhoina tabada, seitanna hek laktuna, makhoida hunkhiba wapao adu louthok-i. 

16 Adugumduna wapao tabada, haraona hek lousinba makhoi adu nunglakta hunkhibasing asini; 

17 Adumnadi oiraga makhoida mara leitabana ngaihaktang khang-i; matungda wapao asigidamak awaba taba nattraga otneiba phanglaba matamda, makhoina thuna khudi thiduna tui. 

18 Amasung ateising tingkhang marakta hunkhibani; makhoi asina wapao adu tare hairaga, 

19 Taibangpanbagi wakhal, lan-gi lounam amasung atei atei pammanba changduna wapao adubu namhatli, aduga madu mahei yandaba oiraki. 

20 Aduga aphaba leipakta hunkhiba makhoi adudi wapao adu tabada lou-i, amasung saruk kunthra, humphu, amasung chama phaoba mahei yalli.


Thaomeigi amasung maru hunbagi pandam


21 Amahiksung ibungona makhoida hai, thaomei adu makhong mathakta thamnaba nattaduna, thumuk makha-da nattraga kangkhada thamnanaba purakpra? 

22 Maramdi phongdokloi-daba arotpa karisu leite, aduga phongdokloidaba athuppa karisu leite. 

23 Kanagumbana tananaba nakong pallabadi tajasanu. 

24 Amasung ibungona makhoida hai, nakhoina tari tariba adu cheksillu; nak-hoina olluriba chang aduna nakhoidasu ollagani, hennasu pibigani. 

25 Maramdi areiba mahak aduda pibigani; amasung leitaba mahak adudagi mahakki leitaba adu phaoba louthokkani. 

26 Amahiksung ibungona hairak-i, iswargi leibak adu asigumbani, mi amana leipakta maru hulle hairage, 

27 Ahing tummi, nungthil hougatli, aduga maru adu karamna houraktuna chaorak-i mahakmakna khangde. 

28 Leipak masana ahanbada mayol, matungda charong, adugi matungda charongda heijing phaba mahei palhalli. 

29 Tou-i-gumbasung mahei adu mullabada, lokpa matam oire haiduna mahakna thanggol thai. 

30 Aduga ibungona hairak-i., iswargi leibak adu eikhoina karamna changdamnagadage, nattrage madu eikhoina kari pandamna utkadage? 

31 Hanggam maru ama leipakta hullabada, leipakta leiba maru pumnamaktagi henna pikpa oirabasu, 

32 Hulle hairage madu hourak-i; amasung mana- masing pambi pumnamaktagi henna chaoraktuna achouba masa longthoklak-i, aduna atiyagi ucheksingna madugi marumda mahum sarei, masigumbani. 

33 Amasung makhoina taba ngambagi matung inna ibungona wapao adu makhoida ayamba asigumba pandamna ngang-i; 

34 Aduga pandam nattana ibungona makhoida ngangde, tou-i-gumbasung ibungomakki seboksingdadi lonna ibungona pumnamak phongdok-pire.


Jisuna nong nungsit khamba


35 Numit aduda numidang oiraklabada, ibungona makhoida hai, eikhoi wangmada lanthoklasi. 

36 Amasung miyam adubu thanamduna, makhoina hida asum leiramba ibungobu makhoiga loinana pure. Aduga atei hisingsu ibungoga loinana leirammi. 

37 Amasung akanba nong-nungsit laktuna, ithakna hi adu yeire, aduna hi adu thangadoure. 

38 Aduga ibungodi hiruda leiduna monda tumlammi; amasung makhoina ibungobu houdoktuna haijei, guru, eikhoi manglibasi ibungona thouoibiroidra? 

39 Maduda ibungona lengkhatlaktuna, nungsit adubu khamjillaga samadruda hairak-i, tapthou! tuminna leiyu! aduga nungsit adu tokkhiduna, yamna tapthakhre. 

40 Amasung ibungona makhoida hairak-i, nakhoina kiriba karigino? Houjik phaoba, thajaba leitribra? 

41 Aduga makhoina thoidokna kiraduna, amaga amaga hainarak-i, adunadi nungsitnasu samadrunasu illiba ibungo asi kanano?

Mark 05 

Sengdaba thawai changba Gerasenigi mi amabu phahanbiba


1 Amahiksung makhoina Gerasenigi lam samadru wangmada lakle. 

2 Aduga ibungona hidagi lengthoklakpada sengdaba thawai changba mi amana mang maraktagi thoklaktuna ibungoga hek oknare. 

3 Magi leiphamdi mang marakta leirammi; aduga houjikti kana amatana mabu yotlhing-phalangnasu punba ngamkhidre; 

4 Maramdi mabu hanna hanna hang challaga amasung yotlhing-phalangna pullaga, mana yotlhing phalang adu thadatli, aduga hang adu matek matek thudek-i, amasung kananasu mabu tehanba ngamde. 

5 Matam leiba khibikta ahing-nungthil mana mang marakta amasung chingnungda koirao laoduna, masa mathantabu nungna sudatcharammi. 

6 Amasung mana Jisubu athappadagi ujabada chellaktuna ibungobu khurum-jare. 

7 Aduga awangba khonjenna laothoktuna haijei, he ihen henba iswargi macha nipa Jisu, nangga eiga kari thoknaba leibage? Iswar sonduna eina ibungobu haijei, eibu wahanbiganu. 

8 Maramdi ibungona ma-ngonda hairammi, sengdaba thawai nang, mi adudagi thokkhro. 

9 Aduga ibungona mabu hangle, naming karino? Maduda mana ibungoda hai, imingdi mayam kou-i; maramdi eikhoi yammi. 

10 Amasung makhoibu lam adudagi thadokpidananaba mana ibungoda yamna nonjei. 

11 Aduga mapham aduda chingyada ok sanggu achouba ama chaduna leirammi. 

12 Amasung, eikhoina oksing aduda changnanaba eikhoibu thabiyu, haiduna makhoina ibungoda nonjaraki. 

13 Aduga ibungona makhoibu yabire. Amasung sengdaba thawaising aduna thoklaktuna oksing aduda changlaga, ok lising aniromgi sanggu aduna angamba adudagi samadruda hotthaduna, samadruda lak-hatkhre. 

14 Amasung makhoibu sellambasing aduna chenkhiduna sahar aduda amasung khun khunda tam-lure. Aduga kari thokkhibano makhoina yengnanaba lakle. 

15 Amasung makhoina Jisuda laklaga, bhutna puba, haibadi bhut mayamna changlamba mahak aduna phisu settuna pukningsu achumba oiduna phamlamba adu ubada kire. 

16 Aduga bhutna puramba mahak aduda asi karamna thokkhiba amasung ok adugi maramda ukhibasingna makhoida libire. 

17 Maduda makhoigi lam adudagi lengthokkhinanaba makhoina ibungoda haijaba houre. 

18 Amasung ibungona hida lengsillakpada, bhutna puramba mahak aduna ibungoga loinajage haiduna ibungoda nonjarammi. 

19 Aduga mahakpu ibungona yabide, tou-i-gumbasung mangonda hai, nayumda chattuna prab-huna nanggidamak kaya chaoba thabak toubikhiba amasung nathakta kaya nungsibiba adu nanggi misingda tamlu. 

20 Amasung mahakna chatkhiduna, Jisuna mahakkidamak kaya chaoba thabak toubikhiba adu Dekapolida sandokpa houre; aduga mi pumnamakna ingak ngaldammi.


Jayirgi machanupibu hinggatpiba amasung i tabi nupi amabu phahanbiba


21 Amahiksung Jisuna hida amuk wangma lanthokkhibada, miyam yamna ibungogi maphamda tille; amasung ibungona samadru mapanda leirammi. 

22 Amasung loisanggi wayel thoudaba mapusinggi Jayir kouba mi ama lak-i, aduga ibungobu ubada, ibungogi khuyada tuthajare, 

23 Amasung mahakna yamna nonjana haijei, eigi ichanupi apisak sigadoure; mahak phaduna hingnanaba ibungona lengbiraktuna mahakki mathakta ibungogi khut thambiyu. 

24 Aduga ibungona mahakka loinana lengkhre; amasung miyam yamna ibungogi tung inkhiduna ibungobu omsillammi. 

25 Amahiksung chahi taranithoi itaduna narabi nupi ama leirammi; 

26 Mana ayamba maibasingdagi awaba yamna khangduna magi leijabamakhei tinglabasu karisu kannaba phangdana, henjin heniinna narammi; nupi asina Jisugi maram tajaraduna, 

27 Miyamgi marakta ibungogi tunglomda laklaga ibungogi phi sokle. 

28 Maramdi, eina ibungogi innaphi aduta sokcharabadi, ei pumpha phagani haina mahakna hairak-i. 

29 Amasung khudak adumaktada mahakki igi iphut adu kangkhre; aduga mahakna mahakki phattaba laina adudagi phare haiba masada khangjare. 

30 Aduga khudak adumaktada Jisuna masadagi matik thokkhre haiba ibungo mathantamakna sengna khangjaraduna, miyamda onthoklaktuna hairak-i, kanana eigi innaphi sokkhibage? 

31 Maduda seboksingna ibungoda hairak-i, miyamna ibungobu omsillaba ibungona uduna, eibu kanana sokkhibage haibiribra? 

32 Amasung ibungona asi toukhibi adubu unanaba koiyeng yenglammi. 

33 Tou-i-gumbasung nupi aduna masada thokkhiba adu khanglabada, kibana tanik tanikna lakladuna, ibungogi mangda tuthajare, amasung achumba pumnamak ibungoda tamjare. 

34 Aduga ibungona mangonda hai, icha nupi, nanggi thajabana nangbu phahanbire; ingthana chatchakhro, amasung nanggi phattaba laina adudagi pumpha phaba oijaro. 

35 Ibungona nganglingeimaktada loisanggi wayel thoudaba mapu adugi yumdagi makhoina hairei, nahakki nacha nupi sire. Nangna Gurubu karigi amuk wahallibano? 

36 Tou-i-gumbasung ngangliba wa adu tasannadana Jisuna loisanggi wayel thoudaba aduda hai, kiganu, thada tha-jou. 

37 Amahiksung Pitar, Jakob amasung Jakobki manao Johan nattana ibungona amatabu ibungoga loinana tung innaba yabidre. 

38 Aduga makhoina loisanggi wayel thoudaba mapugi yumda thunglabada, ibungona inin ninba, aduga kapliba amasung yamna tengtharibasingbu yeng-i. 

39 Amasung ibungona lengsillakpada makhoida hai, nakhoina karigi inin nillibage amasung kaplibage? Angangdi side tumlibani. 

40 Amasung makhoina ibungobu usittana noknei. Adubu ibungona makhoi pumnamakpu tanthoklaga, anganggi mapa mama amasung ibungoga loinabasingbu puduna, angang adu leiba maphamda lengsille. 

41 Aduga ibungona angang adugi makhut paikhattuna mangonda hai, Talitha kumi; wa asi handokpada asini, ibemma, eina nangonda hairi, hougatlu. 

42 Amasung khudak adumaktada nupi macha aduna hougattuna koichat chatle; maramdi mahak chahi taranithoi surabini. Amasung khudak aduda makhoina yamna ingak ngakle. 

43 Aduga kana amatanasu asi khangdananaba ibungona makhoida yamna kanna sinnare. Amasung mangonda chanaba piyu haiduna ibungona yathang pire.

Mark 06 

Nasaretta Jisubu yadaba


1 Amahiksung mapham adudagi leng-thokkhidima, ibungona masamakki khunda lenglak-i; amasung seboksingna ibungogi tung illi. 

2 Aduga potthaba numit oirabada ibungona loisangda tam-biba houre; amasung ataba ayamba aduna ingak ngakladuna hairak-i, nipa asigi pumnamak asi kadaidagino? Aduga nipa asida piriba lousing amasung mahakki makhutna asigumba toungamdaba toukhiba thabaksing asi karino? 

3 Usuba mi, Mariyamgi macha nipa, Jakob, Jousi, Jihuda amasung Simon-gi mayamba adu nattra? Aduga mahakki machansing asida eikhoigi inakta leiba nattra? Matou asumna makhoina ibungoda khudi thire. 

4 Amasung Jisuna makhoida hairak-i, iswargi wa takthokpa mibu mahakmakki sagei marakta, amasung mahakmikki imung manungda nattana ikaikhumna daba natte. 

5 Aduga ibungona anaba mi kharagi mathakta khut thambiduna makhoibu phahanbikhiba adu nattana, toungamdaba thabak kari amata maduda ibungona touba ngamde. 

6 Amasung makhoigi thajadaba maramna ibungona ngaklammi. Aduga ibungona khun khunda tambi tambiduna koina lenglak-i.


Sebok taranithoibu thaba


7 Amahiksung ibungona taranithoi adubu kouraga, makhoibu ani ani oina thaba houre; aduga ibungona makhoida sengdaba thawaisingbu ngamnaba matik pibire; 

8 Amasung cheisu ama nattana, achapot, paitukhao, sen-gaoda sel, kari amata langpheigidamak puganu; 

9 Tou-i-gumbasung khongda khugrang tong-u, aduga phuritti ani litkanu haiduna ibungona makhoida yathang pire. 

10 Amasung ibungona makhoida haire, nakhoina karigumba yum amada changle hairaga, mapham adudagi chatthokriba phaoba aduda leiyu. 

11 Aduga karigumba mapham amagi mina nakhoibu lousin-bidrabadi, nattraga tabidrabadi, nakhoina mapham adudagi chatthokpada, makhoina sakshi oinaba nakhoigi khuyagi uphul kanthoklammu. 

12 Amasung makhoina chatthokkhiduna, mina pukning hongnaba pao sandokle. 

13 Ayamba bhutsingbu tanthokpirammi, aduga anaba ayambabu thao teibiduna phahanbirammi.


Baptais toubiba Johanbu hatpa


14 Amahiksung Herod ningthouna tare; maramdi ibungogi ming phaorammi. Amasung baptais toubiba Johanna asibasinggi maraktagi hinggatle; maram aduna mangonda toungamdaba thabak toubagi matik leiribani, haiduna makhoina hainarammi. 

15 Tou-i-gum-basung ateisingna, masi Eliyani hai. Aduga ateisingnadi, masi iswargi wa takthokpasinggi amagumba, iswargi wa takthokpa amani hai. 

16 Tou-i-agumb-asung Herodna tarabada hairak-i, eina makok kakkhiba Johan adu hinggatle. 

17 Maramdi Herodmakna mahakki manao Phillipki nupi Herodiyabu pannarambanina, mahakki masunglanggidamak mi thakhiduna, Johanbu pharaga keisumsangda punkhi. 

18 Maramdi Johanna Herodta hairammi, nahakki nanaogi nupibu nahakna louba wayel kai. 

19 Tou-i-gumbasung Herodiyana mahakpu yengsu yengthire, hatsu hatningle, adubu ngamlamde. 

20 Maramdi Herodna Johandi dharma chenba amasung asengba mini haiba khangduna, mahakpu kiduna ngakpirammi. Aduga mahakki wa tabada pukning langtaknara-basu, mahakki wa taba nungngaire. 

21 Amasung Herodna mahakki angambasing, lanmigi athoiba luchingbasing amasung Galilgi achou-asangsingda mahakki mapok numitki chak-khangba matamda khudong chaba numit lakle, 

22 Matam aduda Herodiyagi macha nupi changduna jagoi sarabada, Herod amasung mahakka pharmminnabasingbu pelhalle, adudagi ningthouna leisabi aduda hairak-i, nangna pamba adu nijou, aduga eina madu nangngonda pibi-gani. 

23 Amasung mahakna mangngonda wasakle, nangna eingonda kari kari oirabasu nijaba, eigi leibak tangkhai-phaoba, eina pibigani. 

24 Aduga mana chatthokkhiduna mamada hairak-i, eina kari nigadabage? Maduda mamana hairak-i, baptais toubiba Johan-gi makok. 

25 Amasung mana ningthougi mapham tanna thuna hek laktuna nijarak-i, ibungona baptais toubiba Johan-gi makok sempak amada haptuna eingonda chingngeimaksida pibiba eina pamjei. 

26 Maduda ningthou aduna thawai yamna warabasu, mahakki wasakki amasung mahakka phamminnaribasinggi maramna mabu yadaba touningdre. 

27 Khudak adumaktada ningthouna mahakki santrisingdagi lanmi amabu thakhiduna mahakki makok puraknaba yathang pire. Amasung mana chatkhiduna keisumsangda mahakki makok kamluraga, 

28 Madu sempak amada pire; aduga leisabi aduna mamada madu pire. 

29 Masi tarabada, mahakki sebok-singna laktuna mahakki asiba hakchang adu louraga, mongphamda thamjille.


Jisuna mi lising mangabu pijaba


30 Amahiksung paokhonchatpasingna Jisugi maphamda tilladuna makhoina kari kari toukhiba amasung kari kari tambikhiba pumnamak adu ibungoda tamlare. 

31 Aduga ibungona makhoida hai, lak-u, nakhoi nasamakna achikkpa maphamda tonganna ngaihak potthajaro. Maramdi ayambana chatthok chatsin toubana makhoina chanaba phaoba matam phanglamde. 

32 Amasung makhoina hina achikpa mapham amada tonganna chatthokle. 

33 Aduga makhoina chatpa adu ayambana uduna khangle, amasung sahar pumnamaktagi khongna mapham aduda chensillaktuna makhoibu hanna thunglamle. 

34 Maduda ibungona lengthoklaktuna miyam yamna urabada, makhoi adu senbiba leitaba yaosinggum oirambagi maramna, ibungona makhoibu nungsiba pokle; amasung ibungona makhoida hiram ayamba tambiba houre. 

35 Amasung houjik numit thengkhrabada seboksingna ibungogi maphamda laktuna hanggatlaki, masi achikpa maphamni, houjik numitsu yamna thengkhre; 

36 Akoibada leiba lawai amasung khunda makhoina chatkhiduna chanaba kari karigumba leijarunaba makhoibu thabikhro. 

37 Tou-i-gumbasung ibun-gona makhoida khumlak-i, nakhoina makhoida chanaba piyu. Aduga makhoina ibungoda hangatchei, eikhoina chattuna dinar chanigi tat leiraga, chanaba makhoida pigadra? 

38 Maduda ibungona makhoida hai, nakhoida tandum kaya lei-bage? Chattuna yengu. Aduga khanglabada makhoina hai, manga, aduga nga ani lei. 

39 Amasung makhoi pumnamkpu kanglup kanglup oina napi asangba mathakta phamhallu haiduni ibungona makhoida yathang pire. 

40 Aduga makhoina chamma amasung yangkhei oina pareng pareng phamthare. 

41 Amasung ibungona tandum manga aduga nga ani aduga louraga swargada yengkhattuna bor pibire, amasung tandumsing adu thugaiduna mamang mamgangda yennaba seboksingda ibungona pire; aduga nga ani adu pumnamakta yenbire. 

42 Amasung makhoi pumnamakna chaduna mapuk thalle 

43 Aduga makhoina machet makai nga adugisu yaona thumuk taranithoi thanna khun-gatle. 

44 Amasung tal adu chakhibasing nipa lising manga oirammi.


Jisuna ising mathakta khongna lengba


45 Amahiksung khudak aduda ibungo masana miyam adubu thadoklingeida, ibungogi seboksingbu hi tongduna mang thana wangmada Betseidada chathalammi. 

46 Amasung ibungona makhoiga khainaba matungda, haijananaba chingda lengthokkhre. 

47 Aduga numidangwai oiraklabada hi aduna samadru mayaida amasung ibungonadi matommata kangphanda leirammi. 

48 Amasung nungsitna makhoida mayoknaba maramna hi honbada makhoina yamna waba ubada, ahinggi yuthak mari aduwaida ibungona samadru mathakta khongna chattuna makhoi tanna lenglak-i. Amasung ibungona makhoibu hendokke tourammi; 

49 Tou-i-gumbasung samadru mathakta khongna lenglakpa ibungobu ubada, makhoina tamnaba laini haina ningladuna laorakle 

50 Maramdi makhoi pumnamakna ibungobu uraduna pakhatnare. Adubu ibungona khudak adumaktada makhoiga ngangnaraduna hairak-i pukning lumna leiyu, eini kiganu. 

51 Amasung ibungona makhoi tanna hida lengkhatpada nungsit lepkhre. Maduda makhoi masa masamak ngakpana thengle 

52 Maramdi makhoina tal adugi khandre, tou-i-gumbasung makhoigi thammoi kallammi. 

53 Adudagi makhoina lanthokkhiduna, Gennesaretki lamdamda laklaga torbanda hi thangle. 

54 Amasung makhoina hidagi thoklaklabada, misingna ibungobu hek shak khangladuna, 

55 Maikei apumba koichel chellaklaga, ibungo lei haina makhoina taba mapham mapham aduda anabasingbu makhoigi hipnaphamga konnana koipu puba houre. 

56 Aduga ibungona changkhi changkhiba khul oirabasu, sahar oirabasu, lawai oirabasu, anabasingbu mi tinpham tinphamda thamduna, makhoina ibungogi phiji aduta sokchannaba ibungoda haijarammi; Aduga sokchaba makheibu pumpha phahanbire.

Mark 07 

Chatnarakliba hounabi kaibagi jisuna khumba


1 Amahiksung Jerusalemdagi lakpa pharisising amasung sastragi ojhasing kharana ibungogi maphamda tinnare. 

2 Amasung ibungogi seboksing kharana sengdana, haibadi khut hamdana, tal chakhiba makhoina uramle. 

3 (Maramdi Pharisising amasung Jihudi pumnamakna ahal lamansinggi chatnarakliba adu ngaktuna, makhoigi khut cheksinna hamdrabadi chade; 

4 Aduga keithendagi laklaga makhoina irujadrabadi chade; amasung makhoina ngakliba atei ayamba chatnarakliba leiri, madudi, tenggot, chaphu amasung pithraigi kollik chamba). 

5 Amasung Pharisisingga sastragi ojhasinggana ibungoda hanggatchei, ibungogi seboksingna ahallonsinggi chatnarakliba matung inna chattaduna, sengdaba khutna tal chaba karigino? 

6 Maduda ibungona makhoida hairak-i, aphasajaningba nakhoigi maramda Jisaiyana ningthijana iswargi wa takthokle, asumna iduna lei: Mising asina eibu chinbanthongna ikaikhumnei, tou-i-gumbasung makhoigi pukningdi eingondagi thapna lei. 

7 Adubu makhoina misinggi chatnaba yathang adubu dharmagi paotakkumna tambiduna, eibu arembada khurummi 

8 Nakhoina iswargi yathang adubu thadoktuna, misinggi chatnarakliba adu chetna pai. 

9 Aduga ibungona makhoida hairak-i, nakhoigi chatnarakliba ngaknanaba, nakhoina iswargi yathang adu kayada ningthijana thou-oidriba! 

10 Maramdi Mousina hairammi, napa namabu ikai-khum-nou, amasung napa namabu thina ngangba mahak adu sisanu; 

11 Adubu nakhoina hai, mi amana mapa nattraga mamada, eingondagi nahakna kannaba phangba yaba adu korbanni, haibadi, iswarda katkhre, hairagadi, 

12 Nakhoina mapa nattraga mamagidamak mahakna karigumba tounanaba amuk yabidre; 

13 Aduna nakhoina mathang mathang pinarakpa nakhoigi chatnarakliba aduna iswargi wa hiktokle; amasung asiga mannaba asigumba nakhoina tou-i. 

14 Matung aduda ibungona miyambu nakta kousillaga, makhoida hairak-i, nakhoi pumnamakna eigi wa tasu tao, khangsu khang-u: 

15 Mapandagina mi aduda changduna mahakpu manghanba ngamba karisu leite; tou-i-gumbasung mi adubu manghanba adudi mangondagi thoklaklibasing adunani. 

(16 Manakong panba mi aduna tajasanu). 

17 Amasung miyamdagi ibungona imungda lengsinbada, ibungogi sebok-singna pandam adu ibungogi maphamda hangatcharak-i. 

18 Maduda ibungona makhoida hai, nakhoisu asup khangdabra? Mapandagina mida changkhiba pumnamak aduna mahakpu manghanba ngamde; 

19 Maramdi madu mahakki thammoida changde, tou-i-gumbasung mapukta changduna amangba oina chatthokkhi haiba nakhoina khangdra? Ibungona haiba asina chinjak pumnamak seng-halli. 

20 Aduga ibungona hai, mi adudagi thokkhiba aduna mi adubu manghalli. 

21 Maramdi manungdagi haibadi, misinggi pukningdagi phattaba wakhal, marumbi thamba, huranba, mihatpa, mitu-miwa lannaba, 

22 Karamba, phattaba, minamba, hakchanggi apaiba, mityeng phattaba, thina ngangba, chao-thokpa, apangba thok-i. 

23 Phattaba pumnamak asina manungdagi thoklaktuna mi adubu manghalli.


Atoppa jatki kisabi amabu phahanbiba


24 Matung aduda ibungona mapham adudagi lengkhattuna Tur amasung Sidon-gi ngamkheida lengthokkhre. Amasung ibungona yum amada lengsinduna mi amatabu khangbanninglamdrabasu, ibungodi lotpa ngamde. 

25 Tou-i-gumbasung sengdaba thawai changba nupi macha apisak amagi mamana ibungogi maram hek tarabada, lak-tuna ibungogi khuyada tujarare. 

26 Nupi asidi Suropheinikigi grik oirammi. Amasung mahakki machanupidagi bhut adu ibungona tanthokpinaba mahakna hanggatcharammi. 

27 Maduda ibungona mangondi hairak-i, ahanbada angangsing mapuk thankhisanu, maramdi angangsinggi achapot louduna huisingda hunjinba chumde. 

28 Adubu mahakna khumduna ibungoda hanggatchei; chum-i, prabhu; mej makhada huisingmaknasu angangsinggi chanabadagi makup makai chai. 

29 Maduda ibungona mangonda hairak-i, hairiba asigi marammna chatlu, bhut aduna macha nupidagi chatthokkhre. 

30 Aduga mahakna mayumda chatkhiduna, angang aduna phamungda hiplamba amasung bhut aduna chatthokkhiramba phangle.


Manasu pangba maronsu thoktaba mi amabu phahanbiba


31 Amahiksung ibungona Turgi lamdagi amuk lengthoklaktuna Sidon-gi mayaidagi Galil samadru tanna Dekapoligi lam mayaida lenglakle. 

32 Adup makhoina ibungogi maphamda napangba amasung mareilomba amabu puraktuna, ibungona magi mathakta khut thambinaba haijei. 

33 Amasung ibungona mahakpu miyamdagi lonna puthokkhiduna mahakki manakong anida ibungogi khudonbi thingjinbire, aduga ibungona tin sitpiduna mahakki marei matonda sokpire; 

34 Amasung swargalomda yengkhattuna ibungona nungsamapi honduna mangonda hai, epphatha, haibadi hangdoklo. 

35 Maduda mahakki manakong hangdokle, mahakki marei maton apunba adu thadokle, amasung mahakna chumna wa ngangba houre. 

36 Aduga mi kana amadasu tamthoktanaba ibungona makhoibu yathang pire; tou-i-gumbasung ibungona adupki makhei yathang piraga, makhoida asupki matik sandokle. 

37 Amasung makhoina tamningngai leitaba makhei ngakladuna hairaki, ibungona thabak pumnamak phajana toubire; napangbasingbu tahanbi, amasung lol thoktaba singbu lol thokhanbi.

Mark 08 

Jisuna mi lising maribu pijaba


1 Matam aduwaida amuk mayam yamnaleiduna, makhoina chanaba karisu leitrabada, ibungona seboksingbu kousinduna makhoida hairak-i, 

2 Eina miyam asida nungsiba pokle, maramdi makhoina eiga loinana houjik numit humni leiminnaraduna makhoigi chanaba leitre; 

3 Amasung eina makhoibu chara helhanduna makhoigi yumda thakhrabadi, makhoina lambida wantharagani; aduga makhoi kharadi athappadagini. 

4 Maduda ibungogi seboksingna khumjarak-i, lamhang asida kanagumbana mising asibu talna mapuk thalhanba kadaidagi ngamgadage? 

5 Aduga ibungona makhoibu hanglak-i, nakhoigi tandum kaya yaoribage? Maduda makhoina hanggatcharik-i, taret. 

6 Amasung ibungona miyam adubu leipakta phamthananaba yathang piraga, tandum taret adu louduna thagatcharaga, thugaiduna mamang mamangda yennanaba ibungogi seboksingda pibire; aduga makhoina miyamda yenbire. 

7 Amasung makhoigi nga macha khara leirammi, aduga ibungona madugi mathakta bor pibiduna, asisu makhoigi mamangda yengbinaba yathang pire. 

8 Amasung makhoina chaduna thalle; aduga lemhouba machet makai thumuk taret khungatle. 

9 Amasung makhoi adu lising marirom oirammi. 

10 Aduga ibungona makhoibu thadokkhre; khudak aduda ibungona seboksingga loinana hida lengsinduna, Dalmanuthagi lamda Jakle.


Ibungona seboksinggi wakhal tadaba adu warakpiba


11 Amahiksung pharisisingna thoklaktuna, ibungobu chang yengba oina swargadagi khudam ibungodagi thaduna, wa hangdok hangjin touba hourak-i. 

12 Amasung ibungona thawai wana luna nungsamapi honduna hai miron asina khudam thiriba kari maramgino? Thanggeisengna eina nakhoida hairi, miron asida khudam piraroi. 

13 Maduda ibungona makhoibu thanamduna, amuk hida lengsinduna wangmada lengthokkhre. 

14 Amahiksung makhoina tal puba kaoraduna hinungda tandum ama nattana makhoigi leiramde. 

15 Amasung ibungona makhoida yathang piduna hai, yeng-u, pharisisinggi hamei amasung Herodki hamei adu cheksillu. 

16 Aduga makhoigi tal leitabagi maramda makhoina amaga amaga khannarammi. 

17 Maduda ibungona khangladuna makhoida hai, tal leitabagi maramda nakhoina karigi khannaribage? Nakhoina houjik phaoba udri-khang-dribra? Nakhoigi thammoi kallibra? 

18 Mit panna panna nakhoina udabra, amasung na panna panna nakhoina tadabra? 

19 Amasung eina mi lising mangagidamak tandum manga thugaibada, nakhoina machet makaina thanba thummuk kaya khungatpa adu nakhoina ningsingdabra? Makhoina ibungoda hanggatli, taranithoi. 

20 Aduga mi lising matigidamak tandum taret aduda machet makaina thanba thummuk kaya nakhoina khun-gatpage? Amasung makhoina ibungoda hanggatli, taret. 

21 Maduda ibungona makhoida hairak-i, houjik phaoba nakhoina khangdribra?


Betseidada Ibungona mamit tangba mi amabu phahanbiba


22 Amahiksung makhoina Betseidada lak-i. Amasung makhoina ibungogi maphamda mittangba mi amabu purak-tuna, mahakpu sokpinaba ibungoda nonjei. 

23 Aduga ibungona mittangba mi adugi makhut paiduna khundagi mahakpu puthokkhre; amasung ibungona mamitta tin sitchanbiduna, mathakta khut thambiraga, mahakpu hanglak-i, nangna karigumba ubra? 

24 Maduda mahakna yengkhattuna hairak-i, eina misingbu adubu eina makhoibu u-pambigumna koichat chatpa ui. 

25 Matung aduda ibungona amuk mahakki mit mathakta khut ani thambire; aduga mahakna sangtrikna yengbada, pharaduna pot pnmnamak iseng sengna ujarakle. 

26 Amasung ibungona mahakpu mayumda thakhiduna hai, khunda changganu.


Jisubu Khristamakni haina Pitarna haidokpa


27 Amahiksung Jisuga seboksingga Kaisariya Philippigi khun khunda lengthoklakle; aduga lambida ibungona sebok singda hanglak-i, misingna eibu kanani hainabage? 

28 Maduda makhoina ibungoda hanggatlak-i, baptais toubiba Johan, aduga kharana Eliya, tou-i-gumbasung ateisingna iswargi wa takthokpasinggi amani hai. 

29 Amasung ibungona makhoida hanglak-i, adubu nakhoinadi eibu kanani haibage? Pitarna ibungoda khumlak-i, ibungo nahakti Khrista aduni. 

30 Aduga mahakki maramda kanadasu haidokkanu haina ibungona makhoida kanna sinnare.


Jisuna mahakki siba amasung hinggatpagi wa mangjounana khanghanbiba, mina masa mathantabu yajadanaba Jisuna kouba


31 Amahiksung migi macha nipa adu ayamba awa anang phangba tai, ahal-lamansing, athoiba purohitsing amasung sastragi ojhasinggi yadaba khangba tai, mahakpu hatpa tai, aduga mahakna numit humni suraga hinggatpa tai haiba makhoida ibungona tambiba houre. 

32 Amasung hairiba asi ibungona iphong phongna ngangthoklammi. Maduda Pitarna ibungobu manakta pusillaga warakpa houre. 

33 Tou-i-gum-basung ibungona onsillaktuna seboksingbu ubada Pitarbu waraktuna hai, itungda chatthokkhro, seitan! Maramdi nangna iswargi oiba adu khande, adubu migi oiba adu khalli. 

34 Amasung ibungona seboksingga loinana miyambu kousinduna makhoida hairak-i, kanagumbana eigi itung inninglabadi, mahakna masa matommatabu yajadasanu mahakki Kros loukhatsanu, amasung eigi itung injasanu. 

35 Maramdi mathawai kanjaningba kanagumba aduna madu mangjagani; aduga eigi maramgi amasung aphaba wapaogidamak mathawai mangjaba kanagumba aduna madu kanjagani. 

36 Maramdi taibangpal apumba phangjaraga, magi thawai mangjaba mi adugi kari tongjaba leibage? 

37 Maramdi mi amana magi thawaiga kariga sinnagadage? 

38 Maramdi nupi lannaba amasung papchenba miron asida eigidamak amasung eigi waheisinggidamak ikaiba kanagumba adugidamak migi macha nipa adunasu asengba swargadutsingga loinana mapagi matik manganda lenglakpa matamda ikaigani.

Mark 09 

1 Amasung ibungona makhoida hairaki, eina nakhoida thanggeisengna hairibani, asida lepliba makhoi kharidi iswargi leibak matik yaona lakkhraba adu udriba phaoba sibagi mahao khak tangloi.


Jisugi saklon hongba


2 Amahiksung numit taruknigi matungda Jisuna mahakka loinana Pitar, Jakob amasung johanbu puduna, awangba chingda makhoitabu tonganna pukhatle; amasung ibungona makhoigi mamangda saklon hongle; 

3 Aduga ibungogi phirol tagup tarengduna asup ngourak-i, madudi taibangpanda phi suba kana amatana adup ngouhanba ngamde. 

4 Amasung Mousiga loinana Eliyana makhoida phaorakle, aduga makhoina Jisuga wa ngangnei. 

5 Maduda Pitarna Jisuda hanggatcharaki, Rabbi, eikhoina mapham asida laijaba phei, aduga eikhoina khangpok ahum, Ibungogidamak ama, Mousigidamak ama, amasung Eliyagidamak ama sasi. 

6 Maramdi mahakna kari khumgadage khanglamde, maramdi makhoina thoidokna kirammi. 

7 Amasung makhoibu khanjinba leichin ama laklaga, leichin adudagi, masi eigi nungsiraba icha nipani, nakhoi mahakna haiba tao, haiba khonjel ama thoklakle. 

8 Aduga khanghoudana koyeng yengbada, makhoiga loinana Jisu matommata nattana kana amatabu amuk ukhidre. 

9 Amahiksung makhoina chingdagi asum kumtharakpada, migi macha nipa aduna asibasinggi maraktagi hinggatlaba matam nattana, mi kanadasu nakhoina ukhiba adu tamthokkanu haiduna ibungona makhoida yathang pirammi. 

10 Amasung asibasinggi maraktagi hinggatpa asi karino haiba makhoi masengi marakta hangnaduna, hairiba adu makhoina ngakle. 

11 Aduda makhoina ibungoda hangjarak-i, Eliyana hanna lakpa tai haina sastragi ojasingna karamna haibano? 

12 Aduga ihungona makhoida hairak-i, Eliyana laktuna pot pumnamak hanjinbani, chummi; amasung migi macha nipa adu ayamba awa ana khanggani, amasung karisu nattaba oihan-gani, haiba mahakki maramsi karamna ikhibage? 

13 Tou-i-gumbasung eina nakhoida hairibani, Eliyadi lakkhre, amasung mahakki maramda ikhiba aduga mannana, makhoina pamba adu mangonda toukhre.


Bhut changba nipa macha amabu phahanbiba


14 Amahiksung makhoina seboksing tanna laklabada, makhoigi akoibada miyam yamna leiba amasung sastragi ojhasingna makhoiga wa hangdok hangjin tounaba makhoina ure. 

15 Aduga miyam pumnamakna ibungobu hek ubada, ingak ngakle amasung ibungo tanna chellaktuna khurumjare. 

16 Maduda ibungona makhoibu hanglak-i, nakhoina makhoiga kari wahang tounaribage? 

17 Amasung miyamgi maraktagi amana ibungogi maphamda khumlak-i, guru, lol thoktaba thawai changba eigi icha nipabu ibungoda eina pujarakle; 

18 Aduga mabu puba mapham khudingda mabu chingthui; amasung ma konggol thokna maya krak krak chiktuna tukthare; aduga masi tanthokpiyu haiduna eina ibungogi seboksingda haijabada makhoi ngamde. 

19 Maduda ibungona makhoida khumlak-i, he thajadaba miron, eina nakhoiga kaya kuina leiminnagadage? Eina nakhoibu kaya kuina khanggadage? Mabu eingonda purak-u. 

20 Amasung makhoina mabu ibungogi maphamda purakle; aduga ibungona mabu ubada, thawai aduna mabu wana noihatle; maduda mana leipakta mana tuduna konggon thokna tharo tharo olle. 

21 Amasung ibungona magi mapabu hang-i, mangonda thokpa asi kaya kuirabage? Aduga mahakna hanggatlak-i, angang oiringeidagini. 

22 Amasung masina mabu mangnanaba, meidasu isingdasu toina toina hunjilli; tou-i-gumbasung ibungona karigumba toubiba ngamlabadi, eikhoibu thoujanbiduna pangbiyu. 

23 Maduda Jisuna mangonda hairak-i, ngamlabadi, haibadu! thajaba mangon-da pumnamak ingam ngambani. 

24 Khudak adumaktada angang adugi mapana laona haijarak-i, ei thajei; eigi thajadaba koknaba pangbiyu. 

25 Madudua miyamna chensillakpa adu Jisuna ubada sengdaba thawai adubu cheihatle, lol thoktaba amasung na pangba thawai nang, mangondagi. chatthokkho, aduga mangonda nang amuk hanna changlaganu haina eina nangbu yathang piri. 

26 Amasung lao-khong-duna mabu yamna noihatlamlaga thokkhre; aduga angang adu asiba amagum oirakle, aduna ayambana mahak sikhre haiduna hainei. 

27 Tou-i-gumbasung Jisuna magi makhut paiduna mabu hougathalle, aduga amana lepkhatle. 

28 Amasung ibungona imungda lengsillakpada; seboksingna ibungobu lonna hanggatchei, eikhoina masibu tanthokpa ngamdaba kari maramnano? 

29 Aduga ibungona makhoida hairak-i, asigumba asi haijaba nattana karigumbana thokhanba ngamde.


Ibungogi sibagi waram mangjounana tambiba anirak suba


30 Matungda makhoina mapham adudagi chathoklaktuna, Galilgi mayaida lanthokle; aduga kanagumba mina masibu khangba ibungona pamlamde. 

31 Maramdi ibungona seboksingbu tambi tambiduna makhoida hairammi, migi macha nipa adubu misinggi makhutta pithoklaga, makhoina mahakpu hatkani; amasung mahakpu hatkhraga, numit humni suraga mahakna hinggatkani. 

32 Adubu hairiba adu makhoina khanglamde, amasung ibungoda hangjabasu kirammi.


Nollukpagi khangbibagi amasung mibu khudi thihandanabagi maram tambiba
