33 Amahiksung makhoina Kapharnahumda lakle, aduga imungda lengsillabada, ibungona makhoibu hanglak-i, lambida nakhoina kari wa yetnabano? 

34 Tou-i-gumbasung makhoina tuminna leirammi, maramdi lambida kanana khwaidagi henna chaobage haiduna makhoina amaga amaga chinda-paodana-rammi. 

35 Maduda ibungona phamthaduna taranithoi adubu kouraga makhoida hai, kanagumbana ahanba oiba pamlabadi, mahakna pumnamakki akonba amasung pumnamakki manai oigani. 

36 Amasung ibungona apikpa angang amabu paiduna, makhoigi mayaida thamle; aduga mabu konduna makhoida hairak-i, 

37 Kanagumbana asigumba apikpa angangsinggi maraktagi amabu eigi imingda lousinjarabadi, eibu lousinjabani; aduga kanagumbana eibu lousinjarabadi, eibu lousinjaba natte, tou-i-gumbasung eibu tharakpa ibungo mahakpuni. 

38 Johanna ibungoda hanggatchei, guru, kanagumba amana ibungogi mingda bhutsingbu tanthokpa eikhoina uraduna, mahakpu khamjillammi, maramdi mahakna eikhoigi tang illamde. 

39 Tou-i-gumba-sung Jisuna hai, mahakpu khamganu, maramdi eigi imingda toungamdaba thabak touraga, eigi maramda phattaba ngangba thuna ngamgadaba kanasu leite. 

40 Maramdi eikhoibu yeknadaba mahak adu eikhoigidamakni. 

41 Maramdi nakhoi Khristagini haiduna maming aduda kanagumbana nakhoida thaknaba ising tenggot ama pibirabadi, eina nakhoida thanggeisengna hairibani, mahakki mana adu khak mingloi. 

42 Amasung kanagumbana thajaba apikpasing asigi amabu khudi thihanbabudi, magi mangakta achenba chakri nung thangduna samadruda langthabana magidamak henna phabani. 

43 Aduga nanggi nakhutna nangbu khudi thiba thokhallabadi, madu kakchatkho; nanggi nakhut ani panna norokta mutpa ngamdaba meinungda changbagi sarukpudi, khut soina hingba aduda changbana nanggi henna phei. 

44 ** 

45 Amasung nanggi nakhongna nangbu khudi thiba thokhallabadi, madu kakthatkho nanggi nakhong ani panna norokta langsinbagi sarukpudi khong tekna hingba aduda changbana nanggi henna phei. 

46 ** 

47 Aduga nanggi namitna nangbu khudi thiba thokhallabadi, langthokkho; nanggi namit ani panna norokta langsinbagi sarukpudi, namma tangna iswargi leibakta changbana nanggi henna phei. 

48 Norok aduda makhoigi han side, aduga meisu mutte. 

49 Maramdi mi khudingmakpu meina thum nambagum oihan-gani. 

50 Thum aphabani; tou-i-gumbasung thum adugi mahao manglabadi, nakhoina karamna madu haohangadage? Nakhoi nasen-gi manungda thum leihallu, aduga nakhoi amaga amaga ingthanou.

Mark 10 

Nupi khainabagi wahang


1 Amahiksung ibungona mapham adudagi lengkhattuna, Jihudiyagi lamdamda amasung Jordan wangmada lenglak-i; aduga miyamsingna maphamda amuk lakminnabada, ibungona mahousagumna makhoibu amuk tambirak-i. 

2 Amasung pharisisingna laktuna chang yengba oina ibungoda hangjarak-i, nipana nupi khainaba wayel kaibra? 

3 Maduda ibugona makhoida khumlak-i, Mousina nakhoibu kari yathang pirambage? 

4 Aduga makhoina hai, khainabagi waroi lairik inaraga, mahakpu khainaba Mousina yabire. 

5 Adubu Jisuna makhoida hairak-i, nakhoigi thammoi kanbagi maramna mahakna yathang asi ibire. 

6 Tou-i-gumbasung leisemngei-dagi ibungona makhoibu nipa amasung nupi oina sembirambani. 

7 Maram asina nipana mapa mama thadoktuna magi nupida napsin-gadabani, amasung makhoi ani masa amata oigadabani. 

8 Adunadi makhoina amuk ani oidaduna masa amata oire. 

9 Maram aduna iswarna tinnahankhraba adu mina kbaidoktasanu. 

10 Amasung imungda seboksingna waram asigi marida ibungoda amuk hangjei. 

11 Aduga ibungona makhoida hai, kanagumbana magi nupibu khainaraga, atoppa ama luhongba adu magi nupigi mathakta lannaba thabak tou-i; 

12 Amasung nupina masa mathantana mapuroibabu khainajaraga, atoppa ama luhongba adu manasu lannaba thabak tou-i.


Jisuna angangsingbu bor pibiba


13 Amahiksung ibungona sokpinanaba makhoina apikpa angangsingbu ibungoda pujaraklammi; aduga seboksingna makhoibu cheihatlammi. 

14 Tou-i-gumba-sung Jisuna madu ubada, yamna nungngaitaduna makhoida hairak-i, eingonda apikpa angangsing lakchasanu; makhoibu khamganu; maramdi iswargi leibak adu asigumba makhoigini. 

15 Eina nakhoida thanggeisengna hairibani, apikpa anganggumna iswargi leibak loudaba kanagumba aduna maduda supchang changloi. 

16 Amasung ibungona makhoibu kollaga makhoigi mathakta khut thambi thambiduna bor pibire.


Inak khunba pakhang amana lomba naidaba hingba thiba


17 Amahiksung ibungona lambida asum lengthoklakpada, mi amana chellaktuna ibungogi mangda khuru khudak kullaga ibungoda hangjarak-i, aphaba guru, lomba naidaba hingba adu phangpham thoknanaba, eina kari toujagadage? 

18 Maduda Jisuna mangonda hai, nangna eibu karigi aphaba koubage? Amata ngaiba iswar nattana aphaba kanasu leite. 

19 Mi hatkanu, nupi lannaganu, huranganu, chumdaba sakshi piganu, lounam touganu, napa namabu ikai khumnou, haiba yathang asi nahakna khang-i. 

20 Amasung mahakna ibungoda hairak-i, guru, pumnamak asi eina angang oiringeidagi ngakcharak-i. 

21 Aduga Jisuna mangonda yengduna nungsibire, amasung mangonda hairik-i, nang thabak ama watli chatlo, nanggi arei areiba yonthoktuna lairabasingda pinou, aduga swargada nanggi lal leigani; aduga lak-u, hung injararao. 

22 Tou-i-gumbasung hairiba asina mahakki mamai mamle, aduga mahak wana chatthokkhre; maramdi mahak maral yamna leiba ama oirammi.


Inakkhunbagi apanba


23 Amahiksung Jisuna koyeng yenglaga seboksingda hai, inak khunba makhoi aduna iswargi leibakta kayada luna changgadabano! 

24 Aduga seboksingna ibungogi wa aduda ingak ngaklammi. Tou-i-gumba-sung Jisuna makhoida amuk khumlak-i, angangsa, landa thajabasingna iswargi leibakta changba kayada lubano. 

25 Inak khunba mina iswargi leibakta changbadagi ut amana yettum manada litpana henna lai. 

26 Maduda makhoina thoidokna ngakladuna hairak-i, adu oirabadi, kanana aran khubam phangba ngamgadage? 

27 Jisuna makhoida yengduna hairak-i, misingdadi masi oithoktabani, tou-i-gumbasung iswardadi natte; maramdi iswarda pumnamak oiba ngaktani. 

28 Pitarna ibungoda haiba houre, yenbiyu, eikhoina pumnamak thadokchaduna, ibungogi tung injare. 

29 Jisuna hairak-i, eina nakhoida thanggeisengna hairibani, eigidamak amasung aphaba wapaogidamak, mayum, machin manao, machan mache, mama mapa, macha masu, lousing oirabasu kanagumbana thadoklabadi, 

30 Mahakna howjik matam asida otneiba phangbaga loinana mayum makei, machin manao, machan mache, mamasing machasing amasung lousing saruk chama, aduga lakkadaba taibang-panbada lomba naidaba hingba phanggani. 

31 Tou-i-gumbasung ahanba oiba ayambana akonba oigani, aduga akonbana ahanba oigani.


Ibungogi sibagi waram mangjounana tambiba ahumlak suba


32 Amahiksung makhoina Jerusalemda kagadabagi lambida leirammi, aduga Jisuna makhoigi mangda lenglammi; aduga Jisuna makhoina ngaklammi, aduga tung inba kharanadi kirammi. Amasung ibungona seboksingbu amuk puthokladuna, ibungoda thokla thoklagadaba adu makhoida tamba houre, 

33 Madudi, yeng-u, eikhoina Jerusalem tanna kari; amasung migi macha nipa adubu athoiba purohitsing amasung sastragi ojhasingda pithokkani, aduga makhoina mahakpu hatpa matik cha haina uttuna, mahak-pu atoppa jatsingda pithokka-ni: 

34 Aduga makhoina mahakpu noknagani, mangonda tin sitchin-gani, mahakpu thina yeiraga hatkani; amasung numit humnigi matungda mahakna hinggatkani.


Achumba Achouba


35 Amahiksung Sebedigi macha nipa ani, Jakobka Johan-gana ibungogi nakta laktuna hairei, guru ibungoda eikhoina nijaba adu ibungona eikhoigi damak toubigani haina ningjei. 

36 Maduda ibungona makhoida hai, eina nakhoigidamak kari toubiba pambage? 

37 Aduga makhoina ibungoda haijei, ibungogi matik manganda eikhoi amana ibungogi yetta, amna oida phamnaba eikhoida pinabiyu. 

38 Tou-i-gumbasung Jisuna makhoida hairak-i, nakhoina nijtuiba adu nakhoina khangde. Eina thakpa tenggot adu nakhoina thakpa, nattraga eibu baptais touba adubu nakhoina louba ngambra? 

39 Maduda makhoina ibungoda haijei, eikhoi ngamjei. Adubu Jisuna makhoida hairak-i, eina thakpa tenggot adu nakhoina thakpadi thakkani, aduga eibu baptais touba aduna nakhoibu baptais tougani 

40 Tou-i-gumbasung eigi yet nattraga oida phambadi eina pigadaba natte; adubu masidi makhoigidamak sem-sabiraba makhoi adugini. 

41 Amasung tare aduna madu tabada, Jakob amasung Johan-gi mathakta saoba houkhre. 

42 Maduda Jisuna makhoibu nakta kousinduna makhoida hairak-i, atoppa jatsinggi makok oiba masing chanbasingna makhoigi mathakta mapu oi, aduga makhoigi achoubasingna makhoigi mathakta mapu oibagi thabak tou-i haiba nakhoina khangi. 

43 Nakhoigi naraktadi asum toude; tou-i-gumbasung nakhoigi naraktagi chaoningba kanagumba aduna nakhoigi thougan touba mi oigani; 

44 Aduga nakhoigi naraktagi khwaigi makok thangningba kanagumba aduna punmamakki mini oigani. 

45 Maramdi migi macha nipa aduna masabu thougan touhannaba lakpa natte, tou-i-gumbasung thougan toubinaba amasung mayamgi thadokmal oina mahakki thawai pinaba lakpani.


Mittangba Bartimayabu Phahanbiba


46 Amahiksung makhoina Jerikho tanna lak-i; aduga ibungona Jerikhodagi seboksingga ayamba mayamga loinana asum lengthoklakpada, Timayagi macha nipa mittangba chakniba Bartimayana lambi mapanda phamlammi. 

47 Amasung Nasaretki Jisuna haiba tabada mahakna laona haijaba houre, Dayudki macha nipa Jisu, eibu nungsibiyu. 

48 Aduga mahak tuminna leigadabani haina ayambana mahakpu cheihatlammi. tou-igumbasung mahakna thoina henna laojarammi, Dayudki macha nipa, eibu nungsibiyu. 

49 Amasung Jisuna leptuna hairak-i, nakhoina mahakpu kou. Aduga makhoina mittangba adubu kouduna mangonda hai; nungngaijaro, hougatlu, ibungona nahakpu koubiri. 

50 Maduda mahakna maphi hunjektuna chongkhatlaga Jisu tanna lakle. 

51 Amasung Jisuna nangonda khumlak-i, eina nanggidamak kari toubiba pambage? Maduda mittangba aduna ibungoda haijei, Rabboni, eihak uba phangjaning-i. 

52 Aduga Jisuna mangonda hai, chatlu, nanggi thajabana nangbu phahanbire. Khudak aduda mahakna uba phangjare, amasung lambida ibungogi tung injarammi.

Mark 11 

Jisuna Jerusalemda lola tongduna lengkhatpa amasung iswar ningnasang sengdokpa


1 Amahiksung makhoina Jerusalem naksillakpa matamda, haibadi, Jeitun chingda taba Betphage amasung Bethaniyada, ibungona sebok anida asi haiduna thai, 

2 Nakhoigi namamgda leiriba khul aduda chatlu, amasung nakhoina maduda hek changbada, kana amatana tongdriba lola macha ama punduna leiramba phanglugani; madu thoktuna purak-u, 

3 Aduga nakhoina asi karigi toubage haiduna nakhoida kanagumbana hairabadi, prabhu aduna masibu kannaba lei, amasung ibungona amuk asida madu hek thillakkani haina nakhoina haiyu. 

4 Maduda makhoina chatkhiduna, thonggan manak lambida punduna leiramba lola macha ama phangle; amasung makhoina madu thokle. 

5 Aduga maduda leplamliba kharana makhoida hairik-i, nakhoina lola macha adu kari tounaba thoklibano? 

6 Maduda Jisuna haikhibagumna makhoida hairabada, makhoina makhoibu thadokpire. 

7 Aduga makhoina lola macha adu Jisugi maphamda puraktuna, mathakta makhoigi phi thare hairaga; ibungona mathakta lengkhatle. 

8 Amasung ayambana makhoigi phi aduga ateisingna loubuktagi usa-wasa yanduna lambida thare. 

9 Amasung ibungogi mang thabasingga tuna injabasinggana laona hairak-i, Hosanna! Prabhugi mingda lengbirakliba ibungo adu yaiphabani! 

10 Eikhoigi ipa Dayud ningthougi lakliba leibak adu yaiphabani! Hosanna khwaidagi henna wangbada! 

11 Amahiksung ibungona Jerusalemda iswar ningnasang manungda lengsinduna, pumnamak ikoi koina yengle hairaga, houjik matam thenglabada taranithoiga loinana Bethaniyada lengthoklakle. 

12 Amasung hayenggumba aduda makhoina Bethaniyadigi chatthokpada, ibungo chak lamlammi. 

13 Aduga mana yaoba heiyit pambi ama athappadagi uduna, ibungona maduda karigumba mahei phangba yai haiduna lenglakle. Amasung ibungona madu tanna lenglaklabada, mana nattana karisu phangde; maramdi heiyit panba matam oiramde. 

14 Maduda ibungona heiyit pambi aduda hairak-i, kananasu nangondagi matam asidagi houna matam pumnamakta mahei chadasanu. Amasung ibungogi seboksingni madu tare. 

15 Amahiksung makhoina Jerusalemda laklaga, ibungona iswar ningnasangda lengsinduna sang manung aduda leiriyolliba makhoibu tanthokpa houre, amasung sen kaibasinggi mejsu khunu yonbasinggi phamphamsu mathak makha onthokle; 

16 Aduga iswar ningnasang manungda kanagumbana phu-wal puba ibungona yabide, 

17 Amasung ibungona tambiduna hairak-i, eigi sangbu jat pumnamakkidamak haijanaba sang kougani; haiduna masi ikhiba nattra? Tou-i-umbasung nakhoina madu dakusinggi makol oihalli. 

18 Madu athoiba purohitsingga ojhasinggana tare, amasung makhoina ibungobu karamna manghansige haina thirammi; maramdi makhoina ibungobu kirammi, maramdi miyam pumnamakna ibungogi tambibada ngaklammi. 

19 Amahiksung numidang khudingda ibungona sahardagi lengthoklammi.


Thajabagi panggal


20 Amasung makhoina ayukta asum lakpada, heiyit pambi adu mara phaoba kangsinkhiba ure. 

21 Aduga Pitarna ningsinglaktuna ibungoda hai, Rabbi, yengbiyu, ibungona sirap toukhiba heiyit pambi adu kangsinkhre. 

22 Maduda Jisuna makhoida khumlak-i, iswarda thajou. 

23 Eina nakhoida thanggei-sengna hairibani, kanagumbana chingjao asida, nang phuktuna samadruda thadajou, hairagadi, amasung mahakki pukningda chingnaba leitragadi, tou-i-gumbasung mahakna haiba adu thok-i haiba thajaragadi, madu mangonda oirak-kani. 

24 Maram asina eina nakhoida hairibani, nakhoina haijaduna nijaba pot pumnamak adu nakhoina phangle haina thajou, amasung nakhoida madu oirak-kani. 

25 Aduga nakhoina haijanaba lepkhatpa matamda, nakhoigi swargada leiba napanasu nakhoigi ayol aral kokpinanaba, kanagumbagi mathakta nakhoigi karigumba nungaitaba leirabadi, nakhoina kokpiyu. 

(26 Tou-i-gumbasung nakhoina kokpidrabadi, nakhoigi swargada leiba napanasu nakhoigi ayol aral kokpiroi).


Jisugi matikki maramda wahang


27 Amahiksung makhoina Jerusalemda amuk lak-i; aduga ibungona iswar ningnasang manungda koichat chatlingeida athoiba purohitsing, sastragi ojhasing amasung ahal lamansingna ibungogi maphamda laktuna, 

28 Ibungoda hairei, nangna natik kari leiduna hiramsing asi touribano? Amasung kanana natik asi nangonda pibibage? 

29 Maduda Jisuna makhoida hai, eina nakhoida wahang ama hangge, madu eingonda khumbiyu, aduga eina hiramsing asi kari itik leiduna toubage haiba adu eina nakhoida takke. 

30 Johanna baptais touramba adu swargadagira, nattraga misingdagira? Eingonda khumbiyu. 

31 Amasung makhoi masen khannarammi eikhoina swargadagini hairagadi, mana haigani, adu oirabadi nakhoina mabu karigi thajadabage? 

32 Adubu eikhoina misingdagini haisira? Makhoina misingbu kirammi, maramdi pumnamakna Johanbu aoibamak iswargi wa takthokpa amani haina yanarammi. Amasung makhoina Jisuda khumlak-i, eikhoi khangde. 

33 Maduda Jisuna makhoida hai, kari itik leiduna eina hiramsing asi toubage haiba adu einasu nakhoida hairoi.

Mark 12 

Draksha ingkhon-gi pandam


1 Amahiksung ibungona makhoida pandam oina ngangba houre; nipa amana draksha ingkhol ama koiraga, madugi akoibida sambal khaduna, draksha chumnaba ,kom ama halle, amasung sagai ama saraga, akoiba misingda sandoklamduna atoppa leibakta chatkhre. 

2 Amasung matam adu oirabada, draksha ingkhongi mahei akoiba mising-dagi lourunanaba, mahakna minai ama akoiba mising aduda thakhi. 

3 Aduga makhoina mabu phaduna, yeiraga khut hangna thadokkhre. 

4 Amukka mahakna atoppa minai ama makhoida thakhrabada, makhoina mabu makok thugaiduna lakchana toubire. 

5 Amasung mahakna atoppa amabu thakhrabada mabu makhoina hatle; aduga atei ayamba, kharabu yeire, kharabu hatle. 

6 Mahakki amuk ama leijari, haibadi mahakki achanba macha nipani; makhoina eigi icha nipabu ikai khumnagani, haiduna mahakna ikon konbada mabu makhoida thakhi. 

7 Adubu akoibasingna makhoi masen hainei, magi yumlepcharani; lak-o eikhoina mabu hatsi, aduga magi phangpham thokpa adu eikhoigi oigani. 

8 Adudagi makhoina mabu phaduna hatlaga draksha ingkhondagi langthokkhre. 

9 Draksha ingkhon-gi mapu aduna kari tougadage? Mahakna laklaga, akoibasing adubu manghanduna, draksha ingkhol adu atoppasingda pibigani. 

10 Nakhoina sastra asi phaoba pakhidabra; yum sabasingna channadaba nung adu, madumakna chithekki mapi oihallammi. 

11 Masi prabhudagini, amasung masi eikhoigi mittadi angakpani. 

12 Aduga makhoina ibungobu nampha phage haina thirammi, adubu miyambu kire; maramdi ibungona makhoigi mathakta pandam adu ngangbani haibs makhoina khangle; amasung makhoina ibungobu thadoklamduna chatkhre.


Keisarda loipot habagi wahang


13 Amahiksung makhoina wangangda ibungobu phananaba pharisising-gi amasung Herodki khutpugi mi kharabu ibungogi maphamda thai. 

14 Amasung makhoina laklaga ibungoda hai, guru, ibungo nahak achumbani, amasung kanabusu haiba ekhoina khang-i, maramdi ibungo nahakti migi misak mimai yengbiba natte, tou-i-gumbasung iswargi lambibu chumna takpi. Keiiarda loipot haba wayel kaibra kaidabra? 

15 Eikhoina pigadra, piroidra? Tou-i-gumbasung ibungona nakhoigi aphasajaningba adu khangladuna makhoida hairak-i, nakhoina eibu karigi chang yenglibage? Eingonda dinar ama puraktuna utlu. 

16 Makhoina madu purakle. Maduda ibungona makhoida hai, Makok amasung maning asi kanagino? Aduga makhoina ibungoda hai, Keisargini. 

17 Maduda Jisuna hairak-i, Keisargi oiba adu Keisarda, aduga iswargi oiba adu iswarda katlu. Amasung makhoina ibungobu ingak ngaklammi.


Hinggatpagi marida wahang


18 Amahiksung hinggatpa haibasi leite hairiba saddukisingna ibungoda laktuna hanglammi, 

19 Guru, Mousina eikhoigidamak ibirammi, kanagumbagi machin manao amana sibada, magi nupi thanamlaga macha thanamdrabadi, mahakki machin manaona magi nupi adubu louduna, magi machin manao adugidamak dhara thanamgadabani. 

20 Machin manao taret leirammi; aduga ahal aduna nupi louraga, dhara thanamdana sikhre; 

21 Anisuba aduna mahakpu louraga dhara thanamdana sikhre; ahumsuba adunasu adu mangai; 

22 Amasung taret aduna dhara amatasu thanamde. Khwaigi matungda nupi adusu sikhre. 

23 Hinggatlakpa aduga mahak adu makhoigi maraktagi kanagi nupi oigadage? Maramdi taret aduna mahakpu lourammi. 

24 Jisuna makhoida hairak-i, nakhoina sastra amasung iswargi panggal adu khangde, maramna nakhoina lanba nattra? 

25 Maramdi makhoina asiba-singgi maraktagi hinggatpada makhoina luhongde, amasung makhoibu luhongduna pide, adubu swargada dutsinggumna lei. 

26 Tou-i-gumbasung asibasingna hinggatpagi maramda mousigi lairikta manna pungba mongsonggi wari nakhoina padabra, haibadi iswarna mangonda hairak-i, eidi Abraham, Ishak amasung Jakobki iswarni? 

27 Iswardi asibasinggi iswar natte, tou-i-gumbasung ahing-basinggini; nakhoi yamma lalle.


Khwaidagi henna chaoba wayel yathang amasung Dayudki macha nipa Kharistagi marida tambiba


28 Amahiksung sastragi ojhasing amana makhoina wa hangdok hangjin touba adu taraduna, ibungona makhoida ningthijana khumle haiba adu khangladuna, nakta laklaga ibungoda hangjare, yathang pumnamaktagi karamba yathangna ahanbano? 

29 Jisuna khumlak-i, ahanba adudi asini: He Israyelsa, tao, prabhu eikhoigi iswar adudi prabhu amatani; 

30 Amasung nangna prabhu nanggi iswarbu nanggi thammoi apumba, thawai apumba, pukning apumba amasung panggal pumnamak yaona nungsigadabani. 

31 Anisuba aduna asini, nangna nanggi keiroi leikaibu nasamakkumna nungsigadabani. Ani asidagi henna chaoba yathang atei leite. 

32 Sastragi ojha aduna ibungoda hanggatcharak-i, phare, guru, ibungona chumna haire, ibungo mahakti amatani, aduga ibungo nattana atei leite; 

33 Amasung thammoi apumba, akhangba pumnamak amasung panggal pumnamak yaona ibungo mahakpu nungsiba, aduga keiroi leikaibu masamakkumna nungsiba asina mapum oina meida thaduna katpa amasung iratpot pumnamaktagi yamna thoi helli. 

34 Aduga mahakna singna khumba adu Jisuna uraduna, mangonda hai, nahak iswargi leibaktagi lapnadre. Adugi matungdadi kana amatanasu ibungoda ichang thouna hangkhidre. 

35 Amahiksung Jisuna iswar ningnasang manungda tambiringeida khumlak-i, Khrista adu Dayudki macha nipani haiba sastragi ojhasingna karamna haibano? 

36 Dayudmakna thawai asengbagi mapanna haire, prabhuna eigi prabhuda hai, eina nanggi yeknabasingbu nanggi nakhong mahkada thambidriba phaoba, eigi yetta phammu. 

37 Dayudmakna mahakpu prabhu kou-i; aduna mahkna mahakki macha nipa karamna oiribano? Aduga michamsingna ibungogi wa haraona tarammi.


Sastragi ojhasinggi maramda mit-na singhanba lukhrabigi katchaba


38 Amahiksung ibungogi tambibagi marakta asumna hai, achumba phi settuna koiba, miyam tinnabada khuramhanba, 

39 Loisang loisangda amasung chakkhangbada makok phamba pamba, 

40 Lukhrabisinggi yumkei munthokpa amasung tousinnaduna kuina haijaba sastragi ojhasinggi maramda cheksillu. Makhoi asina henna, chaoba maral phanggani. 

41 Amahiksung ibungona langeiga maioknana phamduna, miyamna langeida karamna sen hunjinbage yenglami, Aduga inak khunba ayambana yanma hunjilli. 

42 Amasung lairabi lukhrabi ama laktuna semkhai ani, madudi peisa amarom, hunjille. 

43 Maduda ibungona seboksingbu nakta kousinduna makhoida hairak-i, eina nakhoida thanggei sengna hairibani, lan-geida hunjinbasing pumnamaktagi lairabi lukhrabi asina henna hunjille. 

44 Maramdi makhoi pumnamakna makhoigi lemthok-pathok-padagi hungille; tou-i-gumbasung nupi asina magi leitabadagi magi leijaramba pumnamak, haibadi magi hingnaba pum-namak, hunjille.

Mark 13 

Iswar ningnasanggi manglagadaba amasung jugki aroiba Jisuna mangjounana Takpiba


1 Amahiksung ibungona iswar ningnasangdagi lengthoklakpada, ibungogi seboksing amana ibungoda hai, guru, yengbiyu, nungsing amasung sariba makhei asi kaya ningthijabano! 

2 Maduda Jisuna mangonda hairak-i, achouba sariba makhei asi nang ubra? Asida nung amabu amagi mathakta ningkhaihandana thanamlaroi. 

3 Amahiksung ibungona iswar ningnasangga maioknana Jeitun chingthakta phamlingeida, Pitar, Johan amasung Andriyana lonna ibungoda hanggat-charei, 

4 Hiramsing asi keidoungei thokkadage? Aduga hiram pumnamak asi thunglamdaida khudam kari oigadage? Eikhoida takpiyu. 

5 Maduda Jisuna makhoida haiba hourak-i, kananasu nakhoibu serannana lamjingdananaba cheksillu. 

6 Ei mahakni, haiduna ayambana eigi imingda lakkani, aduga ayambabu serannana chinggani. 

7 Amasung nakhoina lal amasung lan-gi paoninkhol tarabada mipaiganu; hiramsing asi thoklaba tai; adubu aroiba adu houjik nattri. 

8 Maramdi jat amana jat amagi mathakta, amasung ningthouleibak amana ningthouleibak amagi mathakta hourakkani; tongan tonganba maphamda yuharaba thokkani, chak tangbasu oigani; hiramsing asi awa ananggi ahoubani. 

9 Tou-i-gumbasung nakhoi nashana sajel toujou; makhoina nakhoibu ahallupasingda pithokkani; amasung loisang loisangda nakhoibu phugani; aduga makhoida sakshi pinanaba leibak ngakpasing amasung ningthousinggi mamangda eigidamak nakhoina lepkani. 

10 Amasung jat pumnamakta aphaba wapao hanna sandokpa tai. 

11 Aduga makhoina nakhoibu chingduna pithokpa matamda, nakhoina kari nganggani haina hanna langtaknaganu; tou-i-gumbasung pung aduda nakhoida pibi pibiba adu ngangu; maramdi ngangliba ngangliba adu nakhoina natte, adubu thawai asengbanani. 

12 Aduga machin manaona machin manaobu amasung mapana machabu sinanaba pithokkani, amasung machasingna mama mapagi mathakta houraktuna, makhoibu hat-han-gani. 

13 Aduga mi pumnamakna eigi minggidamak nakhoibu tukkachagani; tou-i-gumbasung aroiba phaoba khangba mahak adubu kanbigani. 

14 Adubu amang atakki tukkachaba adu leploidaba maphamda leppa nakhoina uba matamda(apaba mahakna khangjasanu), matam aduda Jihudiyada leiba makhoi chingda chenkhisanu; 

15 Yumthakta leiba mahak aduna imungda leiba karigumba pot louthokpa kumsu kumthadasanu, changsu changdasanu; 

16 Aduga loubukta leiba mahak aduna mahakki innaphi louba hallaktasanu. 

17 Tou-i-gumbasung mi-rollibi amasung khomnouribising adudi matam aduda awa nungsibanida! 

18 Amasung madu ningtham thada oidanaba nakhoina haijou. 

19 Maramdi iswarna semba leisemngeidagi houna houjik phaoba thokkhidriba aduga kadoungeidasu thoklaroidaba asup achouba awaba numit adu oigani. 

20 Amasung prabhuna numitsing adu kaksinbiba nattanadi, thawai panba kanabusu kanbiramloidabani; adubu ibungona khan-gatkhraba khan-gatpasing adugidamakta numitsing asi kaksinbikhre. 

21 Aduga matam aduda; yengu, asida, yengu, aduda Khrista Iei, haina kanagumbana nakhoida hairabadi; thajaganu. 

22 Maramdi Khrista sasinnabasing amasung iswargi wa takthoksinnabising thoklakkani, aduga ngamlabadi khangatpasingbu serannana lamjingnaba, khudamsing amasung angak angakpa utkani. 

23 Adubu nakhoina cheksillu; eina nakhoida pumnamak mangjounana haikhre. 

24 Tou-i-gumbasung numitsing aduda, awaba adugi matungda numitna mamsingani, thana migi mangal piroi. 

25 Thawan michaksingna atiyadagi taduna leigani, amasung atiyada leiba panggal khibikpu nik-han-gani, 

26 Aduga matam aduda migi macha nipa aduna achouba panggal amasung matik manganga loinana leichinda lenglakpa makhoina ugani. 

27 Amasung matam aduda ibungona dutsingbu tharaklaga, ibungogi khangatpasingbu maikei marimaktagi, prithibigi aroibadagi atiyagi aroiba phaoba khomjin-gani.


Mitseng khangbagi kannaba


28 Amukka heiyit pambidagi pandam adu tammu; magi masa aduna nouraklaba amasung yening hullaklaba matamda nakhoina olangtha nakle haiba khang-i. 

29 Adugumduna nakhoisu hiramsing asi thoklakliba uba matamda, ibungo thongjin youna naksillakle haiba nakhoina khang-u. 

30 Eina nakhoida thanggei-sengna hairibani, hiram pumnamak asi pangthoktriba phaoba miron asi houkhiroi. 

31 Atiya amasung prithibidi mangkhigani, tou-i-gumbasung eigi wasingdi supmang manglaroi. 

32 Adubu madugi numit nattraga pungpham adu mapa nattana swargada leiba dutsingnasu, macha nipa adunasu, kana amatana khangde. 

33 Cheksillu, mitseng khang-u amasung haijou; maramdi matam adu kadoungeidano nakhoina khangde. 

34 Mi amana mahakki yum thadoklamduna atoppa leibak amada langphei chatkhiba, mahakki minaisingda magi magi thabak tounaba matik pikhiba, amasung thongsangbadasu mitseng khangu haiduna yathang pikhiba mahakkumbani. 

35 Maram aduna mitseng khangu, maramdi yum adugi mabungona numidangda, nattraga nongyaida, nattraga yen khongbada, nattraga ayukta lenglakpa matam adu nakhoina khangde; 

36 Khanghoudana nabungngona lenglakpada nakhoi tumlamba phanglaba yai. 

37 Amasung eina nakhoida hairiba asi eina pumnamakta hairibani, mitseng khang-u.

Mark 14 

Jisubu hatnaba khujin thourang Bethaniya da Jisubu thao heibiba


1 Numit ninigi matungda aran-cha-kkhangba amasung hamei yaodaba tal-chakkhangba oirammi. Aduga athoiba purohitsing amasung sastragi ojhasingna marei mara touduna ibungobu karamna pharaga hatkadage haina thirammi; 

2 Maramdi, misinggi marakta ninnadananaba chakkhangba matamda oiganusi, haina makhoina hainei. 

3 Amahiksung Bethaniyada ibungona leiba matamda, kusthi thungba Simon-gi yumda luk haba pharnlingeida, nupi amana asengba nardki mamal yamna luba teinathao happa angouba nungphu ama puduna lakle. Mahakna nungphu adu thugairaduna ibungogi kokthakta heithabire. 

4 Aduga makhoi masengi marakta nungngaitaba leiba kharana hairak-i, teinathao mangba asi kari maramgidamakno? 

5 Maramdi teinathao asi lupa chama yangkheidagi henna yonthoklaga lairabasingda piba yaramgadabani. Amasung makhoina mahakki mathakta murum murum sonnarammi. 

6 Tou-i-gumbasung Jisuna hairaki, leijasanu; nakhoina mahakpu karigidamak othbano? Mahakna eingonda aphaba thabak toubire. 

7 Maramdi lairabasingdi itat tattana nakhoiga leiminnei, aduna nakhoina touning ba matam khudingmakta makhoida aphaba touba yai; tou-i-gum-basung eidi itat tattana nakhoiga leiminn-aba natte. 

8 Mahakna ngamjaba adu toujare; phumnabagidamak eigi hakchang mangjounana mahakna thao teibire. 

9 Amasung eina nakhoida thanggei sengna hairibani, taibangpal apumba sinthungna aphaba wapao sandokkadaba mapham khudingmakta nupi asina toukhiba adusu mabu ningsingnanabagi damak ngangthokkani. 

10 Amahiksung taranithoigi mitaktagi ama, Iskariyot Jihuda aduna athoiba purohitsinggi maphamda ibungobu pithoknaba chatthokkhre. 

11 Aduga makhoina madu taraga, haraoaduna mangonda sen pinaba wa leple. Amasung mahakna ibungobu karamna khudong chana pithokpa yananaba thiramli.


Ikon konba chakkhang


12 Amahiksung hamei yaodaba tal-chakkhangbagi ahanba numitta, aranchakkhangbagi yao macha hatpa matamda, ibungogi seboksingna hanggat-charak-i, ibungona aran-chakkhangba adu hananaba eikhoina chattuna kadaida thourang semjaba ibungona pambibage? 

13 Madudi ibungona seboksinggi anibu thaduna makhoida hai, saharda chang-u, amasung mi amana isingpul puduna nakhoibu oknagani; mahakki tung illu, 

14 Aduga mahakna changkhiba yum adugi mapuda haiyu, guruna hai, eina eigi seboksingga loinana aran-chakkhangba chananaba eig ka adu kadai-dano? 

15 Amasung mahakna mapot machei suna langlaba mathak thangba ka achouba ama nakhoibu uhan-gani; mapham aduda eikhoigidamak thourang tou. 

16 Maduda seboksingna chatthok-khiduna saharda changlaga, ibungona makhoida haikhiba adugumna; amasung makhoina aran-chakkhangba thourang toure. 

17 Amahiksung numidang oirakpada ibungona taranithoi aduga, loinana leng-lak-i. 

18 Aduga makhoina phamduna. charingeida Jisuna hairak-i, eina nakhoida thangei sengna hairibani, nakhoigi naraktagi amana, eiga chaminnariba aduna, eibu pithokkani. 

19 Makhoina waraduna ibungoda amamam oina haiba hourak-i, einara? 

20 Maduda ibungona makhoida hairak-i, pukham amatada eiga loinana khut lupminnariba taranithoigi amani. 

21 Maramdi migi macha nipa aduna magi maramda ikhiba adugumna chatlibani, tou-i-gumbasung migi macha nipa adubu pithokpa mi aduda awabanida! Mi aduna poklamdragadi magidamak pharamgadabani. 

22 Amahiksung makhoina charingeida ibungona tal louduna bor piraga madu thugaire, amasung makhoida piduna hai, nakhoina masi eigi hakchangni. 

23 Aduga ibungona tenggot louduna thagatcharaga makhoida pire, amasung makhoi pumnamakna madudagi thakle. 

24 Aduga ibungona makhoida hairak-i, masi walepnaba adugi, ayambagidamak tabikhraba eigi ini. 

25 Eina nakhoida thanggeisengna hairibani, iswargi leibakta eina anouba thakkadaba numit adu oidriba phaoba eina draksha maheidagi amuk thaklaroi. 

26 Aduga makhoina isei shaklaga Jeitun chingda chatthokkhre.


Seboksingna Jisubu thadokkadaba adu ibungona mangjounana khanghanba


27 Amahiksung Jisuna makhoida hai, nakhoi pumnamak khudi thiba thokkani, maramdi masi ikhrabani, eina yaosen-babu yeithugani, amasung yao sanggu adu ichai chaithoklagani. 

28 Tou-i-gum-basung eibu hinggatpiraga eina nakhoi-dagi hanna Galilda chatkani. 

29 Adubu Pitarna ibungoda hairak-i, pumnamakna khudi thiba thoklagasu eidi thiba thokcharoi. 

30 Maduda Jisuna mangonda hai, eina nangonda thanggeisengna hairibani, ngasi ahing asida yellabana anirak khongdringeida nahakna eihakpu ahunlak yaramloi. 

31 Tou-i-gumbasung mahakna henna henna kanna hairammi, eina ibungoga loinana shiba phaoba tarabasu eidi ibungobu yadaba suptou toujaroi. Aduga adugumna makhoi pumnamaknasu hairammi.


Getsimanida Jisugi awaba amasung Jisubu phaba


32 Amahiksung makhoina Getsimani kouba maphamda lak-i; amasung ibun-gona seboksingda hai, eina haijaringeida nakhoi asida phamlam-u. 

33 Aduga ibungona mahakka loinana Pitar, Jakob amasung Johan pure, amasung yamna ngakpa amasung pukning olang onsaoba houre. 

34 Aduga ibungona makhoida hai, eigi thawai sigadouba makhei ware, nakhoi asida leiduna mitseng khang-u. 

35 Amaaung ibungona manglomkhara lengthoklaga, leipakta tuthajaduna, masi oiba yarabadi, pungpham asi ibungodagi lanthoknaba haijarak-i. 

36 Aduga, abba, ipa, pumnamak ibungogi maphamda ingam ngambani; tenggot asi eingondagi louthokpiyu; tou-i-gumbasung eigi ningba oidaduna ibungogi ningba oibiribani, haina ibungona haijei. 

37 Amasung ibungona lenglakpada makhoi tumlamba phangi, aduga Pitarda hai, Simon, nang tumlibra? Nang-na pung ama mitseng khangba ngamdra? 

38 Nakhoina athembada chang-dananaba mitseng khangduna haijou; thawainadi maning-i, tou-i-gumbasung hak-changnadi solli. 

39 Aduga amuk hanna ibungona lengthokkhiduna, chap mannaba wahie haiduna haijei. 

40 Amukka ibungona lenglakpada makhoi tumlamba phanglare, maramdi makhoigi mamit yamna lumtharammi; amasung makhoina ibungoda kari khumjagadage khang-lamde. 

41 Aduga ibungona ahumlaksuba oina lenglaktuna makhoida hai, houjik-tagidi tumduna potthajaro; okle; pung-pham adu lakle; yeng-u, migi machanipa adubu papchenbasinggi makhutta pithok-i. 

42 Hougatlu, eikhoi chatlasi, yeng-u, eibu pithokpa mi adu nakle. 

43 Amahiksung khudak adumaktada ibungona wa nganglingeida Jihuda, taranithoigi ama adu lak-i, amasung athoiba purohitsingdagi, shastragi ojhasing amasung ahallamansingdagi kabakthangga cheiga paiba miyam maga loinari. 

44 Ibungobu pithokpa mi aduna makhoida khudam ama piduna hairammi, eina chupkadaba mahak aduni; mabu pharaga chetna touduna chingthokkho. 

45 Amasung mahakna lakla-bada ibungogi nakta hek changlaktuna hai Rabbi; aduga ibungobu yamna chuple. 

46 Maduda makhoina ibungobu khutphangnana phare. 

47 Aduga nakta leplamba makhoi adugi kanagumba amana magi kabakthang sattuna, purohitlen-gi minai adubu yallakpada mana soidatle. 

48 Amasung Jisuna makhoida khumlak-i, dakubu phagadabagumna kabak thangga cheiga loinana eibu phananaba nakhoina thoklaklabra? 

49 Numit khuding eina iswar ningnasangda tambiduna nakhoiga loinana leiramlabasu nakhoina eibu phade. Tou-i-gumbasung masi sastragi wa thungnanabani. 

50 Amasung makhoi pumnamakna ibungobu thadoktuna chenkhre. 

51 Amahiksung kanagumba pakhang amana phi yaodaba masada limon phi ama induna ibungogi tung ille; aduda makhoina mahakpu phare, 

52 Adubu mahakna limon phi adu thanamduna masha ngakta chenkhre.


Purohitlen-gi mangda Jisubu wayenba


53 Amasung makhoina Jisubu purohitlen-gi maphamda pukhatkhre; aduga athoiba purohitsing, ahallamansing amasung sastragi ojhasing pumnamakna mahakka loinana tinnare, 

54 Amasung Pitarna purohitlen-gi sumang manung phaoba ibungogi tong thap-in inkhi aduga phamnaiba singga meinganda phamminaduna mei tiklammi. 

55 Aduga athoiba purohitsingga ahallup apumbagana Jisubu hatnanaba mathakta sakshi thirabasu phanglamde. 

56 Maramdi ayambana ibungogi mathakta aranba sakshi pirammi, amasung sakshi adu iman mannaramde. 

57 Amasung mi kharana hougattuna ibungogi mathakta minamba sakshi pirak-i, 

58 Madudi, eina iswar ning-nasang, khutnasaba asi manghallaga numit humnigi manungda khutna sadaba atoppa ama sabigani, haiduna mahakna haiba ekhoina tai. 

59 Aduga asum hairabasu makhoigi sakshi iman mannade. 

60 Amasung purohitlenna mayaida lep-khattuna Jisuda hanglak-i, nahak kari amata khuniloidra? Nanggi nathakta mising asina sakshi piriba asi karino? 

61 Tou-i-gumbasung ibungona tuminna leiduna karisu khumdre. Amukka purohittlenna ibungoda hangduna hai, thagatkadaba mapu adugi macha nipa Khrista adu nahakla? 

62 Maduda Jisuna hairak-i, eimakni; aduga migi macha nipa aduna matik chaobagi yetthangbada phamba amasung swargagi leichin-ga lenglakpa nakhoina ugani. 

63 Maduda purohitlenna maphi segairaduna hai, asidagi henna eikhoina sakshi louba kari kannabano? 

64 Iswarbu thina ngangba adu nakhoina tare; nakhoina kari khanbage? Amasung makhoi pumnamakna siba matik chai haiduna ibungobu aranba tahalle. 

65 Aduga kharana ibungoda tin sitchinba, mai khumbiba, khudumna suba, amasung kanana nangbu phubage haiyu haiba houre. Amasung phamnaibasingna ibungobu khubakna thaduna lousille.


Pitarna Jisubu yadaba


66 Amahiksung Pitarna makhada sumangda leiringeida; Purohitlen-gi minai leisabi ama lak-i; 

67 Amasung Pitarna mei tikpa ubada mahakpu yenglaga mangonda hai, nangsu Nasaretki mi, Jisu aduga loinarambani. 

68 Tou-i-gum-basung mahakna yadaduna hai, nangna hairiba adu eidi khangsu khangde, bhapsu tade. Amasung mahakna mangonda chatthokkhre; aduga yellabana khong-e. 

69 Aduda leisabi aduna mahakpu uduna manakta leppasingda amuk haiba houre, mi asi makhoigi maraktagini. 

70 Adubu mahakna amuk yadre Aduga ngaihak leiraga manakta leppasingna Pitarda amuk hairak-i, aoibamak makhoigi maraktagini; maramdi nangdi Galilgi mini. 

71 Tou-i-gumbasung, nakhoina ngangnariba mi asibu ei khangde, haiduna mahakna masabu sirap toujaba amasung sari sonba hourakle. 

72 Aduga khudak adumaktada yellabana anirak suba oina khongle. Amasung yellabana anirak khongdringeida nangna eibu ahumlak yaramloi, haina Jisuna karamna mangonda haikhiba haiba wa adu Pitarna ningsinglakle. Amasung mahakna madu khanbada kappa houre.

Mark 15 

Romgi leibak ngakpa mapu Pilatki mangda Jisubu pukhatpa


1 Amahiksung ayuk hek oibada athoiba purohitsingna ahallamansing, sastragi ojhasing amasung ahallup pumnamakka loinana wa tanaraga, Jisubu pulle; aduga puthokkhiduna Pilatta pikhatkhi 

2 Maduda Pilatna ibungoda hang-i, nangdi Jihudisinggi ningthoura? Aduga ibungona mangonda khumlak-i, nahakna haibaduni. 

3 Amasung athoiba Purohitsingna ibtmgogi mathakta ayamba theijillammi. 

4 Aduga Pilatna ibungoda amuk hanglak-i, nang karisu khumloidra? Yengu, makhoina nathakta hiram kaya yamna theijilliba! 

5 Tou-i-gumbasung Jisuna karisu amuk khumdre, aduna Pilatna ngakle. 

6 Chakkhangbada makhoina nijaba phadok amabu mahakna makhoigidamak thadokpiba mahakki hounasani. 

7 Amasung Barabba kouba ama leibak wa thokhanbasingga loinana punduna leirammi; wa thokhanba aduda mising aduna mi hatlammi. 

8 Aduga miyamna, mahakna makhoigidamak mahakki hounasagumna tounanaba nijaba houre. 

9 Amasung Pilatna makhoida khumlak-i, eina Jihudisinggi ningthou adubu nakhoigi damak thadokpiba nakhoina pambra? 

10 Maramdi kallakpagi maramna athoiba Purohitsingna ibungobu pithoklabani haiba mahakna khanglammi. 

11 Tou-i-amasung adu natta-duna Barabbabu mahakna makhoigidamak thadokpinanaba, athoiba purohitsingna miyambu thougatlammi. 

12 Amasung Pilatna makhoida amuk khumlak-i, adunadi nakhoina ningthou kouba mahak aduda eina kari tougadage? 

13 Aduga makhoina amuk laorak-i, mabu krosta hatlu. 

14 Tou-i-gumbasung Pilatna makhoida hairak-i, karigino, mahakna kari phattaba toukhrabage? Adubu makhoina hennadum laorammi, mabu krosta hatlu. 

15 Amasung Pilatna miyambu pellhanningduna Barabbabu makhoi-gidamak thadokpire, aduga mahakna Jisubu thina yeiraga Krosta hatnaba pithokle.


Lamnisingna jisubu noknaba


16 Amahiksung lanmisingna ibungobu Pritoriyon adugi sumanggi manungda pusillaga, lanmi kanglup apumbabu kousille. 

17 Amasung makhoina ibungobu memanba phi inbiduna, tingkhang-gi luhup ama lollaga ibungoda uppire. 

18 Aduga makhoina ibungobu, he Jihudisinggi ningthou khurumjari, haiduna khurumba houre. 

19 Amasung makhoina singnangna ibungogi kokta phuduna ibungoda tin sitchille, aduga khuru khudak kunduna ibungobu khurumle. 

20 Amasung makhoina ibungobu noknaraga memanba phi adu ibungodagi louthokpiduna ibungogi phi setpire. Aduga makhoina ibungobu Krosta hatnanaba puthokkhre.


Jisubu krosta pangtingba, Ibungona siba amasung ibungobu phumba


21 Amahiksung manaktuda lakpa, lawaidagi karakpa, Alekjendar amasung Rupkhi mapa Simon kouba kurinigi mi amabu namduna ibungogi kros puhalle. 

22 Amahiksung makhoina ibungobu Golgotha kouba mapham, haibadi, lukanggi maphamda puraki. 

23 Aduga makhoina morga totnaba draksha mahi ibungoda pi, adubu ibun-gona madu loude. 

24 Amasung makhoina ibungobu krosta yotpi thaduna pang tingkhrabada, ibungogi phi adu makhoina kana kanagi oigadage haiduna laibak yengnaraga yennei. 

25 Aduga makhoina ibungobu krosta yotpi thaduna pang tinglamba matam adu ahumsuba pung oirammi. 

26 Amasung ibungoda theijinba wagi mingthol, Jihudisinggi ningthou, haiba adu kokthaklomda iduna leirammi. 

27 Aduga makhoina ibungoga loinana daku anibu, amana ibungogi yetta, amana oida krosta yotpi thaduna pangting-i. 

(28 Aduga sastrana haiba, amasung ibungo mahakti ayol aranba misinggi manakta challe haiba adu thungle). 

29 Amasung manakta chatthok chatsin touriba makhoi aduna makok hairaduna khon thina ikaiba piduna hai, E! Iswar ningnasang manghanba amasung numit humnida saba nang, 

30 Krosta-gi kumtharaktuna nathantabu kanjou. 

31 Adugumduna athoiba puro-hitsingnasu sastragi ojhasingga loinana makhoi masengi marakta noknaduna hai, ateisingbudi mana kanbi; mathantabudi kanjaba ngamde. 

32 Eikhoina uduna thajananaba, Israelgi ningthou Khrista aduna houjik Krostagi kumthasanu. Amasung ibungoga loinana Krosta yotpi thaduna pang tingminnaribasingna ibungobu achoppa wa hairammi. 

33 Amahiksung taruksuba pung tarakpadagi mapalsuba pung taba phaoba leibak apumbada mamle. 

34 Amasung mapalsuba pung tabada Jisuna awangba khonjenna loirak-i, eloi, eloi, lama sabaktani? Adudi eigi iswar, eigi iswar, ibungona eibu karigi hundokpibage? 

35 Aduga manakta leplamba kharana madu tarabada hairak-i, yeng-u, Eliyabu kou-i; 

36 Maduda kanagumba amana chenkhiduna, spanj ama asinba mahida luptuna singnang amada madu lengsillaga ibungobu thaknaba piduna hai, leijasanu; Eliyank mabu louthabinanaba lakkadra eikhoina yengsi. 

37 Amasung Jisuna awangba khonjenna laoramlaga mathwai thakhre. 

38 Maduda iswar ningnasanggi asengba maphamgi maikhan phi adu mathaktagi makha phaoba anithokna segaire. 

39 Aduga ibungoga maioknana nakta leppa lanmi chamagi mapu aduna ibungona asumna thawai thakhiba adu ubada hairak-i, aoibamak mi asi iswargi macha nipani. 

40 Amasung nupisingnasu athappadagi yengduna leirammi, makhoigi manakta Magadalini Mariyam, naha oiba Jakobka Jousigagi mama Mariyam, amasung Salomi yaorammi. 

41 Ibungona Galilda leiringeida makhoina ibungogi tung induna thougan toujarammi. Aduga ibungoga loinana Jerusalemda kaminnarakpa ayamba atei nupisingsu yaorammi. 

42 Amahiksung numidangwai oiraklabasu, potthaba numit oidringeigi thourang langba numit oirabanina, 

43 Ahallupki ikai-khumnaba mi, masanasu iswargi leibak ngaijariba Arimathiyagi Jouseph adu bide; mahakna thouna phana Pilatki maphamda changkhiduna Jisugi hakchang nijare. 

44 Aduga houjik ibungo sikhre haibada Pilatna ngakle, amasung lanmi chamagi mapu kouraduna, ibungo siba kuirabra haiduni mangonda hangle. 

45 Amasung mahakna lanmi chamagi mapudagi madu khanglabada, Jousephta asiba hakchang adu pibire. 

46 Aduga mahakna ananba limon phi ama leiraga ibungobu puthaduna, limon phi aduna yomlaga, nungjaoda huttoklaba mongphamda ibungobu thamle; amasung mahakna mongpham adugi thongda nung ama onsille. 

47 Aduga Magadalini Mariyam amasung Jousigi mama Mariyamna kadaida thambage haiba ukhirammi.

Mark 16 

Jisuna hinggatpa


1 Amahiksung potthaba numit adu langthokkhrabada, Magadalini Mariyam, Jakobki mama Mariyam amasung Salomi, makhoina laktuna ibungobu teibinanaba manam nungsiba pot leire. 

2 Adtiga chayon-gi ahanba numitta yamna nganna makhoina mongpham tanna numit thokpa matungda lak-i, 

3 Amasung makhoi masen hainarammi, kanana eikhoigi-damak mongphamgi thongdagi nung adu onthokpigadage? 

4 Maduda makhoina yengkhatpada nung adu onthokkhiramba ui; maramdi madu yamna chaorammi, 

5 Amasung makhoina mongpham manungda changbada, angouba phi inba pakhang ama yetthangbada phamba uraduna yamna ngaklammi. 

6 Adubu mahakna makhoida hai, ngakpa touganu; Krosta hatkhiba Nasaretki Jisubu nakhoina thiri. Ibungobu hinggatpikhre, asida leitre; yengu, Ibungobu thamlamba mapham asi! 

7 Tou-i-gumbasung chatlu, ibungogi seboksingga Pitargada takpiru, ibungona nakhoidagi hanna , Galilda lengbi; ibungona nakhoida haikhiba-gumna nakhoina ibungobu aduda ugani. 

8 Amasung makhoini thoklak-tuna mongphamdagi chenkhre; maramdi makhoida anikpa amasung angakpa oirammi; aduga makhoina kibagi maramna kana amadasu karisu hairamde. 

9 Amahiksung chayon-gi ahouba numitta nganna ibungona hingatlabada, bhut taretpu ibungona tanthokpikhiba, Magadalini Mariyamda hanna uhanle. 

10 Mahakna chatkhiduna ibungoga loinaramba, tengthaduna kapliba makhoisingda tamlei. 

11 Aduga ibungodi hingli amasung nahakna ibungobu ujare haiba makhoina tarabasu thajade. 

12 Punmamak asigi matungda sak atoppa oina ibungona makhoigi maraktagi khul tanna chatlamba anibu lambida uhanbire. 

13 Maduda makhoina hankhiduna leihouribasingda madu tamle, adubu makhoina makhoibu thajade. 

14 Matung aduda taramathoi aduna chaba phamlingeida ibungona uhanbire; aduga makhoigi thajadaba amasung thamoi kanbagi maramda makhoibu warakle, maramdi hingatkhiba ibungobu ujarabasingbu makhoina thajaramde. 

15 Amasung ibungona makhoida hairak-i, nakhoina taibangpal pumnamakta chattuna taibang mi makheida aphaba wapao sandok-u. 

16 Thajaduna baptais louraba mahak adubu kanbigani; tou-i-gumbasung thajadaba mahak adubu lalhangani 

17 Amasung khudamsing asina thajabasingga loinagani haibadi, eigi imingda makhoina bhutsingbu tanthokkani; anou anouba lol nganggani; 

18 Lil paikhatkani, amasung karigumba sinaba hu makhoina thaklabadi, maduna makhoibu khak sokloi; makhoina anabasinggi mathakta khut thambiraga makhoigi anaba phagani. 

19 Matou asumna makhoida hairabagi matungda prabhu Jisubu swargada loukhatkhre, amasung ibungona iswargi yetta phamkhre. 

20 Aduga makhoina chatthokkhiduna mapham khudingda pao sandokle; Prabhuna makhoiga loinana thabak touminnare, amasung loinariba khudamsing aduna wa adu chethanbire.

LUKNA LENGBA APHABA WAPAO 

A-iba: Luk 

lbagi matam: A.D. 60 aduwai. 

Wamachang: Khrista asi taibang mioibagi maongda lakpani. 

Luk asi Missionary Polbu mateng pangba mioi amani. Mahak daktar amasu oirammi. Aduna mahak asibu daktar Luk hainasu khangnei. Mahakna Gospel ibasi Griksinggi bhap tanaba maongda ibani. Matam adugi mioisingna Khristabu Satan amagumna lounarammi. Adubu Lukna Khristagi pari-puri Adamdagi lakpa adu mayek sengna tak-i. Jisu Khristagi angang oiringeigi punsi, pokpagi maram, Iswarda tattana haijabagi maram thoidok hendokna atei atoppa Gospel ibadagi mahakna sandokna i. 

Khristana taibangpan-gi sak-ongda poklabasu pumnamakpu kanbiba ngammi haibasi mahakna thanggei sengna khanghalli. 

Luk 1 

Wahoudok


1 Ahoubadagi mamitmakna ubasing amasung wa adugi thougan tourambasing, makhoi aduna eikhoida pithoklamba adugi matung inna, 

2 Eikhoigi irakta ithung thungkhraba thabak adugi marida ayambana wari lengbada khut thingjinnabagi maramna, 

3 He matik chaoraba Thiophil, nahakna tamkhraba wagi aoiba adu khaugba yananaba, 

4 Eisu ahanbadagi hiram pumnamak khonggul liraga changkhonna mathangsitna nangonda ijaba phagani haina ningle.


Baptais toubiba Johan pokkani haina mangjounana haidokpa


5 Jihudiyagi ningthou Herodki haktakta Abiyagi kanglupki leng oiba, maming Sakhariya kouba kanagumba purohit ama leirammi, aduga mahakki nupidi Haron-gi sageidagini, amasung mahakki maming Elisabet kou-i. 

6 Amasung makhoi anina Prabhugi yathang amasung wayel pumnmakta ayol aral leitana chattuna, iswargi mangda dharmachenba oirammi. 

7 Aduga makhoigi macha leiramde, maramdi Elisabet chaboktabini, amasung makhoi ani adu chahi yamna lirammi. 

8 Asum thoklare, mahakna mahakki kanglupki leng matung inna iswargi mangda purohitki thabak adu touringeida, 

9 Purohitki phamgi hounabi matung inna prabhugi asengba maphamgi manungdi changduna dhup thaba mahakki laibakta tare. 

10 Amasung dhup thabagi pung aduda mising adugi miyam pumnamakna mapanda haijaduna leirammi. 

11 Maduda prabhugi dut amana dhup thanapung adugi yetta leptuna mahakpu uhanbire. 

12 Aduga Sakhariyana urabada langtaknare, amasung mangonda akiba thokle. 

13 Maduda dut aduna mangonda hairak-i, kiganu, Sakhariya, maramdi nahakki nijaba adu tabire, aduga nahakki nupi Elisabetna nacha nipa ama pokkani, amasung nahakna magi maming Johan thon-gani. 

14 Aduga nungngaiba amasung yamna haraoba nahakki oigani, amasung mahak pokpada ayambana harao-gani; 

15 Maramdi mahakti prabhugi mityengda chaogani, draksha mahisu yusu thakloi, amasung mamagi puknungdagi houna thawai asengbana thangani. 

16 Aduga Israyelgi machasing ayambabu mahakna prabhu makhoigi iswarda halhan-gani. 

17 Aduga mapasinggi thammoibu machasingda, amasung haiba indabasingbu achumbasinggi lousingda halhannanaba, prabhugi damak sem-saraba misingbu thourang langhannanaba, mahak masana ibungogi mangda Eliyagi thawai amasung pangganna chatkani. 

18 Maduda Sakhariyana dut aduda hairak-i, asi eina karamna khanggadage? Maramdi ei hanure, amasung eigi nupisu chahi lire. 

19 Amasung dut aduna mangonda khumlak-i, iswargi mangda leppa Gabriyel eini; aduga nangga ngangnanaba amasung aphaba pao asi nangonda puraknanaba eibu tharakpani. 

20 Amasung yengu, hiramsing asi thoktriba numit phaoba nangdi tuminna leigani amasung wa ngangthokpa ngamloi, maramdi makhoigi matamda thunggadaba eigi wasing adu nangna thajaramde. 

21 Asum touringei asida misingna Sakhariyabu ngairammi, amasung mahakna asengba maphamda kuithakhibaduda ngaktuna leirammi. 

22 Amasung mahakna thoklakpada makhoida ngangba ngamdre, aduga mahakna asengba maphamda karigumba ama urak-i haina makhoina khangle; amasung mahakna makhoida inggit touram-i amasung lol thoklamde. 

23 Asum thoklare, mahakna thougan touba numit adu sukhrabada, mahak mayumda hankhre. 

24 Numitsing asigi matungda mahakki nupi Elisabet mirolle, Amasung asi haiduna mahak masana tha manga lotchare, 

25 madudi, misinggi marakta eigi ikaiba koknanaba ithakta prabhuna yengbiba numit aduda eingonda asi thokhanbire.


Jisupokkdabagi wa mangjounana haidokpa


26 Amahiksung tha taruk subada Nasaret kouba Galilgi sahar tanna iswardagi Gabriyel dut adubu tharakle; 

27 Dayudki imungdagi Jouseph kouba nipa amada wa loinakhrabi leisabi asengbi aduda mahak lakle, amasung leisabi adugi mamingdi Mariyamni. 

28 Aduga mahakna mangonda naksillaktuna hairak-i, Yaiphou, thoujal phangbi ibemma, prabhuna nangbu loinabi. 

29 Tou-i-gumbasung hairiba asida mahakna yamna langtaknaraduna, khurumba asi karamba makhurumno haina mapukningda khallak-i. 

30 Maduda dut aduna mangonda hai, kiganu, Mariyam, maramdi nahakti iswargi maphamdagi thoujal phangjare. 

31 Amasung yeng-u, nahak mironduna nacha nipa ama pokkani, aduga ibungo adugi maming Jisu thongani. 

32 Ibungo asi matik chaogani, amasung ihen henba adugi macha nipa kougani; amasung prabhu iswarna ibungo aduda mapa Dayudki phambal pibigani, 

33 Aduga ibungona Jakobaki imunggi mathakta lomba naidana pangani; amasung ibungogi leibak adu lomba nairoi. 

34 Maduda Mariyamna dut aduda hai, eidi nipaga khangnadabi oibanina, asi karamna oigadage? 

35 Aduga dut aduna mangonda khumlak-i, thawai asengbana nangonda kumtharakkani, amasung ihen henba adugi matikna nangonda lumsinbiragani; maram adunasu pokkadaba asengba adu iswargi macha nipa kougani. 

36 Amasung yeng-u, nahakki sagei Elisabetnasu hanuthangda macha nipa ama mirolle; aduga chaboktabi hairamba mahakna mironba houjik tha taruk sure. 

37 Maramdi iswardagi thokpa wahei khuding matik leitaba oiroi. 

38 Maduda Mariyamna hairak-i, yengbiyu, prabhugi manai nupibu, nahakki yathang matung inna eingonda thokpa oisanu. Adudagi dut aduna mangondagi chatthokkhre. 

39 Amahiksung Mariyamna numitsing asigi manungda hougattuna, chinggi lamadam, Jihudagi sahar amada thuna chatkhre, 

40 Aduga mahakna Sakhariyagi yumda changduna Elisabetpu khurumjare. 

41 Asum thoklare, Elisabetna Mariyamgi khurumjaba adu tabada, mahakki puknungda angang aduna chongkhatle; amasung Elisabetna thawai asengbana thalladuna, 

42 Khonjel wangna laokhatlak-i, nupisinggi marakta nangdi yaiphabini, amasung nanggi puknunggi mahei adu yaiphabani. 

43 Eigi prabhugi mamana eingonda lakpida, eingonda yaiphaba asi kadaidagino? 

44 Maramdi yeng-u, nanggi khurumjaba khonjel adu eigi nakongna tarabada, ipuknungda angang asi yamna haraona chongkhatle. 

45 Aduga thajarabi nupi adu yaiphabini; maramdi prabhudagi mangonda haikhraba adu thunggadabani. 

46 Maduda mariyam hairak-i, eigi pukningna prabhubu thagatchei, 

47 Amasung eigi thawaina eigi kanbiba mapu iswargi maphamda haraojare. 

48 Maramdi ibungo mahakna manai nupigi tollaba phibamda yengthabi. Maramdi yeng-u, houjiktagi houna miron punmamakna eibu yaiphabi kougani. 

49 Maramdi pangganba aduna eingonda achouba thabak toubire; amasung ibungo mahakki ming asengbani. 

50 Amasung ibungo mahakpu kibasingda miron mironda ibungo mahakki nungsibiba lei. 

51 Ibungo mahakki pambomna panggal utpire; Ibungo mahakna makhoi makhoigi pukninggi khangjaba aduda chaothokpasingbu ichai chaikhaibire. 

52 Ibungo mahakna phambandagi angambasingbu inthabire, aduga tonthabasingbu chaokhathanbire; 

53 Ibungo mahakna arambasingbu aphaba potna thalhanbire, aduga inakkhunbasingbu hangna thadokpire. 

54 Ibungo mahakna Abraham amasung mahakki dharada lomba naidana nungsibiba ningsingnanaba, 

55 Eikhoigi ipa ipusingda hailkhiba-gumna, ibungogi manai Israyelbu pangbire. 

56 Amasung Mariyamna tha ahumlom mahakka leire hairaga, mayumda hankhre.


Baptais toubiba Johan pokpa


57 Amahiksung Elisabetki angang unagadaba matam surabada, mahakna macha nipa ama pokle. 

58 Aduga prabhuna thoidokna ibungo mahakki nungsibiba mangonda utpire haiba mahakki keiroi leikai amasung sagei nateina tabada, mahakka loinana haraomignarammi. 

59 Asum thoklare, numit nipanni subada angang kaknanaba makhoina lakle; amasung makhoina mapagi maming matung inna mabu Sakhariya thon-gadourammi. 

60 Maduda magi mamana khumlak-i, natte; tou-i-gumbasung mabu Johan thongadabani. 

61 Amasung makhoina mangonda hairak-i, nahakki sagei-nateigi marakta maming asi kouba kana amata leite . 

62 Aduga mabu maming kari thoningbage haiduna makhoina magi mapada inggit toure. 

63 Maduda mahakna inanaba korabak ama nijaduna, magi maming Johan kou-i, haiduna ire. Aduga makhoi pumnamak ngakle. 

64 Khudak adumaktada mahakki machin hangdokpire, marei thadokpire amasung mahakna iswarbu thagatchaduna wa ngang-i. 

65 Amasung makhoigi akoibada leiriba pumnamakta akiba pokle. Aduga hairiba pumnamak asina Jihudiyagi ching lamdam pumnamakta inin ninnare; 

66 Amasung angang asi kari oiragaba haiduna, ataba pumnamakna makhoigi thammoida thamlammi. Maramdi prabhugi khut maga loinarammi. 

67 Amahiksung mapa Sakhariyana thawai asengbana thalladuna iswargi wa takthoklak-i. 

68 Israyelgi iswar prabhubu thagatchaba oisanu, maramdi ibungo mahakki misingda mityeng tabiduna handokpiba thabak toubire; 

69 Amasung ibungo mahakki manai Dayudki imungda eikhoigidamak aran khubamgi machi ama phaohanbire 

70 (Thainadagi iswargi, wa takthokpa asengbasing machinna ibungo mahakna haihanbagumna); 

71 Eikhoigi yeknabasing amasung eikhoibu tukkachaba pumnamakki khuttagi eikhoibu kanbiba; 

72 Eikhoigi ipa ipusingda nungsibiba utnanaba, ibungo mahakki asengba lepnakhiba wa ningsingnanaba, 

73 Amasung eikhoigi ipudhou Abrahamda wasaknakhiba matung inna, 

74 Eikhoibu eikhoigi yeknabasinggi khuttagi kanbiraga, ibungo mahakki mangda akiba leitana, 

75 Pukning asengbadasu dharamachenbadsu eakhoigi punsi chuppa ibungo mahakpu thougan toujaba yabinanaba toubire. 

76 Amasung, angang, mangbudi ihen henbagi wa takthokpa kougani; Maramdi ibungogi lambi thourang langbinanaba prabhugi mangda nangna chatkani; 

77 Ibungogi misingda makhoigi pap kokpiba aran khubamgi mahei pibinabani; 

78. Masi eikhoigi iswargi nungsibiba pukchengi maramnani; asigi mapanna amambada amasung asibagi mamida phamlibasingda nganbinanaba, 

79 Aduga ingthabagi lambida eikhoigi khong chingbinanaba, mathaktagi chingkhei hunba aduga eikhoibu mityeng tabigani. 

80 Amahiksung angang, adu hakchangdasu thawaidasu chaosu chaorak-i, kansu amasung israyelsingda mahakpu utpa numit phaoba lamjaoda leirammi.

Luk 2 

Jisu pokpa


1 Matam aduda asum thoklare, taibangpal pumnamakki mikok thiyu haiduna Agastas Keisardagi yathang lakle. 

2 Kurinina Suriyagi mapu oiringeida mikok thiba asi ahanba oirammi. 

3 Amasung mi khudingna magi magi khunda maming inanaba makhoi pumnamak chatli. 

4 Aduga Jousephsu Galilgi Nasaret saharadagi Jihudiyagi Bethalehem kouba Dayudki sahar tanna karakle, maramdi mahak Dayudki sagei amasung imung oirammi; 

5 Mahakka wa loinarabi mirollibi Mariyam aduga loinana maming inanabani. 

6 Asum thoklare, makhoina aduda leiringeida, mahakna angang unagadaba numit adu sure. 

7 Amasung mahak ahanba macha nipa ama pokle, aduga mabu phina yom-duna, sa thaknaba khudengda hiphalle, maramdi mithungsangda makhoigi damak mapham leiramde. 

8 Ainahiksung lam aduda yaosenba kharana loubuk lamhangda lektuna, makhoigi yao sanggu ahingda ngaklammi. 

9 Amasung prabhugi dut ama makhoigi manakta leplare; aduga prabhugi matik manganna makhoigi akoibada nganbire; maduda makhoi yamna kire. 

10 Adubu swargadut aduna makhoida hai; kiganu maramdi yeng-u, mi pumnamakki oigadaba, yamna haraoba aphaba wapao eina nakhoida pubi-rakli; 

11 maramdi ngasi Dayudki saharda nakhoigidamak kanbiba mapu pokle; ibungo mahakti Khrista prabhuni. 

2 Aduga nakhoigi damak khudam asini, nakhoina phina yomba angang ama sa thaknaba khudengda hipliba phanggani. 

13 Amasung khudak adumaktada swargagi kanglup mayam dut aduga loinaraduna iswarbu thagatlak-i, 

14 KhWaidagi henna wangbada iswarbu thagatpa, aduga taibangpanda ibungobu pelhalliba misinggi marakta ingthaba! 

15 Asum thoklare, swargadutsingna makhoidagi swargada kakhatkhraga, yaosenbasingna amaga amaga hainarak-i, eikhoina houjik Bethlehem tanna chatkhiduna, eikhoida prabhuna khanghanbikhiba thoklibi wa asi yenglusi. 

16 Amasung makhoina thuna laktuna, Mariyam amasung Jousephpu aduga sa thaknaba khudengda hipliba angang adubusu phanglare. 

17 Aduga makhoina urabada, angang asigi maramda makhoida haikhiba wa adugi marida makhoina khan ghalle. 

18 Amasung ataba pumnamakna yaosenbasingna makhoida haikhiba adugi maramda ngakle. 

19 Tou-i-gumbasung Mariyamna mapukningda maon maon khanduna, hairiba pumnamak asi ngaklammi. 

20 Amasung yaosenbasingda haikhiba adugumna, taraba amasung uraba pumnamak adugi damak makhoina iswargi matik mangal saktuna amasung ibungo mahakpu thagattuna hankhi. 

21 Amahiksung un kaknabagi damak numit nipanni surabada, ibungobu mirondringeina swargadutna thonkhibagum, ibungogi ming Jisu tholle.


Jisubu iswar ningnasangda pukhatpa; Simiyon amasung Annanana iswarbu thagatpa


22 Amasung Mousigi wayel yathang adugi matung inna makhoigi sengdokpagi numit surabada, prabhuda katchananaba 

23 (Prabhugi wayel yathang aduga ikhrabagumna, hanna pokpa nipa khudingbu prabhuda asengba kougadabani), 

24 Amasung prabhugi wayel yathang aduda ikhibagi matung inna lamkhunu pu ama nattraga khunu macha ani bali tounanaba ibungobu makhoina Jerusalemda pukhatle. 

25 Aduga yeng-u, Simiyon kouba mi ama Jerusalemda leirammi, amasung mahak asi Israyejgi apha-nungaiba ngaijariba, dharmachenba amasung iswarbu chetna ningba mi oirammi; aduga thawai asengbana mahakki mathakta leirammi. 

26 Amasung mahakna prabhugi Khrista adubu udriba phaoba, asiba uroi haiduna thawai asengbagi mapanna mangonda phongbiramle. 

27 Maduda thawaina tongduna mahakna iswar ningnasangda changlakle; aduga wayel yathang adugi hounabi matung inna ibungogi damak toubinanaba, mapa mamana angang Jisubu pusillaklabada, 

28 Mahakna ibungobu pamduna, iswarbu thagatcharak-i, 

29 Prabhu, ibungo nahakna haibibagi matung inna houjik ibungo nahakna nanaibu ingthana thadokpi, 

30 Maramdi jat pumnamakki mamangda ibungo nahakna thourang langbiraba 

31 Ibungo nahakki aran khubam adu eigi imitna ujare; 

32 Ibungodi atoppa jatsingda phongdokpinanabagi damak mangal, amasung ibungo nahakki mi, Israyel jatki matik mangal oibi. 

33 Amasung ibungogi mapa mamana ibungogi maramda haikhiba wa media ngaktuna leirammi; 

34 Aduga Simiyonna makhoibu bor piduna, ibungogi mama Mariyamda hairak-i, yeng-u, angang asi Israyelgi marakta ayambagi tathanaba amasug kakhatnabagi damak, aduga yadabagi khudam oinaba thambani; 

35 Amasung kabakthangna nangmakki thawaida thin-gani; aduna ayambagi pukningdagi wakhal makhei phongdoknanabani. 

36 Amahiksung Asergi salai, Phanuyelgi macha nupi Anna koubi iswargi wa takthokpi ama leirammi (Mahakti mayum naingeidagi mapuroibaga chahi taret pannaraga, 

37 Chahi mariphumari phaoba lukhra oibi, chahi yamna lirabi oirammi). Mahakna ahing nungthil chara henba amasung haijabaga loinana khurumjaduna, iswar ningnasang thadoklamde. 

38 Aduga pung adumaktada mahakna karaktuna iswarbu thagatchaduna, Jerusalem handokpiba ngaijaramba pumnamakta ibungogi maramda ngangthokpirammi. 

39 Amasung makhoina prabhugi wayel yathang adugi matung inna thabak pumnamak loirabada, makhoina Galilda makhoimakki sahar Nasret tanna hankhre.


Jisuna naha oiringeigi waram


40 Adugi matungda angang adu asum chaokhatlaktuna, mapanggal kallak-i, amasung lousingna thallak-i; iswargi thoujannasu ibungo mangonda leirammi. 

41 Amahiksung ibungogi mapa mamana chahi chahigi aranchakkhangbada Jerusalemda chatlammi. 

42 Amasung ibungona chahi taranithoi surabada, chakkhangbagi hounabi matung inna makhoina karakle, 

3 Aduga numitsing adu loiraga, makhoina asum hallakpada, nipa macha Jisudi Jerusalemda leihou-i, amasung ibungogi mapa mamanadi madu khangde. 

44 Thou-i gumbasung ibungodi chatminnaba kanglup marakta yao-i-ningduna makhoina nongmagi lambi chatlakle, aduga makhoigi sagei amasung khangnabasinggi marakta makhoina ibungobu koithi thirammi; 

45 Adubu makhoina ibungobu phangdrabada, thira thiraduna, Jerusalem tanna hallake. 

46 Asum thoklare, numit humnigi matungda makhoina ibungobu iswar ningnasang manungda ojhasinggi wa taduna amasung makhoida hangduna mayaida phamlamba phangle. 

47 Aduga ataba pumnamakna ibungogi hei-singba amasung paokhum makhei aduda chamamnarammi. 

48 Amasung makhoina ibungobu urabada, ingak ngakladuna mamana ibungoda hai, icha nangna eikhoida asumna touba kargino? Yeng-u, napaga eigana nungsa thiduna nangbu thirammi. 

49 Maduda ibungona makhoida hai, nakhoina eibu thiba asi karigino? Eidi ipagi yumda leipham thokpamakni haiba nakhoina khanglamdra? 

50 Amasung ibungona makhoida haiba wa adu makhoina khangde. 

51 Aduga ibungona makhoiga loinana kumthakhiduna Nasaretta lenglakle, amasung makhoigi makha ponna leirammi; aduga ibungogi mamanadi hairiba pumnamak asi mahakki thammoida chetna thamlammi. 

52 Amahiksung Jisu lousingda, sabanda amasung iswarga misinggana chanbada hengatlanuni.

Luk 3 

Baptais toubiba Johan amasung mahakki thabak houba


1 Tibiriya Keisarna panba taramanga suba chahigi manungda, Pontiya Pilatna Jihudiya leibak ngakpa mapu oiba, Herodna Galilgi ningthou oiba, mahakki manao Philipna Ituriya amasung Trakhonitiya lamgi ningthou oiba, Lujaniyana Abilinigi ningthou oiba, 

2 Amasung Hannaga Kayaphagana purohitlen oiba matamda lamjaoda Sakhariyagi macha nipa Johanda iswargi wa thunglei. 

3 Maduda paptagi handokpinaba pukning hongbagi baptais touba adu mahakna sandoktuna Jordangi akoiba lam pumnamakta lakle; 

4 Iswargi wa takthokpa Jisaiyagi waheisinggi lairikta ikhibagumbani, haibadi,


Lamjaoda laoriba amagi khonjendi, nakhoina prabhugi lambel thourang tou, ibungogi lambi chumhallu.


5 Akutpa khuding thalhangani, chingjao amasung ching macha khuding nemthahangani, akhoi akhoiba lambi chumhallakkani, amasung akut atong lambi mannahallakkani; 

6 Aduga mi pumnamakna iswargi aran khubam ugani. 

7 Maram aduna mangonda baptais lounanaba thoklakpa miyamsingda mahakna hairammi, he lingi dharasa, lakkadouriba assaoba adudagi chellu haina kanana nakhoida takpibage? 

8 Adunadi nakhoina napukning hongbagi matik chaba mahei yalhallu; amasung, eikhoigi ipudhou Abraham lei haiba napukningda haiba houganu, maramdi eina nakhoida hairi, iswarna nung mayam asidagi Abrahamda machasing thokhanba ngami. 

9 Houjikimaksu upambisinggi maruda singjangsu thaduna lei; Maram asina aphaba mahei yandaba upambi khudingmakpu yanthektuna meinungda langsilli. 

10 Maduda miyamsingna mangonda hanglak-i, madu oiragadi, eikhoina kari touba tabage? 

11 Amasung mahakna makhoida khumlak-i, phurit ani leiba mahak aduna ilei leitaba mahak aduda khai sanu; aduga chanaba leiba mahak adunasu adugumna tousanu. 

12 Amasung khajana thoubasingnasu laktuna mangonda hairei, guru, eikhoina kari touba tabage? 

13 Aduga mahakna makhoida hai, akakpa adudagi henna thouruganu 

14 Amasung lanmisingnasu mangonda hanglammi, eikhoina kari touba tabage? Maduda mahakna makhoida hai, nam-haduna mi kanadagisu louganu, kanabusu aranba theijin-ganu, amasung nanggi nanggi asumal aduna penba oiyu. 

15 Amahiksung misingna yengduna leiringeida amasung mi pumnamakna Johanbu Khristadu oiramgadra haiduna mahakki maramda makhoigi pukningda khannaringeida, 

16 Johanna makhoi pumnamakta khumlak-i, eidi nakhoibu isingda baptais toubi; adubu eingondagi henna matik leiba adu lenglak-i. Ibungogi khugrang mari eina louthokpa itik chade; ibungonadi nakhoibu thawai asengbada amasung meida baptais toubigani. 

17 Ibungogi lou yeipham changkhonna sengdoklaga gehu adu ibungogi keida peisinnanaba, ibungogi humai makhutta lei; tou-i-gumbasung maham adu mutpa naidraba meida thajingani. 

18 Asumna ayamba atei thoujinba wanasu mahakna misingda aphaba wapao sandoklammi. 

19 Tou-i-gumbasung Herod ningthoubu manaogi nupi Herodiyagi maramna amasung phattaba toukhiba pumnamak adugi maramna mahakna warakpada, 

20 Herodna pumnamak adugi mathakta asisu hapchille, haibadi, Johanbu keisumsangda thamjille.


Jisubu baptais touba


21 Asum thoklare, mi pumnamakpu baptais toubiba matamda, Jisunasu baptais louraga haijaringeida swarga hangdokkhre, 

22 Thawai asengbana khunugi maonggumna ibungogi mathakta kumtharakle, amasung, nang eigi nungsiraba icha nipani, nangonda eina yamna pelle haiba khonjel swargadagi lakle.


Jisugi pari puri


23 Amahiksung thabak houba matamda Jisu masamakki chahi kunthra marum oirammi. Ibungoi (mina ningnabagum) Jousephki macha nipani, Jousephna Heligi macha nipani. 

24 Helina matthatki macha nipani, Matthatna Leibigi macha nipani, Lebina Melkhigi macha nipani, Melkhina Jannagi mahcha nipani, Jannana Jousephki macha nipani, 

25 jousephna Mattathiyagi macha nipani, Mattathiyana Amoski macha nipani, Amosna Nahumgi macha nipani, Nahumna Esligi macha nipani, Eslina Naggagigi macha nipani, 

26 Naggagina Matki macha nipa-ni, Matna Mattathiyagi macha nipani, Mattathiyana Semeyingi macha nipani, Semeyinna Jousekki macha nipani, Jousekhna Joudagi macha nipani, 

27 Joudana Jouanangi macha nipani, Jouananna Risagi macha nipani, Risana Sarubbabelgi macha nipani, Sarubbabelna Saltiyelgi macha nipani, Saltiyelna Nerigi macha nipani, 

28 Nerina Melkhigi macha nipani, Melkhina Addigi macha nipani, Addina Kousamgi macha nipani, Kousamna Elmadamgi macha nipani, Elmadamna Ergi macha nipani, 

29 Erna Jesugi macha nipani, Jesuna Eliesargi macha nipani, Eliesarna Jourimgi macha nipani, Jourimna Matthatki macha nipani, Matthatna Leibig macha nipani, 

30 Lebina Simiyon-gi macha nipani, Simiyonna Judagi macha nipani, Judana Jousepkhi macha nipani, Jousephna Jounamgi macha nipani, Jounamna Eliyakimgi macha nipani, 

31 Eliyakimna Maleyagi macha nipani, Maleyana Mennagi macha nipani. Mennana Mattathagi macha nipani, Mattathana Nathan-gi macha nipani, Nathanna Dayudki macha nipani, 

32 Dayudna Jisaigi macha nipani, Jisaina Obedki macha nipani, Obedna Boyeski macha nipani, Boyesna Salmon-gi macha nipani, Salmonna Nahason-gi macha nipani, 

33 Nahasonna Amminadabki macha nipani, Amminadabna Arnigi macha nipani, Arnina Hebron-gi macha nipani, Hebronna Pereski macha nipani, Peresna Jihudagi macha nipani, 

34 Jihudana Jakobki macha nipani, Jakobna Isahakki macha nipani, Isahakna Abrahamgi macha nipani, Abrahamna Terha gi macha nipa-ni, Terhana Nahorgi macha nipani, 

35 Nahorna Sarugki macha nipani, Sarugna Rayugi macha nipani, Rayuna Pelegki macha nipani, Pelegna Ebargi macha nipani, Ebarna Selahagi macha nipani, 

36 Selahana Keinangi macha nipani, Keinanna Arphakasadki macha nipani, Arphakasadna Semgi macha nipani, Semna Nouhagi macha nipani, Nouhana Lemekki niacha nipani, 

37 Lemekna Mathuselhagi macha nipani, Mathuselhana Hanokki macha nipani, Hanokna Jeredki macha nipani, Jeredna Mahallelgi macha nipani, Mahallelna Keinan-gi macha nipani, 

38 Keinanna Enoski macha nipani, Enosna Sethki macha nipani, Sethna Adamgi macha nipani, Adamna Iswargi macha nipani.

Luk 4


Jisubu Themba


1 Amahiksung Jisu thawai asengbana thalladuna, Jordandagi hallaklaga, numit niphuni phaoba lamjaoda Diyabolgi themba adu khanglingeida thawaina ibungobu ching birammi. 

2 Amasung numitsing aduda ibungodi kari amata charamde, aduga numit adu loirabada, ibungona chak lamle. 

3 Maduda Diyabolna ibungoda hairei, nangna Iswargi macha nipa oirabadi, tal ollu haina nung asibu yathang piyu. 

4 Amasung Jisuna mangonda khummi, taltana mina hingloi; haina iduna lei. 

5 Maduda mahakna ibungobu ching-khatkhiduna, taibangpan-gi ningthou leibak pumnamak mikup amada ibungoda uhalle. 

6 Amasung Diyabolna ibungoda hai, pumnamak asigi mapu oiba amasung makhoigi matik mangal eina nangonda pibigani; maramdi masi eingoinda sinnakhre, aduga eina pamba kanagumba aduda masi pibi. 

7 Maram aduna imangda nangna khurumjaragadi, pumnamak nanggi oigani. 

8 Maduda Jisuna mangonda khumlak-i, nangna prabhu nanggi iswarbu khurumjagadabani, amasung ibungo mahaktabu ninggadabani, haiba asi iduna lei. 

9 Amasung mahakna ibungobu Jersusalemda chingkhiduna, iswar ningnasanggi matol tollenda lephallaga ibungoda hai, nangna iswargi macha nipa oirabadi, nang asidagi chongthajou. 

10 Maramdi iduna lei, Nangbu ngakpinanaba, ibungo mahakna nanggi maramda magi dutsingda yathang pibigani, 

11 Amasung nanggi nakhong adu nungda thengaidananaba makhoina nangbu makhutna pamkhatpigani. 

12 Maduda Jisuna mangonda khumlak-i, nangna prabhu nanggi iswarbu chang Yengpharoi, haina haikhrabani. 

13 Asumna themba pumnamak loiraga, khudong chaba matam phangdriba phaoba Diyabolna ibungodagi chatthokkhre.


Nasaretta Jisuna tambiba


14 Matung aduda Jisuna thawaigi panganna Galilda hallakle, amasung akoibada leiba lam apumbada ibungogi maramda mingchat sandokkhre. 

15 Amasung ibungona makhoigi loisang loisangda tambibada pumnamakna ibungobu thagatlammi. 

16 Amahiksung ibungobu yokkhatkhiba Nasaret tanna ibungo lenglakle; amasung potthaba numitta ibungogi hounabigumna loisangda lengsinduna, ibungona lairik pananaba lepkhatle. 

17 Amasung iswargi wa takthokpa Jisaiyagi lairik ibungoda katsille, aduga ibungona lairik adu hangdoktuna, wa asi iba mapham phangle, 

18 Prabhugi thawai ithakta leiri, maram adugi damak ibungo mahakna lairabasingda aphaba wapao sandoknanaba eingonda thao heibire; Aphabasingda thadokpiba amasung mittangbasingda amuk uba laothoknanaba, asokpa misingbu maning tamhanbinanaba, 

19 Aduga prabhugi ayaba chahi adu laothoknanaba, eibu thabirakle. 

20 Matung aduda ibungona lairik adu konsillaga, thouganba mida amuk piduna phamthare; amasung loisangda leiba pumnamakna ibungoda mitpham amatta oina yengle. 

21 Maduda ibungona makhoida haiba houre, nakhoina tabada ngasi sastragi wa asi thungle. 

22 Amasung makhoi pumnamakna ibungogi maramda aphaba ngangnarammi, aduga ibungogi chindagi thokpa thoujan-gi wa aduda ingak ngakladuna hairak-i, asi Jousephki macha nipa nattra? 

23 Maduda ibungona makhoida hai, soidana nakhoina eingonda paorou asi haigani, maiba, nasabu phahanjou; Kapharnahumda toukhi toulthiba eikhoina taba adu nahakmakki khun asidasu tou. 

24 Amasung ibungona hai, eina nakhoida thanggeisengna hairibani, iswargi wa takthokpa kana amatabu mahakmakki mareibakta yaba leite. 

25 Tou-i-gumbasung achumbamak eina nakhoida hairi-bani, Eliyagi haktakta chahi ahum tha taruk swarga thingkhiduna, leibak pumnamakta yamna chaktangba thokpa matamda Israyelda ayamba lukhrabi leirammi; 

26 Amasung makhoigi marakta kana amatada Eliyabu thabirakte, adubu Sidon-gi Sareptada lukhra oirabi nupi adutada thabirak-i. 

27 Aduga iswargi wa takthokpa Elisaigi matamda Israyelda kusti thungba yamna leirammi; amasung makhoigi marakta kana amatabu senghande, adubu Siriyagi Namanbutani. 

28 Maduda loisangda leiba pumnamakna waram khibik asi tabada saobana meihourammi; 

29 Aduga makhoina hougattuna, ibungobu sahardagi inthok laga, angambada hunthannanaba, makhoigi sahar sariba ching adugi chingdonda chingkhre. 

30 Tou-i-gumbasung ibungodi makhoigi marakta phaodoktuna lengthokkhirammi.


Bhut changba amabu phahanbiba


31 Amahiksung ibungona Galilgi sahar Kapharnahumda kumtharakle. Amasung potthaba numitta ibungona makhoibu tambirammi. 

32 Aduga ibungogi tambiba aduda makhoina ingak ngaklammi, maramdi ibungogi wagi matik leirammi. 

33 Amasung loisangda sengdaba bhutki thawai changba mi ama leirammi; aduga mana khonjel wangna laorak-i, 

34 Ha! Nasaretki Jisu, nangga eikhoiga kari thoknaba leibage? Eikhoibu manghannanaba lakpra? Eina nang kanano haiba khang-i, Iswargi asengba aduni. 

35 Maduda Jisuna mabu khamjinduna hai, tuminna leiyu, aduga mangondagi thokkhro. Amasung bhut aduna mabu mayaida huntharaga, mabu karisu soktana mangondagi thokkhre. 

36 Maduda pumnamakta angakpa thokladuna, makhoi amaga amaga hainarak-i, wa asi karino? Maramdi matikka panggan-ga yaona ibungona sengdaba thawaisingda yathang piraga makhoina chatthok-i. 

37 Amasung akoibada leiba lamgi mapham khudingda ibungogi maramda inin ninnakhre.


Simon-gi manembokpu amasung ateisingbu anaba pahanbiba


38 Amahiksung ibungona loisangdagi lengkhatlaga Simon-gi yumda changle. Amasung Simon-gi manembok arum kanna hourammi; aduga makhoina mahakki damak ibungoda nonjare. 

39 Maduda ibungona manakta leplaga yengthaduna arum adubu khamle, aduga magi arum kokkhre; amasung mahakna khudak aduda hougattuna makhoibu thougan toujarak-i. 

0 Amahiksung numit tabada, makhoi pumnamakkida leiba makhal makha ayamba lainana naba makhei adubu ibungogi mapbamda purakle; aduga ibungona mathang mathang amamamda khut thambiduna makhoibu phahanbire. 

41 Amasung bhutsingnasu, ibungogi iswargi macha nipani, haina lao laoduna ayambadagi thokkhre. Aduga ibungona makhoibu khamjinduna nganghandre, maramdi ibungobu Khristani haiba makhoina khanglammi. 

42 Amahiksung nongngallabada ibungona lengthokkhiduna, achikpa maphamda lengkhre. Amasung miyamsingna ibungobu thira thiraduna ibungogi maphamda laklaga, makhoidagi lengthoktananaba ibungobu khamba hotnarammi. 

43 Touigumbasung ibungona makhoida hai, eidi iswargi leibakki aphaba wapao adu atei atei sahardasu sandokpa tare; maramdi maram asigi damak eibu tharakpani. 

44 Asum touna ibungona Jihudiyagi loisang loisangda pao sandoklammi.

Luk 5


Ahanba seboksingbu kouba


1 Asum thoklare, miyamna ibungoda oinsinduna iswargi wa taringeida, ibungodi Gennesaretki pat mapanda leplammi, 

2 Aduga pat adugi mapanda hi ani thanglamba ibungona ure; adubu nga thibasingna hi adudagi kumthaduna makhoigi in chamduna leirammi. 

3 Maduda ibungona hi ani adugi amada, haibadi Simon-gida, lengsinduna, kangphandagi khara hondok-u, haiduna mahakpu haijare. Aduga ibungona phamthaduna hinungdagi miyamsingbu tambi. 

4 Amasung ibungona ngangba adu toklabada, Simonda hai, arubada honjinduna nga phananaba nakhoigi insing hunthou. 

5 Maduda Simonna khumlak-i, ibungo, eikhoina ahing nongsoiba nomjarabasu kari amata phade; adubu ibungogi yathang inna eina insing hunthajage. 

6 Amasung makhoina asi tourabada, nga sanggu achouba ama uple; maduda makhoigi insing adu segaiba houre. 

7 Amasung hi ateida leiba makhoiga nga thiminnaribasingna laktuna pangbinanaba makhoina khut khatle. Aduga makhoina laklaga, asup thanna happa aduna hi ani adu lupkadourammi. 

8 Tou-i-gumbasung Simon Pitarna masi ubada Jisugi khuyada tuthajaduna haijei, he prabhu, eingondagi lengthokpiyu, maramdi eidi pap chenba mini. 

9 Maramdi makhoina phanglaba aphaba ngasing aduda mahaksu mahakka loinaba pumnamaksu ingak ngak-lammi; 

10 Adugumduna Simon-gi mapangsing, Sebedigi macha nipasing, Jakobka Johan-ganasu ngaklammi. Maduda Jisuna Simonda hai, kiganu; houjiktagi houna nangna mi hingpha phagani. 

11 Aduga makhoina kangphanda hi ani adu thanggatlamlaga, makhoina pumnamak thadoklamladuna, ibungogi tung injare.


Kusthi thungba nipa ama amasung nakal namma sithaba mi amabu phahanbiba


12 Amahiksung asum thoklare, ibungona sahar amada leiringeida, yeng-u, kusthina pumyon yomba nipa amana Jisubu ubada, uprakna tuthajaduna ibungoda nonjarak-i, He prabhu, ibungona yabirabadi, eibu senghanbiba ngammi. 

13 Amasung ibungona khut tingthoklaga mabu sokpiduna hai, eina yare, nahak sengjaro. Khudak adumaktada kusthi laina adu mangondagi thokkhre. 

14 Amasung ibungona mahakpu achetpa yathang pire, mi kanadasu haidokkanu; adubu chattuna nasamak purohitta utcharu, aduga nahakpu senghanbibagi maramda, Mousina yathang pikhibagumna, makhoida sakshi pinanaba katcharu. 

15 Adumakpu ibungogi maramda pao henna henna sindok-i; aduga tananaba amasung makhoigi anaba phahanbinanaba miyam yamna pullap punna lak-i. 

16 Tou-i-gumbasung ibungo masana achikpa mapham maphamda theidokkhiduna haijarammi. 

17 Nongma numit amada asum thoklare, ibungona tambiringeida Galil amasung Jihudiyagi khul khudingdagi aduga Jerusalemdagi thoklakpa pharisisingga wayel yathanggi ojhasinggana manakta phamlammi; amasung anaba phahanbinanaba prabhugi matik ibungoga loinarammi. 

18 Aduga yeng-u, misingna nakal namma sithaduna naba mi ama phamungna puraklaga mabu manungda pusinnaba amasung ibungogi mangda thamnaba thirammi. 

19 Amasung miyamgi maramna mabu pusinnabagi lambi phangdaduna, makhoina yumthakta kakhatlaga, chek khara sidoktuna magi hipnaphamga loinana mayaida Jisugi mangda mabu thadare. 

20 Aduga makhoigi thajaba adu uraduna ibungona hai, He nipa, nanggi napapsing adubu kokpire. 

21 Maduda sastragi ojhasingga pharisinggana maon maon khanba houraduna hai, iswarbu thina ngangliba asi kanano? Iswar nattana kanana pap kokpiba ngambage? 

22 Tou-i-gumbasung Jisuna makhoigi maon maon khannariba adu khangduna, makhoida khumlak-i, nakhoina nakhoigi pukningda karigi maon maon khannabage? 

23 Nanggi damak napapsing kokpire haibaga, hougattuna, koichat chatlu haibaga, karambana henna laibage? 

24 Tou-i-gumbasung migi macha nipa aduna taibangpanda papsing kokpinaba matik lei haiba nakhoina khangnanaba (ibungona nakal namma sithaba aduda hairak-i), eina nangonda hairi, hougatlo, nanggi hipnapham adu loukhattuna nayumda chatlu. 

25 Amasung mana khudak aduda makhoigi mamangda hougatle, aduga magi hipnapham adu loukhatlaga, iswarbu thagattuna mayumda chatkhre. 

26 Aduga angakpana makhoi pumnamakpu sumhatle, amasung makhoina iswarbu thagatcharammi; aduga, eikhoina ngasi onthokpa thabak ure, hai-duna makhoi akibana thalle.


Lebibu koubiba


27 Asisinggi mattungda ibungona lengthokkhiduna, khajana thiphamda phamliba, Lebi kouba khajana thouba mi ama uraduna mangonda hai, itung illu. 

28 Maduda mahakna pumnamak thadoklamduna, hougatlaga ibungogi tung injei. 

29 Amahiksung Lebina ibungogi damak mayumda achouba chakkhangba ama langle, aduda makhoida chabada phamminnaba khajana thoubasing amasung ateising adu achouba miyam ama oirammi. 

30 Amasung Pharisisingga makhoigi sastragi ojhasinggana ibungogi seboksinggi mathakta murum murum sonnaduna makhoida hai, nakhoina khajana thoubasinga papchenbasingga karigi chamin-thakminnabage? 

31 Maduda Jisuna makhoida khumlak-i, masa phabasingdadi maiba kannade, adubu anabasingdadi kannei. 

32 Eina dharmachenbasingbu kouba lakpa natte, adubu pukning hongnanaba papchenbasingbuni.


Chara hendabagi maram hangba


33 Amahiksung makhoina ibungoda hai, Johan-gi seboksingna toina chara henduna nonjei; pharisisingnasu adugumna toui, adubu nahakkinadi chathak-i. 

34 Maduda Jisuna makhoida hai, borna marup mapangga leiminnaringeida makhoibu chara helhanba ngambra? 

35 Tou-i-gumbasung asigumba numit lakkani, amasung bor adubu makhoidagi pukhigadaba matamda, numit adugi manungda makhoina chara hen-gani. 

36 Amasung ibungona makhoida pandamsu hai, kananasu ahanba phidagi machet segaiduna amanba phida photchinde; photchillabadi, mahakna ahanba adusu segaigani, aduga ahanbadagi machet adusu amanba aduga tinnaroi. 

37 Amasung kananasu amanba sa-un khaosingdi anouba draksha mahi hapnade; haplabadi, anouba draksha mahi aduna sa-un khaosing adubu pokkhathan-gani, mahi adusu tagani, aduga sa-un khaosingsu manggani. 

38 Tou-i-gumbasung ahanba saun khaosingda anouba draksha mahi kappa tare. 

39 Amasung ariba thaklaga kananasu anouba pamde; maramdi aribana hao-i hai.

Luk 6 

Potthaba numit ngakpa


1 Asum thoklare, potthaba numit amada ibungona louyaida lenglaklingeida, ibungogi seboksingna gehu charong hektuna makhoigi khutna noiraga charammi.
