2 Tou-i-gumbasung pharisi kharana hai, potthaba numitta touba hounadaba thabak karigi nakhoina touribage? 

3 Amasung Jisuna makhoida khumlak-i, Dayudna mahak amasung mahakka loinabasingna lamlaba matamda kari toukhiba, 

4 Haibadi, mahakna iswargi sangda matou karamna changkhi-bage, purohitsing nattana chaba yadaba aut-tal adu mahakna louduna chakhibage, amasung mahakka loinabasingdasu pikhibage, haiba asi phaoba nakhoina padabra? 

5 Aduga ibungona makhoida hai, migi macha nipa adu potthaba numitki mapuni. 

6 Amahiksung atei potthaba numit amada asum thoklare, ibungona loisangda lengsinduna tambire, aduga maduda makhut yetthangba sithaba mi ama leirammi. 

7 Amasung sastragi ojhasingna amasung pharisisingna ibungogi maral phangba yananaba, potthaba numitta ibungona anaba phahangadra haiduna lumduna yenglammi. 

8 Toiu-i-gumbasung ibungona makhoigi wakhal khanglammi, aduga makhut namma sithaba nipa aduda hai, hougatlu amasung mayaida lep-u. Maduda mahakna hougattuna leple. 

9 Aduga Jisuna makhoida hai, eina nakhoibu hangli, potthaha numitta aphaba nattraga phattaba touba, thawai kanbiba nattraga manghanba hounabra? 

10 Amasungi ibungona makhoi pumnamakta koyeng yenglaga mangonda hai, nakhut tingthok-u. Aduga mahakna madu toubada, mahakki khut hannagum phakhre. 

11 Maduda makhoina khoidou sikladuna Jisuda kari touba yagadage haina makhoi amaga amaga ngangnarammi.


Sebok taranithoi


12 Matam aduda asum thoklare, ibungona chingda haijananaba lengthokle; amasung ibungona ahing nongsoiba iswarda haijaduna leirammi. 

13 Nongngallabada ibungona seboksingbu nakta kouraga, makhoidagi taranithoibu khangatle, aduga makhoibu pakhonchatpa mamingsu tholle; 

14 Adudi, marring Pitarsu thonba Simon amasung mahakki manao Andriya, Jakob amasung Johan, Philip amasung Bartholomaya, 

15 Matthi amasung Thoma, Alphiyagi macha nipa Jakob amasung Selot kouba Simon, 

16 Jakobki macha nipa Jihuda amasung yaknabagi michang oirakkhiba Iskariyot Jihuda, makhoi asini. 

17 Amasung Ibungona makhoiga loinana lengtharaktuna atemba maphamda leple. Maduda ibungogi sebok miyam yamna amasung Jihuda pumnamaktagi Jerusalemdagi, aduga, Turga Sidon-gagi samadru mapandagi, ibungogi wa tananaba amasung makhoigi laina makhei phahanbinanaba, miyam yamna lakle; 

18 Aduga sengdaba thawaisingna noihatpasingbu phahanbirammi. 

19 Amasung miyam pumnamakna ibungobu sokchanaba thirammi, maramdi ibungodagi matik thoklaktuna pumnamakpu naba phahanbirammi.


Yaiphabasing amasung awabasing


20 Amahiksung ibungona mahaki seboksingda mit yengkhattuna hai, lairabasa, yaiphei, maramdi iswargi leibak nakhoigini. 

21 Houjik lamlibasa, yaiphei, maramdi nakhoibu thalhanbigani. 

22 Houjik kaplibasa, yaiphei, maramdi nakhoina noklagani; migi macha nipa adugi maramgi damak misingna nakhoibu tukkachaba, khaidokpa, cheiba amasung nakhoigi naming phatte haiduna inthokpa matamda, nakhoi yaiphei. 

23 Numit aduda haraoduna chongkhatlu; maramdi, yeng-u, swargada nakhoigi mana chao-i; maramdi matou asigumna makhoigi mapa mapuna iswargi wa takthokpasingda toukhibani. 

24 Tou-i-gumbasung inakkhunba nak-hoi awabanida! Maramdi nakhoina nakhoigi apha-nungaiba phangkhre. 

25 Houjik puk thalliba nakhoi awabanida! maramdi nakhoi lamgani. Houjik nokliba nakhoi awabanida! Maramdi nakhoia tengthaduna kapkani. 

26 Mi pumnamakna nakhoigi maramda aphaba ngangnaba matamda awabanida! Maramdi matou asigumna makhoigi mapa mapuna iswargi wa takthoksinnabasingda tourammi.


Yeknabasingbu nungsiba amasung misingbu wayendaba


27 Tou-i-gumbasung tariba nakhoida eina hairi, nakhoigi yeknabasingbu nungsiyu, nakhoibu tukkachabasingda phajana toubiyu, 

28 Nakhoibu sirap pibasingbu bor piyu, nakhoibu usittana toubasinggi damak haijabiyu. 

29 Nangbu nakhajai amada phuba mangonda atoppa adusu yabiyu; amasung nanggi innaphi munkhiba mahak aduna nanggi phuritsu munbada khamganu. 

30 Nangonda nijaba khudingda pinou; amasung nanggi napot nachei loukhiba aduda amuk thouruganu. 

31 Amasung misingbu nakhoida tou-hanningbagumna, nakhoinasu makhoida adugumna tou. 

32 Aduga nakhoibu nungsibasingbu nakhoina nungsirabadi, nakhoida kari thagatpham leibage? Maramdi papchenbasingnasu makhoibu nungsibasingbu nungsi. 

33 Amasung nakhoida aphaba toubibasingda nakhoina aphaba toubirabadi, nakhoida kari thagatpham leibage? Maramdi papchenbasingnasu adumak tou-i. 

34 Amasung nakhoina phanggani ningba makhoi aduda puthoklabadi, nakhoida kari thagatpham leibage? Papchenbasingnasu adup amuk phangnanaba papchenbasingda puthoki. 

35 Tou-i-gumbasung nakhoigi yeknabasingbu nungsisu nungsiyu, aphabasu toubiyu amasung khak nungsathidaduna puthok-u. Maduda nakhoigi mana chaogani, aduga nakhoi ihen henba adugi machasing oigani; maramdi toubimal khangdabasingdasu phattabasingdasu ibungo mahakna chanbi. 

36 Nakhoigi napana nungsibibagum nakhoina nungsibiyu. 

37 Amasung wayelluganu, aduga nakhoibu wayenbiroi; amasung lalhalluganu, aduga nakhoibu lalhalloi; thadokpiyu, aduga nakhoibu thadokpigani; 

38 Piyu, aduga nakhoida pibigani; aphaba changda, namthaduna, niksinduna, pathana makhoina nakhoigi thabakki khaoda happigani. Maramdi nakhoina olluriba chang aduna nakhoida amuk ollagani. 

39 Amahiksung ibungona makhoida pandam amasu hai, mittangbana mittangababu lamjingbiba ngambra? Makhoi animak komda taroidra? 

40 Sebokna gurugi mathak natte, tou-i-gumbasung tamba changkhollaba mi khuding magi gurugum oirakkani. 

41 Aduga nangmakki namitta khangngel leiba adu khandaduna, nanggi nachin nanaogi mamitta thunamba leiba adu karigi yenglibano? 

42 Nangmakki namitta khangngel leiba adu udaduna, karamna nachin nanaoda, ichin inao, namitta leiba thunamba adu louthokpige, haiba ngambage? Aphasajaningba, nangna ahanbada nanggi namittagi khangngel adu louthokkho, amasung matung aduda nangna nachin nanaogi mamitta leiba thunamba adulouthoknaba sengna ugani. 

43 Maramdi phattaba uhei panba aphaba upambi, aduga aphaba uhei panba phattaba upmabi leite. 

44 Maramdi magi magi meheimaktana upambi khudingbu khangnei. Maramdi misingna tingkhang pambidagi heiyit, aduga tingkhang panba mongsongdagi draksha mahei heknade. 

45 Aphaba mina magi thammoigi aphaba pukeidagi aphaba adu puthok-i, amasung phattabana phattabadagi phattaba adu puthok-i; maramdi thammoigi ayamba leiba adudagi machinna ngangthok-i.


Wa Taba amasung inba


46 Amahiksung nakhoina eina haiba hiram adu toudaduna, eibu Prabhu, Prabhu, kouba karigino? 

47 Eingonda laktuna, eigi wasing taraga touba mi khuding adu kanaga mannaba eina nakhoida utke. 

48 Mahakti touduna luthahallaga, nungjao mathakta yumpham thonduna yum saba mi amasgmbani; aduga ising ichaona hourakpada, ichel aduna yum adu yeire, amasung madu lenghanba ngamde, maramdi madu ningthina sabani. 

49 Tou-i-gumbasung taraga toudaba mahak adudi yumpham yaoduna leipak mathakta yum saba mi amagumbani; ichenna yeiraga, madu hek pumtu ture, aduga yum adugi tekpa adu yamna thikre.

Luk 7 

Lanmi chamagi mapugi manai amabu anaba phahanbiba


1 Ibungona mising tananaba haiba pumnamak loiba matungda Kapharnahumda lengsille. 

2 Amahiksung kanagumba lanmi chamagi makokki minai ama naduna sigadourammi. Mahaktu mapugi luna toujaba minaini. 

3 Madudi mahakna Jisugi maram tabada, ibungona lengbiraktuna mahakki minai adubu kanbiyu haijarunaba, Jihudisinggi ahallamansingbu ibungogi maphamda thakhi. 

4 Amasung makhoina Jisuda laklabada, ibungona mahakki damak asi toubiba mahakti matik-chabani; 

5 Maramdi mahakna eikhoigi jatpu nungsi, adnga mahakmakna eikhoigi loisang sabire, haiduna ibungoda kanna haijarammi. 

6 Maduda Jisuna makhoiga lengminnei. Adubu ibungona yuin adu kaya laplaktrabada, lanmi chamagi makok aduna ibungoda marupsingbu tharaktuna ibungoda haihallei, prabhu, Ommgo wabiganu, maramdi ibungona eigi yumda lengbirakpa eigi itik chade. 

7 Maram asigi damak eimaksu ibungogi maphamda lakchaba itik chade haina ningjarammi; tou-i-gumbasung yathang pibiyu, aduga eigi inai naba phaba oisanu. 

8 Maramdi eimaksu mapugi makhada leiba mini, eigi ikhada lanmising leiri; amasung eina mi asida chatlu hairaga mahakna chatli; attopan amada lak-u hairaga lak-i; aduga eigi inaida, asi tou, hairaga tou-i. 

9 Maduda Jisuna wa asi tabada, man-gonda ngakladuna ibungogi tung illiba miyam aduda ollaklaga hairak-i, eina nakhoida hai, eina Israyelgi marakta phaoba asup yamna thajaba phangdri. 

10 Aduga thakhibasing aduna yumda hallakpada, minai adu pumpha phana phanglare.


Nayinda lukhrabi amagi macha nipabu hinggatpiba


11 Amahiksung khara leiraga asum thoklare, ibungona Nayin kouba saharda lenglakle, aduga seboksingsu miyam ayambasu ibungoga loinarammi. 

12 Aduga ibungona sahar adugi panthongda naksillaklabade, yeng-u, asiba ama puthoklammi, mahakti mamagi aduta ngaijaba macha nipani, mamasu lukhrabini; amasung sahar adugi okhak yamlaba miyamna mama aduga loinarammi. 

13 Maduda prabhuna nupi adubu ubada, mangonda nungsiba pokladuna, ibungona mangonda hai, kapkanu. 

14 Aduga ibungona nakna lengsillaktuna, kai adu sokpada apubasingna leple. Maduda ibungona hai, pakhang, eina nangonda hairi, hougatlu. 

15 Aduga asiba aduna hougattuna phamsu phamle, wasu ngangba houre. Matung aduda ibungona mabu mamada pikhre. 

16 Amasung pumnamak kibana sumhatle; aduga makhoina iswarbu thagatlak-i, iswargi wa takthokpa achouba ama eikhoigi irakta phaorare, amasung iswarna ibungo mahakki misingbu mityeng tabire. 

17 Amasung ibungogi maramda pao asi Jihudiya apumbada aduga akoibada leiba lam pumnamakta sinkhre.


Baptais Toubiba Johan


18 Amahiksung Johangi seboksingna waram pumnamak asi mangonda tamle. 

19 Maduda Johanna mahakki sebok ani kousillaga, prabhugi maphamda makhoibu thakhiduna haihallei, lenglakliba adu ibungora, nattraga eikhoina atoppa amabu ngaijakhigadra? 

20 Amasung mising aduna ibungoda laklabada, makhoina hanggatlei, baptais toubiba Johanna eikhoibu ibungoda tharaktuna, asumna haihanbani, lenglakliba adu ibungora, nattraga eikhoina atoppa amabu ngaijakhigadra? 

21 Pung adumaktada ibungona ayambabu anabadagi, laina phattabadagi amasung phattaba bhutsingdagi phahanbire, aduga ibungona mittangba ayambada uba pinabire. 

22 Amasung ibungona makhoida khumlak-i, nakhoina ataba amasung a-uba pumnamak adu Johanda tam-u; mittangbasingna ujari, khongtekpasingna koijari, kusthi thungbasingna sengba phangjari, napangbasingna tajari, asibasingbu hinggathalli, sandokliba aphaba wapao adu lairabasingbu tahanbi. 

23 Amasung eingonda khudi thidaba mahak adu yaiphabani. 

24 Amahiksung Johan-gi pakhon sirakpasingna chatthokkhrabada, ibungona Johan-gi maramda miyamsingda haiba hourakle, nakhoina lamjaoda kari yengba chatlubage? Nungsitna lenghanba singutpura? 

25 Tou-i-gumbasung nakhoina kari unaba chatlubage? Amonba phi setpa mi amabura? Yeng-u, yamna tagup tarengba phi settuna nungaina panba makhoi adudi ningthousinggi konungda leibani. 

26 Tou-i-gumbasung nakhoina kari yengnanaba chatlubage? Iswargi wa takthokpa amabura? Hoi, Eina nakhoida hairi, mahakti iswargi wa takthokpa amadagi helli. 

27 Masi mahak aduni, mahakki maramda iduna lei, madudi, yeng-u, eina eigi pakhonsibabu nanggi namangda thai; mahakna nanggi namangda nanggi Iambi semgani. 

28 Eina nakhoida hairi, nupisingna pokpa makhoi adugi marakta Johandagi henna chaoba kanasu leite; adum oinamak iswargi leibakta khwaidagi henna pikpa mahak aduna mangondagi henna chao-i 

29 Amasung masi taraba mi pumnamaksu khajana thoubasingsu Johandagi baptais louduna, iswarbu achumbani haina yare. 

30 Tou-i-gumbasung pharisisingna amasung wayel heibasingna mangondagi baptais loudaduna iswargi wakhal adu makhoi masagi damak yajadre. 

31 Maram asina miron asigi misingbu eina kariga changdamnagadage, amasung makhoi kariga mannabano? 

32 Makhoidi keithenda phamba angangsingga mannei amasung makhoi amana amabu kounaduna hai, eikhoina nakhoida bansi khonglaga nakhoina jagoi sade; eikhoina tengtharaga nakhoina kapte. 

33 Maramdi baptais toubiba Johanna talsu chadaduna draksha mahisu thaktaduna lakle; amasung nakhoina mahakpu bhut pubani hai. 

34 Migi micha nipa aduna chathaktuna lakle; amasung nakhoina hai, yeng-u, pukchaoba amasung yu thakpa, khajana thoubasing amasung papchenbasinggi marup. 

35 Amasung lousingbu magi machasing pumnamakna chummi haina utle.


Jisugi khong thao teibiba: Lan tonba anigi pandam


36 Amahiksung pharisising kanagumba amana ibungobu mahakka chak chaminnananaba haijarammi, aduga ibungona pharisi adugi yumda lengsinduna chabada phamle. 

37 Amasung yeng-u, sahar aduda papchenbi nupi ama leirammi. Mahakna pharisi adugi yumda ibungona chabada phamliba adu khanglabada, mahakna teinathao happa nungphu angouba ama puraktuna, 

38 Ibungogi khong-manakta tunglomda lepcharage, kaptuna mapina ibungogi khong chot-hanba houre, madu mahakki kokki samna teithokchare, aduga ibungogi khong yamna chuptuna, teinathaoaduna teibire. 

39 Madu ibungobu koujaba pharisi aduna ubada, mapuknungda wa ngangduna hai, nipa asi iswargi wa takthokpa ama oirabadi, mahakpu soklibi asi kanano amasung karamba nupino, haibadi papchenbini, haiba asi khanglamgadabani. 

40 Maduda Jisuna mangonda khumlak-i, Simon, eina nangonda karigumba khara haining-i. Aduga mahakna hai, Guru, haibiyu. 

41 Kanagumba sel puthokpa amadagi sel puba ani leirammi. Amana lupa chani yengkhei, aduga atei aduna lupa kunmanga tollammi. 

42 Makhoina singningai leitrabada, makhoi anibu mahakna kokpire. Maram aduna makhoi karambana mahakpu thoina nungsigadage? 

43 Simonna khumlak-i, eina jabadi, mahakna thoina kokpikhiba mahak adunani. Aduga ibungona mangonda hai, nahakna chumna wayelle. 

44 Maduda ibungona nupi aduromda onsinduna Simonda hai, nahakna nupi asibu ubra? Eina nahakki yumda changle, nahakna ikhonggbidamak ising pide; adubu nupi asina mapina ikhong chothanduna masamna teithokpire. 

45 Nahakna eibu chuppide, adubu mahakna eina changlakpadagi houna ikhong chuppiba tokte. 

46 Nahakna eigi kokta thao teibide, adubu mahakna eigi khongda teinathao teibire. 

47 Manua aduna eina nangonda hairi, mahakki pap ayamba adu kokpire; adugi damak mahakna yamna nungsire. Khajikta kokpikhiba aduna manungsi. 

48 Amasung ibungona nupi aduda hai, nanggi pap khibik kokpirabani. 

49 Maduda ibungoga chabada phamminnaribasingna makhoi masen marakta ngangnaba houre pap phaoba kokpiba asi kanano? 

50 Amasung ibungona nupi aduda hal, nanggi thajabana nangbu kanbire; ingthana chatchakhro.

Luk 8 

Jisubu nupisingna thougan touba


1 Adugi matungda asum thoklare, ibungona sahar saharda amasung khun khunda iswargi leibakki aphaba wapao sandoktuna; amasung tambiduna koichat chatpada, taranithoi adu ibungoga loinarammi. 

2 Amasung phattaba thawaisingdagi aduga ason-anadagi phahanbikhiba kana kanagumbi nupising: bhut taret thokkhiba Magdalini koubi Mariyam 

3 Herodki Dewan Kusagi nupi Johanna, Susanna, aduga ayamba atei nupising yaorammi; makhoi asina maranna makhoibu thougan toujarammi.


Maru hunbagi pandam


4 Amahiksung sahar khudingdagi ibungogi maphamda laktuna miyam yamna tinnarabada, ibungona pandanma hai, 

5 Maru hunba mi aduna mahakki maru hunnanabu thoklakle; amasung mahakna asum hullakpada, maru kharana lambigi mapanda tare, aduga madu khongnasu netle, atiyagi ucheksingnasu chathokkhi. 

6 Amasung kharana nung mathakta tare, aduga madu hourakpada leinin leitabagi maramna kangsille. 

7 Amasung kharana tingkhang marakta tai, aduga tingkhangna maduga loinana houraktuna namhatle. 

8 Ateidi aphaba leipakta tai, aduga madu houraktuna saruk chama mahei palli. Waram asi hairingeida ibungona laorak-i, tananaba nakong panba mahak aduna tajasanu. 

9 Amahiksung ibungogi seboksingna hanggatcharammi, pandam asigi a-oiba karino? 

10 Maduda ibungona hai, iswargi leibakki athuppa wa khangnanaba nakhoida pibirabani; adubu ateisingdadi makhoina uduna udananaba, amasung taduna khangdananaba, pamdam oina haibani. 

11 Pandam adudi asini: Maru adu iswargi wani. 

12 Lambi mapan-gi adusingdi tarabasingni; maduda Diyabolna laktuna, makhoina thajaduna kanbiba phangdananaba makhoigi thammoidagi wa adu puthok-i. 

13 Nung mathakki adusingdi, makhoina tarabada haraona wa adu lou-i, aduga mara leitabana matam kharagi damak thajaramlaga athembagi matamda takhiba makhoi aduni. 

14 Tingkhang marakki adudi, makhoina taraga, makhoigi chatnabi mipan asigi wakhal, lal, amasung harao kummeina namhattuna changkhonba mahei yande. 

15 Amasung aphaba leipaktagi adudi, asengba amasung aphaba thammoida wa adu taraga, chetna paiduna khangheibana mahei yanba makhoi asini.


Thaomeigi Pandam


16 Amahiksung thaomei thallaga kananasu chaphuna kupsinde, nattraga kangkhada thamde, tou-i-gumbasung changlakpasingna mangal adu unanaba makhong mathakta thammi. 

17 Maramdi phongdokloidaba arotpa karisu leite, aduga khangloidaba amasung phongdok-loidaba athuppa karisu leite. 

18 Maram aduna nakhoina karamba ma-ongda tabage chaksillu; maramdi areiba mahak aduda pibigani, aduga leitaba mahak adudagi mahakna leijei ningjaba adu phaoba louthokkani.


Achumba ichin inao


19 Matung aduda ibungogi mama amasung manaosingna ibungogi manakta laklaga, miyamgi maramna makhoina ibungobu unaba ngamdre. 

20 Amasung ibungogi imaga inaosinggana mapanda leptuna ibungobu unajage haina ibungoda pao tamle. 

21 Adubu ibungona makhoida khumlak-i, iswargi wa adu taraga touba makhoi asi eigi ima amasung eigi ichin inaosingni.


Jisuna nong-nungsit khamba


22 Nongma numit amada asum thoklare, ibungo masagi seboksinggana hinungda lengsillaga, ibungona makhoida hai, eikhoina pat wangmada lanthoksi. Maduda makhoina hi hollak-i, 

23 Aduga makhoina asum hollakpada ibungo tumtharammi. Amasung pat aduda nong-nungsit sittharak-i, aduna ising haijinduna makhoi khudong thibada tarammi. 

24 Aduga makhoina laktuna ibungobu houdoktuna hai, ibungo, ibungo, eikhoi mangle. Maduda ibungona lengkhatladuna, nungsit amasung ihourakpa adubu khamjillabada, animak tokladuna tapthare. 

25 Amasung ibungona makhoida hai, nakhoigi thajaba kadaidano? Adubu kisu kiraduna, ngaksu ngakladuna, makhoina amaga amaga hainarak-i, nungsit amasung ising phaoba yathang piraga illiba ibungo asi kanano?


Sengdaba thawai changba Gerasenigi mi ambu phahanbiba


26 Amahiksung Galilga maioknaba Gerasenigi lamda makhoina thunglare. 

27 Aduga ibungona kangphanda lengkhatlakpada, bhut changba kanagumba mi amana sahardagi thoklaktuna ibungoga oknare; mahakna matam kuina phisu sette, yumdasu leite, tou-i-gumbasung mang marakta leirammi. 

28 Mahakna Jisubu ubada, laoraga ibungogi mangda tuthajaduna awangba khonjenna hai, he ihen henba iswargi macha nipa Jisu, nangga eiga kari thoknaba leibage? Eina nangbu non-jari, eibu wahanbiganu. 

29 Maramdi ibungona mi adudagi chatthoknaba sengdaba thawai adubu yathang pirammi. Maramdi sengdada thawai mahakpu ayamba matamda pharammi; amasung misingna mahakpu ngaksenduna yothling phalangna pullabasu amasung hang chalabasu, mahakna apunba adu pumthat thadatlaga, bhut aduna mahakpu lamhangda tanthoklammi. 

30 Amasung Jisuna mangonda hangle, naming karino? Aduga mana hai, mayam; maramdi ayamba bhutsingna mangonda changlammi. 

31 Maduda bhutsing aduna, eikhoibu makha naidaba komda chatnaba yathang pibiganu, haiduna ibungoda haijararmmi. 

32 Adubu chingnung aduda ok mayamgi sanggu ama chaduna leirammi; amasung makhoina makhoibu oksing aduda changnaba yabiyu haina ibungoda haijare. Maduda ibungona makhoibu yabire. 

33 Aduga bhutsing aduna mi adudagi thoklaktuna, oksing aduda changlaga, sanggu aduna angamba adudagi patta hotthaduna isingna lakhatkhre. 

34 Amasung sellambasing aduna thokkhiba adu ubada, chenkhiduna sahar aduda amasung khun khunda tamlure. 

35 Aduga thokkhiba adu yengnanaba makhoina thoklakle, amasung makhoina Jisugi maphamda laklaga, bhutsing thokkhiba mi aduna phisu settuna mapukningsu achumba oiduna, Jisugi khuyada phamlamba adu phanglabada, kire. 

36 Aduga bhutna puramba mahak adu karamna pumpha phakhibage haiba ukhibasing aduna makhoida tambire. 

37 Amasung Gerasenigi akoiba lamda leiba miyam pumnamakna makhoidagi lengthok-khinanaba ibungobu haijare; maramdi makhoina kibana thagatlammi. Maduda ibungona hida lengsingduna hallakle. 

38 Tou-i-gumbasung bhutsing chatthokhiba mi aduna ibungoga loinajage haiduna ibungogi maphamda nonjarammi; 

39 Adubu ibungona mahakpu thakhiduna hai, nayumda hankhro, aduga iswarna nanggi damak kaya chaoba thabak toubire haiba lithoklu. Maduda mahakki damak Jisuna kaya chaoba thabak toubire haiba sandok sandoktuna sahar apumba koiphao phaona chatkhre.


Jayirgi macha nupibu hinggatpiba amasung i tabi nupi amabu phahanbiba


40 Amahiksung Jisuna hallakpada miyamna ibungobu haraona lousinjare; maramdi makhoi pumnamakna ibungobu ngaijarammi. 

41 Amasung yeng-u, Jayir kouba nipa ama lakle, mahakti loisanggi wayel thoudaba mapu amani; aduga mahakna Jisugi khuyada tuthajaduna, mahakki yumda lenglaklaba ibungobu non-jarammi; 

42 Maramdi macha nupi chahi taranithoirom surabi, amata ngaijabi adu sigadourammi. Adubu ibungona asum lenglakpada miyamsingna omsillammi. 

43 Amahiksung chahi taranithoi i taduna marabi, maibasingda magi leijaba pumnamak tinglabasu, 

44 Kana amatana phahanba ngamdrabi nupi amana ibungogi tungda laktuna, ibungogi phiji sokle, aduga magi i taba adu khudak adumaktada khakle. 

45 Maduda Jisuna hai, eibu sokkhiba adu kanano? Aduga pumnamakna sokte haibada, Pitar amasung mahakki loinabasingna hai, ibungo, miyamsingna ibungobu omsinduna innabani. 

46 Tou-i-gumbasung Jisua hai, kanagumbana eibu sokkhre; maramdi eingondagi itik thokkhiba adu eina mangle. 

47 Amasung nupi aduna lotpa yadre khangjarabada, tanik tanikna laktuna ibungogi mangda tuthajaraga, kari maramna mahakna ibungobu sokpage amasung mahakki ana ba karamna hek phakhibage haiba adu pumnamakki mangda tamthokle. 

48 Maduda ibungona hai, icha nupi, nanggi thajabana nangbu phahanbire; ingthana chatchakhro. 

49 Ibungona nganglingeimaktada loi sanggi wayel thoudaba mapu adugi yumdagi amana laktuna mangonda hairei, nahakki nacha nupi sikhre; gurubu amuk wahanbiganu. 

50 Adubu Jisuna madu tarabada mangonda khumlak-i, kiganu, thada thajou, maduda mana hinggatkani. 

51 Amasung yum aduda ibungona lenglakpada, Pitar, Johna, Jakob, amasung nupi macha adugi mapaga mamagabu nattana kanabusu ibungona changminnaba yabidre. 

52 Aduga magi damak pumnamakna kapsu kaplammi, thabaksu yeirammi, tou-i-gumbasung ibungona hai, kapkanu. Maramdi mahakti side, tumlibani. 

53 Amasung mahak sire haiba makhoina khangladuna, ibungobu usittana noknei. 

54 Tou-i-gumbasung ibungona magi makhut paiduna kou-i, ibemma, hougatlu. 

55 Maduda mathawai hanjillaktuna, khudak aduda mahak lepkhatle; amasung mangonda chanaba piyu haiduna ibungona yathang pire. 

56 Aduga mapa mamana ingak ngaklammi; adubu thokkhiba adu kanadasu tamdananaba ibungona makhoida kanna yathang pire.

Luk 9 

Sebok taranithoibu thaba


1 Matung aduda ibungona taranithoi adubu pullap kouduna, bhut pumnamakpu ngam naba amasung laina makhoibu phahannaba panggal amasung matik makhoida pibire. 

2 Aduga ibungona iswargi leibak sandoknanaba amasung anabasingbu phahanbinanaba makholbu thakhi. 

3 Amasung ibungona makhoida hai, langpheigi damak cheisu oirabasu, pai-tukhao oirabasu, tal oirabasu, sel oirabasu, kari amata puganu; phuritsu ani puganu. 

4 Aduga nakhoina karigumba yumda changlaga, madumakta Chung-u, aduga madumaktagi chatsu chatthok-u. 

5 Amasung kanagumbana nakhoibu lousinbidrabadi, sahar adudagi nakhoina chatthokpa matamda makhoigi mathakta sakshi oinabagi damak nakhoigi khong-dagi uphul kanthoklammu. 

6 Matung aduda makhoina chatkhiduna, mapham khudingda aphaba wapao sandoktuna amasung anaba phahanduna khun khunda changlammi.


Herodki chamamnaba


7 Amahiksung Herod ningthouna thokliba pumnamak asi tarabada, yamna chamamnarammi, maramdi kharana Johanbu asibasinggi maraktagi hinggat-pire, 

8 Kharana, Eliya uhallare, aduga ateisingna, iswargi wa takthokpa aribasinggi maraktagi kanagumba ama hing-gatle, hairammi. 

9 Herodnadi hai, eina johan-gi makok kamkhre, adubu eina mahakki maramda asigumba wa tariba mi asi kanano? Aduga mahakna ibungobu unanaba thirammi.


Mi Lising mangabu pijaba


10 Amahiksung pakhonchatpasingna hallaklabada, makhoina toukhi toukhiba thabak adu ibungoda lire. Aduga ibungona makhoibu pudana, Betseida kouba sahar amada tonganna theidokle. 

11 Tou-i-gumbasung miyam-singna madu khanglabada, ibungogi tung injare; aduga ibungona makhoibu taramna lousinbiduna iswargi leibakki maramda ngangthoklammi, amasung naba phaba pamba makhoi adubu phahanbirammi. 

12 Numit taramdaida taranithoi aduna ibungogi maphamda laktuna hanggatle, miyam asina akoibada leiba khun amasung lawaida chatkhiduna, yumthung amasung chanaba phangnanaba makhoibu thabikhro; maramdi asina eikhoina achikpa maphamda leiri. 

13 Tou-i-gumbasung ibungona makhoida hai, nakhoina makhoida chanaba piyu. Maduda makhoina hai, eikhoina chattuna mi pumnamak asigi damak chanaba leirudragadi, eikhoigida tandum manga amasung nga anidagi henna leijade. 

14 Maramdi makhoi nipa lising mangarom oirammi. Aduga ibungona seboksingda hai, makhoibu mi yangkheiromgi kanglup kanglup oina phamthahallu. 

15 Amasung makhoina asum touduna makhoi pumnamakpu phamthahalle. 

16 Maduda ibungona tandum mangap nga ani aduga louraga, swargada yengkhattuna bor pibiraga thugaiduna, miyamgi, mamang mamangda yennanaba seboksingda pibire. 

17 Amasung makhoi pumnamak chaduna mapuk thalle; aduga makhoigida lemhouba machet makai thummuk taranithoi khungatle.


Jisuba Khristamakni haina Pitarna haidokpa amasung Jisuna mahakki siba amasung hinggatpagi wa mangjounana khanghanbiba


18 Asum thoklare, ibungo mathanta haijaringeida, seboksing ibungoga loinarammi. Matung aduga ibungona makhoida hang-i, miyamsingna eibu kanani hainabage? 

19 Maduda makhoina khumlak-i, baptais toubiba Johan, aduga kharana Eliya, tou-i-gumbasung atei-singna, iswargi wa takthokpa aribasinggi maraktagi kanagumba ama hinggatle, hai. 

20 Aduga ibungona makhoida hai, adubu nakhoinadi eibu kanani haibage? Amasung Pitarna khumlak-i, iswargi Khrista aduni. 

21 Tou-i-gumbasung makhoida karma sinnaduna, mi ,kanadasu asi tamthokkanu haina ibungona yathang piraga hai, 

22 Migi macha nipa adu ayamba awa anang phangba tai, ahallammansing, athoiba purohitsing amasung sastragi ojhasinggi yadaba khangba tai, mahakpu hatpa tai, aduga numit humni subada mahak hinggatpa tai. 

23 Amasung ibungona mi pumnamakta hairak-i, kanagumbana eigi itung inninglabadi, mahakna masa matommatabu yajadasanu, mahakki Kros nongma nongma loukhatsanu, amasung eigi itung injasanu. 

24 Maramdi mathawai kanjaningba kanagumba aduna madu mangjagani, aduga eigi maramgi damak mathawai mangjaba kanagumba aduna madu kanjagani. 

25 Maramdi mi amana taibangpal apumba phangjaraga, masamak mangjaba nattraga matkhiba oirabadi, kari tongjabage? 

26 Maramdi eigi damak amasung eigi waheisinggi damak ikaiba kanagumba adugi damak migi macha nipa aduna mahakki, mapagi, amasung asengba swargadutsinggi matik manganda lenglakpa matamda ikaigani. 

27 Tou-i-gumbasung eina nakhoida chumna hairibani, asida lepliba makhoi kharadi iswargi leibak udriba phaoba asibagi mahao khak tang-loi.


Jisugi saklon hongba


28 Amahiksung waging asigi matungda numit nipannirom leiraga asum thoklare, ibungona mahakka loinana Pitar, Johan amasung Jakobpu puduna, haijananaba chingda lengkhatle. 

29 Aduga asum thoklare, haijaringeida ibungogi maithong tongallakle amasung ibungogi phirol ngousu ngoure, langsu langle. 

30 Amasung yeng-u, mi ani ibungoga wa ngangnarammi, makhoidi Mousi amasung Ellya oirammi. 

31 Makhoina matik manganda uhanduna, Jerusalemda thunghanjagadouriba ibungona chatthokpa adugi maramda ngangnarammi. 

32 Tou-i-gumbasung Pitar amasung mahakka loinabasingna tumningbana uirammi, adubu makhoigi mamit phajana singlaklabada, makhoina ibungogi matik mangal amasung ibungoga lepminnaba mi ani adubu ure. 

33 Aduga makhoina ibungoga khainaba matamda asum thoklare, Pitarna Jisuda hanggatchei, ibungo, eikhoina mapham asida leijaba phei; aduna eikhoina khangpok ahum, ibungogi damak ama, Mousigi damak ama, amasung Eliyagi damak ama sasi; mahakna kari hairibano madu khangde. 

34 Amasung mahakna wa asi hairingeida, leichin laktuna makhoibu khanjille; aduga makhoina leichin manungda changlabada kire. 

35 Amasung leichin adudagi khonjel thoklaktuna hai, asi eigi khandoklaba icha nipani; Nakhoi mahakna haiba tao. 

36 Aduga khonjel adu thokpada, Jisu matommata leiba phangle. Maduda makhoina tumnna leire, aduga matam aduda makhoina ukhiba adu kari amata kanadasu tamde.


Bhut changba nipa macha amabu phahanbiba 




37 Amahiksung asum thoklare, hayenggumbada makhoina chingdagi khumtharakpada, miyam yamna ibungoga oknare. 

38 Aduga yeng-u, miyam-dagi nipa amana laorak-i, guru, eigi icha nipabu yengbiyu haiduna ibungobu nonjari, maramdi mahakti eigi amata ngaijaba ichani; 

39 Amasung yeng-u, thawai amana mabu phabada, mana khanglao laorak-i; konggol thokpa phaoba mabu noihatli, amasung thins sokhanduna mangondagi madu thadokningdana thadok-i. 

40 Maduda Jisuna khumlak-i, he thajadaba amasung serannaba miron, eina nakhoiga kaya kuina leiminnaduna nakhoibu khangbigadage? Nacha nipa adu asida purak-u. 

42 Amasung mana laklingeida, bhut aduna mabu inthuduna wana noihatle. Tou-i-gumbasung Jisuna sengdaba thawai adubu khamjinduna, nipa macha adubu phahanbiraga, mabu mapada amuk pibire. 

43 Amasung makhoi pumnamakna iswargi achouba matik aduda ingak ngaklammi.


Jisuna mahakki sibagi waram mangjounana tambiba anirak suba


44 Tou-i-gumbasung ibungona touriba thabak pumnamakta pumnamakna khanjanaringeida, ibungona seboksingda hai, Nakhoidi wasing asi nakhoigi nanakongda hanjillu; maramdi migi macha nipa adubu misinggi makhutta pithokkadouri. 

45 Adubu hairiba asi makhoina khanglamde, amasung makhoina madu wakhal tadanaba makhoidagi thuple; aduga hairiba asigi maramda makhoina ibungobu hangjaba kirammi.


Nollukpa amasung khangbiba


46 Amahiksung makhoigi marakta kanana khwaidagi henna chaobage haiduna yetnaba houre. 

47 Adubu Jisuna makhoigi pukningda yetnaba adu urabada, ibungona apikpa angang amabu paiduna ibungogi nakta thamlaga, 

48 Makhoida hai, kanagumbana eigi imingda apikpa angang asibu lousinjarabadi, eibu lousinjabani, aduga kanagumbana eibu lousinjarabadi, eibu tharakpa ibungo mahakpu lousinjabani; maramdi nakhoi pumnamakki marakta henna pikpa mahak aduna chaobani. 

49 Aduga Johanna khum-lak-i, ibungo, kanagumba amana ibungogi mingda bhutsingbu tanthokpa eikhoina uraduna mahakpu khamjilli, maramdi mahakna eikhoiga loinana chatminnade. 

50 Tou-i-gumbasung Jisuna mangonda hai, khamganu, maramdi nakhoibu yeknadaba mahak adu nakhoigi damakni.


Jisuna Jerusalemgi damak khongsanba amasung Samariyasingna lousinbidaba


51 Amahiksung ibungobu loukbatkadaba matam adu naksillaklabada, asum, thoklare, ibungo masamakna Jerusalem tanna chatnanaba chetna mai olle; 

52 Amasung ibungogi mangda pakhonsibasingbu thare; aduga makhoina chatkhiduna ibungogi damak thourang tounanaba samariyasinggi khul amada changle. 

53 Adubu ibungona Jerusalem tanna lenggadabagi mai onba maramna makhoina ibungobu lousinbide. 

54 Aduga Jakob amasung Johan ibungogi seboksing aduna ubada hai, Prabhu, atiyadagi mei thadaduna makhoibu manghannaba eikhoina yathang piba ibungona yabibra? 

55 Tou-i-gumbasung ibungona ollaktuna makhoibu warakle, (Karamba thawaigi mino haiba adu nakhoi khangde, maramdi migi macha nipa aduna mioibagi thawai manghange haiduna lakpa natte, kanbige haiduna lakpani). 

56 Aduga makhoina atoppa khul amada chatkhre.


Sebok oige haibasingbu chang yengba


57 Amahiksung makhoina asum lambi chatpada, kanagumba mi amana ibungoda hai, ibungona lengba mapham khudingda tung injage. 

58 Maduda Jisuna mangonda hai, lamhuisinggi makhul lei, amasung atiyagi ucheksinggi mahum lei; tou-i-gumbasung migi macha nipa adugi kok thamphamdi leite. 

59 Amasung ibungona atoppa amada hai, eigi itung illu. Adubu mahakna hai, prabhu, hanna ipabu potloinaba eina chatchaba yabiyu. 

60 Tou-i-gumbasung ibungona mangonda hai, asibasingna makhoigi asibasingbu potloinanaba thanammu; adubu nahakti chattuna iswargi leibak koisan sandok-u. 

61 Amasung atoppa amanasu hai, prabhu, ibungogi tung injage; adubu hanna eigi yumda leiribasing adubu khainaba eibu yabiyu. 

62 Tou-i-gumbasung Jisuna mangonda hai, langgonda khutna paire hairaga, tunglomda yengba mi kana amatana iswargi leibakki damak matik chaba natte.

Luk 10 

Sebok humphutarabu thaba amasung makhoi hallakpa


1 Asigi matungda prabhuna atei humphutarabu pham happiduna, ibungo masamakna chatkadaba sahar khudingda amasung mapham khudingda makhoibu ani ani oina ibungogi mangda thare. 

2 Amasung ibungona makhoi da hai, lou lokkadaba yammi, adubu lokpinaba midi yamde; maram aduna ibungo mahakki lokkadaba louda thabak suba mi thabiraknaba lougi mapuda nonjou. 

3 Chatlu; yeng-u, keisalgi marakta yao machagum eina nakhoibu tharibani. 

4 Sengao, paitukhao amasung khugrang kari amata puganu, aduga kanabusu lambida khurumganu. 

5 Amasung nakhoina karigumba yumda changbada, hanna hai-u, yum asida tapthaba oi-sanu, 

6 Aduga mapuda tapthabagi macha nipa leirabadi, nakhoigi tapthaba adu mahakkimathakta leigani, adubu leitra-badi, madu nakhoida amuk hallakkani. 

7 Amasung makhoina piba piba adu cha thaktuna yum adumaktada nakhoina leiyu, maramdi thabak suba mi aduna magi asuman phangba matik chai. Yum amadagi yum amada hongganu. 

8 Amasung nakhoina karigumba saharda changbada, makhoina nakhoibu lousinbirabadi, makhoina nakhoigi namangda khinbi khinbiba adu chao, 

9 Aduda leiba anabasiagbu phahallu; amasung makhoida hai-u, iswargi leibak nakhoida naksillkale. 

10 Adubu nakhoina karigumba saharda changbada, makhoina nakhoibu lousinbidrabadi, madugi lambi lambida chatthoktuna hai-u, 

11 Nakhoigi sahardagi eikhoigi khongda pakpa uphul adumak nakhoigi nathakta sakshi oina eikhoina teithok-i; adum oinamakpu nakhoina asi khang-u, iswargi leibak naksillikle. 

12 Eina nakhoida hairibani, numit aduda sahar adudagi Sodomna henna saphagani. 

13 He Khorasin, nangonda awabanida! He Betseida, nangonda awabanida! Maramdi nakhoida toukhiba toungamdaba thabaksing adu Tur amasung Sidonda touramlabadi, makhoina adungeida thouri phi settuna amasung utta phamduna mapukning honglamgadabani. 

14 Tou-i-gumbasung wayel toubada nakhoidagidi Tur amasung Sidonna henna saphagani. 

15 Amasung he Kaphar nahum, nangdi swarga phaoba wangkhatkadra? Nangdi khamnung leibak phaoba kumthagani. 

16 Nakhoigi wa taba aduna eigi wa tabani, aduga nakhoibu yadaba aduna eibu yadabani, amasung eibu yadaba aduna eibu tharakpa ibungo mahakpu yadabani. 

17 Amahiksung humphutara aduna haraona hallaktuna hai, prabhu, ibungogi mingda bhutsingmaknasu eikhoigi ikha polli. 

18 Maduda ibungona makhoida hai, swargadagi nongthang kuppagumna seitanna taba eina urammi. 

19 Yeng-u, nakhoina lil amasung brischikki mathakta netnanaba amsasung yeknaba adugi panggal pumnamakki mathakta eina nakhoida matik pibire; amasung nakhoibu kari, amatana khak sokloi. 

20 Adum oinamakpu thawaisingna nakhoigi nakha polli haiba asida haraoganu; adubu nakhoigi naming swargada ikhrabani haiduna haraojaro.


Jisuna thagatpa


21 Pung adumaktada ibungona thawai asengbagi mapanna haraojaraduna hai, he ipa, swarga amasung prithibigi prabhu, eina nahakpu thagatchari, maramda nahakna hiramsing asibu asibasing amasung akhangbasingdagi thuptuna thamlaga angang machasingda phongdokpire; hoi, ipa, maramdi masina nahakki mityengda apenbani. 

22 Hiram pumnamak eigi ipana eingonda sinnabire, amasung mapa adu nattana macha nipa adu kanano haiba kana amatana khangde; aduga macha nipa adu amasung macha nipana mangonda phongdokningba kanagumba adu nattana mapa kanano haiba kana amatana khangde. 

23 Amasung seboksingda ollaktuna ibungona lonna hai, nakhoina uri uriba adubu uba mitsing adu yaiphabani. 

24 Maramdi eina nakhoida hairibani, iswargi wa takthokpa amasung ningthou ayambana nakhoina uba adu uninglammi, adubu ukhide; aduga nakhoina taba adu taninglammi, adubu takhide.


Lomba naidaba hingba karam touna phangjagadaba amasung aphaba samariyagi mi amagi pandam


25 Amahiksung yeng-u, kanagumba wayel heiba amana hougattuna, ibungobu chang yengduna hai, guru, eina kari touraga lomba naidaba hingba phangadage? 

26 Maduda ibungona mangonda hai, wayel yathang aduda kari iduna leibage? Karamna pabage? 

27 Aduga mahakna khumlak-i, nangna prabhu nanggi iswarbu nanggi thammoi apumba, thawai apumba, panggal pumnamak amasung pukning apumba yaona nungsingadabani; aduga nangna nanggi keiroileikaibu nasamakkumna nungsigadabani. 

28 Amasung ibungona mangonda hai, nahakna chumna khumle; asi tou, aduga nahakna hinggani. 

29 Tou-i-gumbasung mahakna masa achumba sajaningduna Jisuda hai, phei, eigi keiroi-leikai adu kanano? 

30 Jisuna khumlak-i, Kanagumba mi amana Jerusalemdagi Jerikho tanna kumlaklingeida dakusinggi makhutta tare. Makhoina mahakki maphi marol munbire, amasung mahakpu yeiduna asibagum thanamduna chatthokkhre. 

31 Aduga thoklaba amadagi, kanagumba purohit amana lambi aduda kumtharakpada mahakpu uraduna, lambi-gi nakal amaromda theidoktuna chatkhi. 

32 Amasung matou adugunana Lebiyagi amanasu mapham aduda laklaga mabu uduna lambigi nakal amaromda theidoktuna chatkhi. 

33 Tou-i-gumbasung kanagumba Samariyagi mi amana asum langphei chatlakpada mahakna leiba mapham aduda laklaga, mahakpu ubada nungsiba pokle, 

34 Amasung mangonda laktuna mahakki sokphamsing aduda thao amasung draksha mahi heijinbiduna punsinbire; aduga mahakpu mahakmakki sadonggi mathakta tonghanduna mithungsang amada puraklaga, mahakpu chetna channa toubire. 

35 Amasung hayenggumbada mahakna Dinar ani puthoktuna mithungsang pannaba mi aduda piraga hai, mahakpu chetna channa toubiyu; aduga nahakna chading touba ahenba makhei adu eina amuk hallakpada nangonda singlagani. 

36 Ahum asigi marakta kanana daku-singgi makhutta taba mi asigi keiroileikai oiraba, nahakna kari ningbano? 

37 Aduga mahakna hai, mahakpu chanbiba mahak aduni. Maduda Jisuna mangonda hai, chatlu, nahaksu adugumna tou.


Martha amasung Mariyam


38 Makhoina chatpada ibungona, kari-gumba khul amada lengsille; aduga Martha koubi kanagumbi nupi amana ibungobu mayumda lousinjare. 

39 Amasung Mariyam koubi mahakki manao ama leirammi, mahaknasu prabhugi khuyada phamijaduna ibungogi wa tarammi. 

40 Tou-i-gumbasung Marthana thougan touba yambagi maramna waichille. Aduna mahakna ibungogi nakta laktuna hai, prabhu, ei ithanta thougan tounaba inaona eibu thanamba asi ibungona thousabidra? Maram aduna eibu mahakna pangbinanaba yathang pibiyu. 

41 Tou-i-gumbasung prabhuna mangonda khumlak-i, Martha, Martha, nahakna thabak yambagi maramda langtaknaduna ware; 

42 Adubu thabak amatangdi tanpiphadrabani. Maramdi Mariyamdi mangondagi louthoklaroidaba aphaba saruk adu khandokle.

Luk 11 

Haijabagi marida Prabhuna tambiba


1 Amahiksung ibungona karigumba mapham amada haijaringeida asum thoklare, haijaba loirabada, ibungogi sebok amana ibungoda hai, prabhu, Johannasu mahakki seboksingbu tambibagumna, haijananaba eikhoibu tambiyu. 

2 Maduda ibungona makhoida hai, nakhoina haijaba matamda hai-u, he ipa, ibungo nahakki ming asengba oisanu. Nahakki leibak laksanu. 

3 Eikhoigi nongmagi oknaba chinjak numit khuding pibiyu; 

4 Aduga eikhoigi pap makhei kokpiyu, maramdi eikhoi isanasu eikhoida laman tonba khudingbu kokpi; amasung eikhoibu athembada changhanbiganu. 

5 Amahiksung ibungona makhoida hai, nakhoigi narakta kanana magi marup areiba amada ahing nongyaida chattuna, marup, tandum ahumdang eina pujage, 

6 Maramdi eigi marup ama langpheidagi eingonda thunglare, aduga eina mahakpu pijanaba karisu leijadre, hairabada, 

7 Manungdagi mi aduna, eibu wahan-ganu; houjik thong lolle, aduga ichasingga eiga loinana phamungda hipminnare; eina hougattuna nangonda piba ngamloi, haina khumlakkadra? 

8 Eina nakhoida hairibani, mahak magi marup oirabamaktada hougattuna mangonda piningde, adum oinamakpu mahakki hanna hanna nijaba maramna mahakna hougattuna mahakki kannaba adupki makhei pibigani. 

9 Amasung eina nakhoida hairibani, nijou, nakhoida pibigani; thijon, nakhoina phangjagani; thong yeijou, nakhoida hangdokpigani. 

10 Maramdi nijaba mi khudingmakna phang-i, thijaba aduna khang-i, amasung yeijaba aduda hangdokpigani. 

11 Aduga nakhoigi narakta karamba mapana mahakki macha nipana tal niraga lil pigadra? 

12 Nattraga mahakna yerum niragadi, brischik mangonda pigadra? 

13 Maram aduna nakhoina phattaba oidunasu, nakhoigi nachasingda aphaba khudon piba heirabadi, nakhoigi swargada leiba napana nijaba makhoida kayamuk thoidok hendokna thawai asengbabu pibigadaba!


Jisudi seitan-gi pangbibana thabak touribani haibada Jisuna khumba


14 Amahiksung ibungona marol thoktaba bhut tanthokpirammi. Aduga bhut aduna thokkhrabada asum oirare, marol thoktaba adu thokle; amasung miyamsingna ingak ngakle. 

15 Tou-i-gumbasung makhoi kharana hai, mahakna bhutsinggi mapu Belsabulgi mapanna bhutsingbu tanthokli. 

16 Aduga ateisingna ibungobu chang yengduna swargadagi khudam ama ibungodagi thirammi. 

17 Tou-i-gumbasung ibungona makhoigi, wakhal adu khangladuna, makhoida hairak-i, ningthou leibak khudingmakna masagi manungda nakpak tanarabada amangba thoklei; amasung imung manung amana imung manung adugi manungda nakpak tanarabada leikha tai. 

18 Amasung seitannasu masagi manungda nakpak tanaribadi, mahakki leibak karamna pangadage? Maramdi eina Belsabulgi matengna bhutsingbu tanthok-i, haina nakhoina hai. 

19 Aduga eina Belsabulgi matengna bhutsingbu tanthoklabadi, nakhoigi nacha nipasingna kanagi matengna makhoibu tanthokpage? Maram asina makhoina nakhoigi wayel mapu oigani. 

20 Tou-i-gumbasung eina iswargi khutnaobigi matengna bhutsingbu tanthokpa oirabadi, iswargi leibak nakhoida laklabani. 

21 Akanba mina lan-gi khutlai phijet mapung phana settuna mahakki mayum makei ngaklabada, mahkki mapot machei mangdana lei; 

22 Adubu mangondagi henna kanba aduna laktuna mahakpu ngamlabada, mahakna pambei ngajaramba khutlai phijet apumba adu mangondagi mulli, aduga mahakki mullakpa adu yennei. 

23 Eiga loinadaba mahak adu eigi yeknabani, amasung eiga khomjinminnadaba mahak aduna chaikhai. 

24 Sengdaba thawaina mi amadagi chatthokpa matamda potthapham thiduna ising leitaba lam lamda koichat chatli, aduga karisu phangdaduna hai, eina thoklakkhiba iyum aduda hanjillage. 

25 Amasung mana lakpada madu sittoklamba amasung leitenglamba ui. 

26 Matam aduda mana chattuna mahakmaktagi henna phattaba atei thawai taret puraklaga, changsinduna maduda lei; amasung mi adugi akonbagi phibam aduna ahanbagidagi henna phatlakte. 

27 Amahiksung ibungona wa asi hairingeida thoklare, miyamgi maraktagi kanagumbi nupi amana khonjel wangna ibungoda hai, ibungobu puramba nao-pham adu yaiphabani, amasung ibungona thaklamba khom adu yaipha-bani. 

28 Tou-i-gumbasung ibungona hai, hoi, adum oinamakpu iswargi wa taduna ngakpasing aduna yaiphabani.


Khudam thidanaba paomenba thaomeigi pandam


29 Amahiksung miyamsingna ibungobu omsillabada ibungona haiba hourak-i, miron asi phattaba mironni; khudam thi, amasung Jonagi khudam nattana khudam amata maduda piraroi. 

30 Maramdi Jonana Ninabigi misingda khudam oirakpagumna, migi macha nipa adunasu miron asida oigani. 

31 Makharomgi ranina wayen-gi matamda miron asigi nipasingga loinana hougatlaktuna makhoibu aranbani haina utkani, maramdi mahakna prithibigi aroiba ngamkheidagi Solomon-gi lousing tage haina laklammi; amasung yeng-u, asida Solomondagi henna chaoba ama lei. 

32 Ninabigi nipasingna wayen-gi matamda miron asiga loinana lepkhatlaktuna, madubu aranbani haina utkani; maramdi Jonagi pao sandokpada makhoina pukning honglammi, amasung yeng-u, asida Jonadagi henna chaoba ama lei. 

33 Thaomei thallaga mi kananasu madu arotpa maphamda nattraga thummuk makhada thamde, tou-i-gumbasung manungda changbasingna mangal unanaba thaomei makhong mathakta thammi. 

34 Nanggi hakchanggi thaomeidi namitni; nanggi mitpham chumlabada, nanggi hakchang apumbasu yamna ngalli; tou-i-gumbasung nanggi mitpham chumdrabada, nanggi hakchangsu yamna mammi. 

35 Maram aduna nangonda leiba mangal adu mambra yeng-u. 

36 Maram aduna nanggi hakchang apumba, amamba mapham ilei leitana, phajana ngallabadi, thaomeina magi langna nganbana nangbu ngalhanbagum, madu pumngan ngan-gani.


Jisuna pharisisingbu amasung sastragi ojhasingbu thangjinba


37 Amahiksung ibungona wa nganglin-geida, pharisi amana ibungobu ayukki luk haminnanaba haijei, aduga ibungona lengsinduna luk hanaba phamthare. 

38 Amasung ibungona luk hadringeida hanna chaithabidaba adu pharisi aduna urabada ngakle. 

39 Maduda prabhuna mangonda hai, houjik nakhoi pharisisingnadi pukham tenggotki mapanthangba saruk adu sengdok-i, adubu nakhoigi manungdadi namja namtheknaba amasung phattabana thalli. 

40 Nakhoi apang-basa, mapanthangbabu sembiba ibungo mahakna manungthangbabusu sembiba nattra? 

41 Tou-i-gumbasung manungda leiba pot adu pinou, aduga yeng-u, pot pumnamak nakhoigi damak seng-i. 

42 Adubu nakhoi pharisisingda awaba-nida! Maramdi nakhoina nungsihidak, arud amasung mana-masing khibikki saruk taragi ama katlaga, achumba amasung iswargi nungsibadi thadok-i; tou-i-gumbasung asising asi nakhoina touba tai, aduga ateising adubu thadoktaba tai. 

43 Nakhoi pharisisingda awabanida! Maramdi loisang loisangda makok phamba, miyam tinnabada khurumhanba nakhoina pammi. 

44 Nakhoida awabanida! Maramdi nakhoidi udaba mongphamgumbani, amasung adusinggi mathakta koichat chatpa misingna madu khangde. 

45 Amahiksung wayel heibasinggi kanagumba amana ibungoda khumlak-i, guru, asi haibada nahakna eikhoibusu maithihalli. 

46 Maduda ibungona hai, nakhoi wayel heibasingdasu awabanida! Maramdi puba waba potlum nakhoina misingbu puhalli, aduga nakhoi nasanadi potlum adu nakhoigi khutnaobi amanasu sokte. 

47 Nakhoida awabanida! maramdi nakhoina iswargi wa takthokpasinggi mongpham sai, aduga nakhoigi napa napusingna makhoibu hatle. 

48 Asum touduna nakhoina sakshini, aduga nakhoigi napa napusinggi thabak adu nakhoina iya yabani, maramdi makhoi masamakna makhoibu hatle, aduga nakhoina makhoigi mongpham sai. 

49 Maram aduna iswargi lousingnasu hai, eina makhoida eigi wa takthokpasing amasung pakhonchatpasingbu thagani, aduga makhoina makhoi kharabu hatkani amasung kharabu otneigani, 

50 Haibadi, hebalgi idagi iswargi latnapung amasung asengba sanggi marakta mangkhiba Sakhariyagi i phaoba, 

51 Taibangpal houngeidagi iswargi wa takthokpa pumnamakki i takhiba adu miron asidagi tanba yananabani. Hoi, eina nakhoida hairibani, masi miron asidagi tan-gadabani. 

52 Nakhoi wayel heibasingda awabanidal! maramdi nakhoina maheigi so louthokkhre; nakhoi nasanasu change, amasung changjage hotnariba makhoi adubusu khamle. 

53 Amahiksung ibungona mapham adudagi lengthokkhrabada, sastragi ojhasing amasung pharisisingna ibungogi chindagi karigurnba wa phananaba lumduna, 

54 Ibungobu kanna yeknaba amasung ayambagi maramda panghang hangba houre.

Luk 12 

Jisuna seboksingbu mit-na singhanbiba amasung thougatpiba


1 Matam aduda miyamgi ayamba lising lisingna amana amagi manakta netpa makhei tillarabada, ibungona ihan hanbada seboksingda haiba hourak-i, pharisisinggi hamei, haibadi aphasajaningba adu, nakhoina sajen tou, 

2 Tou-i-gumbasung phongdokloidaba pumkup kupsinba karisu leite, aduga khangloidaba arotpa karisu leite. 

3 Maram aduna nakhoina amambada haikhi haikhiba adu anganbada tagani; amasung achikpa ka kada nakhoina nakongda ngangnakhiba adu yumthak yumthakta laothokkani. 

4 Aduga eigi marup oiba nakhoida eina hairibani, hakchangbu hatlaga, adugi matungda karisu touba ngamdaba makhoibu kiganu. 

5 Adubu nakhoina kanabu kigadage eina nakhoida takpige: hatpagi matungda norokta langsinnaba matik leiba ibungo mahakpu kiyu; hoi, eina nakhoida hairibani, ibungo mahak asibu kiyu. 

6 Peisa anigi damak sendang manga yondra? Amasung makhoi amatabu iswargi mityengda kaoba leite. 

7 Tou-i-gumbasung nakokki nasam pumnamak adu phaoba masing thirabani. 

8 Kiganu, nakhoida ayamba sendangdagi mamal helli. Amasung eina nakhoida hairibani, misinggi mamangda eibu yaba khudingmakpu migi macha nipa adunasu iswargi dutsinggi mamangda mahakpu yabigani. 

9 Adubu misinggi mamangda eibu yadaba mahak adubu iswargi dutsinggi mamangda yabiroi. 

10 Amasung migi macha nipa adugi mathakta wa ngangba mi khudingbu kokpigani; tou-i-gumbasung thawai asengbagi mathakta thina ngangba mahak adubu kokpiroi. 

11 Aduga makhoina nakhoibu loisanggi kanglupsing, luchingbasing amasung angambasinggi mamangda purabada, nakhoina kari karamna khumgadage nattraga kari haigadage langtaknaganu. 

12 Maramdi thawai asengbana pung adumaktada nakhoina kari haigadaba adu nakhoibu tambigani.


Karambagi wa amasung apangba inakkhunbagi pandam


13 Amahiksung miyamgi maraktagi mi amana ibungoda hai, guru, phangpham thokpa adu eiga yennanaba iyambabu haibiyu. 

14 Tou-i-gumbasung ibungona mangonda hai, he mioiba, nakhoigi nathakta wayel mapu nattraga yennaba mapu kanana eibu happage? 

15 Aduga ibungona makhoida hai, cheksillu, amasung karamba pumnamaktagi nakhoi nasa sennajou. Maramdi mioibagi hingba adu mahakki leijaba pot ayamba aduda leiba natte. 

16 Maduda ibungona makhoida pandam ama hairak-i, kanagumba inakkhunba mi amagi lamda yamna chathok leire; 

17 Amasung mahakna mapukningda khallammi, eina kari tousige? Maramdi eigi mahei marong peisinnaba mapham leite. 

18 Amasung mahakna hai, eina asi touge: eigi kei makhei sidoklaga, henna chaoba sagatke; aduga maduda eigi maru amasung ipot ichei pumnamak peisin-ge. 

19 Amasung eina ithawaida haige, he thawai, chahi kuinagi damak nahakki aphaba pot ayamba peisille; potthajaro, charo, thaklo, nungaijaro. 

20 Tou-i-gumbasung iswarna mangonda hai, he apangba, ahing asida nanggi thawai nangondagi louragani; maduda nangna langkhatkhraba pot makhei adu kanagi oigadage? 

21 Iswargiromda inakkhundaduna, mathantagi damak lal peisinba mahak adu asigumbani.


Langtaknadananaba mit-na singhanba


22 Amahiksung ibungona seboksingda hai, maram asina eina nakhoida hairibani, hingnabagi damak nakhoina kari chagani, aduga nakhoigi hakchanggidamak kari setkani haina langtaknaganu. 

23 Maramdi chinjaktagi thawaina, amasung phijettagi hakchangna helli. 

24 Kwaksingbu wakhal tou: makhoina hunsu hunde, khaosu khaode, makhoigi kotsu keisu leite, aduga iswarna makhoibu pijabi ucehksingdagi nakhoidi kaya thoidak hendokliba! 

25 Aduga nakhoi kanana langtaknaduna magi mapunsi aduda khudup ama hen-gathanba ngambage? 

26 Aduna khwaidagi henna pikpa adu phaoba nakhoina touba ngamdrabadi, atei ateigidamak karigi langtaknabano? 

27 Tharosingna karamna houbage wakhal tou, makhoina nomsu nomde, langsu naide: adubu eina nakhoida hairi-bani, Solomonmaknasu magi matik mangal pumnamakta makhoi asigi maraktagi amagumna phijet leitengkhide. 

28 Tou-i-gumbasung ngasi leiriba, hayengdi leirangda thajingadaba loubukki napi adubu iswarna asup ningthijana thonbirabadi, he thajaphattabasa, ibungona nakhoibu thoidok hendokna phi tholloidra? 

29 Aduga nakhoina kari chagani amasung kari thakkani thiganu, aduga pukning chingnaganu. 

30 Maramdi taibang pangi jatsingna pot pumnamak asi thi; adubu potsing asi nakhoida kannei haiba napana khangbi. 

31 Adum oinamakpu ibungo mahakki leibak thiyu, amasung potsing asi nakhoida hapchinbigani. 

32 Kiganu, yao sanggu apishaksa, maramdi nakhoida leibak adu pibiba nakhoigi napana penjaribani. 

33 Nakhoigi areiba adu yonthoktuna pinou; manba naidaba sen-gao nakhoigidamak semmu; haidabi, huranbana naksindaba, tin-kangnasu manghandaba, swarga aduda leiba lal loiba naidabani. 

34 Maramdi nakhoigi lal leiba mapham aduda nakhoigi pukningsu lei-gani.


Mitseng khangbagi kannaba, amasung thajaba dewan-gi pandam


35 Nakhoigi khwang laksinduna, thao-mei thanduna leiyu; 36 Amasung luhongbagi chakkhangbadagi makhoigi mabungona hallakpa matamda thong yeirabada, makhoina mahakki damak thuna thong hangdoknanaba ngaiba misingumba nakhoi oiyu. 

37 Mabungona lenglakpada minasing mitseng khangduna leiramba phangba adu yaiphabani. Eina nakhoida thangei sengna hairibani, mabungo aduna khwangjet laksinduna, makhoibu chanaba phamthahallaga, lenglaktuna makhoibu thougan toubigani. 

38 Aduga mabungona anisuba yuthak amasung ahumsuba yuthak tabada lenglaktuna makhoibu asum phanglagadi, makhoi adu yaiphabani. 

39 Tou-i-gum-basung asi khang-u, yumbuna kari yuthakta huranbana lakkani haiba khanglamlabadi, mahakna mitseng khangduna magi yum adu sagun touhallamloidabani. 

40 Nakhoinasu thourang touduna leiyu, maramdi nakhoina ningdaba pungphamda migi macha nipa aduna lenglakkani. 

41 Amahiksung Pitarna hai, prabhu, ibungona pandam asi eikhoida nattraga pumnamaktasu haibiribra? 

42 Maduda prabhuna hai, adunadi achaba matamda makhoida channaba saruk pinanaba magi mabungona imunggi mathakta pannahan-gadaba thajaba yaba asingba dewan adu kanano? 

43 Magi mabungona lenglakpada adugumna phangba minai adu yai-phabani. 

44 Chumna eina nakhoida hairibani, mahakna mahakki leijaba pumnamakki mathakta mabu pannahanbigani. 

45 Tou-i-gumbasung eigi ibungona lenglakpa thilli haina minai aduna mapukningda hairaga, minai nipasing amasung minai nupisingbu yeiba, aduga chaba, thakpa amasung yu ngaoba hourabadi, 

46 Minai aduna ningdaba numit amasung khangdaba pung aduda mabungo aduna lenglakkani, mabu matup ani thokna kakthatlagani, amasung thajaba yadabasingga loinana magi saruk phanghangani. 

47 Amasung mabungogi ningba adu khanglaga, thourang langdaba amasung mabungogi pamba matung inna toudaba minai adubu cheipham yamna naihanna phugani. 

48 Tou-i-gumbasung mabungogi ningba adu khangdaduna, phuba matik chaba thabak touba minai adubu cheipham kharata naihanna phugani. Amasung yamna pikhiba mi khudingdagi yamna louge haigani; aduga misingna yamna sinnabikhiba mi adudagi makhoina henna nigani.


Matamgi khudam


49 Eina prithibida mei hunthanaba lakle; mei houjik hourabadi, eina pamba karino? 

50 Eina baptais lounanaba baptais matou ama lei; amasung masi thungdriba phaoba eibu kaya insilliba! 

51 Prithibida ingthaba piba eina lakpani haina nakhoina khanbra? Eina nakhoida hairi, natte, hennadum khaidoknanabani. 

52 Maramdi houjik-tagi houna yum amada mi manga leiba adu aniga ahum, ahumga ani khai-doknagani. 

53 Makhoina mapaga macha nipaga, macha nipaga mapaga, mamaga macha nupiga, macha nupiga mamaga, manembokka mamouga manembokka khaidoknagani. 

54 Amahiksung ibungona miyamsing-dasu hai, nakhoina nongchuptagi leichin karakpa ubada, nakhoina hek hai, nong chugani; aduga asumna thok-i. 

55 Amasung khagi nungsit sitlakpada nakhoina hai, meichak kanna saba oiragani; aduga madu thok-i. 

56 Nakhoi aphasajaningbasa, prithibi amasung atiyagi matou adu nakhoina khang-i, tou-i-gumbasung matam asi nakhoina khangba ngamde haiba karigino? 

57-58 Aduga nangga wathoknaribaga loinana mapugi mangda chatlingeida, lambida mangondagi kokpiba phangnaba hotnaro; nattraga mahakna nangbu wayel mapu tanna chinglaktuna wayel mapu aduna nangbu phamnaiba machada sinnaraga, phamnaiba macha aduna nangbu keisumsangda thamjin-gani. 

59 Eina nangonda hairibani, nangna singgadaba aroiba peisa adu singdriba makhei, mapham adudagi khak thoklakpa yaroi.

Luk 13 

Pukning hongnaba insinbiba


1 Amahiksung Pilatna Galilgi misinggi iga makoigi iratpokta totnahhanbagi maramda ibungoda tamliba mi khara matam adumaktada leirammi. 

2 Amasung ibungona makhoida khumlak-i, Galilgi mising asina awaba asi khangba maramna, Galilgi mising pumnamaktagi henna papchenbani haina nakhoina ninglibra? 

3 Eina nakhoida hairi, natte; adubu nakhoina pukning hongdrabadi, matou adugumna nakhoi pumnamak manggani. 

4 Aduga Silohada leiba phura aduna nanduna hatkhiba mi taranipal aduna Jerusalemda leiba mi pumnamktagi henna laman tonbasingni haina nakhoina ninglibra? 

5 Eina nakhoida hairi, natte; adubu nakhoina pukning hongdrabadi, matou adugumna nakhoi pumnamak manggani.


Mahei pandaba heiyit pambigi pandam. nupi amabu potthaba numitta anaba phahanbiba


6 Amahiksung ibungona pandam asi hai, kanagumba mi amagi draksha ingkhonda thaba heiyit pambi ama leirammi; amasung mahakna maduda mahei thiba lakpada phangde. 

7 Maduda mahakna draksha ingkhon suba mi aduda hai, yeng-u, chahi ahum asi phaoba eina heiyit pambi asida mahei thiba lakpada phangde. Masi yantheklo; masina leipakpu aremba oihalliba karigino? 

8 Aduga mahakna mangonda khumlak-i, ibungo, masi kumsisu leijaramsanu, eina masigi akoibada touthoklaga santhi hapchakhige. 

9 Madudagi houna masina mahei pallabadi phare; adubu pandrabadi masi yanthek-u. 

10 Amahiksung ibungona loisang amada potthaba numitta tambirammi. 

11 Aduga yeng-u, chahi taranipal solhanbagi thawaina leibi nupi ama manam ponduna, masa mathanta tingkhatchaba supngam ngamlamde. 

12 Amasung Jisuna mahakpu ubada, kouduna mangonda hai, nupi, nanggi sonbadagi nangbu thadok-pire. 

13 Aduga ibungona mahakki mathakta khut thambiba khudak adumaktada mahak tingkhatlakle, amasung iswarbu thagatcharak-i. 

14 Maduda loisanggi wayel thoudaba mapu aduna Jisuna potthaba numitta anaba phahanba maramna nungaitaduna, miyamda khumlak-i, misingna thabak tougadaba numit tarukni lei; Maram aduna numitsing aduda anaba phahannaba lak-u, potthabagi numit aduda lakkanu. 

15 Tou-i-gumbasung prabhuna mangonda khumlak-i, aphasajaningbasa, nakhoi mi khudingna potthaba numitta magi magi san nattraga magi magi lolla punphamdagi thadoktuna, ising pithaknaba chingthokpa nattra? 

16 Abrahamgi macha nupi oibi, yeng-u, chahi taranipal seitanna pullambi nupi asidi, potthaba numitta apunba asidagi thadokpipham thoktra? 

17 Amasung wasing asi haiduna, ibungogi yeknaba pumnamakpu ikaihalli; aduga ibungona toubiriba asup ningthijaba thabak pumnamakki damak miyam punmamakna haraojarammi.


Hanggam marugi amasung hameigi pandam hingbada changnaba akhuba lamjang


18 Maram aduna ibungona hai, iswargi leibak adu kari manbage? Aduga madu kariga changdamnagadage? 

19 Mi amana louduna mahakki ingkhonda hunjinkhiba hanggam maru amagumbani; amasung madu houraktuna upambigum chaorakle, aduga madugi masasingda atiyagi ucheksingna mahum sarare. 

20 Amukka ibungona hai, iswargi leibak adu kariga mannahan-gadage? 

21 Madudi, nupi amana yam chang ahumda, pumnamak adu kamkhattriba phaoba, louduna happa hamei adugumbani. 

22 Amahiksung sung Jerusalemlomda lenglakkadabagi ibungona sahar saharda, khun khunda tambiduna lallaklammi. 

23 Matam aduda kanagumba amana ibungoda hai, prabhu, kanbiba phangba makhoi adu kharatara? Maduda ibungona makhoida hai, 

24 Akhuba thongda changnaba kanthi hou; maramdi, eina nakhoida hairi, ayambana maduda changnanaba thigani amasung ngamloi. 

25 Yumbuna hougattuna thong lonkhraga, nakhoina mapanda leptuna thong yeiduna, ibungo, eikhoida hangdokpiyu, haiba hourabada, mahakna, nakhoi kadaidagino ei khangde, haina nakhoida khumlakkani; 

26 Matam aduda nakhoina haiba hougani, eikhoina namangda cha-thakpa toujabani, amasung nahakna eikhoigi lambi lambida tambire; 

27 Aduga mahakna haigani, eina nakhoida hairibani, nakhoi kadaidagino ei khangde; eingondagi chatthok-khro, phattaba thabak touba mi pumnamaksa! 

28 Nakhoina Abraham, Isahak, Jakob amasung iswargi wa takthokpa pumnamakpu iswargi leibakta leiba, aduga nakhoi nasabudi mapanda hunjekpa ubada, mapham aduda kappa amasung ya krak krak chikpa oigani. 

29 Amasung makhoina nongpok nongchuptagi, amasung kha wangdagi laktuna iswargi leibakta phamthagani. 

30 Aduga yeng-u, ahanba oigadaba akonbasing lei, amasung akonba oigadaba ahanbasing lei.


Jerusalemgi maramda tengthaba


31 Pung adumaktada kanagumba pharisisingna laktuna ibungoda hai, thoklaktuna mapham asidagi chatthok-u; maramdi Herodna nahakpu hatning-i. 

32 Maduda ibungona makhoida hai, nakhoina chatkhiduna lamhui aduda hai-u, yeng-u, ngasisu hayengsu eina bhutsingbu tanthok-i, anabasingbu phahalli, amasung numit humni subada eibu changkhonhanbigani. 

33 Adum oinamakpu ngasisu, hayengsu, hangchitsu eina chatpa tare; maramdi Jerusalemgi mapanda iswargi wa takthokpa amata mangphade. 

34 Iswargi wa takthokpasingbu hatpa amasung mangonda thakhibasingbu nungna thaba, he Jerusalem, Jerusalem! Yenbina magi mathada machasingbu konsinbagumna, eina nanggi nachasingbu kayatoina konsinningkhiba adubu nakhoina yaning khide! 

35 Yeng-u nakhoigi yum hangna nakhoida thambiramlabani! Amasung eina nakhoida hairi, prabhugi mingda lenglakpa ibungo mahak yaiphabani, haibasi nakhoina haidriba phaoba, eibu sup-u ukhraroi.

Luk 14 

Potthaba numit amada phugam thungba amabu phahanbiba


1 Amahiksung asum thoklare, pharisisinggi mapu amagi yumda ibungona potthaba numit amada luk hanaba lengsinbada, makhoina ibungobu lumlammi. 

2 Amasung yeng-u, ibungogi mangda kanagumba phugam thungba mi ama leirammi. 

3 Maduda Jisuna wayel heibasing amasung pharisingda khumlak-i, potthaba numitta anaba phahanba hounabra hounadabra? 

4 Tou-i-gumbasung makhoina tuminna leire. Aduga ibungona mahakpu paiduna anaba phahanbiraga thadokkhre. 

5 Amasung ibungona makhoida hai, magi macha nipa nattraga san guhada tarabada, potthaba numitta mabu hek chingkhatloidaba nakhoigi narakta kana leibage? 

6 Maduda makhoina waramsing asida amuk khumba ngamdre.


Nollukpa amasung thoujanheiba


7 Amahiksung barton phangbasingna makok phamnaba khandoknariba ura-duna, ibungona pandam ama makhoida hairak-i, 

8 Kanagumbagi luhongba chakkhangbada nahakpu bartton tourabada, makokki phamphamda phamganu; kanana khanggani, nangondagi thoina ikaikhumnaba mi amabu mahakna barton tourambasu yai; 

9 Aduga nahakpusu mahakpusu barton touba mi aduna laktuna nangonda haigani, mi asibu phampham piyu. Matam aduda nahakna ikaibaga loinana makha ithang thang ba phampham adu louba hougani. 

10 Tou-i-gumbasung nahakpu barton tourabada, makha ithang thangba phamphamda chattuna pham-u; aduna nahakpu barton touba mahak adu lakpada, marup, henna mathak thangba phamphamda lengkhat-piyu haina nangonda mahakna haiba yananabani; matam aduda chabada nangga phamminnariba pumnamakki mamangda nahakpu thagatpa oigani. 

11 Maramdi masabu chaohanjaba mi khudingbu nolhangani; aduga masana nollukchaba mahak adubu chaohanbigani. 

12 Amahiksung ibungobu barton touba mahak adudasu ibungona hairak-i, nahak-na ayuk nattraga chak pijabada, nahakki marup mapang, nachin nanao, sagei natei amasung inakkhunba keiroi-leikai kouganu; kanana khanggani, makhoinasu nahakpu amuk barton touduna nangonda laman singlaba yai. 

13 Touti-gum-basung nahakna chak pijabada, lairabasing, asonbasing, khongtekpasing amasung mittangbasingbu barton tou. 

14 Maduda nahakna yaiphaba oigani, maramdi makhoina nangonda laman singjanaba karisu leijade. Maramdi dharmachenbasingna hinggatpada, nangonda laman singbigani.


Chakkhanggi pandam


15 Amahiksung ibungoga chabada phamminnaribasing kanagumba amana waramsing asi tabada, ibungoda hai, iswargi leibakta chaba phanggadaba mahak adu yaiphabani. 

16 Tou-i-gumbasung ibungona mang-onda hai, kana gumba mi amana achouba chakkhangba ama touduna, ayambabu barton toure; 

17 Amasung barton phangbasing aduda, lak-u, maramdi houjik pot pumnamak thourang loire, hainanaba chakkhang chaba matamda mahakna minaibu thakhre. 

18 Aduga makhoi pumnamkna wakhal amata oina kaithokpinaba nijaba houre. Ahanba aduna mangonda hai, eina lou ama leijare, amasung eina chattuna madu yeng-uba tare; eibu kaithokpiyu, eina nahakpu haijari. 

19 Amasung atei amana hai, eina sallaba pot manga leijare, aduga eina makhoidu apha-phatta yengjaruge; eibu kaithokpiyu eina nahakpu hai-jari. 

20 Amasung atei amana hai, eina nupi ama luhongjare maram aduna ei lakpa ngamjadre. 

21 Maduda minai aduna laklaga, mabungoda pao asi tamlare. Matam aduda yumbu aduna saoraduna manai aduda hai, sahargi lamjao lamjaoda, leirak leirakta thuna chatkhiduna, lairabasing, ason-basing, mittangbasing amasung khong-tekpasingbu asida purak-u. 

22 Aduga minai aduna hai, ibungo, nahakki yathang matung inna toujare, adum oinamakpu houjiksu mapham leiri. 

23 Amasung mabungo aduna manai aduda hai, lamjao lamjaoda, leirak leirakta chatkhiduna, eigi yum thannanaba makhoibu tangaiphadana lakhallu. 

24 Maramdi eina nakhoida hairibani, barton phangkhraba mising adu kana amatana eigi chakkhangba asigi mahao tangloi.


Sebok oibagi mamal


25 Adugi matungda miyam yamna ibungoga chatminnarammi; amasung ibungona ollaktuna makhoida hai, 

26 Kanagumbana eingonda laktuna mapa, mama, matu, machasing, machin manao, mache machan, aduga hoi, mahakki masamakpusu tukkachadrabadi, mahak eigi sebok oiba ngamde. 

27 Magi kros pudaba amasung itung indaba mahak aduna eigi sebok oiba ngamde. 

28 Maramdi nakhoigi narakta kanana phura saningbada, madu pumloi loinanaba mamal leibra haiduna hanna phamduna masing thiroidra? 

29 Kanana khanggani, mahakna yumpham houraga loiba ngamdrabada, yengliba pumnamakna, 

30 Mi asina sabadi houre, loibadi ngamdre, haiduna mahakpu noknaba houba yai. 

31 Nattraga ningthou kanana atoppa ningthou amana lan soknaba chatpada, mahakpu soknaba lising kun-ga loinana lakpa mahakpu mahakna lising taraga oknaba ngamgadra haina hanna phamduna wa tanaroidra? 

32 Soknaba ngamdrabadi, atei aduna yamna thapna leiringeida, wa pubasing thaduna channabagi wa haijagani. 

33 Maram asina adugumduna nakhoigi naraktagi magi leijaba pumnamak thadoktaba kana kanagumba adu eigi sebok oiba ngamde. 

34 Maram aduna thum aphabani, tou-i-gumbasung thum adumak mahao mangkhrabadi, karamna haohangadage? 

35 Madu leipakki damaksu leihaogi damaksu kannade; madu hunjekkhi. Tananaba nakong panba mahak aduna tajasanu.

Luk 15


Mangkhiba yao mangkhiba sen


1 Adugi matungda khajana thoubasing amasung papchenbasing pumnamakna wa tananaba ibungogi nakta naksillaklammi. 

2 Amasung pharisisingga sastragi ojhasinggana murum murum sonnarak-i, nipa asina papchenbasingbu yabi amasung makhoiga chaminnei. 

3 Amahiksung ibungona makhoida pandam asi hai, 

4 Nakhoigi narakta mi amagi yao chama leiba adudagi jao ama mangkhrabada, lamjaoda mariphutara-mapal adu thanamduna, mangkhiba adu phangdriba phaoba thirurodaba kanano? 

5 Amasung mahakna madu phanglabada haraoadunw.madu marengbanda thonggatli. 

6 Aduga mahakna mayumda laklabada, mahakki marup mapang amasung keiroi leikaibu kousinduna, makhoida hai, eiga haraominnasi, maramdi eigi mangkhiba yao adu phangjare. 

7 Eina nakhoida hairi, matou asumna pukning hongba kannadaba, dharmachenba mi mariphutara-mapandagi papchenba amana pukning hongba adugi damak swargada haraoba oigani. 

8 Aduga lupa-makhai tara leiba adudagi makhai ama mangkhrabada, thaomei thallaga, yum sittuna, madu phangdriba phaoba thoroidabi nupi kanano? 

9 Amasung madu phanglabada, mahakna marup mapang amasung keiroi-leikaibu kousin-duna hai, eiga haraominnasi, maramdi eigi mangkhiba makhai adu. phang-jare. 

10 Matou asumna eina nakhoida hairibani, pukning hongba papchenba amagi damak iswargi dutsinggi mamangda haraoba oirak-i.


Oktaba macha nipa


11 Amahiksung ibungona hai, kanagumba mi amagi macha nipa ani leirammi; 

12 Aduga makhoigi atomba aduna mapada hai, paba, nahakki areiba eingonda thunggadaba saruk adu eingonda pibiyu. Maduda mahakna maral adu makhoida yennabire. 

13 Amasung numit kharagi matungda macha nipa atomba aduna pumnamak khomjillaga, athappa leibak amada chatthoklakle; aduga mapham aduda mahakna choithokna panduna mahakki areiba adu ichai chaithokkhre. 

14 Mahakna pumnamak chading toukhrabada, leibak aduda akanba chaktangba thokle, amasung mahak watpa houre. 

15 Maduda mahakna chatkhiduna leibak adugi khunjasinggi amada masa napcharure; aduga mahakna mabu ok sennanaba mahakki loubukta thare. 

16 Amasung maha kna okra chaba okchak aduna mapuk thanhanninglanuni, adubu mi kananasu mangonda pibidre. 

17 Tou-i-gumbasung ma masa mathanta hanthajarabada hairak-i, kaya yamba eigi ipagi anekpa naisingna lemthok pathokna chaba phang-i, aduga eidi charam-chatatnaba asida mangduna leiri! 

18 Eina hougattuna ipagi maphamda chatlaga, mangonda haijaruge, paba, eina swargabu yeknaduna nahakki mangda pap toure; 

19 Eina houjik nahakki nacha nipa kouba matik chadre; eibu nahakki anekpa naising amagum sembiyu. 

20 Adudagi mahakna hougattuna, mapagi maphamda lakle. Tou-i-gumbasung mahakna thapna leiringeida, mahakki mapana mabu uraduna nungsiba pokle aduga chellaktuna magi mangaksam kollaga mabu chuple. 

21 Amasung macha nipa aduna mangonda hai, paba, eina swargabu yeknaduna nahakki mangda pap toure; eina houjik nahakki nacha nipa kouba matik chadre. Eibu nahakki anekpa naising amagum sembiyu. 

22 Tou-i-gumbasung mapana minaisingda hai, thuna khwaidagi henna phaba phijon puthoklaktuna setpiyu, makhutta khudop sibiyu, aduga makhongda khugrang tongbiyu; 

23 Amasung anoiba sannao adu puraktuna hatlu, aduga chaduna haraomin-nasi. 

24 Maramdi icha nipa asi sik-hibadagi amuk hinglaklabani; mangkhi-badagi phanglabani. Aduga makhoina haraoba houre. 

25 Matam aduda mahakki macha nipa ahanna loubukta leirammi; amasung mahakna laktuna yum naksillaklabada, pungbina amasung jagoi makhol tare. 

26 Maduda mahakna minaising amabu kouduna, thokliba matousing asi karino, hanglammi. 

27 Aduga mahakna mangonda hai, nahakki nano lak-i, aduna nahakki pabana mahakpu ana ayek leitana phangba maramna anoiba sannao adu hatpi. 

28 Toi-i-gumbasung mahakna saoraduna changningdre. Maduda mapana thoklaktuna mahakpu themjill-ammi, 

29 Adubu mahakna mapada khumlak-i, yengbiyu, chahi asup yamna eina nahakpu khanjei, aduna eina nahakki yathang thou-oidaba khak toujade; adu oirabasu eina eigi irupsingga loinana haraominnanaba hameng macha amatasu nahakna eingonda khak pibidri. 

30 Tou-i-gumbasung nacha nipa asina oktabisingga loinaduna nahakki lal chathoklaga lakpada, nahakna magi damak anoiba san-nao adu hatpire. 

31. Maduda mapana mangonda hai, angang, nangdi itattattana eiga leiminnei, aduga eigi leiriba pumnamak adu nang-gini. 

32 Tou-i-gumbasung masi harao nungaigadabamakni, maramdi nanao asidi sikhibadagi hinglaklabani; mangkhi-badagi phanglabani.

Luk 16 

Chumdaba dewan amasung lanthumgi ma rida Jisuna tambiba


1 Amahiksung ibungona seboksingdasu hai, dewan thamba kanagumba inakkhunba mi ama leirammi; aduga mahakki dewan adu magi mapot machei manghalli haina mangonda hullei. 

2 Maduda mahakna mabu kouduna hai, eina nanggi maramda tariba asi karino? Nanggi dewan-gi thabakki chaga-chading piyu, maramdi nangna amuk hanna dewan oiba ngamlroi. 

3 Aduga dewan aduna puknungda hairak-i, eigi ibungona eingondagi dewan-pham louthokpasida eina kari tougadage? Eina leipak touge ipanggal leijade, nige ikai. 

4 Eibu dewanpham asidagi inthoklabada, makhoina makhoigi yum yumda eibu changhannanaba, kari tougadage eina khangle. 

5 Amasung mabungogi lal tonba khudingbu mangonda kouduna, ahanba aduda mahakna hai, nangna ibungogi kaya tollibano? 

6 Mahakna hai, thao chang chama. Maduda mahakna mangondahai, nahakki a-iba du lou, thuna phamthaduna yangkhei isillu. 

7 Matung aduda mahakna atei amada hai, nangna kaya tollibano? Mahakna hai, gehu chang chama. Mahakna mangonda hai, nahakki a-iba adu lou, mariphu isillu. 

8 Amasung dharmachendaba dewan aduna singna toukhiba maramna mabungona mahakpu thagatle; maramdi anganbagi machasingdagi taibangpanba asigi machasingna makhoi makhoigi miron-gi damak henna sing-i. 

9 Amasung eina nakhoida hairibani, dharma oidabagi lanna nasa nasagi marup ling-u, adugadi madu loikhrabada, makhoina nakhoibu lombanaidaba leipham leiphamda lousinbinabani, 

10 Thabak apisakta thajaba yaba mahak adubu ayambadasu thajaba yabani, amasung thabak apisakta dharma chendaba mahak aduna ayambadasu dharmachendabani. 

11 Maram asina nakhoibu dharma oidaba landa thajaba yadrabadi, kanana achumba lal adu nakhoida sinnagadage? 

12 Amasung nakhoibu atei amagi oiba aduda thajaba yadrabadi, kanana nakhoigi oiba adu nakhoida pibigadage? 

13 Nai kananasu mapu anigi thougan touba ngamde; maramdi amabu tukkacharaga ama bu nungsigani, nattraga amagidamak leplaga amabu thou-oiroi. Nakhoina iswar amasung lan-gi minai oiba ngamde. 

14 Amahiksung sen pamganba oiriba pharisisingna waram pumnamak asi taduna, makhoina ibungoda machin peithoktuna karemnarammi. 

15 Amasung ibungona makhoida hai, misinggi mityengda nakhoi nasana dharmachenbani haina utli, adubu iswarna nakhoigi thammoi khang-i; maramdi misinggi marakta awangba oiba adu iswargi mityengdabi tukkachabani. 

16 Wayel yathang amasung iswargi wa takthokpasing Johan-gi matam phaoba leirammi. Matam adudagi iswargi leibakki aphaba wapao sandoklibani, amasung mi khudingna maduda kanthi houna changlibani. 

17 Tou-i-gumbasung wayel yathang adugi bindu ama soibadagi swarga amasung prithibi mangkhibana henna lai. 

18 Magi nupi khainaduna, atoppa amabu luhongba mi khudingna nupi lannaba thabak tou-i, amasung mawaga khainarabibu luhongba mahak aduna nupi lannaba thabak tou-i. 

19 Matam amada kanagumba inakk-hunba ama leirammi, aduga mahakna memanba amasung ananba limon phi settuna, numit khuding harao tayamna pallammi. 

20 Amasung masa pumba patpa Lasar kouba kanagumba chakniba amabu mahakki konthongda thamlammi. 

21 Aduga mana inakkhunbagi mejadagi ata ataba aduna mapuk thalhanjaninglammi, hoi huisingnasu laktuna magi apatpa adu lek-i. 

22 Amahiksung asum thoklare, chakniba adu sire, amasung swargadutsingna Abrahamgi thabakta mahakpu pukhre; aduga inakkhunba mi adusu siraduna phumle. 

23 Amasung mahakna khamnung leibakta wana leiduna mamit yengkhatpada, thapna Abrahambu amasung mahakki thabakta Lasarbu ui. 

24 Maduda mahakna kourak-i, ipa Abraham, eibu nungsibiyu, aduga Lasarna mahakki khudonbi matol adu isingda luptuna eigi irei inghannanaba mahakpu thabiyu; maramdi eina meiri asida awaba khangli. 

25 Tou-i-gumbasung Abrahamna hai, angang, nangna hinglingeida nanggi nungaiba phangkhi, aduga Lasarna adugumna phattaba phangkhi; adubu houjik asida mahakna ingthare, aduga nangdi awaba khangli; madu ningsing-u. 

26 Asigi mathaktasu mapham asidagi nakhoi tanna lanthokningbasingna lanthokpa ngamdananaba, aduga mapham adudagi eikhoi tanna kananasu lallaktananaba, eikhoiga nakhoigagi marakta achouba khong ama lengdana lei. 

27 Amasung mahakna hai, maram aduna, ipa, nahakna pabagi yumda mahakpu thabinanaba eina nahakpu non-jari, 

28 Maramdi eigi ichin inao manga lei. Makhoinasu awaba mapham asida laktananaba, mahakna makhoida phajana sakshi pibinanabani. 

29 Tou-i-gumbasung Abrahamna hai, makhoigida Mousi amasung iswargi wa takthokpasing lei; makhoigi wa tajasanu. 

30 Aduga mahakna hai, natte, ipa Abraham, adubu asibasinggi maraktagi kanagumbana makhoida chatlabadi, makhoina pukning honggani. 

31 Maduda mahakna mangonda hai, makhoina Mousigi amasung iswargi wa takthokpasinggi wa tadrabadi, asiba-singgi maraktagi kanagumbana hinggatlabasu, makhoibu thajanaba themba yaroi.

Luk 17 

Jisugi paotak khara


1 Amahiksung ibungona seboksingda hai, khudi thipham thoktaba yade; adubu khudi thiba thokhanba mi aduda awabanida! 

2 Mahakna apikpa angangsing asigi amabu khudi thihanbadagi magi mangakta chakri nung thangduna samadruda hunthabana mahakki damak phei. 

3 Nakhoi nasana cheksillu; nachin nanao amana lallabadi, mahakpu warak-u; aduga mahakna mapukning honglabadi, mahakpu kokpiyu. 

4 Amasung mahakna nongmada nangonda taretlak lallabada, nangonda taretlak hallaktuna ei pukning hongle hairabadi mahakpu kokpiyu. 

5 Amahiksung pakhonchatpasingna prabhuda hai, eikhoigi thajaba hengathanbiyu. 

6 Maduda prabhuna hai, nakhoida hanggam maru amamuk thajaba leirabadi, nakhoina mananou-u mapal asida mara phuktuna samadruda houru hairabada, maduna nakhoigi yathang illamgadabani. 

7 Tou-i-gumbasung magi minai lou khoiriba nattraga yao selliba aduna loudagi karakpada, thuna lak-u, chananaba pham-u, haiduna mangonda haigadaba nakhoigi narakta kana leibage? 

8 Adugi mahutta, nangna eigi chananaba pot thourang tou; eina chaba thakpa loidriba phaoba khwangjet laksinduna eibu thougan tou; adugi matungda nang chathak-u, haiduna mangonda hairoidra? 

9 Mahakna yathang pikhiba adu minai aduna touba maramna mabu thagatpra? 

10 Adugumduna nakhoida yathang pikhraba pumnamak adu toure hairaga, eikhoidi kannadaba minaisingni, eikhoigi toujagadaba adu eikhoina toujare, haiduna nakhoinasu hai-u.


Kusthi thungba mi tarabu Jisuna phahanbiba


11 Amahiksung asum thoklare, ibungona Jerusalem tanna lengbada, Samariya amasung Galilgi marakta phaorak-i. 

12 Aduga ibungona kari-gumba khul amada lengsinbada, kusthi thungba nipa tara thapna lepladuna ibungoga oknare. 

13 Amasung makhoina khonjel wangna haijei, ibunga Jisu, eikhoibu nungsibiyu. 

14 Aduba ibungona makhoibu urabada, makhoida hai, nakhoina chatkhiduna nasa nasabu purohitsingda utlu. Asum thoklare, makhoina chatna chatna masadu seng-lakle. 

15 Aduga makhoigi maraktagi amanadi mahakki anaba phare haiba ujabada, hallaktuna khonjel laona iswarbu thagatchare; 

16 Amasung mahakna ibungogi khuyada uprakna tuthajaduna ibungobu khurumjare; aduga mahakti Samariyagi mini. 

17 Maduda Jisuna khumlak-i, tara adubu sengdokpiba nattra? Mapal adudi kadai? 

18 Atoppa jatki mi asi nattana iswarbu thagatnanaba hallakpasing phangdabra? 

19 Aduga ibungona mangonda hai, hougattuna chat-chakhro; nanggi thajabana nangbu kanbire.


Iswargi leibak lakpagi wa


20 Amahiksung pharisisingna iswargi leibak kadoungei lakkani haina hangbada, ibungona makhoida khumlak-i, iswargi leibak una una lakte; 

21 Aduga yeng-u, asida lei! nattraga, aduda -lei! Makhoina hairoi; maramdi iswargi leibak adu nakhoigi manungda lei. 

22 Adudagi ibungona seboksingda hai, migi macha nipa adugi numit ama nakhoina uba yamna pamlabasu uroidaba numitsing adu lakkani. 

23 Amasung misingna nakhoida haigani, yeng-u, aduda lei! nattraga, yeng-u, asida lei! Chatsu chatluganu, makhoigi tungsu illuganu. 

24 Maramdi nongthangna atiyagi makhada mapham amadagi kuppana atiyagi makhada atei maphamda nganbagumna, migi macha nipa adu mahakki numitta adugunma oigani. 

25 Tou-i-gumbasung mahakna ahanbada ayamba awa anang amasung miron asina yadaba khangba tai. 

26 Amasung Nohagi haktakta thokkhibagumba, migi macha nipa adugi numittasu adugumba oigani. 

27 Nohana hijao mamingdachangdriba numit phaoba, makhoina chaduna, thaktuna, luhongduna, luhonghanduna leirammi; aduga ising ichao laktuna makhoi putnna-makpu manghalle. 

28 Adugumduna Lotki haktakta thokkhi; makhoina chaba, thakpa, leiba, yonba, mapal thaba, amasung yum saba touduna leirammi; 

29 Tou-i-gumbasung Lotna Sodomdagi chatthapa numitta atiyadagi mei amasung gandhuk chuthaduna makhoi pimmamakpu manghalle. 

30 Migi macha nipa adu phongdokpa numitta maduga mannana oigani. 

31 Numit aduda kanagumbana yumthakta leiba aduga mahakki potcheina imungda leiba, madu louba khumthadasanu; aduga loubukta leiba mahak adu madugumduna hallaktasanu. 

32 Lotki nupibu ningsing-u. 

33 Magi thawai ngaknanaba thiba kanagumba aduna madu manghan-gani, adubu magi thawai manghanjaba kanagumba aduna madu hinghan-gani. 

34 Eina nakhoida hairi, ahing aduda phamung amada mi ani leigani; ama adubu pukhigani, aduga atoppa adubu thanamgani. 

35 Nupi anina chakri takminnagani; ama adubu pukhigani. aduga atoppa adubu thanamgani. 

(36 Loubukta mi ani leigani; ama adubu pukhigani, aduga atoppa adubu thanamgani.) 

37 Maduda makhoina ibungoda khumlak-i, prabhu, kadaidano? Aduga ibungona makhoida hai, asiba masa leiba mapham aduda langjasu pullap leigani.

Luk 18 

Haijabagi maramda Jisuna takpiba


1 Amahiksung makhoina tat-tana haijaba amasung pukning hanthadanaba touba tare hiiba asi khanghannanaba ibungona pandam ama makhoida hairak-i, 

2 Karigumba sahar amada iswarbu kidaba amasung mibu ikaikhumnadaba wayel mapu ama leirammi. 

3 Aduga sahar aduda lukhrabi ama leirammi, amasung mahakna mangonda toina laktuna, eigi yeknababu laman khumbiyu, haijarammi. 

4 Aduda mahakna matam khara phaoba yaramde; adudu adugi matungda mahakna mapu-knungda hai, eina iswarbu kidaba amasung mibu ikaikhumnadaba oirabasu, 

5 Lukhrabi asina eibu otpagi maramna, mana tattana laktuna eibu wahan-nanghandananaba, eina magi damak laman khumbige. 

6 Maduda Prabhuna hai, dharmachendaba wayenba aduna kari haiba tao.
