7 Aduga iswarda ahing nungthil laojaba ibungo mahakki khan-gatpasinggi damak ibungo mahakna laman khumbiroidra? Amasung ibungo mahakti makhoidi damak khangbiheiba nattra? 

8 Eina nak-hoida hairi, ibungo mahakna makhoigidamak thuna laman khumbigani. Adum oinamakpu migi macha nipa aduna lenglakpada prithibida thajaba phanggadra? 

9 Amahiksung makhoidi dharmachenbani amasung atei pumnamakti karisu natte haina masa mathantada thajaba kana kanagumba aduda ibungona pandam asisu hai, 

10 Mi anina haijananaba iswar ningnasangda kare; amadi pharisini aduga atoppa adudi khajana thoubani. 

11 Pharisi aduna leptuna masa mathantada asumna haijei, he iswar, eina ibungobu khurumjari, maramdi eidi namja namtheknaba, dharma chendaba, nupi lennaba atei misinggumba natchade, aduga khajana thouba mi asigasu mannaba natte. 

12 Eidi chayonda anirak chara helli, eina phangjaba pot pumnamaktagi saruk taragi ama katchei. 

13 Tou-i-gumbasung khajana thouba aduna thapna leplaga, swargaromda mamit phaoba pangkhatningde, adubu mathabak yeiduna haijei, he iswar, papchenba eingonda thoujanbiyu. 

14 Eina nakhoida hairi, atoppa adu natte, adubu mi asi dharmachenbani haina singthabiduna mayumda kumkhre; maramdi masabu chaohanjaba mi khudingbu nolhan-gani, aduga masana nollukchaba mahak adubu chaohanbigani.


Jisuna angangsingbu bor pibiba


15 Amahiksung ibungona sokpinanaba makhoina angang apisaksingsu ibungoda pujaraklammi; adubu seboksingna ubada makhoibu cheihatlak-i. 

16 Tou-i-gumbasung Jisuna makhoibu kousinduna hai, eingonda apikpa angangsing lakchasanu, makhoibu khamganu; Maramdi iswargi leibak adu asigumba makhoigini. 

17 Eina nakhoida thanggei sengna hairibani, apikpa anganggumna iswargi leibak loudaba kanagumba aduna maduda supchang changloi.


Lomba naidaba hingba, amasung lanna palhanba


18 Matung aduda kanagumba mapu amana ibungobu hanglak-i, aphaba guru, eina kari touraga lomba naidaba hingba adu phangpham thokkadage? 

19 Maduda Jisuna mangonda hai, nangna eibu karigi aphaba koubage? Amata ngaiba iswar nattana aphaba kanasu leite. 

20 Nupi lannaganu, mi hatkanu, huran-ganu, chumdaba sakshi piganu, napa namabu ikaikhumnou, haiba yathang asi nahakna khang-i. 

21 Aduga mahakna hai, pumnamak asi eina angang oiringeidagi ngakcharak-i. 

22 Amasung Jisuna masi tarabada, mangonda hai, houjik nang thabak ama watli. Nanggi areiba pumnamak yonthoktuna lairabasingda yenbiyu, aduga swargada nanggi lal leigani; aduga lak-u, itung injararao. 

23 Tou-i-gumbasung mahakna waram asi tarabada, mapukning yamna waba oirakle, maramdi mahakti yamna inakkhunbani. 

24 Maduda Jisuna mahakpu uduna hai, inakkhunba makhoi aduna iswargi leibakta kayada luna changgadabano. 

25 Maramdi inakkhunba mina iswargi leibakta changbadagi ut amana yettum manada litpana henna lai. 

26 Madu tabasingna hai, adu oirabadi, kanana aran khubam phangba ngamgadage? 

27 Tou-i-gumbasung ibungona hai, misingdadi oithoktaba adu iswardadi oiba ngaktani. 

28 Aduga Pitarna hai, yengbiyu, eikhoina pumnamak thadokchaduna ibungogi tung injare. 

29 Maduda ibungona makhoida hai, eina nakhoida thanggeisengna hairibani, iswargi leibakki damak mayum, matu, machin manao, mapa mama, machasing oirabasu thadoklabadi, 

30 Mahakna matam asida saruk yamna henna aduga lakkadaba taibangpanbada lomba naidaba hingba phanggani.


Jisuna mahakki sibagi waram mangjounana tambiba ahumlak suba


31 Adudagi ibungona taranithoi adu puthokladuna, makhoida hai, yeng-u, eikhoi Jerusalem tanna kari, amasung iswargi wa takthokpasingna ikhiba pumnamak adu migi macha nipa adugi maphamda ithung thunggani. 

32 Maramdi mahakpu atoppa jatsingda pithokkani, mahakpu noknagani, tachop tachopna laknagani, mangonda tin sitchin-gani; 

33 Amasung thina yeiraga hatkani; aduga numit humni subada mahakna hinggatkkani. 

34 Amasung makhoina waramsing asi kari amata khangde; aduga ngangthokkhiba asi makhoidagi thupna leirabanina kari hairiba adu makhoina khanglamde.


Jisuna mittangba amabu phahanbiba


35 Asum thoklare, ibungona Jerikhoda naksillakpada, kanagumba mittangba ama chak niduna Iambi mapanda phamlammi. 

36 Aduga miyamna chatliba adu taduna, thok-iba asi karino, haina mahakna hanglabada, 

37 Makhoina mangonda takpire, Nasaretki Jisu lengli. 

38 Maduda mahakna laona haijei, Dayudki macha nipa, Jisu, eibu nungsibiyu. 

39 Aduga mangthakhibasingna mahak tuminna leigadabani haina mahakpu cheihatlammi; adubu mahakna thoina henna laojarammi, Dayudki macha nipa, eibu nungsibiyu! 

40 Maduda Jisuna leptuna, mahakpu inakta ching-birak-u haina yathang pire; aduga mahakna naksillaldabada, ibungona mabu hang-i, 

41 Eina nanggi damak kari toubiba pambage? Maduda mahakna haijei, prabhu, eihak uba phangjaningi. 

42 Aduga Jisuna mangonda hai, uba phangjaro; nanggi thetjabana nangbu phahanbire. 

43 Khudak adumaktada mahakna uba phangjare, aduga iswargi matik mangal sonjaduna ibungogi tung injarammi; amasung mi pumnamakna masi ubada iswarbu thagatchare.

Luk 19 

Sakkayana pukning hingba


1 Matung aduda ibungona Jerikhoda lengsinduna madu phaoraklammi. 

2 Amasung yeng-u, maming Sakkaya kouba athoiba khajana thouba nipa ama leirammi; amasung mahakti inakkhunbani. 

3 Aduga mahakna Jisudu kanano yenggadabagi hotnarabasu, miyamna omsinbana ngamlamde, maramdi mahak marep nem-i. 

4 Aduna mahakna mangda chenkhattuna, ibungobu unanaba heibong pambi amada kakhatle, maramdi ibungona lambi adomda lenggadourammi. 

5 Amasung Jisuna mapham aduda lenglaklabada, yengkhattuna mangonda hai, Sakkaya, thuna kumtharo, maramdi ei ngasidi nanggi yumda leiba tare. 

6 Maduda mahakna thuna kumtharaktuna, ibungobu haraona lousinjare. 

7 Amasung madu ubada, makhoi pumnamakna murum murum sonduna, mahakti papchenba nipagi yumda thungnaba changkhre, hai. 

8 Adubu Sakkayana leptuna prabhuda hai, yengbiyu, prabhu, eigi leijaba makheigi tangkhai lairabasingda eina pi; aduga eina kanagumba migi karigumba chumdana lourabadi, saruk mari eina hanbi. 

9 Aduga Jisuna mangonda hai, yum asida ngasidi aran khubam lakle, maramdi mahakpu Abrahamgi macha nipani. 

10 Maramdi migi macha nipa aduna mangkhraba adubu thinanaba amasung kanbinanaba lakle.


Talentki pandam


11 Amahiksung makhoina waramsing asi taringeida, ibungona pandam amasu hai, maramdi ibungo Jerusalem naksillakle, amasung iswargi leibak thuna ugadouri haina makhoina ninglammi. 

12 Maram aduna ibungona hai, achouba sageigi kanagumba amana masa mathantagi damak ningthouleibak ama phanglaga hallaknanaba, athappa leibakta chatkhi. 

13 Aduga mahakna mahakki minai tara kouraga, makhoida mina tara piduna hai, eina laktriba phaoba asina lallonou 

14 Tou-i-gumbasung mahakkileibakki misingna mahakpu tukkachaba maramna wa pubasing mahakki tungda thakhiduna, nipa asina eikhoigi ithakta ningthou oiba eikhoina pamde, haiduna hairei. 

15 Asum thoklare, mahakna ningthou-leibak adu phangladuna hallakpada, mahakna sel pikhiba minaising adu lallonjaduna kaya tongjabano khangnanaba, makhoibu mangonda kouraknaba yathang pire. 

16 Aduga minai ahanba aduna mahakki mangda laktuna hai, prabhu, ibungogi mina aduna mina tara tongjare. 

17 Maduda mahakna mangonda hai, yamna phare, aphaba minai, nangna thabak apisakta thajaba yaba maramna, sahar taragi mathakta mapu oijaro. 

18 Amasung anisuba aduna laktuna hai, prabhu, ibungogi mina aduna mina manga thongjare. 

19 Maduda mahakna mangondasu hai, nangsu sahar mangagi mapu oijaro. 

20 Amasung atei ama aduna laktuna hai, prabhu, yengbiyu, ibungogi mina eina phijetta liduna thamba adu asini; 

21 Maramdi eina nahakpu kijarammi, maramdi nahakti naringjen khaba mini, nahakna thajdaba pot adubu loukhatli, amasung hundaba adusu khao-i. 

22 Mahakna mangonda hai, he phattaba minai, nangmakki nachindagi eina nangbu wayen-gani. Eidi iringjen khaba mini, eina thamdaba adu loukhatli, amasung hundaba adu khao-i haiba nangdi khanglamboire. 

23 Adu oirabadi nangna eigi sel adu sen-onphamda karigi pisindabage? Madu tourabadi, eina laklaga sendoiga loinana loukhatcharamgadabani. 

24 Amasung mahakna manakta leppa makhoi aduda hai, mangondagi mina adu louthoktuna, mina tara leiba mahak aduda piyu. 

25 Maduda makhoina mangonda hai, prabhu, mahak asigidi mina tara lei. 

26 Eina nakhoida hairi, areiba mi khudingda pigani. tou-i-gumbasung leitaba mahak adudagi magi leijariba adu phaoba louthokkani. 

27 Adubu makhoigi mathakta eina ningthou oibabu pamdaba eigi yeknabasing asibu asida puraktuna eigi imangda hatlu.


Jisuna Jerusalemda lola tongduna lengkhatpa


28 Amahiksung ibungona wa asi haiba matungda, Jerusalemda lengkhatkadabagi mang tharammi. 

29 Asum thoklare, ibungona Jeitun kouba chingda taba Betphage amasung Bethaniyada naksillakpada, ibungona sebok anida asi haiduna thakhirammi, 

30 Nakhoigi namangda leiriba khul aduda chatlu; nakhoina maduda changbada kana amatana tongdriba lola macha ama punduna leiramba phanglugani; madu thoktuna purak-u. 

31 Aduga nakhoina masi karigi damak thokpage haiduna kanagumbana nakhoibu hangla-badi, nakhoina asumna hai-u, prabhu aduna masibu kannaba lei. 

32 Maduda thakhibasing aduna chatkhiduna, ibungona makhoida haiba adugumna phangle. 

33 Aduga makhoina lola macha adu thoklingeida, madugi mapusingna makhoida hai, nakhoina lola macha adu karigi thoklibage? 

34 Maduda makhoina hai, prabhu aduna masibu kannaba lei. 

35 Aduga makhoina madu Jisugi maphamda chinglaklaga, lola macha adugi mathakta makhoigi phi thaduna Jisubu tonghalle. 

36 Amasung ibungona asum lenglaklingeida, makhoina makhoigi phi lambida thabirammi. 

37 Houjik ibungona asum naksillak-pada, Jeitun chingdagi kumtharamdaida, seboksing mayam pumnamakna ukhiba toungamdaba thabak pumnamakki maramda haraoba amasung khonjel wangna iswarbu thagatchaba houraduna hai, 

38 Prabhugi mingda lengbirakliba ningthou adu yaiphabani! 

39 Aduga miyam adudagi pharisising kharana ibungoda hai, guru, nahakki seboksingbu warak-u. 

40 Maduda ibungona khumlak-i, eina nakhoida hairibani, makhoi asina tuminna leirabadi, nung makheina laothokkani.


Jisuna Jerusalemgi maramda tengthaba. Jisuna iswar Ningnasang sengdokpa 




41 Amahiksung ibungona naksillakpada, sahar adu uraga, madugi maramda kaptuna hai, 

42 Nangna numit asida, nangmakna, ingthaba oibagi thabak adu khanglamlabadi! Adubu houjikti nanggi mityengdagi madu thuptuna leiri. 

43 Maramdi nathakta asigumba numitsing lakkani, haibadi, nanggi yeknabasingna nanggi akoibada pal saraga, koisinduna, maikei khudingmakta nangbu thingjillagani; 

44 Amasung nangga nanggi manunggi nachasinggabu leipakta inthuragani, aduga nanggi manungda nung amabu amagi mathakta makhoina thanamlaroi; maramdi nangbu mityeng tabiba matam adu nangna khanglamde. 

45 Adugi matungda ibungona iswar ningnasangda lengsillaga, yollibasingbu tanthokpa houraduna, makhoida hai, 

46 Masi ikhre, amasung eigi sang haijanaba sang oigani, adubu nakhoina madu dakusinggi makol oihalle. 

47 Amahiksung ibungona iswar ningnasangda numit khuding tambirammi. Tou-i-gumbasung athoiba purohitsing, sastragi ojhasing amasung athoiba misingna ibungobu manghannaba thirammi; 

48 Adubu kari tougadage haiba makhoina phanglamde, maramdi mi pumnamakna ibungoda pukning changna tarammi.

Luk 20 

Jisugi matikki maramda wahang


1 Nongma numit amada asum thoklare, ibungona iswar ningnasangda misingbu tambiduna aphaba wapao sandoklingeida, athoiba purohitsing amasung sastragi ojhasing ahallamansingga loinana ibungogi nakta khanghoudana laktuna, 

2 Ibungoda hairei, eikhoida hai-u, nangna natik kari leiduna hiramsing asi touribano? Amasung matik asi nangonda pibiba kanano? 

3 Aduda ibungona makhoida khumlak-i, eisu nakhoida wahang ama hangge; aduga madu eingonda hai-u, 

4 Johanna baptais touramba adu swar-gadagira, nattraga misingdagira? 

5 Amasung makhoi masen khannarammi, eikhoina swargadagini hairagadi mana haigani, adu oirabadi nakhoina mabu karigi thajadabage? 

6 Tou-i-gumbasung eikhoina misingdagini hairagadi, mi pumnamakna eikhoibu nungna thagani; maramdi makhoina Johanbu iswargi wa takthokpa amani haina thajei. 

7 Aduna makhoina, kadaidagino khangde, haina khumle. 

8 Amasung Jisuna makhoida hai, kari itik leiduna eina hiramsing asi toubage haiba adu einasu nakhoida hairoi.


Draksha ingkhon-gi pandam


9 Amahiksung ibungona misingda pan-dam asi haiba houre: nipa amana draksha ingkhol ama koiraga, akoiba misingda madu sandoklamduna, atoppa leibak amada matam kuina chatkhre. 

10 Amasung matam oirabada, akoiba misingna draksha ingkhon-gi maheidagi mangonda pinanaba mahakna minai ama makhoida thakhi; tou-i-gumbasung akoiba misingna mabu yeiraga khut hangna thadokkhre. 

11 Aduga mahakna atoppa minai ama amuk thakhi; madubu makhoina yeiraga, lakchana touduna khut hangna thadokkhre. 

12 Amasung mahakna ahumsuba amuk thakhi; masibusu makhoina ihang naihang sahanduna langthokkhre. 

13 Maduda draksha ingkhon-gi mapu aduna hai, eina kari tougadage? Eina eigi icha nipa nungsiraba adubu thage; makhoina mabu ikaikhumnaba yai. 

14 Tou-i-gumbasung akoiba mising aduna mahakpu ubada, makhoi amaga amaga khannaduna hai, masi yumlep-charani; magi phangpham thokpa adu eikhoigi oinanaba, eikhoina mabu hatsi. 

15 Maduda makhoina mahakpu draksha ingkhondagi langthoktuna hatle. Maram aduna draksha ingkhon-gi mapuna makhoida kari tougadage? 

16 Mahakna laktuna akoibasing asibu manghallaga, draksha ingkhol adu atoppasingda pibigani. Madu tabada makhoina hai, adugum khak oidasanu. 

17 Tou-i-gumbasung ibungona makhoida yengladuna hai, adu oirabadi, yum sabasingna channadaba nung adu, madumak chithekki mapi oihallammi, haina ikhiba asi karino? 

18 Nung adugi mathakta tuba khuding adu machet machet kaigani, tou-i-gumbasung masina mathakta taba kanagumba adu uphungumna toigani.


Loipot habagi amasung atei ateigi marida wahang


19 Maduda sastragi, ojhasing amasung athoiba purohitsingna pung adumaktada ibungobu khutphangnana phage haina thire, aduga makhoina misingbu kire; maramdi ibungona makhoigi mathakta pandam asi ngangbani haiba makhoina khangle. 

20 Amasung makhoina ibungobu lumduna ibungogi wangangda phaduna, leibak ngakpa mapugi lakpagi panggal amasung wayel thouda ngamba aduda ibungobu pithoknanaba, masana dharmachenba sasinnaba mikup nahum yengbasingbu thare. 

21 Amasung makhoina ibungoda hanglak-i, guru, ibungo nahakna chumna tambi, takpi, misak mimai yengde, tou-i-gumbasung iswargi lambi chumna takpi haiba eikhoina khang-i. 

22 Keisarda loipot baba wayel kaibra kaidabra? 

23 Tou-i-gumbasung ibungona makhoigi marei- mara adu khangladuna makhoida hai-rak-i, 

24 Eingonda dinar ama utlu. Kanagi makok amasung maming leibage? Makhoina hai, Keisargi. 

25 Maduda ibungona makhoida hai-rak-i, adu oirabadi, Keisargi oiba adu Keisarda, aduga iswargi oiba adu iswarda katlu. 

26 Amasung makhoina misinggi mamangda ibungogi wahei aduda phaba ngamdre; aduga makhoina ibungogi paokhum aduda ingak ngakladuna tuminna leire. 

27 Amahiksung hinggatpa haiba asi leite hairiba saddukising kharana laktuna ibungoda hanglammi, 

28 Guru, Mousina eikhoigidamak ibirammi, kanagumbagi machin mango amana nupi louraga, macha leitana mahak sirabadi, mahakki machin manaona magi nupi adubu louduna, machin manao adugi damak dhara thanamgadabani. 

29 Phare, machin manao taret leirammi; aduga ahal aduna nupi louraga, macha leitana sire: 

30 Anisu banasu ahumsubanasu nupi adubu loure; 

31 Adugumduna taretmak macha thanamdana sikhre. 

32 Akonbada nupi adusu sire. 

33 Maram aduna hinggatlakpa aduda nupi adu makhoigi marakta kanagi nupi oigadage? Maramdi taret aduna mahakpu lourammi. 

34 Maduda Jisuna makhoida hai, tai-bangpanba asigi machasingna luhong-i amasung makhoibu luhongduna pi; 

35 Tou-i-gumbasung taibangpanba adu amasung asibadagi hinggatpa adubu phangnanaba matik chana singthanakhraba makhoina luhongde amasung makhoibu luhongduna pide. 

36 Maramdi makhoi amuk siba ngamde, maramdi makhoidi swargadutsingga mannei; amasung hinggatlakpa adugi machasing oibanina, makhoi iswargi machasing oire. 

37 Tou-i-gumbasung Mousinasu prabhubu Abraham, Isahak amasung Jakobki iswar kouba matamda, asibasing hinggatlakpani haina mana pungba mongsonggi warida mahakmakna phongdokkhre. 

38 Aduna ibungo mahakti asibasinggi iswar natte, tou-i-gumbasung ahingbasinggini; maramdi ibungo mahakki mityengda pumnamak hing-i. 

39 Maduda sastragi ojha kharana khumlak-i, guru, ibungona phajana haire. 

40 Maramdi makhoina amuk hanna ibungoda ichang thouna wahang karisu hangkhidre. 

41 Amahiksung ibungona makhoida hai, Khrista adu Dayudki macha nipani haiba makhoina karamna haibano? 

42 Maramdi Dayud masamakna iseigi lairikta hai, prabhuna eigi prabhuda hai, 

43 Eina nanggi yeknabasingbu nakhonggi khunet oihandriba phaoba eigi yetta phammu. 

44 Maram aduna Dayudna mahakpu prabhu kou-i, aduga mahakna mahakki macha nipa karamna oiribano? 

45 Adugi matungda mi pumnamakna taringeida, ibungona seboksingda hai, 

46 Achonba phi settuna koiningba, aduga miyam tinnabada khurumhan basu, loisang loisangda amasung chakkhangbada makok phambasu pamba, 

47 Lukhrabisinggi yumkei munthokpa, aduga tousinnaduna kuina haijaba sastragi ojhasinggi maramda sajel tou. Makhoi asina henna chaoba maral phanggani.

Luk 21 

Lukhrabigi semkhai


1 Amahiksung ibungona yengkhattuna, inakkhunbasingna makhoigi katchaba adu langeida hunjinba ure. 

2 Aduga kanagumbi lairabi lukhrabi amana semkhai ani maduda hunjinba ibungona ure. 

3 Maduda ibungona hai, eina nakhoida chumna hairibani, lairabi lukhrabi asina makhoi pumnamaktagi henna hunjille. 

4 Maramdi pumnamak asina makhoigi lemthok-pathokpadagi potkatsinggi marakta hunjille, tou-i-gumbasung nupi asina magi leitabadudagi magi leijaramba hingnaba pumnamak hunjille.


Jerusalem manglagadaba amasung jugki aroiba Jisuna mangjounana khanghanba


5 Amasung ningthijaba nung amasung potkatna kaya leitengliba haiduna iswar ningnasanggi maramda kana kanagumbana ngangbada, ibungona hai, 

6 Nakhoina yengliba potsing asigi maramda, asigumba numitsing lakkani, maduda nung amabu amagi mathakta asida ningkhaihandana thanamlaroi. 

7 Aduda makhoina ibungoda hanggat-charak-i, guru, maram aduna hiramsing asi kadoungei thokkadage? Aduga hiramsing asi thoklamdaida khudam kari oiga-doge? 

8 Amasung ibungona hai, nakhoibu serannana lamjingdanaba cheksillu; maramdi, ei mahakni, aduga, matam adu naksillakle, haiduna ayambana eigi imingda lakkani. Nakhoina makhoigi tung in-ganu. 

9 Amasung nakhoina lal amasung maranghouba tarabada thukkatkanu; maramdi hiramsing asi hanna thoklaba tai, adubu aroiba adu khudak adumakta natte, 

10 Matam aduda ibungona makhoida hai, jat amana jat amagi mathakta amasung ningthou-leibak amana ningthou-leibak amagi mathakta hourakkani; 

11 Aduga akan akanba yuharaba, tongan tonganba maphamda chaktangba amasung laina makhal makha ayamba thokkani; aduga aki akhang amasung atiyadagi achou achouba khudam oiragani. 

12 Tou-i-gumbasung pumnamak asi thoktringeida, makhoina nakhoibu khut phangnana phaduna ot-neigani; makhoina nakhoibu loisangda amasung keisumsangda pithoktuna, eigi iminggi damak ningthousing amasung leibak ngakpasinggi mamangda nakhoibu pukhatkani. 

13 Sakshi pinanabagi damak nakhoida masi thoklaragani. 

14 Maram aduna nakhoina khumgadaba adu ahanbada wakhal touroi haiduna napukningda lep-u. 

15 Maramdi nakhoigi yeknaba punmnamakna nakhoigi nathakta leppa nattraga ngangba ngammoidaba chin amasung lousing eina nakhoida pibigani. 

16 Tou-i-gumbasung nama napa, nachin nanao, sagei natei, marup mapang phaobanasu nakhoibu pithokkani; aduga nakhoi kana kanagumbabu makhoina hathangani; 

17 Amasung mi pumnamakna nakhoibu eigi minggi damak tukkachagani. 

18 Adubu nakhoigi kokki sam mana amata mangloi. 

19 Nakhoigi khangheibana nakhoina nakhoigi hingba phangjagani. 

20 Tou-i-gumbasung nakhoina Jerusalembu lanmisingna koisilliba ubada, matam aduda magi mang-takkadaba naksillakle haina khang-u. 

21 Adudadi Jihudiyada leiba makhoi chingda chenthoksanu, konung manungda leiba makhoi madudagi thokkhisanu, aduga lawaida leiba makhoi maduda changdasanu; 

22 Maramdi ikhiba pumnamak adu thungnanaba, laman khumbagi numitsing adu asini. 

23 Masa mirol bising amasung khomnouribising adudi matam aduda awa-nungsibanida! Maramdi prithibida thoidokna mipal thiragani, amasung mising asida asaoba oiragani. 

24 Aduga makhoina kabakthanggi mayada taragani, makhoibu phaduna jat punmamakta pukhigani, amasung atoppa jatsinggi matam loidriba phaoba Jerusalembu atoppa jatsingna netthagani. 

25 Amahiksung numitta, thada, thawanmichaksingda khudam thokkani; amasung prithibida samadruga ithakkagi ngangbana langtaknaraduna, jatsinggi awa ana thokkani; 

26 Kibagi amasung taibangpanda thokkadaba adu khanbagi maramna, misingna wanthagani; maramdi atiyagi panggal khibikpu nikhangani. 

27 Matam aduda migi macha nipa aduna panggan-ga achouba matik manganga loinana leichinda lenglakpa makhoina ugani. 

28 Tou-i-gumbasung hiramsing asi thokpa hourakpada yengkhattuna nakok thanggatlu, maramdi nakhoigi handokpiba naksinbani.


Mitseng khangbagi kannaba


29 Aduga ibungona pandam ama makhoida hai, heiyit pambi amasung u pambi pumnamakpu yeng-u. 

30 Pumnamaksing yening hullakpada, houjik olangtha nakle haiduna nakhoi nasana uduna khang-i. 

31 Adugum-duna nakhoinasu hiramsing asi thoklakliba urabada, iswargi leibak naksillakle haiba khang-u. 

32 Eina nakhoida thanggei sengna hairibani, hiram pumnamak asi pangthoktriba phaoba miron asi houkhiroi. 

33 Atiya amasung prithibidi mangkhigani, tou-i-gumbasung eigi wasingdi supmang manglaroi. 

34 Tou-i-gumbasung chak moubana, yu ngaobana amasung mipal asigi langtaknabana nakhoigi thamoi lumthahandananaba, amasumg numit adu langgumna nakhoigi nathakta khanghoudana laktananaba, nakhoi nasana sajel toujou; 

35 Maramdi numit adu prithibigi mapham khudingda palliba pumnamakki mathakta lakkani. 

36 Adubu thoklagadouriba pumnamak asi nanthokpa, amasung migi macha nipa adugi mangda leppa nakhoina ngamnanaba matam leiba khibikta nonjaduna mitseng khang-u. 

37 Amahik sung ibungona iswar ningnasangda nungthin nungthinda tambirammi, aduga ahing ahingda lengthokkhiduna Jeitun kouba chingda ibungona yaireklammi. 

38 Amasung mi pumnamakna ibungogi wa tagadabagi iswar ningnasangda ayuk nganta ibungogi maphamda laklammi.

Luk 22 

Jihudagi tharou. Ikon konba chakkhangba


1 Adugi matungda aran-chakkhangba kouba hamei yaodaba talchakkhangba adu naksilaklammi. 

2 Aduga athoiba purohitsing amasung sastragi ojhasingna ibungobu karamna hatpa yagadage haiduna thirammi; maramdi makhoina misingbu kiduna leirammi. 

3 Amahiksung taranithoi adugi marakta masing chanba Iskariyot kouba Jihuda aduda seitanna changle. 

4 Aduna mahakna chatkhiduna athoiba purohitsingga thongngaklensingga loinana ibungobu makhoida karamna pithokkadage haina ngangnare. 

5 Maduda makhoina haraoraduna mangonda sel pinaba wa lepnare. 

6 Aduga mahakna yaraduna, miyam leitaba matamda ibungobu makhoida pithoknaba khudong chaba thiba hourammi. 

7 Adudagi hamei yaodaba talchakkhangbagi numit, haibadi, aranchakkhangbagi yao macha hatkadaba numit adu lakle. 

8 Aduga ibungona Pitar amasung John thakhiduna hai, eikhoina chananaba aran-chakkhangba adu eikhoigi damak chattuna thourang touru. 

9 Aduga makhoina ibungoda hai, eikhoina kadaida tourang toujaba ibungona pambage? 

10 Maduda ibungona makhoida hai, yeng-u, nakhoina saharda changbada, mi amana isingpul puduna nakhoibu oknagani; mahakna changba yum aduda matung induna chang-u. 

11 Aduga nakhoina yum adugi mapuda hai-u, guruna nangonda hai, eina eigi seboksingga loinana aran-chakkhangba chananaba ka adu kadaidano? 

12 Maduda thourang langlaba mathak thangba ka achouba ama mi aduna nakhoibu uhan-gani; mapham aduda thourang tou. 

13 Amasung makhoina chatkhiduna, ibungona makhoida haikhiba adugum phangladuna, makhoina aran chakkhangba adu thourang toure. 

14 Amahiksung pung adu oirabada, ibungona pakhoncbatpasingga loinana phamthare. 

15 Maduda ibungona makhoida hai, eina awa anang khangdringeida, yamna pamna aran-chakkhangba asi eina nakhoiga chaminnaningle. 

16 Maramdi eina nakhoida hairibani, iswargi leibak aduda masi thungdriba phaoba eina masi chararoi. 

17 Amasung ibungona tenggot paikhattuna thagatcharaga hai, asi loudina nakhoigi narakta yennou; 

18 Maramdi eina nakhoida hairi, iswargi leibak laktriba phaoba, houjiktagi houna eina draksha maheidagi thaklaroi. 

19 Aduga ibungona tal louduna thagatcharaga, madu thugaire, amasung makhoida piduna hai, masi nakhoigi damak piraba eigi hakchangni, eibu ningsingnanba asi tou. 

20 Amasung chaba loirabada, matou adugumna tenggot louduna hai, tenggot asidi nakhoigi damak tabikhraba eigi ina semba, anouba wa lepnabani. 

21 Tou-i-gumbasung yeng-u, eibu pithokliba mi adugi makhut mejda eiga leiminnari. 

22 Maramdi tamlakpa matung inna migi macha nipa aduna chatlibani; tou-i-gumbasung pithokpa mi aduda awabanida. 

23 Maduda thabak asi tougadouriba adu makhoigi marakta kana oigadaba haiduna makhoi masen hangnaba houre.


Achumba Achouba


24 Amahiksung makhoigi marakta kanabu khwaidagi henna chaoba singthanabage haibadu khatnaba houre. 

25 Maduda ibungona makhoida hai, atoppa jatsinggi ningthousingna makhoigi mathakta mapu oibagi thabak tou-i; amasung makhoigi mathakta thoudabasingbu chanbiheibasing kou-i. 

26 Tou-i-gumbasung nakhoidi adugumna oide; adubu nakhoigi narakta henna chaoba mahak aduna atonbagum, amasung athoiba mahak aduna thougan touba migum oiraksanu. 

27 Maramdi henna chaoba adu kanano, chabada phamliba mahak adura, thougan touriba adura? Chabada phamliba adu nattra? Adubu eidi nakhoigi narakta thougan touba migum oiri. 

28 Tou-i-gumbasung nakhoidi eibu chang yengba pumnamakta eiga loinana leiminnakhrabasingni. 

29 Amasung eigi ipana eingonda ningthou-leibak ama sinnabibagurnna, 

30 Nakhoina eigi ningthou-leibakta eigi mejda cha-thakpa yananaba, amasung Israyelgi salai taranithoibu wayenduna phambal phambanda phamnanaba, eina nakhoida ningthou-leibak sinnabi.


Pitarna yaroidaba mangjounana takpiba


31 Simon, Simon, yeng-u, seitanna nakhoibu gehugum niknaba nijare; 

32 Tou-i-gumbasung nanggi thajaba muttananaba eina nanggi damak non-jare; aduga nangna pukning amuk honglakpada, nanggi nachin nanaosingbu chethallu. 

33 Maduda mahakna ibungoda hai, prabhu, eidi ibungoga keisumsang-dasu siba phaobasu loinanaba tourang loijare. 

34 Ibungona hai, Pitar, eina nangonda takpiribani, nangna eibu khang-i, haiba yadaba ahumlak sudriba phaoba, ngasi yellabana khongloi. 

35 Amahiksung ibungona makhoida hai, eina nakhoibu sen-gao, paitukhao, amasung khugrang yaodana thaba matamda, karigumba watlambra? Aduga makhoina hai, karisu watte. 

36 Maduda ibungona makhoida hai, adubu houjikti, sen-gao leiba mahak aduna madu pusanu, paitukhaosu adugumna; aduga karisu leitaba mahak aduna maphi yonduna, kabakthang leijasanu. 

37 Maramdi eina nakhoida hairi, amasung ayol aranbasinggi marakta mahakpu masing challe, haiduna ikhiba asi eingonda thungba tare; maramdi eigi maramgi wa adu loiraklibani. 

38 Amasung makhoina hai, prabhu, yengbiyu, asida kabakthang ani lei. Maduda ibungona makhoida hai, okle.


Getsimanida Jisugi thawai waba amasung ibungobu phaba


39 Amahiksung ibungona lengthok-laktuna, mahousagumna Jeitun chingda lengkhre; aduga seboksingnasu ibungogi tung injare. 

40 Amasung ibungona mapham aduda leirabada makhoida hai, nakhoina athembada changdananaba haijou. 

41 Maduda nung amuk hunba marum thapna ibungona makhoidagi khaidoklaga, khuru khudak kulladuna haijarak-i, 

42 He ipa, ibungona yabirabadi, tenggot asi eingondagi louthokpiyu; adum oinamakpu eigi ningba oidaduna ibungogi oibisanu. 

43 Maduda ibungobu panggal happiba swargadagi dut ama ibungoda uhalle. 

44 Amasung ibungona pukning wamankhraduna henna kanna haijarammi, aduga ibungogi humang adu leipakta taba phamjillaba i matum matum-gum oirakle. 

45 Haijaba adudagi ibungona lengkhatladuna, seboksing tanna lenglakpada, makhoi thawai wabana tumlamba phangladuna, 

46 Makhoida hai, nakhoina karigi tumlibano? Athembada changdananaba hougattuna haijou. 

47 Ibungona wa nganglingeimaktada, yeng-u, miyam, amasung Jihuda kouba taranithoigi amana makhoigi mang thaduna Jisubu chupnanaba ibungogi nak tanna changsillakle. 

48 Adubu Jisuna mangonda hai, Jihuda, nangna migi macha nipa adubu chuppana pithoklibra? 

49 Maduda ibungobu koisillibasingna thoklagadaba adu uraduna hai, prabhu, eikhoina kabakthangna yangadra? 

50 Amasung makhoigi kanagumba amana athoiba purohitki mini adubu yanduna magi yetthangba mana soidatkhre. 

51 Tou-i-gumbasung Jisuna khumlak-i, nakhoina asi phaoba yabiro. Maduda ibungona magi mana sokpiduna, mabu phahalle. 

52 Amasung Jisuna athoiba purohitsing, iswar ningnasanggi thongngaklensing amasung ahallamansing, ibungobu phaba lakpasing aduda hai, dakubu phagadbagum, kabakthangga cheiga loinana nakhoi thoklaklabra? 

53 Numit khuding eina nakhoiga loinana iswar ningnasangda leiringeida nakhoina eibu phanaba nakhut tingthokle. Tou-i-gumbasung asi nakhoigi pung-phamni amasung amambagi matik oiba matamni.


Pitarna Jisubu yadaba


54 Matung aduda makhoina ibungobu pharaga, chingduna athoiba purohitki imung manungda purakle. Tou-i-gumbasung Pitarna thap-in illammi. 

55 Amasung makhoina sumang mayaida mei houduna phamminnarabada, Pitarna makhoigi marakta phamlammi. 

56 Aduga mahakna meinganda phamlingeida, kanagumbi minai leisabi amana mahakpu uraduna, sangtrikna yenglaga hai, nipa asisu mahakka loinarambani. 

57 Adubu mahakna yadaduna hai, nupi, mahakpu ei khangde. 

58 Ngaihak leiraga atei mi amana mahakpu uraduna hai, nangsu makhoigi maraktagini. Adubu Pitarna hai, he mioiba, ei natte. 

59 Aduga pung amaromgi matungda atei kanagumba amana kanna hai, a-oibamak nipa asisu mahakka loi-narambani; maramdi mahakti Galilgi mini. 

60 Tou-i-gumbasung Pitarna hai, he mi-oiba, nangna hairiba adu ei khangde. Amasung mahakna nganglingeimaktada yellabana hek khongle. 

61 Maduda prabhuna ollaktuna Pitarda yenglak-i. Aduga, ngasidi yella-bana khongdringeida nangna eibu ahumlak yaramloi haina mangonda karamna haikhiba, prabhugi wa adu Pitarna ningsinglak-i. 

62 Maduda mahakna mapan thokkhiduna thawai sokna kaplure. 

63 Amahiksung ibungobu pairiba nipasing aduna ibungobu noknaduna phurak-i; 

64 Amasung makhoina ibungobu mit punsinbiduna hanglak-i, nangbu kanana phubage? Takthok-u! 

65 Aduga makhoina atei ayamba athiba wa ibungogi mathakta hairammi.


Ahallupki mangda Jisubu pukhatpa


66 Amasung nong hek ngallakpada, leibakki ahallup, haibadi athoiba purohitsing amasung sastragi ojhasing tinnare; aduga makhoina ibungobu makhoigi ahallup tinbada chinglaktuna hai, 

67 Nang Khrista adu oirabadi, eikhoida hai-u. Adubu ibungona makhoida hai, eina nakhoida hairabasu nakhoina khak thajaroi; 

68 Aduga eina nakhoibu hanglabasu nakhoina khak khumloi. 

69 Tou-i-gumbasung houjiktagi migi macha nipa aduna iswargi panggangi yetthangbada phamgani. Maduda makhoi pumnamakna hai, madu oirabadi, nangdi iswargi macha nipara? 

70 Aduga ibungona makhoida hai, eini nakhoina hairibani. 71 Maduda makhoina hai, eikhoina sakshi amuk kari kannabano? Maramdi eikhoi isana mahakki machindagi wa tare.

Luk 23 

Romgi leibak ngakpa mapu Pilatki mangda Jisubu pukhatpa


1 Adudagi makhoi miyam apumbana hougattuna, ibungobu Pilatki mangda pukhatle. 

2 Amasung makhoina ibungobu theijinba houduna hai, nipa asina eikhoigi jatpu serannahanba, Keisarda loipot haba khamba, amasung ma masana Khrista ningthouni haiduna haiba eikhoina phangle. 

3 Maduda Pilatna ibungoda hanglak-i, nangdi Jihudisinggi ningthoura? Aduga ibungona mangonda khumlak-i, nahakna haibaduni. 

4 Amasung Pilatna athoiba purohitsingga miyamsinggada hai, eina mi asida maral kari amata phangde. 

5 Tou-i-gum-basung makhoina angam tanna hair-ammi, mahakna Galildagi houna mapham asi phaoba, Jihudiya pumnamakta tambiduna misingbu marang houhalli. 

6 Adubu Pilatna madu tarabada, mi asi Galilgi mira, haina mahakna hang-i. 

7 Aduga ibungodi Herodki makha ponba mini haiba mahakna khanglabada, matam asida Herod masasu Jerusalemda leibanina, mahakna ibungobu mangonda thakhre.


Jisubu Herodki mangda pukhatpa


8 Herodna Jisubu urabada, thoina haraore, maramdi mahakna ibungogi marida tabagi maramna, matam kuinadagi ibungobu unaba pamlammi, amasung ibungona karigumba angakpa khudam touba mahakna uninglammi. 

9 Aduna mahakna ibungoda wa yamna hanglammi; adubu ibungona mangonda karisu khumde. 

10 Aduga athoiba purohitsing amasung sastragi ojhasingna ibungogi mathakta kanna wa hunjinduna leplammi. 

11 Amasung Herodna mahakki lanmisingga loinana ibungobu usittana noknare; aduga ibungobu ningthou phijet sethanduna Pilat tanna amuk thakhre. 

12 Numit adumakta Herod amasung Pilat amaga amaga channarakle; maramdi mamangngeida makhoi masen yeknarammi.


Pilat, Barabba amasung Jisu


13 Maduda Pilatna athoiba purohitsing, luchingbasing amasung miyambu sinduna, 

14 Makhoida hai, misingbu serannahanba amagun]mna nakhoina mi asibu eingonda purakle, aduga yeng-u, eina nakhoigi mangda mahakpu chang yengbada, nakhoina theijin theijinba adu mi asida karisu maral phangde; 

15 Hoi, Herodnasu phangde; maram aduna mahakna eikhoida mahakpu amuk tharakle. Aduga yeng-u, hatpa matik chaba thabak mahakna kari amata toude. 

16 Maram aduna eina mahakpu cheirak piraga thadokkani. 

(17 Chakkhangba asida mahakna makhoigi damak mi amabu thadokkadabani.) 

18 Tou-i-gumbasung makhoi pumnamak amata oina laorak-i, mi asibu puthokkhro, eikhoigi damak Barabbabu thadok-u. 

19 Mahakti saharda karigumba wa thokhanbagi amasung mi hatpagi maramna keisumsangda thambani. 

20 Aduga Pilatna Jisubu thadokpa pamduna laona makhoida amuk hai; 

21 Adubu makhoina lao laoduna, mabu Krosta hatlu, krosta hatlu, hairammi. 

22 Amasung mahakna ahumlak suna makhoida hal, karigino, mi asina kari phattaba toukhrabage? Mangonda hatnabagi maram eina kari amatta phang-de; maram aduna eina mabu cheirak piraga thadokkani. 

23 Tou-i-gumbasung ibungobu krosta hatnanaba khonjel wangna niduna, makhoina angam tallammi. Aduga makhoigi laojaba aduna ngamjare. 

24 Maduda makhoina nijaba adugi matung inna tounanaba Pilatna yathang pire. 

25 Aduga wa thokhanbagi amasung mi hatpagi maramna keisumsangda thamliba, makhoina nijariba mi adubu mahakna thadokpire, tou-i-gumbasung Jisubu makhoigi ningba thungnanaba makhoida pithokle.


Jisubu krosta pang tingba, Ibungona siba amasung ibungobu phumba


26 Amahiksung makhoina ibungobu chingthokpada lawaidagi karakpa kurinigi Simon kouba amabu makhoina phaduna, Jisugi tungda kros adu mangonda thong-gatpire. 

27 Aduga mi mayam amasung mathabak yeiduna tengtharibi nupi mayam ibungogi tung illammi. 

28 Tou-i-gumbasung Jisuna makhoida illaktuna hai, Jerusalemgi macha nupisa, eigi damak kappiganu, adubu nakhoi nasagi damak amasung nachasinggi damak kapchou. 

29 Maramdi yeng-u, chaboktabi, khak mirondribi amasung khom khak pithaktribi makhoi adu yaiphabini haina makhoina haigadaba numitising laklabani. 

30 Matam aduda chingjaosingda, eikhoigi ithakta tabiyu; amasung ching machasingda, eikhoibu kuppiyu, haina makhoina haiba hougani. 

31 Maramdi makhoina asangba upambida thabaksing asi tourabadi, akangbadadi kari thokkadage? 

32 Amasung phattaba thabak touba atei mi anibusu hatnanaba ibungoga loinana chinglammi. 

33 Amahiksung makhoina Lukang kouba mapham aduda laklabada, makhoina maduda ibungobu amasung phattaba thabak toubasing adubu, amana yetta, amana oida, krosta yotpi thaduna pangtingle. 

34 Maduda Jisuna hai, he ipa, makhoibu kokpiyu; maramdi makhoina kari touriba makhoina khangjade. Amasung makhoigi marakta ibungogi phiron yenna-duna, makhoina leibak yengnei. 

35 Aduga misingna leptuna yenglammi. Luchingbasingnasu machin pei-thok peithoktuna karemaduna hairammi, mana ateisingbu kanbire; masi khandokpa, iswargi Khrista adu oirabadi, ma masa mathantabu kanjasanu. 

36 Aduga lanmisingnasu ibungogi nakta laklaga, asinba mahi piduna noknarak-i, 

37 Nangna Jihudisinggi ningthou oira-badi, nathantabu kanjou. 

38 Amasung ibungogi kokthaklomda, Jihudisinggi ningthou adu asini, haina iba mingtholsu leirammi. 

39 Amahiksung Krosta yalliba phattaba thabak toubasing amana ibungobu usittana hai, nang Khrista nattabra? Nathantabusu eikhoibusu kallu. 

40 Tou-i-gumbasung atoppa aduna khumduna mabu waraklak-i, nangna chapmannana wakong phanglibani khangna khangna iswarmakpu nangna kidabra? 

41 Amasung eikhoidi chumnamak phangpham thokpani; maramdi eikhoina touru touruba adugi matik okpa mahei phanglibani, tou-i-gumbasung nipa asina nattaba kari amata toude. 

42 Aduga mahakna hanggatchei, he Jisu, Ibungogi ningthou-leibakta youbada ibungona eibu ningsing-biyu. 

43 Maduda ibungona mangonda hai, eina nangonda thanggei sengna hairi-bani, ngasi nang eiga loinana Paradaista leiminnagani. 

44 Amahiksung houjik chaorakna taruksuba pung tare, aduga numitki mangal thupkhiduna, mapalsuba pung tadriba phaoba leibak apumbada mamlakle; 

45 Amasung iswar ningnasanggi asengba maphamgi maikhanphi adu mayaida segaire. 

46 Maduda Jisuna awangba khonjenna laorak-i, he ipa, itha-wai ibungogi khutta sinnajare! Asi hairamlaga, ibungona mathawai thakhre. 

47 Aduga lanmi chamagi mapu aduna thokkhiba adu urabada, iswarbu thagattuna hai, soidana mi asi dharmachenba-ni. 

48 Amasung asi yengnaba tillaba miyam pumnamakna thokkhiba adu urabada, makhoigi mathabak yei yeiduna hannarammi. 

49 Aduga ibungoga khangnaba pumnamakna amasung Galil-dagi ibungogi tung induna loinarakpa nupisingna pumnamak asi yengduna thapna leplammi. 

50 Amahiksung yeng-u, Jouseph kouba ahallupta yaoba aphaba amasung dharmachenba nipa ama leirammi; 

51 Mahakti makhoigi wakhal tounaba amasung thabak touba adu yaramde; mahak Jihudiyasinggi sahar Arimathiyadagi lakpa, iswargi leibak ngairiba ama oirammi. 

52 Nipa asina Pilatki maphamda chatkhiduna Jisugi hakchang nijare. 

53 Adudagi madubu puthaduna, ananba limon phi aman a yomlaga, mi kana amata khak thamdriba, nungda huttoklaba mongphamda mahakna ibungobu thamle. 

54 Amasung masi thourang langbagi numit oirammi, aduga potthaba numit houramdaidani. 

55 Amasung ibungoga loinana Galildagi lakkhiba nupisingna tung illaktuna, mongphamga ibungogi hakchang karamna thamba aduga yengle. 

56 Adudagi makhoina hallaktuna, manam nungsiba pot amasung teinathao thourang toure. Aduga potthaba numittadi makhoina yathang matung inna potthare.

Luk 24 

Jisuna hinggatpa


1 Tou-i-gumbasung chayon-gi ahanba numitta ayuk nganna thourang langkhraba manam nungsiba pot adu puraktuna mongpham tanna lakle. 

2 Amasung mongphamdagi nung adu onthokkhiramba makhoina phangle. 

3 Aduga makhoina changbada prabhu Jisugi hakchang adu phangde. 

4 Amasung makhoina adugi maramda langtaknaringeida, asum thoklare, yeng-u, tagup tarengba phi setpa nipa ani makhoigi manakta hek leplare. 

5 Aduga makhoina kimankhraduna, leipakta maru lukthabada, nipa ani aduna makhoida hai, asibagi marakta ahingbabu nakhoina karigi thiribage? 

6 Ibungodi asida leitre; tou-i-gumbasung ibungobu hinggatpikhre. Ibungona Galilda leiringeimakta nakhoida haikhiba adu ningsingu. 

7 Migi macha nipa adubu papchenba misinggi makhutta pithoktuna Krosta hatpa tai, amasung ibungona numit humni subada hinggatpa tai, haikhi. 

8 Maduda makhoina ibungogi wa mak-hei adu ningsinglakle, 

9 Amasung makhoina mongphamdagi hallaktuna maram pumnamak asi taramathoi adudasu atei pumnamaktasu tamle. 

10 Makhoi adudi Magdalini Mariyam, Johana, amasung Jakobki mama Mariyam oirammi; Makhoina loinabi nupi ateisingnasu maramsing asi pakhonchatpasingda tamlanuni. 

11 Amasung waheising asi makhoigi mityengda pangngang ngangbagumba masak ama oire; aduna makhoina makhoibu thajaramde. 

12 Tou-i-gumbasung Pitarna hougattuna mongpham tanna chenkhre, aduga mahakna nonthaduna yengsinbada, limon phi aduta ure; amasung thokkhiba aduda ngakladuna mark mayum tanna chatkhre.


Jisuna Emmayu tanaba lambida unhanba


13 Amahiksung yeng-u, numit adumakta makhoigi maraktagi mi ani Jerusalemdagi mail taretlom thappa Emmayu kouba khul amada chatlammi. 

14 Maduda makhoina thokkhiba pumnamak adugi maramda amaga amaga ngangnarammi. 

15 Amasung makhoina ngangnaduna hangdok hangjin tounaringeida, asum thoklare, Jisu masamak naksillak-tuna, makhoiga loinaba chatminnarammi. 

16 Tou-i-gumbasung makhoina ibungobu khangdananaba makhoigi mamit serannahanbirammi. 

17 Aduga ibungona makhoida hai, nakhoina chatna chatna amaga amaga ngangnasanariba asi karino? Maduda makhoina awaba sak oina chapleple. 

18 Amasung makhoigi marakta Kliyopa kouba amana ibungoda khumlak-i, numitsing asigi manungda Jerusalemda thokkhi thokkiba adu khangdana, nahak nathanta maduda lamlanbu oirubra? 

19 Amasung ibungona makhoida hai, kari kari thokkhibage? Aduga makhoina ibungoda hai, iswarbu amasing mi pumnamakki mamangda thabak amasung waheida pangganba, iswargi wa takthokpa oiraba, Nasaretki Jisugi maram, 

20 Haibadi, athoiba purohitsing amasung eikhoigi luchingbasingna karamna ibungobu sibagi maranda pithoklage Krosta hatkhibage haibasini. 

21 Tou-i-gumbasung Israyelbu handokpigadaba adu ibungomakni haina eikhoidi ninglammi. Hoi, asi pumnamakki mathaktasu thabak makhei asi thokkhiba ngasina humni subani. 

22 Amukkasu eikhoigi iraktagi nupi kharana mongphamda nganna chatluduna eikhoibu ngakhalle; 

23 Amasung makhoina ibungogi hakchang phangdrabada, ibungodi hing-i haiba swargadutsingbu makhoina manggum urak-i haina hairei. 

24 Amasung eikhoiga loinaba kana kanagumbana mongphamda chatluduna, nupising aduna hairaba adugumna phangle, adubu makhoina ibungobudi ude. 

25 Maduda ibungona makhoida hai, he apangba amasung iswargi wa takthokpasingna haikhiba pumnamak thajabada pukning thinba misa! 

26 Khrista aduna awaba asi khanglaga, ibungogi matik manganda changba tadabra? 

27 Aduga Mousidagi amasung iswargi wa takthokpa pumnamaktagi houduna ibungo masagi maramda sastra pumnamakta leiba adu ibungona makhoida handokpire. 

28 Amasung makhoina chatkadaba khul adu naksillakpada, ibungona amuk chatkhatkadabagum toure. 

29 Aduna makhoina ibungobu kanna haijare, eikhoiga loinana leibiyu, maramdi numi-dangwai oire aduga numit yamna thengkhre. Maduda ibungona makhoiga leiminnanaba lengsille. 

30 Amasung ibungona makhoiga loinana channaba phamtharabada asum thoklare, ibungona tandum adu louraduna bor pibire, aduga madu thugaiduna makhoida pire, 

31 Amasung makhoigi mamit pangthokhalle, aduga makhoina ibungobu khanglakle; maduda ibungona makhoidagi mangkhre. 

32 Amasung makhoina amaga amaga hainei, ibungona lambida eikhoiga ngangnabada aduga eikhoida sastragi wa handokpiringeida eikhoigi thammoi chaklamdra? 

33 Adudagi makhoina pung adummaktada hougattuna, Jerusalemda hallakle, amasung taramathoi aduga makhoiga loinabasinggana pullap tinnaduna, 

34 A-oibamak prabhubu hinggatpikhre amasung Simonda uhalle, hainaramba makhoina phangle. 

35 Maduda lambida thokkhiba, amasung tandum thugaibada makhoina ibungobu karamna khanglakpa adu makhoina lirammi.


Seboksingda Jisuna masabu uhanba


36 Amahiksung makhoina waram asi ngangnaringeida, ibungo masamakna makhoigi mayaida leptuna makhoida hai, nakhoida tapthaba oisanu. 

37 Tou-i-gumbasung makhoina thukkhattuna kibana thawai ama ure ninglammi. 

38 Amasung ibungona makhoida hai, nakhoina karigi langtaknaribano, aduga nakhoigi pukningda kari maramna khanjanaba thoklibano? 

39 Eigi khut amasung khong yeng-u, eimakni, eibu soktuna yeng-u; maramdi eigi lutong leiba nakhoina ubagumna thawaigidi leite. 

40 Maduda ibungona asi hairaga, makhut amasung makhong makhoida uhalle. 

41 Aduga makhoina haraobana thajadringeida amasung ngaklingeida ibungona makhoida hai, asida nakhoigi karigumba achapot leibra? 

42 Maduda makhoina ibungoda arouba nga machet ama (amasung khoihi khoira ama) pire. 

43 Aduga ibungona madu louraga makhoigi mamangda chare. 

44 Amahiksung ibungona makhoida hai, eina nakhoiga leiminnaringeida, eina nakhoiga ngangnakhiba wasing adu asini, haibadi, eigi maramda Mousigi wayel yathangda, iswargi wa takthokpasinggi amasung iseigi lairikta ikhiba pumnamak adu thunghanba tai. 

45 Matam aduda makhoina sastra khangba yananaba ibungona makhoigi pukning hangdokpire; 

46 Aduga ibungona makhoida hai, Khrista aduna awaba khangba, amasung numit hummi subada asibasinggi maraktagi hinggatpa oigadabani; 

47 Aduga Jerusalemdagi houduna jat pumnamakta ibungogi mingda pukning hongba amasung pap kokpiba adubu sandokkadabani, haina asum ikhrabani. 

48 Nakhoidi pum-namak asigi sakshini. 

49 Amasung yeng-u, eigi ipana waleppa adu eina nakhoida thafi; adubu mathaklomdagi nakhoibu pangganna phigum inbidriba phaoba saharda nakhoi leirammu.


Swargada lengkhatkhiba


50 Amahiksung ibungona makhoibu Bethaniya manak phaoba lamjingbiraklaga, ibungogi khut thanggattuna makhoibu bor pibire. 

51 Amasung ibungona makhoibu bor pibiringeida asum thoklare, ibungona makhoidagi khainaduna, swargada, ibungobu pukhatpikhre. 

52 Maduda makhoina ibungobu khurumjaraga, yamna haraona Jerusalemda hallakle. 53 Amasung makhoina iswar ningnasangda itattattana iswarbu thagattuna leirammi. AMEN

ROMIYASINGDA POLNA IBA LAIRIK 

A-iba: Pot 

lbagi matam: A.D. 56 

Wamachang: Achumba Iswargi asengba wahei. 

Masigi chithi asi Missionary Polna Korint khundagi Romiyasingda irakpani. Gentile singlupsinggidamak khristansingna thajaba asi karambano haibasi utnanaba chithi asida sugaina iri. Thajabana aran-khubam phangbani aduga thajabana marannaigi wakhal chende haibasi tak-i. 

 ROMIYA 2 

Khurumjaba


1 Jisu Khristagi manai, pakhonchatpa oina kouraba, iswargi aphaba wapaogi damak khaidoklaba Polna. 

2 Aphaba wapao asidi ibungo mahakki macha nipagi maramda asengba sastrada ibungo mahakki wa takthokpasinggi mapanna mamangngeida pigani haina waleppa aduni; 

3 Macha nipa adudi hakchanggi marida Dayudki dharada pokle; 

4 Asengbagi thawai adugi marida ibungodi sibadagi hinggatpagi mapanna panggan-ga loinana iswargi macha nipani haiba phongdokle; madu ekhoigi Prabhu Jisu Khristani; 

5 Ibungo adugi mapanna eikhoina ibungogi minggidamak jat pumnamakki marakta thajabagi haiba innanaba thoujal phangjare amasung pakhonchatpagi pham phangjare, 

6 Amasung makhoi adugi marakta Jisu Khristagi oinaba kouraba nakhoisuni. 

7 Romda leiba iswargi nungsiba, aseng basing oinaba kouraba mi pumnamakta eikhoigi ipa iswar amasung Prabhu Jisu Khristadagi thoujal amasung ingthaba nakhoida leibisanu.


Polna Rom youningba


8 Ahanbada, taibangpal apumbada nakhoigi thajabagi maramda ngangnare, haiduna nakhoi pumnamakki maramda Jisu Khristagi mapanna eina eigi iswarbu thagatchei. 

9 Maramdi matam leiba khibikta eigi haija haijabada nakhoigi maramda itattattana eina ningsingjei haiba ibungo mahakki macha nipagi aphaba wa paoda ithawai yaona eina thougan toujariba ibungo iswarna eigi sakshini; 

10 Iswargi ningbibana eina thabak pangba oirabadi, karigumba pambeina tungda karigumba matamda nakhoida lakchanaba eina nijari. 

11 Maramdi nakhoibu chethannabagi damak thawaigi oiba karigumba khudon nakhoida eina pinanaba nakhoibu yamna ujaning-i; 

12 Amasung madu asini, eikhoi amaga amagagi thajabana, nakhoigisu eigisu nakhoigi narakta eiga nakhoigabu insinbinanabani. 

13 Aduga, ichin inaosa, eina jatsing atei ateigi marakta mahei phangbagumna, nakhoigi naraktasu phangnanaba, eina nakhoida, lakchanaba toina ningjare, aduga houjik pbaoba eibu palhalle haiba nakhoina khangdaba ei pamjade. 

14 Griksingdasu jat ateisingdasu, asingbasingdasu apangbasingdasu, eidi laman tonbani. 

15 Matou asumna eina ngamjaba makheidi Romda leiba nakhoidasu aphaba wapao adu sandoknaba eigi thourangni.


Aphaba wapaogi maong matou


16 Maramdi eina aphaba wapaogi maramda ikaiba leijade; maramdi madu thajaba mi khudingna aran khubam phangnaba iswargi pangganni; Ahanbada Jihudidani aduga Griktasuni. 

17 Maramdi maduda thajabagi damak thajabagi mapanna iswardagi dharma chenba phongdokpani; ikhiba asigumbani, touigumbasung dharmachenba mina thajabadagi hinganni.


Atoppa jatsinggi phattaba


18 Maramdi makhoigi dharmachen dabana achumbabu thingba mising adugi iswar ningdaba amasung dharma-chendaba pumnamakki mathakta iswargi asaoba swargadagi phongdok-i. 

19 Masi iswargi maram khangba ngamba adu makhoigi nungda phongdokpibagi maramnani, maramdi iswarna madu makhoida phongdokpire. 

20 Maramdi taibangpal semngeidagi ibungo mahakki uba ngamdaba, haibadi, ibungo mahakki lomba naidaba panggal amasung iswar oiba adu, semkhraba potki mapanna wakhal tana taseng tasengna uribani; aduna makhoibu kaibipham leite. 

21 Maramdi makhoina iswarbu khanglabasu ibungo mahakpu iswarni haiduna thigatte, Aduga ibungo mahakki toubimansu khangde, adubu makhoigi wakhal khanba adu aremba oirakle, aduga makhoigi apangba pukning mamkhre. 

22 Makhoi masana asingbani haidokchaduna, apangba oirak-le, 

23 Aduda mangba leitaba iswargi matik manganbu yaba migi, ucheksinggi makhong mari panba sasinggi amasung mapukna sittuna chatpasinggi maong manna olhalle. 

24 Adugi maramna makhoi masen-gi marakta makhoigi hakchang adu ikaikhumnaba leitanaba, iswarna makhoibu makhoigi pukninggi apamba aduda sengdaba oinaba thadokpire; 

25 Maramdi makhoina iswargi achumba adu minambada olhanduna, sembiba mapugi mahutta aremba pot adubu ningsu ningle, thougansu toure; sembiba mapu ibungobudi lomba naidana thagatkadabani. Amen. 

26 Maram asigi damak iswarna makhoibu achoppa apambada thadokpire; maramdi makhoigi nupisingnasu mahou sagi thoudou adu mahousagi oidaba thoudouda olhalle; 

27 Aduga, matou adugumna umna nipasingnasu nupiga mahousa mari thadoktuna, makhoigi apaibana amana atei amada meigum chaktuna, nipaga nipaga achoppa thabak touminnare, amasung makhoigi aranbagi phanggadaba mahei adu makhoi masa masada phangbani. 

28 Amahiksung makhoina makhoigi khangbada iswarbu mapham piba yadaba adugumna, natei chadaba thabak adu tounanaba iswarna makhoibu yadaba pukning da thadokpire. 

29 Dharma chendaba, phattaba, karamba, kallakpa, pumnamakna thalladuna; khambanbana, mihatpana, yeinasunabana, minambana, nungnangbana thanbasing; chibon chibon ngangba, 

30 Chirol touba, iswargi mangda tukkachaba, ikaiba khangdaba, chaothokpa, napal touba, phattaba thabak puthokpa, mapa mamagi haiba indaba, 

31 Wakhal leitaba, walepnaba kaiba, mahousagi nungsiba leitaba, chanbiheitaba, 

32 Mising asina, asigumba thabak mahousana toubasingna siba matik chai haiba iswargi wayel adu khangduna, madumak toubata nattana madu mahousana toubasinggasu yaminnei.

ROMIYA 2 

Jihudisingnasu ayol aranda taba


1 Maram aduna, he wayelliba mi khuding, nangbu kaibipham leite; maramdi nangna mi ateibu wayenba nang nathantabu lalhalli, maramdi wayelliba nangna madumak mahousana tou-i. 

2 Aduga asigumba thabak mahousana toubasinggi mathakta iswargi wayendi achumbagi matung inbani haiba eikhoina khang-i. 

3 Amasung asigumba thabak mahousana toubasingbu wayelliba amasung adumak touriba, he mioiba, nangna iswargi wayendagi hingani haiba asi ninglibra? 

4 Nattraga, iswargi aphaba matouna nangbu pukning hongnabada lamjingbi haiba khangdaduna ibungo mahakki aphaba matou adugi, ngaibiheibagi, amasung khangheibagi ayamba adubu nangna usittaba toubra? 

5 Adubu nanggi pukning kanba amasung hongningdaba adugi matung inna iswargi asao-bagi amasung achumba wayel phongdokpagi numitta asaoba nasa nathantagi damak peisinjei. 

6 Ibungo mahakna mi khudingda magi magi thabak matung inna hanbigani: 

7 Aphaba toubada khangduna, matik mangal, ikaikhumnaba, amasung mangba yadaba thiribasing aduda lomba naidaba hingba pibigani; 

8 Adubu marannai tanba amasung achumbabu indaduna, dharma nattababu inba makhoi aduda, haibadi, ahanbada Jihudida, aduga Griktasu, 

9 Phattaba touba mi khudinggi thawaigi mathakta asaoba amasung meihouna saoba, awaba amasung anangba oigani. 

10 Adubu ahanbada Jihudida aduga Griktasu aphaba thabak touba mi khudingda matik mangal, ikaikhumnaba amasung ingthaba oigani. 

11 Maramdi iswarna misak mimai yengde. 

12 Maramdi wayel yathang adu yao-dana pap touba mi makhei wayel yathang adu yaodana manggani, aduga wayel yathang adugi makha ponna pap touba mi makheibu wayel yathang aduna wayen-gani. 

13 Maramdi wayel yathang adu tabasing aduna iswargi mangda dharma chenba natte, adubu wayel yathang adu toubasing adubu chumhanbigani. 

14 (Maramdi wayel yathang adugi atoppa jatsingna wayel yathang adugi thabak adu mahousana tourabada, makhoi asigi wayel yathang leitrabasu, makhoi masada wayel yathang leiri; 

15 Maramdi makhoina makhoigi thanunoi nungda isinkhraba wayel yathang adugi thabak adu utli, aduga makhoigi achum aran khangnaba pukningna maduga loinana sakshi pi, amasung makhoigi wakhal amaga amaga yetnaduna makhoida-maran theijilli, nattraga makhoibu kaibi); 

16 Wayenba numit aduda iswarna, eina sandokpa aphaba wapaogi matung inna, Jisu Khristagi mapanna, misinggi arotpa adu wayen-gani. 

17 Touigumbasung nangna Jihudi haiba ming purabadi, wayel yathangda ngajarabadi, iswarda chaothokcharabadi, 

18 Ibungo mahakki ningba khanglabadi, wayel yathang adudagi tamba phangbana thoihenna phaba thabakni khallabadi; 

19 Aduga khangbagi amasung achumbagi maong adu wayel yathang adugi manungda phangduna, nang nasana mittangbasinggi lamjingbibani, amambada leibasinggi manganni, 

20 Apangbasinggi chumhanbibani, amasung angang machasinggi tambibani, haiduna nangna thajarabadi; 

21 Adunadi, mi ateibu tambiba nang, nasa nathantabu tambidra? huranpharoi sandokpa nang, huranbra? 

22 Nupi lannapharoi haiba nang, nupi lannabra? lai-murtibu tukkachaba nang, laisangdagi huranbra? 

23 Wayel yathangda chaothokchaba nang, wayel yathang adu lanbana iswarbu ikaikhumnadaba toubra? 

24 Maramdi ikhibagumna, nakhoigi maramna atoppa jatsinggi marakta iswargi mingbu thina ngang-i. 

25 Maramdi nangna wayel yathang inba mi oirabadi, un kakpa tongjabamakni; adubu nangna wayel yathang adu lanba mi oirabadi, nanggi unkakpa adu un kaktaba oirakpani. 

26 Maramaduna un kaktaba mina wayel yathang adugi haiba adu ngaklabadi, mahakki un kaktaba adu un kakpada singthanaroidra? 

27 Aduga mahousana un kaktaba mina wayel yathang adu thunghallabadi, lairikta ikhra ba wayel yathang amasung un kakpa nanggi leirabasu, wayel yathang adu lanba nangbu mahakna wayel touroidra? 

28 Maramdi mapanthongda Jihudi oiba adu Jihudi natte, aduga hakchangda mapanthonggi un kakpa adu un kakpa natte. 

29 Touigumbasung manung thangbada Jihudi oiba aduna Jihudini, aduga a-ibana nattana thawaina thamoigi un kakpa adu un kakpani. mahakpu thagatpa adu misingdagi natte, iswardagini.

ROMIYA 3 

Wayetlakpada matik chana khumba


1 Adunadi Jihudigi oijaba kari leibage? Aduga un kakpagi tongjaba karino? 

2 Maram khudingmakta yammi. Ihan hanbadi, makhoida iswargi wa sin-nabire. 

3 Maramdi kharana thajadrabadi, kari oigani? Makhoigi thajaba watpana iswarbu thajapham thokpa adubu karisu nattaba oihangadra? 

4 Madu khak oidasanu! Mi khudingna chinthiba oirabasu, iswardi achumba oisanu; ikhiba asigumbani, Ibungo nahakki waheida ibungo nahak ichum chumbani hainanaba, amasung ibungo nahakpu wayenbada ngamnanaba. 

5 Tou-i-gumbasung eikhoigi dharmachendabana iswargi achumba adubu uhallabadi, eikhoina kari haigadage? Asaobana laman khumliba iswarsi chumdabra? (Eina miobagi machat matung inna ngangjaribani.) 

6 Madu khak oidasanu! Maramdi adu oiragadi iswarna taibangpanbabu karamna wayengadage? 

7 Tou-i-gumbasung eigi chinthibana achumba adubu phongdoktuna ibungo mahakki matik mangal chaohallabadi, eibusu karigi maramna houjik phaoba papthenbani haina wayenbiribano? 

8 Aduga, aphaba thoknaba phat taba tousi, karigi eikhoina hairoidage? Madugumna eikhoina hai haina kana kanagumbana eikhoibu lanna theijilli; asigumba migi maral piba chummi.


Iswargi mangda mioibagi asoiba


9 Adunadi karino? eikhoi makhoidagi henna phabra? Natte; maramleite; maramdi Jihudisingsu Griksingsu pumnamakna papki makha ponbani haina eikhoina mamangngeida makhoida thangjille. 

10 Ikhiba asigumbani: dharmachenba kanasu leite, amatasu leit; 

11 wakhal taba kanasu leite, iswarbu thiba kanasu leite. aphaba touba kanasu leite, leite, amatasu leite. 

12 Makhoi pumnamak lam serannakhre, makhoi kannadaba pumoi oirakle. 

13 Makhoigi khouridi hangdokkhraba mongphamni, makhoigi leitonna minamle lil kharougi huna makhoigi chinban makhada lei. 

14 Makhoigi chin sirap amasung akhabana thalli. 

15 Makhoigi khongna i tahannaba chenba yang-i, 

16 Amangba amasung awaba makhoigi lambida lei, 

17 Amasung ingthabagi lambi makhoina khandge. 

18 Makhoigi mityengda iswarbu kiba leite. 

19 Amahiksung wayel yathang aduda hairi hairiba makhei aduna chin khudingmakpu mensinnanaba, amasung taibangpanba pumnamakpu iswargi mangda wayenhannanaba, wayel yathang adugi makha ponna leiribasingda haibani haiduna eikhoina khang-i. 

20 Maramdi wayel yathanggi thabakna ibungo mahakki mityengda kana amatabu chumhanbiroi; maramdi wayel yathanggi mapanna pap khanglak-i.


Khristada thajaba mapanna dharmachenba


21 Touigumbasung houjikti wayel yathang yaodana iswardagi dharmachenba phongdokle, madu wayel yathang aduna amasung iswargi wa takthokpasingna sakshi pi, 

 22 Iswardagi dharmachenba adu Jisu Khrista bu thajabagi mapanna thajaba pumnamakta oibiri. Maramdi karisu tonganba leite; 

23 Maramdi mi pumnamak pap chelle, aduga iswargi matik mangandagi makhoi sotthei, 

24 Khrista Jisuda leiba handokpiba adugi mapanna ibungo mahakki thoujanna makhoibu lemna chumhanbire; 

25 Mamangngeida toukhiba pap adubu iswargi khangbibana lanthokpiba maramna ibungo mahakki achumba utnanaba, 

26 Haibadi, ibungo mahakmak achumba, amasung Jisubu thajaba mahak adugi chumhanbiba mapu oinabagi, houjik matam asida ibungo mahakki achumba utnanabagi damaksu, thajabagi mapanna ibungogi i-na senggatpinaba oina iswarna ibungobu phongbire. 

27 Adunadi chaothokpham kadaida leibage? Madu khak leite. Karamba wayel yathangnano? Thabakkinara? Natte, adubu thajabagi wayel yathangnani. 

28 Maramdi wayel yathanggi thabak yaodana thajabana mibu chumhanbibani haiba eikhoina singthanei. 

29 Aduga Jihudisinggita iswarra? atoppa jatsinggisu iswar nattra? 

30 Mani, ama oiba iswarduna un kakpabu thajabadagi amasung un kaktababu thajabagi mapanna chumhanbirabadi, atoppa jatsinggisuni. 

31 Adunadi thajabagi mapanna wayel yathangbu eikhoina karisu nattaba oihanbra? Madu khak oidasanu! Eikhoina wayel yathang bu chethanbani.

ROMIYA 4 

Abrahamna pandam oiba


1 Adunadi hakchanggi matung inna eikhoigi Ipudhou Abrahamna phangkhiba adugi maramda eikhoina kari haigadage? 

2 Maramdi thabaktagi Abrahambu chumhanbikhrabadi, mahakki chaothokpham lei, adubu iswargi mangdadi natte. 

3 Maramdi sastrana kari haibage? Amasung Abrahamna iswarbu thajare, aduga maduda mangonda dharmachenba singthanare. 

4 Thabak touba migi atoumal adu thoujan-gi marida singthanei. 

5 Touigumbasung thabak toudaba, adubu iswarbu thouidaba mibu chumhanbiba ibungobu thajaba, mahak adugi thajaba adu dharmmachenba singthanabi. 

6 Thabak yaodana iswarna dharmachenba singthanabiba mi adu yaiphabani, Dayudmaknasu haiba asigumbani: 

7 Makhoigi ayol aral kokpikhraba amasung makhoigi pap kuppi-khraba makhoi adu yaiphabani. 

8 Prabhuna pap singthanabiroidaba mi adu yaiphabani. 

9 Adunadi bor asi un kakpa midra? un kaktaba midasura? Maramdi eikhoina hai, Abrahamda mahakki thajaba adu dharmachenba singthanabire. 

10 Adunadi madu karamna singthanarabano? Mahakpu un kaktringeigi mamangdara nattraga matungdara? Kaklaba matungda natte, kaktrngei mamangdani. 

11 Amasung mahakna un kaktaba oiringeida, mahakki leiramba thajaba adugi dharmachenbagi chum, un kakpagi khudam adu, mahakna phangle. Aduna makhoida dharmachenba singthanabinaba, un kaktringeida thajaba mi pumnamakki mapa adu mahak oinanabani; 

12 Aduga un kakpada chatpata nattaduna, eikhoigi ipudhou Abrahamna un kaktaba oiringeida, mahakki thajaba adugi khongthangdasu thangduna chatliba makhoida mahak un kakpagi mapa oinanabani. 

13 Maramdi, Abrahamna taibangpan-gi yumlepchara oigani, haiba mangondasu mahakki dharadasu waleppiba adu wayel yathanggi mapanna natte, adubu thajabagi dharmachenbagi mapannani. 

14 Maramdi wayel yathang inba misingna yumlepchara oirabadi, thajaba adu aremba oihalle, aduga waleppa adu karisu nattaba oihalle 

15 Maramdi wayel yathang aduna saoba thokhalli, touigumbasung wayel yathang leitaba mapham aduda yathang kaibasu leite. 

16 Maram asigidamak thoujangi matung inna oinanaba, madu thajabadagini; dhara pumnamakta, wayel yathangdagi oiba adudata nattana, Abrahamgi thajabadagi oibadasu waleppa adu soidananabani; 

17 Abrahamdi, asibasingbu hinghanbiba amasung leitaba potpu leibagumna kouba iswar, mahakna thajaba ibungo adugi mangda, eikhoi pumnamakki ipani (Eihakna nahakpu ayamba jatsinggi mapa oihalle haiba ikhibagumbani). 

18 Adugumna nanggi dhara oigani haikhiba adugi matung inna, ayamba jatsinggi mapa mahakna oiraknanaba, Abrahamna ningpham thoktrabasu khourangna ningduna thajare. 

19 Amasung mahakna thajaba hanthadana, houjik sikhrabagumlaba mahakki hakchang (Mahakti chahi chama marum sure) aduga Saragi siraba naopham adu wakbal toure; 

20 Adumakpu iswargi waleppa adugi maramna thajadaba toudana, adubu iswarbu thagatchaduna, 

21 Amasung iswarna waleppikhraba adu toubibasu ngammi haina pukningda lepladuna, thajaba kankhatle. 

22 Maram adunasu mangonda mahakki thajaba adu dharmachenba singthanabire. 

23 Mangonda singthanabire haina mahakki maramgi damaktada ikhiba natte, 

24 Adubu eikhoigi maramgi damaksuni, maramdi eikhoigi Prabhu Jisubu asibasinggi maraktagi hinggat piraba ibungo mahakpu thajaba eikhoida singthanabigani; 

25 Jisubu eikhoigi ayol aralgi damak pithokle, amasung eikhoibu dharmachenba oihannabagi damak hinggatpire.

ROMIYA 5 

Thajabagi Mahei; Khrista sibana iswargi nungsiba adu phongdokpa


1 Maram aduna thajabana chumhanbirabanina eikhoina eikhoigi Prabhu Jisu Kharistagi mapanna iswarga ingthana leisi. 

2 Ibungogi mapannasu eikhoina lepchariba thoujal asigi manungda thajabana eikhoigi changpham phangjare, aduga eikhoina iswargi matik mangangi saruk phanggani haiduna haraosi. 

3 Aduga asita natte, adubu eikhoigi awa anangdasu haraosi. Awa anangbana khangheiba, 

4 Khangheibana ngamjaba, aduga ngamjabana tarang tarang khangna ningba thokhalli haiba eikhoina khang-i; 

5 Amasung tarang tarang khangna ningbana ikaihande, maramdi eikhoida pibiraba thawai asengbagi mapanna eikhoigi thamoida iswargi nungsiba heithabire. 

6 Maramdi eikhoina sollingeimaktada, achaba matamda Khristana iswar ningdabasinggi damak sibire. 

7 Maramdi dharmachenba mi amagi damak kanagumba amana sibiba phana tang-i, adumakpu aphaba migidamak kanagumba amana sibinaba thouna phabasu mayai. 

8 Touigumbasung eikhoina papchenba mi oiringeimaktada, Khristana eikhoigidamak sibiba aduda iswarna eikhoiromda ibungomahakmakki nungsiba utpire. 

9 Maram aduna adudagi henna ibungogi i-na houjik chumhanbirabanina, ibungogi mapanna eikhoibu iswargi asaobadagi kanbigani. 

10 Maramdi eikhoina yeknaba oiringeida, ibungo mahakki macha nipa sibibagi mapanna eikhoibu iswarda taisinbirabadi, taisinbirabanina amuk henna ibungogi hingbana eikhoibu kanbigani. 

11 Aduga asita natte, adubu eikhoigi Prabhu Jisu Khristagi mapanna eikhoina iswarda haraonasu leijari, maramdi ibungogi mapanna eikhoina houjik taisinbiba phangjare.


Adamgi maramna siba, Jisugi mapanna hingba


12 Maram aduna mi amagi maramna pap amasung papki maramna siba taibangpanda changle, aduga asum touna mi pumnamakta siba thangthare, maramdi khawaimakna pap itou toure, adugumbani. 

13 Maramdi wayel yathang pidringeida taibangpanda pap leirammi, adubu wayel yathang leitabada pap singthanade. 

14 Adum oinamakpu sibana Adamdagi Mousi phaoba ningthougum palle; Adamna yathang kaibaga mannana pap toudabasinggi mathaktasuni; Adam asidi lenglakkadaba ibungogi pandamni. 

15 Touigumbasung ayol aranba adugumna chanbiba khudon adu natte. Maramdi mi ama adugi ayol aranbana mi ayamba sirabadi, iswargi thoujal amasung mi amagi, haibadi Jisu Khristagi, thoujanna piba khudon adu mi ayambada amuk henna pathana thalle. 

16 Amasung pap toukhiba amagi maramna oibagumna khudon adu natte; maramdi ayol aranba amadagi wayenbana aranba tahanbani, touigumbasung ayol aranba ayambadagi chanbiba khudonna dharma chenba singthanabibani. 

17 Maramdi amagi ayol aranbana siba aduna ama adugi maramna ningthougum pallabadi, thoujan-gi amasungsung dharmachenbagi khudon-gi athanba phangbasingna ama adugi, haibadi Jisu Khristagi, mapanna hingbada aniuk henna ningthougum pan-gani. 

18 Adunadi ayol aranba amagi maramna mi pumnamakpu aranbada tahanbagum, amagi dharmachenbagi thabakki mapannasu mi pumnamakpu hingnabagi damak chumhanbibada lamjingbire. 

19 Maramdi mi amagi haiba indabagi maramna ayambabu pap chenba mi oihanbagum, amagi haiba inbagi mapan-nasu ayambabu dharmachenba mi oihan-bigani. 

20 Amasung ayol aral yamnanaba wayel yathangsu changsille; 

21 Adubu sibada papna ningthougum pallakpagumna, thoujannasu eikhoigi Prabhu Jisu Khristagi mapanna jomba naidaba hingba phaoba dharmachenbagi mapanna ningthougum pannanaba pap yamba mapham aduda thoujal thoidok hendokna yamle.

ROMIYA 6 

Khristaga tinnabana papka paknabada


1 Adunadi eikhoina kari haigadage? Thoujal yamnanaba eikhoina papta itattattana leigadra? 

2 Madu khak oidasanu! paplomda sikhraba eikhoina maduda henna kuina karamna pangadage? 

3 Nattraga, Khrista Jisugida baptais loukhraba eikhoi makheina ibungogi sibagida baptais loure haiba nakhoina khangdra? 

4 Maram aduna mapagi matik mangangi mapanna Khristabu asibasinggi maraktagi hinggatpibaga mannana, eikhoinasu hingbagi anouba machat chatpa yananaba, sibagida baptais loubagi mapanna eikhoibu ibungoga phumminnare. 

5 Maramdi eikhoina ibungogi sibagi matouda ibungoga loinana tinnaraklabadi, ibungogi hinggatpagi matoudasu eikhoi tinnagani; 

6 Papki hakchang mangkhiduna, eikhoina papta henna kuina minai oidananaba, eikhoigi ariba mi adu ibungoga loinana krosta siminnare haiba asi eikhoina khang-i. 

7 Maramdi sikhraba mahak adubu paptagi chumhanbire. 

8 Touigumbasung eikhoina Khristaga siminnarabadi, eikhoina ibungoga loinana hingsu hinggani haiba eikhoi thajei; 

9 Maramdi asibasinggi maraktagi hinggatpiraba Khrista amuk siraroi; sibana ibungogi mathakta amuk khudum challaroi haiba eikhoi khang-i. 

10 Maramdi ibungona sikhiba masi adu ibungona paplomda amukta sikhibani adubu ibungona hingliba mahing adu iswarlomda hinglibani. 

11 Matou adugumna nakhoisu nasa nathanta paplomda sirabani, adubu iswarlomda Khrista Jisuda hinglibani haina singthanajou. 

12 Maram aduna nakhoina papki apamba adu indananaba, nakhoigi sigadaba hakchangda papna ningthougum pandasanu; 

13 Aduga nakhoi nakhoigi hakchang kayat adu dharmachendabagi khulaigum papta katpa tok-u; adubu nakhoi nakhoigi nasamak iswarda asibasinggi maraktagi hingba hingba misinggum, amasung nakhoi nakhoigi hakchang kayat adu iswarda dharmachenbagi khutlaigum katthok-u. 

14 Marmdi papna nakhoigi nathakta khudum challaroidabani, maramdi nakhoidi wayel yathanggi makha ponba natte, adubu thoujan-gi makha ponbani. 

15 Adunadi karino? Eikhoina wayel yathanggi makha pondaduna thoujan-gi makha ponba mamma eik-hoina pap tousira? madu khak oidasanu! 

16 Siba thokhanba papki oirabasu, dharmachenba thokhanba haiba inbagi oirabasu, haiba innanaba nakhoi nasamak minai oina katthoklabada, nakhoina haiba illiba mahak adugi minaisingni haiba nak-hoina khangdra? 

17 Touigumbasung nakhoi papki minai oiramlabasu, nakhoibu sinnakhraba tambibagi maong adugi nakhoina thawai yaona haiba ille, 

18 Aduga paptagi naning tamhanbiraduna, nakhoibu dharmachenbagi minai oihanbirakle haiduna, iswarda thagatpa oisnu. 

19 Nakhoigi hakchang oibagi sonba maramna eina mioibagi matou-gumna nganglibani. Maramdi henna touheidaba tounabagidamak sengdabada amasung touheidabada minai oina nakhoi nakhoigi hakchang kayat adu katthok-lambagumna, houjikti asengba oinabagidamak dharmachenbada minai oina nakhoi nakhoigi hakchang kayat adu katthok-lo. 

20 Maramdi nakhoina papki minai oiringeida, nakhoi dharmachenbaromda maningtambasing oirammi. 

21 Adunadi matam aduda nakhoina kari mahei phangbage? Thabaksing adugi maramda houjik nakhoina ikaire. Maramdi adusinggi arombadi sibani. 

22 Adubu houjikti paptagi naning tamhanbiraduna, iswargi minai oihanbirabanina, asengba tanba nakhoigi mahei amasung aromba adu lomba naidaba hingba nakhoina phangle. 

23 Maramdi papki atoumandi sibani, touigumbasung iswargi chanbiba khudondi eikhoigi Prabhu Khrista Jisuda lomba naidaba hingbani.

ROMIYA 7 

Luhongbagi pandam


1 He ichin inaosa, mina hinglingei adupki makhei wayel yathang aduna khudum chanbani haiba nakhoina khangdabra? (Maramdi wayel yathang khangba Misigda eina nganglibani.) 

2 Maramdi mapuroiba leiba nupi adubu hingliba mapuroiba aduda wayel yathangna pullibani; touigumbasung mapuroida aduna siragadi, mahakpu mapuroibagi wayel yathang adudagi thadokpire. 

3 Adunadi mapuroida aduna hinglingeida, mahakna atoppa nipa amada yum pallagadi, mahakpu warannabi kougani. Adubu mapuroiba aduna siragadi, mahak wayel yathang adudagi maning tamle, aduna mahakna atoppa nipa amada yum pallagasu mahakti warannabi oide. 

4 Adugumduna, he ichin inaosa, nakhoina atoppa amagi, haibadi, asibasinggi maraktagi hinggatlaba ibungogi oinabagidamak, nakhoisu Khristagi hakchanggi mapanna wayel yathanglomda sihallabani, asi eikhoina iswargi maphamda mahei yannanabani. 

5 Maramdi eikhoina hakchangda leiramba matamda, wayel yathang adugi mapanna oiba papki apaiba na sibada mahei yannanaba eikhoigi hakchang kayatta thabak tourammi. 

6 Adubu houjikti eikhoibu pulamba aduba sirabanina, wayel yathang adudagi eikhoibu thadokpire; aduna lairikki aribana nattana, thawaigi anoubana eikhoina khanjari.


Wayel yathang amasung pap; mioibagi anirongba mahousa


7 Adunadi eikhoina kari haigadage? wayel yathang adu papla? Madu khak oidasanu! Adubu wayel yathanggi mapanna nattanadi eina pap khanglamloidabani; maramdi nangna karampharoi haina wayel yathang aduna hairamdrabadi, eina karamba khanglamloidabani. 

8 Touigumbasung khudong chaba phangduna, papna karamba makhal pumnamak yathang asigi mapanna eingonda insille; maramdi wayel yathang yaodabada papti sibani 

9 Amasung eina matam amada wayel yathang yaodana hinglammi, adubu yathang adu laklabada, pap hinggatle amasung ei sire; 

10 Aduga hingnabagi oiba yathang asimak eigidamak sinaba thokle. 

11 Maramdi papna khudong chaba phangduna, yathanggi mapanna eibu namthak toure, aduba masigi mapanna eibu hatle. 

12 Maram aduna wayel yathang adudi seng-i, amasung yathang adu sengsu seng-i, dharmasu chelli, amasung phasu phei. 

13 Adunadi aphaba aduna eingonda sinaba oirakpra? Madu khak oidasanu! Adubu pap adudi papni haina utnanaba, aphaba adugi mapanna papna haina eingonda sinaba thabak touduna eingonda sinaba oirakle; asi yathanggi mapanna papna thoidak hendokna papchenba oiraknanabani. 

14 Maramdi wayel yathang adudi thawaigi oibani haiba eikhoina adubu eidi hakchanggi oibani amasung papki makha ponna yonthokkhrabani. 

15 Maramdi eina touba adu eina khangde; maramdi eina touningba adu eina touriba natte, adubu eina tukkachaba adu eina toui. 

16 Touigumbasung eina touningdaba adu eina tourabadi, wayel yathang adu aphabani haina wayel yathang aduga eina yaminnabani. 

17 Aduna madu touba adu houjik amuk eina natte, adubu eingonda leiriba papnani. 

18 Maramdi eingonda, haibadi eigi hakchang manungda, aphaba leite haiba eina khangjei. Maramdi ningba adu eiga loinana lei, adubu aphaba adu tounaba leite. 

19 Maramdi eina touning-ba aphaba adu eina toude, adubu eina touningdaba phattaba adu eina touribani. 

20 Touigumbasung eina touningdaba adu eina tourabadi, madu touba adu amuk eina natte, adubu eingonda leiriba papnani. 

21 Adunadi eina wayel yathang asi phang-i, haibadi, eina aphaba toujaningbada, phattaba eiga loinana lei. 

22 Maramdi manung thangba mi adugi matung inna iswargi wayel yathangda ei haraojei; 

23 Touigumbasung eigi pukninggi wayel yathangbu yeknaduna lal soknariba amasung eigi hakchang kayat manungda leiba papki wayel yathangii makha ponna apha apun oina eibu purakliba atoppa wayel yathang ama eigi hakchang kayatta eina ui. 

24 Tollaba minida, ei! siba asigi hakchangdagi eibu kanana kanbigadage? 

25 Eikhoigi Prabhu Jisu Khristagi mapannani haiduna iswarbu thagatchari. Adunadi ei isamak eigi pukningna iswargi wayel yathangbu khanjari; adubu hakchangna papki wayel yathangbu khanjari.

ROMIYA 8 

Thawai Asengbada hingba


1 Maram aduna houjik Khrista Jisuda leiribasingda aranba tahanba leite. 

2 Maramdi Khrista Jisuda Leiba hingbagi thawai adugi wayel yathang aduna eibu papki amasung sibagi wayel yathang adudagi ining tamhalle 

3 Maramdi hakchangna solhanba wayel yathangna touba ngamdaba adu, iswarna ibungo mahakmakki macha nipabu papchenba hakchanggi maong oina amasung papki damak thabiraktuna, hakchangda pap adubu aranba tahalle; 

4 Aduna hakchangdi matung inna chatpa nattana, thawaigi matung inna chatpa eikhoida wayel yathang aduna haiba adu thungnanabani. 

5 Maramdi hakchanggi matung inbasingna hakchanggi oiba adu ning-i, adubu thawaigi matung inbasingna thawaigi oiba adu ning-i. 

6 Maramdi hakchanggi ningba adu sibani, adubu thawaigi ningba adu hingba amasung ingthabani. 

7 Maram aduna hakchanggi ningba aduna iswari mathakta yeknabani; maramdi madu iswargi wayel yathang adugi makha ponde, aduga ponbasu ngamde; 

8 Amasung hakchangda leibasing aduna iswarbu pelhanba ngamde. 

9 Touigumbasung iswargi thawaina nakhoida leirabadi, nakhoina hakchangda leiba natte, thawaida leibani. adubu kanagumba mida Khristagi thawai leitrabadi, mahakti ibungogi oide. 

10 Amasung Khristana nakhoida leirabadi, hakchangdi papki maramna sibani, adubu thawaidi dharmachenbagi maramna hingbani. 

11 Touigumbasung Jisubu asibasinggi maraktagi hinggatpiraba ibungo mahak adugi thawai aduna nakhoida leirabadi, Khrista Jisubu asibasinggi maraktagi hinggatpiraba Ibungo mahak aduna nakhoida leiriba Ibungo mahakki thawai adugi mapanna nakhoigi sigadaba hakchangbusu hinghanbigani.


Iswargi macha Nipasing


12 Adunadi, ichin inaosa, eikhoina hakchanggi matung inna hingnaba hakchangda laman tonba natte; 

13 Maramdi nakhoina hakchanggi matung inna hinglabadi, nakhoi sigadabani; adubu thawaigi mapanna nakhoina hakchanggi thabak adu sihallabadi nakhoina hinggani. 

14 Maramdi iswargi thawaina chingbiriba makhei asidi iswargi macha nipasingni. 

15 Maramdi nakhoina amuk kinanaba minai oibagi thawai phangba natte, adubu yokchaba macha nipa oibagi thawai nakhoina phangle; aduna eikhoina, Abba! Ipa! laojei. 

16 Eikhoi iswargi machasingni haiba thawai ibungo mahakna eikhoigi thawaiga loinana sakshi pibi; 

17 Aduga machasing oirabadi, yumlepcharasu oire; ibungoga loinana eikhoina matik mangan phangminnanaba, ibungoga loinana eikhoina awa khangminnaba oirabadi, iswargi yumlepchara amasung ibungoga yumlepchara oiminnaba oire.


Oiragadaba matik mangal


18 Maramdi houjik matam asigi awa khangliba adu eikhoida phongdokkadaba matik mangal aduga changdamnaba matik chaba natte haiba eina singthanei. 

19 Maramdi lengli-pallibasinggi khourangna ngaijaba aduna iswargi macha nipasingbu phongdokpibagi damak ngaijari. 

20 Maramdi lengipallibasingna kannadabagi makha ponba asi magi magi apambadagi natte, adubu tarang tarang khangna ningduna madubu makha polhalliba ibungo mahakki maramnani; 

21 Maramdi lenglipallibasingmakpusu mangbagi manai oibadagi iswargi machasinggi matik mangan-gi maning tamhanbibada thadokpigani. 

22 Maramdi lenglipalliba apumbana houjik phioba naheminnari amasung naoyek-naothin phangminnari haiba eikhoina khang-i. 

23 Amasung madutasu natte, adubu thawaigi ahanba mahei phangba eikhoimaksu yokchaba macha nipa oiba, haibadi eikhoigi hakchanggi handokpiba, adugi damak ngai jaringeida, eikhoi isagi manungda eikhoimakna nahejari. 

24 Maramdi eikhoibu tarang tarang khangna ningbana kanbire; touigumbasung una ningba adu tarang tarang khangna ningba natte, maramdi mahakna uriba adugidamak kanana tarang tarang khangna ningbage? 

25 Adubu eikhoina udaba adugi damak eikhoina tarang tarang khangna ninglabadi, eikhoina madugi damak khangheina ngaijei. 

26 Amahiksung adugumduna thawai adunasu eikhoigi asonbada pangbi; maramdi eikhoina kari karamna haijagadaba khangjade, adubu thawai ibungo mahakmakna hainingai leitaba nahebaga loinana eikhoigi damak wanombi. 

27 Amasung pukningbu thiriba ibungo mahakna thwai adugi pukning karino khangbi, maramdi ibungo mahakna iswargi ningba matung inna aseengba misinggidamak wanombi. 

28 Amasung iswarna ibungo mahakpu nungsibasingda, haibadi, ibungo mahakki ningba matung inna koubiba makhoi aduda, phanabagi damak thabak pumnamak touminnabi haiba eikhoina khangi. 

29 Maramdi ibungo mahakna hanna khangkhiba makhoibu ibungo mahakki macha nipagi maong matou mannanaba hanna langbire, macha nipa aduna ayamba machin manaosinggi marakta ahanba pokpa oinanabani. 

30 Aduga Ibungo mahakna hanna langbikhraba makhoi adubu kousu koubire, koubiraba makhoi adubu chumsu chumhanbire, amasung chumhanbiraba makhoi aduba ibungo mahakna matik mangansu pibire.


Iswargi nungsiba


31 Adunadi maramsing asida eikhoina kari haigadage? iswarna eikhoigidamak oibirabadi, yeknagadaba kanano? 

32 Ibungo mahakki machanipabu kanbidaduna eikhoi pumnamakkidamak pithokpiba ibungo mahakna macha nipa aduga yaona pot pumnamaksu eikhoida karamna lemna pibiroidage? 

33 Iswarna khangatpasinggi mathakta kanana wa hungadabage? chumhanbiba adu iswarnani. 

34 Aranba tahangadaba adu kanano? sikhiba adu Khrista Jisuni, amasung madudagi henna asibasinggi maraktagi hinggatpiraga, iswargi yetta leiduna eikhoigi damak ibungona wasu nombiri. 

35 Khristagi nungsibadagi eikhoibu kanana khainahan-gadage? pukning olangbanara, awa meichaknara, ot neibanara, chak tangbanara, phi leitabanara, khudongthibanara, nattraga kabakthangnara? 

36 Ikhiba asigumbani, Ibungo nahakki maramgi damak eikhoibu numit chuppa hatli; hatnaba yaosinggum eikhoibu singthanare 

37 Adum oinamakpu maram asi pumnamakta eikhoibu nungsibiba ibungogi mapanna eikhoina ngambadagi henna ngambani. 

38 Maramdi eina thajei, haibadi, sibana oirabasu, hingbana oirabasu, swargadutsingna oirabasu, angambasingna oirabasu. oiribana oirabasu, oirakkadabana oirabasu, pangganbasingna oira-basu, 

39 Awangbana oirabasu, arubana oirabasu, kanagumba atoppa lengli-palli-bana, eikhoigi prabhu Khrista Jisuda leiriba iswargi nungsiba adudagi eikhoibu khaidokhanba ngamlaroi.

ROMIYA 9 

Israyelsingna thajadabagi Polna wabiba


1 Eina Khristagi oina achumba hairi, ei chinthide, thawai asengbagi mapanna eigi achum aran khangnaba pukningna eiga sakshi piminnei, 

2 Haibadi, eina eigi thamoinungda yamna waba amasung atatpa leitaba anaba phang-i. 

3 Maramdi hakchanggi matung inna eigi sagei natei, ichin inaosinggi maramgi damak ei isamak sirap phangnaba, Khristadagi khainaba eina ningba ngamlamgadabani. 

4 Makhoidi Israyelsingni; yokchaba macha nipa oiba, matik mangal, walepnaba makhei, wayel yathang piba, iswargi thogan, amasung wareppa makhei makhoigini; 

5 Ipa ipusing adu makhoigini, amasung hakchanggi marida Khristadi makhoidagini; ibungodi pumnamakki mathakta leiba, lomba naidana thagatkadaba iswarni. Amen.


Iswargi weleppa makheidi Sotthaba leite


6 Touigumbasung iswargi wa adu karisu nattabagum oirakle haiba natte. Maramdi Israyeldagi thokpa makhoi pumnamak Israyel natte, 

7 Aduga abrahamgi dhara oibagi maramna, makhoi pumnamak machasing natte; adubu Isahaktagi nahakki dhara kougani haiba wareppire. 

8 Adudi hakchanggi machasing adu iswargi machasing natte, adubu wareppagi machasingbu dhara oina singthanabi. 

9 Maramdi wareppagi wa asini, asigumba matamda ei lakkani, aduga Sarana macha nipa ama phangjagani. 

10 Amasung asitasu natte, adubu Ribekkabusu amana, haibadi eikhoigi ipa Isahakna, mirolhallabada, 

11 Maramdi angangsing poktringeida, amasung karigumba aphaba nattraga phattaba toudringeida khangatpagi matung inna iswargi ningba lepnanaba, haibadi thabakki nattana, koubiba ibungo mahakki, 

12 Ribekkada hai, ahanna nahabu thouganjagani. 13 Jakobpu eina nungsire, adubu Esoubu tukkachare haiba ikhibagumbani.


Iswardi chumdaba natte


14 Adunadi eikhoina kari haigadage? Iswargi maphamda dharmachendaba leibra? Madu khak oidasanu!
