15 Maramdi ibungo mahakna Mousida hai, eina nungsibiba adubu nungsibigani, aduga eina chanbiba adubu chanbigani. 

16 Adunadi masi ningliba mahakkisu natte, chelliba mahakkisu natte, adubu nungsiheiba iswargini. 

17 Maramdi sastrana Pharounda hai, eina nangonda eigi panggal utnanaba, amasung eigi iming prithibi pumnamakta koisan sandoknanaba, asimakki damak eina nangbu thokhalle. 

18 Adunadi ibungo mahakna ningbiba aduda nungsibi, amasung ningbiba adubu pukning kalhanbi.


Iswardi ingam ngambani


19 Adu oirabadi, nahakna eingonda haigani, karigi ibungo mahakna aranba puthokpiribage? Maramdi ibungo mahakki ningbabu kanana khangba ngambage? 

20 Natte, adubu, he mioiba, iswargi mathakta khumliba nang kanano? Asaba potna sabiba mahak aduda, naha-kna eibu karigi asumna toubibage haina haigadra? 

21 Nattraga, phusabana leital matum amadagi saruk amabu aruba thabakki damak amasung saruk amabuna araiba thabakki damak phu sananaba, leitan-gi mathakta mahakki matik leiba nattra? 

22 Ibungo mahakna matik mangangi damak hanna langbikhraba thoujan-gi phuda, haibadi, Jihudisingda-gita nattana atoppa jatsingdagisu ibungo mahakna koubikhraba eikhoida, 

23 Ibungo mahakki matik mangan-gi ayamba adu khanghannanaba, iswama ibungo mahakki asaoba utning-labasu amasung ibungo mahakki panggan khanghanninglabasu, 

24 Mangba matik charaba asaobagi phu makheibu yamna khangheibaga loinana khangbirabadi; karino? 

25 Ibungo mahakna Hoseyagi lairiktasu haibagumna, Eigi mi oiramdaba makhoi adubu eina eigi mi, aduda challamdaba nipi adubu chanbirabi kougani. 

26 Amasung asum oigani, haibadi, nakhoi eigi mi oide haina makhoida haiba mapham aduda makhoibu hingliba iswargi macha nipasing kougani. 

27 Amasung Jisaiyana Israyelgi maramda lao-i, Israyelgi machasinggi masing adu samadrugi leingoigum oirabasu, lemhouba saruk adubu kanbigani. 

28 Maramdi Prabhuna ibungo mahakki wa prithibida loithoktuna amasung tenna kakthattuna touthokkani. 29 Aduga Jisaiyana mamangngeida haikhibagumna, lanmi mayamgi prabhuna eikhoida dhara thambiramdrabadi, eikhoi Sodomgum oiraklamgadabani, amasung Gomoraga mannahallamgadabani.


Israyelgi sotthabagi maram


30 Adunadi eikhoina kari haigadage? dharmachenba tandaba atoppa jatsingna dharmachenba, haibadi thajabadagi dharmachenba, phangle. 

31 Touigumbasung dharmachenbagi wayel yathang talliba Israyelna wayel yathang aduda thungde. 

32 Kairgi maramnano? Maramdi makhoina thajabadagi dharmachenbabu tande, aduhu thabaktagi madubu tanbagumna talli. Makhoina khudi thinaba nungda khudi thire; 

33 Ikhiba asigumbani, yeng-u, Siyonda khudi thinaba nung amasung tunaba nungjao eina thammi; amasung ibungo mahakpu thajaba mahak adubu ikaihalloi.

ROMIYA 10 

Dharmachenbagi anouba lambi adu pumnamakki damakni


1 He ichin inaosa, makhoina aran khubam phangnanaba eigi pukninggi apambani amasung makhoigidamak iswarda eigi nonjabani. 

2 Maramdi eikhoina iswargi damak thawai yaoba lei, adubu khangbagi matung inna natte haiba eina nakhoigi maramda sakshi pi. 

3 Maramdi iswargi dharmachenba khangdabanina makhoimakki dharmachenba lepchanaba thiduna, makhoina masa mathantabu iswargi dharmachenba adugi makha ponde. 

4 Maramdi Khristadi thajaba mi khudingda dharmachenba oiraknanaba wayel yathanggi aroibani. 

5 Maramdi wayel yathang-da-gi oiba dharmachenba adu touba mi aduna madugi mapanna hinggani haiba Mousina-i. 

6 Touigumbasung thajabadagi oiba dharmachenba aduna asumna hai, nahakki pukningda haiganu, kanana swargada kagani? (Madudi Khristabu putharaknanaba haibani.) 

7 Nattraga kanana makha naidaba komda kumthagani? (Madudi Khristabu asibasinggi maraktagi pukhatnanaba haibani.) 

8 Touigumbasung maduna kari hai? Nanggi nanakta, nanggi chinda amasung nanggi pukningda wa adu lei (madudi eikhoina sandokliba thajabagi wa aduni) 

9 Maramdi nangna nanggi nachinna Jisubu Prabhuni haidokcharagadi, amasung asibasinggi maraktagi ibungobu iswarna hinggatpire haiba nanggi pukningda thajaragadi, nangbu kanbigani. 

10 Maramdi mina dharmachenba phangnanaba pukningna thajei, amasung aran khubam phangnanaba machinna haidokchei. 

11 Maramdi sastrana hai, Ibungobu thajaba mi khudingbu ikaihalloi. 

12 Maramdi Jihudi amasung Grikki marakta tonganba leite; maramdi pumnamakki Prabhu amatani, amasung ibungobu koujaba pumnamakki damak Ibungodi inakkhunbani. 

13 Maramdi Prabhugi ming koujaba mi khudingbu kanbigani. 

14 Adunadi makhoina thajadaba ibungo adubu karamna koujagadage? Aduga makhoina ita tadaba ibungo adubu karamna thajagadage? Amasung pao sandokpiba yaodana makhoina karamna tagadage? 

15 Aduga makhoibu thabidanadi, makhoina karamna pao sandokkadage? Ikhiba asigumbani, haraoba aphaba wapao purakpasinggi makhong adu kaya ningthijariba! 

16 Touigumbasung makhoi pumnamakna aphaba wapao adubu tabide. Maramdi Jisaiyana hai, prabhu eikhoigi paodam tabada kanana thajabirabage? 

17 Maram aduna paodam tabadagi thajaba adu amasung Khristagi wa adugi mapanna paodam adu thok-i. 

18 Touigumbasung eina hai, makhoina taraba nattra? hoi, thanggei sengna tare; Makhoigi makhol prithibi pumnam-makta, amasung makhoigi wahei taibangpan-gi aromba phaoba sinkhre. 

19 Touigumbasung eina hai, Israyelna khangba nattra? Mousina hanna hai, jat oidaba adugi mathakta kallaknaba, khangba jatki mathakta saonaba eina nakhoibu langnagani. 

20 Amasung Jisaiyana yamna thouna phana hai, eibu thidabasingna eibu phangle; eingonda nijadabasingda ei ithantabu phongdokpire. 

21 Touigumbasung ibungo mahakna Israyelda hai, haiba in-daba amasung wakhetpa jatki maikeida eina numit chuppa eigi khut tingthokle.

ROMIYA 11 

Israyelsinggi maraktagi thoujanna khakhouba


1 Adunadi eina hai; iswarna ibungo mahakki mibu hundokkhrabra? Madu khak oidasanu! Maramdi eisu Israyelgi mi, Abrahamgi dhara, Benjamin-gi salaini. 

2 Iswarna hanna khangkhraba ibungo mahakki mibu hundokpide. Nattraga Eliyagi maramda sastrana kari haibage nakhoina khangdabara? Haibadi, mahakna Israyelgi mathakta Iswargi maphamda hanggatchei, 

3 Prabhu, Ibungo nahakki wa takthokpasingbu makhoina hattokle, makhoina Ibungo nahakki latnapung makhei toukhaire, amasung ei ithanta leihoure, aduga makhoina ithawaibu thiri. 

4 Touigumbasung mangonda Iswarna khumba adu kari haibage? Balda khuru khudak kundaba mi lising taret eina ithantagi damak khakchahoure. 

5 Adugumduna matam asidasu thoujanna khangatpa matung inna lemhouba saruk leiri. 

6 Touigumbasung masi thoujan-gi mapanna oirabadi, thabaktagi amuk oiraroi; nattrabadi thoujal adu amuk thoujal oidre. 

7 Adunadi karino? Israyelna thiba adu phangdre; adubu khan-gatpibasingna madu phangle, aduga leihoubasing aduna mappukning kankhre; 

8 Ikhiba asigumbani, Iswarna makhoida uiningba thawai, udanaba mit amasung tadanaba nakong ngasigi numit asi phaoba pibire. 

9 Aduga Dayudna hai, Makhoigi achapot adu konggoiga langga amasung khudi thinabaga matik okpa maheiga makhoigi damak oisnu; 

10 Makhoina udananaba makhoigi mit mamsnu, amasung matam leiba khibikta ibungo nahakna makhoigi manam polhanbiyu. 

11 Adunadi eina hai, makhoina tunanaba khudi thirabra? Madu khak oidasnu! touigumbasung makhoibu kalakhannanaba makhoigi tubana atoppa jatsinggi damak aran khubam thoki. 

12 Amasung makhoigi tubana taibanpan-gi inakkhunba, aduga makhoigi mangbana Atoppa jatsinggi inakkhunba oirabadi, makhoigi thanbanadi amuk kaya hengaba!


Kolan sembaga changdamnaraba atoppa jatsinggi aran khubam


13 Adubu eina atoppa jatsing oiba nakhoida hairibani, maramdi eina atoppa jatsinggi pakhonchatpa oibanina, eina toujaba thougan einai ikai khumnajei; 

14 Ngamlabadi, eina karigumba pambei amana hakchanggi marida eigi oiriba makhoi adubu kallakhanduna makhoi kharabu kanbiba yanabani. 

15 Maramdi makhoibu hundokpa aduna taibangpanbagi tainasinbiba oirabadi, makhoibu lousinbiba aduna asibasinggi maraktagi, hinggatpiba nattanadi kari oiga-dage? 

16 Amasung anoiba yam matumdagi katchaba ahanba saruk adu senglabadi, yam matum apumba seng-i; aduga maru aduna senglabadi, usa makheisu seng-i. 

17 Touigumbasung usa kharabu thudekkhrabadi, aduga nangna lamgi chorphol, mapambi oiduna makhoigi marakta nangbu kolam semduna chorphon mapambigi maragi mahaodagi nangna makhoiga saruk phangminnarak labadi, 

18 Usasing adubu yeknaduna chaothokchaganu; touigumbasung nangna chaothoklabadi marabu puba nang natte, adubu marana nangbu pubini. 

19 Adunadi nangna haigani eibu kolam semnanaba usa thudekkhre. 

20 Phare; makhoigi thajadabana makhoibu thudekkhre, aduga nangdi nanggi thajabana lepli. Pukning nawangganu, adubu kiyu; 

21 Maramdi iswarna mahousagi usasing adubu kanbidrabadi, ibungo mahakna nangbusu kanbiroi. 

22 Adunadi iswarga aphaba amasung ayakpa adu yeng-u; tukhibasinglomda ayakpa, touigumbasung nangna iswargi aphabada itattattana leirabadi, nangollomda ibungo mahakki aphaba oigani; nattrabadi nangbusu kakthatkani. 

23 Amasung makhoinasu makhoigi thajadabada itattattana leiba nattrabadi, makhoibu kolam sembigani; maramdi iswarna makhoibu amuk kolam sembiba ngammi. 

24 Maramdi nangbu mahousana lamgi chorphol mapambidagi kakthattuna, aphaba chorphol mapambida mahousaga onna-teina kolam sembirabadi, mahousagi oiba usasing asibu makhoimakki chorphol mapambida kaya henna kolam sembigaba!


Iswargi khujil thouranggi mapung phabadi pumnamakpu thoujanbibani


25 Maramdi, ichin inaosa, nakhoi nasana napan toujabana asingbani ningjadanaba, athuppa wa asi nakhoina khangdaba eina pamde, haibadi, atoppa jatsinggi masing suna changdriba phaoba, machetta pukning kanba Israyelda thoklare; 

26 Amasung asigumna Israyel pumnamakpu kanbigani; ikhiba asugumbani,


Kanbiba mapu aduna Siyondagi lenglakkani, Ibungona Jakobtagi iswar-ningdaba louthokkani;


27 Amasung eina makhoigi pap louthokpiraba matamda, Makoiga loinana eigi lepnaba wa asini. 

28 Aphaba wapaogi marida makhoidi nakhoigi maramgi damak yeknabasingni; adubu khangatpagi marida makhoigi ipa ipusinggi maramgidamak achanbasingni. 

29 Maramdi iswarna ibungo mahakki chanbiba khudonsing amasung koubibagi maramda pukning hongde. 

30 Maramdi houkhiba matamda nakhoina iswarna haiba inde, adubu joujikti makhoigi haiba indabana nakhoina nungsibiba phangle, 

31 Adugumna nakhoida utlaba nungsibiba aduna makhoinasu houjik nungsibiba phangnanaba, makhoi asisu houjik haiba indaba oire. 

32 Maramdi iswarna pumnamakta nungsibiba utnanaba, ibungo mahakna pumnamakpu haiba indaba thingjille. 

33 Onthokpanida Iswargi lousing amasung khangba animakki lal kayada lukhrabano! ibungo mahakki wayel kayada thingamdriba, amasung ibungo mahakki lambi kayada khonggul lingamdriba! 

34 Maramdi Prabhugi pukning kanana khanglabage? Nattraga ibungo mahakki wattanangai angamba kanana oiraklabage? 

35 Nattraga ibungo mangonda hanna piraga, ibungo mangondagi amuk phanggadaba kanano? Maramdi ibungo mangondagi, ibungo mahakki mapanna amasung ibungo mahakki damak pot pumnamak ioi oi. Lomba naidana ibungo mangonda thagatpa oisnu. Amen.

ROMIYA 12 

Anouba punsi


1 Maram aduna, he ichin inaosa, nakhoina nanggi nanggi hakchangbu ahingba, asengba amasung iswarbu pelhanba iratpot oina katnaba eina iswargi chanbiba makheigi mapanna nakhoibu nijari; Masi nakhoigi thawaigi oiba thouganni. 

2 Amasung taibangpanba asigi matung inba sakong louganu, adubu iswargi ningba aphaba, ayaba amasung changkkonba adu karino haiba nakhoina chang yengduna khangnanaba, nanggi nanggi pukning amuk nouhanbana nakhoi sakong onthok-u.


Thawaigi oiba khudonsing adu chumna sijinnaba


3 Maramdi nakhoigi narakta leiriba mi khudingda, mahak mahakna ningba matik chaba adudagi henna wangna masamakki maramda ningdananaba, adubu mi khudingmakta iswarna pibiba thajabagi chang matung inna pukning phajinna ningnanaba, eingonda thoujan-gi mapanna eina haijari. 

4 Maramdi eikhoigi hakchang amada kayat pumnamak mathou mannadabagumna, 

5 Eikhoi mayam Khristada hakchang ama oiri, aduga eikhoi khuding amaga amaga mapangni. 

6 Amasung eikhoida pibiraba thoujangi matung inna tongan tonganba khudon phangjaraduna, iswargi wa takthokpa oirabasu eikhoigi thajabagi chang matting inna takthoksi, 

7 Thougan touba oirabasu, thougan matung inna tousi, tambiba adunasu tambisanu; 

8 Thoujanbiba adunasu thoujanbisanu, apiba adunasu pammudana pisanu, luchingba adunasu pukning changna ehingbisanu; nungsibiba thabak touba mahak adunasu harao haraona toubisanu.


Khristan punsigi pathap


9 Aphasajaba yaodana nungsiba oisanu; phattaba adu tukkachou; aphabi adu chitna kollu; 

10 Imung manung nungsinabagum nachin nanao amaga amaga nungsinou; amana amabu athoibani ningduna ikaikhumnou. 

11 Tandaduna maram okpa oiyu; harao haraona pukning changna thougan tou; prabhubu khanjou. 

12 Tarang tarang khangna ningbada haraojou; awabada khangheiyu; haijabada tattaba oiyu. 

13 Asengbasinggi kannagadaba pinou; lamlanbada taram taramna tou. 

14 Nakhoibu ot neibasingbu bor piyu; sirap toudana, bor piyu. 

15 Haraobasingga haraominou; akappasingga kapminnou. 

16 Amaga amaga khoijel lingjel mannaba oiyu. Awangbada ningdaduna anembada yajou. Nasana napan toujabina asingbani ningganu. 

17 Mi kanadasu phattabagidamak phattaba han-ganu. Mi pumnamakki mityengda phajaba thabakkidamak hanna wakhal tou. 

18 Masi oiba yarabadi, nakhoina ngamba makhei mi pumnamakka ingthana leiminnou. 

19 Achanbasa, nakhoi nasen laman khumnaganu, adubu iswargi asaobada mapham piyu; maramdi masi ikhre, laman khumba eigini; eina matik okpa pigani Prabhuna hai. 

20 Touigumbasung nahakki yeknabana lamlabadi mahakpu pijou; mahakna khouranglabadi pithak-u; maramdi adugum touba aduna nahakna mahakki kokthakta meital araba peigani. 

21 Phattabana ngamhanganu, adubu aphabana phattababu ngamhallu.

ROMIYA 13 

Angam athousingi makha ponba


1 Mi khudingna angam athousinggi makha ponsunu, maramdi iswargi mapanna nattana angamba leite; amasung leiriba angamba sing adu iswarna sinbibani. 

2 Maram aduna angambabu thouoidaba mahak aduna iswargi sinbiba adubu yeknabani, amasung yeknaraba makhoi aduna makhoi masada wayenba phangjagani: 

3 Maramdi mapusingna aphaba thabakta kihanba natte, adubu phattabadani. Amasung nangna angambabu kidaba oiningbra? Aphaba tou, aduga nangna angamba adudagi thagatpa phangjagani, 

4 Maramdi mahakti nanggi phanabagi damak iswargi thougan toubani. Touigumbasung nangna phattaba tourabadi, kiyu; maramdi mahakna kabakthang, arembada puba natte; maramdi mahakti iswargi thougan touba, phattaba touriba mi aduda asaobagi damak laman khumba oiribani. 

5 Maram aduna asaoba adugi maramgita nattana, achumba khangnaba pukninggi maramgi damaksu nakhoi nasana makha ponjaba tabani. 

6 Maramdi maram asigi damak nakhoina loipotsu piribani; maramdi makhoina thabak asimakki damak itattattana iswargi thabak toubasing oiribani. 

7 Pipham thokpa thokpa aduda piyu, loipot hagadaba aduda loipot hao, kanggat pigadaba aduda kanggat piyu, kigadaba adubu kiyu, ikaikhumnagadaba adubu ikaikhumnou.


Machin manaogum nungsinaba


8 Amana amabu nungsinabagi laman nattana, mi kanagisu kari amata laman tonduna leiganu; maramdi mi ateibu nungsiba mahak aduna wayel yathangbu thunghalle. 

9 Maramdi nangna nupi lannapharoi, nangna mi hatpharoi, nangna huranpharoi, nangna karampharoi, yathangsing asi amasung karigumba yathang atei leirabadi, nangna nanggi keiroi leikaibu nasamakkumna nungsigadabani haiba wahei asida supchin-bani. 

10 Nungsibana magi keiroi leikaida phattaba toude; maram aduna nungsibana wayel yathangbu thunghanbani.


Khristagi numit adu naksillakpa


11 Amahiksung asi toubiyu, maramdi nakhoina matam asi khang-i, haibadi, hoijik tumbadagi hougatpa pungphamni; maramdi eikhoina hanna thajaramba matam adudagi houjikna henna eikhoigi aran khubam naksillakle. 

12 Ahing houkhre, aduga nungthil nakle; maram aduna amambagi thabak eikhoina langthoktuna mangan-gi khulai phijet setsi, 

13 Eikhoina nungthinda chatpagumna chumna chatsi; lamchat haptaba amasung yungaoba, machit phattaba amasung apaiba, khatna-cheinaba amasung kallakpa touganusi. 

14 Adubu nakhoina phi setpagum Prabhu Jisu Khristabu setlu, aduga hakchanggi apamba thungnanabagi damak thourang langganu.

ROMIYA 14 

Khanjanabasinggi damak khangbiba


1 Touigumbasung Thajabada solliba mahak adubu nakhoina lousinbiyu, adum oinamakpu mahakki khanjanababu wayennabagi damak natte. 

2 Pot pumnamak chaba yai haibagi mi amagi thajaba lei, adubu asonba mahaknadi mana masing chai. 

3 Achaba mi aduna chadaba mi adubu usittaba toudasanu, aduga chadaba mi aduna achaba mi adubu wayendasanu; maramdi iswarna mahakpu lousinbire. 

4 Atei amagi manaibu wayenba nang kanano? Mahakmakki mabungogi mangda mahak lep-i nattraga tai hoi, mahakpu lephanbiba ngammi. 

5 Mi amana numit amadagi numit amabu henna ning-i; mi atei amana numit khudingmak iman mannana ning-i. Mi khudingna magi magi pukningda sengna khangduna leppa oisanu. 

6 Numitpu ngakpa mahak aduna prabhugi damak madu ngakpani; aduga chaba mahak aduna prabhugi damak chabani, maramdi mahakna prabhubu thagatchei; Aduga chadaba mahak aduna prabhugi damak chadana iswarbu thagatli. 

7 Maramdi eikhoi kana amatana masamakki damak hingba natte, aduga kana amatana masamakki damak siba natte. 

8 Maramdi eikhoina hingba oirabasu prabhugidamak hingbani; eikhoina siba oirabasu prabhugi damak sibani. 

9 Maram aduna eikhoina hinglabasu sirabasu prabhugini. Maramdi Khristana asibasing amasung hinglibasing animakki prabhu oinanaba, maram asigidamak sisu sibire, hingsu hinggatle. 

10 Touigumbasung nangna karigi nachin nanaobu wayenbano? Nattraga nangnasu karigi nachin nanaobu usittaba toubano? Maramdi eikhoi pumnamakna iswargi wayen phambei mangda lepkani. 

11 Maramdi masi ikhre, Prabhuna hai, eina hinglibanina, khuk-u khudingmakna eingonda nonjagani, aduga leitol khudingmakna iswarbu thagat chagani. 

12 Adunadi eikhoi mi khudingna iswarda masa masagi maram pijagani. 

13 Maram aduna eikhoina amana amabu amuk hanna wayen tounaganusi; adugi sarukpudi mahak mahakki machin manaogi lambida khudi thinaba nattraga tunaba pot thamdanaba asi pukning lep-u. 

14 Pot masamakta mangba karisu leite haiba eina khangsu khang-i, prabhu Jisugi mapanna thasu thajei; karigumba pot ama mang-i haina khanjaba mi adutana pot adu mangbani. 

15 Maramdi chanaba potki maramna nanggi nachin nanaobu pukning wahallabadi, nangna nungsibagi matung inna chattre. Khristana mahakki mahutta sibikhiba mahak adubu nanggi chanaba potna manghanganu. 

16 Adunadi nakoigi aphaba adubu thina ngangnadasanu. 

17 Maramdi iswargi leibakti chanathaknaba natte, adubu thawai asengbada dharmachenba, ingthaba amasung haraobani. 

18 Maramdi Khristada asumna khanjariba mahak aduda iswarna penbani, amasung misingna yabani. 

19 Maram aduna ingthaba oihanba amasung eikhoi amana amabu semgatnaba thabakki matung inna chatsi. 

20 Chanaba potkidamak iswargi thabak manghanganu. Pot pumnamak asengbani, adubu mibu khudi thihanbaga loinana chaba mi adugi damak phattabani. 

21 Sa chabana, yu thakpana nanggi nachin nanaobu khudi thinaba karisu toudaba phei. 

22 Nanggi thajaba leijaba adu iswargi mangda nathantamakki oisanu. Mahakna yajakhraba aduda masa mathantabu wayenjadaba mahak adu yaiphabani. 

23 Adubu chingnaba mahak aduna charabadi aranba tabani, maramdi madu thajabadagi natte; amasung thajabadagi nattaba makhei papni.

ROMIYA 15 

1 Amahiksung akanba eikhoina ithantagi nungainaba toudaduna, kandabasinggi asonba adu pubigadabani. 

2 Eikhoi mi khudingmakna magi magi keiroi leikaibu phananaba amasung semgatnaba touduna pelhansi. 

3 Maramdi Khristanasu Ibungo mathantabu pelhande; touigumbasung ikhiba asigumbani, Ibungo mahakpu paothokpasinggi paothoklaba wa adu ithakta tare. 

4 Maramdi sastradagi thokpa khangheiba amasung insinbibagi mapanna eikhoina tarang tarang khangna ningba phangnanaba, mamangngeida ikhi ikhiba adu eikhoigi tamnanabagidamak ikhibani. 

5 Pukning amata oina nakhoina chin amana eikhoigi prabhu Jisu Khristagi iswarsu mapasu oiba adubu thagatnaba, 

6 Khrista Jisugi matung inna amaga amaga mannaba pukning adubu khangheibagi amasung insinbibagi iswarna nakhoida pibisanu. 

7 Maram asina Khristansu nakhoibu lousinbibagunma, iswargi matik mangan-gi damak nakhoi amana amabu lousinnou. 

8 Maramdi eina haribani, ipa ipusingda waleppasing adu chetnanaba, amasung atoppa jatsingna ibungo mahakki nungsibibagi maramna iswarbu thagatnanaba, 

9 Iswargi achumba adugi damak Khristabu unkakpagi thougan touba mi oihalle; ikhiba asigumbani, Maram aduna eina atoppa jatsinggi marakta ibungo nahakpu thagatchagani, amasung ibungo nahakki mingbu sakchagani. 

10 Aduga amuk mahakna hai, atoppa jatsa, nakhoina ibungo mahakki, misingga loinana hatiominnou. 

11 Aduga amuk, atoppa jat pumnamaksa, prabhubu thagatlu, amasung jat pumnamakna ibungo mahakpu thagatsanu. 

12 Aduga amukka Jisaiyana hai, Jisaiyagi mara leigani amasung atoppa jatsinggi mathakta mapu oinaba ama phaorakkani, Ibungo aduda atoppa jatsingna tarang tarang khangna ninggani. 

13 Thawai asengbagi pangganna nakhoigi tarang tarang khangna ningba hengatnanaba, tarang tarang khangna ningbagi iswarna nakhoigi thajabada haraoba amasung ingthaba pumnamakna nakhoibu thalhanbisanu.


Polna thouna phana iba


14 Amahiksung, he eigi ichin inaosa, nakhoi nasamak aphabana thalle, mahei pumnamak phangle amasung amana amabu waraknabasu ngamle haiba ei isamaknasu nakhoigi maramda thajare. 

15 Touigumbasung atoppa jatsingda ei Khrista Jisugi thougan touba mi oijagadabani haiba iswarna eingonda pinabiraba thoujal adugi maramna, nakhoibu amuk ningsinghannabagum eina nakhoida maram khara kharada henna thouna phana ijei. 

16 Thawai asengbana sengdokpikhraba atoppa jatsingbu katchaba adu yabiba oiraknanaba, eina purohitkum iswargi aphaba wapao adugi thogan toujari. 

17 Maram aduna iswargi mari oiba thabakta eina Khrista Jisuda eigi chaothokchaba phangjei. 

18 Maramdi wahei amasung thabakna, khudamsing amasung angak angakpagi pangganda, thawai asengbagi pangganda atoppa jatsinggi haiba inbagi damak Khristana eigi ipanna toukhi toukhiba adu nattana, eina kari amata ngangba thouna pharoi. 

19 Asum touna Jerusalemdagi, amasung ikoi koina Illurikam phaoba eina Khristagi aphaba wapao isu suna sandokchare; 

20 Hoi, asumna eina mi atoppa amagi yumpham mathakta sagattananaba, Khristagi ming ikhang khangdriba mapham aduga aphaba wapao sandoknaba eigi wakhalgi tendam oijare; 

21 Ikhiba asigumbani, Ibungogi maramda pao ithung thungdriba makhoina ujagani, amasung ita tadriba makhoina khanglakkani.


Pol masagi khujil thourang


22 Adugi marmnasu nakhoida lakkadabagi matam ayambada eibu khambani. 

23 Touigumbasung houjikti maikei asida amuk mapham phangdrabana, aduga chahi yamna kuinadagi nakhoida yamna lakninglibana, 

24 Karigumba matamda eina Spenda chatpada (Maramdi eigi langphei khongchatta eina nakhoibu unagani aduga ahanbada eina nakhoigi kanglupka khara nungngaiminnaraga, nakhoina adomda eibu lambida thindokpigani haina ningjei) 

25 Touigumbasung houjikti eina asengbasinggi thougan tounaba Jerusalem tanna chatkadouri. 

26 Maramdi Jerusalemda leiba asengbasinggi marakta lairabasinggi damak karigumba khara katchabana Makidoniya amasung Akhaiyagi penjaba oire. 

27 Hoi, makhoigi penjaba oire; aduga makhoidi makhoida laman tonbani. Maramdi atoppa jatsingna makhoigi thawaigi oiba pot phangminnaba oirabadi, hakchanggi oiba pottasu makhoina makhoida thougan tounaba laman tonba oire. 

28 Maram aduna eina thabak asi loiduna, makhoida mahei asi sengna pithoklamlaga, eina nakhoidagi Spen tanna chatkani. 

29 Amasung eina nakhoida lakpa matamda Khristagi athanba borga loinana eina lakchagani haiba khangjei. 

30 Amahiksung, ichin inaosa, Jihudiyada leiba haiba indabasingdagi einu kanbinanaba, amasung Jerusalemgi damak eina toujaba thougan adu asengbasingna yabinanaba, 

31 Eigidamak iswargi maphamda nakhoi eiga loinana yamna kanna haijaminnanaba, eikhoi Prabhu Jisu Khristagi mapanna, amasung thawai asenbagi nungsibana eina nakhoida nijari; 

32 Aduna eina iswargi ningba matung inna nakhoida haraona lakchaduna, nakhoiga loinana pothajaba phangminnanabani. 

33 Houjikti ingthabagi iswarna nakhoi pumnamakka loinabisanu. Amen.

ROMIYA 16 

Masan Khurumjaba


1 Kenkhriyada leiba singlupki thougan toubi eikhoigi ichan Phoibibu nakhoina asengbasinggum matik chana prabhuda lousinbinaba eina nakhoida sinnajari; 

2 Aduga nakhoidagi mahakki karigumba kannagadaba leirabadi, nakhoina mahakpu pangbiyu, maramdi mahak masamakna ayambagi amasung ei isamakkisu tengbangbiba oire. 

3 Khrista Jisuda eiga thabak suminnaba Priska amasung Akulada khurumjei; 

4 Nakhoina ithawaigi damak makhoigi mangak yonthokpi. Ei ithantana makhoibu thagatpa nattana, atoppa jatsinggi singlup pumnamaknasu thagatpani. 

5 Makhoigi yumda tinaba singluppusu khurumjei. Khristagi maphamda Esiyagi ahanba mahei oiriba eigi achanba Epinetabu khurumjei. 

6 Nakhoigi damak yamna nomlabi Mariyambu khurumjei. 

7 Eigi sageising oiba amasung eiga phadok oiminnaramba Andronikaga Juniyagabu khurumjei; makhoidi pakhonchatpasinggi marakta khangnaba amasung eingondagi hanna Khristada leiramba mini. 

8 Prabhuda eigi achanba Ampliyabu khurumjei. 

9 Khristada eikhoiga thabak suminnaba Ubranabu amasung eigi achanba Stakhubu khurumjei. 

10 Khristagi maphamda yanaraba Appellibu khurumjei. Aristobulgi imungda leibasingbu khurumjei. 

11 Eigi sagei Herodiyonbu khurumjei. Nakrisagi imung, prabhuda leiribasing adubu khurumjei. 

12 Prabhuga loinana nomlibi Kriphinabu amasung Kraphosabu khurumjei. Prabhuga loinana yamna nomlabi achanbi Prasibu khurumjei. 

13 Prabhugi damak khandoklaba Ruphabu amasung mahakkisu eihakkisu imabu khurumjei. 

14 Asunkritabu, Phlegonbu Harmmibu, Patrobabu, Harmmabu amasung makhoiga leiminnaba ichin inaosingbu khurumjei. 

15 Philologaga Juliyagabu, Nireyaga mahakki machan-gabu, Olumpabu amasung makhoiga leiminnariba asengba pumnamakpu khurumjei. 

16 Sengna chupnabaga loinana amana amabu khurumnabiyu. Khristagi singlup pumnamakna nakhoibu khurumjei. 

17 Amahiksung, ichin inaosa, eina nakhoibu nijari, nakhoina tamkhraba wapao adugi onna-teina na, tokhai tokhai tahanba amasung khudi thihanba makhoi adubu masak khang-u, aduga makhoi adudagi tongallu. 

18 Maramdi adugumba mising adudi eikhoigi Prabhu Khristagi manai natte, adubu makhoimakki mapukkini, aduga makhoigi thumna amasung phajana ngangba aduna michamsinggi pukningbu lounam toubani. 

19 Maramdi nakhoigi haiba inbagi wa adu mi pumnamakta youkhre. Maram aduna eina nakhoigi maramda haraojei, adubu nakhoina aphabagi marida heisingba amasung phattabagi marida waoithouoidaba eina pamjei. 

20 Amasung khara leiraga ingthabagi iswarna seitanbu nakhoigi khongkhada taha-t-han-gani. Eikhoigi Prabhu Jisu Khristagi thoujal nakhoiga loinabisanu. 

21 Eiga thabak suminnaba Timothiya aduga eigi sageising oiba Lukiya, Jason amasung Sosipatra, makhoi asina nakhoibu khurumjei; 

22 Chithi asi ijariba Tartiya eina prabhuda nakhoibu khurumjei. Eigi amasung singlup apumbagi yumthang pibiba Gayana nakhoibu khrumjei. 

23 Sahargi selungba Erastana amasung ichin inao Kwartana nakhoibu khurum-jei. 

(24 Eikhoigi Prabhu Jisu Khristagi thoujanna nakhoi pumnamakka loinabisanu. Amen.)


Aroiba thagatpa amasung haijaba


25 Houjikti eigi aphaba wapaogi matunginna amasung athuppa wa phongdoktuna Jisu Khristgi maramda sandokpagi matung inna, nakhoibu chethanba ngamba ibungo mangonda eina nakhoibu sinnajari. 26 Athuppa wa asi houba naidaba matam chuppa tuminna thamlamba adu houjik phongdokpire, amasung iswargi wa takthokpasinggi sastragi mapanna, lomba naidaba iswargi yathanggi matung inna, jat pumnamakta thajabagi haiba innanaba khanghanbire. 27 Amata ngaiba asingba Iswarda, Jisu Khristagi mapanna, lomba naidana thagatpa oisanu. Amen.

KORINTHIYASINGDA POLNA IBA AHANBA LAIRIK 

A-iba: Pol 

Magi matam: A.D. 54-55 aduwai 

Wamachang: Iswar thajabasinggi lamchat sajat. 

Masigi chithi asi Missionary Polna Ephisa khuldagi irakpani. Khristansing adugi lamchat phattabagi maramna Korint khulgi singlupsing adu awaba yamna tarammi. Makhoising adu aphaba oiraknaba Polna masi ibani. Makhoigi marakta wathok kayamarum thoklammi madudi luhongbagi maram, kainabagi maram, irat-puja toubagi pot chaba thakpagi maram asini. Aduna Missionary Polna makhoibu macha manaogumna thawai asengbana tongan tongan thabak toubagi maram, Prabhugi chakkhanggi maram amadi Jisu Khrista sibadagi amuk hinggatlakpagi maram pumnamak sugaina chithi asida iduna khanghalli. 

 I KORINTHIYA 1 

Khurumjaba amasung iswarbu thagatpa


1 Iswargi ningbibagi mapanna Jisu Kristagi pakhonchatpa oina kouraba Polna amasung eikhoigi ichin inao Sosthenina Korinthada leiba iswargi singlupta, 

2 Haibadi, asengbasing oina kouraba, Khrista Jisuda sengdoklaba makhoida amasung eikhoigi Prabhu makhoigisu eikhoigisu oiba Jisu Khristagi mingbu koujaba, mapham khudingda leiba pumnamkta khanghanjari. 

3 Eikhoigi ipa iswar amasung Prabhu Jisu Khristadagi thoujal amasung ingthaba nakhoida leibisanu. 

4 Khrista Jisuda leiba nakhoida pikhraba iswargi thoujal adugi damak eina nakhoigi maramda matam leiba khibikta Iswarbu thagatchei; 

5 Adudi ibungoda leiduna nakhoidi maram khuding makta wangang pumnamakta amasung mahei pumnamakta hengatle; 

6 Asumna Khristagi marida sakshi adu nakhoigi narakta chethanbire; 

7 Maram aduna eikhoigi Prabhu Jisu Khrista phongdokpa adugi damak ngaijaduna nakhoida khudon phangnaba karisu watte; 

8 Aduga eikhoigi Prabhu Jisu Khristagi numit aduda maral leitanaba, ibungona nakhoibu mameiphaoba chethanbigani. 

9 Iswardi thajaba jabani, Ibungo mahakki mapanna macha nipa Jisu Khrista haibadi eikhoigi prabhugi marup mapang oinaba nakhoibu koubire.


Singlupki manungda tokhai tanaba


10 Houjik, he ichin inaosa, nakhoi pumnamak na hiram amata ngangnanaba, amasung nakhoigi narakta kainaba leitana pukning amata amasung wakhal amata oina taisinnanaba, eina eikhoigi Prabhu Jisu Khristagi ming sonjaduna nakhoida haijari. 

11 Maramdi, eigi ichin inaosa, nakhoigi narakta khatnaba leinari haiduna Khloigi imung manung na eingonda tamle. 

12 Adudi asini, nakhoi khudingna, eidi Polgini, eidi Appollogini, eidi Keiphagini, eidi Khristagini, hainei. 

13 Khristabu yennarabra? Nakhoigi damak Polbu krosta hatlabra? nattraga nakhoibu Polgi mingda baptais tourabra? 

14 Nakhoina eigi mingda baptais loure haina kanagumba mina haigani haiduna, Krispa amasung Gayabu nattana 

15 Eina nakhoi kana amatabu baptais toubide haiduna eina harao-jei. 

16 Aduga eina Stephanagi imungbasu baptais toubikhi; asi nattana eina atei kanagumbabu baptais toubikhi haiba khangde. 

17 Maramdi baptais tounaba Khristana eibu thaba natte, adubu Khristagi kros aremba oidananaba waheigi lousing yaodana, aphaba wapao adu sandoknaba thabibani.


Kroski panggan


18 Maramdi kroski wa asi manglibasingdadi apangbani, adubu kanbiriba eikhoidadi Iswargi pangganni. 

19 Maramdi masi ikhrabani, eina asingbasinggi lousing adu manghangani, aduga khanba heibasinggi wakhal adu eina karisu nattaba oihan-gani. 

20 Asingba mi kadaida leibage? Sastragi ojha kadaida leibage? taibangpanba asigi marei yetnaba heiba mi kadaida leibage? Taibangpanbagi lousing adu iswarna panghanba nattra? 

21 Maramdi Iswargi lousingda taibangpanbana makhoigi lousinggi mapanna Iswarbu khanglamdaba maramna aphaba wapao sandokpagi apangba thabak adugi mapanna thajabasingbu kanbinaba Iswarna phei haina ningle. 

22 Marimdi Jihudisingna khudam thi aduga Griksingda lousing thi; 

23 Touigumbasung eikhoidi krosta hatkhraba Khristabu sandok-i; krosta hatkhraba Khrista asi Jihudisingda khudi thinapham amasung atoppa jatsingda apangba oi; 

24 Adubu koubiraba Jihudisingdasu Griksingdasu Khrista asi Iswargi panggal amasung Iswargi lousing oi. 

25 Maramdi Iswargi apangba aduna misingdagi henna sing-i, aduga Iswargi asonba aduna misingda henna kalli. 

26 Maramdi, ichin inaosa, nakhoigi koubiba yengu, haibadi, hakchanggi matung inna singba yamdabani, kanba yamdabani, achou asangba yamdabani; 

27 Touigumbasung asingbasingbu ikaihannanaba, taibangpanbagi apangba adu Iswarna khalle; aduga akanba adu ikaihannanaba, taibangpanbagi apangba adu Iswarna khalle; 

28 Amasung oiriba adu karisu nattaba oihannanaba, taibangpanbagi atonba adu, usittaba adu amasung oidaba adu Iswarna khalle; 

29 Kana amatana Iswargi mingda napal toudananabani. 

30 Adubu Ibungo mahakki mapan-dagi nakhoidi Khristada lei; Ibungodi eikhoigi damak Iswardagi lousing dharmachenba, sengdokpiba amasung handok-piba oirakle; 

31 Napal touba mahak aduna Prabhugi maramda napal tousanu haiduna ikhraba matung inna oinanabani.

I KORINTHIYA 2 

Taibanggi lousing amasung iswargi phongdokpiba


1 Amahiksung, ichin inaosa, eina nakhoida lakpada, Iswargi athuppa wa adu nakhoida athoiba waheina nattraga athoiba lousingna phongdokpa lakpa natte. 

2 Maramdi Jisu Khristabu amasung Ibungobu krosta hatkhiba adu nattana eina nakhoidi narakta kari amata khangdanaba ipukning leple. 

3 Amasung eina nakhoiga loinana sonna, kina, amasung yamna tanik tanikna leijarammi; 

4 Aduga nakhoigi thajaba adu mioibagi lousingda oidaduna Iswargi pangganda oinanaba; 

5 Eigi wangang amasung pao sandokpa adu lousinggi athemba wada oidaduna thawaigi amasung panggan-gi uhanbibida oire. 

6 Adum oinamakpu ahal oirabasinggi marakta eikhoina lousinggi wa ngang-i, adubu taibangpanba asigi lousing natte, aduga taibangpanba asigi aremba oirak-liba mapusinggi lousing natte. 

7 Toui-gumbasung taibangpanba pumnamak oidringeida Iswarna eikhoigi itik ingan-gi damak hanna langbikhraba lotlamba athuppa wa oiba Iswargi lousing eikhoina ngangbani. 

8 Lousing asi taibangpanba asigi mapusing kana amatana khanglamde; maramdi makhoina madu khanglamlabadi, makhoina matik mangangi Prabhubu krosta hatlamloidabani. 

9 Touigumbasung ikhraba asigumbani, mina udaba, nana tadaba amasung mioibagi pukningda changdaba, pumnamak adu Iswarna Ibungo mahakpu nungsibaggi damak thourang toubikhre. 

10 Maramdi Iswarna eikhoigi damak thawaigi mapanna phongdokpire, maramdi thawai aduna hiram pumnamak, haibadi Iswargi aruba wa adu thi. 

11 Maramdi mioibada leiba thawai adu nattana, mioibagi marakta kanana mioibagi hirambu khangbage? Adugumduna Iswargi hiram adusu Iswargi thawai nattana kananasu khangde. 

12 Touigumbasung Iswarna eikhoida lemma pibikhraba hiram adu eikhoina khangba ngamnanaba, eikhoina taibangpanbagi thawai adu phangjaraba natte, adubu Iswardagi oiba thawai adu phangjarabani. 

13 Hiram asisu eikhoina mioibagi lousing na tambiba wahei nattana, thawaigi oiba waga thawaigi oiba hiramga tinnaduna, thawaina tambiba waheina ngangbani. 

14 Amahiksung mahousagi oiba mina Iswargi thawaigi hiram adu loude, maramdi mangondadi madu khibik adu apangbani, aduga mahakna madu khangba ngamde, maramdi madu thawaina chang yengbani. 

15 Touigumbasung thawaigi oiba mahak aduna hiram pumnamak chang yeng-i, aduga mahak masubu kananasu chang yengde. 

16 Maramdi kanana Prabhugi pukning khangladuna Ibungo mahakpu takpigadage? Touigumbasung eikhoidi Khristagi pukning phangjare.

I KORINTHIYA 3 

Tokkhai tanaba pukchel adu aranba tahanba


1 Amahiksung, ichin inaosa eina nakhoida thawaigi oiba mida ngangbagumna ngangba ngamdre, adubu hakchanggi oiba mida ngangba gumna, Khristada leiba angang machasingda ngangbagumna nganglibani. 

2 Eina nakhoibu sanggom pijare, akanba chinjak pijade; maramdi nakhoina khangba ngamde; hoi, nakhoina houjik phaoba ngamdri; 

3 Maramdi nakhoi houjisku hakchanggi oiba mini. Maramdi nakhoidi narakta kallaknaba amasung khatnaba leiriba aduna nakhoi hakchanggi oiba mi oina leiba nattra, amasung mioibagi machat matung inna nakhoina chatpa nattra? 

4 Maramdi kanagumbana, eidi Polgini, aduga atei amana, eidi Apollogini, haibbada nakhoi chumnagi mioiba nattra? 

5 Adunadi Apollo karino? aduga Pol karino? Thougan toubasingni, makhoigi mapanna nakhoina thajakhrabani, amasung Prabhuna makhoi amamamda pibikhrabagumbani. 

6 Eina mapal thare, Apollona ising chaire, adubu Iswarna chaokhathanbiribani: 

7 Adunadi mapal thaba amasung ising chaiba mi adu karisu natte, adubu chaokhathanbiriba Iswar aduni. 

8 Adugi mapal thaba migi ising chaiba miga amatani; adubu makhoi amamamna magi nombagi matung inna magi magi mama phangjagani. 

9 Maramdi eikhoidi Iswargi thabak suminnabasingni; nakhoidi Iswargi a uba lou, Iswargi asaba yumni.


Ojhasinggi mathoudang


10 Eingonda pibikhraba Iswargi thoujal matung inna, asingba yum saba mapu amagumna eina yumpham thongatle, aduga atei amana madugi mathakta yum sabani. Adubu mi khudingna madugi mathakta karamna sagadage haina cheksinsanu. 

11 Maramdi thongatkhraba yumpham, haibadi jisu Khrista; adu nattana mi kana amatana yumpham atei thonba ngamde. 

12 Touigumbasung kanagumba amana yumpham adugi mathakta sanana, lupana, mamal luba nungna, una, napi akangbana, charukhokna sarabadi, mi khudinggi thabak adu phongdokkani; 

13 Maramdi numit aduna madu uhan-gani, maramdi madu meina phongdokkani, aduga meimakna mikhudinggi thabak adu karambano khanghan-gani. 

14 Kanagumba migi thabak, madugi mathakta mahakna sakhiba adu leihourabadi, mahakna mana phangjagani. 

15 Kanagumba migi thabak mei chakthokkhrabadi, mahakki mangba adubu mahak masabudi kanbigani, adum oinamakpu meinung-dagigum kanbiba phangjagani. 

16 Nakhoidi Iswargi asengba sangni amasung thawaina nakhoigi manungda leiribani haiba nakhoina khangdra? 

17 Kanagumba mina Iswargi asengba sang adu manghallabadi, mahak adubu Iswarna manghan-gani. Maramdi Iswargi sangdi asengbani, aduga nakhoidi maduni. 

18 Mi kana amatana masa mathantabu namthak toudasanu. Nakhoigi narakta taibangpanba asida kanagumba mina asingbani haina ningjarabadi, mahakna asingba oiraknanaba mahak apangba oiraksanu. 

19 Maramdi Taibangpanba asigi lousing Iswargi mityengda apangbani. Maramdi masi ikhrabani, asingbasingbu makhoigi marei marada phaba mahak; 

20 Amukka, asingbasinggi wakhal adu arembani haina Prabhuna khang-i: 

21 Adugi damakna kana amatana mioibagi maramda napal toudasanu. 

22 Maramdi pumnamak nakhoigini, Pol oirabasu, Apollo oirabasu, Keipha oirabasu, taibangpal oirabasu, hingba oirabasu, siba oirabasu, oiriba oirabasu, oirakkadaba oirabasu pumnamak nakhoigini; 

23 Aduga nakhoidi Khristagini; amasung Khristadi Iswargini.

I KORINTHIYA 4 

Iswargi maphamda pakhonchatpasinggi mathoudang


1 Asum touna mina eikhoibu Khristagi thougan touba mi-singgum, amasung Iswargi athuppa wagi, dewansinggum singthanabisanu. 

2 Asida amuk henna dewansinggi marakta thajaba yaba kanagumbabu thibani. 

3 Touigumbasung nakhoina nattraga migi wayenna eibu wayenba adu eingondadi yamna pikpa potni; hoi, eina isa ithantabu wayende. 

4 Maramdi ei isagi iral karisu khangde, adum oinamakpu asina eibu chumhanba natte; adubu eibu wayenba mahak adudi Prabhuni. 

5 Maram aduna Prabhu lenglaktriba phaoba, matam oidringeida karisu wayen-ganu; Ibungona amambagi arotpa pot adu manganda pubirakkani, aduga pukninggi wakhal adu phongdokpigani; amasung matam aduda mi khudingna Iswardagi magi magi thagatpa phangjagdni. 

6 Amahiksung, ichin inaosa, nakhoi kana amatana amagi damak ateigi mathakta yeknaduna chaothoktananaba ikhiba adu hendokphade haibasi eikhoigi mapanna nakhoinana tamnanaba, nakhoigi maramgi damak eina isa ithanta da amasung appolloda hiramsing asi pandam toubani. 

7 Maramdi kanana nangbu tongan hanbage? amasung nangna phangdaba kari leibage? Adubu nangna phangbamak oirabadi, nangna phangdabagum karigi chaothoklibage? 

8 Houjikti nakhoi puk thalleda! Houjikti nakhoi inakkhullakleda! Eikhoi yaodana nakhoina ningthou oina pallakleda!Hoi, eikhoisu nakhoiga loinana ningthou oina pannanaba, nakhoina ningthou oina panba eina pamjabani. 

9 Maramdi sigadabe misinggum, Iswarna eikhoi pakhonchatpasingbu ikon konbada puthokpire haina eina ningjei; maramdi taibangpan-gi, swargadutsinggi amasung misinggi maphamda eikhoi kummei oirakle. 

10 Eikhoidi Khristagi maramgi damak apangbani, adubu nakhoidi Khristada asingbani; eikhoidi solli, adubu nakhoidi kalli; nakhoidi thagatpa phang-i, adubu eikhoidi maithiba phangi. 

11 Houjik pang asi phaoba eikhoidi chak lamli, khourangli, phi thungdri, phuba phangli, amasung areppa leipham phangdri; 

12 Aduga eikhoina ikhutmakna sujaduna nomli; cheirabada eikhoina bor pi; ot-neirabada eikhoina khang-i; 

13 Mingchat thihallabada eikhoina themjilli eikhoidi houjik phaoba taibangpan-gi amotpa potkum, pumnamakki thunam-nangei oirakle.


Mapagi mtougumna paomenba amasung mit-na singhanba


14 Eina nakhoibu ikaihannanaba hiramsing asi iba natte, adubu eigi achanba ichasinggumna nakhoibu waraknanabani. 

15 Maramdi Khristagi marida chingbiba nai lising tara nakhoigi leirabasu, nakhoigi napa yamba natte; maramdi Khrista Jisugi marida aphaba wapaogi mapanna eina nakhoibu pokpire. 

16 Maram aduna eina nakhoibu nonjari, nakhoina eigi itou loubasing oibiyu. 

17 Maram asigi damak Prabhugi marida eigi achanba amasung thajaba yaba icha Timothiyabu nakhoida eina thare. Mapham khudingda, singlup khudingda, eina tambibagum, Khrista Jisuda leiba eigi lichat makhei mahakna nakhoibu nigsinghanbigani. 

18 Adubu eina nakhoida lakloi haiduna kana kanagumba na chaothokle. 

19 Touigumbasung Prabhuna ningbirabadi eina nakhoida khara leiraga lakchagani; aduna chaothokpasing adugi mawa nattaduna eina makhoigi panggal khanggani. 

20 Maramdi Iswargi leibakti waheigi natte, panggan-gini. 

21 Eina nakhoida cheibun-ga loinana lakkadra, nattraga nungsina amasung nollukpagi thawaina lakkadra? nakhoida kari pambage?

I KORINTHIYA 5 

Singlupki manungda ikaiba wathok amagi maram


1 Nakhoigi narakta marumbi thamba lei haiduna pao sengna tamlare, amasung asigumba marumbi thamba asi atoppa jatsinggi maraktamaksu leite, haibadi, kanagumba amana magi mapagi nupibu thamle. 

2 Amasung thabak asi touraba mahak adubu nakhoigi naraktagi louthoknanaba tengthabagi mahutta nakhoina chaothokle. 

3 Maramdi ei thanggei sengna, isa yaojadrabasu, ithawainadi yaoduna, thabak asi asumna touba mibu ei yaojabagum wayenkhre, 

4 Haibadi, eikhoigi Prabhu Jisugi mingdga, nakhoiga eigi thawaigana eikhoigi Prabhu Jisugi panggan ga loinana tinnarabada, 

5 Asigumba mibu, Prabhugi numitta mahakki thawai kanibaba yananaba hakchang mangnabagi damak seitanda pithok-nabani. 

6 Nakhoigi chaothokpa phajade. Hamei khajiktana matum apumba kainkhathalli haiba nakhoina khangdra? 

7 Nakhoi hamei yaodabagumna, nakhoi anouba matum oinanaba, ariba hamei adu pumseng sengdok-u. Maramdi eikhoigi aran-chakkhangbagi yao macha, Khristabu, hatkhre. 

8 Maram adugi damak eikhoina ariba hameiga kallakpagi amasung phattabagi hameiga loinana chakkhangba adu chadaduna, hamei yaodaba asengbagi amasung achumbagi tan-ga chasi. 

9 Marumbi thambasingga totnaganu haiduna eina lairik aduda nakhoida ikhibada, 

10 Taibangpan asigi marumbi thambasingga nattraga karambasingga; namja-namtheknabasingga nattraga lai-murti latpasingga itot totnaganu haiba natte; maramdi madu oirabadi, nakhoina taibangpandagi chatthokpa tare. 

11 Adubu masigumbani, ichin inao minggou thoknaba kanagumbana marumbi thamba, karamba, lai-murti latpa wahei thiba, yu ngaoba nattraga namjanamtheknaba oirabadi, mi adugumbaga totnaganu haibata natte, chaba phaoba chaminnaganu haiduna eina nakhoida ikhibani. 

12 Maramdi mapanda leiba-singbu wayennba eigi thou kari leibage? Nakhoina manungda leibasingbu wayenba nattra? 

13 Touigumbasung, mapanda leibasingbu iswarna wayelli. Nakhoi nasen-gi maraktagi phattaba mi adubu inthok-u.

I KORINTHIYA 6 

Khristansinggi marakta wathoknaba


1 Nakhoigi narakta kanagumba amana ateigi mathakta wathok leirabada asengbasinggi mamangda chattaduna dharamachendabasinggi mamangda wayenhannaba thouna haribra? 

2 Aduga asengbasingna taibangpanbabu wayengani haiba nakhoina khangdra? Amasung taibangpanbabu haiba nakhoina wayel tourabadi, piklaba wathok adu nakhoina wayenba matik chadaba oibra? 

3 Eikhoina swargadutsingbu wayengani haiba nakhoina khangdra? Mipal asida oiriba wa adu eina haiba amuk kanaba leibra? 

4 Adunadi mipal asida oriba wa adu nakhoina wayenba tarabadi, wayennanaba singlupta masing chandabasingbu nakhoina phamhanbra? 

5 Nakhoibu ikaihannanaba eina haibani. Karino! machin manao-singgi marakta waroibiba marakta kanagumba asengba mi nakhoigi narakta ilei leitra, 

6 Adubu machin manao amana amagi mathakta wakatpa, adusu thajadabasinggi mamangda chatpra? 

7 Aduna houjikti nakhoi amana amaga wakatnaba lei haiba asi aoibamak nakhoigi sotthabani. Adugi sarukpudi nakhoina aranba khangbidaba karigino? adugi sarukpudi nakhoibu, lounam touba yabidaba karigino? 

8 Touigumbasung nakhoi nasamakna aranba amasung lounam tou-i, adusu nachin nanaosingi mathaktani. 

9 Aduga dharmachendabasingna Iswargi leibak phangloi haiba nakhoina khangdabra? Nakhoibu minamhan-ganu; marumbi thamba, laimurti latpa, mitu miwa lannaba, akhatpa thabak touba, matao taunaba, 

10 Huranba, karamba, yu ngaoba, wahei thiba amasung namja-namthek-naba, makhoi asina Iswargi leibak phangloi 

11 Amasung nakhoi kharana asigumba oirammi. Adubu eikhoigi Prabhu Jisu Khristagi mingda amasung eikhoigi Iswarna thawaida nakhoibu chamsu chamthokle, sengsu sengdokle, chumsu chumhalle.


Sengdaba thabakka khristan mipan-ga chunadaba


12 Eihakki damak pumnamak ya yabani, adubu pumnamak kanaba natte. Eihakki damak pumnamak iya yabani, adubu eidi karigumba amagi panggan-gi makha ponna leiraroi. 

13 Achapotna pukki damakni, aduga pukna achapotki damakni; adubu Iswarna amabusu amabusu manghangani. Touigumbasung hakchangdi marumbi thabakki damak natte, Prabhugi damakni, aduga Prabhuna hakchanggi dammakni; 

14 Amasung Iswarna Ibungo mahakki panggan-gi mapanna Prabhubu hinggatpire, aduga eikhoibusu hinggatpigani. 

15 Nakhoinakhoigi hakchang adu Khristagi kayatni haiba nakhoina khangdabra? Adunadi Khristagi kayat adu eina louthoklaga oktabigi kayat oihan-gadra? Madu khak oidasanu. 

16 Aduga oktabida napsinba mahak aduna maga hakchang amata oi haiba nakhoi khangdabra? Maramdi Iswarna hai, ani aduna hakching amata oigadabani. 

17 Touigumbasung Prabhuda napsinba mahak aduna Prabhuga thawai amata oi. 

18 Marumbi thabaktagi chenthok-u Mina touba pap khuding hakchanggi mapandani; adubu marumbi tinnaba mahak aduna mahakmakki hakchangbu yeknaduna pap toubani. 

19 Aduga nakhoi nakhoigi hakchangdi nakhoina Iswardagi phangba, nakhoi gi manungda leiriba thawai asengba adugi asengba sangni haiba nakhoina khangdabra? Aduga nakhoidi nakhoi narannaigi natte; 

20 Maramdi nakhoibu mamanna leire. Maram aduna nakhoi nakhoigi hakchang manungda Iswarbu ikaikhumnou.

I KORINTHIYA 7 

Luhongbagi, yumbandabagi amasung nupi khainabagi maram


1 Houjik nakhoina irakpa wa adugi maridi Mina yum pandaba phei. 

2 Adubu marumbigi thabak yambagi maramna nipa khudingna magi magi nupi lousanu aduga nupi khudingna magi nipa lukanu. 

3 Mapu-roibana magi nupida adu pisanu, aduga adugumna nupinasu magi mapuroibada pisanu. 

4 Nupina mamakki hakchanggi mapu natte, adubu mapuroibanani; aduga adugumna mapuroibana mamakki hakchanggi mapu natte, adubu magi nupinani. 

5 Nakhoi nasana haijabagi damak matam sangnanaba, matam kharagidamak nakhoi ani yanaba nattana, nakhoi amana amabu khamnaganu; aduga nakhoi nakhoigi nasa khudam chanba watpa maramna seitanna nakhoibu themdananaba nakhoina amuk hanna tinnaba phei. 

6 Adubu eina haiba asi yathang oina natte, yanaba oina haijabani. 

7 Touigumbasung mi pumnamakna eimakka mannaba eina pamjei. Adubu mi khudingmakna magi magi khudon, amana machat asigi matung inna, aduga atei amana machat adugi matting inna, iswardagi phangjare. 

8 Touigumbasung eina yum pandabasingda amasung lukhrabisingda haibani, makhoina eiga mannana leirabadi phei. 

9 Adubu makhoina masa khudam chanjaba ngamdrabadi luhongsanu; maramdi meichak khanggadabadagi luhongbana henna phei. 

10 Touigumbasung luhongbasingda eina yathang piri, eina natte, adubu Prabhunani, haibadi, nupina mapuroibadagi khainadasanu. 

11 (Adubu mahakna khainnaragadi luhongdana leisanu, nattraga mahakki mapuroibada taisinnajasanu); amasung mapurooiba aduna mahakki nupibu thadoktasanu. 

12 Touigumbasung atei ateisingda eina hairi, Prabhuna natte, kanagumba ichin inao thajadabi nupi leirabadi aduga nupi aduna mahakka leiminnanaba yarabadi, mahakna mabu thadoktasanu, 

13 Amasung kanagumba nupi amagi thajadaba mapuroiba leirabadi, aduga mapuroiba aduna mahakka leiminnaba yarabadi, nupi aduna mapuroibabu thadoktasanu. 

14 Maramdi thajadaba maputoiba adu mahakki nupigi mapanna senghalli, amasung thajadabi nupi adu ichin inao adugi mapanna senghalli; nattrabadi nakhoigi nachasingdi sengde, adubu houjik makhoi seng-i. 

15 Adumakpu thajadaba aduna khainarabadi mahakna khainasanu; ichin inao oirabasu, ichan oirabasu, asigumba asida apunbagi makha pondre. Adubu Iswarna eikhoibu ingthana leinanaba koubire. 

16 Maramdi, he nupi, nahakna napuroibabu kanbigani kanbiroi karamna khangbage? Aduga, he mapurobia, nahakna nahakki nupibu kanbigani kanbiroi karamna khangbage? 

17 Adubu Prabhuna mi khudingda yenbibagumna, Iswarna mi khudingbu koubibagumna, mahakna asumnata chatsanu. Amasung eina singlup pumnamakta adugumna sinnabani. 

18 Un kaklaba kanagumba mibu koubirabra? Mhakna un kaktaba oiraktasanu. Un kaktaba kanagumba mibu koubirabra? Mahakna un kaktaba leisanu; 

19 Un kakpasu karisu natte, un kaktabasu karisu natte, adubu Iswargi yathang ngakpa adugi. 

20 Mi khudingna mahak mahakpu koubiba makou aduda asummak leisanu, 21 Nangbu minai oiringeida koubibra? Madugi damak nungsa thiganu, adubu nangna ningtamba phangba ngamlabadi, madu henna sijinnou. 

22 Maramdi mini oiringeida Prabhugi marida koubiba mahak adu Prabhugi ningtamlaba mini, adugumduna maningtamba oina koubiba mi adu Khristagi minaini. 

23 Nakhoibu mamanna leire; misinggi mini oirakkanu. 

24 Ichin inaosa mahak mahakpu koubiba aduda mi khudingna Iswarga loinana chetna leisanu. 

25 Amahiksung leisabissinggi maramda eina Prabhugi yathang phangjade, adubu Prabhugi nungsibiba phangjaraba thajaba yaba amagumna eina eigi wakhal khanghanjari. 

26 Maram asina eikhoigi ithakta leiba awaba adugi maramna asi phei, haibadi, mahakna oiribagumna adum leijaba mioibagi damak phei haina eina ningjei. 

27 Nangbu nupida pullabra? Thadoknaba thiganu. Nangbu nupida punbagi thadoklabra? Nupi thiganu. 

28 Toui-gumbasung nahakna luhonglagadi nahakki pap leite, amasung leisabina luhonglabadi mahakki pap leite. Adum oinamakpu asigumbasingna hakchangda awaba phanggani aduga eina nakhoibu kanbige. 

29 Adubu, ichin inaosa, asi eina haijari, matam tensille; aduna houjiktagi nupi leibasingna leitabagumna oisanu. 

30 Aduga akappasingna kaptabagumna, haraobasingna harao-dabagumna oisanu; aduga areibasingna marannai leijadabagumna, 

31 Amasung taibangpanbagi thou sijinnabasingna madu pumsu suna sijinnadabagumna oisanu; maramdi taibangpal asigi chatnabidi lanthok-i. 

32 Touigumbasung nakhoina langtak-nadana leiba eina pambani. Mayum pandaba mi asuna Prabhubu karamna pelhangadaba haiduna Prabhugi thabakki damak cheksilli; 

33 Adubu luhonglaba mi aduna mahakki nupibu karamna pelhan-gadaba haiduna taibangpan-gi-oiba potki damak cheksilli, 

34 Aduga mahakki pukning yennei. amasung mayum naidabi nupiga leisabiga nasu mahakna karamna hakchangdasu thawaidasu asengbi oinanaba Prabhugi thabakki damak cheksilli. adubu luhonglabi aduna mapuroi-babu karamna pelhan-gadaba haiduna taibangpan-gi oiba thabakki damak cheksilli. 

35 Amahiksung nakhoimakki tongjanaba asi eina haibani; eina nakhoigi nathakta lang hunjin-ge haiba natte, adubu matik chana, amasung ka-ngao-nadana thougan toujabada nakhoina pukning thingjinba ngamnanabani. 

36 Touigumbasung kanagumba mi amana mahakki macha leisabiromda machat phajana toubide haina ninglabadi, mahakki chahi matanggi leisaba hendokkhrabadi, amasung asum touba kannarabadi, mahakna ningba adu tousanu pap toude; luhongjasanu. 

37 Adubu mahakki pukningda chap-lepkhraba kanagumba amana, tangaiphadaba leitana, mahakmakki ningba marida panggal leiba, amasung mahakmakki macha leisabibu ngaknaba mahakmakki pukningda wa loiba oirabadi, mahakna phajana tougani. 

38 Adunadi mahakmakki macha leisabibu luhongduna piba mi aduna phajana tou-i; aduga machabu luhongduna pidaba mi aduna henna phajana tougani. 

39 Mapuroibana hinglingei adupki makhei nupi adu pullibani; adubu mapuroibana sikhrabadi, mahakna pamba amana luhongnaba thadokpire; Prabhugi maridatani. 

40 Touigumbasung mahakna asumna leijarabadi, mahak henna nungaibani haiba eigi wakhanni; aduga eisu Iswargi thawai phangjei haiduna eina ning-i.

I KORINTHIYA 8 

Lailatpasinggi iratpot amasung achum aran khangnaba pukning solliba thajabasing


1 Amahiksung lai murtida katlurabe potki maramdi: eikhoi pumnamakki khangba lei haiba eikhoina khang-i. khangbana chaothokhalli, adubu nungsibana semgatli. 

2 Kana gumba mina karigumba khang-i haina ningjarabadi, mahakna khanggadabagum khangdri. 

3 Touigumbasung kanagumba mina Iswarbu nungsirabadi, mahakpu Ibungo mahakna khang-i. 

4 Maram aduna lai-murtida katluraba pot chabagi maramdadi, lai murtidi taibangpanda karisu natte, amasung Iswar ama nattana atei leite haiba eikhoina khang-i. 

5 Maramdi swargada nattraga prithibida lai koubasing adu leirabasu-asigunma lai yamna aduga mapu yamna leiri. 

6 Adum oinamakpu eikhoidadi Iswar ama, haibadi ipa adu, lei; Ibungo mangondagi pot pumnamak ioi oi aduga eikhoi Ibungo mahakki damakni; amasung Prabhu ama, haibadi Jisu Khrista adu, lei; Ibungogi mapanna pot pumnamaksu eikhoisu oiri. 

7 Adubu khangba adu mi pumnamakta leite. Touigumbasungiana kana kanagumbadi houjik phaoba mahousana lai-murti latlakpagi wakhal leibana lai-murtida katluraba potkumna chari; amasung makhoigi achum-aram khangnaba pukning sonbanina senghande. 

8 Touigumbasung chanaba potna eikhoibu Iswarda naksinhanba natte. Eikhoina chadraga henna phattaba natte, charagasu henna phaba natte. 

9 Adubu nakhoigi touba ngamba asina asonbasingda khudi thinaba oirakpa yai haiduna cheksillu. 

10 Maramdi lai-murtigi sangda chanaba phamliba akhangba nangbu kanagumbana urabadi, asonba oiriba mahak adugi achum-aran khangnaba pukningbu lai-murtida katluraba pot chananaba thouna phahalloidra? 

11 Maramdi nahakki khangbana Khristana mahakki mahutta sibiba, asonba nachin nanao adubu manghallabani. 

12 Aduga asumna nachin nanaosinggi mathakta pap touduna amasung makhoigi solliba achum-aran khangnaba pukningbu sokhanduna, nakhoina Khristagi mathakta pap tou-i. 

13 Maram adugi damak chanaba potna eigi ichin inaobu khudi thihallabadi, eigi ichin inaobu khudi thihandananaba, ei amuk hanna sa supcha charoi.

I KORINTHIYA 9 

Polna masagi phangpham thokpa thadokpagi pandam; misingbu Khristada pusinba ngamnaba mathawai luppa; lamjenda hoinaba khutchel


1 Ei iningtamba nattra? Ei pakhonchatpa ama nattra? Eina Jisu eikhoigi Prabhubu ukhraba nattra? Prabhugi marida nakhoi eigi thabakki mahei nattra? 

2 Ateisingdadi eina pakhonchatpa oidrabasu, nakhoidadi eina oijaribamakni; maramdi eigi pakhonchatpa oijabagi chum adudi Prabhugi marida nakhoi oiribani. 

3 Eibu chang yengbasingda eigi ngakthokchanaba wa asini: 

4 Chanathaknaba eikhoigi itik leitrane? 

5 Pakhonchatpa ateising, Prabhugi manaosing amasung Keipha, makhoiga mannana eikhoigi thajabi nupi punanaba itik leitrane? 

6 Aduga thabak suba toknanaba ei amasung Barnabagimakta matik leitrane? 

7 Kanana karigumbada mahakki marannaina lanmigi thabak touba leibage? Draksha ingkhol koiraga madugi mahei chadaba kana leibage? Aduga yao sanggu yoklaga sanggu adugi makhom chadaba kana leibage? 

8 Eina mioibagi machat matung inna asi khibik ngangbra? Aduga wayel yathang adunasu asi khibik haidabra? 

9 Maramdi Mousigi wayel yathang aduga masi ikhrabani, phou nethathalliba sallababu nangna machin punpharoi. Iswarna sallabasinggi damak ningba oibra? 

10 Nattraga eikhoigi maramgi damak aoibamakna haibra? Hoi, eikhoigi maramgi damak masi ikhre, maramdi lou khoiriba aduna saruk phangminnagani haiduna khoigadabani, aduga phou nethariba aduna saruk phangminnagani haiduna nethagadabani. 

11 Eikhoina nakhoi da thawaigi oiba maru hunkhraga, eikhoina nakhoigi hakchanggi oiba mahei loklagadi, madu aruba thabakla? 

12 Ateisingna nakhoigi nathakta matik asi saruk phangminnarabadi, eikhoinadi amuk henba nattra? Adum oinamakpu eikhoina matik asi sijinnade, adubu Khristagi aphaba wapaoda apanba thokhandananaba, hiram pumnamak eikhoina khang-i. 

13 Asengba potki maramda thougan touriba makhoina Iswar ningnasanggi pot adu chai haiba, amasung latnapung manakta thougalliba makhoina latnapungga loinana saruk phangminnei haiba nakhoina khangdabra? 

14 Adugumduna aba wapao sandokpa makhoina aphaba wapaogina hinggadabani haiba Prabhunasu sinbire. 

15 Adubu eina machatsing asi isi sijinnade, aduga eigidamak asum tounanaba eina wa khibik asi iba natte. Maramdi kanagumbana eigi chaothokchaba aremba oihangadabadagi eigi damak sibana phei. 

16 Maramdi eina aphaba wapao sandoklabadi, eigi chaothakpham leite; Maramdi tangaiphadaba ithakta lei. Maramdi eina aphaba wapao sandoktrabadi, eingonda awabanida! 

17 Maramdi eina eimakki apambana asi tourabadi eigi mana lei, adubu eimakki apambana nattrabadi eingonda dewan-gi thabak sinnabire. 

18 Adunadi eigi mana karino? Aphaba wapaoda eigi itik adu suna sijinna-daduna, eina sandokpada atoumal yao-dana eina aphaba wapao sandokpa aduni. 

19 Maramdi eina punmamaktagi iningtamba oijarabasu, eina mi henna tongjananaba, ei isabu pumnamakta minai oihadjei. 

20 Amasung Jihudisingbu tongjananaba, eina jihudisingda jihudigumba oijarakle; Wayel yathanggi makha ponna leibasingbu eina tongjananaba, ei isana wayel yathanggi makha ponjadrabasu, wayel yathanggi makha ponbasingda eina makha ponbagum oijarakle. 

21 Wayel yathanggi mapanda leibasingbu eina tongjananaba, Iswargi wayel yathanggi mapanda leiba oidaduna, Khristagi wayel yathanggi makha ponba eina wayel yathanggi mapanda leibasingda mapanda leibagum oirakle. 

22 Eina asonbasingbu tongjananaba, asonbasingda asonba oirakle; eina pambei pumnamakna mi kharabu kanbinanaba mi pumnamakta eina pumnamak oirakle. 

23 Amasung eina aphaba wapaogi saruk phangminnaba oinanaba, madugi maramgi damak eina pumnamak tou-i. 

24 Lamjel tannaba pumnamakna chellaga amatana mana phang-i haiba nakhoina khangdabra? Nakhoina soidana phangnanaba adugumna chellu. 

25 Aduga tannabada ngamnaba hotnariba mi khudingna maram pumnamakta masa khudum channaba tou-i. Adubu makhoinadi mangba yaba kokthon phangnanaba tou-i, eikhoinadi mangba yadaba adu phangnanaba toubani. 

26 Maram aduna eina areppa khangdabagum oidaduna, asumna chenbani; mahada yeidabagum eina asumna soknabani. 

27 Touigumbasung eina ateisingda pao sandoklaga, ei isamak karigumba yadaba oirakpa yai haiduna eina eigi hakchangbu cheipham piduna minai oina chingjei.

I KORINTHIYA 10 

Israyelsinggi warigi pandamdagi mit-na singhanba


1 Maramdi, ichin inaosa, nakhoina asi khangdaba eina pamde, madudi, eikhoigi ipa ipusing pumnamakna leichingi makhada leiduna samadru mayaida punmamak lanthokkhi, 

2 Aduga pumnamakna leichin manungda amasung samadru manungda Mousigida baptais loukhi, 

3 Aduga makhoi pumnamakna thawaigi oiba mannaba achapot chaminnakhi, 

4 Amasung makhoi pumnamakna thawaigi oiba mannaba ising thakminnakhi; maramdi makhoigi matung illiba thawaigi oiba nungjaodagi makhoina thakminnarammi, aduga nung-jao adudi Khrista oirammi. 

5 Adumakpu Iswarda makhoi ayambada penkhide, maramdi makhoibu lamjaoda inthukhi. 

6 Aduga makhoina phattaba pambagum eikhoinadi pamdananaba waramsing asi eikhoigi damak pandam oire. 

7 Aduga makhoi kharana lai murti latpasing oirambagum nakhoina oiganu; misingna chana-thaknaba phamthare amasung sannanaba hougatle haina ikhibagumbani. 

8 Aduga makhoi kharana marumbi thamduna, mi lising kun-humdoi nongmada sibagumna, eikhoina marumbi thamganusi. 

9 Amasung makhoi kharana Prabhubu chang yengduna makhoibu linna manghankhibagum, eikhoina Prabhubu chang yengganusi. 

10 Aduga makhoi kharana murum murum sonduna manghanba aduna manghanbagum, nakhoina murum murum son-ganu. 

11 Pumnamak asi pandam oina makhoida thokle, adubu jug jugki aroiba thunglaba eikhoibu mit-na singnabagi damak ikhrabani. 

12 Maram aduna lepli haina ningjaba mahak aduna taba yai haiduna cheksinjasanu. 

13 Mioibana khangba ngamba adudagi henna athembana nakhoibu phadri, Touigumbasung Iswardi thajaba yabani, nakhoina ngamjaba adudagi henna nakhoibu themnaba Ibungo mahakna yabiroi; adubu nakhoina khangba ngamnanaba athembaga loinana lanbinabasu Ibungo mahakna sembigani.


Lai-murti latpadagi tonganna Leiba


14 Maram aduna, eigi achanbasa, lai-murti latpadagi chenthok-u. 

15 Eina asingba misingda ngangbagumna ngangbani; eina haiba adu nakhoina khanbiyu. 

16 Eikhoina bor piba borgi tenggot adu Khristagi igi saruk phangminnaba nattra? 

17 Maramdi mayam oiba eikhoina tal ama, hakchang ama oi, maramdi eikhoi pumnamakna tal amagi saruk phangminnabani. 

18 Hakchanggi matung inna Israyelsingbu yengbiyu; iratpot-chabasing aduna latnapungga loinana saruk phangminnaba nattra? 

19 Adunadi eina kari haibano? Lai- murtida katluraba pot adu karigumba pot amani, nattraga laimurti adu karigumba pot amani haiduna eina haibra? 

20 Adubu atoppa jatsingna katpa iratpot adu makhoina bhutsingda katpani, Iswardadi natte haibani; aduga nakhoina bhutsingga loinana saruk phangminnaba eina pamjade. 

21 Nakhoina Prabhugi tenggottagi amasung bhutsinggi tenggottagi thakpa yade. Prabhugi mejdagi amasung bhutsinggi mejdagi saruk phangminnaba yade. 

22 Nattraga eikhoina Prabhubu khambannaba langnasira? Eikhoina Ibungo mangondagi henna kanbra? 

23 Pumnamak iya yabani, adubu pumnamak kannaba natte. Pumnamak iya yabani, adubu pumnamak semgathande. 

24 Mi kana amatana marannaigi thidasanu, adubu mi ateigi thisanu. 

25 Keithenda yolli yolliba pot adu achumaran khangnaba pukninggi damak wahang hangdaduna chao; 

26 Maramdi prithibi amasung madugi manungda leiri leiriba pumnamak Prabhugini. 

27 Thajadabasinggi marakta kanagumbana nakhoibu chakkhangbada kourabadi aduga nakhoina chatpa pamlabadi, achumaran khangnaba pukninggidamak wahang hangdaduna nakhoigi namangda khinbi khinbiba adu chao. 

28 Adubu kanagumbana nakhoida asi lai-murtida katpa potni hairabadi, madu utpiba mahakki maramna amasung achum-aran khangnaba pukninggi maramna chaganu; 

29 Achum-aran khangnaba pukning, eina haiba adu, nahakmakki natte, atei adugini; maramdi atei amagi achum-aran khangnaba pukningna eigi iningtambabu karigi wayenbage? 

30 Eina thagatpaga loinana saruk phangjarabadi, eina thagatpa piba adugi maramgi damak eibu karigi phattaba ngangbano? 

31 Maram aduna nakhoina chaba oirabasu, thakpa oirabasu, karigumba touba oirabasu, pumnamak Iswargi matik mangangi damak tou. 

32 Jihudisingbu, Griksingbu, amasung Iswargi singluppu khudi thihanganu; 

33 Makhoibu kanbinanaba, eigi irannai kannaba thidaduna mayamgi thiduna, maram pumnamakta mi pumnamakpu einasu asumna pelhanbamakni.

I KORINTHIYA 11 

Singlup tinnaba maphamda nupisingna makok khumba


1 Eina Khristagi matou lonbagumna, nakhoinasu eigi itou loubasing oibiyu. 

2 Amahiksung nakhoina hiram pum-namakta eibu ningsingbiduna, nakhoida eina sinnarambagumna, chatnarakliba khibik nakhoina chetna ngakli haina eina nakhoibu thagatchari. 

3 Touigumbasung nipa khudinggi. makokti Khristani, nupigi makokti nipani, amasung Khristagi makokti Iswarni haiba nakhoina khangba eina pammi. 

4 Makok khumduna haijaba nattraga Iswargi wa takthokpa nipa khudingna mahakki makokpu ikai khumnadabani; 

5 Adubu makok khumdaduna haijabi nattraga Iswargi wa takthokpi nupi khudingna mahakki makokpu ikai khumnadabani; maramdi asumtoubi asi lu kokthokpi nupiga chap mannabani. 

6 Maramdi nupina makok khumdrabadi mahakki samsu kakthatsanu; adubu masam kakpa nattraga kokthokpa nupigi damak ikaiba oirabadi, mahakki makok khumjasanu. 

7 Maramdi nipadi Iswargi murti amasung matik niangan oibanina mahakki makok khumloidabani; touigumbasung nupidi nipagi matik manganni. 

8 Maramdi nupidagi nipa thokte, adubu nipadagi nupi thokpani. 

9 Maramdi nupigi damak nipabu semlamba natte; adubu nipagi damak nupibu senlambani. 

10 Maram asigi damak swargadutsinggi maramna nupina mahakki makok thakta mikha ponbagi khudam leigadabani. 

11 Adum oinamakpu Prabhugi marida nipa yaodana nupi oide, aduga nupi yaodana nipa oide; 

12 Maramdi nupina nipadagi thokpagumna, nipanasu adugumna nupigi mapanna thok-i; adubu pot pumnamak Iswardagi thokpani. 

13 Nakhoi nasana wakhal toujou; nupina makok khumdana masam haijaba adu phajabra? 

14 Nipana masam sanglabadi, madu mangonda achoppani haiba mahousagi oiba adumakna nakhoibu tambiba nattra? 

15 Adubu nupina masam sanglabadi, madu mangonda thagatpani; maramdi kokkhumgi damak mangonda masam pibire. 

16 Touigumbasung kanagumbana ningai touninglabadi eikhoigidasu Iswargi singlupsinggidasu adugumba hounabi leite.


Prabhugi chakkhang adu chumna ngaktaba


17 Touigumbasung nakhoida yathang asi pibada, nakhoina tinnaraba adu henna phanabagi damak natte, adubu henna phattanabagi damakni haiduna eina nakhoibu thagatte. 

18 Maramdi ihan hanbada, nakhoina singlup tinnabada, nakhoigi narakta kainaba lei haiduna eina tai; aduga eina madu khara thajei. 

19 Maramdi yabirabasingbu nakhoigi narakta phongdokpinanaba, nakhoigi narakta ningai kanbasu leiba tare. 

20 Maram aduna nakhoina mapham amada tinnarabadi, Prabhugi chakkhangba adu chaba yade; 

21 Maramdi nakhoina chabada mi khudingda mi ateigi mamangda magi magi chara chanei, aduga mi amana lammi, atei amana yu ngao-i: 

22 Karino! chana-thaknanaba nayum nayum leitabra? Nattraga Iswargi singluppu nakhoina usittibra? Aduga leijadaba singbu ikaihanbra? Eina nakhoida kari haigani? Eina nakhoibu thagatkadra? Asigi maramda eina nakhoibu thagatte. 

23 Maramdi eina nakhoida pithokpa adu eina Prabhudagi phangjare, haibadi, Prabhu Jisubu pithokpa ahing aduga Ibungona tal loure; 

24 Aduga Ibungona thagatcharaga madu thugaiduna hai, asi nakhoigi damak oiba eigi hakchang aduni, Eibu ningsingnanaba asi tou. 

25 Chaba loirabada, maduga mannana Ibungona tenggotsu louduna hai, tenggot asidi eigi ina semba anouba walepnabani. Nakhoina masi thakpa thakpa khudingda eibu ningsingnanaba asi tou. 

26 Maramdi nakhoina tal asi chaba khudingda amasung tenggot asi thakpa khudingda Prabhu lenglaktriba phaoba, Ibungogi siba nakhoina khanghallibani. 

27 Maramdi adugi damak matik chadaba matouna Prabhugi tal chaba nattraga tenggot thakpa kanagumba adu Prabhugi hakchang amasung ida lallabani. 

28 Adubu mina masa mathantabu chang yengjasanu, aduga asumna mahakna tal adu chasanu amasung tenggot adudagi thaksanu. 

29 Maramdi hakchang adubu wakhal khandana chaba thakpa mahak aduna masa mathantagi mathakta wayennanaba cha-thakpani. 

30 Maram asigi damak nakhoigi narakta ayambana sonsu solli, nasa nai, aduga kharana tumkhre. 

31 Touigumbasung eikhoina eikhoi isa isabu chumna wayenjarabadi, eikhoibu wayel toubiroidabani. 

32 Adubu eikhoibu wayellabada, taibangpanbaga loinana ayolba tahandananaba, eikhoibu Prabhuna lakpibani. 

33 Maram adugi damak, eigi ichin inaosa, nakhoina chananaba tillabada, amana amabu ngainasanu. 

34 Kana kanagumbana lamlabadi, nakhoigi tinnaba adu ayolba tadanaba, mayumda chajasanu. Aduga wa atei ateidi eina lakpa matamda sillagani.

I KORINTHIYA 12 

Thawaigi oiba khudonsing adu yamlabasu amata oiba


1 Amahiksung ichin inaosa, thawaigi oiba khudon-gi marida nakhoina khangdaba eina pamde. 

2 Nakhoina atoppa jatsing oiringeida, nakhoibu chingba chingba khudingda marol thoktaba laimurtisingda koiching chinglammi haiba nakhoina khang-i. 

3 Maram asina Iswargi thawai-gi mapanna ngangduna mi kana amatana, Jisu sirap phanglabani, haide, amasung thawai asengbagi mapanna nattana mi kana amatana, Jisu Prabhuni, haiba ngamde haiba eina nakhoida khanghalli. 

4 Khudon-gi tongan tonganba lei, adubu thawai amatani. 

5 Amasung thougan toubagi tongan tonganba lei, aduga Prabhu amatani. 

6 Amasung thabakki tongan tonganba lei, aduga pumnamakta thabak pumnamak toubiba Iswar amatani. 

7 Touigumbasung mi khudingda tongjananabagi damak thawaigi phongdokpiba adu pinabire. 

8 Maramdi mi amada thawaigi mapanna lousinggi wahei, aduga atei amada thawai adumakki matung inna akhangbagi wahei pinabire; 

9 Atei amada thawai adumakna thajaba, aduga atei amada thawai ama aduna anaba phahanbagi khudon, 

10 Amasung atei amada toungamdaba thabak tounaba, atei amada Iswargi wa takthokpa, atei amada thawaisingbu khangnaba, atei amada lol makhal makha ayamba, aduga atei amada lol handokpa pinabire. 

11 Adubu Ibungo mahakna ningba matung inna thabak pumnamak asi mi khudingda magi magi yennabiduna, amata ngaiba thawai adumakna toubi.


Hakchanggi pandam


12 Maramdi hakchangdi amatani aduga ayamba kayat lei, amasung hakchang adugi kayat pumnamak yamlabasu hakchang amatani, adugumna Khristasu oire. 

13 Maramdi Jihudising oirabasu, Griksing oirabasu, minai oirabasu, maningtambasing oirabasu, thawai amana eikhoi pumnamakpu hakchang ama oinanaba baptais toubire; Aduga eikhoi pumnamakpu thawai amatadagi pithakle. 

14 Maramdi hakchangdi kayat amata natte, mayamni. 

15 Khongna eidi khut nattaba maramna eidi hakchanggi natte hairagadi, maram aduna madu hakchangi natte haiba yada. 

16 Aduga nakongna eidi mit nattaba maramna eidi hakchanggi natte hairagadi, maram aduna madu hakchanggi natte haiba yade. 

17 Hakchang apumba mit oiram-labadi, tanaba kadaida leibage? 

18 Adubu houjikti Iswarna Ibungo mahakki pambagi matung inna hakchangda amamam adu kayat oina palhanbire. 

19 Amasung pumnamak aduna kayat amata oirabadi, hakchangdi kadaida leibage? 

20 Adubu houjikti kayat yammi, hakchangdi amatani. 

21 Aduga mitna nangdi eingonda kannaba karisu leite haiduna khongda haiba ngamde. 

22 Natte, hakchanggi henna sonbagi masak oiba kayatsing aduna thoina kannabani; 

23 Amasung thoidokna ikaikhumnaroidabani haiba eikhoina ningba hakchanggi kayatsing aduna henna yamna ikaikhumnaba pi, aduga eikhoigi phajadaba kayatsing adugi henna yamna phajaba lei; 

24 Adubu eikhoigi phajaba kayatsinggi kannaba leite. Touigumbasung ikai-khumnaba watpa kayat aduga Iswarna henna yamna ikaikhumnanaba pibiduna hakchangbu tinnahanbi, 

25 Haibadi hakchangda khainaba leitaduna, kayatsing adu amana atei amagi damak mannana cheksinbina-nabani. 

26 Amasung kayat amana awa khanglabadi, kayat pumnamakna awa khangminnei; aduga kayat amabu ikai khumnarabadi, kayat pumnamakna haraominnei. 

27 Nakhoidi Khristagi hakchang oiduna, nakhoi khuding madugi kayatni. 

28 Aduga Iswarna singlup manungda mi kharabu, ahanba pakhonchatpasing, anisuba wa takthokpasing, ahumsuba ojhasing thambire; adugi mathangda toungamdaba thabak, anaba phahanbagi khudon, pangbiba thabak, luchingbagi thabak, lol makhal makha ayamba ngangba pinabire. 

29 Pumnamak pakhonchatpasingla? pumnamak Iswargi wa takthokpasingla? pumnamak ojhasingla? pumnamak toungamdaba thabak toubasingla? 

30 Pumnamak anaba phahanbagi khudon phangbra? Pumnamakna tongan tonganba lol ngangbra? pumnamak lol handokpra? 

31 Adubu henna chaoba khudon thawai yaona pamjou. Aduga thoidok hendoklaba lambi ama amukka eina nakhoida utpige.

I KORINTHIYA 13 

Nungsibadi, thoihellaba khudonni


1 Eira mioibagi amasung swargadutsinggi siba leitrabadi, ei makhol houba pithrai aduga khangliba kortan-gum oire. 

2 Aduga eina Iswargi wa takthokpagi khudon phanglabasu, athuppa wa pumnamak amasung mahei pumnmamak ikhang kitanglabasu, aduga eina pumtha thajaduna ching makheibu mapham hongngamlabasu, nungsiba leitrabadi eidi karisu, natte. 

3 Aduga eina eigi leijaba pumnamak pijanaba khatthoklabasu, amasung eigi hakehagng mei thananaba katthoklabasu nungsiba leitrabadi, eingonda karisu tongjaba leite. 

4 Nungibana kuina khangsu khangbi, chansu chanbi; nungsibana kallakte, napal toude, chaothokte, 

5 Athiba machat chatte, marannai thide, saode, phattaba sinthade; 

6 Dharmachendabada haroade, adubu achumbaga haraominnei; 

7 Pumnamak pubi, pumnamak thajei, pumnamak ining ningbi, pumnamak khangbi. 

8 Nungsibana khak sothade; adubu Iswargi wa takthokpa oirabasu loikhigani; tongan tonganba lol oirabasu tokkiani; mahei oirabasu loikhigani. 

9 Maramdi eikhoina machetta khang-i, aduga eikhoina machetta Iswargi wa takthok-i; 

10 Touigumbasung mapum phara-bada, machet haiba adu loikhi-gani. 

11 Eina angang oiringeida, anganggumna nganglammi, anganggumna khanglammi, anganggumna ninglammi; eina ahal oiraklabada, angang oiba matou adu thadokkhi. 

12 Maramdi houjik eikhoin mingsenda mamli mamli ubani, adubu tungdadi maiga maiga unarakhigani. Houjik eina machetta khang-i; adubu tungdadi eibu sengna khangkhibagumna einasu sengna khanglagani. 

13 Touigumbasung houjik thajaba, tarang tarang khangna ningba, nungsiba, ahum asi itattattana lei; aduga asisinggi marakta khwaidagi henthoibadi nungsibani.

I KORINTHIYA 14 

Iswargi wa takthokpagi amasung tongan tonganba lon-gi khudon


1 Nungsiba tallu; adum oinamakpu thawaigi oiba khudon, thoidokpadi Iswargi wa takthoknanaba, nakhoina thawai yaona pamjou. 

2 Maramdi lol ama ngangba mahak aduna misingda ngangba natte, adubu Iswardani; maramdi mi kana amatana madu tade; touigumbasung mahakna thawaina athuppa wa ngnagthokpani. 

3 Adubu Iswargi wa takthokpa mahak aduna misingda semgatpiba, insinbiba amasung themjinbiba wa ngang-i. 

4 Lol ama ngangba mahak aduna masa mathantabu semgatchei, adubu Iswargi wa takthokpa mahak aduna singluppu semgatli. 

5 Nakhoi pumnamakna tongan tonganba lol ngangba einadi pammi, adubu nakhoina Iswargi wa takthokpa eina henna pammi. Aduga singlupna semgatpa phangnanaba lol handokpidrabadi, tongan tonganba lol ngangba mahak adudagi Iswargi wa takthokpa mahak aduna henna chaobani. 

6 Touigumbasung, ichin inaosa, houjik eina tongan tonganba lol ngangduna nakhoida laklabadi, phongdokpa wana, maheina, Iswargi wa takthokpana, nattraga tambibana nakhoida eina ngangdrabada, ei nakhoida kari tongjaba oigadage? 

7 Makhol houriba, mathawai leitaba potmaknasu bansi oirabasu, bina oirabasu, makhon makhonda khennaba pidrabadi, bansi khonglibra nattraga bina khonglibra, madu karamna khanggadage? 

8 Maramdi peresinggana chumdaba makhol pirabadi, kanana masa mathanta langi damak thourang toujagadage? 

9 Adugumduna nakhoinasu laina khangba yaba wa nareina haidoktrabadi, kari ngangliba madu karamna khanggadage? Maramdi nakhoina mahada ngangba oigani. 

10 Taibangpanda makhon-gi asup yamba makhal leibasu mayai, aduga khangnaba khudam yaodaba karisu leite. 

11 Adunadi eina makhol adugi artha khangdrabadi, ngangliba mahak aduna eidi mireibakki mi oigani, aduga ngangliba mahak adu eingonda mireibakki mi oigani. 

12 Adugumduna nakhoinasu thawaigi oiba adu yamna pambagi maramna, singluppu semgatnabagi damak nakhoina hengatnaba thiyu. 

13 Maram asigi damakna lol ama ngangba mahak aduna lol handoknanaba haijasanu. 

14 Maramdi eina lol amana haijarabadi, eigi thawaina haijabani adubu eigi khangbadi mahei yande. 

15 Adunadi madu karino? eina ithawaina haijagani, aduga eigi khangbanasu haijagani; eina ithawaina isei sakchagani, aduga eigi khangbanasu isei sakchagani. 

16 Adu nattraga nahakna nathawaian thagatcharabadi, itam tamdabagi kada leiriba mahak aduna nahakki thagatchaba adu Amen karamna haigadage? Maramdi nahakna kari hairiba nahakna khangde. 

17 Maramdi nahaknadi phajana thagatchabani, adubu ateibudi semgatpide, 

18 Eina nakhoi pumnamaktagi henna tongan tonganba lol ngang-i haiduna Iswarbu thagatchei. 

19 Touigumbasung singlupta eina atei-singbu tambinanaba, lol amana wahei lising tara ngangbadagi, eigi khangbaga loinana wahei mangata ngangba eina henna pammi. 

20 Ichin inaosa, wakhalda angang oibi-ganu; adubu phattabada angang oibiduna, wakhalda ahal oibiyu. 

21 Wayel yathang aduda masi ikhrabani, atop atoppa lolgi misingna amasung atop atoppa misinggi machinna eina mising asida ngangnagani; aduga asumna tourabasu makhoina eigi wa tabiroi, haiduna Prabhuna hai. 

22 Adugumduna tongan tonganba lol ngangba aduna thajabasinggi damak nattaduna, thajadabasinggi damak khudamni; touigumbasung Iswargi wa takthokpa aduna thajadabasinggi damak nattaduna thajabasinggi damakni. 

23 Maram aduna singlup apumbana tinnaduna punmamakna tongan tonganba lol nganglabadi, aduga tamdaba nattraga thajadaba misingna changlaklabadi, nakhoi ngao-i haiduna makhoina hairoidra? 

24 Touigumbasung purmamakna Iswargi wa takthoklabadi, aduga thajadaba nattraga tamdaba kanagumbana changlaklabadi, pumnamakki mapanna mahakpu maral khangjahalli, pumanamkki mapanna mahakpu wakhal toujahalli; 

25 Mahakki pukninggi athup athuppa adu phongdoklak-i; aduga asum touna nakhoigi narakta soidana Iswar lei haina mahakna haidoktuna uprakna tuthajaraga Iswarbu khurumjagani.


Iswar khurumbada mathang manao naibagi kannaba


26 Adunadi, ichin inaosa, madu karino? Nakhoina tinnaba khudingda, dharma isei oirabasu, tambiba oirabasu, phongdokpu wa oirabasu lol ama oirabasu, lol handokpa oirabasu, nakhoi amamamgi lei. Thabak pumnamak semgatnabagi damak tousanu. 

27 Kanagumbana lol ngangba matamda, anina nattraga ahumdagi hendana, mathang mathang ngangsanu; amasung mi amana handokpisanu. 

28 Adubu lol handokpa mi leitrabadi, mahakna singlup manungda tuminna leisanu; aduga mahak mathantada amasung Iswarda ngangjasanu. 

29 Amasung Iswargi wa takthokpasing anina oirabasu, ahumna oirabasu, ngangsanu, aduga ateisingna aoi-oida khansanu. 

30 Touigumbasung phamliba atei amada karigumba wa phongdokpirabadi, ahanba mi aduna tuminna leisanu. 

31 Maramdi pumnamakna tamjanaba, amasung pumnamakpu insinbinaba, nakhoi pumnamakna amamam oina Iswargi wa takthokpa yai; 

32 Aduga Iswargi wa takthokpasinggi thawaising adu wa takthokpasing adugi makha polli; 

33 Maramdi Iswardi ninkhongbagi Iswar natte, ingthabagini. Asengbasinggi singlup pumnamakta asum chatnabani. 

34 Nupisingna singlup manungda tuminna leisanu, maramdi makhoi wa ngangba yabide; adubu wayel yathang adunasu haibagumna, makhoina makha ponna leisanu. 

35 Aduga makhoina karigumba tamjaninglabadi, mayum mayumda makhoi makhoimakki mapuroibasinda haijasanu; maramdi nupina singlup manungda wa ngangba ikaibani. 

36 Karino! nakhoidagi Iswargi wa adu thokkhibra, nattraga madu nakhoitada lakpibra? 

37 Kanagumba mina masa mathanta Iswargi wa takthokpa amani nattraga thawai gi oiba mini haina ninglabadi, eina nakhoida iri iriba asi Prabhugi yathangni haina mahakna khangjasanu. 

38 Touigumbasung kanagumbana khangdrabadi, mahakpu khangdabani. 

39 Maram adugu damakna, eigi ichin inaosa, Iswargi wa takthokpa thawai yaona pamjou, aduga tongan tonganba lol ngangba khamganu. 

40 Adubu thabak pumnathak phajana amasung mathang manao naina tousanu.

I KORINTHIYA 15 

Asibasing hinggatpa


1 Amahiksung, ichin inaosa, eina nakhoida sandoklamba aphaba wapao, nakhoina louraba amasung lepliba adu, eina nakhoida khang hanjari; 

2 Eina nakhoida sandoklamba wa adu nakhoina chetna pairabadi, madugi mapanna nakhoibusu kanbiribani; nattrabadi nakhoi arembada thajare. 

3 Maramdi einasu phangjaraba, pumnamakki athoiba adu nakhoida pithokchare, haibadi, sastragi matung inna Khristana eikhoigi papki-damak sibire, 

4 Aduga Ibungobu phumkhre, amasung sastragi matung inna Ibungobu humni suba numitta hinggatpire; 

5 Aduga Keiphada, adugi matungda taranithoi aduda Ibungona uhanbire. 

6 Adigi matungda Ibungona amuktada chamngadagi henba ichin inaoda uhanbire, makhoigi maraktagi ayambana houjik phaoba leiri, adubu kharadi tumkhre; 

7 Matung aduda Ibungona Jakobta, adugi matungda pakhonchatpa pumnamakta uhanbire; 

8 Aduga pumnamakki ikon konbada, matam nattana pokpa angangumba eingondasu ibungona uhanbire. 

9 Maramdi eidi pakhonchatpa kouba matik chadraba, pakhonchatpasinggi maraktagi khwaidagi piklaba amani, maramdi eina Iswargi singluppu otneikhi. 

10 Touigumbasung eina oijariba adu Iswargi thoujanna oijaribani, adubu Ibungo mahakki thoujal, eingonda pinabiba adu, aremba natte. Touigumbasung eina makhoi pumnamaktagi thoina henna nomjare, adum oinamakpu eina natte, eiga loinaba Iswargi thoujal adunani. 

11 Adunadi einabu oirabasu, makhoinabu oirabasu, asumna eikhoina pao sandok-i, aduga asumna nakhoina thajare. 

12 Amahiksung Khristabu asibasinggi maraktagi hinggatpire haiba pao adu sandoklabadi, asibasing hinggatpa ilei leite haina nakhoigi marakta mi karana karamna hairibage?
