13 Touigumbasung asibasing hinggatpa ilei leitrabadi, Khristabusu hinggatpidre; 

14 Amasung Khristabu hinggatpidrabadi, adunadi eikhoina pao sandokpa arembani, nakhoigi thajabasu arembani. 

15 Hoi, aduga eikhoidi Iswargi mathakta chumdaba sakshisingni haina phongdokle, maramdi Iswarna Khristabu hinggatpire haiba eikhoina sakshi pire. Ibungobu hinggatpide aoibamak oirabadi, asibasingbu hinggatpidabani. 

16 Maramdi asibasingbu hinggatpidrabadi, Khristabusu hinggatpidre; 

17 Amasung Khristabu hinggatpidrabadi, nakhoigi thajaba arembani; houjik phaoba nakhoidi papta leiri. 

18 Adunadi Khristada tumkhiba makhoisu mangkhre. 

19 Hinglingei asida eikhoina Khristada tarang tarang khangna ninglabata oirabadi, mi khwaimaktagi eikhoina henna tonthabani. 

20 Touigumbasung houjikti tumkhiba makhoigi maraktagi ahanba mahei Khristabu asibasinggi maraktagi hinggat-pire. 

21 Maramdi mioibagi mapanna siba thokpa maramna, mioibagi mapanna asibasing hinggatpasu thokpani. 

22 Maramdi Adamda pumnamakna sibagumna, Khristada adugumnasu pumnamakpu hinghanbigani. 

23 Adubu mi khuding magi magi mathang manao naigani, haibadi, Khristana ahanba maheini, matung aduda Khristana lenglakpa matamda Ibungogi oibasing aduni. 

24 Adugi matungda Ibungona Iswarda, haibadi mapada, ningthou lei-bak adu pithokkadaba matamda, Ibungona khudum chanba pumnamak, matik pumnammak amasung panggal pumnamak manghangadaba matamda, aroiba adu oigani. 

25 Maramdi yeknabasing pumnamakpu Ibungogi khong-khada thambidriba phaoba, Ibungona panba tare. 

26 Ikon kondaba manghan-gadaba yeknaba adudi sibani. 

27 Maramdi, Ibungo mahakna Ibungogi khuya khada pot pumnamak makha polhalle. Adubu, pot pumnamak makha polhalle haiduna Ibungo mahakna haibada, makha polhanbiba Ibungo mahakti nattana, pot pumnamak Ibungogi makha polle haiba taseng tasengbani. 

28 Amasung pot pumnamak Ibungogi makha polhanbiba Ibungo mahakki makha polhan-gani. 

29 Nattrabadi, asibasinggi maramna baptais loubasingna kari tougadage? Asi-basingbu khak hinggatpidrabadi, makhoigi maramna makhoina baptais louba karigino? 

30 Eikhoisu pung khuding khudong thibada karigi leibano? 

31 Ichin inaosa, eikhoidi Prabhu Khrista Jisuda eina phangjaba nakhoigi maramda chaothokchaba adu panduna, eina numit khuding si haiba aoibamak hairi. 

32 Mioibagi machat matung inna eina Ephisada lamsasingga soknarabadi, eigi kari tongjabano? asibasingbu hinggatpidrabadi, eikhoi chasi, thaksi, maramdi eikhoina hayeng sigada-bani. 

33 Nakhoibu minamhanganu: phattaba tinnabana aphaba machat manghalli. 

34 Singna yahouro, aduga pap thadoklo. Maramdi mi kharana Iswargi maramda ilei leite. Nakhoibu ikai-hannanaba eina hairibani. 

35 Touigumbasung kanagumbana haigani, asibasingbu karamna hinggatpibano? Amasung karamba hakchang oina makhoina lakpano? 

36 He apangba, nang nasana hunba maru adu sidanadi hinglakte; 

37 Aduga nangna hunba adu oirakkadaba masa adu hunde, adubu gehugi oirabasu, atei ateigi makhal amagi oirabasu, chumnagi maru aduta hunbani. 

38 Touigumbasung Iswarna pambagi matung inna maduna masa pibi, aduga maru khudingmakta magi magi masa pibi. 

39 Masa pumnamak mannaba masa natte, adubu mioibagi masana ama, sasinggina atei ama, ucheksinggina atei ama, amasung ngasinggina atei ama oi. 

40 Swargagi oiba hakchangsu lei, aduga taibangpan-gi oiba hakchangsu lei; touigumbasung swargagi oiba adugi matik manganna ama, aduga taibangpan-gi oiba adugina atoppa ama oi. 

41 Numitki matik manganna ama, thagi matik manganna atei ama, aduga thawanmichaksinggi matik manganna atei atopaa ama oi; maramdi matik manganda thawanmichak amana thawanmichak amadagi khetnei. 

42 Adugumduna asibasing hinggatpasuni, Mangbada hulli, mangdabada hinggatpibani; 

43 Ikaikhumnadabada hulli, matik manganda hinggatpibani; asonbada hulli, pangganda hinggatpibani; mahousagi oiba hakchang hulli, thawaigi oiba hakchang hinggatpibani. 

44 Mahousagi oiba hakchang leirabadi thawaigi oibasu lei. 

45 Adugumduna masisu ikhrabani, ahanba mi Adam aduna hingliba mi oirakle; akonba Adam aduna hingba piba thawai oirakle. 

46 Achumakpu thawaigi oiba adu ahanba natte, adubu mahousagi oiba aduni; matung aduda thawaigi oiba aduni. 

47 Ahanba mi adu leipaktaginina leipakkini, anisuba mi adu swargadagini. 

48 Leipakki oibagumna leipakki oiba makhoisu asumna leipakkini; amasung swargagi oibagumna swargagi oiba makhoisu asumna swargagini. 

49 Aduga eikhoina leipakki oiba murti loubagumna, swargagi oiba murtisu eikhoina loujagni. 

50 Amahiksung, ichin inaosa, eina asi hairi, haibadi, i-tong yaobana Iswargi lei-bak phangba ngamde, aduga amangbana mangdaba phangde. 

51 Yeng-u, eina nakhoida athuppa wa hairi. Eikhoi pumnamak tumloi, 

52 Adubu ngaihaktada, mikup amada, akonba peresingga khongbada, eikhoi pumnamakpu onbigani. Maramdi peresingga khonggani, asibasingbu mangba yadaba oina hinggatpigani, amasung eikhoibu onbigani. 

53 Maramdi mangba yaba asi mangba yadaba setpa tai, amasung siba naiba asi sibanaidaba setpa tai. 

54 Touigumbasung mangba yaba asi mangba yadaba setpa, amasung siba naiba asi siba naidaba setpa, matam aduda ikhraba wa asi thunggani, sibabu angambana yotthokkhre. 

55 He siba nanggi ngamba kadaidano? He siba, nangi namu kadaidano? 

56 Sibagi mamudi papni, aduga papki panggandi wayel yathang aduni. 

57 Adubu eikhoigi Prabhu Jisu Khristagi mapanna angamba adu eikhoida pibiba Iswarbu thagatpa oisanu. 

58 Maram adugi damak, eigi achanba ichin inaosa, nakhoigi nomjaba adu Prabhugi maphamda aremba natte haina khangjaduna, nakhoi achetpa, lengdaba, Prabhugi thabakta matam leiba khibikta maram okpa oiyu.

I KORINTHIYA 16 

Jerusalemgi lairabasinggi damak sen khaigatpa; masagi waram amasung khaina-wa


1 Amahiksung asengbasinggi damak sel khaigatnabagi marida, eina Galatiyagi singlupsingda yathang pikhibagumna, nakhoinasu adugumna toubiyu. 

2 Ei lakpa matam aduda senkhai leitananaba, nakhoina magi magi tongjaba matung inna chayon-gi ahan ahanba numitta mi khudingna makhut makhutta sel tungsinduna thanamsanu. 

3 Amasung eina thunglaba matamda, nakhoina yagadaba kana kanagumba adubu lairikka loinana Jerusalemda nakhoigi khudon punba eina thagani. 

4 Aduga eisu chatpa khudong charabadi, makhoi eiga loinana chat-kani. 

5 Touigumbasung eina Makidoniya mayai lanthoklaklaga nakhoida lakkani; maramdi eina Makidoniya mayai langadabani; 

6 Adubu eina chatka chatkadaba eigi langphei khongchatta nakhoina eibu thindokpinanaba, eina nakhoiga loinana matam khara nattraga ningthamthadasu leminnaraba mayai. 

7 Maramdi eina nakhoibu houjik lamkhangda unaba pamde; maramdi Prabhuna yabirabadi, eina nakhoiga loinana matam khara phaijaning-i. 

8 Touigumbasung eina Pentekost phaoba Ephisada phaigani; 

9 Maramdi achouba amasung thabak mahei yanba thong ama eingonda hongdokpire, aduga ayamba yeknabasing lei. 

10 Amahiksung Timothiyana laklabadi, nakghoiga loinana mahakna kidana leiminnanaba yengbiyu; maramdi eina toubagunma, mahaknasu Prabhugi thabak toubani. 

11 Maram aduna mi kana amatana mahakpu usittaba tousdasanu. Touigumbasung mahakna eingonda laknanaba, ingthana mahakpu lambida thindokpiyu; maramdi eina mahakpu ichin inaosingga loinarakpa ngairi. 

12 Adubu ichin inao Apollogi maramda, eina makhakpu ichin inaosingga loinana nakhoida laknanaba yamna nonjare, aduga houjik lakpa mahakna supning ningde, adubu khudongchaba phanglabada mahakna lakkani. 

13 Nakhoi mitseng khang-u, thajabada chap lep-u, nipa thokpa matou tou, kallu. 

14 Nakhoina touba touba pumnamak nungsina mu. 

15 Amahiksung, ichin inaosa, eina nakhoibu nonjari (Nakhoina Stephanagi imungbu khang-i, haibadi, makhoidi Akhaigi ahanba maheini, aduga makhoi masa mathantabu asengbasinggi thougan tounanaba katthokchare), 

16 Asigumbasinggi amasung thabakta pangbiduna nomliba mi khudinggi makha nakhoinasu ponbiyu haijabani. 

17 Amasung Stephana, Phortunatta amasung Akhayika, makhoi asina lakpagi eina haraojei; Maramdi nakhoi laktabagi awatpa adu makhoina samjinbire. 

18 Maramdi nakhoina eigi thawaibusu nakhoigibusu potthahanbire. Maram aduna nakhoina makhoibu sak khangbiyu. 

19 Esiyagi singlupsingna nakhoibu khurumjari. Akulaga Priskagana makhoigi yumda tinba singlupka loinana Prabhuda nakhoibu yamna khurumjari. 

20 Ichin inao pumnamakna nakhoibu khurumjari, sengna chupnabaga loinana amana amabu khurumnou. 

21 Pol eina khurumjaba asi ikhutmakna ijari. 

22 Kanagumba Mina Prabhubu nungsidrabadi, mahak sirap phangsanu. Maranatha: 

23 Prabhu Jisugi thoujal nakhoiga loinabisanu. 

24 Khrista Jisugi mapanna eigi nungsiba nakhoi pumnamakka loinabisanu.

KORINTHIYASINGDA POLNA IBA ANISUBA LAIRIK 

A-iba: Missionary Pol 

Ibagi matam: A.D. 55-57 aduwai 

Wamachang- Iswarna Missionary Polda pangbibagi matang. 

Missionary Polna Mekadoniya lamdagi Philippi khulda ahumlak suba matamda ibani. Matam aduda Korintgi singlupsinggi marakta wathok lanthok kaya leibadagi Polna Iswargi asengba wa-pao asi henna henna khangnaba ibani. Loinana mahak Iswargi thabak touba mioi amani haibasi utli. 

 II KORINTHIYA 1 

Khurumjaba amasung Iswarbu thagatpa


1 Iswargi ningbiba mapanna Khrista Jisugi pakhonchatpa polna amasung eikhoigi ichin inao Timothiyana, Akhai apumbada leiba asengbasing pumnamakka loinnana Korinthada leiba Iswargi singlupta. 

2 Eikhoigi Ipa Iswar amasung Prabhu Jisu Khristadagi thoujal amasung ingthaba nakhoida leibisanu. 

3 Eikhoigi Prabhu Jisu Khristagi Iswarsu mapasu oiba, nungsiheibagi mapa amasung themjinbiba pumnamakki Iswar, Ibungo mahakpu thagatchari; 

4 Eikhoi isabu iswarna themjinbiba mathemjin adugi mapanna eikhoina karigumba awa anangda leiriba makhoibu themjinbinanaba, Ibungo mahakna eikhoibu themjinbi. 

5 Maramdi Khristagi awa khangba eikhoigi ithakta yamkhatpagumna, eikhoibu themjinbibasu Khristagi mapanna yamkhatpi. 

6 Touigumbasung eikhoina awa anang phanglabadi, nakhoibu themjinbinaba amasung kanbinabagi damakni; adage eikhoibu themjinbirabadi, nakhoibu themjinbibagi damakni; eikhoinasu khangba awaba adumak nakhoigi khangheibada themjinbiba utpani. 

7 Amasung nakhoi awabagi saruk phangminnabagumna themjinbibagisu phangminnabani haiba khangduna, nakhoigi maramgi damak eikhoigi tarang tarang khangna ningba lengdabani. 

8 Maramdi, ichin inaosa, Esiyada eikhoigi ithakta awa anang thokpa adugi marida nakhoina khangdaba eikhoina pamjade, haibadi, ipanggandagi hendokpa, thoihenna lumbana eikhoibu nantharaduna eikhoina thawai hinggani phaoba ninglamde. 

9 Hoi, eikhoi isa isagi puknungda sibagi paokhum phangjare; madudi eikhoina isa ithantada thajadaduna asibasingbu hinggatpiba Iswarda thajananabani. 

10 Ibungo mahakna eikhoibu asup kiraba sibadagi kanbire, amasung kanbigani; Ibungo mabakna eikhoibu amuksu kanbigani haiduna, eikhoina Ibungo mangonda khourangna ningba thamjari. 

11 Nakhoinasu eikhoigi maramda nakhoigi nibibagi mapanna, pangbiri aduna mi ayambagi mapanna eikhoida pinabiba khudon-gi damak ayamba mina eikhoigi maramda thagatpinanabani.


Polgi achumba pukning


12 Maramdi eikhoina chaothokcharibadi eikhoigi achum-aran khangnaba pukninggi sakshi asini, haibadi, Iswardagi asengbana amasung pukchel tingbana hakchanggi oiba lousingna nattaduna, Iswargi thoujanna eikhoina taibangpanda, aduga thoidokpadi nakhoiromda isa isana lamchatsi chatchare. 

13 Maramdi nakhoina pariba nattraga sengna khangnaba nattana, eikhoina nakhoida wa atei ide; aduga nakhoina mamei phaoba sengna khanggani haina eina tarang tarang khang-na ningjabani. 

14 Nakhoi kharanasu eikhoibu sengna khanglabagumbani, haibadi, eikhoigi Prabhu Jisugi numitta nakhoi eikhoigi chaothoknapham oibagumna, eikhoisu nakhoigini.


Mahak lakkadaba adu matam yeithokpa


15 Amahiksung asi thajabagi maramna nakhoina anirak haraoba phangnanaba, eina nakhoida hanna lakle ning-lanuni; 

16 Aduga nakhoidagi Makidoniyada chattuna amuk Makidoniyadagi nakhoida laktuna, Jihudiya tananaba eibu lambida nakhoibu thindokkhanninglammi. 

17 Maram aduna eina asumna ninglambada areppa leitaba utpra? nattraga, eina ningba adu eingonda hoi hoi aduga mai mai oinanaba, eina hakchang matung inna ningbra? 

18 Adubu Iswardi thajaba yaba oibanina, nakhoiromda eikhoigi wa hoi amasung mai natte. 

19 Maramdi eikhoina, haibadi eina, Silbhanana amasung Timothiyana nakhoigi narakta sandoklamba Iswargi macha nipa Khrista Jisu hoisu maisu oiramde, adubu Ibungodadi hoi oire. 

20 Maramdi iswargi waleppa oiri oiriba makhei adu Ibungoda hoi adu oire. Maram adugi damak eikhoigi ipanna Iswarbu thagatchanaba, Ibungogi mapannasu Amen adu oibani. 

21 Amasung Khristagi marida nakhoiga loinana eikhoibu chethanbiba amasung eikhoibu thao heibiba Ibungo mahak Iswarni; 

22 Ibungo mahaknasu eikhoibu chum nambire, amasung eikhoigi thamoi-nungda warep sengumna thawai adu pibire. 

23 Touigumbasung nakhoibu nung-sibibagi eina Korinthada hoijik phaoba laktabani haiba eigi thawaigi mathakta sakshi oinaba eina Iswarbu koujei. 24 Eikhoina nakhoigi thajabagi mathakta mapu oinaba natte, adubu nakhoigi haraobagi damakta pangbibasingni; maramdi thajabada nakhoina chap lepli.

II KORINTHIYA 2 

1 Maramdi eina pukning wabaga loinana nakhoida amuk laktanaba asi ithakta ipukning leple. 

2 Maramdi eina nakhoibu pukning wahallabadi, eina wahankhiba mahak adu nattana kanana eibu haraohangadage? 

3 Amasung eigi haraoba aduna nakhoi pumnamakki haraoba oiri haiduna nakhoi pumnamakta chetna thajaduna, eibu haraohanga-daba makhoidagi eina pukning awaba phang-dananaba, waram asimak eina ire. 

4 Maramdi thoidokna awa anangba amasung thamoi chakpadagi eina nakhoida pi yanma tana ijare; nakhoibu pukning wahannanaba natte, adubu eigi nungsiba nakhoigi nathakta thoidok hendokna leiba adu nakhoina khangnanabani.


Aranba touba mina pukning hongbada mabu lousinbinanaba wa


5 Touigumbasung kanagumbana pukning wahanba leirabadi, mahakna eibuta wahanba natte, adubu machetta (Eina wahei ayakpana namadananaba) nakhoi pumnamakpu wahalle. 

6 Mi ayambana warakpa asi adugumba migi damak okle; 

7 Aduna amaromdadi karigumba maram amana adugumba mibu mahakki thoidok hendokna pukning waba aduna yotsin-gadabadagi, nakhoina mahakpu ngakpiduna themjinbiba phei. 

8 Maram adugi damak nakhoina mahakpu phongna amuk nungsibinaba eina haijabani. 

9 Maramdi nakhoina maram pumnamakta haiba illi inde nakhoigi aoiba eina khangnanaba, asigi maramnasu eina ire. 

10 Touigumbasung nakhoina karigumba kokpiba mahak adubu einasu kok-pi; maramdi seitanna eikhoigi ithakta tongjaba karisu phangdananaba, eina karigumba kokpikhrabadi, eina kokpikhiba adu nakhoigi maramgi damak Khristagi mangda kokpikhibani; 

11 Maramdi seitan-gi thourang adugi maramda eikhoina khangdaba natte.


Aphaba wapaogi maramda changyeng phangba amasung ngambagi maram


12 Aduga eina Khristagi aphaba wapaogi damak Troyada laklabada amasung Prabhugi maramda thong ama hangdokpirabada, 

13 Eina ichin inao Titabu phangnadaba maramna, eina ithawaida potthaba phangjade; adubu makhoidagi khainaraktuna, eina Makidoniyada chatthoklakle. 

14 Touigumbasung matam leiba khibikta Khristagi mapanna eikhoibu maipakna chingbiduna mapham khudingda Ibungo mahakpu khangbagi manam adu eikhoi gi ipanna phonghanbiba Ibungo Iswarbu thagatchari. 

15 Maramdi Iswarna kanbiribasinggi amasung manglibasinggi marakta eikhoidi Iswargi maphamda Khristagi nuugsiba manam oijari, 

16 Manglibasing dadi sibadagi siba thokhanba manam oiri, kanbiriba-singdadi hingbadagi hingba thokhanba manam oiri. amasung thabaksing asigi damak matik chaba kanano? 

17 Maramdi eikhoidi Iswargi wa mothalliba ayambagumba natte, adubu pukchel tinbagum, Iswardagigum, Iswargi mityen-gda, Khristagi oina eikhoina ngangbani.

II KORINTHIYA 3 

Polgi mapanna thajakhrabasing; aphaba wapaogi matik manganga wayel yathanggi matik mangan-gagi khennaba


1 Eikhoina isa ithantabu amuk thagatchaba houribra? nattraga, nakhoida oirabasu, nakhoidagi oirabasu, thagatpagi lairik kana kanagumbana toubagumna, eikhoigi kanabra? 

2 Eikhoigi thamoi nungda ikhraba, mi pumnamakna khangliba amasung pariba eikhoigi lairik nakhoi oiri; 

3 Eikhoibu ihanba, mukna nattana hingliba Iswargi thawaina, nunggi korbakta nattana hakchanggi thamoi korbakta ikhraba, Khristagi lairik nakhoi oiri haiduna nakhoibu phongbani. 

4 Aduga Iswarlomda Khristagi mapanna asigumba chetna thajaba eikhoigi lei. 

5 Eikhoi isa ithantagi karigumba singthananaba, eikhoi isa ithanta matik chaba natte, adubu eikhoigi matik chaba adu Iswardagini. 

6 Ibungo mahakna eikhoibu anouba walepnabagi thougan toubasing oinabasu matik chaba sembire; masi lairikki natte, adubu thawaigini; maramdi lairikna sihalli, adubu thawaina hinghalli. 

7 Adubu sibagi khan jaba, nungda yektuna ikhraba adu matik mingan-ga loinana lakle. aduna Israyelgi machasingna. Mousigi maithonggi manggadouriba matik mangal adugi maramna mahakki maithong sangtrikna yengba ngamde; 

8 Asi asum oirabadi, thawaigi khanjaba aduna adudagi kaya henba matik manganga loinarakloidra? 

9 Maramdi ayol aral tahanbagi khanjaba adugi matik mangal leirabadi, dharmachenbagi khanjaba adugi matik mangal amuk kaya yamna helli. 

10 Maramdi thoihellaba matik mangal adugi maramna, matik mangal chaoramba adu asiromda chaohankhidre. 

11 Maramdi manggadouriba adu matik manganga loinana leiramlabadi, itattattana leiriba adugi matik mangal kaya thoidok hendok-i. 

12 Maram aduna asigumba tarang tarang khangna ningba leibagi maramna, eikhoina wa ngangbagi thouna sijinnei; 

13 Aduga Israyelgi machasingna manggadouriba adugi poloida sangtrikna yengdananaba, mamaida maikhum happa Mousigumba eikhoi natte. 

14 Touigumbasung makhoigi pukning kallammi; maramdi numit asi phaoba ariba walepnaba adu pabada maikhum adu mareihoui, maramdi madu Khristagi mapanna louthokpi haiba makhoida phongdokpidri. 

15 Touigumbasung ngasi phaoba Mousibu paba matam khudingda, maikhum makhoigi thamoida khumli. 

16 Adubu makhoina Prabhuda ollakpa matam aduda, maikhum adu louthokpi. 

17 Prabhu adudi thawaini, aduga Prabhugi thawai leiba mapham aduda matung tamba lei. 

18 Touigumbasung eikhoi pumnamakna mai khumdana Prabhugi matik mangal adu mingsenda yengbagumna yengduna, mannaba sak-ong aduda thawai adu, haibadi, Prabhu adugi mapanna matik mangandagi matik manganda hongdokli.

II KORINTHIYA 4 

Aphaba wapao sandokpada thounaphaba amasung pukchel tingba


1 Maram aduna eikhoina nungsibiba phangbagi matung inna, thougan toujaba asi phangbagi maramna, eikhoina sonthade. 

2 Touigumbasung eikhoina marei mara touna chattaduna, aduga Iswargi wa minamna sijinnadaduna, achumba uhanbagi mapanna Iswargi mityengda mi khudinggi achum-aran khangnaba pukningda eikhoi isa isabu khanghanjaduna, ikaibagi arot arotpa thabak eikhoina thadokle. 

3 Amasung eikhoigi aphaba wa paosu khumjillabadi, manglibasingda khumjinbani. 

4 Iswargi murti oiriba Khristagi matik mangan-gi aphaba wapaogi mangal adu nganthok-tananaba, makhoigi marakta thajadabasinggi pukningbu taibangpanda laina mit tanghalle. 

5 Maramdi eikhoina eikhoi isa isabu sandokpa natte, adubu Khrista Jisuna Prabhuni, aduga eikhoi isana Jisugi maramgi damak nakhoigi nanaini haina sandokpani. 

6 Maramdi, amambadagi mangal nganbigani, haikhiba Iswar aduna Khristagi maithongda Iswargi matik mangan-gi akhangba adugi mangal adu pinanaba, eikhoigi thamoi nungda nganbire.


Polgi asonba amasung iswargi panggan


7 Touigumbasung panggan-gi thoidok hendokpa adu eikhoi isa ithantadagi oidaduna, Iswargi oinanaba, eikhoina leipakki phuda lal asi libani. 

8 Eikhoibu maikei khudingdagi chapsilli, adubu chinde; eikhoina khoiranglilangi, adubu chamamnade; 

9 Eikhoibu otneibi, adubu thadokpide; hunthei adubu mangde; 

10 Jisugi hingba adusu eikhoigi hakchangda phongnanaba, Jisugi siba adu hakchangda matam leiba khibikta eikhoina koipu puri. 

11 Maramdi Jisugi hingbu adusu eikhoigi sigadaba isada phongnanaba, Jisugi maramgi damak hingliba eikhoibu matam leiba khibikta sibada pithokli. 

12 Adunadi sibana eikhoida, adubu hingbana nakhoida thabak touri. 

13 Touigumbasung, eina thajare, maram aduna eina ngangle, haina ikhraba adugi matung inna, thajabagi mannaba thawai eikhoida leibanina eikhoinasu thajari, maram aduna eikhoinasu ngangli; 

14 Maramdi Prabhu Jisubu hinggatpiraba Ibungo mahakna eikhoibusu Jisuga loinana hinggatpigani, amasung nakhoiga loinana eikhoibu lephanbigani haiba eikhoina khang-i, 

15 Maramdi ayambagi mapanna yamkhatlaba thoujanna Iswargi matik mangan-gi damak thagatchaba yamhannanaba, nakhoigi maramgi damak maram pumnamak oiri.


Ngaihakki oiba awa anang amasung lomba naidaba matik mangal


16 Maram adugi damak eikhoina sonthade; adubu eikhoigi mapanthangba mi adu manglabasu, eikhoigi manungthangba mi adudi nongma nongmagi nourak-i. 

17 Maramdi ngaihakki oiriba eikhoigi ayangba awa anang aduna eikhoigi damak matik mangangi lomba naidaba chang henna henna yamna thokhalli; 

18. Eikhoina uba pot aduda yengdaduna, udaba pot aduda yenglingeida madu thokhanbani maramdi uba pot adu kuina leite, adubu udaba pot adu lomba naidaba lei.

II KORINTHIYA 5


1 Maramdi eikhoigi phigi yumgumba leipakki yum asi tumkhrabadi, khutna sadaba Iswardagi oiba, lomba naidaba yum swargada eikhoigi lei haiba eikhoina khang-i. 

2 Maramdi swargadagi oiriba eikhoigi leiphamna phigum setchanba khourangjaduna, asigi manungda eikhoina nahejari; 

3 Haibadi, phigum setle hairaga, eikhoibu phi yaodaba phangloidabani. 

4 Maramdi phigi yumgumba asida leiriba eikhoina thawai waduna nahejari; maramdi madu louthokpiba pamde, adubu sigadaba oiriba adu hing-bana yotsinnanaba eikhoina phigum setpiba pammi. 

5 Asimakki damak eikhoibu sembiraba, eikhoida warep-sen-gumna thawai adu pibiraba Iswarni. 

6 Maram aduna eikhoina matam leiba khibikta pukning thouna ningjari, aduga hakchanggi manungda leiringeida eikhoina Prabhudagi topna leiri haina khang-i. 

7 (Maramdi eikhoina thajabagi mapanna chatpani, mitna ubagi mapanna natte); 

8 Hoi, eikhoina pukning thouna ningjari, aduga hakchangdagi topna leinaba amasung Prabhudagi henna pammi. 

9 Maram aduna eikhoina leiminnaba oirabasu, topna leiba oirabasu, Ibungobu pelhanbana eikhoigi wakhal tendamni. 

10 Maramdi mi khudingna magi magi hakchangda toukhiba matung inna, aphaba oirabasu, phattaba oirabasu phangnanaba, eikhoi pumnamakpu Khristagi wayen-phambei mangda phongba tare.


Khristagi nungsibana thougatpiba


11 Maram aduna Prabhubu kiba adu khangduna, eikhoina misingbu themjei; touigumbasung eikhoibu Iswargi maphamda phongbire; aduga eikhoibu nakhoigi achum-aran khangnaba pukningdasu phongbire haina eina tarang tarang khangna ningjei. 

12 Eithoina nakhoida eikhoi isabu amuk thagatchaba natte, adubu pukningda nattaduna mapanthoigi mityengda chaothokchaba makhoida nakhoigi paokhum leinanaba, eikhoigi maramda chaothokchabagi maram nakhoida eikhoina pibani. 

13 Maramdi eikhoina pukning serannakhrabasu, madu Iswargi maphamdani; aduga eikhoina pukning chumjabasu, madu nakhoigi damakni. 

14 Maramdi Khristagi nungsibana eikhoibu phajinbire, maramdi eikhoina asumna wakhal khalle, haibadi, amana pumnamakki mahutta sibire, aduna pumnamakna sire. 

15 Aduga hinglibasingna amuk mathantagi damak hingdaduna, makhoigi mahutta sibiraduna amuk hinggatkhraba, Ibungogi damak hingnanaba, Ibungona pumnamakki mahutta sibire.


Khristada nouna hingba


16 Maram adugi damak eikhoina houjik-tagi houna mi kana amatabu hakchanggi matung inba oina khangde; eikhoina Khristabu hakchanggi matung, inna khangkhrabasu, houjikti eikhoina Ibungobu adugumna amuk khang-de. 

17 Maram adugi damak kanagumba mina Khristada leirabadi, mahakti anouba khutsemni; ariba pot lanthokkhre; yengu, pot makhei inou nourakle. 

18 Touigumbasung pumnamak Iswardagini; Ibungo mahakna eikhoibu Khristagi mapanna Ibungo mahak masaga tainabiduna eikhoida tainabibagi thougan pibire; 

19 Haibadi, mioibada makhoi makhoigi ayol aran singthanabidaduna, Iswarna Khristada leibiduna taibangpanbabu Ibungo mahak masagi tainabiramle, aduga tainabibagi wa adu Ibungo mahakna eikhoida sinnabire.


Tainabibagi wa amasung madugi thougan


20 Maram aduna Iswarna eikhoigi ipanna insinbibagumna eikhoina Khristagi mahutta wa pubasing oijari; eikhoina Khristagi mahutta haijari, nakhoina Iswarga tainabiyu. 

21 Ibungogi mapanna eikhoina Iswargi dharmachenba oirak-nanaba, pap ikhang khangjadaba Ibungobu eikhoigi ihutta pap oihalle.

II KORINTHIYA 6


1 Amahiksung Ibungoga loinana thabak touminnaduna, nakhoina Iswargi thoujal arembada phangba oidananaba, eikhoinasu nonjari. 

2 (Maram di Ibungo mahakna hai, yabiba matamda eina nanggi haijaba tabire, aduga lanbibagi numitta eina nangbu pangbire. Yeng-u, houjik yabiba matamni; yeng-u, houjik lanbiba numitni. 

3 Eikhoigi thougan toujabada ayol aran leitananaba, karigumbada khudi thinaba kari amata pidaduna, Iswargi thougan toujabasinggumna eikhoina isa ithantabu maram khudingda uhanjari: 

4 Thoidokpa khangheibada, awa anabada, anang anangbada, achin achinbada, 

5 Yeiba yeibada, keisumsangda hanna hanna tabada, wathok lanthoknabada, wana suba ayam-bada, mitseng khangba khangbada, chara henba henbada; 

6 Asengbada, akhangbada, kuina khangbada, chanbibada, thawai asengbada, nungsi sannadabada, 

7 Achumbagi wada, Iswargi pangganda; yet oida dharmachenbagi lan phijetki mapanna, 

8 Thagatpaga ikaikhumnadabagana, aphaba amasung phattaba paodamna minambasing gum labasu achumbani; 

9 Khangbidabasinggumlabasu ningthina khangbibani; siribasing gumlabasu, yeng-u eikhoi hingli; lakpa phangbasing gumlabasu hatpide; 

10 Thawai wabasing gumlabasu matam leibakhibikta harao-i; lairabasing-gumlabasu ayambabu inakhulhalli; karisu leitabasing gumlabasu pumnamak ilei lei; maram pumnamak asida uhanjari.


Thajabasinggi pukningda nungsiba pokhannaba wa


11 He Korinthki misa, eikhoigi iya nakhoida kathokchari, eikhoigi pukchel chaohalle. 

12 Eikhoigi nungda nakhoi chinba natte, adubu nakhoigi nungsibada nakhoi chinjabani. 

13 Houjikti mannaba matouna laman singbagi damak (eina ichasingdagumna ngangjaribani), nakhoigisu chaohanbiyu.


hajadabasingga marup oidanaba mitna singhanba


14 Thajadabasingga pabot oiminnaganu. maramdi dharmachenbaga dharmachendabaga kari mapang oibage? Aduga anganbaga amambaga kari tinnabage? 

15 Amasung Khristaga Beliyalga kari mannaba leibage? Aduga thajabaga thajadabaga kari saruk oinabage? 

16 Amasung Iswargi asengba sangga laimurtisingga kari yaminnaba leibage? maramdi eikhoidi hingliba Iswargi asengba sangni; Iswarna haikhibagumbani, eina makhoigi nungda leisu leigani, koichatsu chatkani; aduga eina makhoigi Iswar oigani, amasung makhoina eigi mi oigani. 

17 Maram adugidamakna Prabhuna hai, makhoigi maraktagi nakhoina thoklaktuna tongallo. Amasung sengdaba kari amata sokkanu; aduga eina nakhoibu lousinbigani, 

18 Amasung eina nakhoigi napa oigani, aduga nakhoina eigi icha nipa, icha nupi oigani haiduna ingam ngamba Prabhuna hai.

II KORINTHIYA 7 

1 Maram aduna, achanbasa, waleppasing asi phangjarabagi, eikhoina isa ithantabu hakchang amasung thawaibu mot-hanba punmamaktagi sengdokchaduna, Iswarbu kibana asengba adu changkhonba oihansi.


Nungsa thiba amasung Tita Lakpa maramna pukning thougatpiba


2 Eikhoigi damak nakhoigi thamoida mapham pibiyu; eikhoina mi kana amatada lande, eikhoina mi kana amatabu manghnande, eikhoina mi kana amadagi tongjanaba toude. 

3 Eina nakhoibu lalhannaba haiba natte, maramdi siminnabadasu hingminnabadasu thamoinungda nakhoi leiri haiduna eina mamangngeida haikhre. 

4 Nakhoiromda wa ngangnaba eigi thouna yamna lei, nakhoigi maramda eigi chaothokchaba yammi, themjinbibana eingonda thalli, eikhoigi awa annang pumnamakta haroao-bana eingonda pathok-i. 

5 Maramdi eikhoina Makidoniyada laklabada eikhoigi isa karisu pothajaba leite, adubu maikei khudingda eikhoi awa nang-i—mapanda lan soknaba, mannungdadi akiba leirammi. 

6 Touigumbaaung tollabasingbu, themjinbiba Ibungo Iswarna Tita lakpagi mapanna eikhoibu themjinbiere, 

7 Aduga mahakna lakpagi mapantana nattaduna, nakhoigi maramda mahakpu themjinbiba mathemjin-gi mapannasuni; mahakna eikhoida nakhoigi khourangna pamba, nakhoigi tengthaba, eigi damak nakhoigi thawai yaoba adu tambire, aduna eina amuk henna haraojare. 

8 Maramdi eina nakhoibu eigi lairikna pukning wahallabasu, eina madu ningngamdaba toude; eina ningngamdaba touramlabasu (lairik aduna nakhoibu ngaihakki damak oirabasu pukning wahallamle haiba eina ui), 

9 Houjikti nakhoibu pukning wahanbagi nattaduna, nakhoibu pukning hongnaba phaoba wahanbagi maramna eina haraojei; maramdi karigumbada nakhoina eikhoidagi amangba phangdananaba, Iswargi ningbiba matung inna nakhoibu pukning wahalle. 

10 Maramdi Iswargi ningbiba matung inba pukning waba aduna lanbiba phaoba ningngamdaba thoktaba pukning hongba oihalli; adubu taibangpanbagi pukning waba aduna siba thokhalli. 

11 Maramdi yeng-u, Iswargi ningbiba matung inna nakhoibu pukning wahanba adumakna adumakna nakhoida kaya cheksinba; hoi, kaya nasa sennajaba; hoi, kaya nungngaitaba; hoi, kaya kiba; kaya khourangna ningba; hoi, kaya thawai yaoba; hoi, kaya laman khumba thokhallibano! Maram khudingda nakhoi nasa nathanta di waram aduda sengjei haina utle. 

12 Aduna eina nakhoida ikhrabasu, aranba toukhiba mahakki maramgi damak natte, aduga aranba adubu khanglaba mahakki maramgisu natte, adubu eikhoigi damak nakhoigi c1eksinbiba Iswargi mityengda nikboida phongnanabagi damak eina ikhre. 

13 Maram aduna eikhoibu themjinbire, aduga eikhoibu themjinbiba asida Titagi haraobagi damak eikhoina thoidok hendokna haraojare, maramdi nakhoi pumnamakki mapanna mahakki thawaibu potthahanhire. 

14 Matramdi karigumbada eina nakhoigi maramda mangonda chaothokcharabadi, ei ikaiba phangjade; adubu eikhoina nakhoida maram pumnamak achumbada ngangbagumna, Titagi mamangda eikhoigi chaothokchaba adusu achumba oire. 

15 Amasung nakhoiromda mahakki nungsiba thoina yamkhatli, maramdi mahakna nakhoi pumnamakki haiba inba adu ningsing-i, haibadi, nakhoina mahakpu kina amasung tanik tanikna lousinbire. 

16 Maram khudingda eina nakhoigi maramda pukning thouna ningjari haiduna haraojei.

II KORINTHIYA 8 

Jerusalemgi lairabasinggi-damak sen khaigatpa Jisudagi phidam louba


1 Amahiksung, ichin inaosa, Makido niyagi singlupsingda pinabikhiba Iswargi thoujal adu eikhoina nakhoida khanghanjari; 

2 Haibadi, awa ananggi asup chang yengba manungda makhoigi haraobagi mapan naidabaga makhoigi khamthenglaba lairabagana makhoigi pinaheiba mapan naidaba phaoba yamkhatle. 

3 Maramdi eina sakshi pijari, haibadi, makhoigi panggal matung inna hoi, makhoigi panggandagi hendokna makhoina piningna pire. 

4 Thoujal asigi marida amasung asengbasingda thougan toujabagi mapang oijanaba yamna haijabaga loinana makhoina eikhoida nijare. 

5 Amasung asi eikhoina ninglambagum natte, adubu Iswargi ningbiba mapanna makhoina hanna masa mathantabu Prabhuda amasung eikhoida pire. 

6 Aduna Titana mamangngeida houbikhiraba adugumna nakhoigi narakta thoujal asisu matol lomsu lomnanaba eikhoina mahakpu thoujille. 

7 Touigumbasung nakhoina thajabada, waheida, khangbada, yamna cheksinbada, amasung eikhoibu nakhoigi nungsibada, maram khuding asida nakhoina chaokhatpagumna thoujal asidasu chaokhatlu. 

8 Eina yathang oina ngangba natte, adubu ateisinggi cheksinba adugi mapanna nakhoigi nungsibagi achumba adusu chang yengduna ngangbani. 

9 Maramdi eikhoigi Prabhu Jisu Khristagi thoujal adu nakhoina khang-i, haibadi, Ibungona inakkhullamlabasu, Ibungogi lairabagi mapanna nakhoina inakkhunba oiraknanaba, nakhoigi maramgi damak Ibungona lairaba oirakle. 

10 Aduga asida eina eigi Aakhal khanghanjari; maramdi asi nakhoigi damak kannabani, hakum ateisinggi mang thana toubata nattana, touningbasu nakhoina houkhre. 

11 Adubu touningba thourang leiramba adugumna, nakhoi nakhoigi leijaba adudagi loithokpa oinanaba, atouba adusu houjik loithoklo. 

12 Maramdi thourang adu leirabadi, leijabagi matung inna yabibani, leijadabagi matung inna natte. 

13 Maramdi ateisingbu yanghannaba aduga nakhoibuna awa nangnaba haiba natte; 

14 Adubu mannanabani, makhoigi ayambanasu nakhoigi awatpa samjinbinanaba matam asida nakhoigi ayambana makhoigi awatpa samjinba phei; aduna mannaba oinanabani. 

15 Masi asumna ikhrabani, yamna khom jinba mahak aduna karisu lemhoude, aduga khajikta khomjinba mahak aduna karisu awatpa leiramde.


Tita amasung ateisingbu thaba


16 Touigumbasung Titagi pukningda nakhoigi damak eiga mannana cheksinba pibiba Iswarda thagatsi. 

17 Maramdi mahakna eikhoigi thoujinba aoiba mak yabibata natte, mahak masana yamna cheksinjabanina masana chatningba nakhoida chatkhibani. 

18 Amasung mahakka loinana aphaba wapaogi marida singlup pumnamakki marakta thagatlaba machin manaobu eikhoina thakhibani. 

19 Aduga aduta natte, adubu Prabhugi matik mangan-gi amasung eikhoigi thouranggi damak eikhoina thougan toujariba thoujal asigi marida eikhoiga loinana langphei khongbu oinaba singlupsingna mahakpu khansu khangatle. 

20 Eikhoina thougan toujariba athoiba khudon asigi maramda kanagumbana eikhoibu lalhandananaba asi sinajari. 

21 Maramdi Prabhugi mityengtada nattaduna, misinggi mityengdasu thabak makhei phajana bagi damak eikhoina hanna wakhal tou-i. 

22 Aduga eikhoina ayamba thabakta matam ayambada cheksinbagi chang khangkhraba, aduga houjik nakhoida mahakki yamna chetna thajaba leibagi maramna amuk henna cheksinkhraba eikhoigi ichin inaobu makhoiga loinana eikhoina thare. 

23 Titagi maramdadi, mahakti eigi ipangni, amasung nakhoigi damak eiga thabak suminabani; aduga ichin inaosing asidi singlupsinggi paopubasingni, Khristagi matik manganni. 

24 Maram aduna nakhoigi nungsibagi amasung nakhoigi maramda eikhoigi chaothokchabagi khudam singlupsinggi mamangda nakhoina makhoida utpiyu.

II KORINTHIYA 9 

1 Maramdi asengbasingda thougan touba adugi maramda eina nakhoida iruduna kannaba leite; maramdi eina nakhoigi thourang khang-i, 

2 Maduna eina nakhoigi maramda Makidoniyagi misinggi maphamda chaothokchei, haibadi, Akhaina hakumdagi langkhatkhre; amasung nakhoigi thawai yaoba aduna makhoi ayam babu thougatpire. 

3 Touigumbasung nakhoigi maramda eikhoigi chaothokchaba adu maram asida aremba oidananaba, haibadi, eina haikhirambagumna nakhoina thourang langnanaba, eina ichin inaosingbu thakhibani. 

4 Eiga loinana Makidoniyasingna lakpada nakhoina thou-rang langlamadaba phanglabadi, chetna thajaba asida eikhoi (nakhoi haidaduna) karigumba ikaiba phangba yai. 

5 Maram aduna ichin inaosingna hanna nakhoida chattuna, nakhoigi hannalepnaba khudon adu pammuna nattaduna, piningna piba thourang oina, madu hanna loithok-nanaba, makhoibu thoujinhanba kannei haina eina ningle.


Senkhai Pibasingda Tambiba


6 Adubu asi eina hairi, likna hunba mahak aduna likna lokkani, aduga marang kaina hunba mahak aduna marang kaina lokkani. 

7 Mi khudingna pammuba nattraga tangaiphadaba maongda nattaduna, magi magi ninglamba matung inna pisanu; maramdi harao haraona piba mibu Iswarna nungsi. 

8 Amasung maram pumnamakta matam leiba khibikta marang kaina aphaba thabak khudinggi damak nakhoigi yamna leinanaba, Iswarna nakhoida thoujal pumnamak yamkhathanbiba ngammi. 

9 Ikhiba asigumbani, mahakna koichai chaithokle, mahakna lairabasingda pinabire; mahakki dharmachenba lomba naidana itattattana lei. 

10 Aduga maru hunba mida maru amasung chanabagi damak achapot pinabiba Ibungo mahakna nakhoigi maru pisu pibigani, yamsu yamkhatthanbigani, aduga nakhoigi dharmachenbagi mahei adu hengathanbigani; 

11 Khak pammudana pinaba phaoba nakhoibu maram pumnamakta inakkhulhanbigani, maduna eikhoigi ipanna Iswarbu thagatpa thokhalli. 

12 Maramdi thougan asigi khanjabana asengbasinggi awatpa samjinbata natte, adubu Iswarbu thagatpa yambagi mapanna chaokhatli; 

13 Maramdi khanjaba asina nakhoigi chang khanghanba mapanna Khristagi aphaba wapaogi marida nakhoigi haidokchaba inba adugi damak, amasung makhoidasu pumnamaktasu nakhoigi katchabagi pammuba leitaba adugi damak, makhoina Iswarbu thagatpani; 

14 Amukka makhoi masanasu nakhoigi damak nijabaga loinana, nakhoigi nathakta Iswargi thoidok hendokpa thoujal leibagi maramna nakhoibu khourangna pamjabani. 

15 Iswargi hainingai leitaba khudongi damak Ibungo mahakpu thagatpa oisanu.

II KORINTHIYA 10 

Polna mahakki matik adu iswardagini haina leppa


1 Amahiksung nakhoiga leiminabada, nakhoigi narakta tonthaba, adubu leiminnadabada nakoiromda pukning thouna ningjaba Pol ei isana Khristagi pukning tappa amasung thotpagi mapanna nakhoibu nonjari; 

2 Hoi, eikhoina hakchanggi matung inna chatpani haina eikhoibu khalliba mi kharagi mathakta eina thouna utke haina ningliba chetna thajaba aduga loinana thouna adu ei leiba matamda eina uttananaba, eina nakhoida oida nijari. 

3 Maramdi eikhoi hakchangna chatlabasu, hakchanggi matung inna eikhoina lan soknade. 

4 (Maramdi eikhoigi langi khutlaidi hakchanggi natte, adubu akanba pal thugainaba phaoba Iswargi mangda madugi panggal lei.) 

5 Ningba khibikpu amasung Iswarbu khangba adubu yeknaduna chaojaba awangba thabak khudingbu eikhoina thugaiduna, wakhal khudingbu apha apun oina Khristagi haiba inba tanna purak-i; 

6 Amasung nakhoigi haiba inba adu changkhollabada, haiba indaba pumnamakpu laman khumnaba eikhoigi thourang lei. 

7 Nakhoigi mangda leiri leiriba pot adubu nakhoina yeng-i. Kanagumba mina, mahak Khristagini haiba masa mathantada thajarabadi, mahak masa mathanta asi amuk wakhal khanjasanu, haibadi, mahak Khristagi oibagumna eikhoisuni. 

8 Maramdi eikhoigi itikki marida eina khara yamna chaothoklagasu (madu nakhoibu sagatnabagidamak Prabhuna pibire, aduga nakhoibu thugainabagi damakti natte), Ei ikaiba phangloi; 

9 Eigi ikhi ikhiba lairikna nakhoibu kihannabagum eibu ningdananaba asi eina haibani. 

10 Maramdi makhoina hai, mahakki a-iba lairiksingdi lummi amasung kalli, adubu mahak masa yaobadi solli, amasung mahakki wangang karisu natte. 

11 Eikhoi leitaba matamda lairikki mapanna waheida oibagumna, eikhoi leiba matamdasu thabakta oi haiba asi adugumba mina khansanu. 

12 Maramdi masa mathantabu thagatchaba makhoi kanagumba aduga loinana eikhoina isa isabu masing channanaba, nattraga changdamnanaba thouna phaba oijade; touigumbasung makhoi masenna makhoi masa masabu chang yengjaba, amasung makhoi masen amaga amaga changdamnajaba, makhoi adudi khangdabani. 

13 Adubu nakhoi phaoba younanaba chang, Iswarna eikhoida kaknabiba ngamkhei adugi chang matung inna nattaduna, chang adu hendokna eikhoina chaothokcharoi. 

14 Maramdi eikhoina nakhoida youdabagum, eikhoina isa isa hendokna tingthokchade; maramdi eikhoina Khristagi aphaba wapao sandokpada nakhoi phaoba thungle. 

15 Eikhoigi machang hendoktuna mi ateisinggi nombada chaothokchade; adubu tarang tarang khangna ningba lei, haibadi, nakhoigi thajaba chaokhatpada, eikhoigi ngamkhei matung inna nakhoina eikhoibu yamna chaohanbigani, 

16 Aduna eikhoina nakhoidagi hendokpa maikeida aphaba wapao sandokpa yai, aduga mi atei amagi ngamkhei manungda thourang langkhraba thabak adugi marida chaothokpa natte. 

17 Tou-i-gumbasung chaothokchaba mahak aduna Prabhuda chaothokchasanu. 

18 Maramdi masa mathantabu thagatchaba mi adubu yabide, adubu Prabhuna thagatpiba mi adubu yabibani.

II KORINTHIYA 11 

Pakhonchatpa ama oina mahakki matik


1 Eina khara pangbada nakhoina khangbiba pamjei; touigumbasung nakhoina eibu aoibamak khangbi. Maramdi eina Iswargi khambanbaga loinana nakhoibu khambanjei; 

2 Maramdi asengbi leisabi oina nakhoibu katchananaba, amata ngaiba napuroiba Khrista aduda eina nakhoibu thajare. 

3 Touigumbasung lil aduna hawabu magi marei masana namthak toukhibagum, karigumba nakhoigi pukningbu Khristaromda atingba amasung asengbadagi manghanba yai haina eina ki, 

4 Maramdi arakpa mina eikhoina sandoktaba atoppa Jisu sandoklabadi, nattraga nakhoina phangdaba tonganba thawai phanglabadi nattraga makhoina jadaba tonganba aphaba wapao yarabadi, nakhoina mahakpu phajana khangbida! 

5 Maramdi eidi thoidok hendokpa pakhonchatpasing adugi tung sotthaba khak natte haina eina singthanajei. 

6 Touigumbasung eina wangangda heita-singdaba oriabasu, khangbadadi natchade; adubu maram khudingda eikhoina pumnamakki marakta asi nakhoida phongdokchare. 

7 Aduga eina nakhoida lemma Iswargi aphaba wapao sandokpagi maramna, nakhoibu chaokhatnanaba isa ithanta tonthajaduna eina pap toukhrabra? 

8 Eina nakhoida thougan tounanaba atei singlupsingdagi asumal louduna makhoibu munbire; 

9 Aduga eina nakhoiga leiminnaduna watpa matamda eina kanagumbada arumba oide; maramdi Makidoniyadagi lakpa ichin inaosingna eigi awatpa makhei samjinbire; aduga nakhoida arumba oihan-gadabadagi eina isa ithantabu maram khudingda ngakchei, amasung ithantabu ngakchagani. 

10 Khristagi achumba eingonda leibana Akhaigi maikeida chaothokchaba asidagi eibu khambiroi, 

11 Karigi damakno? Eina nakhoibu nungsidaba maramnara? Iswarna khang-i. 

12 Touigumbasung khudong chaba pamba makhoidagi khudong chaba kakthoknanaba, haibadi, makhoina chaothokchaba aduda makhoibu eikhoigum phangnanaba, eina touriba adu tousu tougani. 

13 Maramdi asigumba misingdi chumdaba pakhonchatpa, minamba thabak touba, Khristagi pakhonchatpasingga makhoi masana mannahanjaba misingni. 

14 Aduga masi angakpa natte, maramdi seitannasu masa mathantabu mangan-gi dutka mannahanjei. 

15 Maram aduna magi thougan toubasingna masa masabu dharmachenbagi thougan toubasinggumna mannahanjarabadi, madu achouba wa natte; makhoigi aroibadi makhoi makhoigi thabak matung inba oigani.


Polna awa anang Khristagi damak khangba


16 Eina amuk hairi, mi kana amatana eibu apangbani ningbidasanu; adubu ninglabadi, einasu khara chaothokchananaba, apangbagum eibu lousinbiyu. 

17 Eina ngangliba asi Prabhugi matung inna ngangba natte, adubu pangbana chaothokchabagi chetna thajaba asina ngangbani. 

18 Ayambana hakchanggi matung inna chaothokchabagi maramna, einasu chaothokchagani. 

19 Maramdi nakhoina asingba oiduna, apangbasingbu haraona khangbida! 

20 Maramdi kanagumbana nakhoibu minai oihallabadi, kanagumbana nakhoibu chathoklabadi, kanagumbana nakhoibu pharabadi, kanagumbana mathanta chaojarabadi, kanangumbana namaida phurabadi, nakhoina adugumba mibu khangbi. 

21 Eikhoina sollabani haibagumna, ei ithanta usitchadana ngangbani. Adum oinamakpu kanagumbana kari karigumbada thourabadi (pangbana eina ngangbani), einasu thou-i. 

22 Makhoi Ibriyasingla? eisuni. Makhoi Israyelsingla? eisuni. Makhoi Abrahamgi dharara. eisuni. 

23 Makhoi Khristagi thougan toubasingla? (Ei ithanta angaobagumna ngangli) eina amuk helli; subada yamna helli, keisumsangda tabada yamna helli, yeibibada masing naide, siramgadaba toi. 

24 Jihudisingdagi cheipham niphudagi ama taba eina mangarak phangle. 

25 Cheina eibu ahumlak phure, amuk nungna thare, ahumlak hi kaiba eina khangle, ahing amaga nungthil amaga samadru manungda lellure; 

26 Lam chatpa toi, turen kayagi khudongthiba, huranbasinggi khudongthiba, ireibakki misingdagi khudong thiba, atoppa jatsingdagi khudongthiba, saharda khudong thiba, lamlakta khudong thiba, samadruda khudong thiba, chumdaba ichin inaosinggi marakta khudong thiba, 

27 Nomba amasung awaba khangle; mitseng toina khangbada, aram khourangbada, toina chara henbada, ningthambada amasung phi watpada tarammi. 

28 Mapan-gi oiba waramsing asidagisu hendokpa, singlup pumnamakki damak nungsa thiba numit khuding ithakte nanthari. 

29 Kanagi asonbada eisu sondabage? Kanagi khudi thibada eisu meichak khangdabage? 

30 Eina chaothokchaba tarabadi, eigi asonba yambagi maramda eina chaothokchagani. 

31 Prabhu Jisugi Iswarsu mapasu oiba, lomba naidana thagatchagadaba Ibungo mahak aduna ei chinthide haiba khangbi. 

32 Dammesakta ningthou Aritagi makhada leibik ngakpa mapuna eibu phananaba dammesaksinggi sahar adu sennarammi, 

33 Aduga eibu polangda pan-gi mihuttagi thadabiduna makhuttagi hingjare.

II KORINTHIYA 12 

Polda Prabhuna whanbiba amasung masagi asonbada nollukchaba


1 Kannaba leitrabasu, eina chao-thokchaba tare; touigumbasung Prabhugi uhanbiba amasung phongdokpiba ayamba eina haijage. 

2 Chahi tara-mari sure eina Khristada leiba mi amabu khang-i (Hakchang yaobra yaodabra ei khangde, Iswarna khang-i), asigumba mi asibu ahumsuba swarga phaoba pak pukhatpire. 

3 Aduga asigumba mi adubu eina khang-i (Hakchang yaobra yaodabra ei khangde, Iswarna khang-i), 

4 Haibadi, mahakpu Paradaista pak pukhatle, aduga mioibana haidokpa hounadaba, ngangba yadaba wa mahakna tare. 

5 Asigumba migi maramda eina chaothokchagani, adubu ei isagi maramdi eigi sonjabada nattana, eina chaothokcharoi. 

6 Maramdi eina chaothokchaba pamlagadi, ei apangba oiroi, maramdi eina achumba nganggani; adubu kanagumba mina eibu uba oirabasu, eingondagi taba oirabasu, hen-gatna eigi maramda ning-gani haiduna, eina hanthajei. 

7 Amasung phongdokpiba ayamba thoina chaobagi maramna eina nawangkhigani haiduna, eigi isada tingkhang ama pibire, masi eina nawangdannabagi, eibu khudumna sunanaba seitan-gi dut oire. 

8 Asigi marida eingondagi masi theidokpinanaba eina Prabhuda ahumlak nijare: 

9 Amastmg Ibungona eingonda haire, nanggi damak eigi thoujal aokpani, maramdi eigi panggnna asonbada chang khonhanbi. Maram aduna Khristagi panggal ithakta leibinanabagi, henna eina eigi ason asonbada harao haraona chaothokchagani. 

10 Maram adugi damak eina Khristagi maramgi damak ason asonbada, mingchat athi athibada, anang anangbada, thina thina otpada, achin achinbada apenba oijei; maramdi eina sonba matam aduda ipanggal kalli.


Polna mahakki chaothokchaba maram adu amuk hanna puthokpa


11 Ei apangba oirakle. Nakhoina eibu namduna oihalle; maramdi nakhoina eibu thagatkadabamakni, maramdi ei karisu nattaba oirabasu, eidi thoidok hendokpa pakhonchatpasing adugi tung sothaba khak oijade. 

12 Aoibamak khudamsinggi, angak angakpagi amasung toungamdaba thabakki mapanna khangheiba pumnamakta nakhoigi narakta pakhonchatpagi khudam khibik toujare. 

13 Maramdi eina isabu nakhoida arumba oihandaba nattana, singlup atei ateidagi nakhoina sothakhiba kari leibage? Aranba asi eibu kokpiyu. 

14 Yeng-u, eina nakhoida laknaba thourang touba asina ahumlak subani, aduga ei nakhoida arumba oiroi, maramdi eina nakhoigi pot thide, adubu nakhoibu thibani; maramdi machasingna mapa mamagi damak peisinpham thokte adubu mapa mamana machasinggi damak peisinpham thok-i. 

15 Amasung nakhoigi thawaigi damak eigi leijaba thoina haraona tinggani, aduga isasu pumting tingjagani. Eina nakhoibu thoina henna nungsirabadi, eibu nungsiba watpra? 

16 Adubu madu adugumba oisanu, ei isana nakhoibu arumba puhande; touigumbasung eina lousingna marei mara touduna nakhoibu phare. 

17 Eina nakhoida thakhiba makhoi kanagumbagi mapanna nakhoidagi eina tongjaba phanglabra? 

18 Eina Titabu thoujinkhi, aduga mahakka loinana manaobu thakhi. Titana nakhoidagi karigumba tongjaba lourabra? Thawai amatada eikhoina chatminnaba nattra? Khongthang amatada thang-minnaba nattra? 

19 Eikhoina isabu nakhoida kaithok-chabani haina nakhoina asup kuina ning-i. Iswargi mityengda Khristagi oina eikhoina ngangbani. Touigumbasung, achanbasa, nakhoibu semgatnabagi damak maram pumnamak oire. 

20 Maramdi eina ki, haibadi karigumba eina lakpada, eina pambagum nakhoibu eina phangdaba yai, aduga nakhoina pamdabagum eibu nakhoina phangba yai; khatnaba, kallaknaba, meihouna saoba, marannai tanba, mithingaigi thabak, chibon chibon ngangba, napal touba, wathok lanthokpa, karigumba leiba yai; 

21 Amukka eina lakpada, eigi Iswarna nakhoigi mangda eibu nollukhanba yai, amasung hanna pap toukhiduna makhoina toukhiba sengdaba, marumbi thamba amasung apaibadagi pukning hongdaba makhoi ayambagi damak eina tengthaba yai.

II KORINTHIYA 13 

Polna makhoida lakkani haiduna mit-na singhanba


1 Eina nakhoida lakkadouriba asina ahumlak subani. Sakshi ani ahumgi machinda wa khuding lephangadabani. 

2 Hanna pap toukhibasingda amasung atei pumnamakta eina hanna haikhre, aduga eina leiba anisuba matamdagumna, houjik leitrabasu, mangjounana hairibani eina amuk hanna laklabadi, makhoibu eina kanbiroi; 

3 Maramdi Khristana eigi nungda ngangbagi khudam nakhoi na thiribani; Ibungona nakhoiromda sonde, adubu nakhoigi narakta panggal kalli. 

4 Maramdi sonbadagi Ibungobu krosta hatle, adumakpu Iswargi panggandagi Ibungona hing-i. Maramdi eikhoisu Ibungoga sonminnei, adubu Iswargi panggandagi nakhoiromda eikhoina Ibungoga hingminnagani. 

5 Nakhoina thajabada leibra leitabra nakhoi nasamak chang yengjou; nakhoi nasamak khanjou. Nattraga Jisu Khrista nakhoigi manungda lei haiba nakhoi nasamak khangjadabra? Leitrabadi, nakhoibu yadabani. 

6 Adubu eikhoibu yadaba natte haina nakhoina khanggani haiduna eina tarang tarang khangna ningi. 

7 Houjik nakhoina karisu phattaba toudanaba eikhoina Iswarda haijari; eikhoibu yabida uhannanaba nattaduna, eikhoibu yadabagum oirabasu, nakhoina aphaba adu tounanabani. 

8 Maramdi eikhoina achumbabu yeknaduna karisu touba ngamde, adubu achumbagi damak-ni. 

9 Maramdi eikhoina sonba aduga nakhoina kanba matamda eikhoina haraojei; nakhoigi changkhonbagi damak asi eikhoina haisu haijari. 

10 Sidoknanabagi damak nattana, sagatnabagi damak Prabhuna eingonda pibiraba matik adugi matung inna eina nakhoigida leiba matamda tamthina toudananaba, maram asigi damak eina leitabada asi iri.


Aroiba wa


11 Akonbada, ichin inaosa, nungngai yaiphou. Changkhollaba oibiyu, themjin-bida loubiyu, pukning amata oibiyu, ingthana panbiyu; aduga nungsibagi amasung ingthabagi Iswar aduna nakhoiga loinabigani. 

12 Sengna chupnabaga loinana amana amabu khurumnou. 

13 Asengbasing pumnamakna nakhoibu khurumjari. 

14 Prabhu Jisu Khristagi thoujal, Iswargi nungsiba amasung thawai asengbagi, tinnaba adu nakhoi pumnamakka loinabisanu.

GALATIYASINGDA POLNA IBA LAIRIK 

A-iba: Missionary Pol 

Ibagi matam: A.D. 49-56 

Wamachang: Khristansingna ning tamba amasung aran-khubam phangbagi maram. 

Missionary Polna Galatiyagi lamda leiba singlup kharagidamakta ibani. Galatiya hairiba lam asi Asiya Minorgi mayai oirap touba maphamda leibani. Mapham asida leiriba mioising asi u-wa nungnachingba latpa adugumba Phrygiagi jatsingni. Mapham asida Jihudigi mioisingsu lei. Jihudi singgi marakta khristan oibasingna Phrygia singgi marakta khristan oibasingda Mousina iramba amadi chatnaramba Sartan athipham (ti) maton kakkadabani haibanachingba wathok kaya leirammi. Asigumba ariba asi thadoktima Iswargi nungsibada henna chaokhattuna aran khubamgi lambi asi senghan-gadabani haina Jihudi, Phrygia amadi Gentile singda mayek sengna khanghalli. 

 GALATIYA 1 

Khurumjaba


1 Misingdagisu nattaba, migi mapan-nasu nattaba, adubu Jisu Khristagi amasung ibungobu asibasinggi maraktagi hingatpiraba mapa iswargi mapanna pakhonchatpa oiraba Polna, 

2 Amasung eiga loinaba ichin inaosing pumnamakna Galatiyagi singlupsingda: 

3 Eikhoigi Ipa iswar amasung prabhu Jisu Khristadagi thoujal amasung ingthaba nakhoida leibisanu. 

4 Eikhoigi iswar amasung ipagi ningaba matung inna matam asigi phattaba taibangpanbadagi eikhoibu kanbina naba, ibungona masamakpu eikhoigi papkidamak pibire. 

5 Ipa iswar asida Lomba naidana matik mangal oisanu. Amen.


Galatiyasinggi marida Polgi ningba kaiba


6 Khristagi thoujanna nakhoibu koubiba ibungo mahakpu thadoktuna tonganba aphaba wapao amada nakhoina asup thuna hong-i haibada eina ingak ngaki; 

7 Aphaba wa pao asi atei ama natte; mi kharana nakhoibu ottuna, Khristagi aphaba wapao adu serannahanningbatani. 

8 Touigumbasung eikhoina nakhoida sandoklamba aphaba wapao adudagi onna teinaba aphaba wapao ama nakhoida eikhoimakna nattraga swargadagi dut amana sandoklaba di, mahak sirap phangsnu. 

9 Eikhoina mamangngeida haikhibagumna, eina houjiksu amuk hairi, haibadi, kanagumba mina nakhoina phangkhraba adudagi onna teinaba aphaba wapao ama sandoklaba di, mahak sirap phangsnu. 

10 Maramdi eina houjik misinggi yananaba thiribra, nattraga Iswargira? nattraga eina misingbu pelhanba honaribra? eina houjiksu misingbu pelhallamlabadi, eina Khristagi manai oijaramloidabani. Mahakki aphaba wapao adu Khristadagini, Misingdagi Natte


11 Maramdi, ichin inaosa, eina sandokpa aphaba wapao adu mioibagi matung inba nate haibagi marida eina nakhoibu khanghanjari. 

12 Maramdi eina masi mioibadagi phangbasu natte, tamjabasu natte adubu Jisu Khristana phongdokpibagi mapannnani. 

13 Maramdi mamangngeide Jihudisinggi dharmada eina chatlamba matou nakhoina tare, haibadi, eina iswargi singluppu kaya otneiduna manghannaba tourammi; 

14 Amasung eigi ipa ipusingna chatnarakliba adu gi damak thoidok hendokna thawai yaoduna, eigi ireipakki misinggi marakta imannaba ayambadagi Jihudisinggi dharmada eina mang tharammi. 

15 Touigumbasung atoppa jatsinggi marakta eina ibungo mahakki, macha nipabu sandoknanaba, eibu imagi puknungdagi khaidok-oiduna, 

16 Ibungo mahakki thoujan-gi mapanna koubiba iswarna eigi nungda ibungobu phongdokpininglabada, khudak aduda eina i amasung tong yaobaga wa tanarude; 

17 Aduga Jerusalem tanna eigi imangda pakhonchatpasing oiramba aduda eina chatte, adubu eina Arab leibakta chatthoklui, aduga Damesakta amuk hallak-i. 

18 Matung aduda chahi ahum leiraga eina Jerusalem tanna Keiphabu unanaba karuduna, mahakka numit taramangani leiminnarammi. 

19 Adubu Prabhugi manao Jakob nattana eina pakhonchatpasing atei kana amatabu ude. 

20 Eina houjik nakhoida iri iriba asidi, yengu, iswargi mangda ei chin thide. 

21 Adugi matungda eina suriya araasung Kalikiyagi maikeida lakle. 

22 Aduga Khristada leiba Jihudiyagi singlupsingna eibu sak khanglamde; 

23 Adubu, ahanbada eikhoibu otneiramliba niahak aduna ahanbada manghanlamliba thajaba adu houjikti mahakmakna sandokli, haiba makhoina tarambatani; 

24 Aduga makhoina eigi maramda iswarbu thagatcharammi.

GALATIYA 2 

Polgi thabak adu Jerusalem singlupna yabiba


1 Adugi matungda chahi taramari leiraga, eina Barnabaga loinana, Titabusu loinana puduna Jerusalemda karui. 

2 Amasung phongdokpiba matung inna kajarubani; aduga eina atoppa jatsinggi marakta sandokliba aphaba wapao adu makhoigi mamangda tamle, adubu karigumba aremabada chelliba, nattraga chellamba oiba yai haiduna, aphaobasinggi mangda lonna tamle. 

3 Touigumbasung eiga loinaba Titabu, Grik oirabamaksu, un kaknaba namlamde; 

4 Adubu eikhoibu minai oihanna naba, Khrista Jisugi mapanna eikhoina phangjaba iningtamba adu mikup nahum yengnaba lonna changba chumdaba machin manaosingbu pusillakpa maramna asumna oiba yai; 

5 Aphaba wapaogi achumba adu nakhoiga itattattana leiminnanaba, makhoida eikhoina pung ama phaoba makha ponnanaba changjade. 

6 Touigumbasung karigumba oina phaorabasingdagi (makhoina kari kari oiramlabasu, eingondadi karisu natte; iswarna misak mimai yengde) einggondadi aphaobasing aduna karisu hengathanbide. 

7 Adubu amaromdadi, un kakpasinggi damak aphaba wapao Pitarda sinnabibagumna, eingonda un kaktabasinggi damak aphaba wapao sinnabire haiba makhoina uraga. 

8 (Maramdi un kakpasinggi pakhonchatpa thabakta Pitargidamak toubiba ibungo mahakna atoppa jatsingda eigidamaksu toubire); 

9 Eingonda piraba thoujal adu yumbi oina phaoraba Jakob, Keipha, amasung Johanna khanglabada, eikhoina attoppa jatsing da amasung makhoina un kakpasingda chatnanaba, eingondasu Barnabadasu makhoina mapang oibagi yetthangba khut painabire; 

10 Eikhoina lairabasingbu ningsingbigabadani haiba makhoina ningbatani; madumak einasu tounaba thawai yaorabani.


Antiyokhiyada Pitargi asoiba


11 Touigumbasung Keiphana Antiyokhiyada lakpada, mahakna ayol aranda tajaba maramna, eina mahakpu hakthengnana khamjille. 

12 Maramdi Jakobtagi kana kanagumbana laktringeida, mahakna atoppa jatsingga chaminnarammi; adubu makhoina laklabada, mahakna un kakpagi oibasingbu kiduna, mahak masa mathanta ninghannaduna khaidokchaba houre. 

13 Amasung Jihudi Ateisingnasu mahakka loinana louthup loukoina chatle; aduna Barnababu phaoba makhoigi tousinnaba aduna puthoklammi. 

14 Touigumbasung Makhoina aphaba wapaogi achumbagi matung inna chumna chatte haiba eina urabada, makhoi pumnamakki mangda eina Keiphada haire, nahakna Jihudi oiraga Jihudisinggi matougum chattaduna, atoppa jatsinggi matougum chatlabadi, nahakna atoppa jatsingbu Jihudisinggi matougum chatnaba karamna namlibano?


Wayel yathangna aran khubam piba ngamdaba


15 Eikhoi mahousana Jihudisingni, aduga papchenba atoppa jatsing natte; 

16 Adumakpu mioibabu wayel yathanggi thabaksing toudadagi chumhanba natte adubu Jisu Khristabu thajabagi mapanna chumhanbi haiba khangduna, eikhoibu wayel yathanggi thabak-sing toubadagi nattana, Khristabu thaja-badagi chumhanbinanaba eikhoimaknasu Khrista Jisubu thajare; maramdi wayel yathanggi thabaksing toubadagi mi kana amatabu chumhanbiba leiroi. 

17 Toui-gumbasung eikhoina Khristagi mapanna chumhanbinaba thibada, eikhoi isanasu pap chenbasingni haiba phangjarabadi, adunadi Khristana papki thougan touba oibra? madu khak oidasnu! 

18 maramdi eina manghankhraba pot adu eina amuk sagatlabadi, ei isabu aranba touba mini khanghanjei. 

19 Maramdi eina iswarlomda hingjananaba, wayel yathanggi mapanna eina wayel yathanglomda sire. 

20 Eibu Khristaga loinana krosta siminnahanbire; amasung houjik hingjariba eina natte, adubu eigi nungda Khristana hingbibani; aduga eina hoijik hakchangda hingjariba mahing adu eibu nungsibiraba amasung eigidamak ibungo masamakpu pithokpiraba iswargi macha nipabu thajaba adugi mapanna eina hingjabani. 

21 Eina iswargi thojal adu aremba oihande, maramdi wayel yathanggi mapanna dharmachenba oirabadi, Khristadi arembada sibire.

GALATIYA 3 

Iswarna yabibagi maramdi wayel yathang natte, thajabani


1 He apangba Galatiyagi misa, nakhoigi namangmakta Jisu Khristabu krosta hatkhiba adu sengna utpire; nakhoibu kanana sumhatlabage? 

2 Asita eina nakhoidagi khangjaning-i, haibadi, nakhoina wayel yathanggi thabaksing toubadagi thawai adubu phanglabra? nattraga thajabagi paodam tabadagi phanglabra? nakhoi asup pang-libra? 

3 Thawaigi mapanna houkhraba nakhoina houjik hakchanggi mapanna loisillibra? 

4 Nakhoina asup yamba awa anang arembada khanglabra? Masi oirabadi, aoibamak arembani. 

5 Maram aduna ibungo mahakna thawaibu nakhoida pibiba amasung nakhoigi narakta toungambada thabaksing toubiriba adu wayel yathanggi thabaksing toubadagira, nattraga thajabagi paodam tabadagira? 

6 Abrahamna iswarbu thajaraduna mangonda dharmachenba singthana-bibagumbani. 

7 Maram aduna thajabadagi oiba makhoi adudi Abrahamgi machasingni haiba khangu. 

8 Amasung iswarna atoppa jatsingbu thajabana chumhanbigani haiba sastra aduna hanna uduna, Abrahamda aphaba wa pao hanna sandokpiduna hai, nahakki napanna jat pumnamakpu bor pibigani. 

9 Adunadi thajabadagi oiba makhoibu thajaraba Abrahamga loinana bor pibi. 

10 Maramdi wayel yathanggi thabaksing toubadagi oiriba mi makhei sirapki makha ponbani, maramdi masi ikhrabani, haibadi, wayel yathang adugi lairikta ikhraba pumnamak adu tounanaba ngaktaba mi khuding sirap phanglabani. 

11 Amahiksung iswargi mangda wayel yathangna mi kana amatabu chumhanbide haiba taseng tasengbani, maramdi dharmachenba mina thajabana hinggani; 

12 Aduga wayel yathangdi thajabadagi natte; adubu, yathang, pumnamakpu ngakpa mi adu madugi mapanna hinggani. 

13 Khristana eikhoigi ihutta sirap oibiraktuna, eikhoibu wayel yathang adugi siraptagi handokpire; maramdi masi ikhrabani, haibadi, uthakta yanba mi khuding sirap phanglabani: 

14 Aduna Khrista Jisugi mapanna Abrahamgi bor adu atoppa jatsinggi maphamda thungnanabani, aduga eikhoina thajabagi mapanna thawaigi waleppa adu phangjananabani. 

15 Ichin inaosa, eina mioibagi machat matung inna ngangjaribani: mioibagi walepnabamak oirabasu, madu chatkhrabada, mi kana amatana madu aremba oihande, nattraga karigumba maduda tinsinde. 

16 Waleppasing adu Abrahamda amasung mahakki dharada haikhibani. Ibungo mahakna ayambagi maramda haibagumna, amasung nahakki dharasingda, haide; adubu amagi maramda haibagumna, amasung nahakki dharada, haibani; dhara adu Khristani. 

17 Amahiksung asi eina hairi, iswarna hanna chethankhraba walepnaba adu, chahi chamri kunthragi matungda oirakpa wayel yathang aduna waleppa adu mahei yandananaba muthatte. 

18 Maramdi phangpham thokpa adu wayel yathangdagi oirabadi, madu waleppadagi amuk oide. Adubu iswarna Abrahamda waleppagi mapanna thoujanbire.


Wayel Yathanggi maram


19 Adunadi wayel yathang adu karino? Waleppa phanglaba dhara ibungo aduna lengbirakpa phaoba ayol arangi maramna madu hapchinbani; aduga nadu taisinbiba amagi khutna swargadutsinggi mapanna semgatpani. 

20 Amasung taisinbiba adu amagi taisinbiba natte; adubu iswardi amatani. 

21 Adunadi wayel yathang aduna iswargi waleppasing adubu yeknabra? madu khak oidasnu; maramdi hinhanba ngamba wayel yathang piramlabadi, thanggei sengna wayel yatthanggi mapanna dharmachenba oiramgadabani. 

22 Adubu Jisu Khristada thajabadagi waleppa adu thajabasingda pibinanaba, sastrana pumnamak adu papki makha ponna thingjille.


Thajabagi mahei


23 Touigumbasung thajaba adu thoktringeida, tungda phongdokkadouriba thajaba aduda eikhoibu thingjinduna, wayel yathanggi makha ponna thamlammi. 

24 Aduna thajabana eikhoibu chumhanbinanaba wayel yathang aduna Khristagi mapham tanna eikhoibu lamjingbibanai oirakle. 

25 Adubu houjik thajaba adu thoklabada, eikhoi amuk lamjingbiba nai adugi makha pondre. 

26 Maramdi nakhoi pumnamakti thajabagi mapanna Khrista Jisugi marida iswargi macha nipasing oiri. 

27 Maramdi Khristagida baptais louraba makhoi makheina phi setpagum Khristabu setlabani. 

28 Jihudisu Griksu naide; minaisu mapusu naide; nipasu nipisu naide; maramdi nakhoi pumnamak Khrista Jisuda amatani, 

29 Amasung nakhoi Khristagi oirabadi, nakhoidi Abrahamgi dhara, waleppagi matung inna yumlepchara oi.

GALATIYA 4 

Khristada thajabagi mapanna Iswargi macha nipa oiba


1 Touigumbasung eina hairi, haibadi, yumlepchara aduna naha oiringei makhei, mahakna pumnamakki mapu oirabasu, minaiga karisu khetnade; 

2 Adubu mapana kakkhiba numit adu sudriba phaoba mahakna ngaksenbasinggi amasung dewnsinggi makha ponna lei. 

3 Adugumduna eikhoina angang oiringeida taibangpan-gi maru oiba chatnabigi makha ponna eikhoibusu punduna thamlammi. 

4 Adubu maram adu pumsu surabada iswarna, nupina pokpa, wayel yathanggi makha ponna pokpa, macha nipabu thabirakle; 

5 Madudi macha nipasina wayel yathanggi makha ponna leirambasingbu handokpinanabani, asumna eikhoina yokchaba macha nipasing oiba phangjananabani. 

6 Aduga nakhoidi macha nipasing oibagi maramna iswarna macha nipagi thawaibu nakhoigi thamoi nungda thabire; thawai Abba, Ipa, laojei. 

7 Aduga nahakti minai amuk oidre, adubu macha nipa oire; aduga macha nipa oirabadi, iswargi mapanna yumlepcharasu oi.


Polgi mapanna thajabasing adu ninghandananaba haijaba


8 Touigumbasung matam aduda iswarbu khangdaduna nakhoina mahousana iswar oidabasingda khanjarammi; 

9 Adubu houjikti nakhoina iswarbu khanglakle, hoi, madudagi henna iswarna nakhoibu khanglakle hairaga, nakhoina asonba amasung tollaba maru oiba chatnabi aduda karamna amuk hankhibano? Maduda amuk hanna nakhoina minai oiba pambra? 

10 Nakhoina numit, tha makummatha amasung chahi ngak-i. 

11 Eina karigumba arembada nakhoigi damak nomle haiduna, eina nakhoigi maramda ki. 

12 Ichin inaosa, eigumba oirak-u, eina nakhoibu nonjari, maramdi einasu nakhoigumba oirakle. Nakhoina eingonda karisu aranba toude; 

13 Adubu nakhoina khangi, haibadi, isa sonbagi maramna ahanba matamda eina nakhoida aphaba wapao sandokle; 

14 Amasung eigi hakchanggi phibamna nakhoida changjeng ama oiba adu nakhoina usittaba nattraga yadaba toubida; adubu iswargi dut amagum hoi, Khrista Jisumakkum eibu nakhoina lousinbire. 

15 Maram aduna nakhoi nasagi yaiphaba adu kadaino? Maramdi eina nakhoida sakshi piri, haibadi, ngamlabadi, nakhoina nakhoigi mit louthoktuna eingonda pininglamgadabani. 

16 Adunadi nakhoida achumba tambibagi maramna eidi nakhoigi yeknaba oiraklabra? 

17 Makhoina nakhoibu thawai yaona phana thiba natte, adubu nakhoina makhoibu thawai yaona thinanaba makhoina nakhoibu latnahanba pammi. 

18 Touigumbasung eiga nakhoiga leiminnaba matamdata nattana, matam pumnamakta aphaba thabakta thawai yaona thiba aphabani. 

19 Eigi nungsiba angangsa, nakhoigi nungda Khristagi sakong semgattriba phaoba eina nakhoigidamak chabokpada chingnabagum oiri. 

20 Touigumbasung eina houjik nakhoiga leiminnaba amasung eigi khonda onthoknaba ningjabani; maramdi eina nakhoigi maramda langtaknari.


Ariba walepnabagi pandam louba


21 Eingonda tambiyu, wayel yathanggi makha ponningbasa, nakhoina wayel yathang tadabra? 

22 Maramdi masi ikhrabani, haibadi, Abrahamgi macha nipa ani leirammi, amana minai nupigi, aduga amana maningtambigini. 

23 Touigumbasung minai nupigi adudi hakchanggi matung inna pokpani, adubu maningtambigi adudi waleppagi mapanna pokpani. 

24 Wa asida pandam leiri: maramdi nupi ani asi walepnaba anini; amana Sinai chingdagi, minai oinaba macha pokpi Hagar aduni. 

25 Amahiksung Hagar asi Arab leibakta leiba Sinai chingni, aduga houjik leiriba Jerusalemga pangkhakni; maramdi Jerusalem asi machasingga loinana minai oiri. 

26 Adubu mathaklomda leiriba Jerusalem adudi maming tambini, madu eikhoidi imani. 

27 Maramdi masi ikhrabani, chaboktabi, mahak haraojaro; chabok chingnadabi, nahak pokhaina laoro; Maramdi mapuroiba leibidagi naitomtabigi machasingna yamba helli. 

28 Amahiksung, ichin inaosa, Isahakkumna eikhoidi waleppagi machasingni. 

29 Touigumbasung hakchanggi matung inna pokpa mahak aduna thawaigi matung inna pokpa mahakpu matam aduda ot-neiramba adugumna, houjiksu adugumbani. 

30 Adubu sastrana kari haibage? Minai nupiga macha nipagabu tanthokkhro, maramdi minai nupigi macha nipana maningtambigi macha nipaga loinana phangpham thokpa khak phangminnaroi. 

31 Maram aduna, ichin inaosa, eikhoidi minai nupigi machasing natte, adubu maningtambigini.

GALATIYA 5 

1 Ningtamnabagidamak Khristana eikhoibu iningtamhanbire; maram aduna chetna leppu, aduga minaigi popuda amuk yaminnajaganu.


Khristaga wayel yathanggagi marakta ama khangadaba


2 Yengu, Pol eina nakhoida hairibani, haibadi, nakhoina un kakpa lourabadi, Khristadi nakhoigi tongjaba karisu oiroi. 

3 Hoi, un kakpa louba mi khuding-da eina amuk sakshi piribani, haibadi, mahak aduna wayel yathang apumba tounaba laman tonbani. 

4 Wayel yathanggi mapanna chumhanbinaba hotnariba nakhoidi Khristadagi mari thadatnare; nakhoidi thoujandagi takhrabani. 

5 Maramdi eikhoidi thawaigi mapanna thajabana dhramachenbagi tarang tarang khangna ningbagidamak nagaijari. 

6 Maramdi Khrista Jisuda unkakpanasu karisu kannade; adubu nungsibagi mapanna thabak touriba thajaba adunani. 

7 Nakhoina ningthijana chellammi; achumba indananaba nakhoibu kanana khambage? 

8 Athemba asi nakhoibu koubiba ibungo mangondagi natte. 

9 Hamei khajiktana matum apuinba kamkhathalli. 

10 Nakhoigi pukning atoppa leiroi haina eina nakhoigi maramda prabhuda thajei; adubu nakhoibu otpa mahak adu, kana kanagumba oirasu, mahakki wayel phangjagani. 

11 Touigumbasung, ichin inaosa, eina houjik phaoba un kakpa sandoklabadi, kari maramna eibu houjik phaoba otneibiribano? Adunadi krosna khudi thihanba adu tokhalle. 

12 Nakhoibu tapthahandriba makhoi adubu un kakpadagi hendokna masa adu phaoba kakthatlamlabadi, eina penjaramgadabani.


Nungsibagi mapanna ningtambabu khudum chanba


13 Maramdi, ichin inaosa, Nakhoibu naningtamnabagi damak koubire; asita nakhoigi naning tamba adu hakchangda khudongchanabagi damak sijinnaganu, adubu nungsibagi mapanna amaga amaga nai oinou. 

14 Maramdi wayel yathang apumbabu wahei amana thunghanbani, madudi nangna nanggi keiroi leikaibu nasamakkumna nungsigadabani. 

15 Adubu nakhoi amaga amaga chiknaduna chathoknarabadi, nakhoi amana amabu tumhandananaba cheksillu.


Thawai asengbana chingbiba


16 Touigumbasung eina hairibani, thawaigi mapanna chatlu, aduga nakhoina hakchanggi apamba adu thung-halloi. 

17 Maramdi hakchanggi apamba aduna thawaibu yeknei, aduga thawaigi apamba aduna hakchangbu yeknei; maramdi nakhoina pamba pamba adu toudananaba, ani asi amaga amaga yeknaduna, mai oknei. 

18 Touigumbasung nakhoibu thawaina chingbirabadi, nakhoi wayel yathanggi makha ponde. 

19 Houjik hakchanggi thabak phongdokli, madudi asisingni: marumbi thamba, sengdaba, apaiba, 

20 Lai-murti latpa, hikap yaikappa, yeknaba, yeina-sunaba, kalak-naba, meihouna saoba, marannai tanba, tokhai tokhainaba, michang naiba, 

21 Khambanba, yu ngaoba, lamchat haptaba, aduga asigumba mannaba makhei; asigumba thabak mahousana touribasing aduna iswargi leibak phanglaroi haiba eina nakhoida hanna khanghankhibagumna, eina houjiksu nakhoida masigi maramda mangjounana khanghalli. 

22 Touigumbasung thawaigi maheidi: nungsiba, haraoba, ingthaba, kuina khangbiba, chanbiba, aphaba, thajaba, 

23 Pukning tappa, masa khudum chanjaba; asigumbabu yeknaba wayel yathang kari amata leite. 

24 Amasung Khrista Jisugi oibasingna hakchang adu magi apamba amasung apaiba aduga loinana krosta hatkhre. 

25 Eikhoina thawaigi mapanna hinglabadi, thawaigi mapanna eikhoina chatsu chatsi. 

26 Amana amabu langnaduna, amana amabu khambannaduna, eikhoina napan touba oiganusi.

GALATIYA 6 

Aphaba Tounaba Insinbiba


1 Ichin inaosa, karigumba aranbada taba mi amabu pharabadi, nangbusu themba yai haiduna, nang nasabu yengjaduna, thawaigi oiriba nakhoina pukning tappagi thawaina asigumba mibu mensinbiyu. 

2 Nkhoina amana amagi arumba pubiyu, aduga asumna Khristagi wayel yathang adu thunghallu. 

3 Maramdi karisu oidaba kanagumba mi amana masa mathantabu karigumba ama oina ningjarabadi, mahakna masa mathantabu minamjabani. 

4 Adubu mi khudingna magi magi thabak chang Yengbiyu, aduga matam aduda mi ateigi nattaba, mahak masa mathantamakki maramda mahakki chaothokchaba phangjagani. 

5 Maramdi mi khudingna magi magi potlum pujagadabani. 

6 Touigumbasung iswargi wa tamba phangba mahak aduna tambiba mahak aduda aphaba pot pumnamaktagi katsnu. 

7 Nakhoibu minamhanganu; iswarbu noknaphade, maramdi mina magi hunkhi hunkhiba adu madumak loksu lokchagani. 

8 Maramdi mahakmakki hakchanggi damak hunba mi aduna mahakki hakchangdagi amangba lokchagani; adubu thawaigi damak hunba mi aduna thawaidagi lomba naidaba hingba lokchagani. 

9 Amasung aphaba touringeida eikhoina waganusi; maramdi sonthadrabadi, achaba matamda eikhoina lokkani. 

10 Adunadi eikhoina khudongchaba phangba phangbada, mi pumnamakta amasung thoidokpadi thajabagi imung oiribasingda eikhoina aphaba adu tousi.


Aroiba wa


11 Yengbiyu eigi ikhutmakna kaya chaoba mayekna nakhoida eina ijabano! 

12 Hakchangda phajana uhanba pamba makheina nakhoibu un kaknanaba namduna touhanbani; Khristagi Kroski maramda makhoibu ot-neidanabatani. 

13 Maramdi un kaklabasing phaobanasu makhoi masana wayel yathang adu ngakte; adubu makhoina nakhoigi hakchanggi maramda chaothokchananaba, nakhoibu un kakhanningbani. 

14 Touigumbasung eikhoigi Prabhu Jisu Khristagi kroski maramda nattana chaothokchaba eigi oidasanu; madugi mapanna taibangpanna eingonda, aduga eina taibangpallomda krosta sire. 

15 Maramdi un kakpana nattraga kaktabana karisu natte, adubu anouba sembanani. 

16 Amasung changchat asi chatliba makheida aduga iswargi Israyelda ingthaba amasung nungsibiba oisnu. 

17 Houjiktagi eibu kana amatana otpidasanu; maramdi Jisugidamak eigi isada atang atangba mapham eina pujari. 

18 Ichin inaosa, eikhoigi Prabhu Jisu Khristagi thoujal nakhoigi thawaiga loinabisnu. Amen.

EPHISASINGDA POLNA IBA LAIRIK 

A-iba: Missionary Pol 

Ibagi matam: A.D. 60-62 

Wamachang: Singlup haibadi Khristagi Masani amasung eikhoi loinamak amatani. 

Missionary Polna Rom khuldagi ibani. Lugina jaildagi Kolosiya amadi Philimondasu ibani. mana iba lairik adu Tukik hairiba nipa asibu puhalli. Khristansingna toudaba yadraba maram ahumkhak iri. 1. Nungsiba 2. Singlupsingna Khristada amata oiba. 3. Phattaba(satan) singga lan thengnaba ngamnanaba Khristagi thawai wai asengbana thanba. 

 EPHISA 1 

Khurumjaba


1 Iswargi ningbibagi mapanna Khrista Jisugi pakhonchatpa Polna Ephisada leiba asengbasingda amasung Khrista Jisugi marida thajaba yabasingda: 

2 Eikhoigi Ipa amasung Prabhu Jisu Khristadagi thoujal amasung ingthaba nakhoida leibisanu.


Iswarbu thagatpa


3 Eikhoigi Prabhu Jisu Khrista iswarsu mapasu oiba Ibungo mahakpu thagatchagadabani. Eikhoina ibungo mahakki mangda nungsibada asengba amasung amakpa leitaba oinanaba, 

4 Taibangpal houdringeida eikhoibu Khristada ibungo mahakna khan-gatpibagumna ibungoda swargagi mapham maphamda thawaigi oiba bor pumnamakna eikhoida ibungo mahatma bor pibire. 

5 Chanathoiraba Ibungoda Ibungo mahakna eikhoida lemna pinabiba ibungo mahakki thoujan-gi matik mangal thagatpa oinanaba, ibungo mahakki ningbagi matung inna, 

6 Ibungo mahak mathantagi damak Jisu Khristagi mapanna eikhoibu yokchaba machasing oinaba hanna langbire. 

7 Ibungogi igi mapanna handokpiba, haibadi, eikhoigi ayol aral kokpiba, 

8 Ibungo mahakki thoujangi ayamba matung inna Ibungoda eikhoina phangjei. 

9 Ibungo mahakki apenba matung inna, ibungo mahakki ningbagi athuppa wa adu eikhoida khanghanbi-duna, 

10 Lousing amasung mahei pumnamakna eikhoiromda ibungo mahakki thoujangi ayamba adu yamkhathanbire; swargada amasung prithibida leiba pot pumnamak Khristada isup supchinnanaba, 

11 Matam pumsu subagi sillangba phaoba Ibungoda mahakki penba adu pukning leppire. Ibungo mahakki ningbagi wakhal matung inna thabak pumnamak toubiba, ibungo mahakki thourang matung inna ibungo mahakna hanna langbiraduna, 

12 Khristada hanna tarang tarang khangna ninglaba eikhoina ibungo mahakki matik mangal thagatpagi damak oinanaba, Ibungoda eikhoibu iswargi phangphatn thokpa oihalle; 

13 Ibungoda nakhoinasu achumba adugi wa adu, haibadi, nakhoigi aran khubamgi aphaba wapao adu taraduna Ibungoda thasu thajaraduna, waleppagi thawai asengbana nakhoibu chum nambire, 

14 Iswargi matik mangal thagatpa oinanaba, ibungo mahakmakki lal oinaba handokpiba adu phaoba, thawai asengbana eikhoigi phangpham thokpagi warep sen-gumbani.


Iswarbu khangnabagi damak haijaba


15 Maram asgidamak nakhoigi narakta leiba Prabhu Jisuda thajaba adu amasung asengbasing pumnamaklomda nungsiba adu einasu taraduna, 

16 Eigi haija hajabada nakhoigi maramda ningsingjaduna thagatchaba tokte; 

17 Haibadi eikhoigi Prabhu Jisu Khristagi iswar, matik mangangi mapa aduna, ibungo mahakpu ikhang khangbana lousinggi amasung phongdokpiba wagi thawai nakhoida pibinanaba; 

18 Adugaa ibungo mahakki koubibagi tarang tarang khangna ningba adu karino, asengbasingda ibungo mahakki phangpham thokpagi matik mangangi ayamba adu karino, 

19 Amasung ibungo mahakki akanba panggan-gi thabak touba adugi matung inna, thajaba eikhoiromda ibungo mahakki pang-gan-gi thoidok hendokna chaoba adu karino haiba nakhoina khangnanabagidamak nakhoigi pukninggi mit ngalhanbinanaba, eina haijabani; 

20 Ibungo mahakki akanba panggan-gi thabak adu Khristada toubiraduna asumna utpire, haibadi, Ibungo mahakna Khristabu asibasinggi maraktagi hinggatpiraduna, 

21 Swargagi mapham maphamda mapu oiba, matik, panggal, angam-athou, amasung taibang-panba asitada nattana, lakkadabadasu phaoriba ming khuding, pumnamak asigi mathakta ibungo mahakki yetthangbada phamhanbire. 

22 Aduga ibungo mahakna ibungogi khuya khada pot pumnamak makha polhan biduna, pot pum-namakki mathakta makok oinanaba, singlupta ibungobu pibire; 

23 Singlup adudi ibungogi hakchang, pumnamakta pumnamak ithan thalhanjabagi athanba aduni.

EPHISA 2 

Aran khubamdi Iswargi thoujannani


1 Amahiksung nakhoigi ayol aran-gi amasung papki mapanna siramba matamda, ibungo makhakna nakhoibu hinghanbire. 

2 Masisinggi manungda, taibangpal asigi lichat matung inna, atiyagi panggan-gi mapu haibadi, haiba indabagi machasingda houjik thabak touriba thawaigi matung inna, nakhoina maman-gngeida chatlammi. 

3 Makhoigi marakta eikhoi pumnamaknasu hakchanggi amas-ung pukninggi apam apamba toudana hakchanggi apaibada mamangngeida pallammi, aduga ateisingga mannana mahousana asaobagi machasing oirammi. 

4 Touigumbasung iswarnadi mapan naidaba nungsi heiba oiduna, ibungo mahakna eikhoibu nungsibibagi ibungo mahakki athoiba manungsi adugi maramna, 

5 Eikhoigi ayol aran-gi mapanna siduna leiramba matamda, eikhoibusu Khristaga loinana hinghanbire (Thoujanna nakhoibu kanbire), 

6 Aduga ibungo mahakna Khrista Jisuda eikhoiromda chanbibana ibungo mahakki thoujan-gi mapan naidaba lal adu lak-kadaba Jug jugta utpinanaba, 

7 Ibungoga loinana eikhoibu hinggatpiraduna, Kh-rista Jisuda swargagi mapham mapham-da eikhoibu ibungoga phamminnahalle. 

8 Maramdi thoujanna nakhoibu thajabagi mapanna kanbire aduga asi nakhoidagi natte, iswargi khudonni; 

9 Mi kana amatana chaothoktananaba, thabaktagi natte. 

10 Maramdi iswarna hanna langbikhraba aphaba thabakta eikhoina chatnanaba, Khrista Jisuda sembikhraba eikhoi ibungo mahakki khutpham oire.


Atoppa jatsingga jihudisingga singlupta amata oiba


11 Maram adugidamak nakhoina ningsing-u, haibadi, mamangngeida hakchangda atoppa jatsing oiduna, hakchangda khutna semba un kakpa kouba aduna un kaktaba kouraba nakhoidi, 

12 Matam aduda Khristadagi tonganba, Israyelgi leibak machasingdagi mitop oiba, wa leppa adugi walepnaba khibiktagi mireibak macha oiba, tarang tarang khangna ningba leitaba amasung taibangpanda iswar yaodaba mising oirammi. 

13 Touigumbasung houjikti Khrista Jisuda, mamangngeida thapna leiramba makhoibu Khrista gi ina naknahalle. 

14 Maramdi ibungodi eikhoigi ingthabni, ibungona ani adubu ama oihanduna, khainabagi mayaigi phaklang adu thugaire; 

15 Aduga ibungona ingthaba oihanduna, ibungo masada ani adu anouba mi ama semnanaba, amasung krosta yeknaba adu hattuna, 

16 Madugi mapanna iswarda animakpu hakchangda ama da tainabinanaba, ibungogi hakchangda yeknaba adu; haibadi, wayel yathangda leiba yathang makheigi wayel adu lemhalle. 

17 Amasung ibungona lenglaklaga, thapna leiramba nakhoidasu, nakna leiramba makhoidasu ingthaba sandokle; 

18 Maramdi ibungogi mapanna ipagi mapham tanna thawai amada eikhoi animakna changpham phangjei. 

19 Maram aduna nakhoidi amuk hanna mireibak machasing amasung lamlanbasing oidre, adubu nakhoidi asengba singga loinana ireibak macha amasung iswargi imung oire; 

20 Khrista Jisuna chithekki athoiba nung oiduna, nakhoidi pakhochatpasinggi amasung iswargi wa takthokpasinggi yumpham mathakta sagatpani; 

21 Ibungoda yum maong apumba chap chana chagsinminnaduna prabhuda iswargi asengba sang oinanaba sagatpani; 

22 Ibungoda nakhoibusu thawaigi mapanna iswargi leipham oinanaba sagatminabani.

EPHISA 3 

Iswargi athuppa wa phongnanabagidamak Polbu khandokpa


1 Maram asigidamak nakhoi atoppa Jatsinggi damak Khrista Jisugi maramda phadok oiriba Pol eina 

2 Na hoiromda eingonda pibikhraba iswargi thoujal adugi asin-arangba adugi maramda nakhoina aoibamak taraba oirabadi, 

3 Haibadi, phongdokpibagi mapanna, eina ahanbada wahei kharana ikhibagumna, athuppa wa adu eingonda khanghanbire; 

4 Madugi matung inna nakhoina parabada, Khristagi athuppa wada eigi khangba nakhoina uba ngammi. 

5 Athuppa wa asi houjikti thawaigi mapanna ibungogi pakhonchatpasingda amasung wa takthokpasingda phongdokpirambagumna, atei atei mironda mioibagi machasingda khanghallamde; 

6 Haibadi, aphaba wapaogi mapanna Khrista Jisuda waleppa adugi yumlep chara oiminnaba, hakchang amata oiminnaba, amasung saruk phangminnaba atoppa jatsing oi. 

7 Iswargi panggan-gi thabak touba mtung inna eingonda pibikhraba ibungo mahakki thoujan adugi khudon matung inna aphaba wapao asigi thougan touba mi ei oijarakle. 

8 Khristagi thiba ngamdaba lal adu atoppa jatsingda sandokpinaba, amasung pot pumnamak sembiraba iswarda jug jugtagi lotlakliba athuppa wa adugi sinlangba adu karino haiba manganda puthoknaba, 

9 Asengbasing pumnamakki pikkhraba adudagi henna pikpa eingonda thoujal asi pinabire; 

10 Swargagi mapham maphamda leiba mapusineda amasung khut kan-pang-ganbasingda iswargi makhal makha ayamba lousing houjik singlupki mapanna khanghannabani; 

11 Asi eikhoigi Prabhu Khrista Jisuda ibungo mahakna langlaba jug jugki thourang matung inbani. 

12 Eikhoina ibungoda thajabagi mapanna thouna amasung pukning lumna changjaba ibungoda eikhoina phangjei. 

13 Asigi matamda nakhoigi damak eigi awa anang khangbada nakhoina sonthada naba eina nijaribani; masi nakhoigi matik manganni.


Aphaba wapao henna khangjinnabagi damak haijaba


14 Maram asigi damak swargada amasung prithibida leiba imung manung khuding ibungo mangondagi maming thonba,
