15 Ipa adugi maphamda eina khuru khudak kunduna khurum-jei; 

16 Haibadi manungthangba mida nakhoibu ibungo mahildd thawaigi mapanna pangganna kalhanbinaba, 

17 Amasung thajabagi mapanna Khristana nakhoigi thamoida leibinaba, ibungo mahakki matik mangan-gi ayambagi matung inna nakhoida ibungo mahakna pibinanabagi; nakhoina nungsibada mara tatharaga chetna leiduna, 

18 Madugi marak, mayung marep, amasung aruba karino haiba asengbasing pumnamakna loinana pukningna lamba phangnaba, 

19 Amasung khangbadagi hendokpa Khristagi nungsiba adu khangnaba nakhoina akanba oinanabagi, aduga iswargi athanba pumnamak adu phaoba nakhoibu thalhalbinna bagi, eina nijabani. 

20 Amahiksung eikhoigi nungda thabak touriba panggal adugi matung inna, eikhoina nijaba nattraga ningjaba pumnamakki mathakta thoidok hendokna yamna toubiba ngamba ibungo mangonda, 

21 Singlupta amasung Khrista Jisuda lomba naidaba phaoba mirol pumnamakta matik mangan oisanu Amen.

EPHISA 4 

Iswarna koubibada amata oibagi wakhal yaoba


1 Maram aduna prabhugi damak phadok eina nakhoibu haijari, haibadi nakhoibu koubiba makou adugi matik chana chatpiyu; 

2 Pukning nembaga amasung tappaga loinana, kuina khangbaga loinana nungsibada amana amabu khangbiyu; 

3 Ingthabagi apunbada thawaigi amata oiba adu ngaknaba thawai yaona hotnabiyu. 

4 Nakhoibu koubibagi tarang tarang khangna ningba amada koubagumna, hakchang ama amasung thawai ama, 

5 Prabhu ama, thajaba ama, baptais louba ama; 

6 Pumnamakki iswarsu mapasu oibiriba ama, ibungo mahakki pumnamakki mathakta, pumnamak sinba thungna, amasung pumnamakta leiri. 

7 Touigumbasung eikhoi amamamda Khristagi khudon-gi chang matung inna thoujal adu pibire. 

8 Adugi maramna ibungo mahakna hai, Ibungona mathaklomda kakhatpa matamda, aphabasingbu phaduna chingle, amasung misingda khudon pibire. 

9 (Ibungona kakhatkhre, haiba asidi prithibigi makhathangba maphamda ibungona kumsu kumtharamkhi haiba nattana karino? 

10 Kumtharamba ibungodi pumnamak thalhannanaba, swarga pumnamakki mathaklomda kasu kakhatkhiba ibungo adumakni.) 

11 Amasung ibungona kharabu pakhonchatpa, kharabu iswargi wa takthokpa, kharabu aphaba wapao sandokpa, amasung kharabu singlup chingbiba aduga tambiba mi oinaba pinabire. 

12 Eikhoi pumnamakna thajabagi amasung iswargi macha nipabu pumkhang khangbagi amata oiba, 

13 Mapung pharaba nipa oiba, Khristagi athanbagi marepki chang oiba adu thungdriba phaoba makhoi aduna asengbasingbu changkhonhannabagi damak, thougan-gi thabakki damak, Khristagi hakchang sagatnabagi damak oiribani. 

14 Misinggi khut-lei-nar-eida marei marada, aranbagi lounam matung inna, paotakki nungsit pumnamakna humdok humjin touba amasung koipu puba angang apisak ekhoi amuk oidaduna, 

15 Adubu nungsibada achumba ngangduna, makok oibiriba Khristagida pumnamakki marida chaokhatnanabani. 

16 Ibungodagi hakchang pumnamak tangsam khudingna samjinnabagi mapanna chap chana chansinnaduna amasung tusinnaduna, tongan tonganba saruk amamamgi changda thabak toubagi matung inna, nungsibada masa mathantabu sagatpa phaoba hakchanggi chaokhatpa adu semmi.


Ariba amasung anouba mipan


17 Maram aduna asi eina hairi amasung Prabhuda sakshi piri, haibadi, atoppa jatsingnasu makhoigi pukninggi arembada chatpagumna nakhoina amuk chatkanu. 

18 Makhoigi manungda khangdaba leibagi maramna, makhoigi pukning kanbagi maramna, makhoigi khangba mamlaktuna, makhoina iswargi thawaidagi mitop oirakle; 

19 Amasung makhoigi pukning kansillaktuna, apenba naidana sengdaba pumnamak tounanaba, apaibada makhoi masa pithok chare. 

20 Touigumbasung nakhoina Khristagi maramda adugumna tamkhide, 

21 Nakhoina ibungogi khonjel taraba, amasung Jisuda achumba leibagumna, Ibungoda tamjaraba aoiba oirabadi; 

22 Nakoina nakhoigi hanna pallamba mipan-gi marida, minambagi apambagi matung inna mangliba ariba mi adu thadok-u. 

23 Aduga nakhoigi pukninggi thawai-na nouhanduna, 

24 Iswargi matung inna achumbagi dharmachenba amasung asengbada semkhraba anouba mi adu nakhoina setlo.


Nongma-nongmagi panba mipan-gi pathap


25 Maram adugi damak minamba thadoktuna nakhoi mi khudingna magi magi keiroi leikaiga achumba ngangnou; maramdi eikhoi amaga amaga masa amatani. 

26 Saorabasu, pap touganu; nakhoi saoringeida numit tahanganu; 

27 Diyaboldasu mapham piganu. 

28 Huranba mahak aduna amuk hurandasanu, adubu madugi mahutta mahakki khutna aphaba thabak adu touduna, awatpa mi aduda yenbinaba mahakki leinanaba nomjasanu, 

29 Nakhoi nakhoigi chindagi phattaba wa kari amata thoktasanu, adubu atabasingda thoujanbinanaba kannaba matamda sagatnabagidamak asigumba aphaba thoksanu. 

30 Aduga iswargi thawai asengbabu; handokpiba numit phaoba ibungo mahak nakhoigi chum oibire. 

31 Akhaba, meihouna saoba, asaoba, laokhongba, amasung thina ngangba pumnamakka kallakpa pumnamakka loinana nakhoidagi louthokpa oisanu. 

32 Aduga nakhoi amaga amaga channou, pukning nouba oi-u; Iswarnasu Khristagi mapanna nakhoibu kokpiraba adugumna, nakhoi amaga amabu koknou.

EPHISA 6 

1 Angangsa, Prabhuda nakhoigi napa namagi haiba illu, maramdi asi achumbani. 

2 Nahakki yaiphaba oinanaba amasung prithibida kuina pannanaba, napa namabu ikai khumnou. 

3 (Masi waleppaga loinaba ahanba yathangni). 

4 Amasung, nakhoi mapasa, saonaba nakhoigi nachasingbu langnaganu, adubu prabhugi mahei masing tambada amasung mitna singhanbada makhoibu yokkhatpiyu. 

5 Minaisa, kiba amasung nikpaga loinana Khristada toubagumna, pukchel tingna hakchang matung inna nakhoi nakhoigi mapusinggi haiba illu; 

6 Mibu pelhanbasinggumna mityenggi thougan-gi matou toudaduna, Khristagi manaising gumna thamoidagi iswargi ningba adu toubiyu. 

7 Minai oirabasu, mapu oirabasu, mi khudingna karigumba aphaba thabak tourabadi, mahakna prabhudagi madumak amuk phangjagani haiba khangduna; 

8 Misingda toubagum nattana, prabhuda toubagumna, aphaba pukningna thougan toubiya. 

9 Anaisung, nakhoi nasabu, nanaisingbu kihanba thadoktuna, makhoida inaduga mannana toubiyu maramdi makhoigisu nakhoigisu mapu adu swargada lei, aduga ibungo mahakki maphamda misak mimai yengba leite.


Khristan-gi lan phijet


10 Houjiktagi prabhuda amasung ibungogi akanba pangganda kanba oiyu. 

11 Nakhoina diyabolgi lounamga maioknaba ngamnanaba iswargi lan phijet apumha setlu. 

12 Maramdi eikhoigi naba asi i tong yaobagi mathakta natte, adubu mapusinggi mathakta khutkan pangganbasinggi mathakta, amamba asigi angambasinggi mathakta, swargagi mapham maphamda phattabagi thawai oibasinggi mathakta, laknabani. 

13 Maram asigi damak nakhoina phattaba numitta maioknaba ngamnanaba, amasung pumnamak toure hairaga lepnanaba, iswargi lal phijet apumba paikhathlu. 

14 Maram aduna nakhoi nakhoigi khwang achumbana laksinduna, amasung dharmachenbagi thabakkhang haptuna; 

15 Aduga ingthabagi aphaba wapaogi thourang toubana nakhoi nakhoigi khongda tongsinduna; 

16 Pumnamak asiga loinana thajabagi chunggoi adu paikhattuna lep-u; aduna phattaba adugi mei houba hunna-ta pumnamak nakhoina muthatpa ngamgani. 

17 Aran khubamgi amasung iswargi wa oiba thawaigi kabakthang loukhatlu; 

18 Haijaba amasung nonjaba pumnamakna matam pumnamakta thawaigi mapanna haijou aduga maduda asengbasing pumnamakki damak anam kanba amasung nonjaba pumnamakna mitseng khang-u; 

19 Amasung eigi damakti, aphaba wapaogi athuppa wa adu thouna phana khanghannaba, 

20 Eigi iya kathokchabada wahei-khonda eingonda pibinanaba haijabiyu; athuppa wa asigi damak eidi yotlhing phalangna pulliba wapuba mini; masida ei ngangpham thokpagumna eina thouna phana ngangjanana-ba haijabiyu.


Aroiba wa


21 Touigumbasung nakhoinasu ei karam touriba khangnanaba, Prabhuda thajaba yaba thougan touba amasung achanba ichin inao oiba Tukhikana eigi, maram pumnamak nakhoida khanghanbigani. 

22 Nakhoina eikhoigi maram khangnanaba, amasung mahakna nakhoigi pukning themjinbinanaba, maram asimakki damak mahakpu eina nakhoi tanna thare. 

23 Ichin inaosingda Ipa Iswardagi amasung Prabhu Jisu Khristadagi ingthaba amasung thajabaga loinana nungsiba leibisanu. 

24 Eikhoigi Prabhu Jisu Khristabu mangba naidaba manungsina nungsibasing pumnamakka thoujal loinabisanu.

PHILIPPIYASINGDA POLNA IBA LAIRIK 

A-iba: Missionary Pol 

Magi matam: A.D. 61-62. 

Wamachang: Khristansingna nungaibaga awabaga yannabagi maram. 

Missionary Polna Rom khuldagi irakpa chithini. Philippi jailda leiba matamda Iswarna thougatpiduna haraobagi maram amasung maru oina Philippi singlupki mathakta awa ana kaya nanglabasu haraoba amuk lakkani aduga hingba oirabasu Khristagidamak hingba siba oirabasu Khristagidamak siba adu tongjabani haina mayek sengna khanghalli. 

Philippiya 1 

Khurumjaba


1 Jisu Khristagi manaising Pol amasung Timothina luchingbasing amasung dikansingga loinana philippida leiba Khrista Jisuda asengbasing pumnamakta: 

2 Eikhoigi ipa iswar amasung Prabhu Jisu Khristadagi thoujal amasung ingthaba nakhoida leibisanu.


Polna Thagatchaba amasung Haraojaba


3 Ahanba numittagi houjik phaoba aphaba wapao thoina sandokpada nakhoigi mapang oibagi maramda, 

4 Harao-baga loinana eina nonjaduna, nakhoi pumnamakkidamak matam leiba khibikta eigi nonjaba khudingda, 

5 Nakhoibu ningsingjaba pumnamakta eina eigi iswarbu thagatchei; 

6 Asimak eina thajei, haibadi, nakhoigi nungda aphaba thabak houbikhiba ibungo mahakna Jisu Khristagi numit adu phaoba madu matol lomhanbigani. 

7 Asumna nakhoi pumnamakki maramda ningba eigidamak achumbani, maramdi nakhoidi eigi thamoinungda leiri, aduga eibu jotlhing phalangna punbada amasung aphaba wapaogi ngaklou oibada amasung chethanbada, nakhoi pumnamakti eiga loinana thoujangi saruk phangminnabani. 

8 Maramdi eina Khrista Jisugi nungsiheibaga loinana nakhoi pumnamakpu kaya khourangjaba, iswarna eigi sakshini. 

9 Amasung asi eina haijabani, haibadi, khangbada amasung wakhal pumnamakta nakhoigi nungsiba henna henna yamkhatnanabani; 

10 Aduna nakhoina thoihenna phaba thabak adu yanabani; aduga iswargi matik mangal amasung thagatchaba phaoba. 

11 Jisu Khristagi mapanna dharmachenba oibagi maheina thalladuna Khristagi numit aduda nakhoina asengba, amasung langjaba leitaba oinanabani.


Mahak phadok tabagi mahei


12 Amahiksung, ichin inaosa, ithakta thokpa thabak adu aphaba wapao henna pangnanaba thokle haiba eina nakhoibu khanghanning-i; 

13 Aduna eibu pulliba asi Khristagi damakni haiba *Pritoriyon sangba apumbada amasung atei atei pumnamakta phonglakpani; 

14 Aduga eibu pulliba maramna prabhuda chetna thajahanba ichin inao ayambana kiba leitana iswargi wa ngangnanaba thoihenna thouna pharibani. 

15 Kharana aoibamak khambanba amasung yeina sunabagi maramna, aduga kharana aphaba pukninggi maramna Khristagi pao sandok-i; 

16 Kharana, eina aphaba wapaogi ngaklou oina lepli haiba khangduna, nungsibadagi; 

17 Adubu atei ateina, eibu punbagi phibamda eingonda awa anang hengathanningthinaduna, mairannai tanabadagi sengdana Khristagi pao sandok-i; 

18 Adunadi karino? adumakpu maram khudingda, tousinnabada oirabasu, achumbada oirabasu, Khristagi pao sandok-i; aduga maduda eina haraojei, hoi, haraosu haisojagani. 

19 Maramdi eina kangi haibadi, nakhoigi nonjaba amasung Jisu Khristagi thawaigi samjinbiba mapanna eigi aran khubamda asi onthokpigani; 

20 Eina kari amata ikairoi, adubu yamna thouna phana matam leiba khibikta oibagumna houjiksu hingbana oirabasu, sibana oirabasu, eigi hakchangda Khristabu thagatpa oigani, asi eigi khourangna ngaijabagi arnasung tarang tarang khangna ningbagi matung inbani.


Hingbaga sibaga karambana henna phabage?


21 Maramdi eingondadi, eina hingba Khristani, aduga siba tongjabani. 

22 Touigumbasung hakchangda hingbadi, asi eigi thabaktagi mahei yallagadi, maduda ei karibu khang adaba eina khangde. 

23 Adubu eina chatthoktuna Khristaga loinana leiba pamjaduna, ani adugi marakta achinbada leijari; maramdi masina yamna henna phabani. 

24 Adum oinamakpu hakchangda panba nakhoigi maramgi damak henna kannabani. 

25 Amasung chetna thajaba asi leiduna, eina pangani haiba khang-i; aduga eina nakhoiga amuk leiminnabanina eigi ipanna Khrista Jisugi marida nakhoigi chaothokchaba yaimkhatnanaba, 

26 Thajabada nakhoigi mangam pangbagi amasung haraobagi damak nakhoi panminnagani haiba eina khangi.


Thounaphanaba insinbiba


27 Asita, nakhoigi panba mipal Khristagi aphaba wipaogi matik chana pallu; adund eina laktuna nakhoibu unaba oirabasu, unadaba oirabasu, nakhoina pukning amata oina aphaba wapaodagi thajaba adugidamak tannaduna thawai amada chetna lepli haiba nakhoigi maramda eina taba yagani. 

28 Aduga yeknabasingna kari amatada nakhoibu kihandasanu; kidaba asi makhoigidamakti amangbani, adubu nakhoigidi kanbibagi thanggei-sengba khudamni, amasung khudam adu iswardagini; 

29 Maramdi Khristada thajanabata nattana, ibungogi maramda awa khangnabasu, asi ibungogidamakta nakhoida thoujanbire; 

30 Nakhoina eingonda hanna ukhraba, amasung houjikti eingonda oiribani haina nakhoina taba soknaba adumak nakhoina soknari.

Philipiya 3 

Pumnamak manglabasu Khrista phangbadi tongjabani


1 Akonbada, eigi ichin inaosa, prabhuda haraobiyu. Nakhoida ikhrabadu hanna iba eingonda aoibamak waichin ba natte, adubu nakhoigidamak chetnanabani. 

2 Huising adu cheksillu, phattaba thabak toubasing adu cheksillu, masa kakpasing adu cheksillu; 

3 Maramdi eikhoidi, iswargi thawaigi mapanna iswar ningjaba, Khrista Jisugi maramda chaothokchaba amasung hakchangda thajaba karisu leitaba, un kakpa aduni. 

4 Adu oirabasu, ei isana hakchangdasu thajaba leiba mayai, kanagumba atei mina hakchangda thajabani ningjarabadi, eina amuk helli: 

5 Eidi numit nipanni subada un kakpa, Israyelgi chagok, Benyamingi salai, Ibrayasing dagi Ibriya, wayel yathanggi marida pharisi; 

6 Thawai yaobagi marida singluppu ot neiba, wayel yathanggi matung inba dharma chenbagi marida ayol aral leitaba oirakpa mini. 

7 Adum oinamakpu eingonda tongjaba makhei adu Khristagi maramgi damak amangba oina eina singthanajare. 

8 Hoi, aoibamakni, aduga eigi Prabhu Khrista Jisubu khangba adu thoihenbagi maramna eina pot pumnamak amangbami haina singthanei; irannaigi dharma chenba, haibadi wayel yathangdagi oiba adu nattaduna, Khristada thajabagi mapanna oiba adu eingonda leiduna, thajabagi ma iswardagi oiba adu eingonda leiduna Khristabu tongjananaba, 

9 Amasung Ibungoda leiba eibu phangnanaba, Ibungogi damak pot pumnamak mangba adu eina khangduna, pumnamak adubu thunambani haina singthanare; 

10 Eina Ibungobu, Ibungogi hinggatpagi pangganbu, amasung lbungogi sibada mannarakchaduna, Ibungo awa anang khangbagi saruk phangminnaba adubu khangnanabani; 

11. Karigumba pambeina eina asimaraktagi hinggatpa phaoba younanabani. 

12 Eina houjik phangjare nattraga houjik changkhonba oijare haiba natte, adubu yarabadi, eibu Khrista Jisuna phabiba adugi damak madu einasu phajananaba tanajabani. 

13 Ichin inaosa, ei isana houjik phajare haiba singthanajade; adubu thabak amadi, tungda leihou leihouba adu kaothoktuna, manglomda leiri leiriba adu tana tankhattuna, 

14 Khrista Jisugi mapanna iswarna mathaklomda koubibagi mana phangnanaba, panjanphamlomda eina chenjari. 

15 Maram aduna eikhoi mapung pharaba makheina asigumba pukning thamsi; amasung karigumbada nakhoida tonganba pukning leirabadi, masisu iswarna nakhoida phongdokpigani. 

16 Asita, eikhoina youjaraba lambi aduga eikhoina adum chatsi.


Khristagi kroski yeknabasing swargagi praja oiba


17 Ichin inaosa, nakhoi pumnamakna eigi itou loubasing oibiyu, aduga eikhoina nakhoigidamak pandam oibagumna, adugunma chatpa makhoibu munna yengu. 

18 Maramdi ayambana chatli, eina makhoigi maramda nakhoibu toina toina tambirammi, aduga houjiksu eina ipi taduna, makhoina Khristagi kroski yeknabasing oiri haiduna nakhoibu tamlibani. 

19 Makhoigi aroibadi amangbani, makhoigi laidi pukni, amasung makhoigi matik mangal makhoigi ikaibada leiri; makhoigi pukning prithibigi potta lei. 

20 Maramdi eikhoigi leibak macha oibadi swargada lei; mapham adudagisu kanbiba mapu, Prabhu Jisu Khristabu eikhoina ngaijari. 

21 Ibungona pot pumnamakpu ibungo masagi makha polhanba phaoba nagambagi thabak touba mapanna, ibungogi matik mangan-gi hakchanggi maong inna ibungona eikhoigi tollaba hakchangbu nouna onbigani.

Philipiya 4 

Insinbiba


1 Maram adugidamak, eina khourangna unajaningba eigi channaba ichin inaosa, eigi haraoba amasung kokthon oibasa, Prabhuda asumna chetna leppiyu, eigi channabasa! 

2 Prabhuda pukning amata oinaba, eina Iodiabu amasung Suntukhibu thoujinjari. 

3 Hoi, achumba poppu, nahakpusu eina nonjari, nupising asibu pangbiyu, maramdi makhoina Klementaksu, eiga suminnabasing atei ateigasu loinaba, aphaba wa paoda eiga suminnare; makhoigi mamingdi hingbagi lairikta leiri. 

4 Matam leibakhibikta Prabhuda haraobiyu; amukka eina haigani, harao-biyu. 

5 Nakhoigi pukning thotpa adu mi pumnamakna khangba oisanu. Prabhu naksillakle. 

6 Karisu langtaknaganu, adubu maram khudingda thagatpaga loinaba haijabana amasung nonjabana iswargi maphamda nakhoigi nija nijaba adu khanghallu. 

7 Aduga iswargi ingthaba, khangba pumnamaktagi headoklaba aduna, Khrista Jisuda nakhoigi thammoi amasung wakhalbu ngaksenbigani. 

8 Akonbada, ichin inaosa, achum achumba makhei, ikaikhumnaba yaba makhei, dharma chenba makhei, asengba makhei, phaja phajaba makhei, aphaba wahei wata makhei; karigumba aphaba matou leirabadi, amasung karigumba thagatpa leirabadi, asising asi wakhal tou. 

9 Nakhoina eingondagi tamkhiba, phangkhiba, takhiba amasung ukhiba pumnamak asi toubiyu; aduga ingthabagi iswar aduna nakhoiga loinabigani.


Philippiyasinggi chanbiba adugi damak Polna toubimal khangba utpa


10 Touigumbasung eina prabhuda yamna haraojei, haibadi, nakhoina eigidamak houjik amukka wakhal toubire; maduda nakhoina aoibamak wakhal tou-birammi, adubu nakhoigi khudongchaba leiramde. 

11 Eina watpagi maramda ngangba natte; maramdi eina palliba mipan aduda penba tamjare. 

12 Karamna tonthagadaba eina khangjei, aduga karamna yamgadaba eina khangjei. Maram khudingda amasung maram pumnaniakta thanbadasu lambadasu, yambadasu watpadasu, athuppa adu eina tamjare. 

13 Eibu panggal kalhanbiba ibungogi mapanna eina thabak pumnamak itou touba ngamjei. 

14 Adum oinamakpu nakhoina eigi awabada ipang oiminnaduna, phajana toure. 

15 Amasung nakhoi nasamaknasu khang-i, he philippisa, haibadi, aphaba wapaogi ahou-bada, eina Makidoniyadagi chatthokkiba matamda, nakhoi nattana singlup kana amatana pibagi amasung phangbagi matamda eigi ipang oiminnaba leiramde; 

16 Maramdi Thesalonikadasu nak-hoina eigi kananabagi damak hanna hanna thabire. 

17 Eina khudon adu thiba natte, adubu nakhoigi damak hengatpa mahei adu thibani. 

18 Touigumbasung eina loinamak phangjare, amasung awatpa leitre; nakhoidagi pot adu manam nungsiba, iswarna yabiba amasung penbiba bali oina, Ipaphroditagi khuttagi phangjaduna ei thalle. 

19 Amasung eigi iswarna nakhoigi kannaba pumnamak Khrista Jisugi mapanna ibungo mahakki matik manganda leiba lal matung inna pinabigani. 

20 Houjikti eikhoigi iswar amasung ipada lomba naidana thagatpa oisanu. Amen.


Khaina wa


21 Khrista Jisuda asengba khudingbu khurummu. Eiga loinaba ichin inaosingna nakhoibu khurumjei. 

22 Asengbasing pumnamakna, aduga thoidokna Keisargi imungna nakhoibu khurumjei. 

23 Prabhu Jisu Khristagi thoujal nakhoigi thawaiga loinabisanu.(Mapham asida haiba asigi artha khan-gnaba, Johan 15:4-7 yeng-u.)

KOLOSIYA 2 

Khristaga amata oiba amasung minamba lousinggi maheigi marida mitna singhanba


1 Maramdi nakhoigidamak, Layodik eyada leibasinggidamak amasung eigi isak udriba ayambasinggi damak eina kaya kanna angam talliba, 

2 Haibadi, nungsibana tusinnaduna, khangbagi aoiba matougi ayamba pumnamakta, iswargi athuppa wa, Khristabu pumkhang khangba phaoba, makhoigi pukning themjinbinanaba, eina nakhoibu khanghanjaning-i; 

3 Ibungoda lousing amasung maheigi lal pumnamak lotli. 

4 Kanagumbana nakhoibu waheigi thembana namthak toudananaba, asi eina hairi. 

5 Maramdi ei isa leitra-bamaksu, eina haraona nakhoigi chang naiba amasung Khristada nakhoigi thajabagi achetpa adu yengduna ithawainadi nakhoiga loinajari. 

6 Maram aduna nakhoina Khrista Jisu Prabhubu lousinjabagumna ibungoda chatsu chatlu, 

7 Ibungoda marasu ta-thaba, sasu sagatpa oiduna amasung nakhoibu tambikhibagumna nakhoigi thajabada chettuna thagatchaba yamakhatlu. 

8 Khristagi matung inba nattana, misinggi mathang mathang tarakpa wa matung inba, taibangpan-gi maru oiba chatnabigi matung inba, kanagumba mina mahakki mahei-masingna amasung karisu nattaba minambana nakhoibu phakhiba yai haiduna chek-sillu. 

9 Maramdi ibungoda iswargi oibagi athanba pumnamak hakchang oina palli; 

10 Aduga ibungoga loinabana pakhoibu thalhanbire; ibungodi mapu amasung panggal oiba pumnamaki makokni 

11-12 Khutna semba nattaba un kakpana ibungoda nakhoibusu un kakle haibadi, mioibagi hakchanggi oiba hongdoktuna Khristagi un kakpa-dani; Baptais loubada ibungoga loinana nakhoibu phumminare, aduga maduda, ibungobu asibasinggi maraktagi hinggatpiraba iswarna touba thabakta thajabagi mapanna nakhoibu ibungoga loinana hinggatpire. 

13 Amasung nakhoibu, haibadi nakhoigi nasagi ayol aran-gi amasung nakhoigi nasagi un kaktabagi marampa siraba nakhoibu, iswarna ibungoga loinana hinghanbire; eikhoibu eikhoigi ayol aran pumnamak thoujanbiduna, 

14 Eikhoida ona teinaramba, eikhoibu yeknaramba wayel yathang adugi khutigi warep adu muthatpiraduna, madu krosta yotpi thajinduna, eikhoigi iraktagi madu ibungo mahakna louthokpire; 

15 Mapu amasung panggal oiba makhei munthoktuna krosta makhoigi mathakta maipaktuna, ibungo mahakna iphon phongna makhoibu utpire. 

16 Maram aduna chabada, thakpada, nattraga chakkhangba numit, nattraga thanou, nattraga potthaba numitki maramda mi kana amatana nakhoibu wayendasanu. 

17 Masising asi oigadaba thabakki mamini; adubu masadi Khristagini. 

18 Mi kana amatana nakhoigi mana adu maningtamna nollukchabagi amasung swargadutsingbu ningbagi mapanna nakhoidagi munthoktasanu; mahakna ukbhiba pot aduda khubam oiduna, mahakki hakchanggi oiba pukningna arembada chaothok-i; 

19 Aduga asigumba asina makok adubu chetna paide; makok adudagi tangsam tangsamgi amasung tingsam tingsamgi mapanna samjinba amasung tusinba hakchang pumnamakpu iswargi chaokhatpana chaokhatli. 

20 Taibangpangi maru oiba chatnabidagi nakhoina Khristaga loinana siminnarabadi, taibangpanda hinglibagumna , nakhoi nasa nathantabu karigi wayel yathanggi makha pollibage? 

21 Paisu paignu, tangsu tangganu, soksu sokkanu, 

22 Pumnamak asi misinggi chatnaba yathang amasung paotak matung inna sijinnabada mangnanaba oiribani. 

23 Thabak asi masa masana semgatchaba laining lambi chatchabada, nollukchabada amasung masa masabu laknajabada lousinggi mingchat leirabamaksu, hakchanggi maningtamba adu khamnabagidamak kari amata kannaba leite.

KOLOSIYA 3 

Khristaga loinana hinggatminnabagi mahei


1 Aduna nakhoi Khristaga loinana hinggatminnarabadi, mathaklom aduda leiba pot adu thiyu, maduda Khristana iswargi yetthangbada phamlibani. 

2 Mathaklomda leiba pot aduda nakhoigi pukning thammu, prithibida leiba aduda thamganu. 

3 Maramdi nakhoi sire, aduga nakhoigi thawai iswarda Khristaga lotminnari. 

4 Eikhoigi thawai oiriba Khrista adubu phongdokpiba matam adudi nakhoibusu ibungoga loinana matik manganda phongdokpigani. 

5 Maram aduna prithibigi mathakta leiriba nakhoigi hakchang kayat sihallu; haibadi, marumbi thamba, sengdaba, apaibada thawai luppa, phattaba pamba, amasung latpa oiba karamba sihallu; 

6 Pap asigi maramna haiba indabagi machasinggi mathakta iswargi asaoba lak-i. 

7 Nakhoina thabaksing aside pallingeida, nakhoisu maduda mamangngeida chatsu chatlammi; 

8 Adubu houjikti nakhoinasu pumnamak asi: haibadi, asaoba, meihouna saoba, kallakpa, thina ngangba, nachin nachindagi akamba ngangba thadok-u; 

9 Amana amada chin thiganu; maramdi nakhoina ariba mi adubu magi thabaksingga loinana louthokkhre, 

10 Aduga mabu sembiriba ibungo mahakki murti matung inna ikhang khangba phaoba nouhanbiba anouba mioi adu nakhoina setkhre. 

11 Anouba mi asida Grik amasung Jihudi, un kakpa amasung kaktaba mireibakki mi, Skuthia, minai amasung mapu ilei leite; touigumbasung Khristadi pumnamak oi, amasung pumnamakta lei. 

12 Maram aduna iswargi khangatlaba, asengba amasung achanba misinggumna, nungsiheibagi pukchel, chanbiba matou, pukning nemba, pukning tappa, kuina khangba, nakhoina setlu; 

13 Amaga amaga khangnaduna, kanagumba amana kanagumba amagi mathakta nungainadaba leirabadi, amaga amaga koknou; prabhuna nakhoibu kokpikhiba adugumduna nakhoinasu tou; 

14 Amasung pumnamak asigi mathakta changkhonbagi punnaba oiriba nungsibana pullu. 

15 Aduga Khristagi ingthaba aduna nakhoigi thamoinungda wayenba oisanu; nakhoibu madugidamak hakchang ama oina kousu koubire; aduga nakhoina thasu thagatlu. 

16 Khristagi wa aduna nakhoigi nungda marang kaina leibisanu; lousing pumnamakna amana amabu tambiduna amasung warakpiduna, dharma isei, thagatpa isei, amasung thawaigi oiba isei thoujanga loinana nakhoigi thamoi nungda iswargi maphamda sak-u. 

17 Amasung Prabhu Jisugi mapanna mapa iswarbu thagatchaduna, waheida oirabasu, thabakta oirabasu, nakhoina touba pumnamak ibungogi mingda tou.


Khristan imunggi mipal


18 Yumnairabisa, prabhuda matik chaba oibagumna, nakhoigi napuroiba singgi makha ponna leiyu. 

19 Mapuroibasa, nakhoigi nupisingbu nungsiyu, amasung makhoigi mathakta akhaba oibiganu. 

20 Angangsa, thabak pumnamakta napa namagi haiba illu, maramdi asi prabhugi maphamda penbani. 

21 Mapasa, nakhoigi nachasingna pukning hanthaba thoktananaba, makhoi-bu langnaganu. 

22 Minaisa, mibu pelhanbasingumma mityenggi thougan nattana, pukchel tingna, prabhubu kiduna, thabak pumnamakta hakchanggi matung inna nakhoigi mapu oibasinggi haiba illu. 

23 Misinggi maphamda nattaduna, prabhugi maphamda toubagumna, nakhoina touba makhei thawai yaona tou; 

24 Phangpham thokpa adu prabhudagi nakhoina mahei oina phangjagani haiba khang-i; nakhoina prabhu Khristabu khanjabani. 

25 Maramdi aranba touba mahak aduna mahakki toukhiba aranba adu amuk phangjagani; amasung misak mimai yengba leite.

KOLOSIYA 4 

1 Mapusa, swargada nakhoigisu mapulei haiba khangduna, nakhoigi nanaisingda chumna amasung phajana toubiyu. 

2 Haijabada thagatpaga loinana mitseng khangduna, pukning changna itattattana leiyu; 

3 Matam adumakta eikhoigi damaksu, Khristagi athuppa wa adu ngangnaba, iswarna wa adugi maramda eikhoigidamak thong hangdokpinanaba haijabiyu; athuppa wa adugi maramna eisu apunbada leiribani. 

4 Ei ngangpham thokpagumna eina madu phongdokchananaba haijabiyu. 

5 Achaba matam leiduna, mapanthongda leibasinglomda singna chatlu, 

6 Nakhoina mi khudingda karamna khumgadaba khangnanaba, thumgum haohanduna, thoujan-ga loinana matam leiba khibikta nakhoigi wa ngangba oisanu.


Misak panna khurumjaba amasung aroiba wa


7 Thajaba yaba thougan touba mi prabhuda manai oiminnaba amasung achanba ichin inao oiba Tukhikana eigi maramgi wa pumnamak nakhoida khanghanbigani. 

8 Nakhoina eikhoigi maram khangnanaba amasung mahakna nakhoigi thamoi themjinbinanaba, maram asimakki damak mahakpu eina nakhoi tanna thane; 

9 Nakhoigi naraktagi oiba, thajaba yaba amasung achanba ichin inao One-simabu Inahakka loinana thane. Makhoina mapham asigi maram pumnamak nakhoida khanghanbigani. 

10 Eiga phadok oiminnaba Aristrakhana, Barnabagi machin manao thokpa Marakna (Mahakki maramna nakhoina yathang phangle; mahakna laklabadi, lou-sinbiyu), 

11 Amasung Justh kouba Jisuna nakhoibu khurumjari; un kakpagi oiba makhoi asitana iswargi leibakki damak eiga thabak suminnabani, makhoi eingonda themjinbiba oire. 

12 Nakhoigi mi oiba, Khrista Jisugi manai Ipaphrana nakhoibu khurumjari; nakhoina iswargi ningba pumnamakta changkhonna amasung areppa pukningna lepnanaba, nakhoigidamak mahakki haijabada matam leiba khibikta kanna haijari. 

13 Maramdi mahakna nakhoigidamak, Laiodikeyada amasung Hiyarapolida leibasinggi damak thoidokna nommi haiba eina mahakki sakshi piri. 

14 Eikhoigi achanba maiba Lukna amasung Deimana nakhoibu khurumjari. 

15 Laiodikeyada leiba ichin inaosingda, amasung Numphada, aduga mahakki yumda tinaba singlupta eina khurumjei. 

16 Amasung lairik asi nakhoigi narakta paba loirabada, Laiodikeyasinggi singluptasu madu pananaba amasung Laiodikeyadagi lairik adu nakhoinasu pananaba, toubiyu. 

17 Aduga nahakna prabhuda phangkhraba thougan adu thungnanaba pukning thingjillu haiduna Arkhippada haibiyu. 

18 Pol eigi khurumjaba ikhutmakna ijabani. Eibu pulliba ningsingbiyu. Thoujal nakhoiga loinabisnu.

THESLONIKIYASINGDA POLNA IBA AHANBA LAIRIK 

A-iba: Missionary Pol 

Ibagi matam: A.D. 51-54 

Wamachang: Khristansingna chaokhatpa amasung Jisu Khristana amuk lenglakpagi maram. 

Missionary Polna Korint khuldagi ibani. Masigi chithi asi mayai oiba matamda ibani. Khristana taibangpanda amuk lenglakpa matamda awaba anaba amuk leiraroi haina mayek sengna khanghalli. 

I THESLONIKIYA 1 

Khurumjaba amasung iswarbu thagatpa


1 Pol, Silbhana amasung Timothiyana ipa iswarda amasung Prabhu Jisu Khristada leiba Thesalonikagi singlupta: thoujal amasung ingthaba nakhoida leibisanu. 

2 Eikhoigi haija haijabada nakhoigi maramda ningsingjaduna, eikhoina nakhoi punmamakki damak matam leiba khibikta iswarbu thagatchei; 

3 Nakhoigi thajabagi thabak, nungsibagi nomba, amasung eikhoigi ipa iswargi mangda eikhoigi Prabhu Jisu Khrista gi maramda tarang tarang khangba ningbagi khangba eikhoina itattattana ningsingjei. 

4 Iswarna chanba ichin inaosa, nakhoibu khangatpa adu eikhoina khang-i, 

5 Haibadi eikhoina tambiba aphaba wapao adu nakhoida wahei ngakta lakpa natte, adubu Panggan-ga, thawai asengbaga, amasung aoiba khangbaga loinana lakpani; nakhoigi damak eikhoi karamba mino haiba isana utchaba adu nakhoinasu khangi. 

6 Amasung nakhoina thawai asengbagi haraobaga loinana awa anang ayambagi marakta wa adu phangduna, eikhoigi amasung prabhugi matou loubasing oirakle; 

7 Aduna nakhoina Makidoniya amasung Akhayada leiba thajaba pumnamakta pandam oirakle. 

8 Maramdi Makidoniyada amasung Akhayadata nakhoidagi prabhugi wa adu ninthokpa natte, adubu iswar romda nakhoigi thajaba adu mapham khudingda isin sinkhre; aduna eikhoina karigumba ngangnabagi kannaba leite. 

9 Maramdi eikhoigi maramda, haibadi eikhoina nakhoida matou karamna changkhibano, aduga nakhoina ahingba amasung achumba iswarbu khanjananaba, aduga lakkadaba asaobadagi kanbiba Jisu, 

10 Iswarna asibasinggi maraktagi hinggatpiraba macha nipa adubu swargadagi ngainanaba, lai-murtidagi karamna iswarda ollakpano haiba makhoi masana pao tammi.

I THESLONIKIYA 2 

Polna magi sandokpagi thabak kankhatchaba


1 Maramdi, ichin inaosa, eikhoina nakhoida changkhiba adu nakhoi nasana khang-i, haibadi, madu aremba oiramde; 

2 Adubu mamangngeida Philippida awa khangduna, tachop tachopna laknaba phanglabasu, nakhoina khangbagumna, eikhoina yamna soknabada iswargi aphaba wapao adu nakhoida ngangnaba eikhoigi iswargi mapanna eikhoina thouna pharakle. 

3 Maramdi eikhoigi thoujinba adu aranbadagi, sengdabadagi, nattraga chumdabada natte; 

4 Touigumbasung iswarna aphaba wapao sinnanaba eikhoibu yabirabagumna, eikhoina misingbu pelhandaduna, eikhoigi pukningbu chang yengbiba iswarbu pelhanduna asumna ngangbani. 

5 Maramdi nakhoina khangbagumna, eikhoina thagatsinnabagi wa, nattraga karambagi tousinnaba kadoungeidasu sijinnade iswarna sakshini; 

6 Aduga eikhoina Khristagi pakhon chatpasinggum matik leirabasu, misingdagi oirabasu, atei ateisingdagi oirabasu thagitpa thide. 

7 Touigumbasung mamana mahakmakki machasingbu pija-pithakpagumna, eikhoina nakhoigi narakta pukning-thotpa oirakle. 

8 Nakhoibu asup nungsina pamjaduna, eikhoina nakhoida iswargi aphaba wapaota nattana, eikhoimakki ithawaisu piba pamjabani, maramdi nakhoidi eikhoigi yamna achanba oirakle. 

9 Maramdi ichin inaosa, nakhoina eikhoigi nombz amasung awa khangba ningsing-i; eikhoina nakhoi kanagumbabu arumba puhandananaba, ahing nungthil thabak suduna, eikhoina iswargi wapao nakhoida sandokchare. 

10 Eikhoina nakhoi thajabasinglomba karamna sengna, dharmachenna amasung ayol aran leitana chatchaba nakhoinasu iswar-nasu sakshini, 

11 Nakhoina khangbagumbani, haibadi, iswarna nakhoibu ibungo mahakki leibakta amasung matik manganda koubibagi matik chana nakhoina chatnanaba, 

12 Eikhoina nakhoibu thoujinduna, thougattuna amasung sakshi piduna machasingbu toubibaumna eikhoina nakhoi khudingbu toubire.


Theslonikiyasingbu ot-neiba amasung Polna makhoibu nungsiba


13 Amahiksung maram asigi damak eikhoinasu tokpa leitana iswarbu thagat-chei, haibadi, nakhoina eikhoidagi takhiba iswargi wa adu phanglabada, haiba nattaduna, nakhoi thajabasinggi manungda thabaksu toubiriba iswargi wani haiba nakhoina yajare madu aoibamak iswargi wani. 

14 Maramdi nakhoi, ichin inaosa, Jihudiyada leiriba, Jisu Khristada leiba iswargi singlupsing adugi matou loubasing oirakle; maramdi makhoina Jihudisinggi awa khangkhibagumna, nakhoinasu maduga mannana nakhoigi nareibakki misingdagi awa khangle. 

15 Jihudising aduna Prabhu Jisubusu iswargi wa takthokpasingbusu hatle, eikhoibu tanthokle, iswarbu pelhande, amasung mi pumnamakpu onnateinahalli; 

16 Atoppa jatsingbu kanbinanaba wa ngangba makhoina khammi; aduna makhoigi papki chang matam leiba khibikta thalhanbani; adubu asaoba adu makhoigi mathakta makheimak phangna thungle. 

17 Touigumbasung, ichin inaosa, thmoida nattana, hakchangda matam kharagi damak eikhoina nakhoiga khainaraduna, yamna pambaga loinana nakhoigi mai unanaba thoidok hendokna hotnajare. 

18 Maramdi eikhoina, thoidokpadi Pol eina, hanna hanna nakhoi tanna lakchanaba pamjarammi; aduga seitanna eikhoibu pelhalle. 

19 Maramdi eikhoigi Prabhu Jisu lenglakpada Ibungogi mangda eikhoigi tarang tarang khangna ningba, haraoba nattraga chaothok chabagi kokthon karino? Nakhoimak nattra? 

20 Maramdi nakhoidi chaothokchapham amasung hariopharn oibani.

I THESLONIKIYA 4 

Achumba lichatki marida insinbiba


1 Akonbada, ichininaosa, nakhoina karamna chatkadage amasung iswarbu karamna pelhan-gadage haiba eikhoidagi phangkhibagumna, amasung nakhoinasu chatpagumna, nakhoina asum asum hengat-nanaba, Prabhu Jisugi mingda eikhoina nakhoibu nonsu nonjari, thousu thoujinjari. 

2 Maramdi eikhoina nakhoida Prabhu Jisugi mapanna kari kari yathang pikhiba nakhoina khang-i. 

3 Maramdi nakhoigi sengdokpiba asi iswargi ningbani, haibadi, nakhoina marumbi thamdanaba; 

4 Iswarbu khangdaba atoppa jat-singgumna, apaibada thawai luppg oidaduna, 

5 Nakhoi mi khudingna nasa nasagi nupibu sengna amasung ikaikhumnana louba nakhoina khangnaba; 

6 Amasung mi kana amatana machin manaoda maram asida lamhenduna lounam toudanabani, maramdi eikhoina nakhoida henna mit na singhankhiba amasung sakshi pikhiba adugumna, pumnamak asigi maramda laman khumbadi Prabhuni. 

7 Maramdi iswarna eikhoibu sengdaba oinaba koubiba natte adubu asengba oinaba koubibani. 

8 Maram aduna yadaba mahak aduna mibu yadaba natte, adubu nakhoida Ibungo mahakki thawai asengba pibiba Iswarbu yadabani. 

9 Touigumbasung ichin inaosingbu nungsinabagi marida nakhoida iruduna kannaba leite; maramdi nakhoi nasen amaga amaga nungsinanaba Iswarna tambire, 

10 Maramdi nakhoina Makidoniya apumbada leiriba ichin inao pumnamakki maphamda madu tou. Touigumbasung, ichin inaosa, eikhoina nakhoibu thoujinjari, haibadi, nakhoina asum asum hengatpiyu; 

11 Aduga nakhoina mapanda leiribasinggi mamangda mityeng phajana chatnanaba, amasung karisu watpa lei-tananaba, 

12 Ingna leiba, narannai mujaba, amasung nakhutna sujaba, eikhoina nakhoida yathang pikhibagumna, nakhoina tamjou.


Sikhibasinggi maramda pukning themjinbiba


13 Touigumbasung, ichin inaosa, tarang tarang khangna ningba leitaba atei ateisinggumna nakhoina pukning wadananaba tumkhibasinggi marida nakhoina khangdaba eikhoina pamde, 

14 Maramdi Jisuna siba amasung hinggatpa adu eikhoina thajarabadi, adugumduna, Jisugi mapanna tumkhibasingbasu iswarna ibungoga loinana pubirakkani. 

15 Maramdi Prabhugi waheina asi eikhoina nakhoida hairi, haibadi, Prabhu lenglakpa phaoba leihouba tumkhibasing gi mang suptha tharoi: 

16 Maramdi Prabhu Ibungo masamak swargadagi khollaoga, athoiba swargadut ki khonjelga amasung iswargi peresingga makhon-ga loinana lengthabirakkani. Aduga Khristada sikhiba singna hanna hinggatkani; 

17 Matung aduda leihouba hingliba eikhoibu makhoiga loinana atiyada Prabhubu oknajananaba leichin manungda pak pukhatminnabigani amasung asumna eikhoina matam leiba khibikta prabhuga loinana leiminnagani. 

18 Maram adugi damakna nakhoi amaga amaga waheising asina themjinnou.

I THESLONIKIYA 5 

Prabhu lenglakpa, amasung mitseng khangbagi kannaba


1 Touigumbasung matam amasung makuni mathagi marida, ichin inaosa, nakhoida karigumba iruduna kannaba leite. 

2 Maramdi huranbana ahingda lak pagumna Prabhugi numit adu lakkani haiba nakhoi nasana changkhonna khangi. 

3 Makhoina, ingthare amasung asoi angam leite, haiba matam aduda ikhang khanghoudana nupina chabokpada naba hourakpagumna, amangba adu makhoigi mathakta lakkani, aduga makhoina nanthokpa supngam ngamloi. 

4 Touigumbasung ichin inaosa, huranbagumna numit adu nakhoigi nathakta laknanaba, nakhoidi amambada leite; 

5 Maramdi nakhoidi mangan-gi amasung nungthin-gi machasingini. Eikhoidi ahinggisu, amambagisu natte; 

6 Adunadi ateisinggumna eikhoi tumganusi, adubu eikhoina mitseng khangduna pukning laksinsi. 

7 Maramdi atumbasing aduna ahingda tumbani aduga yu ngaobasing aduna ahingda ngaobani. 

8 Adubu eikhoidi nungthin-gi oirabanina, eikhoina thajabagi amasung nungsibagi thabakkhang; amasung lan-luhupki damak aran khubamgi tarang tarang khangna ningba haptuna, pukning laksinba oisi. 

9 Maramdi iswarna eikhoibu asaoba phanghannabagi damak thamba natte, adubu eikhoigi Prabhu Jisu Khristagi mapanna aran khubam phangnabagi damak thambani; 

10 Eikhoina hougatpa oirabasu, tumba oirabasu, Ibungoga panminnanaba ibungona eikhoigi damak sibire. 

11 Maram adugi damak nakhoinasu touriba adugumna amaga amaga thousu thoujinnou amasung semsu semgatnou.


Makhal makha ayamba insinba wa amasung aroiba wa


12 Touigumbasung, ichin inaosa, nakhoina nakhoigi narakta nomliba, Prabhuda nakhoigi nathakta leiraba, amasung nakhoibu warakpiba makhoi adubu munna khangnanaba, 

13 Aduga makhoigi thabakki maramgi damak nung-sina makhoibu thoihenna ikaikhumnanaba, eikhoina nakhoibu nonjari. Nakhoi nasengi narakta ingthana leibiyu, 

14 Amasung, ichin inaosa, eikhoina nakhoibu thoujinjari, atanbasingbu warakpiyu, thawai asonbasingbu pangbiyu thougatpiyu, asonbasingbu pangbiyu, pumnamakkiromda kuina khangbiyu. 

15 Kanagumbana phattaba toubagi damak kananasu khuthandananaba yeng-u; adubu amana amagi damak amasung pumnamakki damak aphaba tounanaba matam leiba khibikta thiyu. 

16 Matam leiba khibikta haraojou; 

17 Tatpa leitana haijou; 

18 Maram khudingda thagatlu; maramdi asi nakhoigi damak Khrista Jisuda iswargi ningbani. 

19 Thawaibu muthatkanu; 

20 Iswargi wa takthokpa adu usittaba touganu; 

21 Adubu thabak pumnamak chang yeng-u; aphaba adu chetna paiyu; 

22 Phattaba matou khudingdagi ngakchou. 

23 Amahiksung ingthabagi iswar ibungo mahakmakna nakhoibu pumseng sengdokpisanu; aduga nakhoigi thawaibu, hingbabu, amasung hakchangbu changkhonnaba eikhoigi Prabhu Jisu Khrista lenglakpada ayol aran leitana sennabisanu. 

24 Nakhoibu koubiba Ibungo mahakti thajaba yabani, ibungo mahakna madu tousu toubigani. 

25 Ichin inaosa, eikhoigi damaksu haijabiyu. 

26 Sengna chupnabaga loinana ichin inaosing pumnamakpu khurummu. 

27 Lairik asi ichin inaosing pumnamakta pabinanaba eina Prabhugi mingda sinnajari. 

28 Eikhoigi Prabhu Jisu Khristagi thoujal nakhoiga loinabisanu.

THESLONIKIYASINGDA POLNA IBA ANISUBA LAIRIK 

A-iba: Missionary Pol 

Ibagi matam: A.D. 51-54 

Wamachang: Iswargi numit adu naksillakle 

Matam aduda singlupsinggi marakta awa-ana yamna tarammi. Makhoi aduna pukning hanthadananba chithi asi ibani. Iswargi numit thungba matamdadi awabasing adu haraoba phanggani, anganbana amambabu tanthokpagum Iswargi numit thungba matamda phattaba pumnamak tanthokkhigani haibagi maram ningthijana utli. 

II THESLONIKIYA 1


Khurumjaba amasung iswarbu thagatpa


1 Pol, Silbhana, amasung Timothiyana eikhoigi ipa iswarda amasung Prabhu Jisu Khristada leiba Theslonikagi singlupta: 

2 Ipa Iswar amasung Prabhu Jisu Khristadagi thoujal amasung ingthaba nakhoida leibisanu. 

3 Ichin inaosa, nakhoigi maramda iswarbu matam leiba khibikta thagatchabana eikhoigi ithouni; masi matik chabani, maramdi nakhoigi thajaba thoidok hendokna chaokhatli, amasung nakhoi mi khuding amana amabu nungsinaba hengatli. 

4 Aduna nakhoina khangliba ot-neiba amasung awa-anang pumnamakki manungda nakhoigi khangheibagi amasung thajabagi maramda iswargi singlupsingda nakhoigi napanna eikhoi isana chaothokhei. 

5 Nakhoigi khangheiba amasung thajaba adu iswargi achumba wayel phongdokpa khudamni; masi iswargi leibakki damak nakhoibu matik chana singthananabani; leibak adugi damak nakhoinasu awa khanglibani. 

6 Maramdi meiri thokpa meida Ibungogi panggan-gi dutsingga loinana swargadagi Prabhu Jisubu phongdokpiba matamda 

7 Nakhoibu awa nanghanbasingda awa anang, amasung awa anang phangba nakhoida eikhoiga, loinana potthaba piba iswargi mityengda achumbani. 

8 Matam aduda iswarbu khangdabasingda amasung eikhoigi Prabhu Jisugi aphaba wapao indabasingda ibungona laman khumbigani. 

9 Ibungona mahakki asengbasingdagi thagatpa phangnanaba, amasung thajabasing pumnamakpu (Maramdi eikhoigi sakshi nakhoina thajare) ngakhannanaba, 

10 Ibungona lengbirakpa numit aduda adugumba misingna makhoigi wakong, haibadii prabhugi mangdagi amasung ibungogi panggan-gi matik mangandagi lomba naidana mangba khanggani. 

11 Maram asigi damak eikhoigi iswarna nakhoibu koubibagi matik chana singthananaba, amasung aphaba pamba khuding thajabagi thabak khuding pangganga loinana thungnanaba, eikhoinasu matam leiba khibikta nakhoigidamak haijari; 

12 Haibadi, eikhoigi iswar amasung Prabhu Jisu Khristagi thoujal matung inna, nakhoida eikhoigi Prabhu Jisu Khristagi mingbu amasung ibungoda nakhoibu thagatnanabani.

II THESLONIKIYA 2 

Prabhu lenglakpagi maramda aranba wakhal


1 Amahiksung, ichin inaosa, eikhoigi Prabhu Jisu Khrista na lenglakpagi amasung eikhoina ibungogi maphamda punna tinnabagi marida eikhoina nakhoibu nonjari, 

2 Haibadi, thawaina oirabasu, waheina oirabasu, eikhoina iba manba lairikna oirabasu, Prabhugi numit houjik lakle haibana nakhoibu pukning khoirang lilanghanba nattraga tnipaihanba oidananabani. 

3 Mi kana amatana nakhoibu karigumba matouna namthak toudasanu; maramdi dharma thadokpa adu hanna thokpa amasung paki mi, amangbagi mi macha nipa aduna, phongdokpa nattanadi madu oiroi; 

4 Mahak adudi iswarni hai naraba nattraga khurumnaraba pot pumnamakki mathakta yeknaba amasung masa mathanta chaojaba oibani; aduna mahakti masa mathantabu iswargum utchaduna, iswargi asengba sanggi manungda phammi. 

5 Eina nakhoiga leiminnaringeida asising asi nakhoida tambirammi haiba nakhoina ningsingdra? 

6 Amasung mahak makki matamda mahakpu phongdoknaba houjik khamba adu nakhoina khang-i. 

7 Maramdi wayel yathang indabagiath-uppa aduna houjiksu thabak touri; houjik khamliba mahak adubu louthoktriba phaoba khambatani. 

8 Amasung matam aduda wayel yathang indaba mahak adubu phongdokkani; Prabhu Jisuna Ibungogi chin-gi nungsaswarna mahakpu hattuna, Ibungo lengbirakpa uhanbana aremba oihan-gani. 

9 Mahak lakpa adu seitan-gi thabak toubagi matung inna panggal pumnamakka, khudamsingga, minamba angak anggkpa ga, 

10 Amasung manglibasinggi damak dharmachendabagi minamba pumnamakka loinagani; maramdi makhoi kanbiba phangnanaba achumbagi nungsiba adubu makhoina loude. 

11 Amasung maram asina makhoina minamba adubu thajagadabani haiduna, aranbana makhoida thabak tounaba iswarna thabi; 

12 Aduna achumba adubu thajadaduna dharmachendabada nungngaiba makhoi pumnamakpu wayennabani.


Prabhudi cheksinna leinaba haliaba


13 Touigumbasung; Prabhuna chanba ichin inaosa, nakhoigi maramda matam leiba khibikta iswarbu thagatchabana eikhoigi ithouni, maramdi iswarna nakhoibu ahanbadagi thawaina sengdokpibana amasung achumbabu thajabana aran khubam phangnanaba khanbire. 

14 Asigidamak ibungona nakhoibu eikhoigi gi, Prabhu Jisu Khristagi, matik mangal phangnanaba, eikhoina aphaba wapao tambibagi mapanna koubire. 

15 Adunadi, ichin inaosa, chetna lep-u; amasung waheina oirabasu, eikhoigi lairikna oirabasu, nakhoibu tambikhiba chatnarakliba adu chetna paiyu. 

16 Houjikti eikhoigi Prabhu Jisu Khrista masana, amasung eikhoigi, nungsibiba, lomba naidana themjinbiba, aduga thOujan-gi mapanna aphaba khourangna ningba pibiba eikhoigi ipa iswar aduna nakhoigi pukningbu themjinbisanu; 

17 Adiga aphaba thabak amasung wahei khudingda chethanbisanu.

II THESLONIKIYA 3 

Aroiba insinbiba amasung aroiba wa


1 Akonbada, ichin inaosa, prabhugi wa adu nakhoigi naraktasu oikhibagumna, thuna sindoknanaba amasung matik mangal chaonanaba eikhoigi damak haijabiyu, 

2 Aduga eikhoibu waiong chadaba amasung phattaba misingdagi kanbinanaba haijabiyu, maramdi pumnamakta thajaba adu leiba natte. 

 Touigumbasung Prabhudi thajaba yabani, Ibungona nakhoibu panggal kalhanbigani, amasung phattaba adudagi nakhoibu ngaksenbigani. 

4 Amasung eikhoina piriba yathangsing adu nakhoina tousu tou-i, tousu tougani haiduna nakhoigi maramda Prabhuda eikhoigi thajaba lei. 

5 Aduga Prabhuna nakhoigi pukning iswargi nungsibada amasung Khristagi khangheibada lamjingbisanu. 

6 Amahiksung, ichin inaosa, eikhoina nakhoibu Prabhu Jisu Khrista gi mingda yathang piri. haibadi, atanba amasung nakhoina eikhoidagi phangkhiba chatnarakliba adugi matung indaba nachin nanao khuding dagi nakhoi nasana khaidokchou. 

7 Maramdi nakhoina eikhoigi itou karamna lougadaba nakhoi nasa khangjei maramdi eikhoina nakhoigi narakta atanba oijade, 

8 Aduga eikhoina kanagumbadagi lemna chajaramde, adubu eikhoina nakhoi kanagumbabu arumba puhandananaba, nombaga amasung awa khangbaga loinana ahing nungthil thabak subani, 

9 Maramdi eikhoigi itik leitaba natte, adubunakhoina eikhoigi itou lounanaba, eikhoi isabu pandam oina nakhoida pinnabani. 

10 Maramdi eikhoina nakhoiga leiminnaringeida, eikhoina nakhoida yathang asi pirammi, haibadi, kanagumbana thabak asi pirammi, haibadi, kanagumbana thabak suningdraba, mahakna chasu chadasanu. 

11 Maramdi nakhoigi narakta kana kanagumbana tanna lenduna, thabak isu sudana, choirangnana chatli haiba eikhoina tai. 

12 Asigumba misingna ingna thabak, suduna marannaigi chajananaba, eikhoina makhoibu Prabhu Jisu Khristagi mingda yathang piduna thoujinjari. 

13 Adubu, ichin inaosa, nakhoidi aphaha toubada wabiganu. 

14 Aduga kanagumba mina eikhoigi lairik asigi wa indrabadi, mi adubu khanghou, mahakna ikaijananaba nakhoina mahakka tinnaganu, 

15 Adumakpu mahakpu yeknaba oina loubiganu adubu nachin nanao oina mahakpu warakpiyu. 

16 Houjikti ingthabagi Prabhu ibun-gomakna nakhoida matam pumnamakta maram pumnamakta ingthaba pibisanu. Prabhuna nakhoi pumnamakka loinabi pibisanu. 

17 Pol eina khurumjaba asi ikhutmakna ijabani. Eigi lairik khudingda masina khudamni. 

18 Eikhoigi Prabhu Jisu Khristagi thoujal nakhoi pumnamakka loinabi-sanu.

TIMOTHIYADA POLNA IBA AHANBA LAIRIK 

A-iba: Missionary Pol 

Ibagi matam: A.D. 64-65 

Wamachang: Singlupsingna chatkadaba niti niyom amasung luchingbasinggi thoudang. 

Chithi asi Missionary Polna magi loinaba oiriba Timothi ngonda singlupsinggi chatkadaba niti niyomgi maramda ibani. II Tim ga Titus gagi chithi asi pastoralgi chithi hainasu khangnei. Maramdi singlupsinggi maram amadi luchingbasingna chatkadabi maram ningthina utli. 

 I TIMOTHIYA 1 

Khurumjaba; chumdaba tambibagi marida mit-na singhanba


1 Eikhoigi kanbiba mapu iswargi amasung eikhoigi khourangna ningjaba Khrista Jisugi yathang matung inna, Khrista Jisugi pakhonchatpa Polna thajabagi marida achumba icha Timothiyada: 

2 Ipa Iswardagi amasung eikhoigi Prabhu Khrista Jisudagi thoujal, nungsiheiba, amasung ingthaba leibisanu. 

3 Eina Makidoniyada chatlamdaida nahakpu thoujinkhibagumna, Ephisada leibiyu Tonganba wapao tambidananaba, 

4 Aduga asemba warisingda amasung aroiba naidaba mihourol ayambada pukning thingjindananaba kana kanagumbada yathang piyu. Maramdi asisingnadi thajabada leiriba iswargi sillangba adu thokhanba nattaduna hennadum hangdok hangjin touba thokhalli. 

5 Touigumbasung yathang adugi maheidi asengba thamoidagi, aphaba achum-aran khangnaba pukningdagi amasung thajasinnadabadagi thokpa nungsibani; 

6 Pumnamak asidagi mi kharana khanglei leithoktuna waremda onsinkhi; 

7 Makhoina kari karigi haiba, nattraga kari karigi maramda aoiba oina haiba adu khangdrabasu, makhoina wayelgi ojhasing oining i. 

8 Touigumbasung mina wayel yathang adu chumna sijinnarabadi, aphabani haiba eikhoina khang-i. 

9 Eikhoina asi khang-i, haibadi, dharmachenba migi damak wayel yathang samba natte, adubu wayel yathang indaba amasung machat naidaba, iswar ningdaba amasung pap chenba, sengdaba amasung amangba, mapa mama hatpa amasung mihatpa, 

10 Marumbi thamba, matao tounaba, mi huranba, chinthiba, minamna wasakpa, makhoi asigidamak-ni, 

11 Aduga bor pinaheiba iswargi matik mangan-gi aphaba wapao eingonda sinnabiraba adugi matung inba achumba paotakta atei kari karigunibana serannahallabadi, asigi damaksu wayel yathang sembani.


Iswargi thoujan-gi damak polna thagatchaba.


12 Eibu panggal kalhanbiba, Khrista Jisu eikhoigi Prabhubu eina thagatchei, maramdi thougan tounanaba Ibungona eibu happiduna, thajaba yaba singthanabire. 

13 Mamangngeida eina ibungobu thina ngangba, ot-neiba amasung ikaiba khangdaba mi oirabasu, nungsibiba eina phangjei, maramdi thajadaba phibamda khangdana eina madu tou-i; 

14 Aduga eikhoigi Prabhugi thoujal Khrista Jisuda leiriba thajaba ga amasung nungsibaga loinana mapal naidana pinabi. 

15 Khrista Jisuna pap chenbasingbu kanbinanaba taibangpanda lengbirakle haiba wa adu thajaba yabani amasung khwaina louba matik chabani. Papchenbasing adudagidi eina athoibani; 

16 Adum oinamakpu lomba naidana hingnaba ibungobu thajarakadabasingda pandam oinabagi damak eingonda athoiba oina Khrista Jisuna mahakki kuina khangbiba pumnamak utpinanaba, maram asigi damak eina nungsibiba phangjare. 

17 Houjik lomba naidaba ningthou mangba leitaba uba ngamdaba, amata ngaiba iswarda lomba naidaba phaoba ikaikhumnaba amasung thagatpa oisanu Amen. 

18 Icha Timothiya, nahakki maramda hanna iswargi wa takthok takthokpa matung inna yathang asi eina nangonda sinnari. Takthokpa wa asina nahak aphaba lansoknaba adu thajaba amasung aphaba achum aran khangnaba pukning paiduna soknou; 

19 Pukning asi kana kanagumbana makhoidagi inthokkhiduna thajabagi marida hi kaiba nangle; 

20 Makhoigi marakta Humenaya amasung Aleksanderni; athiba wa haidanaba makhoina tamjananaba, eina makhoibu seitanda pithokle.

I TIMOTHIYA 2 

Punna iswar khurumjanabagi takpiba


1 Maram aduna eina ihan hanbada insillibani, madudi eikhoina iswar-ningba chinglemba matou pumnamakta amasung chikna panba mipal oina pannanba, mi pumnamakki, 

2 Ningthou amasung awangba phamda leiba pumnamakki damak nonjaba, haijaba; nibiba thagatpa toubiyu. 

3 Asi eikhoigi kanbiba mapu iswargi mityengda phajaba amasung ayabani. 

4 Mi pumnamakpu kanbiba amasung makhoina achumbabu changkhonna khangba ibungo mahakna pambani, 

5 Maramdi iswar ama lei, iswar amasung misinggi marakta tainabiba amasu lei, 

6 Mahakti masamakpu pumnamakki damak tha, dokmal oina pibiraba mi oiba Khrista Jisuni. Sakshi asi acha achaba matamda pibani; 

7 Adugi damak pao sandokpa amasung pakhonchatpa oina (eina achumba hairi, chinthide), thajabada amasung achumbada atoppa jatsinggi ojha oina eibu pham happire. 

8 Maram aduna nipasingna asaoba amasung khanjanaba leitana asengba khut thanggattuna mapham khudingda haijaba eina pambani. 

9 Adugumduna nupisingna ikaiba khangna amasung pukning laksinna masa masana achaba phijet setpa eina pambani; masam lonbana amasung sanana, maktana, nattraga namal luba phijetna nattaduna, apha aphaba thabakna leitengjasanu; 

10 Iswar ningbini hairiba nupisinggi damak masi matik chabani. 

11 Nupina changkhonna makha ponbaga loinana tuminna leiduna tamjasanu. 

12 Touigumbasung nupina tambiba, nattraga nipagi mathakta mapu oiba eina yade, adubu tuminna leisanu. 

13 Maramdi Adambu hanna sabani, mattungda Hawabuni; 

14 Aduga Adambu namthak touba natte, adubu nupibu nannhak touduna ayol aranbada tabani; 

15 Adubu makhoina thajabada, nungsibada amasung asengbada pukning laksinbaga loinana itattattana leirabadi, chabokpa aduda nupibu kanbigani.

I TIMOTHIYA 3 

Singlupki phamnaibasing


1 Hairiba asi thajaba yabani, kanagumbana Luchintbagi pham thirabadi, mahakna aphaba thabak pambani. 

2 Maram aduna luchingba aduna mingda thiba leitaba, nupi amagi mapuroiba, thaktaba, pukning phajinba, changnaiba, pija pithak phaba, tambiheiba; 

3 Yu ngaodaba, yeina-cheinagandaba; adubu pukning thotpa ningai kandaba, sen pamgandaba asigumba mi oiba tare. 

4 Mahakna machat phajana machasingbu laktuna, mahakmakki imungbu ningthina ngakkadabani; 

5 Kanagumbana mahakmakki imungbu karamna ngakkadage khang-drabadi, mahakna iswargi singluppu karamna ngaksen gadage? 

6 Nouna ollakpa mina oidasanu, mahakna nawanglaktuna diyabolgi wayenda taba yai. 

7 Amukka mahakna mingda thibada aniastmg diyabolgi langda tadananaba mapanda leiba-singna sonnaba mi oiba tare. 

8 Adugumduna singlupki dikansingna chinglemba mi, machin ani longdaba, draksha mahida thoina pukning changdaba, sendong karamdaba mi oiba tare; 

9 Asengba achum-aran khangnaba pukningna makhoina thajabagi athuppa adu paigadabani. 

10 Aduga makhoi asibu hannana chang yengsanu, maduda makhoina paothokpa leitrabadi, dikansing oina thougan tousanu. 

11 Adugumduna nupisingna chinglembi, mi hungandabi, yu thaktabi, thabak pumnamakta thajaba yabi oiba tare. 

12 Dikansingna machasingbu amasung makhoimakki imu ngbu phajana ngaktuna nupi amagi mapuroiba oisanu. 

13 Maramdi dikangi thougan phajana touraba makhoi aduna masa masagi damak aphaba pham amasung Khrista Jisuda leiriba thajaba aduda yamna thouna phaba phangjabani. 

14 Eina nangonda thuna laknaba khourangna ning-i; 

15 Adubu eina thillaklabadi; iswargi imungda karamba machat chatkadaba nahakna khangnanaba, eina nangonda wasing asi ibani; imung adudi hingliba iswargi singlup, achumbagi yumbi amasung ngaklou oibani. 

16 Amasung iswar ningbagi athuppa adu arubani haina pumnamakna yabani: Ibungobu hakchang oina phongdok-pire, Ibungogi thawaida dharmachenba oihalle, Swargadutsingna ure, Jatsinggi marakta sandokle, Taibangpanda thajare, Matik mangan-ga loinana lou-khatpire.

I TIMOTHIYA 4 

Chumlaba tambiba misinggi maramda


1 Touigumbasung thawai aduna sengna hai, haibadi, tungda themdokpa thawaisingda amasung bhutsinggi paotakta pukning changduna, kana kanagumbana thajaba thadokkani; 

2 Masi chinthiba misinggi aphasajaningbadagi thokpani, amasung makhoidi makhoimakki achum, aran khangnaba pukningda mei ngangna ikpa yotna tanghanba mini; 

3 Makhoina luhongbasu khammi, aduga thajariba amasung achumba khanglibasingna thagatpaga loinana chananaba iswarna sembikhraba achapot hennaba yathang pi. 

4 Maramdi iswarna semba pot khuding mak aphabani, aduga thagatpaga loinana loujarabadi, yaroidaba karisu leite; 

5 Maramdi iswargi wa amasung haijabagi mapanna sengdokhanbani. 

6 Nahakna waramsing asi ichin inao singgi pukningda hanjinbirabadi, nahakna thajabagi wa makheina amasung nahakna tung injaraba aphaba paotakna nasabu yokchaduna, nahak Jisugi aphaba thougan touba mi oigani. 

7 Touigumbasung amangba amasung hanubisinggi asemba wari louganu. Aduga nahak nathanta iswarbu ningba adu henna heinanaba sajen tou; 

8 Maramdi hakchanggi sajendi khajiktagi damak tongjei, adubu iswar ningbadi houjikki amasung lakkadaba gi hingnaba waleppa leibagi maramna pumnamakki damak tongjabani. 

9 Hairibt wa asi thajaba yabani amasung khwaina louba matik chabani. 

10 Maramdi asigi damak eikhoina nomsu nombani, angamsu tanbani, maramdi mi pumnamakki, thoidokpadi thajabasinggi, kanbiba mapu oiriba iswarda eikhoigi khourangna ningba lepchare.


Timothiyagi lichat-sajat amasung tambiba maong


11 Waramsing asi yathang piduna tambiyu. 

12 Nang nahani haiduna kana amatana usittaba toudasanu, adubu nahakti thajabasinggi damak waheida, lichat sajatta, nungsibada thajabada, asengbada pandam oiyu. 

13 Eina laktriba phaoba, sastra pabibada, thoujinbibada, tambibada pukning chang-u. 

14 Ahallupki khut thambibaga loinana iswargi wa takthokpana nangonda pikhraba, nangonda leiriba khudon adu thaoidaba touganu. 15 Mipumnamaktagi nahakki thabak pangba phongdoknanaba, thabak asida maram ok-u, nasa pumba pithok-u, 16 Nasagi marida amasung nahakki tambibagi marida cheksillu. Thabak asida itattatana leiyu; maramdi asi touduna nahakna nasabusu, nahakki wa tabasingbusu kanbigani.

I TIMOTHIYA 5


1 Ahanba warakkanu, adubu mahakpu napagumna, naha oibasingbu nachin nanaogumna, 

2 Nupi ahansingbu namagumna, naha oibisingbu nachem nachan-gumna, pukning iseng sengna thojanbiyu.


Singlupki manungda lukhrabisinggi maphamda thaktaba chatkadaba machai


3 Thanggei sengba lukhrabisingbu ikaikhumnou. 

4 Touigumbasung kanagumbi lukhrabigi macha mousing leirabadi macha masusiug asina hanna makhoimakki imung manunglomda iswar ningba, amasung makhoigi mapa mama, mapu mabensingda laman singnaba tamsanu maramdi asi iswargi mityengda ayabani. 

5 Adubu thanggei sengba lukbrabi amasung mathanta ngairibi mahak aduna iswarda mahakki khourangna ningba lepchare, aduga ahing nungthil nonjaba amasung haijaba tatte. 

6 Touigumbasung masa nungainaba touriba lukhrabi aduna hingna sirabani. 7 Makhoibu thiba leitananaba, yathang sing asisu piyu. 

8 Touigumbasung kanagumbana oiba, aduga thoidokpadi mahakmakki imung manunggi damak langbi-khotpidrabadi, thajaba adu mahakna yadre, aduga thajadaba mida mahakna henna phattabani. 

9 Chahi humphu sudribi kana amatana lukhrabi singda chandasanu nipa amagi nupi oiramduna, 

10 Aphaba thabakki damak sonnarabi oisanu; mahak angang-singbu yoklabi, lamlanbasingbu pija-pithak pharabi, asengbasinggi khong hambirabi, awa anangbasingbu pangbirabi, aphaba thabak khuding maram okna tung illabi oirabadi, mahakpu lukhrabi singda chanba yai. 

11 Touigumbasung naha lukhrabisingbu yaganu; maramdi makhoina Khristabu yeknaduna makherangba hourakpada, mayum naiba pammi; 

12 Makhoigi ahangba wasak kaibagi maramna ayol aral phang-i. 

13 Aduga asita nattana makhoina yum yumda koichat chattuna tanba tammi, amasung tanbata nattana, makhoina ngangloidaba wa ngangduna, warem ngangbisu thougaidabisu oirak-i. 

14 Maram aduna nabs oibising aduna mayum naiba, macha pokpa, imung ngakpa, tachopna ngangnaba maram kart amata yeknaba aduda pidaba eina pammi; 

15 Maramdi kana kanagumbana houjik seitan-gi matung innaba leithokkhre. 

16 Kanagumbi thajabi nupi amagi lukhrabasing leibaradi, mahakmakna makhoibu pangbisanu aduga singlupna thanggei sengba lukhrabasingbu pangbiba yananaba singluppu arumba pnhandasanu


Ahallamansing


17 Phajana chingbibira ahansingbu, thoidokpadi waheida amasung tambibada nomlibasingbu, saruk ani ikai khumnabagi matik chaba singthanasanu. 

18 Maramdi sastrana hairi, phou nethathalliba sallababu nangna chin punpharoi. Amasung thabak suirba mina mahakki asuman phangba matik chabani. 

19 Mi ani ahumgi sakshi nattana, ahal amagi mathakta theijinba wa louganu. 

20 Ateisingnasu kinanaba, pap touriba ahan-singbu pumnamakki mangda warak-u. 

21 Michang mikhai naiba karisutou-daduna, mangjounana wayel touba yaodana nahakna waramsing asi ngaknanaba, iswargi, Khrista Jisugi, amasung khan-gat-pa swargadutsinggi mamangda eina nangonda sinnari. 

22 Mi kana amagi mathakta thuna khut thambiganu, aduga mi ateisinggi papki saruk phangminaganu; nasa nathantabu sengna ngakchou. 

23 Isingta amuk thakkanu, adubu nahakki napukki maramgi damak amasung nasa toina sonbagi damak draksha mahi khara sijinnou. 

24 Mi kharagi papti makhoigi mang thaduna wayel toudringeida sengna phong-i; aduga mi kharagi papti tung illi. 

25 Adugumdunasu aphaba thabak phong-i, aduga phongdra-basu lotpa ngamde.

I TIMOTHIYA 6 

Minaising


1 Iswargi mingbu amasung paotak thina haidananaba, minaigi popu puriba makheina makhoimakki mapusingbu ikaikhumnaba matik chaba singthanasanu. 

2 Amasung thajaba mapusing leiba makhoina machin manao oibagi maramna makhoibu usittaba toudasanu; touigumbasung aphaba thabakki saruk phang-minnabasingna thajaba amasung achanba oibagi maramna, makhoina makhoibu thoina thougan tousanu. Waramsing asi tamsu tambiyu, thousu thoujinbiyu.


Chumdaba tambibagi marida


3 Kanagumba mina tonganba paotak tambirabadi, amasung achumba wahei, haibadi eikhoigi Prabhu Jisu Khristagi adu, amasung iswar ningbagi matung inba paotak yadrabadi, 

4 Mahakti karisu khangdrabasu, wa hangdok hangjin touba amasung wa ningai tounaba maramda ngaoduna nawangjabani; Masidagi khambanba, yeina-sunaba, thina ngangba, phattaba ningba; 

5 Pukning khoiba achumba ilei leitaba, amasung iswar ningbadi tongjabagi lambini haina ningba misinggi ningai touba, pumnamak asi thok-i.


Achumba lan


6 Touigumbasung apenbaga loinana iswar ningbadi thoina tongjabani; 

7 Maramdi eikhoina taibangpanda karisu purakte, aduna eikhoina karigumba amata puthokpa ngamde. 

8 *Eikhoigi chanaba amasung eikhoigi setnaba leirabadi, eikhoi penjagani. 

9 Touigumbasung inakkhunningba makhoina athembada, langda, amasung apangba aduga phattaba ayamba apambada tabani; asigumbasina misingbu amangatada luphalli. 

10 Maramdi sen pamganbadi phattaba pumnamakki maruni; masi pammannduna tannabada mi kharadi thajabadagi lamhuknakhre, aduga awaanang ayambana makhoi masa mathantabu tana thinbagum thilli.


Timothiyabu insinbiba


11 Touigumbasung, he iswargi mi, nahakna pumnamak asidagi chenthok-u; aduga dharmachenbagi, iswar-ningbagi, thajabagi, nungsibagi, khanghei-bagi, nollukpagi tung illu. 

12 Thajabagi aphaba lansoknaba adu soknou, lomba naidaba hingba adu paiyu, maduda nahakpu koubire, aduga ayamba sakshisinggi mamangda aphaba haidokpa adu nahakna phongdokle. 

13 Pot pumnamak hinghalliba iswargi amasung Pontiya Pilatki maphamda aphaba haidokpa adugi sakshi pikhiba Khrista Jisugi mangda eina nangonda sinnari, 

14 Madudi, nahakna yathang adu amakpa amasung mingda thiba yaodana, eikhoigi Prabhu Jisu Khristabu phongdoktriba phaoba ngak-u; 

15 Bor pinaheiba amasung amata ngaiba matik chaoraba, ningthousinggi ningthou, mapusinggi mapu, amata ngaiba siba naidaba, naksinba ngamdaba manganda leiba, 

16 Mi kana amatana udaba amasung uba ngamdaba ibungo mahakna phongdokpiba adu acha achaba matamda utpigani; ikaikkhumnaba amasung lomba naidaba panba adu ibungo mangonda oisanu. Amen. 

17 Houjikki taibangpanba asida inakkhullibasingda sinnabiyu, madudi, makhoina pukning nawangdasanu, areppa leitaba landa nattaduna, eikhoibu nungainanaba pot pumnamak marang kaina pibiba iswarda khourangna ningba lepchasanu; 

18 Aphaba tousanu, apha aphaba thabakta inakkhunba oisanu, pinaheiba amasung yenbiheiba oisanu. 

19 Makhoina aoiba hingba adu painanaba lakkadaba matamgi damak yumphamgum makhoi masagi damak lisinjasanu. 

20 He Timothiya, nangonda sinnaba adu ngak-u; lanna kounaba khangba adu-dagi thokpa amangba pangngang ngangba amasung wa khettokpadagi leithok-u; 

21 Khangba asi mi kharana haidok-tuna thajabagi marida soire, thoujal nangga loinabisanu.

TIMOTHIYADA POLNA IBA ANISUBA LAIRIK 

A-iba: Missionary Pol 

Ibagi matam: A.D. 66-68 

Wamachang: Achumba sakshi pibagi wa. 

Nerona ningthou oina panba matamda Missionary Polna Romgi khulda ibani. Ahanbagi chithi aduda Timothiyaga unasi haiba utli. Adubu akonbagi asidadi magi matam thtina loigani haiba utli. Tim. 4:6 ta Polna Jailda leina leina adukki matik thabak tourabasu magi marupsing aduna Nerobu kibadagi khristan oiba toklammi. prithibi aside khristansingna Iswarngonda chetna thajabasu leigani thajadabasu leigani haiba adu utli. 

Masi Polgi aroiba chithini, Tim. 1:15; 4:16. 

II TIMOTHIYA 1 

Khurumjaba amasung iswarbu thagatpa; thawai yaonaba amasung thouna phanaba insinbiba


1 Khrista Jisuda leiriba hingba adugi waleppa thungnanaba, iswarna ningbagi mapanna Khrista Jisugi Pakhon-chatpa Polna, eigi achanba icha Timothiyada: 

2 Ipa Iswardagi amasung eikhoigi Prabhu Khrista Jisudagi thoujal, nungsiheiba, ingthaba leibisanu. 

3 Ei haraobana thannanaba, nahakki pi taba ningsingduna, ahing nungthil nahakpu khourangna ujaningduna, amasung eigi nonja nonjabada nahakpu tattana ningsingjaduna, 

4 Asengba achum aran khangnaba pukningga loinana ipa ipusingdagi houna eina khanjarakpa iswar ibungobu eina thagatchei. 

5 Nangonda leiriba thajasinnadaba adu ei ningsing-i; thajasin-nadaba asi nahakki nabenbok Loyida amasung nahakki nama Unikida Loyida leirammi, aduga madu nangondasu lei haina eina thajei. 

6 Maram asigi damak eigi khut thambibagi mapanna nangonda leiriba iswargi khudon adu nahakna meigum chakkhathannanaba eina nahakpu ningsinghallibani. 

7 Maramdi iswarna eikhoida akibagi thawai pibide; adubu panggan-gi, nungsibagi amasung masa lakchabagi thawai pibire. 

8 Maram aduna eikhoigi prabhugi maramda sakshi pibagi damak, aduga ibungogi maramda phadok oiriba mi eigi damak ikaibiganu, adubu iswargi panggal matung inna aphaba wapaogi damak eiga loinana awaba khamgminna-biyu. 

9 Ibungo mahakna eikhoibu kanbire aduga asengba koubana eikhoibu koubire, eikhoigi thabak matung inna natte, adubu ibungo mahakmakki ningba amasung thoujal matting inna koubibani; Thoujal asi thaina mamangngeida Khrista Jisugi mapanna eikhoida kanbiba, 

10 Adubu houjikti eikhoigi kanbiba mapu Khrista Jisugi uhanbibana phongdokpire. Ibungona siba manghanduna, aphaba wapaogi mapanna hingba amasung siba naidaba adu manganda pubirakle; 

11 Aphaba wapao asigi damak eibu pao sandokpa, pakhonchatpa amasung ojha happire. 

12 Maram asigi damak eina awaba asisingsu khangjari; adumakpu ei ikaijade, maramdi eina thajaraba ibungobu eina khangjei, aduga eina ibungoda sinajakhiba adu ibungona numit adu phaoba ngakpiba ngammi haidunna eina thajei. 

13 Khrista Jisuda leiriba thajabada amasung nungsibada, nahakna eingondagi takhiba achumba wagi pandam adu paiyu. 

14 Nangonda sinakhiba aphaba adu eikhoigi nungda leiriba thawai asengba adugi mapanna ngak-u. 

15 Phugela amasung Harmogini yaona, Esiyada leiba pumnamakna eingondagi leithokkhre haiba asi nahakna khang-i: 

16 Prabuna Onesiphoragi imungbu nungsibisanu; maramdi mahakna eihakpu toina awa pothahanbiduna eigi yotlhing-phalanggi maramda ikaibide; 

17 Adubu mahakna Romda laklabada, eibu mahakna thawai yaona thiraduna phangle. 

18 (Prabhuna numit aduda prabhudagi nungsibiba phangnaba mangonda chanbisanu); aduga mahakna Ephisada kaya yamna thougan toujare haiba nahakna henna ningthina khangbani.

II TIMOTHIYA 2 

1 Maram aduna, eigi icha, nahakna Khrista Jisuda leiriba thoujal aduda panggal kanba oiyu. 

2 Aduga ayamba sakshisinggi mapanna nahakna eingondagi takhi takhiba adu ateisingbusu tambiba ngamgadaba thajaba yaba misingda nahakna sinnabiyu. 

3 Khrista Jisugi aphaba lanmi amagumna awa khang-minnabiyu. 

4 Lanmi oiriba kana amatana mahakpu lanmi oinaba ming chanbiba kanagumba adubu pelhannanaba mipan asigi thoudokta mahak masabu chayet-nahande. 

5 Adugasu mi amana singna-bada tannarabadi, mahakna hounabi matung inna tannadrabadi, mahakpu kokthon uppide. 

6 Nomliba lou-uba mi aduna mahei maronggi saruk hanna phangba tare. 

7 Eina kari haiba wakhal tou; 

8 Maramdi prabhuna maram pumnamakta lousing nangonda pibigani. Eina sandokpa aphaba wapaogi matung inna asibasinggi maraktagi hinggatkhraba, Dayudki dhara Jisu Khrista adubu ningsing-u. 

9 Masigi damak ei touheidaba touba migumna punba phaoba awa khangbani; adubu iswargi wadi punde. 

10 Maram asina khan-gatpasingnasu lomba naidaba matik mangan-ga loinana Khrista Jisuda leiriba aran khubam adu phangnanaba, makhoigi damak eina pumnamak khangbani. 

11 Hairibasi thajaba yabani: maramdi eikhoina ibungoga siminnarabadi ibun-goga hingsu hingminnagani; 

12 Eikhoina khanglabadi ibungoga ningthou oina pansu pamninnagani; eikhoina ibungobu jadragadi ibungonasu eikhoibu yabiroi. 

13 Eikhoida thajaba yaba leitrabadi ibungodadi thajaba yaba itattattana lei; maramdi ibungona masa mathantabu yadaba ngamde.


Wa yetnabagi marida mit-na singhanbiba


14 Makhoibu asising asi ningsinghallu, amasung karisu tongjadaba, atabasingbu onna-teinahanba wa ningai tounadananaba, prabhugi mangda makoibu sin-nabiyu. 

15 Achumbagi wa adu chumna yenbiduna, ikaigadaba maram leitaba nomliba mi, iswargi maphamda lousinba yaba oina nasamak katchananaba hotnou. 

16 Toui-gumbasung amangba pangang ngangbadagi thei-dok-u; maramdi makhoi iswar ningdabada asum asum hengat lakkani, 

17 Amasung makhoigi wa aduna chasillakpa lainagum chasillakkani; makhoigi marakta Humenaya amasung Philitani; 

18 Houjikti hinggatpa adu thokpa loikhre haiduna achumbagi marida soikhraba mising asina kana kanagumbagi thajaba adu manghalli. 

19 Adum oina-makpu iswargi achetpa yumpham adudi lengdana lei; masigi chum asi lei, haibadi, prabhuna ibungogi oibasingbu khang-i, aduga, prabhugi ming sonjaba mi khudingna dharamchendababu thadoksanu. 

20 Amahiksung achouba yumda sanagi amasung lupagi phu walta leiba natte, adubu ugisu, leipakkisu lei; aduga phu-wal adu kharabu luna aduga kharabu laina sijinnei. 

21 Maram aduna kanagumbana masa mathantabu asisingdagi senghanjarabadi, mahakti luna sijinnaba, sengdoklaba, mapugi sijinnabagi damak kannaba, aphaba thabak khudinggidamak thourang touraba phu ama oigani. 

22 Touigumbasung naha oibagi apaiba makheidagi chenthok-u, asengba pukningdagi prabhubu koujabasingga loinana dharmachenbagi, nungsibagi, ingthabagi matung illu. 

23 Adubu apangba amasung heita singdaba wahangna khatna cheinaba thokhalli haiba khangduna, madudagi lei-thok-u. 

24 Aduga prabhugi manaidi yeina cheinaba touphade, adubu pumnamakki maphamda pukning thotpa, tambi heiba, khangheiba, 

25 Yetna-basingbu nollukna chumhanbiba tarei karigumba iswarna makhoibu achumba khangba phaoba pukning honghanbiba yai, 

26 Aduga diyabolna hingpha phakhibasingbu diyabolgi langdagi ibungo mahakki ningba tounanaba thadokpiba yai.

II TIMOTHIYA 3 

Phattaba matam naksillakpagi wa


1 Touigumbasung akonba matamda tamthiraba matam lakkani haiba asi khan u. 

2 Maramdi misingna asigumba oigani, haibadi, mathantabu nungsijaba, sen pamganba, napal chaoba, chaothokpa, thina ngangba, mama mapana haiba indaba, toubimal khangdaba, sengdaba. 

3 Mahousagi nungsiba, tainaba yadaba, theijinheiba, masa lakchadaba, hingchayaitambagumba, aphaba ipam pamdaba, 

4 Yeknabagi michang oiba, aphingba, nawangba, iswarbu nungsibadagi hakchanggi nungngaiba henna pamba, 

5 Iswar ningbagi maong louba adubu madugi pangganbu yadaba: asisingdagi leithok-u. 

6 Maramdi makhoising asigi maraktagi yum yumda litsinduna, papki arumba purabi, makhal makha apaibana ching-libi, 

7 Tamlabasu achumba khangba adu kadoungeidasu khanglakpa ngamdabi, apangbi nupisingbu changpha phaba mising lei. 

8 Aduga Janinna amasung Jambrina Mousibu yeknakhibagumna, pukningda manglaba, thajabagi marida yadaba mising asinasu achumbabu yeknei. 

9 Adubu makhoi chaokhatlaroi, maramdi makhoigi wakhal thenba adu, makhoi ani adugi oikhibagumna, mi pumnamakta phonggani.


Sastrana-thajabasinggi pambei oiba


10 Touigumbasung nahakti eigi tambi-bagi, ichat itougi, ningbagi, thajabagi, kuina khangbagi, nungsibagi, khanghei-bagi, 

11 Ot-neiba amasung awa anang khangbagi matung ille; Antiyokhiyada, Ikoniyada, Lustrada eingonda kari kari thokkiba; ot-neiba kaya eina khan-jakhiba nahakna khang-i; aduga pumnamakna asidagi prabhuna eibu kanbire. 

12 Hoi, aduga Khrista Jisuda iswar-ningna panningbasingna ot-neiba khanggani. 

3 Adubu phattabi misingna amasung matat heibasingna mibu minamduna amasung minamhanduna henna henna phatlakloi. 

14 Touigumbasung nahakna tamkhi tamkhiba amasung chetna thajakhiba aduda lengdana leiyu; nahakna kana kanadagi tamlakpage, 

15 Amasung pildingeidagi nahakna asengba sastra haiba nahakna khang-i; Khrista istitAa thajabagi mapanna sastra asina aran khubam phaoba nahakpu singhanba ngammi 

16 Sastra khuding iswargi swardagi oibani, amasung iswargi mina aphaba thabak khudinggi damak mapung phana langladuna changkhonba oinanaba; 

17 Tambinabagi damak, waraknabagi damak, chumhanbinabagi damak, dharma chenbagi marida takpinabagi damak kannabani.

II TIMOTHIYA 4 

1 Iswargi mangda amasung ahingba-singga asibasinggabu wayen gadouriba Khrista Jisugi mangda, ibungogi uhanbiba amasung ibungogi leibak sonduna eina sinnajari: 

2 Wa adu sandok u, matamdasu matam nattabadasu ain kanna tou, kuina khangbiba amasung tambiba pumnamakka loinana wakhal tahallu, warakpiyu, thoujanbiyu. 

3 Maramdi makhoina achumba tambiba adu khangba ngamloidaba matam lakkani; adubu manakong hakkachaduna makhoimakki apamba matung inna tambiba makhoi masen—gi damak khomjingani, 

4 Amasung achumbadagi makhoigi manakong leithokkhiduna asem asemba warida leisingani. 

5 Tonigumbasung nahakti maram pumnamakta pukning laksillu, awaba khang-u, aphaba wapao sandokpagi thabak tou, nahakna thougan touba adu thunghallu. 

6 Maramdi ei houjikti bah oina katthoklabani, aduga eigi chatthokpa matam lakle. 

7 Aphaba lan soknaba adu eina soknare, ithou adu eina loijare, thajaba adu eina ngakchare. 

8 Houjiktagi dharmachenbagi luhup adu eigi damak thamjinbire, madu dharmachenba wayel mapu prabhu aduna eingonda numit aduda pibigani; aduga madu eingondata natte, adubu ibungogi uhanbibabu nungsiraba pumnamak-tasuni.


Mi kharagi pao amasung khaina wa


9 Eingonda thuna laknanaba ngamba makhei hotnabiyu. 

10 Maramdi Deimana houjikki taibangpanba asi nungsiraduna eibu thadoklaga Thesalonikada chatkhre, Kreskena Galatiyada, Titana Dalmatiyada chatkhre. 

11 Luktadi eiga loinari. Nangna Markpu thiduna purak-u; maramdi thougan tounabagi damak mahak eingonda kannabani. 

12 Adubu Tukhikabu eina Ephisada thakhre. 

13 Troyada Karpagida eina thanamba innaphiduga lairik makheiga, thoidokpadi saun-gidu, nahakna lakpada purak-u. 

14 Aleksandar, korisaba aduna eingonda yamna phattaba toubire; prabhuna mahakki thabakki matung inna mangonda laman khumbigani. 

15 Nahaknasu, mahakki maramda sennajou; maramdi mahakna eikhoigi wasing kanna thingnaba hotnare. 

16 Eigi ahanba kanthokchaba wa haiba matamda kana amatana eigi michang changbide, adubu pumnamakna eibu thadokle; makhoida masi singthanabidasanu. 

17 Touigumbasung eina wa sandokchaba changkhonna loinanaba, amasung atoppa jat pumnamakna wa adu tananaba, prabhuna inakta leppiduna ein-gonda panggal happire; aduga eibu nongsagi machindagi kanbire. 

18 Prabhu aduna phattaba thabak khudingdagi eibu kanbiduna, ibungogi swarga leibak phaoba eibu pukhatpigani. Ibungoda lomba naidana thagatpa oisanu. Amen. 

19 Priskaga Akulagabu, aduga Onisiphorgi imungbu khurumjei. 

20 Irastana Korinthada leihoure, aduga Militada Trophima naduna eina thanamle. 

21 Ningthamtha oidringeida laknanaba karma hotnabiyu. Ubul, Puden, Lina, Klodiya, amasung ichin-inao pumnamakna nahakpu khurumjei. 

22 Prabhuna nahakki thawaiga loinabisanu. Thoujal nahakka loinabisanu.

TITADA POLNA IBA LAIRIK 

A-iba: Missionary Pol 

Ibagi matam: A.D. 65 

Wamachang: Singlupsingna aphaba thabak touduna chetna lepkadaba maong amasung luchingbasinggi thoudang. 

TITUS 1 

Khurumjaba 

1 Iswarna khangatpasinggi thajabagi, amasung iswar-ningbagi achumba adubu changkhonna khangnabagi damak, iswargi manai amasung Jisu Khristagi pakhonchatpa Pol eina lomba naidaba hingba khourangna ninduna. 

2 Lomba naidaba hingba adu minamba leitaba iswarna thaina mamangngeida pigani waleppikhi; 

3 Adubu acha achaba matamda wapao sandokpada ibungo mahakki wa adu phongdokpire; sandokpa adu eikhoigi kanbiba mapu iswargi yathang matung inna eingonda sinnabire. 

4 Thajaba mannaba matung inna eigi achumba icha Titada: Ipa Iswardagi amasung eikhoigi kanbiba mapu Khrista Jisudagi thoujal amasung ingthaba leibisanu.


Ahallamansingbu pham happa


5 Maram asigi damak watlam watlamba makhei adu nahakna mathang manao naina semjinnanaba, amasung sahar khudingda singlupki ahansinggi pham hapna-naba, eina nahakpu Kritta thanambani; eina nangonda takpikhibagumna 

6 Haibadi, paothokpa leitaba, nupi amagi mapuroiba oiba, amasung thajaba, wathok lanthokki theijinba leitaba nattraga machat naidaba oidaba machasing leiba kanagumba mi leirabadi, mahakpu hapu. 

7 Maramdi luchingba aduna iswargi Dewangumma paothoktaba, marannaigi ningdaba, thuna saodaba, yu ngaodaba, yeina cheinagandaba, sendong karamdaba; 

8 Adubu pijapithak phaba, aphaba pamba, pukning phajinba, dharmachenba, asengba, masa khudum chanjaba mi oiba tare; 

9 Aduga achumba tambibada insinba amasung wakhetpasinggi maral phongdokpa ngamnanaba, takpiba matung inba thajaba yaba wa adu mahakna chetna paiba tare.


Chumdaba Tambiba mising


10 Maramdi ayatnba machat naidaba, warem ngangba amasung minamba mi lei, thoidokpadi makhoi un kak-pasingdagini; 

11 Makhoigi machin menba tare; asigumba misingna sendong karambagi maramna makhoina tambiroidaba wa tambiduna, ayamba imung apumbabu thugai. 

12 Makhoi masendagi makhoimakki wa takthokpa kanagumba mi amana hai, Kritki misingdi matam leiba khibikta chinthibasing, phattaba lamsasing, atanba puklaobasingni. 

13 Sakshi asi achumbani. Maram adugi damak makhoina Jihudisinggi asemba warida amasung achumbadagi leithokkhiba misinggi yathangda pukning thingjindaduna, 

14 Thajabada achumba oinanaba, makhoibu karma warak-u. 

15 Asengbasingda pot pumnamak iseng seng-i; adubu amangba amasung thajadaba makhoida asengba kari amata leite; touigumbasung makhoigi wakhansu achum-aran khang-naba pukningsu motle. 

16 Makhoina iswarbu khangi haiduna haidokchei, adubu makhoigi thabakna ibungo mahakpu yade; makhoidi tukkachaba, haiba indaba, amasung aphaba thabakki damak karisu kannadabani.

TITUS 2 

Khristansinggi lichat-sajat amasung madugi makhong


1 Touigumbasung nahakna achumba paotakki achaba wa adu ngangu. 

2 Hanubasingna yu thaktaba, chinglemba, pukning phajinba, amasung thajabada, nungsibada, khangheibada achumba oisnu. 

3 Adugumduna hanubisingna maramchatta iswar kina ningbi, hullan-gandabi. aduga draksha mahida minai oidabi, aphaba tambiheibi oisnu. 

4 Iswargi wabu thina haidana-naba, naha oibi nupisingbu makhoi makhoigi mapuroibasingbu nungsibi, machasingbu nungsibi, 

5 Pukning phajinbi, asengbi, yumban heibi, aphabi, makhoi makhoimakki mapuroibasinggi makha ponbi oinaba makhoida tambigadabani. 

6 Adugumduna naha oiba nipasingbu pukning phajinnaba insnbiyu. 

7 Maram pumnamakta nasa nathantabu aphaba thabakki pandam oina utlu; 

8 Migi michang oiriba mahak aduna eikhoigi maramda phattaba hainingai kari amata phangdaduna ikainanaba, nahakki tambibada atingba, chinglemba amasung lalhanba ngamdaba achumba wangang utlu. 

9 Minaisingna maram pumnamakta eikhoigi kanbiba mapu iswargi paotak adu phajahannanaba, makhoi makhoimakki mapusinggi makha ponjaduna maram pumnamakta makhoibu pelhannaba; wa khettaduna, 

10 Lonna pot khaidaduna, changkhorma mapu ningba utnaba, insinbiyu. 

11 Maramdi iswargi thoujal, mi pumnamakta aran khubam pubirakpa adu, uhanbire; 

12 Eikhoina iswar ningdaba amasung taibangpan-gi oiba apamba adu yadaduna, pukning phajinna, dharma chenna amasung iswar ningna houjikki taibangpanba asida pannanaba thoujal asina ikhoibu tambi; 

13 Marak asida yaiphakhraba khourangna ningjaba, haibadi, achouba iswar eikhoigi kanbiba mapu Khrista Jisugi matik manganbu uhanbiba adugidamak eikhoina ngaijari. 

14 Eikhoibu ayol aral pumnamak tagi handokpinanaba, amasung aphaba thabakta thawai yaoba aduga ibungogi marannaigi mibu ibungo masagi damak sengdokpinanaba, ibungona eikhoigi damak masamakpu pibire. 

15 Wasing asi haibiyu, insinbiyu, aduga matik pumnamakka loinana warakpiyu. Mi kana amatana nahakpu usittaba oidasanu.

TITUS 3 

1 Makhoina mapusinggi amasung angam athousinggi makha ponnaba, haiba innaba, aphaba thabak khudinggi damak thourang touba oinaba, 

2 Mi kana amatagi mathakta thina ngangdanaba, ningai kanba oidanaba, pumnamakki maphamda pukning tappa uttuna pukning thotpa oinaba makhoibu ningsinghallu.
