3 Maramdi eikhoisu mamangngeida apangba, haiba indaba, minamba, makhal makha apaibagi amasung harao-kumeigi minai oiba, kallak-khambana panba, tuk-kachabiraba, amaga amaga tukkachanba oirammi. 

4 Touigumbasung eikhoigi kanbiba mapu iswargi chanbiba amasung mibu nungsibaba uhanbirabada, 

5 Eikhoi isana dharmachenna toujakhiba thabak-tagi natte, adubu ibungo mahakki nungsibibagi matung inna, ibungo mahakna eikhoibu amuk pokpibagi luthokpa amasung thawai asengbana nouhanbibagi mapanna kanbire; 

6 Ibungo mahakki thoujanna chumhanbiduna, lomba naidaba hingba khourangna ningba matung inna eikhoibu yumlepchara oihanbinanaba, 

7 Eikhoigi kanbiba mapu Jisu Khristagi mapanna thawai asengba adubu eikhoigi ithakta ibungo mahakna marang kaina heithabire. 

8 Hairiba asi thajagadabani; aduga wara msing asigi marida iswarbu thajarabasingna apha aphaba thabak touduna leibada pukning changnanaba nahakna chetna haibiba eina pambani. Waramsing asi misinggi damak aphaba amasung kannabani. 

9 Thoigumbasung apangba wa hangdok hangjin touba, mihourol thinba, yeina-sunaba, amasung wayel yathanggi marida khatna-cheinaba, asisingdagi theidok-u; maramdi asising asi kannadaba amasung arembani. 

10 Ningai chaoba midi serannaba, pap chenba, amasung mathantabu lalhanjabani haiba khangduna, 11 Amuk anirak warakpa matungda asigumba mibu louganu.


Khaina Wa


12 Eina Artima nattraga tukhikabu nangonda tharaklaga, Nikopoli tanna nahakna eingonda laknanaba ngamba makhei hotnabiyu, maramdi maduda eina ningthamtha lenning-i. 

13 Wayel heiba Sinaga Apollogabu karisu watpa leitananaba pukning changna thindokpiyu. 

14 Aduga eikhoigi misingna mahei yandaba oidananaba, tangaiphadabada sijinnanabagi damak apha aphaba thabak touduna leiba makhoinasu tamsanu. 

15 Eiga loinariba pumnamakna nahakpu khurumjari. Thajaba adugi marida eikhoibu nungsibasingbu khurumjei. Thoujal nakhoi pumnamakka loinabisanu.

PHILIMONDA POLNA IBA LAIRIK 

A-iba: Missionary Pol 

Ibagi matam: A.D. 60-62 

Wamachang: Nungsibana pumnamakpu joi touba ngammi. 

Khristabu thajabasingna makhoigi mathakta phattaba kaya tourabasu ngakpiheigadabani. Minaibu oirabasu kana phattaba mi oirabasu makhoina karigumba phattaba thabak touduna madu phatte haiba khanglaktuna ngakpinaba haijarabadi madu ngakpigadabani. Aduga makhoibusu madu amuk haraona phongdokkadabani haibasi chithi asida mayek sengna utli.


Wahoudok


1 Khrista Jisugi maramda phadok oiriba Polna amasung ichin inao Timothiyana, eikhoigi achanba amasung suminnaba Philimonda, 

2 Ichan Aphiyada, eikhoiga lanmmi oiminnaba Arkhippada, amasung mahakki yumda tinnaba singlupta: 

3 Eikhoigi ipa iswardagi amasung Prabhu Jisu Khristadagi thoujal amasung ingthaba nakhoida leibisanu.


Chenkhiba minaigi maramda nonjaba


4 Nahakki nungsiba, aduga Prabhu Jisuda amasung asengbasing pumna makta leiba nahakki thajaba adu taduna, 

5 Eigi haija haijabada nahakki maramda ningsingjaduna, eina matam leiba khibikta eigi iswarbu thagatchei; 

6 Haibadi, eikhoiga leiriba aphaba maram khuding changkhonna khangba aduda, nahakki thajabagi mapang oiba aduna Khrista giromda mahei yallaknanabani. 

7 Maramdi nahakki nungsibada ei yamna haraoba amasung pukning thougatpa phangjare, maramdi, ichin inao, nahakki napanna asengbasinggi pukning nungaihanbire. 

8 Maram adugi damak matik chaba thabak tounanaba nangonda yathang pinaba Khristagi mapanna eina yamna thourabasu, 

9 Asigi mahutta nungsibagi maramna asigumba mi oiriba, chahi liraba amasung Khrista Jisugi maramda houjik phadok oiriba Pol eina nonjari. 

10 Eina keisumsangda pokchakhiba icha Onesimagi maramda nahakpu nonjari. 

11 Mahakti mamangngeida nangonda kannadaba oirammi, adubu houjikti nangondasu eingondasu kannaba oire. 

12 Mahak masamakpu, haibadi eigi thawaimak oiriba mahakpu, nahakki naphamda eina halhankhibani. 

13 Mahakna nahakki mahutta aphaba wapaogi maramda pulliba eigi thougan toubinanaba, eiga loinana mahakpu thamninglammi; 

14 Adubu nahakki chanbiba adu tangaiphadana toubagum nattaduna, toubiningna toubiba oinanaba, nahakna yadana eina karisu touninglam de. 

15 Maramdi nahakna mahakpu lomba naidana amuk phangba yananaba, maram asina mahakna matam kharagi damak nangondagi khainaramba oibasu yai; 

16 Houjikti mahakna minaigum oidaduna, minaidagi henba ichin inao oiduna, thoidokpadi eingonda achanba, adubu nangondadi hakchangdasu prabhudasu amuk kaya henna achanba oibano! 

17 Aduna nahakna eibu napangni singthanabirabadi, eibu lousinbibagumna lousinbiyu. 

18 Touigumbasung mahakna nahakki naphamda karigumba lankhiba nattraga nahakki karigumba tonba leirabadi, madu eigi chadingda pansinbiyu. 

19 Pol eina masi ikhutmakna ijabani, eina madu hanbigani; haibadi, maduta nattana nahak nasamaksu eingonda tollibani haidananabani. 

20 Hoi, ichin inao, prabhugi marida nangondagi tengbang eina pammi. Khristagi mapanna eigi pukning nungaihanbiyu. 

21 Nahakki haiba inbada chetna thajaba leiduna eina nangonda ijari; eina haibadagi nahakna hendoknasu toubigani haiba khangjei


Aroiba wa


22 Adugasu eigidamak thungpham thourang toubiyu; maramdi nakhoina haijabibagi mapanna eibu nakhoigi naphamda halhanbirakkani haiba eina khourangna ningjei. 

23 Khrista Jisugi maramda eiga phadok oiminnaba Ipaphrana nahakpu khurumjari; 

24 Aduga eiga suminnabasing Marka, Aristrakha, Deiba, Luk makhoi asinasu khurumjari. 

25 Prabhu Jisu Khristagi thoujal nakhoigi thawaiga loinabisanu.

IBRIYASINGDA IBA LAIRIK 

A-iba: Sengna khangdaba 

Ibagi matam: A.D. 68-70 

Wamachang: Khrista asi lomba naidaba Purohit amani. 

Tasengna Ibriya ibani kanano haibasi khangnade. Kanana Polni, kana amana Apolloni, kana amana Barnabani hainei. Masi Ibriyasinggi damakta ibani. Aron haiba aphaoba purohit asidagi Khristana purohit oibana Iswargi marida naknaba amasung aran khubam phangnabagi lambida achumba oi haibadu takli. 

IBRIYA 1


Wahoudok Iswargi machanipadi swargadutsingdagi, Thoihenbani


1 Adungeida Iswarna ipa ipusingda wa takthokpasinggi mapanna machet machet oina amasung tongan tonganba maong oina haikhiduna, 

2 Numitsing asigi aroibada eikhoida macha nipagi mapanna haibire; ibungobu pot pumnamakki yumlepchara oihanbire, Ibungogi mapannasu taibangpanba makhei sembire; 

3 Ibungona Ibungo mahakki matik mangan-gi arangba matou amasung Ibungo mahakki maru oibagi masakmak oiduna, aduga Ibungogi panggan-gi waheina pot pumnamakpu ngakpiduna, Ibungona pap makhei sengdokpinaba toubiraga, wangthoiraba maphamda matik mangal chaoba adugi yetthangbada phamle; 

4 Ibungona swargadutsingdagi thoihenna phaba ming phanglaba adugumna makhoi adudagi adup henna phaba oirakle. 

5 Maramdi Ibungo mahakna karigumba matamda swargadutsinggi maraktagi kanada haikhibano, haibadi nahakti eigi icha nipani, ngasi eina nahakpu pokpire? aduga amukka, eidi mangonda mapa oigani, amasung mahakti eingonda icha nipa oigani? 

6 Amasung hanna pokpa adubu Ibungo mahakna amukka taibangpal manungda pusinbirakpa matamda, Ibungo mahakna hai, amasung Iswargi dutsing pumnamakna Ibungobu khurumsanu. 

7 Aduga swargadutsinggi maramda Ibungo mahakna hai, Ibungo mahakna mahakki dutsingbu nungsit, aduga ibungo mahakki thougan touribsingbu meigi meiri oihalli. 

8 Touigumbasung macha nipagi maramda hai, Ibungogi phambandi, he iswar, lomba naide, aduga achumbagi sanacheidi Ibungona panba leibakki sanacheini. 

9 Ibungona dharmachenba nungsire, amasung wayel chattaba tukkachare; matam aduna Iswarna, Ibungogi Iswar adu, Ibungogi mapangsingdagi hendokna, Ibungoda haraobagi thao heibire. 

10 Aduga, he prabhu, Ibungona ahanbada prithibigi makhong houbire, amasung atiyadi Ibungogi khutki thabakni; 

11 Atiya mangkhigani, adubu Ibungodi lengdana leibani; amasung madu pumnamak phijetna manbagumna mangani, 

12 Amasung innaphi gumna Ibungona madubu thupchin-gani, phijet-kumna madubu sinsu sin-gani. Adubu Ibungodi adum lei, aduga Ibungogi chahidi loiroi. 

13 Toigumbasung swargadutsinggi maraktagi kanada Ibungo mahakna karigumba matamda haikhibano, haibadi, eina nanggi yeknabasingbu nakhonggi khutnet oihandriba phaoba eigi yetta phammu? 

14 Makhoi punmamakti aran khubam phanggadouribasinggi maramgi damak thougan tounanaba thariba, thougan touriba thawaising nattra?

IBRIYA 2 

1 Maram aduna karigumba eikhoi taothakpa yai haiduna, tara taraba hiramsing aduda thoidok hendokna eikhoina pukning changba tare. 

2 Maramdi swargadutsinggi mapanna ngangkhiba wa adu chepta oirabadi, aduga ayol aranba amasung yathang indaba khudigna achumba atoumal phanglabadi, 

3 Eikhoina asup chaoba aran khubam thouoidraga karamna hingba ngamgadage? Prabhugi mapanna ahanbada ngangba houkhraba aran khubam adu tarabasingna eikhoigi damak chethanbire; 

4 Iswarnasu khudamsingna, angak angakpana makhal makha toungamdaba thabakna amasung Ibungo mahakmakki ningba matung inna thawai asengbana pinabiba khudon makheina makhoiga loinana sakshi pi. 

5 Maramdi eikhoina ngangnariba lakkadouriba taibangpal adu Ibungo mahakna swargadutsinggi makha polhande. 

6 Touigumbasung kanagumbana karigumba maphamda sakshi piduna hai, Ibungo nahakna ningsingbiriba mioiba asi karino? nattraga Ibungo nahakna yengbiriba mioibagi macha nipa karino? 

7 Ibungo nahakna mahakpu swargadutsingdagi khara nemthahalle; Ibungo nahakna mahakpu matik manganna amasung ikai khumnabana kokthon thonbire, aduga Ibungo nahakki khutki thabak adugi mathakta mahakpu mathak thonghanbire. 

8 Ibungo nahakna pot pumnamak mahakki khongkha ponna thambire. Maramdi pot pumnamak mahakki makha polhankhre Ibungo mahakna mahakki makha polhandaba kari amata khaktre. Adubu houjik eikhoina pot pumnamak mahakki makha pollaba udri. 

9 Touigumbasung Iswargi thoujanna Jisuna mi khudinggi damak sibagi mahao tangnanaba swargadutsingdagi khara nemthahanba Ibungobu, sibagi awa khangba maramna matik manganna amasung ikai khumnabana kokthon thonbire, eikhoina ujei. 

10 Maramdi Ibungo mahakna ayamba macha nipasingbu matik manganda pubirakpada, makhoigi wan khubamgi mapu adubu awa khangbagi mapanna changkholhannaba asi Ibungo mahakki damak achabani, maramdi Ibungo mahakki maram na amasung Ibungo mahakki mapanna pot pumnamak oiribani. 

11 Maramdi sengdokpiba Ibungosu sengdokpiraba makhoisu pumnamak amatadagini. Maram asigi damak Ibungona makhoibu ichin inao kouba ikaide; 

12 Ibungona hai, eina Ibungo nahakki mingbu eigi ichin inaosingda phongjagani, singlup tinnabagi mayaida eina Ibungo nahakpu thagatchaba isei sakchagani. 

13 Aduga amukka, Ibungo mangonda eigi thajaba leigani. Aduga amukka, yengbiyu, ei amasung Iswarna eingonda pinabida angangsing, 

14 Maram aduna angangsing aduna i-tonggi saruk phangbagi maramna, Ibungona sibagi mapanna sibagi mapanggal leiriba mahakpu, haibadi diyabolbu, karisu nattaba oihannanaba, 

15 Amasung siba kibana makhoi makhoigi mapunsi chuppa apunbagi makha pollibasing pumnamakpu thadokpinanaba, Ibungonasu makhoiga mannana saruk adumak loujare. 

16 Maramdi thanggeisengna Ibungona swargadutsingbu pangbiba natte, adubu Ibungona Abrahamgi dharasingbu pangbibani. 

17 Maram asina Ibungona misinggi pap kokpinanaba, iswargi oiba thabakta nungsiheiba amasung thajaba yaba purohitlen oiraknanaba, Ibungobu machin manaosingga pumnamakta mannahanbiba tare. 

18 Maramdi Ibungo masana themba phangduna, awa khangkhiba aduna athemba phangbasingbu pangbiba Ibungona ngammi.

IBRIYA 3 

Khristadi mousidagi thoihenbani; mamei phaoba thajabagi kannaba


1 Maram asina, swargagi koubiba saruk phangminnaba asengba ichin inaosa, eikhoigi haidokchaba asigi pakhonchatpa amasung purohitlen Jisubu wakhal toubiyu. 

2 Ibungo mahakki imung pumnamakta Mousidi thajaba yaba oibagum Ibungobu pham happiba Ibungo mahakki maphamda ibungosu thajaba yabani. 

3 Maramdi yum saba mibu yum adudagi henna ikaikhumnabagumna, Ibungobudi Mousidagi asup henna thag-atpa matik chaba sigthanare. 

4 Maramdi yum khuding kanagumbana sabani; adubu pot pumnamak sakhiba mahak adudi Iswarni. 

5 Amasung Mousidi Ibungo mahakki imung pumnmakta manai oina tungda nganggadaba wa makheigi sakshigi damak thajaba yabani; 

6 Adubu Khristadi Ibungo mahakki imungni mathakta macha nipa oina thajaba yabani. Eikhoina eikhoigi thouna phaba amasung eikhoigi khourangna ningbagi chaothokchaba adu mamei phaoba chetna paijarabadi, eikhoidi Ibungogi imungni. 

7 Maram asina thawai asengbana haibagumna, ngasi nakhoina Ibungo mahakki khonjel taragadi, 

8 Lamhangda thembagi numitta langnaba aduda toubagumna, nakhoi nakhoigi pukning kalhanganu; 

9 Mapham aduda nakhoigi napa napusingna eibu chang yengduna themle. Aduga makhoina chahi niphu phaoba eigi thabak ure. 

10 Maram asina eina miron asigi mathakta yamna nungngaitaduna hai, makhoina matam leibakhibikta makhoigi thamoi nungda lammuknei; toui-gumbasung makhoina eigi lambi khangdre. 

11 Eina saobada wasakkhibagumna, makhoina eigi potthabada changloi. 

12 Ichin inaosa, hingliba Iswarbu thadoktuna nakhoi kanagumbada thajadabagi phattaba pukning leiba yai haiduna pukning thingjillu. 

13 Touigumbasung nakhoi kanagumbabu papki lounamna pukning kalhandananaba, ngasi kouba leiringeida, nongma nongmagi amana amabu insinnou; 

14 Maramdi eikhoina eikhoigi chetna thajabagi ahouba adu aroiba phaoba chetna pairabadi, eikhoidi Khristaga saruk phangminnabasing oirakle. 

15 Maramdi masi hairibani, ngasi nakhoina Ibungo mahakki khonjel taragadi, langnaba aduda toubagumna, nakhoi nakhoigi pukning kalhan-ganu. 

16 Maramdi kana kanada taraga langnabage? Mousigi mapanna Misordagi lakpa pumnamak aduna nattra? 

17 Aduga Ibungo mahakna kana kanagi mathakta chahi niphu phaoba nungngaikhidabage? Lamhangda hakchang takhiba pap touba makhoigi mathakta nattra? 

18 Amasung yathang indabasing aduda nattana, makhoina Ibungo mahakki potthabada changloi haiduna Ibungo mahakna kanada wasakkhibage? 

19 Aduga thajadabagi maramna makhoina changba ngamkhide haiba eikhoina ui.

IBRIYA 4 

Jisudi Harondagi henna chaoba purohitlenni


1 Maram aduna Ibungo mahakki potthabada changnabagi waleppa adu leirabasu, nakhoi kanagumbana madudagi sothahouba yai haiduna eikhoina kisi. 

2 Maramdi makhoida sandokpagumna eikhoidasu aphaba wapao sandokpire; adubu ataba wa adu makhoida tongjade, maramdi haiba tabasingna thajabaga loinana madu lousinde. 

3 Maramdi thajaraba eikhoidi potthaba aduda chang-i; masi Ibungo mahakna haikhibagumbani, haibadi, eina saobada wasakkhibagumna, makhoina eigi potthabada changloi; thabak makhei taibangpal hourakpadagi loikhrabasu masi haire. 

4 Maramdi Ibungo mahakna karigumba maphamda taretnisuba numitki maramda asumna haikhi, amasung iswarna Ibungo mahakki thabak pumnamaktagi taretnisuba numitta potthare. 

5 Asidasu amukka, makhoina eigi potthabada changloi. 

6 Maram aduna kharana potthaba aduda changnaba leiribanina, aduga hanna aphaba wapao sandokpa tarabasingna haiba indabagi maramna changdabanina, 

7 Ibungo mahakna asup kuina leiraga Dayudki mapanna (hanna haikhibagumna), Ngasi nakhoina Ibungo mahakki khonjel taragadi, nakhoi nakhoigi pukning kalhanbiganu; haiduna, ngasi haiba, areppa numit ama Ibungo mahakna amukka kakpi. 

8 Maramdi Jihosuyana makhoida potthaba piramlabadi; ibungo mahakna tungda atoppa numitki maramda nganglamloidabani. 

9 Aduna iswargi misinggi damak potthaba numit leiri; 

10 Maramdi ibungo mahakki potthabada changlaba mahak aduna, iswarna mahakmakki thabaktagi potthabagumna, mahak masanasu mahakki thabaktagi potthajare. 

11 Maram aduna mi kana amatana haiba indabagi pandam adumakki matung inna tadananaba, eikhoina potthaba aduda changnaba ngamba makhei hotnasi. 

12 Maramdi iswargi wadi hingliba, thabak ain kanba, maya ani panba kabakthangdagi henna thouba, hingbaga thawaigabu amasung tangsamga tinggabu khaidokpa phaoba thinba, amasung pukninggi wakhal amasung ningba khangnaba thuba oi. 

13 Amasung semkhraba pot kari amata Ibungo mahakki mangda phongdaba leite, adubu Ibungo mahakki mityengda pot pumnamak khumjindana ihang hangdokna lei, amasung Ibungo mahak adugi maphamda eikhoina maram pigadabani. 

14 Aduna Iswargi macha nipa Jisu, swarga makhei phaodokkhiba achouba purohitlen eikhoigi lei haiduna, eikhoigi haidokchaba adu chetna paisi. 

15 Maramdi eikhoigi ason ana khangminnaba ngamdaba purohitlen eikhoigi leiba natte, adubu eikhoigum maram pumnamakta athemba phanglaba, adumakpu pap yaodaba, purohitlen eikhoigi lei. 

16 Maram aduna nungsibida amasung kannagadaba matamda pangbinaba thoujal eikhoina phangjananaba, thoujan-gi phambal tanna thouna phana naksinjasi.

IBRIYA 5 

1 Maramdi, mahakna papki damak katnaba pot amasung iratpot katnanaba haiduna iswargi oiba thabakta misinggi mahutta misinggi maraktagi louraba purohitlen khudingbu happi. 

2 Mahak masamakpusu asonbana koisinbagi maramna heitasingdabasingga amasung aranbasingga pukning tapthana khangba ngammi; 

3 Amasung asonba asigi maramna misinggi damak katpibagumna, mahak massmakki damaksu papki maramda katchaba tare. 

4 Aduga mi, kana amatana ikaikhumnaba pham adu mahak masamakna loujade, adubu Haronbu koubikhibagnumna, iswarna mahakpusu koubibani. 

5 Adugumduna Khristanasu purohitlen oiraknanaba Ibungo mathantabu thagatchade, adubu Ibungoda, nahakti eigi icha nipani, numit asida eina nahakpu pokpire, haikhiba Ibungo mahaknani. 

6 Ibungo mahakna mapham atei amadasu haikhibagumbani, nahakti Melkisedekki matou matting inna lomba naidaba purohit oi. 

7 Ibungona taibangmi oina pallingeida, sibadagi Ibungobu kanbiba ngamba Ibungo mahakki maphamda kanna kappa amasung pi tabaga loinana haijaba amasung nonjaba katchaduna, aduga iswar kina ningbagi maramna Ibungobu tabiraduna, 

8 Ibungona macha nipa oirabasu awa khangjaba aduna haiba inba tamjare; 

9 Aduga Ibungona changkhonba oiraktuna Ibungogi haiba inbasing pumnamakki damak Ibungona lomba naidaba arankhubamgi thokpham oirakle; 

10 Melkisedekki matougi matung inna iswarna Ibungobu purohitlen mingthol pire.


Khristan punsidi chaokhatpham thok-i


11 Asigi maramda eikhoina haigadaba yamna lei, adubu nakoina taba heitaba oirakpagi maramna wa asi handokpiba lui. 

12 Maramdi matamgi matung inna nakhoidi tambibasing oipham thoklabada, kanagumbana nakhoibu iswargi wagi ahoubagi maru oiba adu amukka tambibana nakhoigi kanagadaba oiri; aduga nakhoidi akanba pot chabadagibudi sanggomchabana kanaba oirakle. 

13 Maramdi sanggomta chariba khudingna dharamachenbagi wagi maramda wakhal tadri; maramdi mahakti angang oiri. 

14 Touigumbasung akanba achapotti mapung pharaba misinggi damakni, makhoina makhoigi indri sijinnabadagi apha-phatta khennanaba sajen toure.

IBRIYA 6 

1 Maram asigidamak Khristagi ahoubagi wa thadoktuna, eikhoina mapung phabaromda inkhatsi; asiba thabaktagi pukning hongbagi, iswaromda thajabagi, 

2 Iruppa makhei gi tambibagi, khut thambibagi, asibasing hinggatpagi amasung lomba naidaba wayel toubagi yumpham amuk hanna thonganusi. 

3 Aduga iswarna yabirabadi, masi eikhoina toujagani. 

4 Maramdi amuk nganbikhraba, swargagi khudon mahao tangkhraba, thawai asengba saruk phangminnaba oihanbikhraba, 

5 Iswargi aphaba wa amasang lakkadaba jugki toungamdaba thabaksing mahao tangkhraba makhoisingna takhraba da, 

6 Makhoibu amuk hanna pukning hongba phaoba nouhanba oithoktabani; maramdi makhoina iswargi macha nipa bu makhoi masagi damak krosta hattuna, Ibungobu iphong phongna ikaihalli; 

7 Maramdi mathakta nong hanna hanna taba adu thaldaba, amasung uribasinggi damak achaba mama masing tholdlanbiba leipak aduna iswardagi bor phangbani. 

8 Adubu tingkhang-langk-hang ngakta houhallabadi, leipak adu yadabani amasung sirap naklabani; madugi arombadi mei thabani. 

9 Touigumbasung, achanbasa, eikhoina asumna nganglabasu, nakhoigi maramda henna phaba amasung aran khubamgi oiba adu eikhoina thajei; 

10 Maramdi iswarna nakhoigi thabak amasung nungsiba kaonaba dharmachendaba natte; nakhoina asengbasingbu thougan toukhraba amasung touriba aduna Ibungo mahakki minglomda nungsiba adu utpire. 

11 Aduga nakhoina tandaduna, thajaba amasung khangheibagi mapanna waleppa adu phangjaba makhoi adugi matou loubasing oinanaba, 

12 Nakhoi mi khudingna mamei phaoba khourangna ningba mapung phana khangba tanna pukning changba adumak nakhoina utpa eikhoina pambani.


Iswargi warepna khourangna ningba pokhanbi


13 Maramdi Iswarna Abrahamda waleppa matamda, wasakpa da pannanaba henna chaoba kana amatagi ming leitabagi maramna, Ibungo masamakki ming panjaduna wasaklak-i, 

14 Soidana eina nangonda bor pisu pibigani, aduga yamsu yamhanbigani. 

15 Amasung asum touna mahakna khangheina khangjare hairaga, waleppa adu phangjare. 

16 Maramdi misingna henna chaobagi ming panduna wasaknei, aduga chet-hannabagi damak wasakpana makhoigi ningai tounaba khudingda loinei. 

17 Asumna Iswarna Ibungo mahakki wakhan-gi hongba yadaba adubu waleppa adu phangbasingda henna yamna utningduna Ibungo mahakna wasakpana taisille; 

18 Changjapham phangnabagi damak chellaba eikhoina eikhoigi mangda leiba khourangna ningba adu painaba hongba yadaba thabak anigi mapanna (maduda iswarna chinthiba oithoktabani) eikhoi kanna thougatpa phangjananabani. 

19 Eikhoina phangjaba khourangna ningba asi thawaigi longgorgumbani, masimakna aoiba, achetpa amasung maikhanphi manungda leiba aduda changbani. 

20 Maikhanphi manungda leiba aduda Jisuna Melkisedekki matou matung inna lomba naidaba purohitlen oiraktuna, eikhoigi damak mangthaba oina changbire.

IBRIYA 7 

Jisudi Melkisedekki matougumba purohitlenni


1 Maramdi Salemgi ningthou, ihenhenba iswargi purohit oiba, ningthousingbu hatlubadagi hallkpa Abrahambu oknaduna bor pibikhiba, 

2 Abrahamna pumnamakki saruk taragi ama tamkhiba (maming handokpada, ahanbada dharamachenbagi ningthou, aduga matungda Salemgisu ningthou, haibadi ingthabagi ningthou; 

3 Mapa mama, paron puron leitaba, mahakki hourakpa numit amasung pallambagi aroiba leitaba, adubu iswargi macha nipagum oihallamba) Melkisedek asina itattattana pur-ohit oina leiri. 

4 Houjik mi asi kayada chaoriba khallu. Mangonda sageigi piba Abrahamna mullakpa athoiba pottagi saruk taragi ama pire. 

5 Amasung purokitki pham phangba Lebigi macha nipasingmakna wayel yathanggi matung inna misingdagi, habadi Abrahamgi dhara oirabasu machin manaosing saruk taragi ama lounanaba yathang phangle. 

6 Adubu makhoigiga mihourol tinnadaba mahak aduna Abrahamgagi saruk taragi ama loure, aduga waleppa phangba mahak adubu bor pibire. 

7 Touigumbasung henna chaobana apikpabu bor pi hhaibasi kanagumbana ningai touningai liete, 

8 Aduga asidadi sigadaba misingna saruk taragi ama phang-i, adubu madu-dana hing-i haiba sakshi leiba mahak adu phang-i. 

9 Amasung asum hainaba yai, saruk taragi ama phangba Lebimakna Abrahamgi mapanna saruk taragi ama pire; 

10 Maramdi Melkisedekna Abrahambu oknaba matamda Lebidi mapagi puknungda leirambani. 

11 Amahiksung lebi salaidagi purohit oiba adugi mapanna changkhonba oiramlabadi (Maramdi purohit oiba aduda misingna wayel yathang phangle), Haron-gi matou matung inna masing chandaba atoppa purohit ama, Melkisedekki matou matung inna thoklakpagi kari amuk henna kannaba leirambano? 

12 Maramdi purohit oiba adu honglabada, wayel yathangsu hongba kannabamakni: 

3 Maramdi atoppa salai oiba mi amagi maramda waramsing asi hairibani; salai adudagi mi kana amatana latnapungda thougan toude. 

14 Maramdi Jihuda salaidagi eikhoigi Prabhu thoklakle haiba teseng tasengbani; salai adugi maramda Mousina Purothitsinggi marida kari amata ngangkhide. 

15 Amasung Melki sedekka mannaba atoppa purohit ama thoklaklabadi, eikhoina hairiba asi amuk henna yamna taseng tasengbani; 

16 Ibungosidi hakchanggi oiba yathanggi hounabi matung inna natte, adubu lomdaba hingbagi panggal matung inna purohit oirakle. 

17 Maramdi masi sakshini, nahakti Melkisedekki matou matung inna lomba naidana purohit oi. 

18 Maramdi mamangngeigi yathang adu sonba amasung kannadabagi maramna kakthatpani. 

19 (Maramdi wayel yathangna karisu changkhonhande), aduga henna phaba khourangna ningbabu pusinbirakpani; madugi mapanna eikhoina iswargi maphamda naksinjarakpani. 

20 Amasung masi wasakpa yaodana oide. 

21 Makhoidi wasakpa yaodana purohit oirakpani; adubu Ibungo mahakna Ibungoda hai, Prabhuna wasakle, amasung pukning hongloi, nahakti lomba naidaba purohit oi; 

22 Asumna Jisudi wasakpaga loinana purohit amasung henna phaba walepnabagi tasengba oirakle. 

23 Amasung makhoidi purohit oiba yamlaklabani, maramdi sibana makhoibu tattana leibadagi thingbanani. 

24 Adubu Ibungodi lomba naidana leiba maramna tattaba purohit pham phangle. 

25 Maram adugi damak Ibungogi mapanna iswargi maphamda naksillakpasingbu Ibungona changkhonba kanbibasu ngammi, maramdi Ibungodi makhoigi damak wa nombinanaba tattana hinglibani. 

26 Maramdi asigumba asengba, lingjel chumba, amakpa leitaba, papchenbasingdagi khaidoklaba amasung atiyadagi henna wanghallaba purohitlen eikhoigi damak matik chabani. 

27 Purohitlensing aduna ahanbada makhoi masa masagi papki damak, aduga tungda misinggi damak numit khuding iratpot katchabagumna, Ibungogidi kannaba leite; maramdi Ibungona masa mathantabu katthokchabada, asi amuktada tourabani. 

28 Maramdi sonna leiba misingbu wayel yathangna purohitlen hap-i, adubu wayel yathanggi matungda thokpa wasakpagi wa aduna lomba naidana changkhollaba macha nipa adubu ,pham hap-i.

IBRIYA 8 

Khristagi purohit phamdi jihudisinggi purohit phamdagi henna chaobani


1 Amahiksung hairiba wa asina athoiba maram asini; swargada matik mangal chaobagi phambangi yetta phamba, 

2 Asengba maphamgi amasung, mina nattana, Prabhuna khangatpa achumba phijang adugi thougan touba, asigumba purohitlen eikhoina phangjare. 

3 Maramdi purohitlen khudingbu khudonsu iratpotsu katnanaba pham happani; maram asina purohitlen asigisu karigumba katnaba leiba tare. 

4 Ibungona aoibamak prithibida leiramlabadi, wayel yathanggi matung inna khudon katpasing leibanina, Ibungona purohit oiramloidabani. 

5 Makhoi asidi swargada leiba potki pandam amasung mami oiba adu khanjabani; masi Mousina phijang adu saramdaida iswarna mangonda takpikhibagumbani; maramdi Ibungo mahakna hai, nangonda chingda utpikhiba maong adugi matung inna pot pumnamak sananaba nahakna yeng-u. 

6 Adubu houjikti Ibungona henna phaba ayamba waleppagi mathakta wayel oihallaba henna phaba walepnabagi tainabibasu oiba adupki makhei, Ibungona thoina henna phaba thougan phangjare. 

7 Maramdi ahanba walepnaba aduna lallamdrabadi, anisuba gi damak mapham thiramloidabani. 

8 Maramdi makhoigi aranba puthoktuna, Ibungo mahakna hai, Prabhuna hai, yeng-u matam lakli, matam aduda Israyelgi imungga amasung Jihudagi imungga loinana anouba walepnaba eina semgani. 

9 Eina makhoibu Misor leibaktagi makhut paiduna chingthoklakpa nutnit aduda eina makhoigi mapa mapusingga loinana semkhiba walepnaba adugi matting inna oiroi; maramdi makhoina eigi walepnabada tattana leiramde, aduna eina makhoibu ningbidre, Prab-huna hai, 

10 Maramdi matam adugi matungda, eina Israyelgi imungga loinana semgadaba walepnaba adu asini, Prabhuna hai, eina eigi wayel makhei makhoigi pukningda thambigani, aduga makhoigi thamoidasu eina madu isinbigani; amasung eina makhoigi Iswar oigani, aduga makhoina eigi mi oigani. 

11 Amasung, Prabhubu khang-u, haiduna makhoi mi khudingna magi magi machin manaobu suptam tambiroi, maramdi makhoi pumnamakna apisaktagi achouba phaobana eibu ikhang khanggani. 

12 Marmdi eina makhoigi ayol aranda thoujanbigani, amasung makhoigi pap eina amuk hanna ningsingbiroi. 

13 Ibungo mahakna, Anouba Walepnaba, haibada ahanba adu ariba oihalle. adubu lirakpa amasung henna mantharakpa aduna mangkhigadaba nak-i.

IBRIYA 9 

Ariba asengba mapham adudi anouba asengba maphamgi khudamni


1 Amahiksung ahanba walepnaba adumakki iswargi thougan-gi hounabi amasung taibangpan-gi oiba asengba mapham leirammi. 

2 maramdi phijang ama langkhre; madugi ahanba ka adugi manungda thaomei makhong, mej amasung aut-tal leirammi; mapham adudu asengba mapham kou-i. 

3 Amasung anisuba maikhanphigi maningda asengba pumnamaktagi asengba kouba phijang leirammi; 

4 Maduda sanagi dhup thanapung, amasung mathakta sanana pumyom yomba walepnabagi upu leirammi; upu manung aduda manna happa sanagi chaphu, mayol chongba Hawn-gi chei, amasung walepnabagi nunggi korbak leirammi; 

5 Amasung madugi mathakta matik mangan-gi kharub anima nungsibiba-phal adu lum-sillammi; pot pumnamak asigi maramda eikhoina houjik makup tana ngangba ngamde. 

6 Amahiksung pumnamak asi asumna langle hairaga, purohitsingna Prabhuda thougan tounaba ahanba phijang manungda tattana chang-i; 

7 Adubu anisubagi manungdadi purohitlen mathanta chahigi amukte chang-i; mahak masamakki damak amasung misinggi aranbagi damak katchaba i adu yaodana changde. 

8 Thawai asengbana asi uhanbiri, haibadi, ahanba phijang adu khanduna leiringeida, asengba pumnamaktagi asengba maphamda changnaba lambi adu houjik phongdokpidri. 

9 Phijang asi houjikki matamgi damak pandam oiri; pandam asigi matung inna khudonsu iratpotsu katlibani, madusingna latliba migi achum aran khangnaba pukning chang-khonhanba ngamde; 

10 Maramdi madusing adu acha-athakkita, tongan tonganba luthokchabagita, haibadi phananaba hongbagi matam oidriba phaoba ngakpham thokpa hakchanggi oiba hounabita oibanani.


Sengdokpagi matik leiba amasung changdamningai kitaba Khristagi


11 Touigumbasung Khristana henna chaoba amasung henna changkhonaba phijang khutna sadaba, haibadi leisemgi pot asi nattaba, adugi mapanna oikhraba aphaba maram pumnamakki purohitlen oina laktuna, 

12 Hameng amasung sangi igi mapanna nattana, Ibungomakki igi mapanna lomba naidaba handokpiba phangladuna amukta asengba maphamda changle, 

13 Maramdi hameng amasung sallabagi ina, aduga sengdabasinggi mathakta sanhatamgi ut chaiduna hakchang sengnaba sengdoklabadi, 

14 Lomba naidaba thawaigi mapanna iswargi maphamda amakpa leitana masamak katcharaba Khrista adugi i aduna, hingliba iswarbu thougan toujananaba, asiba thabaktagi eikhoigi achum-aran khangnaba pukning-bu kayamuk henna sengdokpigaba 

15 Amasung maram asigi damak, ahanba walepnabagi makhada leiramba ayol arandagi handokpibagi damak amana sibagi maramna koubirabasingna lomba naidaba phangpham thokpagi waleppa adu phangnanaba, Ibungodi anouba walepnabagi tainabibani. 

16 Maramdi sinanaba leiba aduda, madu semkhraba mi aduna siba thokpa tare. 

17 Maramdi siba thoklabada sinanaba chetli, maramdi asemba mi adu hinglingeida madu kadoungeidasu panggal thokte. 

18 Maram adugi damak ahanba walepnaba adu i yaodana lingkhatkhide. 19 Maramdi wayel yathang matung inna Mousina yathang khuding mi pumnamakta ngangkhiba matamda, mahakna sal amasung hamenggi i adu, isingga, angangba sa matuga hisopka louraga lairik adudasu mising pumnamaktasu khikpiduna hai, 

20 Asi Iswarna nakhoiromda yathang piraba walepnabagi i aduni. 

21 Aduga phijang adusu thougan-gi phu pumnamak adusu mahakna matou adugumna i aduna khikle. 

22 Amasung wayel yathang matung inna pot pumnamak inna sengdok-i haiba mayai, aduga i taba nattana kokpipham leite. 

23 Maram aduna swargada leiba potki pandam oibasingbu asisingna sengdokpa tarammi, adubu swargada leiba pot adumakti asisingdagi henna phaba iratpot chang-i. 

24 Maramdi achumbagi maong oiba, khutna saba asengba maphamda Khristana changde; adubu swargamakta eikhoigi damak iswargi mangda uhanjaba Ibungona changbani. 

25 Aduga purohitlenna asengba maphamda chahi khuding tnasamaldci nattaba i yaona changbagumna, Ibungonadi masa mathantabu toina katchananaba changba natte; 

26 Aduoirabadi, Ibungona taibangpal houngeidagi toina awa khanglamgadabani. Touigumbasung houjikti jugki aroibada Ibungona masamakpu iratthokpagi mapanna pap langseknanaba amuktang phongbire. 

27 Amasung taibangmina amuk siba, aduga asigi matungda wayenba thokkadaba areppani, 

28 Adugumduna Khristanasu ayamba migi pap pubinaba amuktang masamakpu katcharaga aran khubamgi damak Ibungobu ngaijaribasingda pap yaodana anisuba matamda uhanbigani.

IBRIYA 10 

Khristana mathawai katthokkhiba asina wayel yathanggi oiba balidagi thoihenbani


1 Maramdi wayel yathangdi lakkadaba aphaba potki murtimak nattaduna, pot adugi mamita oibanina, makhoina tattana katchaba, chahi khudinggi mannaba iratpot aduna naksinjarakpasingbu kadoungeidasu chankhonhanba ngamde; 

2 Maduna ngamlabadi, iswar khurumjabasingbu amukta sengdoklaga, mapap khangjaba karisu amuk hanna leiroidabani haiba maramna, iratpot adu katpa toklamloidra? 

3 Touigumbasung iratpot pumnamak aduna chahi khuding papki maramda ningsinghanba lei. 

4 Maramdi sallabagi amasung hamenggi ina pap louthokpa sukngam ngamde. 

5 Maram adugi damak Ibungona taibangpanda lenglaktuna hai, iratpot amasung katnaba pot Ibungo nahakna pamdre, touigumbasung Ibungo nahakna eigi damak hakchang langbire; 

6 Mapum oina mei thaduna katpa amasung papki damak iratpa potta Ibungo nahakna pendre. 

7 Aduda eina hai, yeng-biyu, lairik makol aduda eigi maramda ire, he iswar, Ibungo nahakki ningba toujananaba ei lakchabani. 

8 Iratpa, kapta, mapum oina mei thaduna katpa, amasung papki damak iratpa Ibungo nahakna pamde amasung maduda pende haiba mathakta haikhre (Masising wayel yathanggi matung inna katpani) 

9 Maduda Ibungona hai, yeng-biyu, Ibungo nahakki ningba adu toujananaba ei lakchabani. 

10 Ibungona anisuba adu lingkhatnanaba, ahanba adu louthok-i. Ningba aduna eikhoibu Jisu Khristagi kakchang adu amukta katpiba adugi mapanna sengdokpire. 

11 Amasung Purohit khudingna numit khuding thougan touduna, aduga chap mannaba iratpot adu toina katchaduna lep-i. Iratpot asina pap kadoungeidasu louthokpa ngamde; 

12 Adubu Ibungonadi papki damak iratpot amatang lomba naidabagi damak katlaga, iswargi yetta phamle; 

13 Matam adudagi Ibungogi yeknabasingbu Ibungogi khonggi khutnet oihandriba phaoba ngaiduna lei. 

14 Maramdi Ibungona katpa amatangna sengdokpibasingbu lomba naidabagi damak changkhonhanbire. 

15 Amasung thawai asengbanasu eikhoida sakshi pi, maramdi, 

16 Matam adugi matungda eina nakhoiga loinana semgadaba walepnaba adu asini, Prabhuna hai: eina eigi wayel makhei makhoigi thamoida thambigani, aduga makhoigi pukningdasu eina madu isinbigani, Ibungo mahakna asi haiba matungda, Ibungo mahakna hai, 

17 Amasung eina makhoigi pap aduga makhoigi ayol aral amuk hanna ningsingbiroi. 

18 Aduna asisingbu kokpiba leiba mapham aduda, papki damak amuk hanna katpa leite.


Thougatpa amasung mitna singhanba


19 Maram aduna, ichin inaosa, Jisugi igi mapanna, Ibungona eikhoigi damak semggatpiba anouba amasung hingliba lambi, 

20 Maikhanphi aduda, haibadi Ibungogi hakchangda, lambi oiduna, 

21 Asengba maphamda changnanaba eikhoigi thouna phaba amasung iswargi imunggi mathakta achouba purohit leiduna, 

22 Eikhoigi phattaba achum-aran khangnaba pukningdagi thamoibu i khikpiduna, aduga eikhoigi hakchang asengba isingna luthokpiduna, eikhoina mapung phaba thajabana achumba thamoiga loinana naksinjasi; 

23 Lengdana eikhoigi khourangna ningba haidokchaba adu chetna paisi; maramdi walepnakhiba mahak adu thajaba yabani; 

24 Aduga amana amabu nungsiba amasung aphaba thabaklomda ichang thouhannanaba eikhoi wakhal tounasi; 

25 Mi kharagi hounabi oibagumna, eikhoi isen tinnajaba thadoktaduna, eikhoi amana amabu thougatnasi; aduga numit adu naksillakpa nakhoina ubagumna adupki makhei henna tousi. 

26 Maramdi eikhoina achumbabu khangba adu phanglaba matungda khangna khangna pap tourabadi, papki damak amuk hanna iratpa leihoude, 

27 Adubu wayen-gi karigumba kina ngaijaba amasung yeknabasingbu tumhan-gadaba meichak akanba leihou-i. 

28 Mousigi wayel yathangbu thouoi-usittaba mina sakshi ani ahumgi wada chanbiba yaodana sinei. 

29 Iswargi macha, nipabu khongna netpa, mahakpu sengdokpikhiba walepnaba adugi ibu sengdaba potni singthanaba, amasung thoujangi thawai adubu maithina thuba mi adubu kaya henna phattaba wakong phangba matik chagadibani haina nakhoina ningbano? 

30 Maramdi, khutkhumba eigini, eina matik okpa pigani, aduga amukka, Prabhuna Ibungo mahakki misingbu wayen-gani, haikhiba Ibungo mahakpu eikhoina khang-i. 

31 Hingliba iswargi khutta taba akiba masakni.


Tattana thounaphanaba insinbiba


32 Touigumbasung nakhoibu ngalhanbikhiba matungda, nakhoina awa anang khangbagi kanna soknaba khang-khiba mamangngeigi numit makhei adu ningsing-u; 

33 Matam amada paothok panasu awabanasu nakhoibu kummei oihalli, aduga matam amada asumna laknaba phangbasingga nakhoi saruk phangminnaba oirakle. 

34 Maramdi nakhoina phadoksingga awa khangminnare, aduga nakhoigi damak henna phaba amasung lengdana leiba pot lei haiba nakhoina khangduna, nakhoigi pot munthokkhiba adu haraona yajare. 

35 Maram aduna achouba matik okpa mana phanggadaba nakhoigi thouna phaba hunjekkanu. 

36 Maramdi nakhoina iswargi ningba adu toure hairaga, waleppa adu phangnanaba, nakhoina khangba kannabani. 

37 Maramdi houjik matam khara leiraga, lenglakliba Ibungona lenglakkani, aduga thillakloi. 

38 Touigumbasung eigi dharmachenba mi thajabadagi hinggani, amasung mahakna ninghannarabadi eigi thawaina mangonda penba leite. 

39 Touigumbasung eikhoidi mangba tanna ninghannabagi natte, adubu thawai ngaknaba phaoba thajabagini.

IBRIYA 11 

Thajabada phaoraba mising


1 Thajabadi khourangna ningba potki areppani, aduga udaba potki maramda wakhal tarabani, 

2 Maramdi masida ahansingna masa masagi maramda aphaba sakshi phangle. 

3 Iswargi waheina taibangpanbabu semle, aduna uriba pot adu uba ngamba pottagi oirakpa natte haiba, thajabana eikhoina khang-i. 

4 Thajabana Hebalna Kayindagi iswargi maphamda thoihenba iratpot katle; asigi mapanna iswarna mahakki khudon-gi mathakta sakshi piduna, mahak dharmachenbani haiba masana sakshi phangle; aduga thajaba asigi mapanna mahakna sikhrabasu houjik phaoba ngangli. 

5 Thajabana Hanokna siba udananaba mahakpu pukhatpire; aduga iswarna mahakpu pukhatpikhiba maranma mahakpu phangdre; maramdi mahakpu pukhatpidringeida iswarbu mahakna pelhalle haiba sakshi phangle. 

6 Amasung thajaba yaodanadi Ibungo mahakpu pelhanba ngamde; maramdi iswargi maphamda naksinjarakpa mina iswar lei amasung Ibungo mahakpu thijabasingda mana pibiba mapuni haiba thajaba tare. 

7 Thajabana Nohana udriba thabakki marida mitna singhanbiba phangduna, iswar kina ningbagi maranma, mahakki imung kannanaba hijao ama sare; asigi mapanna mahkna taibangpanbabu lalhalle amasung thajabagi matung inna oiriba dharamachenbagi yumlepchara oirakle. 

8 Thajabana Abrahamna, mahakpu kourabada, phangpham thokpa phanggadouriba mapham adu tanna chatthoknanaba haiba ille; aduga mahakna kadaida chatkadaba khangdaduna chatthoklak-i. 

9 Thajabana mahakna mahakmakki lam nattabagumna, waleppagi lamda lamlanba oiraktuna, waleppa adumakki yumlepchara oiminnaba Isahakka amasung Jakobka loinana phiyumda palle. 

10 Maramdi mahakna yumpham leiba, iswarna sasu saba semsu semba sahar adugi damak ngaijarammi. 

11 Thajabana Saramakna su chahi matung lankhrabada mironnanaba panggal phangle, maramdi waleppiba Ibungo mahakpu thajaba yabani haina mahakna singthanare. 

12 Maram adugi damak amadagi, mahaksu sirabagum oirabada, masingda atiyagi thawanmichakkum amasung masing thiba ngamdaba samadru mapanda leiba leingoigum chongthokle. 

13 Makhoi pumnamak asina waleppa makhei adu phangkhide, adubu athappadagi madusingbu usu ujaduna, khurumsu khurumjaduna, amasung makhoidi prithibida mireibak macha amasung lamlanbani haidoktuna thajana sire. 

14 Maramdi asumna hairiba makhoina makhoimakki mareibak oinaba thijari haiba phongdokpani. 

15 Amasung makhoina thoklakpa mareibak adu ningsinglamlabadi, maduda amuk hannanabagi khudongchaba makhoina phanglamgadabani. 

16 Adubu houjikti makhoina henna phaba mareibak, haibadi swargagi oiba adubu khourangjabani. Maram adugi damak makhoigi iswarni haina koubada iswarna makhoigi damak sahar ama thourang toubire. 

17 Abrahambu chang yengbada thajabana mahakna Isahakpu katchare, aduga waleppa makhei adubu haraona phangjaraba mahak aduna mahakki amata ngaiba macha nipa bu katthoklammi. 

18 Macha asigi marida wa asi haibadi Isahaktagi nahakki dhara kougani, haikhi. 

19 Iswarna asibasingdagi phaoba hinggathanba ngammi haiba mahakna khalle; madudagisu mahakna pandam oina mabu amuk hanna phangjare. 

20 Thajabana Isahakna thoklagadaba adugi maridasu Jakob amasung Esoubu bor pibire. 

21 Thajabana Jakobna siramdaida Jousephki macha nipa khudingbu bor pibire; aduga mahakki cheisu matonda ngajaduna iswarbu khurumjare. 

22 Thajabana Jousephna mapunsi loiramdaida, Israyelgi machasingna chatthokkadabagi maramda ningsingduna, mahakki lugi maramda yathang pire. 

23 Mousibu poklaga, thajabana mahakpu mama mapana tha ahum lotlammi, maramdi mahak phajaba angangni haiba makhoina ure; aduga makhoina ningthougi yathang adubu kiramde. 

24 Thajabana Mousina chaoraklabada Pharoun-gi mach nupigi macha nipani haina kouba yaramde; 25 Adugi mahutta matam kharagi damak papki nungngaiba phangbadagibudi, iswargi misingga loinana awa anang saruk phangminnaba mahakna khandokle; 26 Misorgi lanthumdagibudi Khristagi maithibana henna luba lanni haina singthanare; maramdi mahakna matik okpa mana adu yengjarambani. 

27 Thajabana mahakna ningthougi meihouna saoba adu kidaduna Misor thadokle; maramdi uba ngamdaba Ibungo mahakpu mahakna ubangumna khangle. 

28 Hanna pokpasingbu manghanba aduna makhoibu soktananaba, thajabana mahakna aran-chakkhangba amasung i khikpa adu semgatle. 

29 Thajabana makhoina angangba samadru adugi mayaida kangphangumna lanthokle; Misorgi misingna madu touge hotnabada samadruna makhoibu lak-hatkhre. 

30 Thajabana Jerikhogi pal adu numit taretni koisillaba matungda kinthare. 

31 Thajabana oktabi Rahabna lanjabasingbu chikna lousinbiba maramna, haiba indabasingga loinana mahakna mangminnakhide. 

32 Amahiksung eina henna kari haiga-dage? Maramdi Gidiyon-gi, Barakki, Simson-gi, Jiphathagi, Dayudki, amasung Samuyelgi aduga iswargi wa takthokpasinggi maram eina tamlabadi, eigi matam leiroi. 

33 Makhoising asina thaja-bagi mapanna ningthou panba leibaksingbu khudum challe, dharmachenba thabak toure, waleppa phangle, nongsasinggi machin khamle, 

34 Meigi panggal muthalle, kabakthang mayadagi hinglakle, asonbadagi kallakle, landa khutkan panggallakle, mireibakki lanmisingbu tanthokle. 

35 Nupisingna makhoi makhoigi asibasingbu hinggatpagi mapanna phangjare. Atei ateisingna henna phaba hinggatpa phangnanaba, thadokpiba yajadabadagi laknaba phangle; 

36 Amasung ateisingna noknabagi aduga thina yeibagi, hoi, amuk henna punsu punbagi, keisumsangda tasu tabagi chang yengba khangle. 

37 Makhoibu nungna thare, makhoibu lenkhaire, makhoibu themdokle, makhoibu kabakthangna hatle; makhoina yao amasung hamenggi maun settuna koichat chatle; makhoina nangduna awaba khangduna, ot-neiba pliangduna. 

38 (Makhoi adugi damak taibangpansi matik chaba natte), lamhangda, chingda, chingnunghutta amasung leikhunda koichat chatle. 

39 Amasung makhoigi thajabagi mapanna makhoi pumnamak asigi maramda sakshi phanglabasu, makhoina waleppa adudi phangkhide; 

40 Maramdi eikhoi yaodana makhoi changkhonba oidananaba iswarna eikhoigi maramda karigumba henna phaba pot langbire.

IBRIYA 12 

Jisudi thajabagi athoiba khudamni; iswarna warakpibagi maram


1 Maram aduna eikhoibu ikoi koisilliba asup chaoba leichingumba sakshising leibagi maramna, eikhoinasu arumba khuding, amasung eikhoibu ilai laina yetliba pap adu hunjeksi, 

2 Amasung eikhoigi thajabagi mapu amasung changkhonhanbiba Jisubu yengduna, eikhoigi mangda leiriba lamjen adu khangbaga lonana chensi. Ibungogi mangda leiba haraoba adugi damak Ibungona ikaibabu usittaduna kros adu khanglaga, iswargi phambalgi jetta phamle. 

3 Maramdi nakhoina nakhoigi thawai tukthaduna wadananaba, Ibungo-makki mathakta papchenbasinggi asup wa khetpa khanglaba Ibungobu wakhal khallu. 

4 Nakhoina houjik phaoba papka maioknana soknaduna i taba phaoba khamdri; 

5 Aduga macha nipasingga loinabagumna nakhoiga loinana wakhal tounaba insinbiba adu nakhoina kaore, haibadi, he icha nipa, Prabhuna lakpa tayang tayangna ningganu; aduga nangbu Ibungo mahakna warakpa matamda tukthaganu; 

6 Maramdi Prabhuna nungsiba mibu lakpi, aduga Ibungo mahakna yaba macha nipa khudingbu cheirak pi. 

7 Nakhoina khangba adu lakpagi damakni; Iswarna macha nipasingda chatpagumna nakhoida machat chatpi; maramdi mapana laktaba macha nipa kana leibage? 

8 Touigumbasung pumnamakna saruk phangminnaraba lakpa yaodaba nakhoina oirabadi, maduda nakhoina macha napasing oidaduna, lamjasing sing oi. 

9 Amukka eikhoibu lakpiba mioibagi ipasing leirammi, aduga eikhoina makhoibu ikaikhumnarammi. Eikhoina kaya henna eikhoigi thawaigi ipa adugi makha ponduna hingloidra? 

10 Maramdi makhoina phei haibagi matung inna numit kharagi damak eikhoibu laklammi, adubu eikhoina Ibungo mahakki asengbagi saruk phangminnanaba eikhoigi tongjanabagi damak Ibungo mahakna lakpire. 

11 Lakpa pumnamak khudak adugi damak haraonanaba ude, adubu awabani; touigumbasung matungdadi madugi mapanna sajen toujaba phangbasingda ingthabagi mahei, haibadi dharamachenbagi mahei, pibi. 

12 Maram adugi damak lektharaba khut amasung sitharaba khuk-u tingkhatlu; 

13 Aduga khongtekpana lambida makhong leithoktaduna phaba oinanaba nakhoina nakhoigi khonggi damak achumba lambi sem-u.


Insinbiba amasung mitna singhanba


14 Mi punmamakka ingthana leinabagi amasung sengdokpibagi matung tallu; sengdokpibasi yaodana kana amatana Prabhubu uroi. 

15 Kanagumbana iswargi thoujandagi sothadananaba, karigumba akhaba mara chongthoklaktuna nakhoibu otpana mi ayambabu mothandananaba, 

16 Amasung kanagumba marumbi thamba nattraga mahakmakki hanna pokpagi phangpham thokpa adu chara nammada yonthokkhiba Esougumba amangba mi leitananaba, cheksinna yeng-u. 

17 Maramdi nakhoina khang-i, haibadi, matungda Esouna bor adu phangninglabada mahakpu yabidre, maramdi mahakna pi tana karma thijarabasu pukning hongba mapham phangjadre.


Taibangpan-gi oiba Siyonga swargagi oiba Siyon-ga khennaba


18 Maramdi sokpa yaba amasung mei chakliba chingda, amubada, amambada, nongnungsitta, 

19 Peresinggagi makhonda, amasung waheigi khonjenda nakhoina naksillakpa natte; khonjel adu tarabasingna amuk wahei kari amata makhoida ngangbidananaba nonjare; 

20 Maramdi sa phaoba ching adu soklabadi, nungna thaduna hatkadabani haina yathang sinnaba adu makhoina khangba ngamlamde; 

21 Aduga auba adu asup kiba masak oirammi, madudi Mousina hai, eina thoidokna kiduna niki. 

22 Touigumbasung Siyon chingda amasung hingliba Iswargi sahar, swargagi Jerusalemda, masing naidaba swargadutsingda, 

23 Swargada ming chankhraba ahanba pokpasinggi mayam tinnaba amasung singlupta, pumnamakki wayel mapu iswarda, changkhollaba dharmachenba misinggi thawaida, 

24 Anouba walepnabagi tainabiba Jisuda amasung Hebalgi idagi henna phaba wa ngangthokpa khiknaba ida, nakhoina naksillaklabani. 

25 Ngangbiriba Ibungobu nakkoina yadaba toudanada cheksillu. Maramdi prithibida makhoibu mitna singhanbiba mahakpu makhoina yadabada hinghoudrabadi, swargadagi mitna singhanbiba Ibungo mahaktagi eikhoina leithoklabada, amuk kaya henna hingloi-dabano. 

26 Matam aduda Ibungo mahakki khonjenna prithibida nikhalle; adubu houjikti, eihakna amukka prithibibuta nikhandaduna swargabasu nikhangani, haiduna Ibungo mahakna waleple. 

27 Amasung, amukka wa asi haibana niktaba pot adu leihounanaba, semkhraba potkumna niklaba pot hongdokpa uhalli. 

28 Maram adugi damak, nikpa ngamdaba ningthou leibak phangjaduna, eikhoina ikaikhumnaba amasung kina ningbaga loinana Iswargi maphamda apenba thougan katchananaba eikhoina thoujal phangjasi; 

29 Maramdi eikhoigi Iswardi tumhanba meini.

IBRIYA 13 

Aphaba tounaba insinbiba; lamjingbasingda luna touba


1 Machin manaosing nungsinaba tattaba oisanu. 

2 Lamlanbasing da nungsiba utpa kaoganu, maramdi asum toubana kana kanagumbana ikhang khangdana swargadutsingbu thunghalle. 

3 Phadoksingbu makhoiga phadok oiminnabagum ningsing-u; ot-neiba phangbasingbu nakhoi nasanasu hakchang panbanina ningsing-u. 

4 Luhongba haibasi pumnamakki marakta ikaikhumngsanu, aduga phamung mangdasanu; maramdi iswarna marumbi thambasingbu amasung nupi lannabasingbu wayen-gani. 

5 Nakhoigi nachat natouda sen pamdaba oisanu; nakhoi nakhoigi leijaba aduna penba oiyu; maramdi Ibungo mahakna hai, eina nangbu karisu sothahalloi, aduga eina nangbu khak thadokloi. 

6 Aduna eikhoina thouna phana hai, Prabhudi eigi pangbiba mapuni, ei kiroi; mina eingonda kari touragadage? 

7 Nakhoigi nathakta pannaramba, nakhoida Iswaargi wa ngangthokpiramba misingbu ningsing-u; aduga makhoigi punsigi mahei adu wakhal khanduna, makhoigi thajabagi matou lou. 

8 Jisu Khristadi ngarangsu, ngasisu, lomba naidaba matam phaobasu iman mannana lei. 

9 Tongan tonganba amasung onthok onthokpa tambibana nakhoibu puthokhankhiganu; maramdi thamoibu achapot nattana, thoujanna, chethanba phabani; achapot asigi matting inna chatpana makhoigi tongjade. 

10 Eikhoigi latnapung ama lei, phijangbu thougan touribasingna madudagi chaba matik leite. 

11 Maramdi papki damak katnanaba purohitlenna asengba maphamgi manungda pusinkhiba i adugi sasinggi masa makhei adu tenggolgi mapanda mei thadok-i, 

12 Maram adugi damak Jisunasu, Ibungomakki igi mapanna misingbu sengdokpinanaba, panthonggi mapanda awa khangle. 

13 Maram aduna eikhoina Ibungogi maithiba pujaduna tenggolgi mapanda Ibungogi mapham tanna chatthoksi. 

14 Maramdi asida eikhoigi lengdaba sahar leite, adubu lakkadaba sahar adu eikhoina thijabani. 

15 Ibungogi mapanna iswargi maphamda tattana thagatchabagi bali, haidadi, Ibungo mahakki mingda haidokchaba chinban-gi mahei adu, eikhoina katchasi. 

16 Touigumbasung aphaba touba amasung puminnaba kaobiganu, maramdi asigumba bali asina iswarbu pelhalli 

17 Nakhoigi nathakta pannaribasinggi haiba illu, aduga makhoigi makha pollu; maramdi maram pigadabasinggumna, makhoina thawai wadaduna haraobaga loinana asi tounanaba, nakhoi nakhoigi thawaigi damakta mitseng khangbi; maramdi makhoina thawai waraba di, nakhoigi damak tongjadabani.


Khaina-wa


18 Eikhoigi damak haijabiyu, maramdi maram pumnamakta chumna chatningduna, eikhoigi phajaba achum-aran khangnaba pukning lei haiba eikhoina thajei. 

19 Amasung eibu nakhoida henna thuna hallakhannanaba, nakhoibu asi toubinaba eina thoidok hendokna insinjabani. 

20 Houjik lomba naidaba walepnabagi i adugi matikna yaosinggi achouba asenba mapu, eikhoig Prabhu Jisu adubu asibasinggi maraktagi pukhatpiba, 

21 Ingthabagi Iswar aduna Jisu Khristagi mapanna Ibungo mahakki mit, yengda apenba oiba adu eikhogi nungda toubiduna, Ibungo mahakki ningba tounanaba aphaba thabak khudingda nakhoibu changkhonhanbisanu; Ibungoda lomba naidana thagatpa oisanu. Amen. 

22 Touigumbasung eina nakhoibu insinjari, ichin inaosa, insinba wa adu khangbiyu, maramdi eina nakhoida wahei kharana ijare. 

23 Eikhoigi ichin inao timotthiyabu thadokpire haiba nakhoina khangbiyu; mahakna thuna laldabadi, eina mahakka loinana nakhoibu unajagani. 

24 Nakhoigi nathakta pannabasing pumnamakpu amasung asengbasing pumnamakpu khurumjari. Italiyadagi misingna nakhoibu khurumjei. 

25 Thoujal nakhoi pumnamakka loina-bisanu. Amen.

JAKOBNA IBA LAIRIK 

A-iba: Jakob 

Ibagi matam: A.D. 45-50 

Wamachang: Khristansingna chatkadaba lamchat adu takpa. 

A-iba nipa asi Prabhu Jisu Khristagi manaoni. Mahakna ichai chaina leiraba Jihudisinggi damakta maru oina ibani. Jisu Khristana taibangpanda lengbirakkadaba asi yamna nakkhraba matam asina Jihudi sing asina machoi machoi leiduna masa masagi aningbada touba aduda mahakna makhoising adugidamakta pukning hongnaba ibani. 

Jakob 1 

Makhal makha ayamba maramgi damak kannaba paomen


1 Iswargi amasung Prabhu Jisu Khristagi minai Jakobna ichai chaina leiriba salai taranithoigi maphamda khurumjei. 

2 Eigi ichin inaosa, nakhoi nakhoigi thajabagi chang yengba aduna khangheiba pumsu suhalli haiba khangduna, 

3 Nakhoina makhal makha ayamba chang yeng-ba marakta tarabada haraoba ngakta sing-thanabiyu. 

4 Amasung nakhoina karisu wattaduna, changkhonba amasung mapung phaba oinanaba, khangheiba adugi thabak changkhonba oisanu. 

5 Touigumbasung nakhoi kanagumbagi lousing watlabadi, pumnamakta pinaheiba amasung paothangdaba iswargi maphamda mahakna nijasanu; aduga ibungo mahakna mangonda pinabigani. 

6 Adubu mahakna chingnaba ilei leitana, thajana nijasanu; maramsi chingnaba mahak adudi nungsitna puba amasung hun-gat huntha touba samadrugi ipomgumbani. 

7 Maramdi mi aduna prabhudagi karigumba phangjagani haiba ningdasanu; 

8 Mahakti pukning ani rongba, maram pumnamakta ilep leptaba nipani. 

9 Touigumbasung tonthaba ichin inao aduna mahakki wangkhatpada, 

10 Aduga inakkhunba mahak aduna mahakki nemthaba aduda chaothokchasanu; maramdi inakkhunba adu napigi mapalgumna mangkhigani. 

11 Maramdi numitna meisa kanbaga loinana kakhatlaktuna napi adu kanghalli; aduga madugi mapal adu kelli, amasung madugi phajaba mityeng adu mang-i. adugumduna inakkhunba mi adusu mahakki lamdangda mangkhigani. 

12 Changyengba khangjaba mi adu yaiphabani; maramdi mahakpu phei haina yabirabada, ibungobu nungsibasingda waleppiraba hingbagi luhup adu mahakna phangjagani. 

13 Mahakpu themdoklabada mi kana amatana, iswarna eibu themdokpani, haidasanu; maramdi iswarbu phattabana themdokpa ngamde, amasung Ibungo mahakmakna mi kana amatabu themdokte; 

14 Touigumbasung mi khudingbu mahakmakki apambana chingthokpada amasung lounam toubada themdokpani. 

15 Maduda apamba aduna mirollabada pap pok-i; aduga pap aduna mapung pharabada siba pok-i. 

16 Eigi achanba ichin inaosa, nakhoibu minamhan-ganu. 

17 Aphaba pinaba khuding amasung changkhonba khudon khuding mathaklomdagini, mangal khibikki Mapadagi kumtharakpani, Ibungo mahakki maphamda hongba amasung leithokpagi mami taba khal leite. 

18 Eikhoina ibungo mahakki lenglipallibasinggi karigumba ahanba mahei oinanaba, ibungo mahakmakki ningbadagi eikhoibu achumbagi waheina ibungo mahakna pokpire.


Achumba dharma


19 Eigi achanba ichin inaosa, nakhoina asi khang-i. Touigumbasung mi khudingna tabada yangba, ngangbada tappa, saobada tappa oisanu, 

20 Maramdi migi asaobana iswargi dharmachenbagi thabak toude. 

21 Maram adugi damak amotpa pumnamak amasung phattaba hakmanba thadoktuna, nakhoi nakhoigi thawai kanbiba ngamba thajinkhraba wa adu noolukpaga loinana sillu. 

22 Adubu wa adu atouba mi nakhoina oiyu, aduga nakhoina nasa nasamakpu minamjaduna atabada oiganu. 

23 Maramdi kanagumbana wa adu ataba oiraga, atouba oidrabadi, mahakti mingsenda mahakki mahousagi mamai ujaba migumbani; 

24 Maramdi mahak mathantabu ujaraga chatthokkhiduna, mahak karamba mi oirambano haiba hek kaokhi. 

25 Touigiunbasung maningtambagi changkhonba wayel yathang aduda lukthana yengduna tattana leiba. taraga kaoba mi oidaba adubu thabak touba mi oiba mahak asina mahakki toujabada yaiphagani. 

26 Kanagumba mina mahakki marei yachan chandaba, adubu mahakki tham oibu minamjaba, mahak masa mathanta dharmachenbani ningjarabadi, mi asigi dharma arembani. 

27 Eikhoigi ipa Iswargi mangda asengba amasung amotpa leitaba dharma asini: mapa leitabasingbu amasung lukhrabisingbu makhoigi awa anangbada yengbiba, aduga masa mathantabu taibangpanbadagi amakpa leitanaba ngakchaba aduni.

Jakob 2 

Inakkhunbaga lairabagada chatkadaba sajat


1 Eigi ichin inaosa, eikhoigi Prabhu Jisu Khrista, matik mangan-gi Prabhubu thajaba adu misinggi misak mimai yengbaga loinana paiganu. 

2 Maramdi nakhoigi tinnaphamda sanakhudop siba, ningthiba phi setpa nipa ama, aduga amotpa phi setpa lairaba amasu changlaklabadi; 

3 Aduga nakhoina ningthiba phi setpa mi aduda yengduna, nahakti aphaba mapham asida phambiyu, amasung lairaba mi aduda, nahakti aduda lep-u, nattraga, eigi khunet manakta phamthou, hairabadi; 

4 Nakhoina nak-hoi nasen-gi manakta misak mimai yeng-ba, aduga phattaba wakhanna wayenba sing oirakpa nattra? 

5 Eigi achanba ichin inaosa, tabiyu; thajabada inakkhunnanaba, aduga iswarbu nungsibasingda waleppikhiba swarga leibakki yumlepcharsing oinanaba, taibangpanda lairabasingbu Ibungo mahakna khanbiba nattra? 

6 Adubu nakhoinadi lairaba mi adubu ikaikhumnade. inakkhunbasingna nakhoibu neiduna, makhoimakna nakhoibu wayel phambei mangda chingsinba nattra? 

7 Nakhoigi nathakta kouraba ikaikhumnaba minggou adubu makhoina thina haiba nattra? 

8 Sastragi matung inna, nangna nanggi keiroi leikaibu nasamakkumna nungsigadabani, haiba ningthougi wayel yathang adu thunghalla-badi, aoibamak makhoina phajana toubani. 

9 Adubu nakhoina misak mimai yenglabadi, ayol aranbasing oina wayel yathangna aranba tahanduna, nakhoina pap toubani. 

10 Maramdi kanagumbana wayel yathang apumba ngakledi hairaga, amatang langjarabadi, mahakna pumnamak adu lanba oirakpani. 

11 Maramdi, nupi lannaganu, haiba ibungo mahakna, mi hatkanu, asisu hai. aduga nahakna nupi lanna drabadi, adubu mi hatlabadi, nahakna wayel yathanggi ayol aranba mi oirakpani. 

12 Maningtambagi wayel yathangna wayengadaba mising-gumna, nakhoina ngnagsu ngang-u, tousu tou. 

13 Maramdi nungsibida uttaba mahak aduda wayenba nungsi-biba yaodabani; nungsibibana wayenbu ngammi.


Thajaba amasung thabak


14 Eigi ichin inaosa, kanagumbana mahakki thajaba lei hairabadi, adubu thabak yaodrabadi, maduna kari tongjabage? Thajaba aduna mahakpu kanbiba ngambra? 

15 Nachin nanao amana nattraga nachem nachan amana phi amasung numit khudinggi chara watla-badi, 

16 Aduga nakhoi kanagumba amana makhoida, tapthana chatpiyu, lumsu lumbiyu, thansu thanbiyu, hairaga hakchanggi kannaba pot asu pibidrabadi kari tongjabano? 

17 Madugumna thajababu, thabak yaodrabadi, mathanta sijabani. 

18 Adubu mi amana haigani, nanggidi thajaba lei aduga eigidi thabak lei; nahakki thajaba thabaktagi topna eingonda utpiyu, aduga eidi eigi thabakna nangonda eigi thajaba utchage. 

19 Iswar amatani haiduna nahakna thajei; nahakna thajaba adu aphabani. Bhutsingnasu thajaduna kibagi tu chung-i. 

20 Adubu, he kannadaba mi, thabak yaodaba thajaba adu mahei leitabani haiba nahakna khangningbra? 

21 Eikhoigi ipa Abrahamna mahakki macha nipa Isahak-pu latnapung mathakta katkhiba aduda thabakna mahakpu chumhanbiba nattra? 

22 Thajabana mahakki thabakka loinana suminnarammi, 

23 Amasung thabakna thajababu changkhonhalle haiba nahakna ui; aduga, Amasung Abrahamna IswarbU thajare, aduga madu mangonda dharmachenba singthanabire; amasung mahakpu Iswargi marup koure, haiba sastra adu thungle. 

24 Thabakna mibu chumhanbi amasung thajaba ngaktana natte haiba nakhoina ui. 

25 Aduga adugumduna oktabi Rahabna paochatpasing adubu lousinbiduna makhoibu lamtop amada thakhiba aduda, thabakna mahakpusu chumhanbiba nattra? 

26 Thawai yaodaba hakchang adu sibagumna thabak yaodaba thajabanasu adugumna sibani.

Jakob 3 

Lei khudum chanba


1 Eigi ichin inaosa, eikhoina henna lumba wayel phanggani haiba khangduna, nakhoi ayambana tambiba mi oiganu. 

2 Maramdi maram ayambada eikhoi pumnamakna khudi thi. Kanagumbana waheida khudi thidrabadi, mahak adu changkhonba nipani, amasung masa apumbabusu yachan chanba ngammi. 

3 Aduga sagonna eikhoigi haiba innanaba, makhoigi machinda yachan haplabadi, eikhoina makhoigi masa apumbabusu koirei leiba ngammi. 

4 Hi makheisu yeng-u, asup chaorabasu, amasung akanba nungsitna humlabasu, hinao saba mina leiningba maikeida asup pikpa hinao-nouna koilei leihalli. 

5 Adugumduna leisu hakchang kayat apisak amani, amasung achou achouba wa ngang-i. Yeng-u, kaya pikpa meirik amana kaya chaoba umangbu chakliba! Amasung leidi meini. 

6 Eikhoigi hakchang kayatki marakta leina ayol aran-gi taibangpan gumbani. Lei asina hakchang apumbabu makhalli, punsigi chakrabu meida thajilli, amasung masibu norokna meida thajilli. 

7 Maramdi sa amasung uchekki, mapukna sittuna chatpa amasung samadruda leiba potki makhal khuding tehannei, aduga mioibana makhoibu tehalle, 

8 Adubu leibudi mi kana amatana tehanba ngamde; madi atatpa leidaba phattabani, amasung siba yaba huna thalli. 

9 Masina eikhoina Prabhu ipabu thagatnei, amasung masina eikhoina iswargi maongda semkhraba misingbu sirap tounei. 

10 Chin adumaktadagi thagatpasu sirap toubasu thok-i. Eigi ichin inaosa, asising asi asum oiroidabani. 

11 Iphutna machin amatadagi athumba amasung akhaba ising kapthok-lakpra? 

12 Eigi ichin inaosa, heiyit mapanna chorphol mahei, nattraga draksha marina heiyit panba ngambra? aduga thumhina aphaba ising oihanba ngambra?


Aranba amasung achumba lousing


13 Nakhoigi narakta singba amasung heiba kanano? Mahakna lousinggi nollukpaga loinana mahakki thabak makhei aphaba machat matouna utsanu. 

14 Touigumbasung nakhoigi thamoida yamna khambanba amasung marannai tanba leirabadi, chaothokkanu amasung achumbagi mathakta minamganu. 

15 Lousing asi mathaklomdagi kumtharakpa natte, prithibigi, sagi amasung bhukti machat oibani. 

16 Maramdi khambanba amasung marannai tanba leiba maphamba wathok lanthok amasung phattaba thabak pumnamak lei. 

17 Touigumbasung mathaklomdagi oiba lousing adudi ahanbada asengbani, matungda ingthaba pamba, pukning thotpa, haijabada laiba, nungsiheibana amasung aphaba maheina thanba, ching-nadaba, aphasajaningdaba oi. 

18 Amasung dharmachenbagi maheidi ingtha-hanbibasinggi damak ingthabada hulli-bani.

Jakob 4 

Michang naina yeina-sunabagi phattaba


1 Kadaidagi lal makhei amasung kadaidagi yeina-sunaba makhei nakhoigi narakta thokpano? Asidagi nattra, haibadi, nakhoigi hakchanggi kayat marakta lansoknariba nakhoigi haraokummeidagi nattra? 

2 Nakhoina yamna pammi, aduga nakhoigi leite; nakhoina mi hatli, amasung kallak-i, aduga phangba ngamde; nakhoina yeina-sunei amasung lan soknei. Nakhoigi leite, maramdi nakhoina nijade. 

3 Nakhoina nijei, aduga phangde, maramdi nakhoina nakhoigi harao kummeida manghannanaba lanna nijabani. 

4 Nakhoi nipa lannabisa, taibangpan-gi marup oiba aduna iswarga yeknabani haiba nakhoina khangdra? Maram aduna kanagumbana taibangpan-gi marup oininglabadi, mahak masamakpu iswargi yeknaba oihalli. 

5 Nattraga, Ibungo mahakna eikhoigi nungda palhanba thawai aduna khambanba phaoba khourangna pammi, sastrana haiba asi arembani nakhoina ningbra? 

6 Adubu ibungo mahakna thoujan henna pibi. Maram adugidamak sastrana hai, iswarna chaothokpasingbu thing-i, adubu nollukpasingda thoujal pibi. 

7 Maram aduna iswargi makha pollu; Adubu diyabolga maioknou, aduga mahakna nakhoidagi chen-gani. 

8 Iswarda naksillu aduga ibungo mahakna nakhoida naksinbigani. Nakhoi pap chenbasa, nakhoigi nakhut senghallu; aduga, pukning anirongbasa, nakhoigi pukning senghallu, 

9 Awa-nungsiba oiyu, tengthao amasung kap-u. Nakhoigi nokpa adu tengthabada amasung nakhoigi haraoba adu wabana sukthabada onsanu. 

10 Nakhoi nasana Prabhugi mityengda nolluk-u, aduga ibungona nakhoibu chaohanbigani. 

11 Ichin inaosa, amana amagi mathakta ngnagganu. Machin mango amagi mathakta ngangba nattraga machin manaobu wayenba mahak aduna wayel yathanggi mathakta ngangbani, amasung wayel yathangbu wayenbani; touigumbasung nahakna wayel yathangbu wayellabadi, nahakna wayel yathang ngakpa mi natte, adubu wayenba mini. 

12 Kanbiba amasung manghanba ngamba, wayel yathang pibiba amasung wayenbiba Ibungo amatani. Adubu nahakki keiroi leikaibu wayenba nahakti kanano?


Inakkhunbasinggi chaojaningbagi mathakta ngangba


13 Ngasi nattraga hayeng eikhoina sahar asida chatlaga, maduda chahi ama lenduna lallollaga, sendong tangani haiba nakhoisa, houjik lak-u, 

14 Hayeng kari oigani nakhoina khangde. Nakhoigi punsi karino? Maramdi nakhoigi matam khara phaoba uba aduga matungda mangkhiba maninni. 

15 Adugi mahutta, prabhuna ningbirabadi eikhoina hingduna masi nattraga madu tougani haiduna nakhoina haigadabani. 

16 Adubu houjikti nakhoina nakhoigi napal toubana chaothok-i. Asigumba chaothokpa pumnamak phattabani. 

17 Maram aduna aphaba touba khangba amasung madu toudaba mahak aduda masi papni.

Jakob 5 

Inakkhunbasingna neiba adugi mathakta ngangba


1 Houjik lak-u, he inakkhunbasa! nakhoigi nathakta lakliba awa-nung-sibagi damak kap-u, amasung lao-khong-u. 

2 Nakhoigi lanthum tumle, aduga nakhoigi phirol sumna chare. 

3 Nakhoigi sana amasung lupa kolhing kare, aduga madusinggi kolhing aduna nakhoigi nathakta sakshi oigani, amasung meigumna nakhoigi nasa chagani. Nakhoina akonba matamda lal peisille. 

4 Yeng-u, nakhoigi lou khaoba langbasinggi khutlangman, nakhoina lounam touduna khakhouba aduna laothok-i; aduga lon lokpasinggi laoba aduna lanmi mayamgi prabhugi nakongda changle. 

5 Nakhoina prithibida noipenna panduna nungaire; hatpagi numitta nakhoigi thamoi nakhoina noihanjare. 

6 Dharmachenba mahakpu nakhoina lanasu lalhalle, hatsu hatle; mahakna nakhoibu thingde.


Khangheinanaba insinbiba


7 Maram aduna, ichin inaosa, Prabhubu lenglaktriba phaoba khangheina khang-u, yeng-u, prithibigi mamal luba mahei adugi damak anganba amasung athengba nong phangdriba phaoba, lou uba mina madugi mathakta khangheina khangduna ngairi. 

8 Nakhoisu khangheina khang-u; nakhoigi pukning chetllu, maramdi Prabhuna lenglakkadaba adu nakle. 

9 Ichin inaosa, nakhoibu wayendananaba, amana amagi mathakta murum murum sonnaganu; yeng-u, wayel, mapuna thong mamangda lepli. 

10 Ichin inaosa, Prabhugi mimgda ngangkhiba Iswargi wa takthokpasing awa khangbagi amasung khangheibagi pandam oina loubiyu. 

11 Yeng-u, khanglabasingbu eikhoina yaiphaba kou-i. Nakhoina Iyobki khangheiba adugi maramda tare, aduga prabhudi chanbibana thalli amasung nungsiheibani haiba, prabhugi aroiba thourang adu, nakhoina ure. 

12 Touigumbasung, eigi ichin inaosa, hiram pumnamaktagi athoibadi, swarga, prithibi, nattraga karigumba atei atei wasak panduna wasakkanu. Adubu nakhoina wayenda tadannaba nakhoigi hoi adu hoi oisanu, aduga nakhoigi mai adu mai oisanu.


Haijabagi panggal


13 Nakhoigi narakta kanagumba awa khanglibra? mahak haijasanu, kanagumba haraoribra? Mahak thagatpa isei saksanu. 

14 Nakhoigi narakta kanagumba naribra? Mahakna singlupki ahallamansingbu kousanu, aduga makhoina prabhugi mingda mahakpu thao teibiduna, mahakkidamak haijabisanu; 

15 Amasung thajabagi haijabana anaba mahak adubu kanbigani aduga prabhuna mahakpu hougathanbigani; amasung mahakna pap touramlabadi, mahakpu kokpigani. 

16 Maram aduna nakhoibu naba phahanbinanaba, nakhoina amana amada nakhoigi pap haidok-naduna, amana amagi damak haijabiyu. Dharmachenba migi nonjabagi thabak toubada yamna kalli. 

17 Eliyadi eikhoiga mahousa mannaba mi oirammi, amasung nong chudananaba mahakna thawai yaona haijare, aduga chahi ahum tha taruk phaoba prithibida nong chude. 

18 Amasung mahakna amuk hanna haijaraga swargana nong pibire, aduga prithibina mahei pallakle. 

19 Eigi ichin inaosa, nakhoigi narakta kanagumbana achumbadagi lammuknarabadi, aduga kanagumbana mahakpu hanhallaklabadi, 

20 Mahakki lambi lammuknabadagi papchenba amabu hanhallaklaba mi aduna sibadagi thawai amabu kanbigani, amasung pap mayambu kuppigani haiba mahakna khangsanu.

PITARNA IBA AHANBA LAIRIK 

A-iba: Pitar 

Ibagi matam: A.D. 60-65 

Wamachang: Awaba khangba amasung aran khubam 

Lairik asi Jihuda amasung Gentile sing Asiya Minorda leiribasing gi maphamda ibani. Khristansingna awaba tarabasu Khristana sibadagi amuk hinggatpa adu wakhal touduna leinaba sengna khanghalli. 

I PITAR 1


Khurumjaba


1 Jisu Khristagi pakhon chatpa Pitarna Pontada, Galatiyada, Kappadokiyada, Esiyada, amasung Bithuniyada leiba ichai chaikhiba lamlankhibasing oiba, 

2 Ipa iswargi hanna khangba matung inna, yathang innabagi damak amasung Jisu Khristagi i khikpinabagi damak, thawaina sengdokpibagi mapanna khan-gatpasingda: thoujal amasung ingthaba nakhoida yamkhatsanu.


Aran khubamgi asagi damak iswarbu thagatchaba


3 Eikhoigi Prabhu Jisu Khristagi Iswarsu mapasu oiba adubu thagatchei. Ibungo mahakna yamna nungsiheibagi matung inna asibasinggi maraktagi Jisu Khristabu hinggatpiba mapanna hingliba khourangna ningbagi damak, 

4 Amasung mangdaba, amakpa leitaba, mutkhidaba, nakhoigi damak swargada khakpiraba phangpham thokpagidamak eikhoibu amuk hanna pokpire; 

5 Iswargi pangganna aroiba matamda phongnanaba thourang langlaba aran khubamgi damak thajabagi mapanna nakhoibu ngakpi senbire. 

6 Asida houjik matam khara phaoba, kannaba oirabadi, makhal makha ayamba chang yengbada nakhoibu thawai wahallabasu, nakhoina yamna haraojei. 

7 Meina phudonglabasu manggadaba sanadagi henna mamal luraba nakhoigi thajabagi asengba aduna Jisu Khristabu phongdokpidaba, thagatpa, matik mangal amasung ikai khumnaba thoknanaba, nakhoibu chang yengbani. 

8 Uhouba phangdaba Ibungobu nakhoina nungsi; houjik nakhoina Ibungobu udramaksu thajei, 

9 Aduga nakhoigi thajabagi aromba, thawaigi aran khubam adu, phangbanina, nakhoina hainingai leitaba amasung matik manganna thanba hiraobaga loinana yamna harao-i. 

10 Aran khubam asigi maramda nakhoina phanggadaba thoujal adugi maramda iswargi wa takthokpasingna hanna takthoktuna, maram okna humduna thire. 

11 Khristana awa khanggadaba amasung asisinggi matungda matik mangal phanggadabi adu makhoigi nungda leiba Khristagi thawaina hanna sakshi piduna taklamba adu kari karamba matamda oigadabano haiba makhoina thirammi. 

12 Makhoina masa mathantagi damakta nattaduna, nakhoigi damak makhoina waramsing asi thougan tourammi haiba makhoida phongdokpire; houjik waramsing asi swargadagi thabirakpa thawai asengbana aphaba wapao sandokpasinggi mapanna nakhoida haidokpire; waramsing asi swargadutsingna thawai yaona yengsinning-i.


Khristan gi lamchat


13 Maram adugi damak nakhoi nakhoigi pukninggi khwang laksinduna, pukning phajillu, aduga Jisu Khristabu phongdokpibada nakhoida pubirakliba thoujal aduda nakhoigi khourangna ningba changkhonna thammu. 

14 Haiba inba angangsinggumna, nakhoina ahanba khangdringeigi apaibagi sakpham loudaduna, 

15 Nakhoibu koubiba Ibungo mahakna sengbagumna, nakhoi nasasu nachat natou pumnamakta asengba oiyu; 

16 Maramdi masi asumna ikhre, nakhoi asengba oiyu, maramdi ei asengbani. 

17 Amasung misak mimai yengdana mi khudinggi thabak matung inna wayenbiba Ibungo mahakpu nakhoina Ipa kourabadi, nakhoigi langpheigi matam adu kina lellu. 

18 Maramdi lupa nattraga sana, manggadaba pot asina nattaduna, asoiba amasung amakpa leitaba yao machigumba Khristagi mamal luraba ina, 

19 Nakhoibu nakhoigi napa napusingdagi thangtharakpa aremba mipandagi handokpire haiba nakhoina khangi. 

20 Khristabu taibangpal houdringeida aoibamak hanna khangkhrabani; 

21 Adubu asibasinggi maraktagi hinggatpiraba amasung ibungoda matik mangal pirabi iswarda ibungogi mapanna thajaba nakhoigi maram gi damak matamgi aroibada ibungobu phongdokpibani; aduna iswarda nakhoigi thajaba amasung khourangna ningba leibani. 

22 Nakhoina nachin nanaosingbu tousinnaba yaodaba nungsiba phaoba achumbada haiba inbana nakhoi nakhoigi thawai sengdokcharaga, thawai yaona pukningdagi nakhoi amaga amaga nungsi nou. 

23 Maramdi mangba yaba marudagi nattana, mangba yadabadagi, hingba amasung lengdana leiba iswargi wa adugi mapanna nakhoibu amuk hanna pokpire. 

24 Maramdi, hakchang panba pumnamak napigumbani, amasung madugi matik mangal pumnamak adu napigi mapan gumbani. Napina khuikhi, amasung mapanna kenkhi; 

25 Touigumbasung Prabhugi waheidi lomba naidana leibani, Amasung nakhoida sandokkhiba aphaba wapao adu wahei asini.

I PITAR 2 

1 Maram aduna phattaba pumnamak, lingjel chumdaba pumnamak, aphasajaningba, kallakpa amasung phattaba ngangnaba pumnamak thadoktuna, 

2 Prabhudi thoujal heibani haiba nakhoina mahao khanglabadi, thawai yoknaba asengba sanggomna nakhoibu aran khubam phaoba chaohannanaba, 

3 Nouna pokpa angang machasinggumna sanggom adu khourangna pamjou. 

4 Misingnadi aoibamak channadraba, adubu iswargi mityengdadi khanggatlaba, mamal luraba hingliba nung, prabhu adugi maphamda nakhoina laklibani; 

5 Jisu Khristagi mapanna iswargi maphamda yabiba, thawaigi oiba bali katnanaba, asengba purohitpham oinaba, nakhoi nasabusu hingliba nungsinggumna, thawaigi oiba yum sagatlibani. 

6 Maramdi masi sastrada yaori, yeng-u, Siyonda khangatlaba mamal luraba chithekki nung eina thammi; amasung Ibungoda thajaba mahak adubu khak ikaihalloi. 

7 Maram aduna mamal luaraba adu thajaba nakhoigi damakni; adubu thajadabasinggi damakni asigumbani, yum sabasingna channadraba nung adu, adumakna chithekki mapi oihallammi; 

8 Amasung, khudi thinaba nung amasung tunaba nungjao; maramdi makhoina haiba indabanina waheida khudi thi; madusu makhoigi damak tamlakpa oire. 

9 Touigumbasung nakhoibu amambadagi ibungo mahakki angakpa masak oiba manganda koubiriba ibungo mahakki thoihenba khibik nakhoina tamthoknanaba, khan-gatpa sagei, ningthougi oiba purohitsing, asengba jat, ibungo mahak-makki marannaigi damak oiba mi nakhoini. 

10 Mamangngeida nakhoidi mi oiramde, adubu houjikti nungsibire. 

11 Achanbasa, thawaigi mathakta lan soknaba hakchanggi apaibadagi ngakthokchananaba, mireibak machasing amasung lamlanbasinggumna nakhoibu eina nonjari. 

12 Nakhoi phattaba toubani haina nakhoigi nathakta atoppa jatsingna ngangnaba aduda, makhoina nakhoigi aphaba thabak yengduna, mityeng taraba numitta makhoina iswarbu thagatnanaba, nakhoigi naramchat makhoigi marakta phajana chatlu.


Leibakki angam-athousinggi makha ponba


13 Prabhugi maramgi damak mioibagi chatnou haiba wayel khudinggi makha pollu; ningthouna khwaidagi henba mapu, oibanina mahakki makha pollu, 

14 Amasung phattaba toubasinggi mathakta lamankhumnabagi damak aduga apha ba toubasingbu thagatnabagi damak mahakna leibak ngakpasingbu tharakpanina, makhoigi makha pollu. 

15 Maramdi phajana toubana nakhoina apangba misinggi heita singdaba adu tuminna leihanba adu iswargi ningbani. 

16 Maningtamba misinggum oiyu, aduga nakhoigi naningtamba adu phattabagi makhumgumna sijinnadaduna, iswargi minaisinggum oiyu. 

17 Mi pumnamakpu ikaikhumnou, nachin nanao oibasingbu nungsiyu, iswarbu kiyu. Ningthoubu ikaikhumnou.


Thouganbagi artha


18 Minaisa, nakhoigi aphaba amasung pukchel, thotpa mapusingtada nattana nungthoinaganbadasu matik chana kibaga loinana nakhoina makha pollu. 

19 Maramdi iswarlomda pukning changbagi maramna chumduna wahan-bada kanagumba mina khangheina khanglabadi, madu thagatphamni. 

20 Maramdi nakhoina pap touduna khudum suba phanglabada, madu khanglagadi, kari thagatpham leibano? Adubu nakhoina phajana touduna, awa khanglagadi, iswargi mangda asi thagatphamni. 

21 Maramdi asi tanna nakhoibu koubire, maramdi nakhoina Khristagi khonggul matung injana-naba, nakhoida khudam thambiramduna, Ibungonasu nakhoigi damak awa khangbire. 

22 Ibungodi pap khak toude, aduga ibungogi chinda marei mara khak phangde. 

23 Ibungobu cheirabada hanna ibungona cheiramde, ibungona awa khanglabada kihanba touramde; adubu chumna wayenba ibungo mangonda ibungo masabu sinnajarammi. 

24 Paplomda siraduna eikhoina dharmachenbaromda hingnanaba, ibungo masamakna uthakta ibungogi hakchangda eikhoigi pap pubirei; ibungogi cheiphainna nakhoibu naba phahanbire. 

25 Maramdi nakhoidi yaogumna lammuknarammi, adubu houjikti yaosen bada amasung nakhoigi thawaibu ngaksenbiba mapuda nakhoina hallakle.

I PITAR 3 

Mapuroibasing amasung makhoigi nupisingna chatkadaba lamchat


1 Matou adugumna nakhoi nupisa, nakhoi-makki napuroibasinggi makha ponna leiyu, haibadi kana kanagumbana wa adu indrabadi, 

2 Makhoina nakhoigi kibaga loinaba asengba nachat natou adu yengduna, wahei yaodana makhoigi nupisinggi machat matouna makhoibu phangjananabani. 

3 Nakhoigi leitengdi samlonba, sana siba amasung phijet leitengba, mapanthonge leiteng asi oida-sanu; 

4 Adubu nakhoigi leiteng pukninggi arotpa mi adu tappa amasung ingba thawaigi mangdaba phijetna leitengba oisanu, masi iswargi mityengda mathal lubani. 

5 Maramdi matou asig matung inna, mamangngeida iswarda khourangna ningba lepchabi asengbi nupisingnasu makhoi makhoimakki mapuroibashiggi makha ponjaduna, makhoi masenbu leitengnarammi. 

6 Asigumna Sarana Abrahambu mabungo koujaduna haiba illammi. Nakhoina aphaba touduna karigumba akiba kidrabadi, nakhoina mahakki machasing oirakle. 

7 Matou adugumna, nakhoi mapuroibasa, nakhoigi nupisingbu henna sonba potkumna amasung hingbagi thoujan phangminnabasu oina ikaikhumnabiduna, khang bagi matung inna pamninnou; aduna nakhoigi haijaba thingdananabani


Khristan-gi minungsi


8 Akonbadi, nakhoi pumnamak pukning amata, khangminnaba, machin manaogum nungsinaba, pukning nouba; nollukpa oiyu. 

9 Phattabagi damak phattaba hanganu, nattraga cheibagi damak hanna cheiganu, adubu madugi mahutta bor piyu; maramdi nakhoina bor phangnanaba, asigi damak nakhoibu koubire. 

10 Maramdi punsibu nungsiba, amasung aphaba numitpu uba pamba mahak mahakki chin khamjasanu; 

11 Aduga phattabadagi mahakna lei thoklaktuna, aphaba tousanu; mahakna ingthaba thiduna, madu tansanu. 

12 Maramdi Prabhugi mit dharmachenbasinggi mathakta lei, aduga Ibungo mahakki nakong makhoigi nonjabada lei. Touigumbasung Pribhugi maithongdi phattaba toubasingbu yeknei.


Chumdababu khangbiba amasung khristadagi khudam louba


13 Amasung nakhoina aphaba oiba adugi maramda thawai yaoba oirak labadi, nakhoibu phattaba tougadaba kanano? 

14 Adubu nakhoina dharmachenbagi damak awa khanglagadi yaiphabani; aduga makhoigi kihanba kiganu, wasu waganu; 

15 Touigumbasung nakhoigi thamoi nungda Khristabu Prabhuni haina yajou. Nakhoigi nungda leiriba khourangna ningba adugi maram nakhoida hanglaba mi khudingda khumnanaba matam leiba khibikta thourang touduna leiyu, adubu pukning tapna amasung kina tou. 

16 Khristada nakhoigi phajaba nachat nachat natoubu, usitabasingna nakhoigi nathakta phattana ngangba aduda makhoi ikainaba, nakhoigi phajaba achum aran khangnaba pukning leisanu. 

17 Maramdi iswargi ningba adugumba oiragadi, nakhoina, phattaba toubagi damak awa khangbadagibudi aphaba toubagi, damak awa khangbana henna phei. 

18 Maramdi iswargi maphamda nakhoibu pubiraknanaba, dharmachendabasinggi mahutta dharmachenba haibadi, Khristanasu papki damak amuktang sibire; ibungobu hakchanggi marida sihalle, adubu thawaigi marida hinghalle; 

19 Thawai adu oiduna ibungona lengduna keisumsangda leiba thawai-singda laothokle; 20 Mamangngeida Nohagi numitta hijao adu thourang langlingeida, iswargi kuina khangbiba aduna ngaibiramba matamda thawaising aduna haiba inde; hi adugi manungda mi kharabu, haibadi mi nipan, isinggi mapanna kanbire. 

21 Isingna madugi maong oina, haibadi baptais loubana, houjik nakhoibu kanbi, hakchanggi amotpa louthoknaba natte, adubu Jisu Khristagi hinggatpagi mapamia, iswarlomda phajaba achumaran khangnaba pukning thijabani. 

22 Ibungodi swargada lengkhatkhiduna iswargi yetta leiri; swarga-dutsingsu, matik leibasingsu, khutkan-panggan basingsu ibungogi makha ipon ponhalle.

I PITAR 4 

Pap thadokpa


1 Maram aduna Khristana hakchangda awa khangbikhibanina nakhoi nasensu puk ning aduga mannana lan phijetkum setlu; Maramdi hakchangda awa khangkhraba mi aduna paptagi thadokpa phangle; 

2 Aduna nakhoina nakhoigi lei-houriba punsi adu miobagi apaiba matung inna houjik amuk hingdaduna, iswargi ningba matung inna hingnanabani. 

3 Maramdi apaiba, hakchanggi apamba, yungaoba, lamchat haptaba, yuchoiba, amasung tukkachaba lai-latpa pumnamak asida nakhoina chatlamduna, atoppa jatsinggi apamba adu tounabagi damak houkhraba matam aduna okle. 

4 Thabak asi makheida nakhoina makhoiga loinana choithokna panbagi adugumba hakmanba aduda chatminnadaba asi angakpani haina makhoiga ning-duna thina ngangnei. 

5 Makhoi asina hinglibasingbusu sikhibasingbusu wayennanaba thourang langlaba ibungoda maram pigadabani. 

6 Maramdi asigi damak sikhibasingbu miobagi matung inna hakchangda wayennanaba, adubu iswargi matung inna thawaida hing-nanaba, makhoidasu aphaba wapao sandokpikhi. 

7 Touigumbasung pumnamakki aromba nakle; maram, aduna nakhoi pukning achumba oiyu, aduga haijanabagidamak pukning laksillu. 

8 Hiram pumnamaktagi athoibadi nakhoi nasen-gi marakta nungsinabada pukning chang-u; maramdi nungsibana pap ayamba kuppi. 

9 Murum murum sondaduna amaga amaga pija pithak phanou. 

10 Mi amamamna khudon phangbagi matung inna, nakhoi nasen gi marakta iswargi makhal makha ayamba thoujan-gi aphaba dewansinggumna madu thougan tou-nou: 

11 Kanagumba mina nganglabadi, iswargi paotak oibagumna ngangsanu; kanagumba mina thougan tourabadi, iswama pinabiba panggandagi thougan tousanu; aduna maram pumnamakta iswarbu Jisu Khristagi mapanna thagat nanabani. Ibungoda lomba naidaba matik mangal amasung panggal lei. Amen.


Khristagi damak awa khangba
