12 Achanbasa, nakhoibu chang yengnanaba nakhoigi nathakta lakliba meichak aduda, karigumba angakpa thabak nakhoida thokpani haiduna ngakkanu. 

13 Touigumbasung Khristagi matik mangan phongdokpa matamda nakhoina thoidok hendokna nungaina haraonanaba, Khristagi awa anang khangbagi saruk phangminnaba nakhoi adupki matik haraojou. 

14 Nakhoibu Khristagi minggi damak cheirabadi, yaiphabani; maramdi matik mangan-gi thawaina amasung iswargi thawaina nakhoigi nathakta leibani. 

15 Maramdi nakhoi kana amatana mihatpa mi, huranba mi, phattaba touba mi, nattraga mi ateigi wada yaoganba mi oina awa khangdasanu; 

16 Adubu Khristan oina awa khanglabadi, mahakna ikai daduna ming asida iswarbu thagat sanu. 

17 Maramdi iswargi yumda wayenba adu houba matam lakle, aduga madu eikhoidagi hanna hourabadi, iswargi aphaba wapao indabasinggi aromba adu kari oigadage? 

18 Amasung dharmachenbabu wana kanbirabadi, iswar-ning-daba amasung papchenba midi kadaida leigadage? 

19 Aduna iswargi ningba matung inna awa khangbasingnasu thajaba yaba sembi ba mapugi maphamda aphaba thabak touduna makhoigi thawai sinnajasanu.

I PITAR 5 

Insinbibagi wa


1 Maram aduna ahallaman oiminnaba, Khristagi awa khangbagi sakshi amasung phonggadouriba matik mangan-gi saruk phangminnaba oijaba eina nakhoigi narakta leiba ahallamansingbu insinjari. 

2 Tangaiphadana nattaduna touningba toubana, aduga sendong karamdaduna pukning changna, nakhoigi narakta leiriba iswargi yao sanggu adu senbiyu; 

3 Aduga nakhoida sinnakhibasing adugi mathakta mapugum oidaduna, yao sanggu adugi pandam nakhoi oiyu. 

4 Amasung athoiba yaosenba phongdoknaba matamda, nakhoina man-tharakpa naidaba luhup phanggani. 

5 Adugumduna, nakhoi naha oibasa, ahallamansinggi makha pollu. Hoi, nakhoi pumnamak amana amagi thougan tounaba nollukpa na khwang pullu; maramdi iswarna chaothokpasingbu thing-i, adubu nollukpa singda thouial pibi. 

6 Maram aduna iswarna matani chana nakhoibu chaohanbinanaba, ibungo mahakki pangganba khutki makhada nollukchou; 

7 Nakhoigi langtaknaba pumnamak ibungo mangonda pumlang langsillu, maramdi ibungo mahakna nakhoigi damak ningbi. 

8 Pukning laksillu, mitseng khang u; nakhoigi yeknaba diya-bolna khongliba nongsagumna kana-gumbabu chathoknanaba thiduna koichat chatli. 

9 Nakhoi thajabada chettuna mabu maioknou, maramdi adugumba mannaba awa anang khangba adu taibangpanda leiriba nachin nanaosingdasu thokkhrabani haiba nakhoina khang-u. 

10 Amasung ibungo mahakki lomba naidaba matik mangan-gi damak Khristada nakhoibu koubiraba, thoujal pumnamakki iswar ibungo mahakmakna, nakhoina matam khara awa khanglaga, nakhoibu changkhonhanbigani, chethanbigani amasung kalhanbigani. 

11 Lomba naidaba phaoba panba adu ibungo man-gonda oisanu. Amen. 

12 Thajaba yaba oina eina singthanajaba eikhoigi ichin inao Silbhanagi mapanna nakhoida samna ijare, haibadi, eina insinduna, asi iswargi achumba thoujanni haina sakshi pijari; nakhoina thoujal asida chetna lep-u. 

13 Babilonda leibi khangatminnabina amasung icha nipa Markna nakhoibu khurumjei. 14 Nungsibagi chupnabaga loinana amana amabu khurumnou. Khristada leiriba nakhoi pumnamakta ingthaba oisanu.

PITARNA IBA ANISUBA LAIRIK 

A-iba: Pitar 

Ibagi matam: 66-67 

Wamachang: Khristana amuk taibangpanda lengbirakkadaba naksillakpa. 

Khristana taibangpanda amuk lengbirakkadaba naksillakpa asida tongan tonganba mioi kaya thoklaktuna Iswrgi waheibu serannana chinggani. Adubu Khristabu lousinkhrabasingna chetna Khristada leigadabani haina takli. Loinana Khristana lenglaktriba phaoba aphaba wa-pao sandoktuna leigadabani haina khanghalli. 

II PITAR 1 

Khurumjaba. Khristanna phanglaba matik amasung chatkadaba lamchat


1 Jisu Khristagi minai amasung Pakhonchatpa oiba Simon Pitarna eikhoigi iswarsu kanbiba mapusu oiba Jisu Khristagi dharmachenba da eikhoiga loinana mamal tuba mannaba thajaba phangminnabasingda: 

2 Iswarbu amasung eikhoigi Prabhu Jisubu changkhonna khangbada thoujal amasung ingthaba nakhoida yamkhatpisanu: 

3 Maramdi Ibungogi Iswargi oiba pangganna, Ibtmgomakki matik mangal amasung aphaba matouna eikhoibu koubiraba ibungobu changkhonna khangbagi mapanna, hingbagi amasung iswar-ningbagi oiba pumnaniak eikhoida pibire; 

4 Matik mangal amasung aphaba matou asigi mapanna ibungona eikhoida mamal luraba amasung thoidok hendokna chaoba waleppa khibik pibire; aduna asisinggi mapanna nakhoina apaibana taibangpanda leiriba amangba adudagi hinghouduna, iswargi oiba mahousagi saruk phangminnabasing oiraknanabani. 

5 Aduga maram asimakki damak nakhoina yamna maram okpa oiduna, nakhoigi thajabada aphaba matou, nakhoigi apha matouda khangba, 

6 Nakhoigi khangbada nasa khudum chanjaba, nakhoigi nasa khudum chanjabada khangheiba, nakhoigi khangheibada iswarningba, 

7 Nakhoigi iswar ningbada nachin nanaogumna channaba, amasung nakhoigi nachin nanaogumna channabada nungsiba hapchillu. 

8 Maramdi pumnamak asi nakhoigi oiduna yainkhatlabadi, eikhoigi Prabhu Jisu Khristabu changkhonna khangnabagi damak masi-singna nakhoibu atanba amasung mahei yandaba oihalloi. 

9 Maramdi pumnamak asi leitaba midi, mahakki ariba paptagi sengdokpiba adu kokhiduna, nakna leibata uba mittangbagumbani. 

10 Maram adugi damak, ichin inaosa, nakhoibu koubiba amasung khan gatpiba adu chethannanaba henna maram ok-u; maramdi nakhoina asising tourabadi, kei-doungeidasu khudi thiroi. 

11 MaraMdi asum touna eikhoigi Prabhusu kanbiba mapusu oiba Jisu Khristagi lomba naidaba leibakta changnaba nakhoida marang kaina pibigani.


Pitargi siba naksillakpa. Pitargi marannaigi amasung iswargi wa takthokpasinggi sakshi


12 Maram adugidamak nakhoina isingbu khangduna, nakhoida leiriba achumba aduda chetna leirabasu, nakhoibu asisinggi maramda ningsing-hannaba matam leiba khibikta ei thourangda leigani. 

13 Amasung eina phigi yum asigi manungda leiringei, makhei nakhoibu ningsinghannaba insinba chummi haina ningjei; 

14 Maramdi eikhoigi Prabhu Jisu Khristana eingonda takpikhibagumna, eigi phigi yum thadokpa matam adu thuna lakli haiba eina khangi 

15 Aduga eigi thawai lankhiba matungda matam khudingda nakhoina pumnamak asi ningsingba ngamna-naba eina ngambamakhei hotna jagani. 

16 Maramdi eikhoina eikhoigi Prabhu Jisu Khristagi panggal amasung lengbirakpa adu nakhoida khanghanba matamda marei marana semba warisinggi matung injade, adubu eikhoidi ibungogi achouba matik adu mitmakna ujabasing oirakle. 

17 Maramdi Ibungona mapa Iswardagi ikaikhumnaba amasung matik mangal phangjabada, chaoraba matik mangandagi asigumba khonjel asi thoklak-i, masi eigi athanba icha nipani, mangonda eina yamna pelle; 

18 Amasung eikhoina ibungoga asengba chingda leiminnaringeida, khonjel asi swargadagi thoklakpa eikhoimakna tabani. 

19 Aduga eikhoida leiba iswargi wa takthokpagi Wa adu henna chethanbani, wa asina nakhoina, nongngandriba phaoba amasung nakhoigi pukningda sajik thoktriba phaoba, amamba maphamda thaomeida pukning changbagumna chinglabadi, nakhoina phajana tou. 

20 Sastragi takthokpa wagi handokpa adu pukthoktagi kari amata thokte, haiba asi hanna khang-u. 

21 Maramdi iswargi wa takthokpa kari amata mioibagi ningbadagi khak thokte, adubu thawai asengbana tongbiduna mioibasingna iswardagi ngangle.

II PITAR 2 

Iswargi wa takthoksinnabasing amasung phattaba mipal


1 Touigumbasung misinggi marakta iswargi wa takthoksinnabasingsu thokle; adugumduna nakhoigi naraktasu tambisinnabasing leigani. Makhoibu leibirakpa mapumakpu makhoina yadaduna, mangba thokhanba chumdaba paotak lonna pusillakkani, aduga makhoina makhoi masagi mathakta thuna mangba purak-i. 

2 Amasung ayambana makhoigi apaiba thabak adugi matung ingani; makhoi adugi maramna achumba adugi Iambi adubu thina ngangnagani. 

3 Aduga karambana makhoina tousinnaba waheiga loinana nakhoibu lallonpot oinagani, makhoibu aranba tahanba adu thainadagi thillaktri, aduga makhoibu manghanba adu tumde. 

4 Maramdi swargadutsingna pap toubada iswarna makhoibu kanbidrabadi, adubu wayen-gi damak khakpasing asibu norokta hunthaduna amambagi komda pithoklabadi; 

5 Aduga ariba taibangpan-babu kanibadaduna, ibungo mahakna iswar-ningdabasinggi taibangpan-gi mathakta ichao thokhanba matamda, dharmachenbagi wa laothokpa Nohabu mi atei taretka loinana khakhoura-badi; 

6 Aduga Sodom amasung Gomora sahar ani adu ut oihanduna amangba tanna lalhallabadi, aduga iswar ningdabasinggi mathakta thokkadabagi pandam makhoibu oihallabadi; 

7 Amasung phattabasinggi apaiba machat matouna yamna wahallaba dharmachenba Lotpu kanbirabadi 

8 (Maramdi dharmachenba mi aduna makhoigi marakta panduna, ubada amasung tabada numit khuding mahakki dharmachenba thawaibu makhoigi wayel yathang indaba thabakna otlammi), 

9 Iswar ningbasingbu thembadagi kanbiba, amasung dharmachendabasingbu, 

10 Thoidokpadi amotpagi apaibada hakchanggi matung inbasing amasung mapu oibabu usittabasingbu, wayen gi numit phaoba laknaduna thamba prabhuni hei. Ichang thouganba amasung marannai ningba makhoina matik mangal chaorabasingda thina ngangba kide; 

11 Adubu swargadutsingna akan-athou amasung pangganda henna chaorabasu, Prabhugi mangda makhoigi mathakta athiba wayel haidokte. 

12 Thouigumbasng makhoi asina, phanabagi amasung manghannabagi damak mahousagi sa oina poklaba, wakhal yaodaba lengli-pallibasing-gumna, khangdaba adugi maramna thina ngangduna, makhoigi mangnabada manghangani. 

13 Matou asumna aranba toubagi mainal oina makhoina aranba khang-i; nungthil matamda makherangbabu harao tayambani singthanariba mising asina nakhoiga chamin-thakminnaringeida makhoigi minamba matouda makherang-i; makhoi asi amakpani, amasung asoibani. 

14 Makhoigi mamit nupi lannaba thabakna thalli, aduga mamit adu paptagi tokte, makhoina areppa leitaba mising-bu themdok-i; makhoigi pukning karanmabagi sajel toukhrabani; makhoi sirap-ki machasingni. 

15 Makhoina achumba lambi thadoklaga, Beorgi macha nipa Biliyamgi lambi matung induna makhoi lammuknakhre; Biliyamna aranba toubagi mamal adu pamle, 

16 Adubu mahakki ayol aran-gi damak mahakna warakpa phangle; marol thoktaba lolana mioibagi khonjenna ngangthoktuna iswargi wa takthokpa adugi ngaoba adu khamle. 

17 Makhoi asi ising leitaba i phutsing amasung nong nungsitna humdokkhiba leichinni; makhoigi damak amambagi amuba adu khaklabani. 

18 Maramdi kannadaba apongba wa haidoktuna, makhoina aranbada pallibasingdagi hek hingjarakpasingbu hakchanggi apambada apaibana themdok-i; 

19 Makhoina makhoi-bu maning tamhannaba waleppiduna, makhoi masadi amangbagi minaisingni; Maramdi mi kanagumbabu ngamkhiba adumakna minaisu oihalle. 

20 Maramdi makhoina kanbiba mapu Prabhu Jisu Khristabu khangbagi mapanna taibangpan-gi amot amotpa thabaktagi hinghouba matungda, makhoibu amotpa thabak aduda amuk hanna yetnaduna ngamkhrabadi, makhoigi damak akonba phibam adu ahanbadagi henna phatlakte. 

21 Maramdi dharmachenbagi lambi adu makhoina khangle hairaga, makhoida pithokkhraba asengba yathangdagi leithokkhiba saruktagi madu makhoina khanglamdabana makhoigi damak henna pharamgadabani. 

22 Achumba paorou asigi matung inna makhoida thoide, haibadi, huina magi a-obada amuk hanjilli, amasung, luthokpiraba okpina leikhomda leiolli.

II PITAR 3 

Khrista lenglakpagi numit thourang toubagi kannaba


1 Achanbasa, houjikki asi eina nakhoida iba anisuba lairikni; aduga lairik ani asida eina naldioibu ningsinghanduna nakhoigi asengba pukningbu thougatpani, 

2 Haibadi, iswargi wa takthokpa assengbasingna mamangngeida haikhiba wasing adu amasung nakhoigi pakhonchatpasinggi mapanna kanbiba mapu prabhugi yathang adu nakhoina ningsingnanabani. 

3 Asi hanna khang u, haibadi, akonba matamda noknabasingna makhoimakki pambagi matung indana, noknabaga loinana laktuna haigani, 

4 Ibungogi lenglakpagi waleppa adu kadaida leibano? Maramdi ipa ipusingna tumkhiba numittagi pot pumnamak leisemngeidagi leirambagumna adum marei. 

5 Maramdi asi makhoina kaoningna kaobani, haibadi, thainangeidagi iswargi wana swarga aduga isingdagi amasung isinggi mayaida oihanba prithibi leirammi; 

6 Asigi mapanna leiramba taibangpal adu isingna thumhattuna manghalle. 

7 Adubu wayen-gi amasung iswar-ningdaba misingbu manghanbagi numit phaoba wa adumakna houjik leiriba swarga amasung prithibibu khaktuna meigi damak liduna thamle. 

8 Touigumbasung, achanbasa, wa ama asi nakhoina kaoganu, haibadi, Prabhugi maphamda numit amadi chahi lising amagumbani, aduga chahi lising amadi numit amagumbani. 

9 Prabhugi waleppagi marida, mi kharana atappa oina singthanabagumna ibungodi atappa leite, adubu nakhoigi damak kuina khangbibani; Ibungo mahakna kanabusu manghanningde, adubu pumnamakna pukning honglakpa pambani. 

10 Touigumbasung Prabhugi numit huranbagumna lakkani; numit aduda atiyana yamna nin khongbaga loinana mangkhigani, aduga maru oiba pot akanba meisana tumkhigani, amasung prithibi aduga madugi manungda leiriba thabak makhei chak-thokkhigani. 

11 Pot pumnamak asi asumna tumkhigadaba maramna, iswargi numit lakpa adu ngaiduna amasung thawai yaona pamduna, nakhoina sengna panbada amasung iswar ningbada karamba miong oigadabano! 

12 Numit adugi maramna atiya mein chaktuna tumkhigani, aduga maru oiba pot akanba meisana soudokkani. 

13 Touigumbasung ibungo mahakki waleppa matung inna, eikhoina dharmachenbana panba anouba atiya amasung anouba prithibi ngaijei. 

14 Maram adugi damak, achanbasa, nakhoina asisinggi damak ngaijabagi maramna, ibungogi mityengda amakpa amasung asoiba yaodana, ingthana nakhoibu phangnanaba maram ok u. 

15 Amasung eikhoigi prabhugi kuina khangbiba adu aran khubamni singthanou. Eikhoigi achanba ichin inao Polnasu, mangonda pinabiba lousing adugi matung inna nakhoida ikhibagumbani. Mahakki lairik pumnamaktasu waramsing asigi maramda mahakna ngangbagumbani. 

16 Madugi manungda waram kharadi khangba lui; madu heita-singdabasingna amasung areppa leitabasingna atei sastrasu onna-teinahanbagumna makhoimakki amangba, phaoba onna teinahalli. 

17 Maram aduna, achanbasa, waramsing asi hanna khangduna, phattabasinggi aranbana puthokkhiduna, nakhoina nakhoimakki achetpadagi tadananaba sennajou. 

18 Touigumbasung thoujanda amasung eikhoigi Prabhusu kanbiba mapusu oiba Jisu Khristabu khangbada chaokhatlu. Ibungoda houjiksu lomba naidaba phaobasu matik mangal oisanu. Amen.

JOHANNA IBA AHANBA LAIRIK 

A-iba: John 

Ibagi matam: A.D. 85-90 

Wamachang: Iswardi asengbani, manganni, nungsibani. 

Khrista asi thanggeisengna Iswardagi lakpani haibasi eikhoi pumnamakna yajagadabani amasung punna Ibungo mahakpu thagatkadabani Eikhoi pumnamakna amaga amaga warak watemnaduna asengba amasung achumbada leigadabani haina tasengna utli. 

1 Johan 1 

Khristada lomba naidana hingba


1 Ahanbadagi leiramba, ekhoina taraba, eikhoigi imitna uraba, eikhoina ujaduna ikhutna soklaba hingbagi waheigi marida 

2 (amasung hingba adu phongdokle, aduga eikhoina ure, amasung mapaga leiminnaramba aduga eikhoida phongdoklaba hingba, haibadi lomba naidaba adugi sakshi oijaduna, nakhoida tamthok-i), 

3 Eikhoina uraba amasung taraba adu nakhoinasu eikhoiga saruk phangminnanaba, eikhoina nakhoidasu tamthok-i; aduga eikhoi saruk phangminnaba asi mapaga machanipa Jisu Khristaga loinabani. 

4 Amasung eikhoigi haraoba mapung phahannanaba eikhoina waram asi ibani.


Iswarga saruk phangminnabadi paptagi leithokpa haibani


5 Amahiksung eikhoina ibungodagi taraduna nakhoida khanghanba pao adu asini; hai badi, Iswardi manganni, aduga ibungo mangonda amamba khak leite. 

6 Eikhoina ibungoga saruk phangminnabani hairaga, amambada chatlabadi, eikhoi minambani amasung achumba adu toudabani; 

7 Adubu ibungo mahakna manganda leibagumna eikhoina manganda chatlabadi, eikhoina amaga amaga saruk phangminnabani, amasung ibungo mahakki macha nipa Jisugi ina pap pumnamaktagi eikhoibu sengdokpi. 

8 Eikhoina eikhoigi pap leite hairabadi, eikhoina isa ithantabu minamjabani, aduga achumba adu eikhoida leite. 

9 Eikhoina eikhoigi pap haidok-charabadi, eikhoigi pap kokpinanaba amasung dharma chendaba pumnamaktagi eikhoibu sengbinanaba, ibungo mahakti thajaba yaba amasung achumbani. 

10 Eikhoina pap toude hairabadi, eikhoina ibungo mahakpu chinthihalli, amasung ibungo mahakki wa ekhoida leite.

1 Johan 2 

1 Eigi nungsiba angangsa, nakhoina pap toudananaba, eina waramsing asi nakhoida iribani. Amasung kanagumbana pap tourabadi, ipagi mangda eikhoigi wa nombiba dharma chenba Jisu Khrista lei; 

2 Aduga ibungo masamak eikhoigi papkidamak senggatpinaba oibi; eikhoigi damaktada natte, adubu taibangpal apumbagi damaksuni.


Saruk phangminnabagi pramandi haiba inbani


3 Amasung eikhoina ibungogi yathang makhei ngaklabadi, asina eikhoina ibungobu khang-i haiba eikhoina khang-i. 

4 Eina ibungobu haiba amasung ibungogi yathang makhei ngaktaba mahak adu chinthibani, amasung mangonda achumba leite; 

5 Touigumbasung ibungogi wa ngakpa kanagumba mi aduda thanggei sengna iswarbu nungsiba changkholle: Asina eikhoina ibungoda leiri haiba eikhoina khang-i: 

6 Ibungoda itattattana leiri haiba mahak aduna ibungona chatlambagumna mahakmaknasu chatpa tare. 

7 Achanbasa, anouba yathang nakhoida eina iba natte, adubu ahoubadagi nakhoina phangkhraba ariba yathang aduni ariba yathang adudi nakhoina taraba wa aduni. 

8 Amukka, eina nakhoida anouba yathang iri. Masi ibungodasu nakhoidasu achumbani; maramdi amamba adu lanthokli, aduga houjik achumba mangal adu ngalli. 

9 Mahak manganda leiri haiba amasung machin manaobu tuk-kachaba mahak aduna houjik phaobasu amambad leiri. 

10 Machin manaobu nungsiba mahak aduna manganda itatttana leiribani aduga mangonda khudi thipham kite. 

11 Touigumbasung machin manaobu tukkachaba mahak aduna amambada leiribani, aduga mahakna amamba aduda chattuna, mahak kadaida chatlibano khangde, maramdi amamba aduna mahakki mamit tanghalle. 

12 Nungsiba angangsa, eina nakhoida iri, maramdi nakhoigi pap makhei ibungogi minggi maramna kokpi-rabani. 

13 Ipakhoi, eina nakhoida ijari maramdi ahoubadagi leiriba ibungobu nakhoina khangi. Pakhangsa, eina nakhoida iri, maramdi nakhoina phattaba ama adubu ngamle. Angangsa, eina nakhoida ire, maramdi nakhoina napabu khangi. 

14 Ipakhoi, eina nakhoida ijare, maramdi ahoubadagi leiriba ibungobu nakhoina khangi. Pakhangsa, eina nakhoida ire, maramdi nakhoidi kalli, amasung iswargi wa nakhoida itattattana leiri, aduga nakhoina phattaba ama adubu ngamle. 

15 Taibangpanbabu amasung taibangpangi manungda leiriba potsing adubu nungsiganu. Kangumba mina taibang-panbabu nungsirabadi, mapabu nungsibadu mangonda leite. 

16 Maramdi taibangpanda leiriba pumnamak, hakchangna pamba, mitna pamba, amasung punsigi napal ipadagi natte, adubu tai-bangpandagini. 

17 Aduga taibang-panbsu madugi apambasu mangba nai; adubu iswargi ningba touba mi aduna lomba naidana itattattana lei.


Anti-khristagi maramda mitna singhanba


18 Angangsa, akonba pungni; aduga anti-Khrista lak-i haiba nakhoina tarabagumna houjiksu ayamba anti-Khristtasing thoklakle; asidagi akonba pungni haiba eikhoina khang-i 

19 Makhoidi eikhoidagi chathokkhre, adubu makhoidi eikhoigi oiramde; maramdi makhoina eikhoigi oiramlabadi, eikhoiga tattana leiminnaramgadabani; touigumbasung makhoi pumnamak eikhoigi oiramde haiba phongdoknanaba chatthokkhre. 

20 Aduga nakhoidi asengba ama adudagi thao heibiba phangle, amasung nakhoi pumnamakna madu khang-i. 

21 Nakhoina achumba adu khangdaba maramna eina iba natte, adubu nakhoina madu khangbagi maramna, amasung chinthiba kari amata achumbadagi oidabagi maramna ibani. 

22 Jisubu Khristani haiba yadaba mahak adu nattana chin thiba adu kanano? Mapabasu macha nipa adubusu yadaba anti-khrist adu asini. 

23 Macha nipa adubu yadaba mi khudingna mapa-busu phangde. macha nipa adubu yaba mahak aduna mapabusu phang-i. 

24 Nakhoina ahoubadagi takhraba adu nakhoida itattattana leisanu. Ahoubadagi nakhoina takhraba adu nakhoida itattattana leirabadi, nakhoinasu macha nipa aduda amasung mapada itattattana leigani 

25 Amasung ibungona eikhoida waleppiraba walep adu asini, haibadi, lomba naidaba hingba aduni. 

26 Nakhoibu serannana chingthokningbasinggi maramda eina wasing asi nakhoida ire. 

27 Aduga nakhoina ibungodagi thao heibiba adu nakhoida itattattana lei, amasung kana-gumbana nakhoibu tambiba nakhoigi kannaba leite; adubu waram pumnamakki marida ibungogi thao heibiba aduna nakhoibu tambiba achumba oiba, chinthiba leitaba adugumna, amasung maduna nakhoibu tambikhiba gumna, ibungoda nakhoina itattattana leiyu. 

28 Amasung houjik, nungsiba angangsa, ibungobu phongdokpirabadi, eikhoina thouna phaduna, ibungona langlakpada ibungogi mangda ikaidananaba nakhoina ibungoda itattattana leiyu. 

29 Ibungo mahak achumbani haiba nakhoina khanglabadi, achumba touriba mi khudingbusu ibungo mahakna pokpire haiba nakhoina khang-i.

1 Johan 3 

Mapa iswargi nungsiba aduna aphaba mipal tanna chingbi. Papka iswargi macha nipa oiba phangjabaga chunadaba


1 Yeng-u, eikhoibu iswargi machasing-koubinaba, Ipana eikhoigi ithakta kaya nungsiba pinabibano! aduga eikhoi madumak oiri. Maram asigidamak taibangpanbana eikhoibu khangde, maramdi taibangpanbana ibungobu khanglamde. 

2 Achanbasa, houjik eikhoidi iswargi machasingni, amasung eikhoi kari oigadage houjik phongdoktari. Ibungobu phongdokpirabadi, eikhoi ibungo mangani haiba eikhoina khang-i; maramdi ibungona oiribamakkumna eikhoina ibungobu ujagani. 

3 Aduga ibungogi maphamda khourangna ningba asi leiba mi khuding-na, ibungona sengbagumna, masa mathantabu sengdokchei. 

4 Pap chenba mi khudingna wayel yathang indabasu toui, amasung papti wayel yathang indabani. 

5 Aduga nakhoina khang-i, haibadi, pap makhei pubinanaba ibungobu phongdokpire, amasung ibungoda pap khak leite. 

6 Ibungoda itattattana leiba mi khudingmak pap chende; pap chenba mi khudingna ibungobu usu ude, khangsu khangde 

7 Nungsiba angangsa, mi kana amatana nakhoibu serannana chingdasanu. Achumba touriba mahak adu, ibungona dharma chenbagumna, dharmachenbani. 

8 Pap chenba mahak adu diyaboldagini; maramdi diyaboldi ahoubadagi pap chelli. Diyabolgi thabak manghannanabagidamak iswargi Macha nipa adubu phongdokpire. 

9 Iswardagi poklaba mi khudingmak pap chende, maramdi ibungo mahakki maru mangonda itattattana lei, amasung mahakna pap chenduna leiba ngamde, maramdi mahakti iswardagi poklabani. 

10 Asida iswargi machasing amasung diyabolgi machasing phongdokpani. Achumba toudaba mi adu amasung machin manaobu nungsidaba mi adu iswardagi natte. 

11 Maramdi ahoubadagi nakhoina takhiba pao adu asini, haibadi, eikhoi amaga amaga nungsinagadabani. 

12 Kayinna phattaba ama adudagi oiramduna, manaobu hat khibagumna natte. Amasung mahakna mabu karigi damak hatkhibano? Maramdi mahakki thabak phatte, aduga mahakki manaogidi dharmachenbani.


Machin manaosinggi nungsiba


13 Ichin inaosa, taibangpanbana nakhoibu tukkacharabadi, ngakkanu. 

14 Eikhoina sibadagi hingba tanna lanthokle haiba eikhoina khang-i, maramdi eikhoina ichin inaosingbu nungsi. 

15 Nungsidaba mahak aduna sibada itattattana leibani. Machin manaobu tukkachaba mi khudingdi mihatpani, aduga mihatpa kana amatada lomba naidaba hingba leite haiba nakhoina khang-i. 

16 Asina eikhoina nungsiba khangi, haibadi, ibungona eikhoigidamak mathawai thabire; aduga eikhoina ichin inaosinggi damak eikhoigi thawai thabipham thok-i. 

17 Touigumbasung taibangpangi lal leiba amasung mahakki machin manaogi kanagadaba uraga mahakki chanbiba mangonda pibidraba kanagumba mi aduda iswargi nungsiba karamna lei-bano? 

18 Nungsiba angangsa, eikhoina waheina amasung leina nungsiganusi, adubu thabakna amasung achumbana nungsisi. 

19 Asina eikhoina achumbadagini haiba eikhoina khanggani aduga eikhoigi pukningna eikhoibu lalhallabada, 

20 Eikhoina eikhoigi pukningbu ibungogi mangda themjingani; maramdi iswarna eikhoigi pukningdagi henna chaoi, amasung pumnamak ikhang khang-i. 

21 Achanbasa, eikhoigi pukningna eikhoibu lalhandrabadi, iswargiromda eik-hoibu thouna phaba lei; 

22 Amasung eik-hoina nijaba makhei ibungo mangondagi phangjei, maramdi eikhoina ibungo mahakki yathang ngakchduna ibungo mahakki mityengda apamba adu eikhoina toujei. 

23 Amasung asi ibungo mahakki yathangni, haibadi, ibungo mahakki macha nipa Jisu Khristagi mingda eikhoina thajagadabani, amasung ibungona eikhoida yathang pikhibagumna, eikhoina amaga amaga nungsinagadabani. 

24 Aduga ibungo mahakki yathang ngakpa mahak aduna ibungo mangonda itattattana lei; amasung ibungo mahakna mangonda itattattana lei; amasung asina, haibadi ibungo mahakna eikhoida pibiraba thawai adugi mapnna, ibungo mahakna eikhoida itattattana lei haiba eikhoina khang-i.

1 Johan 4 

Iswargi mapaokhol oibra oidabra khangnanaba


1 Achanbasa, thawai khudingbu thaja-ganu, adubu thawaising adu iswarda-gira chang yeng-u; maramdi ayamba iswargi wa takthoksinnabasing taibang-pan-gi manungda chathokkhre. 

2 Asina iswargi thawai adubu nakhoina khang-i: Jisu Khristana hakchang oina lakle haiba yaba thawai khuding iswardagini; 

3 Aduga Jisubu yadaba thawai khuding iswardagi natte. Amasung asi anti-khristagi thawaini, mahak lak-i haiba magi maramda nakhoina tare, aduga houjikmak mahak taibangpanda leiri. 

4 Nakhoidi iswargini, nungsiba angangsa, aduga nakhoina makhoibu ngamle; mararndi nakhoida leiriba ibungo mahak aduna taibangpanda leiriba mahak adudagi henna chao-i. 

5 Mahkoina taibangpanbagini, maram aduna makhoina taibangpanbagi ngang-i, aduga taibangpanbana makhoigi wa tai. 

6 Eikhoidi iswargini, iswarbu khangba mahak aduna eikhoigi wa tai; iswargi nattaba mahak aduna eikhoigi wa tade. Asidagi eikhoina achumbagi thawaibu amasung aranbagi thawaibu khangi.


Iswargi nungsiba amasung mioibagi nungsiba


7 Achanbasa, eikhoina amaga amaga nungsinasi; maramdi nungsiba iswar-dagini, aduga nungsiba mi khuding iswardagi pokpani, amasung iswarbu khangi. 

8 Nungsidaba mahak aduna iswarbu khangde; maramdi iswardi nung-sibani. 

9 Asina iswargi nungsiba adu eik-hoigi maramda phongdokpire, haibadi, iswarna macha nipa amata ngaiba adubu, eikhoina ibungo adugi mapanna hingnanaba, taibangpanda thabirakle. 

10 Asida nungsiba lei, haibadi, eikhoina iswarbu nungsire haiba natte, adubu iswarna eikhoibu nungsibiraduna ibungo mahakki macha nipa adubu eikhoigi papkidamak senggatpinaba oina thabire. 

11 Achanbasa, iswarna eikhoibu asup nungsibirabadi, eikhoinasu amaga amaga nungsinapham thok-i. 

12 Iswarbu kana amatana khak ude; eikhoina amaga amaga nungsinarabadi, iswarna eikhoida itattattana lei; aduga ibungo mahakpu nungsiba eikhoida chaangkholle. 

13 Asina eikhoina ibungo mangonda amasung ibungo mahakna eikhoida itattattana lei haiba eikhoina khangi, maramdi ibungo mahakna eikhoida ibungo mahakki thawaidagi khaibire. 

14 Amasung mapana macha nipa adubu taibangpanbagi kanbiba mapu oina thabire haiba eikhoina ure, amasung sakshi piri. 

15 Jisu Khristabu iswargi macha nipani haina kanagumbana haidok-charabadi, iswarna mangonda amasung mahakna iswarda itattattana lei. 

16 Aduga eikhoigi maramda iswargi nungsiba leiba adu eikhoina khangi, amasung thajare. Iswardi nungsibani, amasung nungsibada itattattana leiriba mahak aduna iswarda itattattana lei, aduga iswarna mangonda itattattana lei. 

17 Asida nungsiba adu eikhoiga changkhomninnare, aduna eikhoina wayen-gi numitta thouna phanabani, maramdi ibungona oiribagumna eikhoinasu taibangpan asida oiri. 

18 Nungsibada akiba leite, touigumbasung changkhonba nungsibana akiba langthok-i; maramdi akibadi wakongga tinnabani; aduga akiba mahak aduna nungsibada changkhonde. 

19 Eikhoina nungsi, maramdi ibungo mahakna eikhoibu hanna nungsi-bire. 

20 Kanagumba mina, eina iswarbu nungsi, hairaga machin manaobu tukka-charabadi, mahakti chinthiba mini; maramdi mahakna uraba machin manaobu nungsidaba mahak aduna udriba iswarbu nungsiba ngamde. 

21 Amasung iswarbu nungsiba mahak aduna machin manaobusu nungsigadabani haiba yathang asi eikhoina ibungodagi phangi.

1 Johan 5 

Khristan-gi thajaba


1 Jisubu Khrista-ni haiba thajaba mi khuding iswardagi poklabani, aduga pokpiba ibungo mahakpu nungsiba mi khudingna ibungo mangondagi poklaba mahakpusu nungsi. 

2 Asina, eikhoina iswarbu nungsiduna ibungo mahakki yathang makhei inba matamda, iswargi machasingbu nungsi haiba eikhoina khang-i. 

3 Maramdi eikhoina ibungo mahakki yathang makhei ngakpa, asi iswarbu nungsibani; aduga ibungo mahakki yathang makhei arumba natte. 

4 Maramdi iswardagi poklaba khudingna taibangpanbabu ngammi; aduga taibangpanbabu ngamlaba mangam adu asini, haibadi eikhoigi thajabani. 

5 Amasung Jisubu iswargi machanipani haiba thajaba mahak adu nattana, taibangpanbabu ngamba mahak adu kanano? 

6 Isingga amasung iga loinana lenglakpa ibungo adu asini, haibadi Jisu Khristani; ising adutana nattana, ising aduna amasung i aduna lenglakpani. 

7 Aduga sakshi piriba adu thawai aduni, maramdi thawai adudi achumbani. 

8 Maramdi sakshi piriba ahum lei, madudi thawai, ising amasung i aduni, aduga ahum asi amata oina yanei. 

9 Eikhoina misinggi sakshi lourabadi, iswargi sakshina henna chao-i; maramdi iswargi sakshi adu asini, haibadi, ibungo mahakna macha nipa adugi marida sakshi pibire. 

10 Iswargi macha nipa adubu thajaba mahak adu masamakta sakshi adu lei. Iswarbu thajabada mahak aduna ibungo mahakpu chinthiba oihalle; maramdi iswarna ibungo mahakki macha nipa adugi marida pikhraba sakshi aduda mahakna thajade. 

11 Amasung sakshi adu asini, madudi, iswarna eikhoida lomba naidaba hingba pibire, aduga hingba asi ibungo mahakki macha nipa aduda lei. 

12 Macha nipa adubu phanglaba mahak aduna hingba adu phangle; iswargi macha nipa adubu phangdaba mahak aduna hingba adu phangde.


Aroiba wa


13 Iswargi macha nipa adugi mingda thajaba nakhoida lomba naidaba hingba lei haiba nakhoina khangnanaba, eina waramsing asi nakhoida ire. 

14 Amasung ibungo mahakki mangda eikhoigi leiba thouna adu asini, madudi ibungo mahakki ningba matung inna karigumba eikhoina nijarabadi, ibungo mahakna eikhoigi nijaba tabi. 

15 Aduga eikhoina kari kari-gurnba nijaba ibungo mahakna tabi haiba eikhoina khanglabadi, eikhoina ibungo mangondagi nijaba makhei adu phangjare haiba eikhoina khang-i. 

16 Kanagumbana mahakki machin manaona siba thokhanba nattaba pap touriba urabadi, mahakna nijagadabani, amasung iswarna mangonda siba thokhanba nattaba pap toubasinggi damak hingba pibigani. Siba thokhanba pap lei; asigi maram da mahakna nijagadabani haiduna eina haiba natte. 

17 Dharma chendaba pumnamak papni, aduga siba thokhanba nattaba pap lei. 

18 Iswardagi poklaba mi khudinginak pap chende, adubu iswardagi pokkhraba mahak aduna masabu sennajei, amasung phattaba ama aduna mahakpu sokte haiba eikhoina khang-i. 

19 Eikhoidi iswargini, aduga taibangpanba apumbana phattaba ama adugi makha ponduna lei haibi eikhoina khang-i. 

20 Aduga iswargi macha nipa aduna lengbirakle, amasung eikhoida khangnaba pibire haiba eikhoina khang-i; aduna eikhoina achumba oiba ibungo mahakpu khang-i, amasung ibungo mahakki machanipa Jisu Khristada leiduna, eikhoina achumba oiba ibungo mangonda leiri. Asi achumba iswar, amasung lomba naidaba hingba aduni. 

21 Nungsiba angangsa, nakhoi nasabu lai-murtisingdagi ngakchou.

2 John 

A-iba: Johan 

JOHANNA IBA ANISUBA LAIRIK 

Ibagi matam: A.D. 85-90 

Wamachang: Amaga amaga nungsinaba. 

Khristabu lousinkhraba pumnamakna amaga amaga nungsinagadabani haibasi lairik asida mayek sengna khanghalli.


1 Khan-gatIabi ibemmada amasung mahakki machasingda ahallaman oija-riba eina ijabani. Eina nakhoibu achum-bada nungsi, amasung eitana natte adubu achumba adu khangba makhoi pumnamaknasuni; 

2 Eikhoida itattattana leiba amasung eikhoiga lomba naidana leiminnagadaba achumba adugi maramgi damakni. 

3 Ipa iswardagi amasung ipa iswargi macha nipa Jisu Khristadagi, achumbada amasung nungsibada, thoujal, nungsi-heiba amasung ingthaba eikhoiga loinabigani. 

4 Eikhoina ipadagi yathang phanglabagumna, achumbada chatliba nahakki nachasing kana kanagumbabu phangbada eina yamna haraojei. 

5 Amasung houjik, ibemma, eina nangonda nonjari; anouba yathang eina nangonda ikaribagum natte, adubu eikhoi amaga amaga nungsinagadabani haiba ahoubadagi eikhoina phangjaraba adu ijabani. 

6 Aduga eikhoina ibungo mahakki yathang makheigi matung inna chatpa asi nungsibani. Nakhoina ahoubadagi takhibagumna, madugi matung inna nakhoina chatkadabani haiba, yathang adu asini. 

7 Maramdi Jisu Khristana hakchang oina lengbirak-i haiba yadaba ayamba minambasingna taibangpanda thokkhre. Asi minamba mi aduni amasung anti-Khrist aduni. 

8 Eikhoina toukhi toukhiba adu nakhoina manghandaduna changkhonba mana phangnanaba, nakhoi nasen sajen toujou. 9 Hendokna chatpa amasung Khristagi tambibada lengdana leitaba mi khudingna iswarbu phangde; tambiba aduda lengdana leiba mahak aduna Mapabusu Macha nipa adubusu phangi. 

10 Kanagumbana nakhoida laklaga tambiba asi puraktrabadi, mahakpu nakhoigi yumda lousinganu aduga mangonda taram taramna touganu; 

11 Maramdi mangonda taram taram touba mahak aduna mahakki phatta-phattaba thabak adu saruk phang-minnei. 

12 Nakhoida igadaba waram ayamba leiraduna eina che amasung mukna ijaningde adubu nakhoigi haraoba mapung phahannanaba eina nakhoida laktuna hakthengnana ngangnajanaba khourangna ning-i. 

13 Nahakki khan-gatlabi nanaogi machasingna nahakpu khurumjei.

3 John 

JOHANNA IBA AHUMSUBA LAIRIK 

A-iba: Johan 

Ibagi matam: A.D. 85-90 aduwai. 

Wamachang: Achumba waheida chaokhatpa. Khristan macha pumnamakna achumbada chaokhatkadabani haiba lairik asida mayek sengna takli.


1 Ahallaman oijariba eina achumbada nungaijaba achanba Gayada ijabani. 

2 Achanba, nahakki thawaina thabak pangbagumna, maram pumnamakta nahakna thabak pangnanaba amasung nasa phaba oinanaba eina haijei. 

3 Maramdi ichin inao sengna laktuna nahakki achumbagi damak sakshi piba matamda, eina yamna haraojare; maramdi nahakna achumbada chatlibani. 

4 Eigi ichasingna achumbada chatli haiba taba asidagi henba haraoba eigi leijade. 

5 Achanba; nahakna ichin inao oi-basingda, thoidokpadi lamlanbasinggi maphamda toubi toubibada thajaba yaba thabak nahakna tou-i; 

6 Makhoina singlupki mangda nahakki nungsibagi sakshi pire; nahakna iswargi matik chana makhoibu makhoigi langphei sandokpada thindokpirabadi, nahakna phajana toubigani. 

7 Maramdi ming adugi maramgidamak makhoina atoppa jatsingdagi karisu loudana chatthokkhi. 

8 Maram aduna ekhoina achumba adugi damak thabak touminnabasing oinanaba, asi-gumba misingbu eikhoina lousinbipham thok-i. 

9 Eina singlupta wa khara ijare; toui-gumbasung makhoigi marakta athoiba oiningba Diyotrephina eikhoibu loubide. 

10 Maram aduna ei laklabadi, mahakna touri touriba mahakki thabak adu eina ning-sing-han-gani. Mahakna eikhoigi ithakta phattaba wana pet pet ngangi, aduga wa asitana pendaduna, mahakmakna ichin inaosingbu loubide, loujaningbasingbusu mahakna khammi, amasung makhoibu singluptagi insu inthok-i. 

11 Achanba, phattaba adugi matou louganu, adubu aphabagi matou loubiyu. Aphaba touba mahak adu iswargini; phataba touba mahak aduna iswarbu udri. 

12 Mi pumnamakna amasung achumba adumakna Dimitriyagi sakshi pire; hoi, eikhoinasu sakshi pibani, aduga eikhoigi sakshi achumbani haiba nahakna khang-i. 

13 Eina nangonda igadaba waram yamna leirammi, adubu eiba mukna amasung kolamna nangonda ininggde; 

14 Touigumbasung eina nahakpu thuna unanaba khourangna ningjabani, aduga eikhoina hakthengnana ngangnagani. 

15 Nangonda ingthaba leibisanu. Marupsingna nahakpu khurumjei. Marupsingbu maming maming panduna khurumjei haibiyu.

JIHUDANA IBA LAIRIK 

A-iba: Jihuda \n
Ibagi matam: A.D. 95-96 

Wamachang: Ninghannadaduna achumbada chetna leiba. Khristan macha pumnamakna ninghannaba leitana Iswarbu thagatkadabani amasung achumbada chetna lepkadabani haibadi khanghalli.


Khurumjaba


1 Jisu Khristagi minai amasung Jakobki machin manao oiba Jihudana, koubikhraba nakhoida, haibadi, ipa iswargi maphamda challaba amasung Jisu Khristagi damak ngaklabasingda; 

2 Chanbiba, ingthaba amasung nungsiba yamkhatsanu.


Tambisinnaba mising amasung phattaba Lamchatki maramda mit-na singhanba


3 Achanbasa, eina nakhoida eikhoi mayamgi oiba aran khubamgi maramda thuna inanaba hotnaringeida, asengbasingda amuktada pithokkhraba thajaba adugidamak thawai yaona angam tanna-naba nakhoibu insinduna ibana eigi tangaiphadaba oikhi. 

4 Maramdi kana kanagumba mising lonna litsinkhre; wayel asigidamak makhoigi maramda mamangngeida hanna ikhrabani. Makhoidi iswar ningdaba, eikhoigi iswargi thoujanbu apaibada olhanba, eikhoigi amata ngaiba mapu amasung Prabhu, Jisu Khristabu yadaba mini. 

5 Amahiksung nakhoina waram pumnamak amuktada khanglabasu, eina nakhoibu ningsinghanjaningi, haibadi, Prabhuna Misor leibaktagi mising adubu kanbire hairaga, matungda thajadabasingbu manghalle. 

6 Aduga makhoimakki khudum chanba adu ngaktaduna makhoimakki panpham thadokpa swargadutsingbu ibungo mahakna achouba numitki wayen-gi damak amambada lomba naidaba punduna thamle. 

7 Adugumduna Sodom amasung Gomora aduga makhoigi akoibada leiba sahar adu asisingga machat manana marumbigi thabak touraba, amasung tonganba hakchanggi matung inna chatlaba aduna lomba naidaba meigi wakong khangduna, pandam oina utlibani. 

8 Adum oinamakpu machat aduga mannana asisingnasu makhoigi mamang mangbada hakchangbu mothalli, Mapu oibabu karisu oihande, amasung matik mangal chaobasingda thina ngangi. 

9 Touigumbasung athoiba swargadut Mikhayelna Diyabolga ningai tounaduna Mousigi hakchanggi maramda chinda paodanaba matamda, thina ngnagbagi wayel magi mathkta puraknaba thouna leiramde, adubu, prabhuna nahakpu waraksanu, haiduna haik hi. 

10 Adubu makhoi asina khang-da-khangdaba potki mathakta thina ngang-i, amasung wakhal yaodaba lengli pallibasinggumna, makhoina mahousana khangba asisinggi mapanna makhoibu manghanbani. 

11 Makhoida awabanida maramdi makhoina Kayin-gi lambida chatkhre, maman-gidamak Biliyamgi aranbada makhoina oro oro chensinkhre, aduga Koragi wakhetpada makhoibu manghalle. 

12 Asisingdi nakhoigi nung-si-chak chana-chanabada nakhoiga chamin-thakminnaduna leiba arotpa nungjaoni, akiba leitana mathantabu yok-thakchaba yaosenbasingni; nungsitna humjemba ising yaodaba leichinni; mahei yandaba, anirak sirabi, mara yaona phuktoklaba ningthamthagi upam-bini; 

13 Makhoi masagi ikaibabu, kong-gongumna souhanba samadrugi sathiba ithakni; koipai paiba thawanmichak-singni, makhoi asigi damak amambagi amuba adu lomba naidana khaklabani. 

14 Amasung asisingdasu Adamdagi miron taretsuba Hanokna iswargi wa takthoktuna hai, yengu, prabhuna ibungogi asengbasing lising lisingga loinana lenglakle, 

15 Pumnamakki mathakta wayennana ba, amasung iswar ningdaba pumnamakpu makhoigi iswar-ningdana toukhiba iswar ningdabi thabak pumnamakki maramda, aduga iswar-ningdaba papchenbasingna ibungogi mathakta ngangkhiba ayakpa wa pumnamakki maramda lalhannanaba, ibungona lenglakle. 

16 Asisingdi murum-murum son-basingni, apenba leittabasingni. Makhoina makhoigi apaiba matung inna chatli, aduga tongjanabagi maramda misak mimai yengduna, makhoigi machinna pongna wa ngangi. 

17 Touigumbasung, achanbasa, eik-hoigi Prabhu jisu Khristagi pakhonchat-pasingna mamangngeida haikhi haikhiba wa adu nakhoina ningsingbiyu; 

18 Haibadi, akonba matamda makhoi masagi iswar-ningdaba apaiba matung inna chat-pa noknaganbasing leigani haina makhoina nakhoida hairammi. 

19 Asisingdi khainahanba, sagi machat chatpa, thawai phangdabasingni. 

20 Touigumbasung, achanbasa, nakhoina nakhoigi thoidok hendokna senglaba thajaba mathakta nakhoigi nasa semgatchaduna, thawai asengbagi mapanna haijaduna, 

21 Lomba naidana hingnaba eikhoigi Prabhu Jisu Khristagi nungsibiba ngaijaringeida, iswargi nungsibada nakhoi nasabu ngakchou. 

22 Amasung chingnaba touriba mi kharagi mathakta nungsibiba utlu; 

23 Makhoibu meidagi pak chingthokpiduna kanbiyu; aduga hakchangna makhanba phiron phaoba tukkachaduna, mi kharagi mathakta akibaga loinana nungsibiba utlu. 

24 Houjikti, khudi thidanaba nakhoibu ngakpiba amasung thoidokna haraobada amakpa jaodana ibungo mahakki matik mangangi mangda nakhoibu lephanba ngamba, 

25 Eikhoigi kanbiba mapu amata ngaiba iswarda eikhoigi Prabhu Jisu Khristagi mapanna ikaikhumnaba, matik mangal chaoba, pangganda amasung mapu oiba matam pumnamak oidringeigi mam angda, houjik, amasung lomba nai-daba phaoba oisanu. Amen.

JOHANDA PHONGDOKPIBA WA 

A-iba: Johan 

Ibagi matam: A.D. 95-96 

Wamachang: Tungda thoklakkadabasing. 

Masi Biblegi aroiba sarukni. Lairik asida tungda thoklakkadaba khudingmak sengna takli. Loinana Khristagi matik mangan-gi matangdasu ningthina utli. Anouba prithibi amuk oirakkadaba, amaga amaga yengthinaba lan soknaba, Iswarna eikhoigidamak leipham sembiba asinachingba pumnamak mayek sengna khanghalli. 

PHONGDOKPIBA WA 1 

Wahoudok amasung khurumjaba


1 Soidana thuna thokkadaba waram, Jisu Khristana ibungogi manai-singda utpinanaba iswarna ibungoda pibiraba phongdokpiba asini; aduga ibungona ibungogi dut thabiduna manai Johanda masi khanghanbire; 

2 Mahakna iswargi wagi amasung Jisu Khrista gi sakshigi maramda, haibadi, mahakna ukhi ukhiba pumnamakki maramda sakshi pire. 

3 Takthokpagi wasing, asi khon thokna paba mahak amasung taba makhoi, aduga madugi manungda ikhi ikhiba adu ngakpa makhoi yaiphabani; maramdi matam adu nakle. 

4 Johanna Esiyada leiba singlup taretki maphamda ibani: oiriba, oiramba amasung lakkadouriba ibungo mangondagi, ibungo mahakki phambal mangda leiriba thawai tarettagi, 

5 Amasung thajaba yaba sakshi, asibasingdagi ahanba pokpa, amasung prithibigi ningthousinggi mapu oiba Jisu Khristadagi thoujal amasung ingthaba nakhoida leibisanu. Eikhoibu nungsibiba, ibungogi, ina eikhoigi paptagi eikhoibu thadokpiraba; 

6 Aduga eikhoibu ning-thou-leibak amasung ibungogi mapa iswargi maphamda purohitsing oihanbiba ibungoda matik mangal amasung panba adu lomba naidaba oisanu. Amen. 

7 Yeng-u, ibungodi leichin-ga loinana lenglak-i; aduga mit khudingna amasung ibungobu tana thinkhibasing aduna ibungobu ugani; aduga prithibigi jat pumnamakna ibungogi maramda wabana thabak yeinagani. Hoi, Amen. 

8 Oiriba, Oiramba amasung lakkadouriba, ingam ngamba Prabhu Iswar aduna hai, Eidi Alpha amasung Omega aduni.


Migi macha nipagi marida uhanbiba


9 Nakhoigi nachin nano amasung Jisugi marida awa-anang, ning-thou-leibak, amasung khangheibagi saruk nakhoiga phangminnaba Johan eina iswargi wagi amasung Jisugi sakshigi maramda Patmo kouba ithatta leirammi. 

10 Ei prabhugi numitta thawaida leirammi, aduga peresinggagigumna achouba khonjel amana itungda asi haiba eina tare, 

11 Nahakna uriba adu lairikta isinduna singlup taretta, haibadi, Ephisada, Smarnada, Pargamada, Thuyatirada,, Sarddida, Philadelphiyada amasung Layodikeyada mudu tharo. 

12 Amasung eingonda ngangba khonjel adu unanaba eina olLarnmi. Aduga ollaklaga eina sanagi thaomei makhong taretpu, 

13 Amasung thaomei makhongsing adugi mayaida migi macha nipa manba, khumit thumna phi thollaba aduga sanagi khwangjetna thabak akoibada thollaba amabu ure. 

14 Amasung makokka masamga angouba sa matugum, un-gum ngou-i; aduga mamitna meigi meirigummi, 

15 Amasung makhong khongdonna meiphamda phudonglaba ningthijaba pithrai gummi; aduga mahakki khonjenna ising mayamgi iraokhon gummi. 

16 Amasung makhut yetta thawanmichak taret lei, machindagi athouba maya ani panba kabakthang thok-i, aduga mahakki maithongdi yamna nganba numitkummi. 

17 Amahiksung eina ibungobu ujabada, asibagumna eina ibungogi khuyada tuthajare. Aduga ibungona makhut yetna ithakta thambiduna hai, kiganu; Eidi ahanba amasung Akonba, 

18 Aduga hingliba aduni; amas-ung eidi sirakle, aduga yeng-u, eidi lomba naidana hingli, amasung sibagi aduga khamnung leibakki so eingonda lei. 

19 Maram aduna nahakna ukhi ukhiba adu, oiri oiriba adu amasung asigi matungda thokla thoklagadaba adu iyu; 

20 Eigi khut yetta nahakna ukhiba thawanmichak taret amasung sanagi thaomei makhong taret adugi athuppa wa adudi: thawanmichak taret adudi singlup taret adugi dutsingni, aduga thaomei makhong taret adudi singlup taretni.

PHONGDOKPIBA WA 2 

Ephisagi singlupta iba lairik


1 Ephisada leiba singlupki dut aduda iyu: Khut yetta thawanmichak taret adu pairiba, sanagi thaomei makhong taret adugi marakta koichat chatliba ibungo aduna wasing asi hairibani. 

2 Nahakki thabak, nomba, khangheiba, amasung phattabasingbu nahakna khangba ngamde haiba, aduga masa mathantabu pakhonchatpa koujaba, oibadi oidabasingbu chang yengduna makhoigi minamba nahakna phangle haiba eina khang-i. 

3 Amasung nahakna khangba hei, eigi minggi damak khangbire, amasung awaba pokte. 

4 Adubu nathakta eigi wa asi lei, haibadi, nangna nanggi ahanba nungsiba adu thadokle. 

5 Maram aduna nangna kadaidagi takhibano ningsing-u, aduga napukning hongduna ahanba thabak adu tou; nattraga, nangna pukning hongdrabadi, eina nangonda laktuna nanggi thaomei makhong adu maphamdagi hongdokkani. 

6 Touigumbasung nanggi asi lei, haibadi, eina tukkachaba Nikolaitisinggi thabak adu nangnasu tukka-chei. 

7 Thawai aduna singlupsingda haiba adu manakong panba mahak aduna tajasanu. Ngamliba mahak aduda iswargi paradaista leiriba hingbagi upambidagi chananaba eina pibigani.


Smarnagi singlupta iba lairik


8 Amahiksung Smarnada leiba singlupki dut aduda iyu: siraga hinglakiaba, ahanba amasung akonba, ibungo aduna wasing asi hairibani. 

9 Nanggi awa-ana amasung lairaba (adubu nangdi inakkhulli), aduga makhoi masana Jihudisingni hairaga, oibadi oidana, Seitan-gi kanglup oiriba makhoisinggi athiba wa adu eina khang-i. 

10 Nangna awa khanggadouriba adu kiganu. yeng u, nakhoibu chang yengnanaba diyabolna nakhoi kharabu keisumsangda hunjingadouri, amasung numit tarani awa-ana nakhoina phanggani. Nangna siba phaoba thajaba yaba oiyu, aduga eina nangonda hingbagi luhup pibigani. 

11 Thawai aduna singlupsingda haiba adu manakong panba mahak aduna tajasanu. Ngamliba mahak adubu anisuba sibana sok-panba leiroi.


Pargamagi singlupta iba lairik


12 Amahiksung Pargamada leiba singlupki dut aduda iyu: Athouba maya ani panba kabakthang adu leiba ibungo aduna wasing asi hairibani. 

13 Nangna palliba maphamadu eina khang-i, maduda seitan-gi phambal lei; aduga nangna eigi ming chetna pai, amasung seitanna panba maphamda nakhoigi nanakta hatkhiba eigi sakshi oiba, eigi thajaba yaba Antipagi numitmaktasu nangna eingonda thajaba adu yadaba toukhide. 

14 Touigumbasung nathakta eigi wa khara lei, maramdi mapaham aduda Biliyamgi tambiba adu ngakpasing nangonda lei, lai-murtida katluraba pot chanaba, amasung marumbi tinnanaba, Israyelgi machasinggi mangda khudi thinaba asi langsinnanaba mahakna Balakpu tambire. 

15 Adugumduna Nikolaitisinggi tambiba adu matou aduga mannana ngakpasingsu nangonda lei. 

16 Maram aduna pukning hong-u; nattraga eina nangonda thuna laklaga, eigi ichin-gi kabakthangna makhoigi mathakta lan soknagani. 

17 Thawai aduna singlupsingda haiba adu manakong panba mahak aduna tajasanu. Ngamliba mahak aduda eina arotpa manna pibigani, amasung nungngou ama, aduga nung adugi mathakta ikhraba anouba ming ama eina mangonda pibigani; madu phangba mahak adu nattana mi kana amatana ming adu khangde.


Thuyatiragi singlupta iba lairik


18 Amahiksung thuyatirada leiba singlupki dut aduda iyu: meigi meiri manba mamit panba amasung makhong khong-don ningthijaba pithrai manba, iswargi macha nipa aduna wasing asi hairibani. 

19 Nanggi thabak, nanggi nungsiba, thajaba, thougan touba, amasung khangheiba adu, aduga nanggi akonba thabakna ahanbadagi helli haiba adu eina khangi. 

20 Adubu nathakta eigi wa asi lei, haibadi, masa mathantabu iswargi wa takthokpi koujabi nupi Isebelbu nangna yabiri, aduga manadi eigi inaisingbu marumbi tinnanaba amasung lai-murtida katluraba pot chananaba tambiduna themdok-i. 

21 Amasung mana pukning hongnanaba eina mangonda matam pibire, aduga magi marumbigi thabaktagi mana pukning hongningde. 

22 Yeng-u, makhoina magi thabaktagi pukning hongdrabadi, eina mabu phamungda, aduga maga loinana lannaba thabak toubasingbu achouba awaanabadi langsing-gani. 

23 Amasung eina magi machasingbu sibana hatkani; aduga pukning amasung thanmmi makhei thiba mahak adu eini haiba singlup pumnamakna khanglakkani, amasung eina nakhoi amamamda nakhoi nakhoigi thabak matung inna pibigani. 

24 Touigumbasung Thuyatirada lemhouba, tambiba asi loudaba, seitan-gi aruba wa (makhoina haibagumna) khangdabasing, nakhoida eina haibani, eina nakhoigi nathakta atei arumba kari amata langsilloi. 

25 Adum oinamakpu nakhoigi leijaba adu eina lakpa phaoba chetna paiyu. 

26 Aduga ngamliba amasung mamei phaoba eigi thabak makhei ngakli, ba mahak aduda eina jatsingggi mathakta matik pibigani; 

27 Amasung phusabagi phuna itoi toina kaikhibagum, einasu ipadagi phanglabagumna, mahakna makhoibu yotki cheina sennagani; 

28 Aduga eina mangonda thawanmichak sajik adu pibi-gani. 

29 Thawai aduna singlupsingda, haiba adu manakong panba mahak aduna tajasanu.

PHONGDOKPIBA WA 3 

Sarddigi singlupta iba lairik


1 Amahiksung Sarddida leiba singlupki dut aduda iyu: Iswargi thawai taret amasung thawanmichak taret leiba ibungo aduna wasing asi hairibani. Nanggi thabak eina khang-i, haibadi, nang hingli haiba naming lei, aduga nangdi asibani. 

2 Nang yahouduna mitseng khangjaro, aduga sigadouraba lemhoubasing adubu panggal happiyu; maramdi eigi iswargi mangda nanggi thabak changkhollaba oina eina phangdre. 

3 Maram aduna nangna karamna phangkhibano amasung takhibano ningsing-u; aduga madu ngaktuna pukning hong-u. Adubu nangna mitseng khangdrabadi, huranbagumna eina lakkani, amasung eina karamba pungda nathakta lakkadaba nangna supkhang khangloi. 

4 Touigumbasung makhoigi maphi marol mothandaba Sarddida ming khara nanggi lei; aduga makhoina eiga loinana phingou settuna koiminnagani, maramdi makhoi matik chaba mini. 

5 Ngamliba mahak adubu asum touna angouba phiron thonbigani; amasung eina mahakki maming adu hingbagi lairiktagi khak muthatpiroi, aduga eina mahakki maming adu Ipagi amasung ibungo mahakki dutsinggi mangda yabigani. 

6 Thawai aduna singlupsingda haiba adu manakong panba mahak aduna tajasanu.


Philadelphiyagi singlupta iba lairik


7 Amahiksung Philadelphiyada leiba singlupki dut aduda iyu: Asengba, achumba, Dayudki so leiba, hanglaga kana amatana thingloidaba, amasung thinglaga kana amatana hangdaba ibungo aduna wasing asi hairibani. 

8 Eina nanggi thabak khang-i (Yeng-u, kana amatana thingba ngamdaba hangkhraba thong ama namangda eina pibire), haibadi panggal khara nanggi lei, aduga eigi wa ngaktuna eigi ming nangna yadaba toude. 

9 Yeng-u, seitan-gi kanglup, masana, Jihudisingni hairaga oibadi oidaba, chinthiba makhoi adudagi kharabu eina pibi; yeng-u, eina makhoibu lakhanduna nanggi khuyada khurumjahangani, amasung eina nangbu nungsire haiba makhoibu khanghan-gani. 

10 Eigi khangheibagi wa adu nangna ngaklabagi maramna, prithibigi mathakta pallibasingbu chang yengnanaba, taibangpal apumbada lakkadouriba chang yengbagi pung adudagi einasu nangbu ngakpigani. 

11 Ei thuna lakkadrouri; mi kana amatana nanggi luhup loukhidananaba, nanggi leijaba adu chetna paiyu. 

12 Ngamliba mahak adubu eina eigi iswargi asengba sangda yumbi ama oihanbigani; aduga mahakna mapham adudagi amuk hanna chatthoklaroi; amasung eigi iswargi ming, eigi iswargi sahar, eigi iswardagi, swargadagi kumtharakpa anouba Jerusalem adugi ming, amasung eimakki anouba ming adu eina mahakki mathakta ibigani. 

13 Thawai aduna singlupsingda haiba adu manakong panba mahak aduna tajasanu.


Layodikeyagi singlupta iba lairik


14 Amahiksung Layodikeyada leiba singlupki dut aduda iyu: Amen kouba, thajaba yaba amasung achumba sakshi, iswarna semkhrabagi ahouba ibungo aduna wasing asi hairibani. 

15 Nanggi thabak eina khang-i, nangna ingsu ingde, sasu sade. Nangna ingba nattraga saba oiba eina pamjei. 

16 Aduna nangna lumbu lumbu saba, amasung sasu sadaba, ingsu ingdaba maramna, eina nangbu eigi ichindagi sittokkani. 

17 Ei inak khulli, lal yamna phangle, amasung karisu watte, nangna haibagi maramna, aduga nanggi tonthaba, anangba, lairaba, mittangba amasung phi settaba nangna khangdabagi maramna, 

18 Nangna inakkhullaknanaba meina phudonglaba sana, nanggi nasada setnanaba amasung nanggi phi settabagi ikaiba phongdananaba angouba phirol, aduga nangna unanaba namit teinabagi thao, eingondagi leinanaba eina nangbu takpiri. 

19 Eina nungsiba makheibu waraksu warakpi, laksu lakpi; maram aduna thawai yao, aduga pukning hong-u. 

20 Yeng-u, eina thongda leptuna yeiri; kanagumbana eigi khonjel taduna thong adu hangbirabadi eina mangonda changduna mahakka aduga mahakna eiga chaminnagani. 

21 Eina ngamladuna eigi ipagi phambanda ibungo mahakka phaminnaraba adugumna ngamliba mangondasu eiga eigi phambanda phamminnaba pibigani. 

22 Thawai aduna singlupsingda haiba adu manakong panba mahak aduna tajasanu.

PHONGDOKPIBA WA 4 

Swarga leibakki marida uhanbiba


1 Waramsing asigi matungda eina ure, aduga yeng-u, thong ama swargada hangdoktuna lei; amasung eina taraba ahanba khonjel aduna peresinggagigumna eiga ngangnaduna hai, asida kakhatlak-u, aduga asigi matungda thokkadaba makhei adu eina nangonda uhange. 

2 Khudak adumaktada eidi thawaida leirammi, amasung yeng-u, swargada phambal ama khillammi, aduga phambal adugi mathakta amana phamlammi; 

3 Amasung phamliba Ibungo mahak adubu yengbada Jaspi amasung sardi nung mallammi, aduga yengbada emerald manba chumthangna phambal adu koisillammi. 

4 Aduga phambal adugi akoibada phambal kunmari leirammi, amasung phambansing asigi mathakta phingou thonba, aduga makhoigi makokta sanagi luhup uppa ahallaman kunmari phamba eina ure. 

5 Amasung phambal adudagi nongthang, makhol amasung nongkhongba yamna thoklak-i; aduga phambal adugi mamangda iswargi thawai taret oiriba mei chakliba meira taret leirammi; 

6 Amasung phambal adugi mamangda liklai manba ilang langba samadrugumba leirammi; aduga phambal adugi mamangda amasung akoibada mamitna maning mamang ithan thanba mathawai panba mari leirammi. 

7 Amasung mathawai panba ahanba adu nongsa manba, anisuba aduna sannao manba, ahumsuba aduna migigumba mamai panba, amasung marisuba aduna pairiba igal uchek manba oirammi. 

8 Aduga mathawai panba mari adu, amamamgi masa taruk taruk palli amasung ikoi koibadasu, manungthangbadasu mamitna ithan thanna lei; amasung makhoi aduna ahing nungthil potthaba leitana hai, Asengba, Asengba, Asengba, oiramba, oiriba amasung lakkadouriba, ingam ngamba Prabhu Iswarni. 

9 Amahiksung mathawai panbasing aduna phambal adugi mathakta phamliba, lomba naidana hingliba ibungo mangonda matik mangal, ikaikhumnaba amasung thagatpa piba matamda, 

10 Ahallaman kunmari aduna phambal adugi mathakta phamliba ibungo mahakki mangda tuthajaduna, lomba naidana hingliba ibungo mahakpu khurumjagani, amasung makhoigi luhup adu phambal adugi mangda huntharaga, haijagani, 

11 Eikhoigi Prabhu, Eikhoigi Iswar, ibungo nahakti matik mangal, ikaikhumnaba amasung panggal phangba matik chabani, maramdi ibungo nahakna pumnamakpu sembire, amasung ibungo nahakki ningbadagi pumnamak oire, aduga pumnamakpu sembire.

PHONGDOKPIBA WA 5 

Iswargi yao machagi marida uhanbiba


1 Amahiksung phambal adugi mathakta phamliba ibungo mahakki khut yetthangbada mapuk manam iraba, chum taret bada mapuk manam iraba, chum taret namlaba lairik ama eina ure. 

2 Amasung, lairik adu hangdoknaba aduga madugi chum adu thoknaba matik chaba kana leibage, haina awangba khonjenna laothokliba akanba swargadut amabu eina ure. 

3 Aduga swargada oirabasu, prithibigi mathakta nattraga makhada oirabasu, lairik adu hangdokpa nattragamadu yengba kana amatana ngamlamde. 

4 Amasung lairik adu hangdokpa nattraga madu yengba matik chaba kana amata phangdaba maramna eina yamna kaplammi. 

5 Aduga ahallamansinggi maraktagi amana eingonda hai, kapkanu; yeng-u, Jihudagi salaigi nongsa, Dayudki mara aduna lairik adusu madugi chum taret adusu hangdoknabagi damak ngamle. 

6 Amahiksung phambal adugi amasung mathawai panba mari adugi marakta aduga ahallamansing adugi mayaida, machi taret amasung mamit taret panba, hatkhibasu oibagumba; yao macha ama lepliba eina ure. prithibi pumnamakta thakhiba mamit adudi Iswargi thawai taretni. 

7 Aduga yao macha aduna lakladuna, phambal adugi mathakta phamliba Ibungo mahak adugi khut yetthangbadagi madu louthokle. 

8 Aduga lairik adu louthoklabada, mathawai panba mari aduna amasung ahllaman kunmari aduna yao macha adugi mangda tuthajare. Makhoi amamamgi bina, amasung asengbasinggi haijaba oiriba dhupna thanba sanagi tenggot Ieirammi. 

9 Amasung makhoina anouba isei saktuna hai, Lairik adu louba amasung madugi chum adu hangdokpa ibungodi matik chabani, maramdi Ibungodi hatkhre, aduga salai, loi, mi, amasung jat khudingdagi Ibungogi ina Iswargi damak Ibungona leibire, 

10 Aduga makhoibu eikhoigi iswargi damak ningthou leibak amasung purohitsing oiba ibungona sembire, amasung makhoina prithibida ningthou oina pangani. 

11 Amahiksung phambal adugi, mathawai panbasing adugi amasung ahallamansing adugi akoibada leiriba swargadut mayamgi khonjel eina usu ure, tasu tare; aduga makhoi gi masingdi lakha lakha, amasung lising lising oirammi; 

12 Makhoina awangba khonjenna hai, panggal, inakkhunba, lousing, akan athou ikaikhumnaba, matik mangal amasung thagatpa adu phangba, hatkhraba yao macha adudi matik chabani. 

13 Amasung swargada, prithibida, prithibigi makhada, samadruda aduga asisinggi manungda leiriba pumnamak, semkhraba khudingna asi haiba eina tare Phambal aduda phamliba ibungo mangonda amasung yao macha aduda thagatpa, ikaikhumnaba, matik mangal amasung panba adu lomba naidaba oisanu. 

14 Aduga mathawai panba mari aduna hai, Amen. amasung ahallamansing aduna tuthajaduna khurumjare.

PHONGDOKPIBA WA 6 

Chumsing hangdokpa


1 Amahiksung yao macha aduna chum taret adugi ama hangdokpa matamda eina ure, aduga mathawai panba mari adugi amana nongkhongbagi makhongumna, lak-u, haiba eina tare. 

2 Aduga eina ure, amasung yeng-u, sagol angouba ama, aduga madugi mathakta tongliba mahak aduna lirung pairammi; mangonda luhup pibikhre, aduga mahakna ngamla ngamla duna, ngamsu nganmanaba thokkhre. 

3 Amasung ibungona anisuba chum adu hangdokpa matamda, anisuba mathawai panba aduna, lak-u haiba eina tare. 

4 Aduga atei sagol ama thokkhre, madudi angangbani; amasung madugi mathakta tongliba mangonda prithibidagi ingthaba louthoknaba amasung mising amana amabu hatnaba pibire, aduga achouba kabakthang ama mangonda pibire. 

5 Amahiksung ibungona ahumsuba chum adu hangdokpa matamda, ahumsuba mathawai panba aduna, lak-u, haiba eina tare. aduga eina ure, amasung yeng-u, amuba sagol ama, aduga madugi mathakta tongliba mahak adugi makhutta khal ama leirammi. 

6 Amasung mathawai panba mari adugi maraktagi khonjel amagumna, gehu ser amagi lupa makhai ama, aduga job ser ahumgi lupa makhai ama; amasung thaoga draksha mahigabudi nahakna sokkanu, haiba eina tare. 

7 Amahiksung Ibungona marisuba chum adu hangdokpa matamda, marisusuba mathawai panba aduna, lak-u, haiba eina tare. 

8 Amasung eina ure, aduga yeng-u, sagol awaoba ama, amasung madugi mathakta tongliba mahak adugi maming siba kou-i; aduga khamnug leibbakna magi matung illammi. Amasung prithibigi saruk marigi saruk amagi mathakta matik, haibadi, kabakthangna, tanggambana, sibana amasung pritthibigi lamsasingna hatnanaba, makhoida pibire. 

9 Amahiksung Ibungona mangasuba chum adu hangdokpa matamda, iswargi wagi damak amasung makhoina pikhiba sakshi adugi damak hatkhiba makhoi adugi thawaising adu latnapunggi makhada eina ure; 

10 Aduga makhoina awangba khonjenna laoduna hai, he asengba amasung achumba mapu, prithibida pallibasinggi mathakta ibungona wayenbiduna, kaya kuina eikhoigi igi laman khumbiroidabage? 

11 Amasung makhoi amamamda achonba phingou pibire, aduga makhoigumna hatkadouriba, makhoiga minai oiminnabasingsu makhoigi machin manaosingsu masing sudriba phaoba, makhoina houjik matam kharagi damak potharamkhisanu, haina makhoida haibire. 

12 Amahiksung Ibungona taruksuba chum adu hangdokpa matamda eina ure, amasung achouba yuharaba thokle, numitna sa matugi phigumna murakle, amasung tha pumbana igumna oirakle; 

13 Aduga akanba nungsitna lenghanba heiyit pambina asangba heiyit kenhanbagum, atiyagi thawanmichaksingna prithibida tare. 

14 Amasung atiyabu lairik makol konsinbagumna louthokkhre, aduga ching khudingbusu, ithat khudingbasu magi magi maphamdagi honghankhre. 

15 Amasung prithibigi ningthousingna, angambasingna, lanjinglensingna, inakkhunbasingna, akanbasingna, minai khudingna amasung maningtamba mi khudingna makhoi masa masa chingnunghutta aduga chinggi nungjao manungda lotle; 

16 Aduga makhoina ching chingda amasung nungjao nungjaoda hai, eikhoigi ithakta taduna phambal adugi mathakta phamliba Ibungo mahakki mangdagi, amasung yao macha adugi asaoba adudagi eikhoibu lotpiyu; 

17 Maramdi makhoigi asaobagi achouba numit adu lakle, aduga kaaana leppa ngambage?

PHONGDOKPIBA WA 7 

Lising chama niphu-maribu chum namba


1 Asigi matungda prithibida, samadruda nattraga upambi khudinggi mathakta nungsit kari amata sittananaba, prithibigi nungsit mari pairiba swarga dut marina prithibigi chithek marida lepliba eina ure. 

2 Amasung hingliba Iswargi chum paiba atei swargadut amana numit thokparomdagi kakhatlakliba eina ure; aduga prithibibu amasung samadrubu sokhannanaba pikhiba swargadut mari aduda awangba khonjenna dut aduna laoduna hai, 

3 Eikhoina eikhoigi Iswargi minaisingbu maraibakta chum namdriba phaoba prithibibu, samadrubu aduga upambi makheibu sokhan-ganu. 

4 Aduga chum namkhiba singgi masing adu eina tare, Israyelgi machasinggi sagei khuding dagi chum namkhiba lakha ama, lising niphumari sui. 

5 Jihudagi salaidagi lising taranithoibu chum namle; Ruben-gi salaidagi lising taranithoibu Gadki salaidagi lising taranithoibu, 

6 Asergi salaidagi lising taranithoibu, Naptaligi salaidagi lising taranithoibu, Mansigi salaidagi lising taranithoibu, 

7 Sumiyon-gi salaidagi lising taranithoibu, Lebigi salaidagi lising taranithoibu, Isakhargi salaidagi lising taranithoibu, 

8 Sabulun-gi salaidagi lising taranithoibu, Jousephki salaidagi lising taranithoibu, Benyamin-gi salaidagi lising taranithoibu chum namle. 

Handokpirabasinggi marida swargada uhanbiba 

9 Asisinggi matungda eina ure, amasung yeng-u, mi kana amatana masing thiba ngamdaba, jat khudingdagi, salai, mi amasung lol pumnamaktagi achonba phingou thollaba amasung makhut makhutta thangdupki mana paiba miyam yamna pharnbal adugi amasung yao macha adugi mamangda leptuna, 

10 Awangba khonjenna laorak-i, Aran khubamdi phambal adugi mathakta phamliba eikhoigi iswardagi amasung yao macha adudagini. 

11 Amasung swargadut pumnamakna phambal adugi, ahallamansing adugi, amasung mathawai panba mari adugi akoibada leplammi, aduga makhoina phambal adugi mamangda uprakna tuthajaraga Iswarbu khurumjaduna hai, 

12 Amen! yaiphaba, matik mangal; lousing, thagatpa, ikaikhumnaba, panggal amasung akan-athou lomba naidana eikhoigi Iswarda oisanu Amen. 

13 Amahiksung ahallamansing adugi amana eingonda hanggatlak-i; achonba phingou thollibasing asi kanano, aduga makhoi kadaidagino? 

14 Amasung eina mangonda haire, Ibungo, nahakna khangbi. Aduga mahakna eingonda hai, asisingdi awa-anang achouba adudagi thoklakpasingni, amasung makhoigi achonba phi adu sudokchaduna, yao macha adugi ina ngouhalle. 

15 Maram aduna makhoidi Iswargi phambal adugi mangda leiribani; aduna makhoina Ibungo mahakpu ahing nungthil Ibungo mahakki asengba sangda khanjabani; amasung phambal adugi mathakta phamliba Ibungo mahakna makhoigi mathakta khanjinbigani. 

16 Makhoina amuk hanna lamlaroi, amuk hanna khouranglaroi; aduga makhoigi mathakta numitnasu, meichak kari amatanasu yeiraroi. 

17 Maramdi phambal adugi mayaida leiriba yao macha aduna makhoibu ngaksenbigani, aduga hingbagi isinggi iphutsing tanna chingbigani; amasung Iswarna makhoigi mamittagi pi makhei teithokpigani.

PHONGDOKPIBA WA 8 

Peresingga taret khongba


1 Amahiksung Ibungona taretsuba chum adu hangdokpa matamda, swargada pung makhoi amarom tuminna leirakle. 

2 Amasung Iswargi mangda lepliba swargadut taretpu aduga makhoida peresingga taret pibiba eina ure. 

3 Amasung sanagi dhup thanaba kambi pairiba atei swargadut amana laktuna latnapungda leple; aduga mahakna phambal adugi mangda leiba sanagi latnapung mathakta asengbasing pumnamakki haijaba aduga tinsinnanaba, mangonda dhup yamna pibire. 

4 Aduga swargadut adugi khuttagi dhupki meikhu aduna asengbasinggi haijaba aduga loinana iswargi mangda kakhatle. 

5 Amasung swargadut aduna dhupki kambi adu loure, aduga mahakna madu latnapunggi mei aduna thalhanduna prithibigi mathakta hunthei; aduga nongkhongba, makhol, nongthang ayamba amastingquharaha thoklakle. 

6 Amahiksung peresingga taret pairiba swargadut taret adu khongnanaba masa masana thourang langle. 

7 Amasung ahanba aduna khongle, aduga lel amasung mei, iga totnaduna thoklakle, amasung madusingbu prithibida hunthare; aduga prithibigi saruk ahumgi saruk ama chakthokle, upambi makheigi saruk ahumgi saruk ama, chakthokle; amasung napi asengba pumnamak chakthokle. 

8 Amasung anisuba swargadut aduna khongle, aduga mein chakliba achouba chingjaogumba samadruda hunthare; amasung samadrugi saruk ahumgi saruk ama i oirakle; 

9 Aduga samadruda leiriba thawai panba lenglipallibasing adugi saruk ahumgi saruk ama sire, amasung hi saruk ahumgi saruk ama manghalle. 

10 Amasung ahumsuba swargadut aduna khongle, aduga meiragumna chakpa achouba thawanmichak ama atiyadagi tatharaktuna, turen makheigi saruk ahumgi saruk amagi mathakta amasung isinggi iphut makheigi mathakta tare. 

11 Aduga thawanmichak adugi maming laibakngou kou-i. Amasung isinggi saruk ahumgi saruk ama laibak-ngou oirakle; aduga mi ayamba ising aduna sire, maramdi ising adubu khahalle. 

12 Amasung marisuba swargadut aduna khongle, aduga numitki saruk ahumgi saruk ama, thagi saruk ahumgi saruk ama amasung thawamnichaksinggi saruk ahumgi saruk ama mamnanaba; aduga nungthingi saruk ahumgi saruk ama, ahinggisu adugumna ngandananaba, numitki, thagi amasung thawanmichaksinggi saruk ahumgi saruk ama yeihatle. 

13 Amahiksung eina ure, aduga atiyagi mayaida pairiba igal uchek amana awangba khonjelna haiba eina tare, khonggadouriba swargadut ahumgi peresinggagi atei atei makhol adugi maramna, prithibida pallibasinggi damak awabanida, awabanida, awabanida!

PHONGDOKPIBA WA 9 

1 Amahiksung mangasuba swargadut aduna khongle, aduga atiyadagi thawan michak ama prithibida takhiba eina ure, amasung makha naidaba kom adugi machin-gi so mangonda pire. 

2 Amasung mahakna makha naidaba kom adugi machin adu hangdokle; aduga meipham achoubagi meikhugumna machin adudagi meikhu thoklakle; amasung numitsu atiyasu machin adugi meikhuna manghalle. 

3 Aduga meikhu adudagi prithibida koujeng mayam thoklakle; amasung prithibigi brischikki panggal leibagumna, makhoidasu panggal adu pibire. 

4 Amasung maraibakta iswargi chum leitaba misingbuta nattana, prithibigi napibusu, karigumba asangba potpusu, karigumba upambibusu makhoina sokpharoi haiduna makhoida hai. 

5 Aduga makhoina makhoibu hattana tha manga wahannanaba makhoida pire; amasung makhoigi wahanba adu brischikkna mibu mamuna thinbada wahanbagum oire. 

6 Aduga numitsing aduda misingna siba thiragasu khak phangloi; amasung makhoi na siba yamna pamgani, aduga sibana makhoidagi chen-thok-i. 

7 Amahiksung koujeng mayam adugi maongdi lan-gi thourang langlaba sagonsingga mannabani; aduga madusinggi makok thakta sana manba luhup uppagumbani; amasung madusinggi mamaidi misinggi maigumbani. 

8 Aduga nupisinggi samgumba madusinggi sam leirammi, amasung madusinggi mayadi nongsasinggi mayagumlammi. 

9 Aduga yotki thabakkhanggumba madusinggi thabakhang leirammi; amasung madusinggi masagi makhondi kang mayamgi makhongum, sagol mayamna landa hotchinkhibagum oirammi. 

10 Aduga brischikka mannaba madusinggi mameisu lei, mamusu lei; amasung madusinggi mameida misingbu tha manga nahannaba panggal lei. 

11 Madusinggi mathakta makha naidaba kom adugi dut aduna ningthougumna lei; magi mamingdi Ibriya londa Abaddon, aduga Grik londa Applluyon kou-i. 

12 Ahanba awaba adu lanthokkhre; yeng-u, asigi matungda amuk awaba ani lak-i. 

13 Amahiksung taruksuba swargadut aduna khongle, aduga iswargi mangda leiriba sanagi latnapung adugi machidagi khonjel amana, 

14 Peresingga leiba taruksuba swargadut aduda haiba eina tare, achouba turel Iyuphreitista pulliba dut mari adu thadok-u. 

15 Amasung pung, numit, tha amasung chahi adugi damak thourang langlaba dut mari adubu, misinggi saruk ahumgi saruk ama hatnanaba, thadokle. 

16 Aduga sagol tongba lanmising adugi masingdi lakha lising ani oire; eina makhoigi masing adu tare. 

17 Amasung auba aduda sagonsingbu, aduga madusinggi mathakta tonglibasingbu eina matou asumna ure: makhoigi thabakkhang meigi, kombirei gi, amasung gandhupki machugumbani, aduga sagonsing adugi makok nongsasinggi makok kumbani; amasung madu-singgi macindagi mei, meikhu amasung gandhup thoklak-i. 

18 Cheinakhon ahum asina misinggi saruk ahumgi saruk amabu madusinggi machindagi thoklakpa mei, meikhu amasung gandhup aduna hatle. 

19 Maramdi sagonsing adugi panggandi machin machinda amasung mamei mameida lei; maramdi mamei mamei adu linsing malli, amasung makok palli, aduga madusingna misingbu sokhalli. 

20 Amasung cheinakhon asisingna hatkhidaba leihouriba misingna bhutsingbu aduga sanagi, lupagi, pithraigi, nunggi amasung ugi laimurti, ubasu, tabasu, chatpasu ngamdaba adusingbu khurumdananaba, makhoigi khutki thabak, adudagi pukning hongde; 

21 Aduga makhoigi mihatpadagi, hidam-yaidambadagi, marumbi thambadagi, nattraga huranbadagi makhoina pukning hongde.

PHONGDOKPIBA WA 10 

Akanba swargadut amasung lairik macha


1 Amahiksung leichin thollaba, akanba atei swargadut ama swargadagi lengtharakpa eina ure; aduga makok thakta chumthang leirammi, mamai numitkumna amasung makhong meigi yumbigumna oirammi; 

2 Aduga mahakki makhutta hangdoklaba lairik macha ama leirammi. Amasung mahakna makhong yetna samadruda, aduga oina prithibida thamle; 

3 Aduga nongsana khongbagumna mahakna awangba khonjelna laore; amasung mahakna laorabada, nongkhongba taretna makhol thoklakle. 

4 Amahiksung nongkhongba taret aduna khongbada, eina isin-gadourammi; aduga, nong khongba taret aduna haidok haidokpa adu chum namsillu adubu ibadi isin-ganu, haiba swargadagi khonjel ama eina tare. 

5 Amahiksung eina uraba swargadut, haibadi samadruda amasung prithibida lepliba aduna swargalomda makhut yet thanggattuna, 

6 Atiyabusu, madugi manungda leiri leiriba adubusu prithibibusu madugi manungda leiri leiriba adubusu aduga samadrubusu, madugi manungda leiri leiriba adubusu sembiriba, lomba naidana hingliba Ibungo mahakpu panduna wasakle, haibadi, amuk thillaroi, 

7 Adubu swargadut taretsuba adugi khonjelgi numit numitta, mahakna khonggadouba matamda, maduda ibungo mahakki minai wa takthokpasingda phongdokpikhiba aphaba wapao adugi matung inna iswargi athuppa wa adu thunglagani. 

8 Amahiksung swargadagi eina takhiba khonjel aduna amuk eiga ngangnaduna hai, chatlu, samadruda amasung prithibida lepliba swargadut adugi khutta hangdokliba lairik adu lou. 

9 Aduga eina swargadut adu bum chatkhiduna, lairik macha adu eingonda pibiyu, haiduna mangonda hai. Amasung mahakna eingonda hai, lou, aduga madu chathok-u; amasung maduna napukpu khahangani, adubu nachindadi khoihigum thumgani. 

10 Amasung eina lairik macha adu swargadut adugi makhuttagi louraga chathokle; aduga madu ichindadi khoi-higumna thumle, amasung eina madu chakhrabada ipukpu khahalle. 

11 Aduga makhoina eingonda hai, nahakna ayamba misinggi, jatsinggi, lol lon-gi amasung ningthousinggi maramda amukka iswargi wa takthokpa tare.

PHONGDOKPIBA WA 11 

Sakshi Ani


1 Amahiksung cheisu manba singnang ama eingonda piraga hai, hougatlu iswargi sang, latnapung, amasung maduda khurumbasingbu chang ollu. 

2 Aduga iswargi sang adugi mapanda leiriba sumang adu thadok-u, amasung madu onganu; maramdi madu atoppa jatsingda pikhrabani, aduga makhoina tha niphunithoi makhongna asengba sahar adubu netkani. 

3 Amasung eina eigi sakshi anida matik pibigani, aduga makhoina thouri phi settuna numit using ama chani humphu iswargi wa takthokkani. 

4 Makhoi asi prithibigi prabhugi mangda lepliba chorphol pambi ani amasung thaomei makhong ani aduni. 

5 Amasung kanagumba mina makhoibu sathina touninglabadi, makhoigi macindagi mei thoklaktuna makhoigi yeknabasingbu chathok-i; aduga kanagumba mina makhoibu sathina touninglagadi, matou asumna mabu hatkadabani. 

6 Makhoi asina iswargi wa takthokpagi matamda nongchudananaba, atiyabu thingnaba makhoigi matik lei; amasung makhoina pamba pambada isinggi mathakta isingbu i olhannaba, aduga cheinakhon khibikna prithibibu yeinaba, makhoigi matik lei. 

7 Amasung makhoina makhoigi sakshi piba adu loirabada, makha naidaba komdagi thoklakpa sa aduna makhoiga lan soknaduna makhoibu ngamlaga hatkani. 

8 Aduga thawaigi oina Sodom amasung Misor kouba, mapham adudasu makhoigi Prabhubu krosta hatkhiba, achouba sahar adugi lambi aduda makhoigi asiba hakchang adu lei. 

9 Amasung mising, salaisinggi, lol lon-gi, aduga jatsinggi maraktagi miyamna makhoigi asiba hakchang aduda numit humniga tangkhai yengduna lei, amasung makhoigi asiba hakchang adu mongphamda phumba yabide, 

10 Aduga prithibida pallibasingna makhoigi maramda haraosu harao-i, kumeisu tou-i; amasung makhoi amana amada khudon thonnagani, maramdi iswargi wa takthokpa ani asina prithibida pallibasingbu wahalle. 

11 Aduga numit humniga tang-khai adugi matungda iswardagi hingbagi swar makhoigi nungda changkhiduna, makhoina makhongna leple, amasung makhoibu ubasing adugi mathakta akiba thokle; 

12 Aduga, asi tanna kakhatlak-u, haiba makhoida haiba swargadagi awang-ba khonjel ama makhoina tare. Amasung makhoi anina leichinda swarga tanna kakhatkhre; aduga makhoigi yeknabasingna makhoibu uhoure. 

13 Amahiksung pung aduda akanba yuharaba ama thokladuna, sahar adugi saruk taragi saruk ama kinthare; amasung yuharaba aduda mi lising taret sire, aduga lemhoubasing aduna yamna kiraduna swargagi Iswarbu thagatle. 

14 Anisuba awaba adu lanthokkhre; yeng-u, ahumsuba awaba adu thuna lakli.


Taretsuba peresingga.


15 Amahiksung taretsuba swargadut aduna khongle; aduga swargada awang awangba khonjel thoklaktuna hai, taibangpan-gi ningthou-leibak adu eikhoigi Prabhugi amasung Ibungo mahakki Khristagini, aduga Ibungo mahakna lomba naidana pan-gani. 

16 Amasung iswargi mangda makhoi makhoigi phambanda phamliba ahallaman kunmari aduna uprakna tuthajaraga, iswarbu khurumjaduna hai, 

17 He Prabhu Iswar, ingam ngamba, oiriba amasung oiramba, Ibungo nahakpu eikhoina thagatchari, maramdi Ibungo nahakna nahakki matik achouba louduna pallakle. 

18 Amasung jatsingna saorakle aduga Ibungo nahakki asaoba lakle, amasung asibasingbu wayennaba matam aduga Ibungo nahakki mini wa takthokpasingda, asengbasingda amasung Ibungo nahakki mingbu kiba apik achoubasingda makhoi makhoigi mana pibinaba, amasung prithibibu manghanbasingbu manghannaba matam lakle. 

19 Amasung swargada leiriba iswargi sang adu hangdokle, aduga Ibungo mahakki walepnabagi upu adu Ibunga mahakki sang manungda ure; amasung nongthang, makhol nongkhongba ayamba, yuharaba aduga lel achouba tholdakle.

PHONGDOKPIBA WA 12 

Nupi amasung marida uhanbiba


1 Amahiksung achouba khudam ama swargada ure; nupi amana numitna phi gum ille, aduga thana makhong khada, amasung thawanmichak taranithoigi luhupna makok thakta leirammi; 

2 Aduga mahakti mironbini, amasung mahakna chabokpa chingnaduna pokkdabagi naduna lao-khong-i: 

3 Amasung atei khudam ama swargada ure: aduga yeng-u, makok taret machi tara panba amasung makok taret adugi mathakta ningthou luhup uppa acouba angangba chinglai ama. 

4 Amasung magi mameina atiyagi thawanmichaksinggi saruk ahumgi saruk amabu chinisinduna prithibida hunthare. Aduga nupi aduna macha poklaga, chinglai aduna macha adubu chathoknanaba, macha pokkadourabi adugi mangda lep-i. 

5 Amasung mahakna macha nipa ama pokle; macha nipa aduna jat pumnamakpu jotki cheina ngaksenbigani, aduga macha asibu iswargi maphamda amasung ibungo mahakki phambanda pak pukhatkhre. 

6 Amahiksung nupi aduna lamjaoda chenkhre. Mapham aduda makhoina mahakpu numit lising ama chani humphu yokthakpinanaba, iswarna langbiraba mahakki mapham lei. 

7 Amahiksung swargada lal oirakle; Mikhayelga mahakki dutsinggana chinglai aduga soknanaba thoklaktuna, chinglaiga magi dutsinggana lal soknare; 

8 Adubu makhoina ngamsu ngamdre, swargada makhoigi mapham amuk henna phangsu phangdre. 

9 Amasung chinglai achouba, lil hanuba, diyabol amasung seitan kouraba, taibangpal apumbabu minamba mapu adubu, hunthare; mabu prithibida hunthare, aduga magi dutsingbu maga loinana hunthare. 

10 Aduga swargada awangba khonjel amana asi haiba eina tare, houjikti eikhoigi iswargi kanbiba, panggal amasung leibak adu, aduga Ibungo mahakki Khristagi matik adu lakle; maramdi eikhoigi ichin inaosingbu theijinba mapu, ahing nungthil eikhoigi iswargi mangda theijinba adubu hunthakhre. 

11 Amasung makhoina mabu yao macha adugi maramna amasung makhoigi, sakshigi wa adugi maramna ngamle, aduga makhoina makhoigi thawaibu siba phaoba pammude. 

12 Maram aduna, he swarga amasung masigi manungda pallibasa, haraojaro: prithibigi amasung samadrugi damakti awabanida, maramdi diyabol aduna magi matam khajikta lei haiba khangduna, yamna mei houna saoduna nakhoi tanna chatthakhre. 

13 Amahiksung chinglai aduna mabu prithibida hunthakhre haiba khanglabada, macha nipa pokpi nupi adubu otneire. 

14 Aduga nupi aduna lamjaoda mahakki mapham, matam amagi, matam anigi amasung matam tangkhaigi damak lil adugi mangdagi mahakpu yokthakpiba mapham adu tanna painanaba, mangonda achouba igal uchek adugi masa ani pibire. 

15 Maduda lil aduna nupi adubu ising ichaona puhankhinanaba, nupi adugi matungda turen-gumna ising magi machindagi kamthokle. 

16 Adubu prithibina nupi adubu pangbire, amasung prithibina machin kakhattuna, chinglai aduna machindagi kamthokpa turel adu yotsinkhre. 

17 Aduga chinglai aduna nupi aduda saoraduna mahakki dhara leihouriba, iswargi, yathang makhei ngakpa amasung Jisugi sakshi chetna paiba makhoi aduga lan soknanaba chatthokle. Aduga madi samadrugi leingoi mathakta leple.

PHONGDOKPIBA WA 13 

Lamsasinggi marida uhanbiba


1 Amahiksung machi tara, makok taret panba, aduga magi machi machigi mathakta ningthou-luhup tara leiba amasung magi makok makokta iswarbu thouoidaba ming leiba sa ama samadrudagi kakhatlakpa eina ure. 

2 Amasung eina uba sa adu keisal mallammi, aduga magi makhongdi saomgigum, amasung machindi nongsagi machingum oirammi. Aduga chinglai aduna mangond magi panggal, phambal amasung achouba matik adu pibire. 

3 Aduga magi makok ama siba tanna yeikhibagum eina ure, amasung magi sinaba cheipham adu phakhre, aduga prithibi apumbana ngakladauna sa adugi matung ille. 

4 Amasung makhoina chinglai adubu khurumle, maramdi mana sa aduda matik pire, aduga makhoina sa adubu khurumduna hai, sa aduga mannaba kana leibage, amasung maga lan soknaba kanana ngambage? 

5 Aduga mangonda achouba amasung iswarbu thouoidaba wa ngangba machin pibire, amasung tha niphunithoi chuppa matik adu pibire. 

6 Aduga mana iswargi mathakta thouoidanabagi damak ibungo mahakki mingbu amasung ibungo mahakki phijang adubu, haibadi swargada pallibasingbu, thina ngangnanaba machin kakhatle. 

7 Amasung asengbasingga lan soknaduna makhoibu ngamnanaba mangonda pire; aduga salai, mi, lol amsung jat khudinggi mathakta matik mangonda pire. 

8 Amahiksung taibangpal houngeidagi hatkhraba yao macha adugi hingbagi lalrikta magi magi ming isindaba prithibida palliba pumnamakna mabu khurumgani. 

9 Kanagumba nakong pallabadi, mahakna tajasanu. 

10 Kanagumbana apha apun oinabagi oirabadi, mahakna apha apun oinaba chatkani; kanagumbana kabakthangna hatlagadi mahakpu kabak-thangna hatpa tare. Asida achumbasinggi khangheiba amasung thajaba adu lei. 

11 Amahiksung sa atei ama prithibidagi kakhatlakpa eina ure; aduga magi machi ani yao machagiga mannana leirammi, amasung mana chinglaigumna wa nganglammi. 

12 Aduga mana ahanba sa adugi matik pumnamak adu magi mamangda sijinnei. Aduga magi sinaba cheipham phakhiba ahanba sa aduda prithibibu amasung madugi manugda pallibasingbu mana khurumhalli.
